zu: Landela iTECNO kuFacebook, Instagram nakuTwitter ukuze uthole izibuyekezo zakamuva futhi ulungele ukuqalisa uhambo olumangalisayo lobuciko nobuchwepheshe ngendlela ongakaze uyibone!

am: ዱክ እና አይካንቦይ ከ100 በላይ የንግድ ባለቤቶች ላይ ተጽዕኖ ለማሳደር የመጀመርያው የ ኤስኤምኢ ቡትካምፕ ያካሂዳሉ
en: Duke & ICANBOI hold inaugral SME Bootcamp to impact over 100+ business owners
ha: Duke & ICANBOI sun yi taron SME Bootcamp domin bunƙasa masu kasuwanci fiye da 100.
sw: Duke & ICANBOI wanaendesha uzinduzi wa SME Bootcamp utakaobadilisha wamiliki wa biashara zaidi ya 100+
yo: Duke & ICANBOI ṣé àkọ́ṣe Ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ fún SME (òkòwò kékeré àti alábọ́dé) láti ṣe ìrólágbára pàtàkì fún àwọn olókoòwò tí wọ́n lé ní 100+
zu: IDuke ne-ICANBOI babambe umhlangano weSME ukuze babe nomthelela kosomabhizinisi abangaphezu kuka-100+

am: የናይጄሪያ የኢኮኖሚ ዋና ከተማ ሌጎስ በናይጄሪያ ውስጥ ለአነስተኛ እና መካከለኛ ኢንተርፕራይዞች( ኤስኤምኢስ) ማዕከል ናት እና ድንገተኛ ለውጦች፣ ከመጠን በላይ ቊጥጥር እና አብዛኛውን ጊዜ መሰናክሎችን ለመዳሰስ የቴክኒክ እውቀት እጥረት ጫና ያለባት መልክዓ ምድር ናት።
en: Lagos, the economic capital of Nigeria is a hub for small and medium enterprises (SMEs) in Nigeria and is a landscape laden with sudden changes, overregulation & most times lack of technical know how in navigating hurdles.
ha: Legas, cibiyar tattalin arzikin Nijeriya waje ne na masu ƙanana da matsakaicin kasuwanci (SME) a Nijeriya kuma ƙasa ce da take saurin samun canje-canje, yawan dokoki da kuma rashin sanin makamar aiki wani lokacin wajen neman mafita.
sw: Lagos, mtaji mkubwa wa uchumi wa Nigeria ni uwepo wa makampuni madogo na makubwa ya biashara (SMEs), pia ni sehemu ambayo imelemewa na mabadiliko ya ghafla, udhibiti uliyokithiri na kukosekana kwa teknolojia inayoweza kuondoa vikwazo.
yo: Ilú Èkó, olúìlú ọrọ̀-ajé ilẹ̀ Nigeria ni ibùdó àwọn òkòwò kékeré àti alábọ́dé (SMEs) ní Nigeria tí ó sì tún jẹ́ ilẹ̀ tí ó kún fún àwọn àyídà òjijì, òfin àfipáṣe & àìnímọ̀ọ́ṣe kíkún nípa líla ewu kọjá sì wọ́pọ̀.
zu: ILagos, inhloko-dolobha yezomnotho yaseNigeria iyisizinda samabhizinisi amancane naphakathi (ismall and medium enterprises (ama-SME)) eNigeria futhi iyindawo egcwele izinguquko, umthethonqubo omningi futhi izikhathi eziningi alukho ulwazi olwanele lobuchwepheshe ukuze bakwazi ukumelana nezithiyo.

am: የ ኤስኤምኢ ቡት ካንፕ 1.0 ተነሳሽነት አዳዲስ እና ነባር የንግድ ሥራ ባለቤቶችን በቋሚነት በተወዳዳሪ ገበያ ውስጥ ለማቆየት ትክክለኛውን ሀብት እና ዕድሎች በመስጠት በሌጎስ ናይጄሪያ ውስጥ አዲስ ወይም ነባር የንግድ ሥራን የማካሄድ ሸክሞችን ለማስተካከል ያለመ ነው።
en: The SME Bootcamp 1.0 Initiative aims to fix the burdens with running a new or existing business in Lagos Nigeria by equipping new and existing business owners with the right resources and opportunities to stay afloat in an ever-competitive marketplace.
ha: SME Bootcamp 1.0 Initiative ya maida hankali ne wajen gyara matsalolin tafiyar da sabon kasuwanci ko wanda ake yinsa a lokacin a Legas Nijeriya ta hanyar samarwa da masu sabo ko tsohon kasuwanci kayan buƙata da damarmaki domin tabbatar da kasuwancinsu a kasuwar da take cike da abokan gasa na kasuwanci a koda yaushe.
sw: Mpango wa SMEs Bootcamp 1.0 unalenga kurekebisha matatizo kwa kuendesha biashara mpya au ilizopo Lagos Nigeria kwa kuandaa wamiliki wapya na waliyopo wa biashara, rasilimali na fursa zinazofaa ili kubakia kwenye soko linaloshindana kila wakati.
yo: Ètò àtinúdá Ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ SME 1.0 náà ní àfojúsùn láti yanjú àwọn ẹrù tí ó rọ̀ mọ́ ṣíṣe àkóso òkòwò tuntun àbí àwọn òkòwò tí wọ́n wà tẹ́lẹ̀ ní ìlú Èkó ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria nípa fífún àwọn olókoòwò tuntun àti tí wọ́n wà tẹ́lẹ̀ ní àwọn ohun àmúṣe àti àǹfààní tí ó tọ́ láti borí ní ọjà olórogún nígbà gbogbo.
zu: ISME Bootcamp 1.0 Initiative ihlose ukulungisa imithwalo ephathelene nokuba nebhizinisi elisha noma elikade livele likhona eLagos eNigeria ngokuhlomisa abanikazi bamabhizinisi abasha nabakade bevele bekhona ngezinsiza ezifanele namathuba okuhlala besebenza endaweni yemakethe ehlale iqhudelana.

am: ዱክ ሴል፣ ከ አይካንቦል ጋር በመተባበር የሌጎስ ግዛት የስራ ትረስት ፈንድ (ኤልኤስኢቲኤፍ) ፣ የናይጄሪያ ቻርተርድ አካውንታንት ኢንስቲትዩት (አይሲኤን) እና የኢንዱስትሪ ባንክ (ቢኦኤል)፣ ጎ ቤቶች ኣሊያንስ እና ሳላድ አፍሪካ አዲስ የ ኤስኤምኢኤስ ትውልድ ይሰበስባል።ግንኙነቱም ሥራ ፈጣሪዎችን እና የንግድ ሥራ ባለቤቶችን በእውቀት፣ ስልጠና እና ንግዶቻቸውን ለማሳደግ እና ለመጨመር እድሎችን ይሰጣል።
en: Duke Sell, in collaboration with ICANBOI, the Lagos State Employment Trust Fund (LSETF), Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN) and the Bank of Industry (BOI), Jobtech Alliance, and Salad Africa will gather a new generation of SMEs to equip entrepreneurs & business owners with the knowledge, training, and opportunities to grow and scale their businesses.
ha: Duke Sell, tare da haɗin guiwar ICANBOI, da Lagos State Employment Trust Fund (LSETF), Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN) da kuma Bank of Industry (BOI), Jobtech Alliance, da Salad Afirka za su tattara sababbin SME na zamani don samarwa da masu sana’ar hannu da kasuwanci ilimi, horo, da kuma damarmaki domin bunƙasa da cigaban kasuwancinsu.
sw: Dukesell kwa kushirikiana na na ICANBOI, Lagos State Employment Trust Fund (LSETE), Intitution of Chartered Accounts of Nigeria (ICAN), na Benki ya viwanda (BOI), Jobtech Alliance pamoja na Salad Africa watakusanya kizazi kipya cha SME ili kuwapa wajasiriamali na wamiliki wa biashara maarifa, mafunzo na fursa za kukuza biashara zao.
yo: Duke Sell, ní ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú ICANBOI, Àjọ Aṣèrànwọ́ Ìrónilágbára ti Ìlú Èkó (LSETF), Ìgbìmọ̀ àwọn Aṣèṣirò-owó Oníwèé-àṣẹ ilẹ̀ Nigeria (ICAN) àti Báńkì Aṣèrànwọ́ owó fún ilé-iṣẹ́ (BOI), Jobtech Alliance àti Salad Africa ni wọn yóò ṣe àkójọ ìran àwọn SMEs tuntun tí wọn yóò sì pèsè ìmọ̀, ẹ̀kọ́ àti àwọn àǹfààní ìdàgbàsókè àti ìdàgbàsókè àwọn òkòwò fún àwọn olùṣòwò & olókoòwò.
zu: IDuke Sell, ngokubambisana ne-ICANBOI, iLagos State Employment Trust Fund (iLSETF), i-Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (i-ICAN) kanye neBank of Industry (iBOI), iJobtech Alliance, kanye neSalad Africa bazohlanganisa isizukulwane esisha sama-SME ukuhlomisa osomabhizinisi nabanikazi bamabhizinisi ngolwazi, ukuqeqeshwa, namathuba okukhulisa amabhizinisi abo.

am: የቡትካምፕው ጭብጥ" አንድ አነስተኛና መካከለኛ ኢንተርፕራይዝ ንግድዎን ለመጀመር እና ለማሳደግ መመሪያ ነው" የሚል ሲሆን ይህም የሚካሄደው በያባ ሌጎስ እምብርት ውስጥ በሚገኘው የአይሲኤኤንቢኦኤል የፈጠራ ማዕከል ውስጥ ነው።
en: The bootcamp is themed “An SME Guide to Starting and Growing Your Business” which will be held at the ICANBOI Innovation Hub situated in the heart of Yaba, Lagos
ha: An yi wa bootcamp ɗin taken “An SME Guide to Starting and Growing Your Business” wanda za a gudanar da shi a dandalin ICANBOI Innovation wanda yake a tsakiyar Yaba, Legas.
sw: Mada ya bootcamp inasema "mwongozo wa SME wa kuanzisha na kukuza biashara yako" ambayo itazungumziwa katika kilele cha uvumbuzi wa ICANBOI itakayofanyika katikati ya mji wa Yoba jijini Lagos
yo: "Ìtọ́sọ́nà SME láti Bẹ̀rẹ̀ àti láti mú Ìdàgbàsókè bá Òkòwò Rẹ" ni àkòrí ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ náà, èyí tí yóò wáyé ní Ìbùdó Ìṣàtinúdá ti ICANBOI tí ó kalẹ̀ sí àárín gbùngbùn Yaba ní ìlú Èkó.
zu: Ibootcamp inesihloko esithi “Umhlahlandlela wamaSME Wokuqala Nokukhulisa Ibhizinisi Lakho” izobanjelwa e-ICANBOI Innovation Hub etholakala phakathi neYaba, eLagos.

am: የቡትካምፕ ተሳታፊዎች፣ አዲስ እና ነባር የንግድ ባለቤቶች በላጎስ ውስጥ እንደ ሥራ ፈጣሪ ንግድ ለመጀመር እና ለማሳደግ ዕንቅፋቶችን ለመቀነስ የሚያስፈልጉ ስልጠናዎችን፣ ገብአቶችን እና እድሎችን የማግኘት እድል ይሰጣል።
en: The Bootcamp provides participants, new and existing business owners with the opportunity to access training, resources and opportunities needed to reduce the barriers to starting and growing a business as an entrepreneur in Lagos.
ha: Bootcamp ɗin ya tanadarwa wanda suka shiga tsarin, masu sabo da tsohon kasuwanci damarmaki na samun horo, kayan amfani da damarmaki da ake buƙata domin rage wahalar farawa ko bunƙasa kasuwanci a matsayinka na mai sana’a a Legas.
sw: Bootcamp inawapa washiriki, wamiliki wapya na waliyopo wa biashara watapata fursa ya kupata mafunzo, rasilimali na fursa zinazohitajika ili kupunguza vikwazo vya kuanzisha na kukuza biashara kama mjasiriamali huko Lagos.
yo: Ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ náà yóò fún àwọn olùkópa, olókoòwò tuntun àti àwọn ti tẹ́lẹ̀ ní àǹfààní láti rí àyè sí ètò ẹ̀kọ́, àwọn ohun àmúṣe àti àǹfààní tí wọ́n nílò láti mú àdínkù bá àwọn ìdènà tí ó so mọ́ bíbẹ̀rẹ̀ òkòwò àti mímú òkòwò gbòòrò gẹ́gẹ́ bí i olùṣòwò ní ìlú Èkó.
zu: IBootcamp inikeza ababambiqhaza, abanikazi bamabhizinisi abasha nabakhona ithuba lokuthola uqeqesho, izinsiza namathuba adingekayo ukuze kuncishiswe izithiyo zokuqala nokukhulisa ibhizinisi njengosomabhizinisi eLagos.

am: ቀን ነሐሴ 26 ቀን 2023 እ.ኤ.አ ( ቅዳሜ)

zu: Usuku: uNcwaba 26, 2023 (ngoMgqibelo)

en: Dukesell

am: ዱክ ማንኛውም ሰው ያለ ካፒታል ወይም ክምችት የቀጥታ መስመር ላይ ንግድ እንዲጀምር የሚያስችል ዳግም ለመሽጥ የሚያስችል መድረክ ነው።
en: Duke is a reselling platform that enables anyone to start an online business with no capital or inventory.
ha: Duke wani dandali ne nz siyarwa da yake ba wa kowa damar fara kasuwancin yanar gizo ba tare da jari ko kaya ba.
sw: Duke wanauza tena majukwaa yanayoweza kumsaidia mtu yeyote kuanzisha biashara mtandaoni bila mtaji.
yo: Duke jẹ́ ìkànnì ìṣàtúntà tí ó fún ẹnikẹ́ni ní ìkànnì láti bẹ̀rẹ̀ òwò orí ayélujára láì fi owó ìdókòwò tàbí ọjà kankan bẹ̀rẹ̀.
zu: IDuke yingosi yokuthengisa kabusha eyenza noma ubani akwazi ukuqala ibhizinisi eliku-inthanethi ngaphandle kwemali noma uhlu.

am: ይህንን የምናደርገው መሠረተ ልማት በማሙዋላት፣ ክምችት እና እውቀትን በማቅረብ ነው፣ በዚህም ዛሬ ንግድ ለመጀመር የመግቢያ መሰናክልን በመቀነስ ነው።
en: We do this by providing the infrastructure, inventory, and know-how, thereby reducing the barrier to entry to starting a business today.
ha: Muna yin haka ne ta samar da kayan more rayuwa, kayan siyarwa, da sanin makamar aiki, domin sauƙaƙa wahalar fara shiga kasuwanci a yau.
sw: Tunafanya hivi kwa kutoa miundo mbinu, mtaji na kutoa elimu ya kupunguza vikwazo vya biashara mpya.
yo: A ń ṣe èyí nípa pípèsè ohun amáyédẹrùn, ọjà àti ọgbọ́n ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe tí yóò dín ìdènà tí ó rọ̀ mọ́ bíbẹ̀rẹ̀ òkòwò títí dé orí mímú òkòwò gbòòrò ní ojú ọjà òní.
zu: Lokhu sikwenza ngokuhlinzeka ngengqalasizinda, uhlu, kanye nolwazi, ngaleyo ndlela sinciphisa okungavimba ukuba uqale ibhizinisi namuhla.

am: የአይካን-ቦይ የፈጠራ ማዕከል
en: ICAN-BOI Innovation Hub
ha: ICAN-BOI Innovation Hub
sw: ICAN-BOI Innovation Hub
yo: Ibùdó Ìṣàtinúdá ICAN-BOI
zu: I-ICAN-BOI Innovation Hub

am: የአይካን-ቦይ በቴክኖሎጂ እና በችሎታ ማግኛ ላይ እየጨመረ የመጣውን ትኩረት በሥራ ፈጠራ ማጐልበት በኩል ተግባራዊ የማድረግ መድረክ ነው።
en: ICAN-BOI is a platform to actualize the growing focus on technology and skills acquisition through entrepreneurship empowerment.
ha: ICAN-BOI wani dandal ine wanda ake samar da lura da cigaban fasaha da samun ƙwarewa ta hanyar bunƙasa sana’ar hannu.
sw: Jukwaa la ICAN-BOI lina linawezesha ukuaji wa teknolojia na ujuzi kwa kupitia uwezeshaji wa wajasiriamali.
yo: ICAN-BOI jẹ́ ìkànnì láti mú kí àfojúsùn tí ó ń pọ̀ si nípa ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ àti iṣẹ́ ọwọ́ kíkọ́ wá sí ìmúṣẹ nípasẹ̀ ìrónilágbára lórí étò ìṣòwò.
zu: I-ICAN-BOI iyingosi yokugxila ekukhuleni kwezobuchwepheshe kanye nokutholwa kwamakhono ngokunikwa amandla kwezamabhizinisi.

am: ተልዕኮው ተማሪዎችን፣ አካዳሚያን፣ ፈጠራዎችን፣ ቬንቸር ካፒታሊስቶችን እና የኢኮኖሚ ልማት ባለሙያዎችን ጨምሮ ለቴክኖሎጂ ችሎታ እና ፈጠራ መገናኛ መሆን ነው።
en: It is on a mission to be a nexus for tech talent and innovation, including students, academia, innovators, venture capitalists, and economic development experts.
ha: Ta ɗauki aniyar zama hanyar haɗa ƙwarewar fasaha da ƙirƙira, wanda ya haɗa har da ɗalibai, harkar ilimi, masu ƙirƙira, masu jari, da masu ilimin cigaban tattalin arziki.
sw: Ni mpango wa kuvumbua vipaji vya teknolojia kwa wanafunzi, kwenye taaluma, kwa waanzirishi wa miradi ya kipebari na wataalamu wa uchumi wa kibepari.
yo: Ó ní iṣẹ́ àyànṣe láti jẹ́ ibi ìsopọ̀ fún ìmọ̀ ìṣàmúlò ẹ̀rọ àti ọgbọ́n àtinúdá pẹ̀lú àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́, àwọn olùkọ́ni, àwọn ọlọ́gbọ́n àtinúdá, àwọn atukọ̀-òkòwò fún èrè àti àwọn onímọ̀ ètò ìdàgbàsókè ọrọ̀ ajé.
zu: Isemkhankasweni wokuba isixhumanisi sethalente lezobuchwepheshe kanye nokuqamba izinto ezintsha, okuhlanganisa abafundi, izifundiswa, abasunguli, abatshalizimali, kanye nongoti bokuthuthukiswa komnotho.

am: የሌጎስ ግዛት የሥራ ትረስት ፈንድ(ኤልኤስኢቲኤፍ)።
en: Lagos State Employment Trust Fund (LSETF)
ha: Lagos State Employment Trust Fund ( LSETF)
sw: Lagos State Employment Trust Fund (ISETE)
yo: Àjọ Aṣèrànwọ́ Ìrónilágbára tí ìlú Èkó (LSETF)
zu: ILagos State Employment Trust Fund (iLSETF)

am: የሌጎስ ግዛት የሥራ ትረስት ፈንድ( (ኤልኤስኢቲኤፍ)በላጎስ ግዛት የሥራ ትረስት ፈንድ ሕግ 2016 የተቋቋመው ለሌጎስ ግዛት ነዋሪዎች የገንዘብ ድጋፍ ለመስጠት፣ ሥራን እና ሀብትን በመፍጠር ሥራ አጥነትን ለመቅረፍ ነው።
en: The Lagos State Employment Trust Fund (LSETF) was established by The Lagos State Employment Trust Fund Law 2016 to provide financial support to residents of Lagos State, to tackle unemployment through job and wealth creation.
ha: Lagos State Employment Trust Fund Law 2016 ne ya samar da Lagos State Employment Trust Fund (LSETF) domin samar da tallafin kuɗi ga mazauna jihar Legas, domin maganin rashin aikin yi ta hanyar samar da aikin yi da kuma kuɗi.
sw: Shirika la Lagos State Employment Trust Fund lilianzishwa na shirika la The Lagos State Employment Trust Fund Law 2016 ili kutoa msaa wa kiuchumi kwa wakazi wa jiji la Lagos, kuondoa tatizo la ajira kwa kutengeneza fursa za kazi ili kupunguza umasikini kwa watu.
yo: Òfin Ìṣèrànwọ́ Ìrónilágbára ní Ìlú Èkó ti ọdún 2016 ni ó ṣe ìdásílẹ̀ Àjọ Aṣèrànwọ́ Ìrónilágbára tí ìlú Èkó (LSETF) láti pèsè ìrànwọ́ owó fún àwọn olùgbé ìlú Èkó láti lè kojú àìríṣẹ́ṣe nípa ṣíṣẹ̀dá ọrọ̀ àti iṣẹ́.
zu: ILagos State Employment Trust Fund (iLSETF) yasungulwa yiLagos State Employment Trust Fund Law ngo-2016 ukuze inikeze usizo lwezezimali kubahlali baseSifundazweni SaseLagos, ukuze kubhekwane nokuntuleka kwemisebenzi ngokwakha imisebenzi nengcebo.

am: የናይጄሪያ ቻርተርድ የሂሳብ ባለሙያዎች ተቋም( አይሲኤኤን)።
en: Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN)
ha: Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria(ICAN)
sw: Institute of Chartered Accounts of Nigeria (ICAN)
yo: Ìgbìmọ̀ àwọn Aṣèṣirò-owó Oníwèé-àṣẹ ilẹ̀ Nigeria (ICAN)
zu: I-Institute of Chartered Accountants yaseNigeria (i-ICAN)

am: የናይጄሪያ ቻርተርድ አካውንታንቶች ተቋም የናይጄሪያ አካውንታንቶች የሙያ ተቋም አካል ነው።
en: The Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria is Nigeria’s professional accountancy body.
ha: Institute of Chatered Accountants of Nigeria ita ce ƙwararriyar cibiya ta akawu a Nijeriya.
sw: Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria ni kiunganishi kikubwa cha uhasibu nchini Nigeria.
yo: Ìgbìmọ̀ Aṣèṣirò-owó Oníwèé-àṣẹ ilẹ̀ Nigeria jẹ́ àjọ oníwèé-àṣẹ fún ìṣèṣirò-owó ti Nigeria.
zu: I-Institute of Chartered Accountants yaseNigeria iyinhlangano yamabhuku ezimali eNigeria.

am: በናይጄሪያ ውስጥ የቁጥጥር ስልጣን ካላቸው ሁለቱ የአካውንታቶች የሙያ ማህበራት ውስጥ አንዱ ነው።
en: It is one of the two professional accountancy associations with the regulatory authority in Nigeria,
ha: Ɗaya ce daga cikin ƙwararrun ƙungiyoyi biyu na akawu da suke da damar bayar da dokoki a Nijeriya.
sw: Ni moja kati ya mihimili mikubwa ya uhasibu inayojihusisha na mamlaka ya udhibiti nchini Nigeria
yo: Ó jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àwọn ẹgbẹ́ méjí tí ó jẹ́ oníwèé-àṣẹ fún ìṣèṣirò-owó pẹ̀lú àṣẹ ìṣàkóso ní ilẹ̀ Nigeria.
zu: Ingenye yezinhlangano ezimbili zobungcweti zokubalwa kwezimali neziphathimandla ezilawulayo eNigeria,

am: በቴክኒካዊ እውቀቱ፣ በችሎታው እና በሙያው ለዓለም አቀፍ የአካውንታንት እና የፋይናንስ ሙያ ሙያ ግንዛቤ እና አመራር ይሰጣል።
en: Through its technical knowledge, skills, and expertise, it provides insight and leadership to the global accountancy and finance profession.
ha: Da ilimin fasaharta, dabaru, da kuma ƙwarewa, tana hangen nesa da jagoranci ga ilimin akawu da kuɗi na duniya baki ɗaya.
sw: Kwa kutumia maarifa ya ufundi, ujuzi na utaalamu walionao wanafundisha viongozi wa fedha na uhasibu duniani kote.
yo: Nípasẹ̀ lílo ọgbọ́n ìmojú-ọnà, ìrírí ìṣe àti ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe rẹ̀, ó ń pèsè òye àti ìdarí fúniṣẹ́ ìṣèṣirò-owó àti ìsètò owó ní àgbáyé.
zu: Ngolwazi lwayo lwezobuchwepheshe, amakhono, kanye nobungcweti, ihlinzeka ngokuqondisisa kanye nobuholi kumkhakha wezokubalwa kwezimali emhlabeni wonke kanye nomsebenzi wezezimali.

am: የኢንዱስትሪ ባንክ(ቢኦአይ)
en: Bank of Industry(BOI)
ha: Bank of Industry(BOI)
sw: Benki ya Viwanda (BOI)
yo: Báńkì Aṣèrànwọ́ owó fún Ilé-iṣẹ́
zu: IBank of Industry (iBOI)

am: የኢንዱስትሪ ባንክ ፣ መካከለኛ እና አነስተኛ ኢንተርፕራይዞችን ለማቋቋም የገንዘብ ድጋፍ በማድረግ እንዲሁም መስፋፋትን፣ ሁሉን አቀፍነትን እና ዘመናዊነትን ለማራመድ የናይጄሪያን የኢንዱስትሪ ዘርፍ የመቀየር ሥልጣን ያለው የናይጄሪያ ግንባር ቀደም የልማት የፋይናንስ ተቋም (ዲኤፍአይ) ነው።
en: The Bank of Industry is Nigeria's foremost development financial institution (DFI) with the mandate to transform Nigeria’s industrial sector by providing financial assistance for the establishment of large, medium, and small enterprises; as well as to drive expansion, diversification, and modernization.
ha: Bank of Industry shi ne development financial institution (DFI) na farko a Nijeriya wanda yake da tsarin canja hukumar masana’antu ta Nijeriya ta hanayar samar da tallafin kuɗi don tabbatar da ƙanana, matsakaita, da manyan masana’antu; tare da faɗaɗawa, bambantawa, da zamanantarwa.
sw: Benki ya viwanda (BOI) ni taasisi ya kwanza ya maendeleo ya uchumi (DFI) nchini Nigeria ambayo ina mamlaka ya kubadilisha idara ya viwanda kwa kutoa msaada wa kifedha kwa ajiri ya kuanzisha wajasiriamali wakubwa, wa kati na wadogo pamoja na kuendesha upanuaji wa mseto wa kisasa.
yo: Báńkì Aṣèrànwọ́ owó fún Ilé-iṣẹ́ jẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ elétò ìdàgbàsókè owó tí ilẹ̀ Nigeria àkọ́kọ́ (DFI) tí ó ní ojúṣe láti mú àyípadà bá ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ ilẹ̀ Nigeria nípa pípèsè ìrànwọ́ owó fún ìdásílẹ̀ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ kéékéèké, ilé-iṣẹ́ alábọ́dé àti àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ńlá; àti láti tún darí ìmúgbòòrò, ìfẹ̀lójú àti ìmúbágbàrẹ́.
zu: Ibhange iBank of Industry liyisikhungo sezezimali eNigeria (idevelopment financial institution (iDFI)) esinegunya lokuguqula umkhakha wezimboni waseNigeria ngokuhlinzeka ngosizo lwezezimali ukuze kusungulwe amabhizinisi amakhulu, aphakathi nendawo, namancane; kanye nokugqugquzela ukwanda, ukuhlukahluka, kanye nokwenza kube yisimanjemanje.

am: ልማት ላይ ተጽዕኖ ሊያሳድሩ የሚችሉ ፕሮጀክቶችን ለመደገፍ ያለመ ስልጣን
en: A mandate aimed towards supporting projects with potential developmental impact.
ha: Tsarin da ya fuskanci tallafawa ayyuka wanda suke da yiwuwar kawo cigaba.
sw: Mamlaka inalenga kusaidia mradi kwa ajiri ya masilahi mapana ya maendeleo yenye matokeo chanya.
yo: Ojúṣe tí ó ní àfojúsùn láti ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún àwọn iṣẹ́ àkànṣe tí wọ́n ní ipa láti mú ìdàgbàsókè wá ni.
zu: Igunya elihloselwe ukusekela amaphrojekthi anamandla okuthuthuka.

am: ጆብቴክ አሊያንስ
en: Jobtech Alliance
ha: Jobtech Alliance
sw: Jobtech Alliance
yo: Jobtech Alliance
zu: IJobtech Alliance

am: የጆብቴክ አሊያንስ በአፍሪካ ውስጥ ሁሉን አቀፍ በሆኑ ሥራዎች ዙሪያ የሥነ-ምህዳር ግንባታ ተነሳሽነት ሲሆን ሰዎችን ጥራት ያለው ኑሮ ለማቅረብ የሚያስችሉ መድረኮችን ለመገንባት ለሥራ ፈጣሪዎች ሁኔታዎችን በሚያመቻች አከባቢ አማካይነት ኑሮ ለመገንባት የሚያስችሉ የሥራ እድሎችን ለማገናኘት ፍላጐት ያለው ነው።
en: The Jobtech Alliance is an ecosystem-building initiative around inclusive jobs in Africa interested in connecting people to work opportunities that build livelihoods through an enabling environment which provides the conditions for entrepreneurs to build platforms which deliver quality livelihoods.
ha: Jobtech Alliance wani tsari ne na gina yanayin muhalli na ayyukan da ake yi a Afirka wanda yake da ra’ayin haɗa mutane ga damarmakin aiki wanda suke gina rayuwa a kyakkyawan mahalli wanda yake bada damar yin sana’a da gina dandali wanda zai dinga isar da saƙo don inganta rayuwa.
sw: Jobtech Alliance ni mfumo wa kijamii wenye nia ya kuwaunganisha wafanyakazi wote wa Afrika na fursa zenye masilahi kwa kuangalia mazingira na hali ya wajasiriamali ili kubuni majukwaa yanayotoa usawa wa mapato.
yo: Jobtech Alliance jẹ́ àwùjọ-alátinúdá tí ó ń ṣe àgbédìde àwọn iṣẹ́ ní ilẹ̀ Africa tí wọ́n nífẹ̀ẹ́ láti ṣe iṣẹ́ lórí àwọn àǹfààní tí yóò bí ọ̀nà ìjẹẹ̀mú fún àwọn èèyàn ní ilẹ̀ Africa nípasẹ̀ pípèsè àyíká tí yóò fún àwọn olùṣòwò ní àǹfààní láti ṣe àgbédìde àwọn ìkànnì iṣẹ tí yóò ṣe ìmúdára ọ̀na ìjẹẹ̀mu fún àwọn èèyàn.
zu: IJobtech Alliance iwuhlelo lokwakha i-ecosystem emisebenzini ebandakanyayo e-Afrika enentshisekelo yokuxhumanisa abantu namathuba omsebenzi ngokwenza izindawo ezivumela osomabhizinisi bakwazi ukwakha izingosi eziphilisa abantu ngendlela eseqophelweni eliphezulu.

am: ሳላድ አፍሪካ
en: Salad Africa
ha: Salad Afirka
sw: Salad Africa
yo: Salad Africa
zu: ISalad Africa

am: ሳላድ በአፍሪካ የሠራተኛ ኃይልን በመቀየር መፍትሄዎችን በመገንባት የተሻለ እና የበለጠ የተመቻቸ ኑሮ እዲኖሩ የገንዘብ ደኅንነት ያላቸው ሰዎች እና ኅብረተሰብ አስተዋጽኦ እያደረግ ነው።
en: Salad is building solutions to transform Africa’s workforce by contributing to a society of financially-secure people who live better and more optimized lives.
ha: Salad yana gina mafita domin canja masu aiki a Afirka ta hanyar tallafawa al’umma da mutanen da suke da kuɗi wanda suke rayuwa mai kyau kuma mafi inganci.
sw: Salad inatafuta namna ya kuwaunganisha nguvu kazi ya jamii barani Afrika kwa kuwahakikishia usalama wa kifedha ili watu waishi maisha yaliyoboreshwa.
yo: Salad ń ṣe ìgbédìde àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ tí yóò mú àyípadà bá ètò iṣẹ́ ní ilẹ̀ Africa nípa dídá sí àwùjọ àwọn èèyàn tí wọ́n ní ìkápá owó tí wọ́n ń gbé ayé dáadáa tí wọ́n sì ní ayé onítumọ̀.
zu: ISaladi iletha izixazululo zokuguqula abasebenzi base-Afrika ngokufaka isandla emphakathini wabantu abanezimali abaphila izimpilo ezingcono.

am: ሳላድ አፍሪካ ሠራተኞቻቸው ከደመወዝ ቀን በፊት ከሚያገኙት ደመወዝ የተወሰነውን ክፍል እንዲያገኙ ከአሰሪዎች ጋር በመተባበር አስቸኳይ ፍላጐቶች አሁን በቀላሉ ሊሟሉ ይችላሉ ይህም ወደ የገንዘብ ደኅንነት እና ነጻነት ጉዞ የመጀመሪያ እርምጃ ነው።
en: Salad Africa partners with employers to give their employees access to a portion of their earned salaries before payday so urgent needs can now be met with ease which is the first step in a journey to financial wellness and freedom.
ha: Salad Afirka tana haɗin guiwa ne da masu bada aiki don bawa ma’aikatansu wani sashi na kuɗin aikinsu kafin ranar biya saboda a biya buƙatun gaggawa cikin sauƙi wanda shi ne mataki na farko na samun dukiya da ‘yanci.
sw: Barani Afrika Salad ina ushirikiano na wafanyakazi ambapo inaweza kufikisha kwa haraka sehemu ya mishahara yao wanayopata kabla ya siku ya malipo; hivyo wafanyakazi wanaweza kufikia mahitaji yao kwa haraka. Hii ni hatua ya kwanza katika safari ya usalama na uhuru wa kifedha.
yo: Salad Africa ní ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn agbanisíṣẹ́ láti jẹ́ kí àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ wọn rí àyé sí díẹ̀ nínú owó oṣù wọn kí ó tó di ọjọ́ ìsanwó-oṣù kí wọ́n lè ní àǹfààní láti yanjú àwọn ìnílò tí ó ṣe gbọnmọgbọnmọ,èyí tí ó sì jẹ́ ìgbésẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ nínú ìrìn-àjò sí òmìnira àti ìníkàápá owó.
zu: ISalad Afrika ibambisana nabaqashi ukuze banikeze abasebenzi babo bathole ingxenye yemiholo yabo ngaphambi kosuku lomholo ukuze bakwazi ukubhekana nezidingo eziphuthumayo kalula okuyisinyathelo sokuqala ohambweni oluya ekuphileni kahle kwezezimali nenkululeko.

am: ታዋቂው የመገናኛ ብዙኃን ሰው" ዶ2ዱቱን" የአልት ትምህርት ቤት አፍሪካን በመፍጠር ግንኙነት ዳይሬክተርነት ተቀላቀለ
en: Renowned Media Personality "Do2dtun " joins AltSchool Africa as Creator Relations Director
ha: Sanannen ma’aikacin yaɗa labarai “Do2dtun” ya shiga AltSchool Africa a matsayin Daraktan Gudanarwa na Shiri.
sw: Mtu mashuhuri wa Vyombo vya Habari "Do2dtun" anajiunga na AltSchool Africa kama Mkurugenzi wa Mahusiano ya Watayarishiji
yo: Gbajúgbajà Agbéròyìnjáde "Do2dtun " dara pọ̀ mọ́ AltSchool Africa gẹ́gẹ́ bí i Adarí Ìṣèmúbárẹ́ Àkóónú
zu: Osaziwayo Bemithombo Yezindaba "iDo2dtun" ijoyina i-AltSchool Africa njengoMqondisi we Creator Relations

am: በአዳዲስ የመማር መፍትሄዎች እና የሙያ ዕድሎች ላይ ያተኰረ መሪ የትምህርት ቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያ የሆነው አልት ትምህርት ቤት አፍሪካ ፣በአፍሪካ በጣም ታዋቂ ከሚባሉት የመ ገናኛ ብዙኃን ስብእናዎች አንዱ የሆነውን ኦላዶቱን ኦጁላፔ ካዮዴን እንዲሁም ዶ2ድቱን በመ ባል የሚታወቀውን የፈጠራ ግንኙነት ዳይሬክተር አድርጎ መ ሾሙን አስታውቋል።
en: AltSchool Africa, a leading educational technology company focused on innovative learning solutions and career opportunities, has announced the appointment of one of Africa's most popular media personalities, Oladotun Ojuolape Kayode, also known as Do2dtun, as Creator Relations Director.
ha: ALtSchool Africa, kamfani ne mai tafiyar da koyarwar fasaha wanda ya bada himma a kan mafitar koyon ƙirƙira da damarmakin sana’a, sun yi sanarwar naɗa ma’aikatan yada labarai mafiya shahara, Oladotun Ojuolape Kayode, wanda kuma aka fi sani da Do2dotun, a matsayin Daraktan Gudanarwa na Shiri.
sw: Altschool Africa ni kampuni inayoongoza kwa elimu ya teknolojia barani Afrika, inayojihusisha na ubunifu wa njia za kujifunzia na nafasi za kazi, imetangazwa uteuzi wa moja wapo ya wanahabari maarufu barani Afrika, Olodotun Ojudope Kayode, anayejulikana kama Do2dtun, kuwa Mkurugenzi wa Mahusiano wa waandaaji (watayarishaji).
yo: AltSchool Africa, aṣáájú ilé-iṣẹ́ afìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ṣètò ẹ̀kọ́ tí ó gbájú mọ́ àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ alátinúdà àti àwọn àǹfààní iṣẹ́ àyànṣe, ti kéde ìyànsípò ọ̀kan lára àwọn gbajúgbajà agbéròyìnjáde ní ilẹ̀ Africa, Ọládọ̀tun Ojúọlápé Káyọ̀dé tí wọ́n tún mọ̀ sí Do2dtun, gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Adarí Ìṣèmúbárẹ́ Àkóónú.
zu: I-AltSchool Africa, inkampani ehamba phambili yobuchwepheshe bezemfundo egxile ezisombululweni ezintsha zokufunda namathuba emisebenzi, imemezele ukuqokwa komunye wabezindaba abadume kakhulu e-Afrika, u-Oladotun Ojuolape Kayode, owaziwa nangokuthi iDo2dtun, njengoMqondisi Wezobudlelwano.

am: ኩባንያው ባወጣው መግለጫ ዶቱን በመላው አህጉር የመስመር ላይ ትምህርትን የመቀየር የአልትስኩልአፍሪካን ተልዕኮ የበለጠ ለማሳደግ ይዘት ፈጣ ሪዎች፣ አስተማሪዎች እና ተጽዕኖ ፈጣሪዎች ጋር ግንኙነትን በማጐልበት ረገድ ወሳኝ ሚና ይጫወታል።
en: In its company issued statement, Do2dtun will play a pivotal role in fostering relationships with content creators, educators, and influencers to further enhance AltSchool Africa's mission of transforming online learning across the continent.
ha: A bayanan da aka fitar na kamfanin, Do2dtun zai yi aiki mai matuƙar amfani domin ƙarfafa dangantaka da masu ƙirƙirar shiri, masu koyarwa, da masu fada aji don ƙara Bunƙasa kudurin AItSchool Africa na sauya koyarwa ta yanar gizo a nahiyar baki ɗaya.
sw: Katika taarifa yake iliyotolewa na kampuni, Do2dtun atapewa jukumu muhimi la kukuza ushirikiano na watunzi wa maudhui, Waelimishaji na washawishi ili kuboresha zaidi dhamira ya Altschool Africa ya kusambaza mafunzo ya mtandaoni katka Afrika nzima.
yo: Nínú ọ̀rọ̀ tí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà fi léde, Do2dtun yóò kó ipa pàtàkì lórí ṣíṣètò ìdàgbàsókè ìbáṣepọ̀ láàárín àwọn aṣẹ̀dá àkóónú, àwọn elétò ẹ̀kọ́ àti àwọn aṣàwòkọ́ṣe orí ayélujára láti túbọ̀ jẹ́ kí ìlépa AltSchool Africa láti mú àyípadà bá ètò ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ orí ayélujára káàkiri orílẹ̀-èdè náà wá sí ìmúṣẹ.
zu: Esitatimendeni esikhishwe yinkampani, u-Do2dtun uzobamba iqhaza elibalulekile ekuqiniseni ubudlelwano nabasunguli bokuqukethwe, othisha, kanye nabagqugquzeli ukuze kuthuthukiswe umgomo we-AltSchool Africa wokuguqula ukufunda ngenthanethi kulo lonke izwekazi.

am: ከሁለት አስርት ዓመታት በላይ በመገናኛ ብዙኃን እና በመዝናኛ ኢንዱስትሪ ውስጥ ስኬታማ የሙያ መስክ በመያዝ ዶ2ዱን በ አልትስኩል አፍሪካ ውስጥ ወደ አዲሱ ቦታው የተትረፈረፈ ልምድ፣ ፈጠራ እና ሰፊ አውታረመረብ ያመጣል።
en: With a successful career spanning over two decades in the media and entertainment industry, Do2dtun brings a wealth of experience, creativity, and an extensive network to his new position at AltSchool Africa.
ha: Tare da aiki mai cike da nasara wanda ya kasance tsawon shekaru ashirin a masana’antar labarai da nishaɗantarwa, Do2dtun ya kawo ƙwarewa da dama, ƙirƙira, da kuma buɗaɗɗiyar hanyar zuwa sabon matsayinsa a ALtSchool Afirka.
sw: Pamoja na kazi waliyoifanya kwa miongo miwili kwenye vyombo vya habari na kwenye tasinia ya burudani, Do2dtun ataongeza uzoefu, ubunifu na kutanua wigo katika fursa yake mpya kwenye Altschool Africa.
yo: Do2dtun, ẹni tí ó ti ní àṣeyọrí dáadáa lẹ́nu iṣẹ́ àyànṣe rẹ̀ ní ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ tí ń rí sí ìgbéròyìnjáde àti ìdánilárayá láti ogún ọdún lé díẹ̀ sẹ́yìn ni yóò gbé àmù tí ó kún fún ìrírí, ọgbọ́n àtinúdá àti àkọ́pọ̀ àwọn èèyàn tí ó mọ̀ tí yóò sì mú ìlọsíwájú wá sí ibi ipò tuntun tí ó ní ní AltSchool Africa.
zu: Ngomsebenzi ophumelelayo othathe iminyaka engaphezu kwamashumi amabili embonini yezindaba nezokuzijabulisa, u-Do2dtun uletha ingcebo yesipiliyoni, ubuciko, kanye nenethiwekhi enkulu esikhundleni sakhe esisha e-AltSchool Africa.

am: ታዋቂው የሬዲዮ አስተናጋጅ፣ የዝግጅት አስተናጋጅ እና ተጽዕኖ ፈጣሪ እንደመሆኑ መጠን ዶ2ዱን በወጣ ቶች ባህል እና በአጠቃላይ በመዝናኛ ኢንዱስትሪ ላይ አዎንታዊ ተጽዕኖ ለማሳደር ያለውን ፍላጐት በተከታታይ አሳይቷል።
en: As a prominent radio presenter, event host, and influencer, Do2dtun has consistently demonstrated his passion for positively impacting youth culture and the entertainment industry at large.
ha: A matsayinsa na dadadden mai rahoton gidan radiyo, mai gudanar da biki, kuma mai fada aji, Do2dtun ya dade yana nuna ƙaunarsa ga son kawo canji mai kyau ga al’adun matasa da kuma masana’antar nishaɗi baki ɗaya.
sw: Kama mtangazaji maarufu wa redio, muongozaji wa vipindi na mshawishi, Do2dtun anaendelea kuonesha shauku katika kuinua utamaduni wa vijana na tasinia ya burudani kwa ujumla.
yo: Do2dtun ti ṣe àfihàn ìfẹ́ tí ó ní sí kíkó ipa pàtàkì lórí ọ̀rọ̀ tí ó jẹmọ́ àwọn ọ̀dọ́ àti ẹ̀ka ìdánilárayá léraléra, gẹ́gẹ́ bí i sọ̀rọ̀sọ̀rọ̀ orí rédíò, aṣàkóso ètò àríyá àti aṣàwòkọ́ṣe orí ayélujára tí ó gbajúmọ̀.
zu: Njengomethuli womsakazo ovelele, umphathi womcimbi, kanye nomgqugquzeli, u-Do2dtun ubelokhu ekhombisa uthando lwakhe lokuba nomthelela omuhle kwisiko lentsha kanye nemboni yezokuzijabulisa iyonke.

am: ዶ2ን በፈጣ ሪ ግንኙነት ዳይሬክተርነት ወደ ቡድናችን በመቀላቀል ደስተኞች ነን ብለዋል፣ የኦፕሬሽንስ ኃላፊ(ራሄል ኦኖጃ)፣ አልትስኩል አፍሪካ።
en: "We are delighted to welcome Do2dtun to our team as the Creator Relations Director," said [Rachael Onoja], Head of Operations, AltSchool Africa.
ha: “Muna farin cikin yin maraba da Do2dtun zuwa cikinmu a matsayin Daraktan Gudanarwa na Shiri,” in ji (Rachel Onoja), Shugaban Aikace-Aikace, ALtSchool Afirka.
sw: "Tunafurahia kumkaribisha Do2dtun kwenye kamati kama mkurugenzi wa mahusiano ya Watayarishaji" alisema Rachael, mkuu wa mradi, Altschool Africa.
yo: Racheal Onoja tí ó jẹ́ Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí ní AltSchool Africa wí pé, "Inú wá dùn láti kí Do2dtun káàbọ̀ sínú ìgbìmọ̀ wá gẹ́gẹ́ bí i Adarí Ìmúbárẹ́ Àkóónú,".
zu: "Siyajabula ukwamukela u-Do2dtun ethimbeni lethu njengoMqondisi Wezabasunguli," kusho [uRachael Onoja], Inhloko Yezokusebenza, i-AltSchool Africa.

am: ዶቱን አልትስኩል አፍሪካ ትምህርት አዝናኝ፣ ተሞክሮ ሰጭ እና ትርፋማ ለማድረግ የገባውን ቃል እንዲፈጽም በመርዳት ረገድ ወሳኝ ሚና ይጫወታል።
en: "Dotun plays a critical role in helping AltSchool Africa fulfill its promise of making learning fun, experiential, and profitable.
ha: “Dotun ya yi babban ƙoƙari wajen taimakawa ALtSchool Afirka wajen cika alƙawarinta na sanya koyarwa ta zamo mai daɗi, ƙwarewa, da kuma riba.
sw: Dotun ina jukumu muhimu katika kusaidia Altschool Africa kutimiza ahadi zake za kuyafanya mafunzo kuwa ya kuvutia, kuzoeleka na yenye faida.
yo: "Dotun ń kó ipa pàtàkì láti jẹ́ kí AltSchool Africa mú ìlérí rẹ̀ pé òun yóò mú ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ dáni lára yá, kí ó fúnni ní ìrírí tí ó dún mọ́ni tí ó sì mówó wọlé fúnni ṣẹ.
zu: "UDotun udlala indima ebalulekile ekusizeni i-AltSchool Africa ukuthi igcwalise isithembiso sayo sokwenza ukufunda kube mnandi, kube nokuhlangenwe nakho, futhi kube nenzuzo.

am: በአልትስኩል አፍሪካ እና በኢንዱስትሪው ባለሙ ያዎች መ ካከል ያለው ን ልዩነት በማ ጥ በብ አሁን በንግድ እና በፈጠ ራ ኢንዱስትሪዎች ው ስጥ ሙ ያ ለመ ከታተል ለሚ መ ኙ አፍሪካው ያን ለዓመ ታት ያልተጠ ቀመ ፣ ዋጋ የሌለው እው ቀት እና ግንዛቤዎችን ማ ም ጣ ት እንችላለን።
en: By bridging the gap between AltSchool Africa and industry experts, we can now bring years of untapped, invaluable knowledge and insights to Africans aspiring to pursue careers in the business and creative industries.”
ha: Ta hanyar rufe gibin da ke tsakanin ALtSchool Afirka da kuma kwararru a harkar masana’anta, a yanzu za mu iya kawo shekarun ilimi mai matuƙar amfani wanda ba a taɓa ba da hangen nesa na ‘yan Afirka da suke son Bunƙasa aikinsu a masana’antun kasuwanci da mishadi.”
sw: Kwa kuziba pengo kati ya AltSchool Africa na wataalam wa tasnia, sasa tunaweza kuleta maarifa na maarifa ya miaka mingi ambayo hayajatumika, yenye thamani sana kwa Waafrika wanaotoka kufuata taaluma katika tasnia ya biashara na ubunifu.
yo: Nípa dídí ààfo tí ó wà láàárín AltSchool Africa àti àwọn akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́, a lè mú ìmọ̀ pàtàkì tí kò tí ì rí ìlò dáadáa báyìí pẹ̀lú àwọn òye ìjìnlẹ̀ wá sí òde fún àwọn èèyàn ilẹ̀ Africa tí wọ́n ń lépa iṣẹ́ àyànṣe ní àwọn ẹ̀ka ìdókòwò àti ọlọ́gbọ́n ìṣẹ̀dá."
zu: Ngokuvala igebe phakathi kwe-AltSchool Africa kanye nongoti bezimboni, manje sesingakwazi ukuletha iminyaka yolwazi olungakasetshenziswa, olubalulekile kanye nokuqonda kubantu base-Afrika abafisa ukuphishekela imisebenzi emabhizinisini nasezimbonini zobuciko."

am: የዱ2ን ሹመ ት ለአትልት ስኩል አፍሪካ ወሳኝ በሆነ ወቅት ላይ የሚመ ጣ ሲሆን በኤድቴክ ቦታ ላይ ተደራሽነቱን እና ተፅዕኖውን ማስፋፋቱን ይቀጥላል።
en: Do2dtun's appointment comes at a pivotal time for AltSchool Africa as it continues to expand its reach and impact in the edtech space.
ha: Muƙamin Do2dtun ya zo ne a lokaci mai matuƙar amfani ga ALtSchool Africa yayin da take cigaba da bunƙasa isarsa da amfani a gurbin edtech.
sw: Do2dtun imechaguliwa kwa muda muafaka kwa sababu Altschool A frica inaendelea kutanua wigo wake na kusambaza elimu ya teknolojia sehemu mbalimbali.
yo: Ìyànsípò Do2dtun bọ́ sí àkókò pàtàkì fún AltSchool Africa pẹ̀lú bí wọ́n ṣe túbọ̀ ń ṣe ìfẹ̀lójú ọwọ́jà àti ipa wọn ní àyè ìfìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ-ṣètò-ẹ̀kọ́.
zu: Ukuqokwa kukaDo2dtun kufika ngesikhathi esibalulekile ku-AltSchool Africa njengoba iqhubeka nokwandisa ukufinyelela nomthelela wayo endaweni ye-edtech.

am: በተለዋዋጭ ስብዕናው እና በፕሮፌሽናል ዳራ ፣በማስ ኮምንኬሽን፣ዱ2ዱቱን ኣልት ስኩል አፍሪካ የሚያቀርበውን ለማሻሻል እና ለተማሪዎች የበለጠ አሳታፊ የመማሪያ አካባቢን ለመፍጠር ከአስተማሪዎች፣ አርቲስቶች እና ተፅዕኖ ፈጣሪዎች ጋር ትርጉም ያለው ትብብር እና አጋርነት ለመፍጠር ጥረቶችን ለመምራት ተዘጋጅቷል።
en: With his dynamic personality and professional background in Mass Communication, Do2dtun is set to lead efforts in fostering meaningful collaborations and partnerships with educators, artists, and influencers to enhance AltSchool Africa's offerings and create a more engaging learning environment for learners.
ha: Da irin wannan dabi’ar mai kyau da kuma ƙwarewar da aka samu a fannin ilimin sadarwa, Do2dtun ya shirya don shigewa gaba wajen haɗin guiwa mai ma’ana da aiki tare da masua koyarwa, jarumai, da masu fada aji domin Bunƙasa gabatarwar ALtSchool Afirka sannan a samar da muhallin koyarwa wanda zai yi tafiya sosai ga masu koyo.
sw: Akiwa na utu wake mahiri na usuli wa taaluma katika Mawasiliano ya Misa, Do2dtun imedhamiria kuongoza juhudi katika kukuza ushirikiano wa maana na ushirikiano na waelimishaji, wasanii, na washawishi ili kuboresha matoleo ya AltSchool Africa na kuunda mazingira ya kujifunza ya kuvutia zaidi kwa wanafunzi.
yo: Pẹ̀lú irú ẹ̀dá tí ó jẹ́ àti ìmọ̀ ẹ̀kọ́ tí ó ní nínú ẹ̀kọ́ Ìgbéròyìnjáde, Do2dtun ti gbáradì láti darí ìgbìyànjú fún ìbáṣepọ̀ àtí ìfọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ onítumọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn olùkọ́ni, àwọn oníṣẹ́ ọnà àti àwọn aṣàwòkọ́ṣe orí ayélujára láti mú àwọn ìfilọ̀ AltSchool Africa dára sí i kí wọ́n sì ṣẹ̀dá àyíkà tí ó ń mú ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ dùn fún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́.
zu: Ngobuntu bakhe obuguquguqukayo kanye nesizinda sakhe sobungcweti kwezokuXhumana Kwabantu abaningi, uDo2dtun umiselwe ukuhola imizamo yokukhuthaza ukusebenzisana okunenjongo nobudlelwano nabafundisi, amaciko, kanye nabagqugquzeli ukuze kuthuthukiswe iminikelo ye-AltSchool Africa nokudala indawo yokufunda eheha abafundi.

am: " የአት እስኩል አፍሪካን በመቀላቀል እና ለትምህርት ፈጠራ አቀራረባቸው አስተዋጽኦ በማበርከት በእውነት በጣም ተደስቻለሁ " ብለዋል ኦላዶቶን ኦጁላፔ።
en: "I am truly excited to join AltSchool Africa and contribute to their innovative approach to learning," said Oladotun Ojuolape.
ha: “ Ina matuƙar farin cikin kasancewa da ALtShool Afirka da kuma bada gudunmawa wajen hanyar ƙirƙirarsu wajen koyarda,” Oladotun Ojuolape ya fada.
sw: "Kiukweli nafurahi sana kujiunga na Altschool Africa na kuchangia mikakati ya ugunduzi wa mafunzo yao" alisema Oladotun Ojuolape.
yo: "Inú mi dùn láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ AltSchool Africa kí ń sì dá sí ètò afọgbọ́n-àtinúdá sí ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tí wọ́n ń ṣe," Ọládọ̀tun Ojúọlápé fèsì.
zu: "Ngijabule kakhulu ukujoyina i-AltSchool Africa futhi ngifake isandla endleleni yabo entsha yokufunda," kusho u-Oladotun Ojuolape.

am: " ትምህርት ለለውጥ ኃይለኛ መሣሪያ ነው ፣ እናም በይዘት ፈጠራ እና ትርጕም ባለው የመማ ር ልምዶች መካከል ያለውን ልዩነት ለማጥበብ ልም ዴን ለመጠ ቀም ቁርጠኛ ነኝ።
en: "Education is a powerful tool for transformation, and I am committed to leveraging my experience to bridge the gap between content creation and meaningful learning experiences.
ha: “ Ilimi wani abu ne mai ƙarfi ga sauyi, kuma na shirya domin bayar da ƙwarewata domin cike gibin da ke tsakanin ƙirƙirar aiki da ƙwarewar koyarwa mai ma’ana.
sw: Elimu ni chombo muhimu cha mabadiliko, hivyo ninajitoa katika kukuza uzoefu wangu ili kuondoa pendo lililopo kati ya utengenezaji wa maudhui na uzoefu wa mafunzo yenye maana.
yo: "Ẹ̀kọ́ jẹ́ irinṣẹ́ alágbára fún ìyípadà, tí mo sì ní ìfarajìn láti mú ọgbọ́n ìrírí mi wá láti dí ààfo tí ó wà láàárín ètò ìṣẹ̀dá àkóónú àti ìrírí ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tí ó ní ìtumọ̀.
zu: "Imfundo iyithuluzi elinamandla lenguquko, futhi ngizibophezele ekusebenziseni ulwazi lwami ukuze ngivale igebe phakathi kokudalwa kokuqukethwe kanye nolwazi lokufunda oluzuzisayo.

am: በጋራ፣ በመሆን ቀጣዩን የተማ ሪዎች ትውልድ እናነሳሳለን"
en: Together, we will inspire the next generation of learners."
ha: A tare, za mu bawa masu koyo da ke tasowa kwarin guiwa.”
sw: Kwa pamoja tunaweza kuwashawishi watu wengine wanaotaka kujifunza
yo: Lápapọ̀, a yóò ṣe kóríyá fún àwọn ìran akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tí ń bọ̀."
zu: Ngokubambisana, sizogqugquzela isizukulwane esilandelayo sabafundi."

am: አልትእስኩል አፍሪካ በአዳዲስ ቴክኖሎጂዎች፣ ግላዊነት በተላበሱ የመ ማ ር ልም ዶች እና ትርጕም ባለው አጋርነት የመ ማ ር ሁኔታን ለመ ቀየር ቁርጠ ኛ የሆነ ዓለም አቀፍ ችሎታ ቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያ ነው ።
en: AltSchool Africa is a global talent technology company that is committed to reshaping the landscape of learning through innovative technology, personalized learning experiences, and meaningful partnerships.
ha: ALtSchool Afirka wani kamfani ne na basirar fasaha na duniya wanda ya bada himma wajen gyara wajen koyarwa ta hanyar ƙirƙirar fasaha, ƙwarewar koyarwa ta karankai, da kuma hulɗa mai ma’ana.
sw: Altschool Africa ni kampuni ya vipaji duniani ambayo imejitoa katika kutengeza mazingira ya kujifunza kupitia teknolojia ya ugunduzi, mafunzo ya uzoefu binafsi na ushirikiano bora.
yo: AltSchool Africa jẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ agbòṣìṣẹ́ káàkiri àgbáyé tí ó ní ìpinnu láti ṣe àtúnrọ ètò ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ nípa lílo ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ tuntun, àwọn ìrírí ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àdáni àti ìbáṣepọ̀ onítumọ̀.
zu: I-AltSchool Africa yinkampani yomhlaba wonke yezobuchwepheshe bethalente elizibophezele ekulungiseni kabusha isimo sokufunda ngobuchwepheshe obusha, ulwazi lokufunda oluqondene nawe, kanye nobudlelwano obunenjongo.

am: ዘመናዊ ቴክኖሎጂን በባለሙ ያ ዲዛይን በተደረገ ይዘት በማ ጣ መ ር የአልትስኮል አፍሪካ ዓላማ ተማ ሪዎች በየጊዜው በሚ ለዋወጥ ዓለም ው ስጥ እንዲበለጽጉ የሚ ያስፈልጋቸውን መ ሣሪያዎች እና ሀብቶች ማ ቅረብ ነው ።
en: By combining cutting-edge technology with expertly designed content, AltSchool Africa aims to provide learners with the tools and resources they need to thrive in an ever-evolving world.
ha: Ta fasahar cutting-edge da kuma aikin da aka shirya shi cikin ƙwarewa, ALtSchool Afirka ta dau aniyar samarwa masu koyo kaya da abubuwan amfani wanda suke buka a cikin wannan duniyar mai sauyawa.
sw: Kwa kuchanganya teknolojia ya kisasa na maudhui yaliyoundwa kwa ustadi, AltSchool Africa inalenga kuwapa wanafunzi zana na nyenzo wanazohitaji ili kustawi katika ulimwengu unaoendelea kubadilika.
yo: Nípasẹ̀ ìmúbọnú ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ tuntun pẹ̀lú àwọn àkóónú tí wọ́n fi ọgbọ́n ìmọ́ọ́ṣe tò, AltSchool Africa gbèrò láti pèsè àwọn ohun àmúṣe àti èlò iṣẹ́ tí àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ máa nílò láti ṣe dáadáa ní ilé ayé aláyìídà.
zu: Ngokuhlanganisa ubuchwepheshe obusezingeni eliphezulu nokuqukethwe okuklanywe ngobungcweti, i-AltSchool Africa ihlose ukuhlinzeka abafundi ngamathuluzi nezinsiza abazidingayo ukuze baphumelele emhlabeni ohlale uvela.

am: ስለ ኦላዶቱን" ዶ2ድቱን" ኦጁላፔ፡
en: About Oladotun "Do2dtun" Ojuolape:
