zu: Kumayelana nokususa imigoqo, ukwandisa amathuba, nokusungula ulwazi oluphelele olukunika amandla okuphumelela njengabaholi bemikhiqizo.

am: በተጨማሪም ፕሮዳክት ዳይቭ ቅዳሜ ነሐሴ 12 ቀን ለሚካሄደው ኮንፈረንስ የቲኬት ግዢዎ ላይ 15% ቅናሽ እያደረገ ነው።
en: Also to celebrate, ProductDive is graciously offering 15% off your ticket purchase for their conference taking place on Saturday, August 12th.
ha: Kuma domin a yi murna, ProductDive tana bayar da ragin 15% daga kuɗin tikitinsu na taron da za a yi ranar Asabar, Agusta 12th.
sw: Pia katika kusherehekea, ProductDive inatoa punguzo la 15% kwenye tiketi yako ya kikao kitakachofanyika jumamosi, 12 Agost.
yo: Láti tún ṣe àjọyọ̀, ProductDive ń pèsè ẹ̀dínwó ìdá 15% nínú owó ìwọlé fún àpéjọ wọn tí ó fẹ́ wáyé ní ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta 12, oṣù Kẹjọ.
zu: Futhi ukuze ujabule, iProductDive ikunikeza ngomusa isaphulelo sika-15% sokuthenga ithikithi lakho engqungqutheleni yabo ezoba ngoMgqibelo, ziyi-12 kuNcwaba.

am: ትኬትዎን ለመግዛት እባክዎ አገናኙን ጠቅ ያድርጉ።
en: Please click the link to purchase your ticket.
ha: Ku danna mahaɗar domin siyan tikitin.
sw: ili kununua tiketi yako mapema, bonyeza tovuti yetu.
yo: Jọ̀wọ́ síratẹ ọ̀rọ̀ àsopọ̀ náà láti ra ìwé ìwọlé rẹ.
zu: Sicela ucofe isixhumanisi ukuze uthenge ithikithi lakho.

am: የማስተዋወቂያ ኮድ ዲይዝኤስቪፒጂ 15 ይጠቀሙ።
en: Use Promo Code DIVESVPG15
ha: Ku yi amfani da lambar garaɓasar ta DIVESVPG15
sw: tumia msimbo wa Matangaza wa DIVESVPG15
yo: Lo Odù Ìpolongo DIVESVPG15
zu: Sebenzisa Ikhodi Yokuthengisa iDIVESVPG15

am: የቀን መቁጠሪያዎቻችሁን ምልክት ያድርጉ፣ ወደ መጪው የምርት አስተዳደር ለመግባት ተዘጋጁ፣ እና አፍሪካን በምርት ሙያዊ ችሎታዎ ለማነሣሣት ይህንን ልዩ እድል ይጠቀሙ ።
en: Mark your calendars, get ready to dive into the future of product management, and embrace this unique opportunity to Inspire Africa with your product expertise.
ha: Ku sanya alama ajikin kalandarku, ku shirya domin shiga cikin kula da kayayyaki ta nan gaba, ku rungumi wannan damar ta musamman domin ba wa Afirka Ƙarfin guiwa da ƙwarewar kayayyakinku.
sw: Kumbuka tarehe yako, jiandae kuungana na usimamizi bora wa bidhaa zako upokee fursa hizi za pekee uweze kuishawishi Afrika kwa ubunifu wa bidhaa zako.
yo: Ṣé àmì sí kàlẹ́ńdà rẹ, gbáradì láti bọ́ sí inú ọkọ̀ ọjọ́ iwájú ètò ìṣàkóso ohun ìṣàmúlò, kí o sì ṣe àmúlò àǹfààní pàtàkì Inspire Africa yìí láti ṣe àfikún ìmọ̀ rẹ nípa ètò ìṣàkóso ohun ìṣàmúlò.
zu: Maka amakhalenda akho, ulungele ukungena kwezokuphathwa komkhiqizo kwakusasa, futhi wamukele leli thuba eliyingqayizivele Lokukhuthaza i-Afrika ngobungcweti bomkhiqizo wakho.

am: ኦኤዩ፣ ሲዩ ባለፉት አስርት ዓመታት ከፍተኛ ቍጥር ያላቸውን ሚሊየነር' የምዕራብ አፍሪካ ጅምር መስራቾችን አፍርቷል
en: OAU, CU produced the highest number of 'millionaire' West African startup founders in the last decade
ha: OAU, CU su ne suke samar da lamba mafi yawa ta ‘millionaire’ wanda suka samar da West Africa startup a shekarun da suka gabata.
sw: OAU, CU ilizalisha idadi kubwa zaidi ya 'milionea' waanzilishi wa Afrika Magharibi ndani ya muongo uliyopita
yo: OAU, CU ni ó ti pèsè iye nọ́ḿbà àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ òkòwò àdìdeelẹ̀ "olówó mílíọ̀nù" ní Ìwọ̀-oòrùn ilẹ̀ Africa tí ó pọ̀ jùlọ ní ọdún mẹ́wàá sẹ́yìn.
zu: I-OAU, CU ikhiqize inani eliphakeme kakhulu labasunguli bokuqala 'abangosozigidi' baseNtshonalanga ne-Afrika kule minyaka eyishumi edlule.

am: ሰኞ፣ ጥቅምት 5 ቀን 2020 ቴክፖይንት አፍሪካ የምዕራብ አፍሪካ ጅምር አስርት ዓመት ሪፖርቱን ይፋ አደረገ።
en: On Monday, October 5, 2020, Techpoint Africa launched its West African Startup Decade Report.
ha: Ranar Litinin, 5 ga Oktoba, 2020, Techpoint Africa ta ƙaddamar da rahotonta na tsahon shekaru na West Africa Startup.
sw: Siku ya jumatatu, Oktoba, 5, 2020 Techpoint Afrika ilitoa taarifa ya muongo mmoja wa taasisi yake ya West African Startup.
yo: Ní ọjọ́ Ajé 5 oṣù Ọ̀wàwà, ọdún 2020 ni Techpoint Africa ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ Àbọ̀ Ọlọ́dún mẹ́wàá fún ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ ní Ìwọ̀-oòrùn ilẹ̀ Africa rẹ̀.
zu: NgoMsombuluko, zi-5 kuMfumfu wezi-2020, iTechpoint Africa yethule umbiko wayo weWest Africa Startup Decade.

am: ሪፖርቱ በ 2010 እና በ 2019 መካከል ባለው የቴክኖሎጂ ቦታ ውስጥ የጀማሪዎች የገንዘብ ድጋፍ እንቅስቃሴ ላይ ያተኩራል።
en: The report focuses on the funding activities of startups in the tech space between 2010 and 2019.
ha: Rahoton ya maida hankali ne a kan ayyukan tallafi na kuɗi ga masu farawa a mahallin fasaha daga 2010 da 2019.
sw: Taarifa ilijikita zaidi kwenye shughuli za ufadhili wa mradi kwenye uwanda wa teknolojia kati ya mwaka 2010 na 2019.
yo: Àbọ̀ náà dójú lé àwọn ètò ìrànwọ́ owó tí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ ní ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ onímọ̀ ẹ̀rọ rí láàárín ọdún 2010 àti 2019.
zu: Lo mbiko ugxile kumisebenzi yokuxhasa ngemali yokuqala ibhizinisi kwezobuchwepheshe phakathi kuka-2010 no-2019.

am: የፋይናንስ እንቅስቃሴዎችን መከፋፈል በጅምር ኢንዱስትሪዎች፣ በባለሀብቶች አመጣጥ እና በኢንዱስትሪው ትኩረት ላይ ይይዛል ከሌሎች በተጨማሪ።
en: It contains a breakdown of funding activities by startup industries, the origin of investors, and industry spotlight, among others.
ha: Ya ƙunshi bayanai na ayyukan tallafi daga masana’antun masu farawa, asalin masu sanya hannun jari, da sanannun masana’antu, da sauran su.
sw: Ina uchanganuzi wa shughuli za ufadhili na tasnia zinazoanzisha, asili ya wawekezaji, na uangalizi wa tasinia, miongoni mwa zingine.
yo: Ó ní àkóónú ìtúpalẹ̀ àwọn ètò ìrànwọ́ owó tí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ ń rí, ibi tí àwọn olùkówólókòwò náà ti wá, àyè wọn ní ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́, àti bẹ́ẹ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ.
zu: Iqukethe ukuhlukaniswa kwemisebenzi yoxhaso ngezimboni eziqalayo, umsuka wabatshalizimali, nokugqama kwemboni, phakathi kokunye.

am: በምዕራብ አፍሪካ ክልል ውስጥ በሚሊየነር የምዕራብ አፍሪካ ጅማሬዎች( ኤምደብሊውኤኤስ) ብቻ 1 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ያሰባሰቡ ጅማሬዎች ብቻ በሪፖርቱ ውስጥ ከግምት ውስጥ መግባታቸው ትኩረት የሚስብ ነው።
en: It is noteworthy that only Millionaire West African Startups (MWAS) -- startups in the West African region that raised $1 million cumulatively -- within the period under review were considered in the report.
ha: Abin lura ne cewar Millionaire West Africa Startup (MWAS) – su ne kawai Kamfani mai Farawa a Afirka ta Yamma da ta samar da miliyan $1 a haɗe- a cikin lokacin da ake magana aka, aka saka a cikin rahoton.
sw: Ni vyema kutambua kwamba ni Milionea pekee wa Afrika Magharibi (MWAS) -- waanzishaji katika ukanda wa Afrika Magharibi ambao walikusanya $1 milioni kwa jumla -- katika kipindi tunachotathminiwa walizingatiwa katika ripoti.
yo: Ó yẹ́ kí á mẹ́nu ba pé àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ ní Ìwọ̀-oòrùn ilẹ̀ Africa Olówó Mílíọ̀nù (MWAS) -- àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ ní ẹkùn Ìwọ̀-oòrùn ilẹ̀ Africa tí wọ́n ti ṣe àgbájọ mílíọ̀nù $1 ní àpapọ̀ -- ní déédé àkókò àyẹ̀wò nìkan ni àyẹ̀wò wọn wà nínú àbọ̀ náà.
zu: Kubalulekile ukusho ukuthi yi-Millionaire West African Startups (iMWAS) kuphela -- ababhizinisi asafufusa esifundeni saseNtshonalanga ne- Afrika aqoqe isigidi esisodwa samadola ngokunqwabelana -- ngesikhathi sokubuyekeza esicutshungulwe kulo mbiko.

am: የጅምር መስራቾችን ትምህርት በመመርመር ኦባፌሚ አውሎዎ ዩኒቨርሲቲ( ኦኤዩ) እና የቃል ኪዳን ዩኒቨርሲቲ( ሲዩ) በቅደም ተከተል 12 እና 6 ተመራቂዎችን በማፍራት በመጀመሪያ ዲግሪ በተቋሙ መከፋፈል የመጀመሪያ እና ሁለተኛ ደረጃን ይይዛሉ።
en: Zeroing in on the education of the startup founders revealed that Obafemi Awolowo University (OAU) and Covenant University (CU) produced 12 and 6 alumni, respectively, to occupy first and second spot in the institution breakdown by first degree.
ha: Mayar da hankali gaba ɗaya a kan ilimin masu samar da masu sun bayyana cewa Jami’ar Obafemi Awolowo (OAU) da Jami’ar Covenant (CU) sun samar da tsofaffin ɗalibai 12, ɗaya na bin ɗaya, domin zama a bigire na farko da na biyu a sakamakon maƙarantar da digiri na farko.
sw: Kuzingatia elimu ya waanzilishi wa uanzishaji kulionyesha kuwa Chuo Kikuu cha Obafemi Awolowo (OAU) na Chuo Kikuu cha Covenant 9CU) kilitoa wahitimu 12 na 6, mtawaliwa, kuchukua nafasi ya kwanza na ya pili katika kuvunjika kwa taasisi kwa digrii ya kwanza.
yo: Ṣíṣe àyẹ̀wò sí ẹ̀kọ́ àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ náà ṣe àfihàn pé Yunifásitì Ọbáfẹ́mi Awólọ́wọ̀ (OAU) àti Yunifásitì Covenant (CU) ní àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́gbòye 12 àti 6 ní sísẹ̀ntẹ̀lé, tí wọ́n sì wà ní ipò kínní àti ìkejì níbi ìṣàfihàn àtúpalẹ̀ àwọn ilé-ìwé nípa lílo ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́gbòye àkọ́kọ́.
zu: Ukugxila kwezemfundo zabasunguli bamabhizinisi asaqala kuveze ukuthi i-Obafemi Awolowo University (OAU) kanye neCovenant University (CU) bakhiqize abafundi abayi-12 nabayi-6, ngokulandelana, ukuze bathole indawo yokuqala neyesibili ekuqhekekeni kwesikhungo ngeziqu zokuqala.

am: የሚገርመው አንድ የጋራ አዝማሚያ ኤምደብሊውኤኤስ መስራቾች ከአንድ የሦስተኛ ደረጃ ተቋም ኩባንያዎችን በጋራ መመስረታቸው ነበር።
en: Interestingly, a common trend was that MWAS founders from the same tertiary institution founded companies together.
ha: Abin sha’awa, wani yayi da ya yawaita cewa wanda suka samar da MWAS daga jami’a ɗaya sun samar da kamfanoni a tare.
sw: cha kuvutia ni kwamba, waanzilishi wa sasa wa MWAS walitokea kwenye taasisi hizohizo za elimu ya juu na walianzisha makampuni kwa kushirikiana.
yo: Ó yani lẹ́nu, pé irú àṣà tí ó wá gbalẹ̀ ni pé àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ ní MWAS láti ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ kan náà náà ni wọ́n jọ ń dá ilé-iṣẹ́ sílẹ̀.
zu: okumangalisayo, ukuthi okuvamile ukuthi abasunguli beMWAS besikhungo esisodwa semfundo ephakeme basungula izinkampani ndawonye.

am: ኩዲ ለምሳሌ ከኦባፌሚ አዎሎዎ ዩኒቨርሲቲ የመጡ ሁለት የ "ኤምድብሊዌኤስ" መስራቾች አሏት፤ ሌሎች ከኦአዩ የመጡ መስራቾች ያሏቸው ጅማሬዎች ቲም፣ ቴራጎን፣ ፋርም ካውዲ፣ 54ጂን፣ ስሊም ትሬደር እና ፕሮፐርቲ ፕሮ ናቸው።
en: Kudi, for instance, has a couple of MWAS founders from the Obafemi Awolowo University; other startups with founders from OAU are TeamApt, Terragon, Farmcrowdy, 54gene, SlimTrader, and PropertyPro.
ha: Kuɗi, alal misali, yana da wanda suka samar da MWAS daga Jami’ar Obafemi Awolowo; sauran kamfanoni masu farawa da wanda suka samar da su daga OAU su ne TeamApt, Terragon, Farmcrowdy, 54gene, SlimTrader, da kuma PropertyPro.
sw: Kudi, kwa mfano, ana waanzilishi kadhaa wa MWAS kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Obafemi Awolowo; miradi mingine na waanzilishi kutoka OAU ni TeamApt, Terragon, Farmcrowdy, 54gene, Slim Trader na PropertyPro.
yo: Fún àpẹẹrẹ, àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ ní IIAOM láti Yunifásitì Ọbáfẹ́mi Awólọ́wọ̀ ti Ilé-Ifẹ̀ ni wọ́n jọ dá Kudi sílẹ̀; àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ mìíràn tí àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ wọn wá láti OAU náà tún ni TeamApt, Terragon, Farmcrowdy, 54gene, SlimTrader àti PropertyPro.
zu: IKudi, uma senza umzekelo, inabasunguli abambalwa beMWAS abavela eNyuvesi yase-Obafemi Awolowo; amanye amabhizinisi asaqala anabasunguli abavela e-OAU yiTeamApt, Terragon, Farmcrowdy, 54gene, SlimTrader, kanye nePropertyPro.

am: የኪዳኑ ዩኒቨርስቲም ፒጊ ቬስት፣ ኤምዲኤኤኤስ እና ኰራ ኔትወርክ የተባሉ ጅማሬዎች በሪፖርቱ ውስጥ የተካተቱትን መስራቾች አዘጋጅቷል።
en: Covenant University also produced founders whose startups -- PiggyVest, MDAAS, and Kora Network -- featured in the report.
ha: Jami’ar Covenant ma tana da masu samarwa wanda Startup ɗinsu su ne—PiggyVest, MDAAS, da Kora Network—sun fito a cikin rahoton.
sw: Chuo Kikuu cha Convenant pia kilitoa waanzilishi ambao waanzilishi wao -- PiggyVest, MDAAS, na Mtandao wa Kora - waliyoangaziwa katika ripoti hiyo.
yo: Yunifásitì Covenant náà ti pèsè àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ tí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ wọn -- PiggyVest, MDAAS àti Korra Network -- ti jẹyọ nínú àbọ̀ náà.
zu: ICovenant University iphinde yakhiqiza abasunguli abaqalayo -- i-PiggyVest, iMDAAS, neKora Network -- evezwe embikweni.

am: እነዚህ ተቋማት ስኬታማ ጅማ ሬዎችን ለመ መ ስረት የሚ ሄዱ ተመ ራቂዎችን የማ ፍራት ችሎታ ያላቸው ይመ ስላል ወይም እነዚህ ተመራቂዎች ድህረ-ምረቃ አውታረ መረብ ን ይይዛሉ፣ ይህም አንድ ላይ እንዲሰባሰቡ እና እነዚህን ኩባንያዎች እንዲጀምሩ ያስችላቸዋል።
en: It would appear that these institutions either have a knack for producing alumni who go on to found successful startups or these alumni maintain a network, post-graduation, that allows them to come together and start these companies.
ha: Zai nuna cewa waɗannan maƙarantun ko dai suna da ƙarfin samar da ɗalibai waɗanda suke zuwa suna samar da Startup mai cike da nasara ko kuma waɗannan daliban suna neman hanya ne, bayan gama maƙaranta, wadda take ba su damar haɗuwa a tare domin fara waɗannan kamfanonin.
sw: inaonekana kuwa hizi taasisi huenda zina usitadi wa kutengeneza wahitimu ambao wanaendelea kuanzisha miradi yenye mafanikioa au hao wahitimu wanamudu ushirikiano wao waliyokuwa nao kipindi wanasoma; hivyo baada ya kuhitimu ushirikiano huo unawawezesha kuungana kwa pamoja na kuanzisha hizi kampuni.
yo: Ó fẹ́rẹ̀ jọ pé àwọn ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ náà fẹ́ràn láti máa pèsè àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́gbòye tí wọ́n ń lọ dá ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ aláṣeyọrí sílẹ̀ ni àbí àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́gbòye wọ̀nyìí ní ọ̀nà ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ kan, lẹ́yìn ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́gbòye, tí ó fi àyè gbà wọ́n láti fi orí kan orí kí wọ́n sì dá àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ wọ̀nyìí sílẹ̀.
zu: Kungase kubonakale sengathi lezi zikhungo zinekhono lokukhiqiza ama-alumni aqalayo aphumelele noma lawa ma-alumni aqhubeke nokuxoxisana, ngemva kokuthweswa iziqu, okubavumela ukuthi bahlangane baqale lezi zinkampani.

am: ምክንያቱ ምንም ይሁን ምን፣ እነዚህ ተቋማት ባለፉት አስርት ዓመታት ውስጥ የኤምደብሊውኤኤስ መስራቾችን አቅርበዋል።
en: Whatever the reason, these institutions provided the most MWAS founders in the last decade.
ha: Koma menene dalilin, waɗannan maƙarantun su ke samar da mafi yawan masu ƙirƙirar MWAS a shekarun baya masu yawa.
sw: Kwa sababu zozote, hizi taasisi zilitoa waanzilishi wazuri wa MWAS ndani ya muongo uliyopita.
yo: Ohunkóhun tí ìdí náà bá jẹ́, àwọn ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ wọ̀nyìí ni wón ti pèsè àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ ní IIAOM tí ó pọ̀ jùlọ láàárínọdún mẹ́wàá sẹ́yìn.
zu: Noma ngabe yisiphi isizathu, lezi zikhungo zinikeze abasunguli beMWAS abaningi kule minyaka eyishumi edlule.

am: ተጨማ ሪ መረጃ ለማግኘት የምዕራብ አፍሪካ ጅምር አስርት ዓመ ት ሪፖርትን ያግኙ።
en: To find out more, get the West African Startup Decade Report.
ha: Domin samun ƙarin bayani, ka nemi rahoton West African Startup Decade.
sw: Kuendelea kujifunza zaidi, tafuta risala ya miaka kumi ya miradi ya Afrika ya magharibi.
yo: Láti mọ̀ síi, wá Àbọ̀ Ọlọ́dún mẹ́wàá fún ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ ní Ìwọ̀-oòrùn ilẹ̀ Africa.
zu: Ukuze uthole okwengeziwe, thola Umbiko Weminyaka Eyishumi Yokuqala kwamabhizinisi YaseNtshonalanga.

am: በአንፕላሽ ላይ በኒክ ፌዊንግስ የተለጠፈ ምስል
en: Featured image by Nick Fewings on Unsplash
ha: Nick Fewings ne ya samar da hoton da aka nuna a kan Unsplash
sw: Picha zimechapishwa na Nick Fewings kwenye Unsplash
yo: Nick Fewings ló ni àwòrán àyọlọ̀ lórí Unsplash
zu: Isithombe esifakwe nguNick Fewings ku-Unsplash

am: የናይጄሪያው ኦፔይ በፊንቴክ መስክ መሪነቱን ይይዛል፣ በዲጂታል ክፍያ ምድብ ውስጥ ብቸኛው የናይጄሪያ ዲጂታል መድረክ በመሆን ሲኤንቢሲ እና እስታቲካዓለም አቀፍ ደረጃን ያገኛል
en: Nigeria's OPay takes the lead in the Fintech landscape, earning CNBC and Statista global ranking as the only Nigeria digital platform in the Digital Payment Category
ha: Opay na Nijeriya ya zamo na gaba a mahallin Fintech, wanda ya samu shaidar matsayi na CNBC da Statista na duniya a matsayin manhajar zamani kaɗai ta Nijeriya a ɓangaren biyan kuɗi na zamani .
sw: Opay nchini Nigeria inaongoza katika nyanja ya teknolojia ya uchumi na imepata cheo cha kimataifa cha CNBC na Statista kama jukwaa pekee la kidijitali la Nigeria katika kitengo cha Malipo ya Kidijitali
yo: OPay orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria ti ṣáájú àyè iṣẹ́ aṣèṣúná orí ẹ̀rọ, ó gba ipò ní àgbáyé láti ọwọ́ CNBC àti Statista gẹ́gẹ́ bíi ìkànnì orí ayélujára kan ṣoṣo ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria tí ó wà ní Ẹ̀ka Ìsanwó orí Ayélujára
zu: I-OPay yaseNigeria ihamba phambili kuFintech landscape, ihola iCNBC kanye neStatista ezingeni lomhlaba njengebhizinisi elidijithali okuyilona kuphela eNigeria Elisesigabeni Sokukhokha ngobuchwepheshe.

am: በአስደናቂ ስኬት ኦፔይ በናይጄሪያ የፊንቴክ ግዛት ግንባር ቀደም ሆኖ በሲኤንቢሲ እና በስታቲስታ የተከበረ ደረጃ ላይ ብቸኛው የናይጄሪያ ዲጂታል የክፍያ መድረክ በመሆን የተከበረ ቦታን አግኝቷል።
en: In a resounding achievement, OPay has surged to the forefront of Nigeria's fintech realm, securing an esteemed position as the sole Nigerian digital payments platform on CNBC and Statista's esteemed ranking.
ha: A wata babbar nasara, Opay ya ɗaga zuwa ga jerin farko na tsarin fintech a Nijeriya, wanda ya samu babban matsayi na cikakkiyar manhajar biyan kuɗi a jerin matsayi na CNBC da Statista.
sw: Kwa mafanikio makubwa, Opay inaongoza kwenye mrorongo wa kampuni za teknolojia ya uchumi nchini Nigeria, ikitetea nafasi yake muhimu kama muhimili mkuu wa jukwaa la malipo ya kidijitali nchini Nigeria mbele ya CNBC na Statista.
yo: Pẹ̀lú àṣeyọrí olókìkí ọ̀ún, OPay ti tẹ̀síwájú ní àyè iṣẹ́ aṣèṣúná orí ẹ̀rọ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria, ó gba ipò ẹ̀yẹ gẹ́gẹ́ bíi ìkànnì ìsanwó orí ayélujára kan ṣoṣo ní Nigeria tí ó ti gba ipò ẹ̀yẹ láti ọ̀dọ̀ CNBC àti Statista.
zu: Ngempumelelo emangalisayo, i-OPay isifinyelele phambili endaweni ye-fintech yaseNigeria, yathola isikhundla esihlonishwayo njengengxenye yokukhokha edijithali yaseNigeria okuwukuphela kwayo kuCNBC kanye nezinga elihlonishwayo leStatista.

am: ከዓለም ዙሪያ የተለያዩ የገንዘብ መተግበሪያዎችን የሚያጠቃልል ሲ ኤን ቢ ሲ፤ ዓለም አቀፋዊና ታዋቂ የሆነ የ24 ሰዓት የዲጂታል ቴሌቪዥን ጣቢያ ሕያው፣ ዓለም አቀፍ የገንዘብ ገበያ መረጃዎችንና ፕሮግራሞችን የሚያቀርብ ሲሆን ስታቲስታ የተባለ ዝነኛ የገበያ ምርምር ኩባንያ አዳዲስና በቴክኖሎጂ የተንሰራፋ የገንዘብ ውጤቶችንና አገልግሎቶችን በማዘጋጀት ረገድ ከፍተኛ ትኩረት የሚሰጡ ኩባንያዎችን ለመጠበቅ ተባብሮ ተባብራለች።
en: From around the world, encompassing a diverse spectrum of financial applications, CNBC; a global and reputable 24-hour digital television network offering live, global financial market information and programming, and renowned independent market research firm Statista collaborated to curate an extensive list spotlighting companies at the vanguard of crafting innovative, tech-infused financial products and services.
ha: Daga dukkan faɗin duniya, wanda ya hada da manhajar hada-hadar kuɗi daban-daban, CNBC; hanyar sadarwa ta talabijin ta duniya wadda take aiki awa 24 kai tsaye, kasuwar duniya ta bayanan kuɗi da shirye-shirye, da kuma sanannen kamfanin bincike game da kasuwa mai zaman kansa Statista sun yi haɗin guiwa domin su samar da jerin sunaye mai faɗi da zai haskaka kamfanoni taron mutane masu fasahar ƙirƙira, kayayyakin kuɗi da suka cika da fasaha da kuma ayyuka.
sw: Kutoka kote ulimwenguni, inayojumuisha wigo tofauti wa maombi ya kifedha, CNBC; mtandao wa televisheni wa kimataifa na unaoheshimika wa saa 24 unaotoa taarifa za moja kwa moja, za soko la fedha duniani na utayarishaji wa programu, na kampuni huru maarufu ya utafiti wa soko ya Statista ilishirikiana kuratibu orodha kubwa ya kampuni zinazoangazia katika kilele cha kuunda bidhaa na huduma za kifedha za kibunifu, zinazoingizwa na teknolojia.
yo: Láti káàkiri àgbáyé, pẹ̀lú àkóónú onírúurú àwọn ìṣàmúlò ajẹmówó, CNBC; gbajúgbajà ìtakùn móhùnmáwòrán orí ayélujára afọjọ́gbogboṣiṣẹ́, tí ó ń jábọ̀ ìwífún ètò owó bóṣeńlọ ní ọjà elétò owó ní àgbáyé, àti gbajúgbajà ilé-iṣẹ́ adáwà tí ń ṣe ìwádìí ọjà Statista ni wọ́n ti jọ fọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ láti ṣe àtòjọ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ń ṣáájú ní ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ tí ń lo ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ alátinúdà láti pèsè àwọn ohun ìṣàmúlò àti ètò iṣẹ́ ajẹmówó káàkiri àgbáyé.
zu: Kusuka emhlabeni wonke, okuhlanganisa izinhlobonhlobo zezicelo zezezimali, iCNBC; inethiwekhi kamabonakude edijithali yomhlaba wonke nehloniphekile yamahora angu-24 enikeza bukhoma, ulwazi lwemakethe yezezimali yomhlaba wonke kanye nezinhlelo, kanye nefemu eyaziwayo ezimele yocwaningo lwemakethe iStatista ibambisene ukuze iqondise uhlu olubanzi lwezinkampani ezihamba phambili ekusunguleni imikhiqizo namisebenzi yezezimali afakwe ubuchwepheshe obusha.

am: የእነሱ የትብብር ጥረት ከፍተኛዎቹን 200 የፊንቴክ ኩባንያዎች ማጠናቀር ያስገኘ ሲሆን የተጠቃሚዎችን ብዛት፣ የግብይት መጠኖችን እና ገቢዎችን የሚያካትቱ ዋና ዋና አመልካቾችን በመጠቀም የኩባንያዎችን አፈጻጸም ለመገምገም በጥንቃቄ የተገለጸ ዘዴን ይጠቀማል።
en: Their collaborative effort yielded a compilation of the top 200 fintech companies, employing a meticulously defined methodology to assess companies' performance across pivotal indicators, encompassing user volume, transaction volumes, and revenues.
ha: Himmar haɗin guiwarsu ya haifar da tattara manyan kamfanonin fintech guda 200, tare da aiki da tsararraun hanyoyi domin duba ƙoƙarin kamfanonin a cikin masu nuna da suke da matuƙar mahimmanci wanda ya shafi ƙarfin mai amfani, ƙarfin musayar kuɗi, da kuma kuɗin shiga.
sw: Jitihada za kuungana zilivuna mkusanyiko wa kampuni kubwa 200 za teknolojia ya uchumi; waliweka uangalifu kwenye kufafanua mbinu za kufikia ufanisi wa kampuni kwa kuangalia vigezo vyote muhimu vinavyojumuisha kiasi cha mtumiaji, kiasi cha miamala na mapato.
yo: Akitiyan wọn lápapọ̀ ni ó bí àtòjọ àwọn olórí ilé-iṣẹ́ aṣèṣúná orí ẹ̀rọ 200, pẹ̀lú àmúlò ìlànà onímọ̀ láti ṣe àgbéyẹ̀wò iṣẹ́ ṣíṣe àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ náà pẹ̀lú àwọn aṣàmì pàtàkì, tí ó ṣe àkóónú iye àwọn aṣàmúlò, iye ìdúnàádúrà àti owó àmúwọlé.
zu: Umzamo wabo wokubambisana ukhiqize inhlanganisela yezinkampani eziphezulu ezingu-200 ze-fintech, zisebenzisa indlela echazwe ngokucophelela yokuhlola ukusebenza kwezinkampani kuzo zonke izinkomba ezibalulekile, okuhlanganisa umthamo wabasebenzisi, amanani okwenziwayo, kanye nemali engenayo.

am: ተለይተው የቀረቡት ኩባንያዎች በጥንቃቄ በዘጠኝ የተለያዩ ክፍሎች ተከፋፍለዋል-ኒዮ-ባንክ፣ ዲጂታል ክፍያዎች፣ ዲጂታል ሀብቶች፣ ዲጂታል የፋይናንስ እቅድ፣ ዲጂታል የሀብት አያያዝ፣ ተለዋጭ ፋይናንስ፣ ተለዋጭ ብድር፣ ዲጂታል የባንክ መፍትሄዎች እና ዲጂታል የንግድ መፍትሄዎች።
en: The featured companies were meticulously categorized into nine distinct segments: neo-banking, digital payments, digital assets, digital financial planning, digital wealth management, alternate financing, alternate lending, digital banking solutions, and digital business solutions.
ha: Kamfanonin da aka gabatar an raba su ne cikin ƙwarewa zuwa gida tara: bankunan zamani, biya ta yanar gizo, kadara ta yanar gizo, tsarin kuɗi na yanar gizo, da kuma kula da dukiya ta yanar gizo, tallafin kuɗi da ake da shi, bayar da bashi da ake da shi, mafita ga bankuna ta yanar gizo, da kuma mafita ga kasuwanci ta yanar gizo.
sw: Kampuni zenye sifa ziliweka uangalifu kwenye sehemu tisa tofauti kama ifuatavyo; benki za kisasa, malipo ya kidijitali, rasilimali za kidijitali, mipango ya uchumi ya kidijitali, usimamizi wa afya wa kidijitali, uwekezaji mbadala, mikopa mbadala, suluhisho la benki za kidijitali na suluhisho la biashara za kidijitali.
yo: Wọ́n fi ọgbọ́n ṣètò ìpín àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ náà sí ìsọ̀rí mẹ́sàn-án ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀: ìṣèṣúná lorí ayélujára, ìsanwó lórí ayélujára, ohun-ìní amówówọlé orí ayélujára, ìṣètò-ìṣúná lórí ayélujára, ìṣàkóso ọrọ̀ orí ayélujára, ìṣèrànwọ́ owó aláìlobáńkì, ẹ̀yáwó aláìlobáńkì, ìpèsè ọ̀nà ìfowópamọ́ orí ayélujára àti ìpèsè ọ̀nà àbáyọ ìṣòwò orí ayélujára.
zu: Izinkampani ezifakiwe zihlukaniswe ngokucophelela zaba izingxenye eziyisishiyagalolunye ezihlukene: i-neo-banking, izinkokhelo zedijithali, izimpahla zedijithali, ukuhlelwa kwezimali kwedijithali, ukuphathwa kwengcebo yedijithali, enye indlela yokuxhaswa ngemali, enye indela yokuboleka, izixazululo zebhange ledijithali, nezixazululo zebhizinisi ledijithali.

am: ዝርዝሩ እንደ ፔይፓል፣ ሪቮሉት፣ ዋይዝ እና በዓለም አቀፍ ደረጃ በፊንቴክ ቦታ ውስጥ ያሉ አንዳንድ ትልልቅ ተጫዋቾችን ያሳያል።
en: The list featured the likes of Paypal, Revolut, WISE, and some of the biggest players in the fintech space globally.
ha: Jerin sunayen ya bayyana kamar su Paypal, Revolut, WISE, da kuma wasu daga cikin manyan masu damawa a mahallin fintech a duniya.
sw: Kampuni zenye sifa ni kama vile; PayPal,Revolut, WISE na baadhi ya kampuni zingine kubwa zilizopo kwenye teknolojia ya uchumi wa kimataifa.
yo: Ààtò náà ṣe àkóónú irú àwọn bíi PayPal, Revolut, WISE, àti àwọn àgbà ọ̀jẹ̀ ní ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ ìṣúná orí ayélujára káríayé.
zu: Uhlu lubonise ukuthandwa kwePaypal, iRevolut, iWISE, nezinye izinkampani ezinkulu esikhaleni sefintech emhlabeni jikelele.

am: ኦፔይ በዚህ ታዋቂ ዝርዝር ውስጥ በዲጂታል ክፍያዎች ምድብ ውስጥ ብቅ ብሏል።
en: OPay emerged within the digital payments category of this prestigious roster.
ha: Opay ya samu shiga a ɓangaren biyan kuɗi a yanar gizo daga wannan jerin sunayen mai matsayi.
sw: Opay ilikuwemo kwenye orodha ya majina ya kampuni za kifahari zinazojihusisha na malipo ya kidijitali.
yo: OPay jẹyọ nínú ìsọ̀rí ìsanwó lórí ayélujára nínú àtòjọ pàtàkì yìí.
zu: I-OPay ivele phakathi kwesigaba sokukhokha ngobuchwepheshe salolu hlelo oludumile.

am: በናይጄሪያ ውስጥ ያለማቋረጥ ዲጂታል የክፍያ መፍትሄዎች ፍላጐት እየጨመረ መምጣቱ የኦፔይ አቅጣጫን በማብራራት ለሁሉም ዓይነት የገንዘብ ግብይቶች እጅግ በጣም ፈጣን፣ ደህንነቱ የተጠበቀ እና አስተማማኝ መድረክ አድርጎታ።
en: The escalating demand for seamless digital payment solutions within Nigeria has illuminated OPay's trajectory, positioning it as a super fast, secure, and reliable platform for all kinds of financial transactions.
ha: Yawan buƙata ga mafitar biyan kuɗi ta yanar gizo mara tangarɗa a cikin Nijeriya ya haskaka hanyar Opay, wanda ya sanya ya zamanto mai saurin gaske, mai tsaro, kuma manhajar da za a dogara da ita wajen kowanne irin musayar kuɗi.
sw: Kuongezeka kwa uhitaji wa suluhisho bora la malipo ya kidijitali nchini Nigeria, kumeangza njia za Opay kwa kuzifanya kuwa za haraka sana, salama na kuwa jukwaa la kuaminika kwa kila aina ya miamala ya fedha.
yo: Ìbéèrè lemọ́lemọ́ fún ọ̀nà àbáyọ nínú ètò ìsanwó orí ayélujára ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria ni ó ṣe atọ̀nà fún ìdàgbàsókè OPay, tí ó fi sí ipò ìkànnì aláàbò, tí ó yára jùlọ, tí ó sì ṣe é fọkàn tán láti ṣe oríṣiríṣi ìdúnàádúrà ajẹmówó.
zu: Isidingo esikhulayo sezixazululo zokukhokha kwedijithali ezingenamthungo eNigeria sikhanyise umkhondo we-OPay, siyibeka njengenkundla eshesha kakhulu, evikelekile, nethembekile yazo zonke izinhlobo zemisebenzi yezezimali.

am: ይህ ዓለም አቀፋዊ እውቅና በናይጄሪያ እና ከዚያ ባሻገር የዲጂታል የክፍያ ገፅታን ለመለወጥ ያለንን ቁርጠኝነት በድጋሚ ያረጋግጣል" ብለዋል በ ኦፔይ የግብይት ኃላፊ የሆኑት አዴኩሉ አዴዬሚ።
en: This global recognition reaffirms our commitment to transforming the digital payment landscape in Nigeria and beyond," commented Adekunle Adeyemi, Head of Marketing at OPay.
ha: Wannan sanin na duniya shi ya ƙara tabbatar da himmarmu wajen sauya mahallin biyan kuɗi na yanar gizo a Nijeriya da wajen ta,”Adekunle Adeyemi ya yi bayani, Shugaban Ɓangaren Tallatawa na Opay.
sw: "Kutambuliwa kimataifa kulithibitisha tena ahadi zetu za kuboresha hali ya malipo ya kidijitali nchini Nigeria na nchi zingine" alisisitiza Adekunle Adeyemi, mkuu wa masoko wa Opay.
yo: Ìfihàn oníkáríayé yìí túbọ̀ ṣe ìtẹnumọ́ ìfarajìn wa láti yí àyè iṣẹ́ ìsanwó lórí ayélujára ní ilẹ̀ Nigeria àti jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ padà," Adékúnlé Adéyẹmí, ẹni tí ó jẹ́ Adarí Ètò Ìpolongo ní OPay fèsì.
zu: Lokhu kuqashelwa komhlaba wonke kuqinisekisa ukuzibophezela kwethu ekuguquleni isimo sokukhokha kwedijithali eNigeria nangale kwalokho,” kuphawula u-Adekunle Adeyemi, INhloko Yezokumaketha kwa-OPay.

am: እንደ ኩባንያ ምን ማድረግ እንደምንፈልግ እና ቡድናችን ለማሳካት ያለመታከት እየሰራ መሆኑን ያሳያል።
en: "It showcases what we set out to do as a company, and what our teams have been working tirelessly to achieve.
ha: “Yana bayyana abin da muka tsara za mu yi a matsayin kamfani, da kuma abin da mutanenmu suke himmatuwa domin cim ma burin.
sw: inaonyesha kile ambacho kampuni imepanga kufanya na ambacho kamati yetu inapigania bila kuchoka.
yo: "Ó ṣe àfihàn ohun tí à ní lọ́kàn láti ṣe gẹ́gẹ́ bí i ilé-iṣẹ́, àti ohun tí àwọn ìgbìmọ̀ wa ti ń ṣiṣẹ́ fún àṣeyọrí rẹ̀ tí kò sì rẹ̀ wọ́n.
zu: "Kukhombisa lokho ebesizimisele ukukwenza njengenkampani, nalokho amathimba ethu abesebenza ngokuzikhandla ukukufeza.

am: በናይጄሪያ የፊንቴክ ኢንዱስትሪ ውስጥ ለፈጠራ እና ምቾት ሻማ ተሸካሚ በመሆናችን በእውነት ኵራት ይሰማናል፣ እናም ይህ ስኬት የእኛን ቁርጠኝነት እና ማለቂያ የሌለው የደንበኛ-ተኮር አቀራረባችን የመቋቋም አቅም የበለጠ ያጠናክራል" ብለዋል።
en: We are truly proud to be the torchbearer for innovation and convenience in the Nigerian fintech industry, and this achievement further reinforces our dedication, and the resilience of our never-ending customer-centric approach,” he added.
ha: Muna matuƙar alfaharin kasancewa masu haskakawa ga ƙirƙira da kuma nutsuwa a cikin masana’antar fintech ta Nijeriya, kuma wannan cigaban ne yake ƙara mana ƙaimin himmarmu, da kuma kasancewarmu ga fuskantar abokn kasuwancinmu da ba sa yankewa,” ya ƙara da hakan.
sw: Tunajivunia kuweka jitihada kubwa kwenye uvumbuzi na urahisishaji wa teknolojia ya uchumi nchini Nigeria na mafanikio hayo yanaimarisha jitihada zetu na uthabiti wa mbinu yetu ya kuzingatia wateja wetu, aliongezea.
yo: Èyí jẹ́ móríyá fún wá pé àwa ni a kọ́kọ́ já ewé ṣiṣẹ́ àmúlò ọgbọ́n àtinúdá àti àǹfààní ìrọ̀rùn ní ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ aṣèṣúná orí ẹ̀rọ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria, tí àṣeyọrí yìí sì túbọ̀ ń ṣe ìrólágbára fún ìfarajìn wa, pẹ̀lú ọ̀nà iṣẹ́ ìfitoníbàáràṣe tí à ń lò láì dáwọ́ dúró," ó ṣe àfikún.
zu: Siyaziqhenya ngempela ngokuba yizibani ezikhanyisayo ekusunguleni nasekusebenzeni kube lula embonini ye-fintech yaseNigeria, futhi le mpumelelo iqinisa ukuzinikela kwethu, kanye nokuqina kwendlela yethu engapheli yokugxilisa amakhasimende," engeza.

am: በፊንቴክ መስክ ከፍተኛ አለመረጋጋት፣ የገንዘብ እጥረትና ወጪ መቀነስ በተስፋፋበት ወቅት፣ ኦፔይ ደንበኞችን ለመደገፍና ኃይል ለመስጠት እንዲሁም ለየት ያሉ ደንበኞችን ለመርዳትና ኃይል ለመስጠት የሚያስችሉ ምርቶችንና አገልግሎቶችን ለመፍጠር የሚያደርገውን ጥረት አጠናክሮታል።
en: Amidst a period of substantial upheaval in the fintech sphere, scarcity in funding, and a surge in cost-cutting measures, OPay has steered its efforts toward creating bespoke products and services to support and empower customers while providing unique customer experiences.
ha: A cikin wannan lokacin na babbar matsala a mahallin fintech, ƙarancin tallafi, da kuma zuwa ga matakan yanke farashi, Opay sun yi ƙoƙari wajen samar da kayayyaki na musamman da ayyuka domin taimakawa da tallafawa abokan ciniki yayin da suke samar da yanayin musamman ga abokan ciniki.
sw: Katikati ya kipindi kikubwa cha mtikisiko wa hali ya teknolojia ya uchumi, uhaba wa fedha na kuongezeka kwa kasi ya kupunguza matumizi, Opay iliongozwa na jitihada zake za kutengeneza bidhaa na huduma zilizopangwa kusaidia na kuimarisha wateja kwa kutoa uzoefu pekee kwa wateja wao.
yo: Ní àkókò tí hílàhílo ńlá ń lọ ní ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ aṣèṣúná orí ẹ̀rọ, ọ̀wọ́ngógó owó ìrànwọ́, àti ìrùsókè àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ ìgèwónàá, OPay ti sa ipá rẹ̀ láti ṣẹ̀dá àwọn ohun ìṣàmúlò àti iṣẹ́ tí yóò ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ àti ìrónilágbára fún àwọn oníbàárà nígbà tí wọ́n yóò sì tún máa pèsè ìrírí ìmúlò tí ó dá yàtọ̀ fún àwọn oníbàárà.
zu: Esikhathini sezinxushunxushu ezinkulu emkhakheni we-fintech, ukushoda kwezimali, kanye nokwanda kwezindlela zokunciphisa izindleko, i-OPay iqondise imizamo yayo ekwakheni imikhiqizo nemisebenzi ajwayelekile ukuze isekele futhi inikeze amakhasimende amandla kuyilapho inikeza ulwazi lwamakhasimende oluhlukile.

am: እንዴት ባንክሊ እንደገና ለዕለት ተዕለት ሰዎች ቁጠባን ይገልጻል
en: How Bankly is Redefining Savings for Everyday People
ha: Yadda Bankly yake sake tsarin ajiya ga Jama'a na yau da Kullum
sw: Jinsi Bankly inavyofafanua Upya Akiba kwa Watu wa Kila Siku
yo: Bí Bankly ṣe ń Ṣàtúnwò Ìfowópamọ́ fún Ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn Ènìyàn
zu: IBankly Ichaza Kabusha Ukonga Kwabantu Kwansuku Zonke

am: ተቃራኒዎች እርስ በርስ ይሳባሉ የሚባለው ምን እንደሆነ ታውቃለህ?
en: You know how they say opposites attract?
ha: Ka san yadda suke cewa kishiyar hakan na janyo hankali?
sw: Unajua jinsi wanavyosema kinyume huvutia?
yo: O mọ bí wọ́n ṣe máa ń sọ pé ohun tí kò jọra ní ó máa ń ba ara ṣe?
zu: Uyazi ukuthi bathi abantu abangafani bayathandana?

am: ደኅና፣ ይህ በእኔ እና ሱዛን መካከል ያለውን ወዳጅነት ለመግለጽ ፍጹም መንገድ ነው፣ የእኔ የዕድሜ ልክ በወንጀል አጋር።
en: Well, that's the perfect way to describe the friendship between myself and Susan, my lifelong 'Partner-in-Crime'.
ha: To, wannan ne daidai yadda za ka kwatanta abotar da ke tsakanina da Susan, ‘daɗaɗɗiyar aminiyta da muke komai tare’.
sw: Sawa, hiyo ni njia sahihi ya kuelezea urafiki kati yangu na Susan, mshirika wangu wa muda mrefu kwenye uhalifu.
yo: Ẹn, bẹ́ẹ̀ gẹ́lẹ́ gan ni irúfẹ́ ọ̀rẹ́ tí ó wà láàárín èmi àti Susan, "Ọlọ́rọ̀" mi láti tipẹ́tipẹ́.
zu: Hhayi-ke, leyo yindlela ephelele yokuchaza ubungane phakathi kwami ​​​​noSusan, unguzakwethu obalulekile empilweni yami yonke.

am: እኔና ሱዛን በባህርይ ረገድ በጣም እንለያያለን፤ ይህ ልዩነት ደግሞ ለሁለት አስርተ ዓመታት በሚቆየው ወዳጅነታችን ውስጥ ፈጽሞ አልተለወጠም።
en: Susan and I couldn't be more different in our personalities, and that contrast has remained constant throughout our nearly two-decade friendship.
ha: Ni da Susan muna da bambanci a ɗabi’a, kuma wannan yanayin ya kasance a haka a gaba ɗaya shekaru ashirin na kawancen mu.
sw: Tabia yangu na Susan hazikutofautiana sana, na utofauti umebaki palepale katika kipindi chote cha miongo miwili ya urafiki wetu.
yo: Èmi àti Susan kò fi ìhùwàsí jọra rárá, tí ìyàtọ̀ náà sì wà bẹ́ẹ̀ títí ọ̀rẹ́ wa fi fẹ́rẹ̀ pé ogún ọdún báyìí.
zu: Mina noSusan sihlukene kakhulu, futhi lokho kuhluka bekulokhu kungashintshi phakathi nobungane bethu obucishe bube yiminyaka eyishumi.

am: እኔ ለጭንቀት የተጋለጠ እና ድንገተኛ አመለካከት የማዳበር አዝማሚያ ቢኖረኝም ሱዛን የተረጋጋ እና ጥንቃቄ የተሞላበት ግለሰብ ናት።
en: While I tend to embrace a carefree and spontaneous attitude, Susan is the epitome of a calm, meticulous individual.
ha: A yayin da nake ƙoƙarin riƙo da ɗadi’u masu cike da raha, Susan ta kasance mai nutsuwa, mai taka tsantsan.
sw: Wakati nikiendelea kukumbatia tabia zangu za kutojali, Susan yeye ni mfano wa utulivu na mtu makini.
yo: Nígbà tí èmi jẹ ẹni tí ó bẹ tí kò sì ní àkàkún, Susan jẹ èèyàn tutù tí ara rẹ̀ sì balẹ̀ dáadáa.
zu: Nakuba ngivame ukwamukela isimo sengqondo sokungakhathali nesizenzakalelayo, uSusan uyisibonelo somuntu ozolile, ocophelelayo.

am: ለዝርዝሮች የማይታመን እይታ እና ለድርጅት ተፈጥሯዊ ስሜት አላት።
en: She has an incredible eye for detail and an innate sense of organization.
ha: Tana da duba abu da dogon nazari da kuma tunanin iya tsari.
sw: Ana akili pevu sana katika kuona na kufafanua ushirikiano.
yo: Ó máa ń ṣe nǹkan rẹ̀ létòlétò ni, ó sì ní ojú fún nǹkan tí ó dára.
zu: Uneso elimangalisayo lemininingwane kanye nomuzwa wokuhleleka adalwe nawo.

am: የተለያዩ ባህርያችን ቢኖሩም እኔና ሱዛን ገንዘብን የመቆጠብ ፍላጐት አለን።
en: Despite our contrasting traits, Susan and I share a common passion for saving money.
ha: Duk da bambancin dabi’unmu, da ni da Susan muna da tunani iri ɗaya wajen adana kuɗi.
sw: Licha ya tofauti zetu za tabia, mimi na Susan tuna shauku ya kutunza fedha.
yo: Bí ó ṣe wá jẹ́ pé ìwà wa kò jọra yìí, èmi àti Susan jọ ní ààyò láti máa fi owó pamọ́.
zu: Naphezu kwezimo zethu ezihlukene, mina noSusan sinothando olufanayo lokonga imali.

am: ብዙውን ጊዜ የገንዘብ አቅማችንን ለመቈጣጠር የተለያዩ መንገዶችን እንወያያለን፣ እና የቅርብ ጊዜው ተግዳሮታችን በተለይ ለእናቷ መጪው 50 ኛ ዓመት የምስረታ በዓል እቅድ ማውጣትና መቆጠብ ነበር።
en: We often discuss various ways to manage our finances, and our latest challenge was particularly significant – planning and saving for her mother's upcoming 50th birthday celebration.
ha: Muna yawan tattauna hanyoyi mabambanta domin kula da harkokin kuɗinmu, matsalarmu ta nan kusa ita ce tanadi mai amfani wajen tara kuɗi domin gabatowar murnar ranar haihuwar mahaifiyarta na shekaru 50.
sw: Kila mara tunajadili njia sahihi ya kusimamia fedha zetu, na changamoto yetu kubwa kwa kipindi hicho, ilikuwa ni kutunza na kupangilia fedha kwa ajiri ya sherehe muhimu ya siku ya kuzaliwa ya mama yake kutimiza miaka 50.
yo: A jọ máa ń sọ̀rọ̀ nípa ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ọ̀nà tí a lè gbà láti ṣàkóso ètò ìnáwó wa, tí isẹ́ àkànṣe tuntun wa sì ṣe pàtàkì gan – ètò àti ìfowópamọ́ fún ayẹyẹ ọjọ́-ìbí àádọ́ta ọdún ti ìyá rẹ̀ tí ó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà.
zu: Sivame ukuxoxa ngezindlela ezihlukahlukene zokuphatha izimali zethu, futhi inselele yethu yakamuva ibibaluleke kakhulu – ukuhlela nokongela umgubho ozayo wosuku lokuzalwa lukanina lweminyaka engama-50.

am: ቤተሰቡ ይህንን ጉልህ ምዕራፍ በልዩ ዝግጅት ለማክበር ወስኗል።
en: The family had decided to mark this significant milestone with a special event.
ha: Iyalin sun yanke shawarar tarar wannan cigaban mai mahimmanci da biki na musamman.
sw: Familia iliadhimia kuweka alama kwenye hatua hii muhimu kwa tukio maalum.
yo: Mọ̀lẹ́bí náà ti pinnu láti ṣe àkàndá ètò fún ẹ̀yẹ pàtàkì yìí.
zu: Umndeni wawunqume ukubeka lokhu njengengqophamlando umcimbi okhethekile.

am: ይሁን እንጂ ፣ወንድሞቿና እህቶቿ ለጉዳዩ አስተዋጽኦ ለማበርከት ከፍተኛ ፍላጐት ቢኖራቸውም የእነዚህን አስተዋጽኦዎች ኃላፊነት በተሞላበት መንገድ የማስተዳደር ሸክም ነበረባት።
en: However, as much as her siblings were eager to contribute for the occasion, she had the burden of managing these contributions responsibly.
ha: Saboda haka, duk yadda ‘yan’uwanta suke son bada gudunmawarsu domin bikin, ita ke da nauyin kulawa da waɗannan gudunmuwar yadda ya kamata.
sw: Hata hivyo, kwa vile ndugu zake walikuwa na shauku ya kuchangia hafla hiyo, alikuwa na mzigo wa kusimamia michango hii kwa uwajibikaji.
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n bí ó ṣe ti wu àwọn ọmọ ìyá rẹ̀ láti dáwó jọ fún ayẹyẹ náà, òun ní ọ̀ràn ṣíṣe àkóso àwọn owó tí wọ́n dá jọ yìí dáadáa ṣí lé lórí.
zu: Nokho, nakuba izingane zakubo zazimagange ukunikela kulo mcimbi, wayenejoko lokuphatha le minikelo ngendlela efanele.

am: አጆ''፣ የተሰኘውን የድሮውን የጋራ የቁጠባ ባህል እንደገና ለመጐብኘት አሰበች።
en: She contemplated revisiting "Ajo", an age-old communal savings tradition.
ha: Ta yi tunanin sake komawa ga”Ajo”, wata daɗaɗɗiyar hanyar adana kuɗi ta al’umma.
sw: Alifikiri kurejea "Ajo", utamaduni wa zamani wa kuokoa jamii.
yo: Ó tilẹ̀ rò ó bóyá kí òun ṣe àtúnlò "Àjọ", àṣà ìfowópamọ́ ní àwùjọ tí ó ti wà tipẹ́tipẹ́.
zu: Ucabange ukuphinde avakashele i-"Ajo", isiko leminyaka elidala lokonga umphakathi.

am: ይህ የአካባቢያዊ የቁጠባ ዘዴ ለበዓሉ ገንዘብ ለማሰባሰብ ምቹ መንገድ እንደሚሆን ተስፋ ይሰጥ ነበር።
en: This local savings method held the promise of a convenient way to pool money for the celebration.
ha: Wannan hanyar tara kuɗin ta nuna alamun hanya ce ta nutsuwa ta tara kuɗin don yin bikin.
sw: Mbinu hii ya kuweka akiba ya ndani ilishikilia ahadi ya njia rahisi ya sherehe.
yo: Ọ̀nà ìfowópamọ́ ìbílẹ̀ yìí ní ó tún fẹ́rẹ̀ jẹ́ ọ̀nà tí ó dára jùlọ fún wọn láti tu owó jọ fún ayẹyẹ náà.
zu: Le ndlela yokonga ibambe indlela elula yokuhlanganisa imali yomgubho.

am: ይሁን እንጂ፣ ይህ ዘዴ ጕድለቶች እንዳሉትና ማጭበርበር የተለመደ እንደሆነ ከራሷ ተሞክሮ ታውቃለች።
en: However, she knew from experience that the method had its flaws, and fraud was common.
ha: Saboda haka, ta sani daga ƙwarewa cewa hanyar na da nata matsalolin, kuma damfara ta zama ruwan dare.
sw: Hata hivyo, alikuwa anafahamu kabisa kuwa hii njia ina dosari nyingi na ulaghai ni kawaida.
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n ìrírí tí kọ́ ọ pé ọ̀nà náà ní àwọn àkùdé rẹ̀, èyí tí jìbìtì sì wọ́pọ̀.
zu: Nokho, wayazi ngokuhlangenwe nakho kwakhe ukuthi le ndlela yayinamaphutha, futhi ukukhwabanisa kwakuvamile.

am: ወንድሞቿን ''ለአጆ'' ቡድን ማስተዋወቅ አደገኛ ነበር።
en: Introducing her siblings to an “Ajo” group was risky.
ha: Gabatar da ‘yan’uwanta ga kungiyar “ Ajo” abu ne mai haɗari.
sw: Kuwatambulisha ndugu zake kwenye kikundi cha "Ajo" ilikuwa hatari.
yo: Mímú àwọn tẹ̀gbọ́ntàbúrò rẹ̀ wọ "Àjọ" ní ewu.
zu: Ukwethula izingane zakubo eqenjini elithi “Ajo” kwakuyingozi.

am: አንድ ሰው መዋጮውን ይዞ ከሄደ በራሱና በወንድሞቹና እኅቶቹ መካከል ግጭት ሊፈጠር ይችላል።
en: If someone went away with their contributions, it could cause conflict between herself and her siblings.
ha: Idan wani ya gudu da kuɗinsu, zai iya janyo rigima tsakaninta da ‘yan’uwanta.
sw: Kama mtu akikimbia na michango yao, itasababisha mgogoro kati yake na ndugu zake.
yo: Bí ẹnìkan bá gbé owó àjọ sálọ, ó lè dá ìjà sílẹ̀ láàárín òun àti tẹ̀gbọ̀ntàbúrò rẹ̀.
zu: Uma othile ehamba neminikelo yakhe, kungase kubangele ukungqubuzana phakathi kwakhe nezingane zakubo.

am: ሌላ መንገድ መፈለግ ነበረባት።
en: She had to find another way.
ha: Ya kamata ta nemo wata hanyar.
sw: ilibidi atafute njia nyingine.
yo: Ó ní láti wá ọ̀nà mìíràn.
zu: Kwakumele athole enye indlela.

am: የሱዛን መፍትሄ ፍለጋ ወደ ባንክሊ ማይክሮ ፋይናንስ ባንክ አመራች።
en: Susan's pursuit of a solution led her to Bankly Microfinance Bank.
ha: Neman mafita ga Susan ya kai ta ga Bankly Microfinance Bank.
sw: Harakati za Susan kutafuta suluhisho zilimpeleka Bankly Microfinance Bank.
yo: Ìrìn-àjò Susan láti wá ọ̀nà àbáyọ ní ó gbé e dé Báǹkì Alájẹṣẹ́kù Bankly.
zu: Ukufuna kukaSusan isixazululo kwamholela e-Bankly Microfinance Bank.

am: ባህላዊውን" አጆ" ዘመናዊ ያደረገ የቡድን ቁጠባ ባህሪ በባንክሊ መተግበሪያ ላይ አቅርበዋል።
en: They offered a Group Savings feature on the Bankly app that modernized the traditional "Ajo".
ha: Suna bayar da damar tara kuɗi a ƙungiyance a manhajar ta Bankly wanda ya zamanantar da hanyar al’adar ta “Ajo”.
sw: Walitoa kipengele cha akiba cha kikundi kwenye programu ya Bankly ambayo iliboresha "Ajo" ya kitamaduni.
yo: Wọ́n ń pèsè àbùdá Ìfowópamọ́ Oníjọ lórí ohun èlò ìmúṣẹ́ṣe Bankly, èyí tí ó jẹ́ àtúnṣe ìgbàlódé fún "Àjọ" àtijọ́.
zu: Banikeze iGroup Savings kuhlelo lokusebenza lweBankly elenza i-"Ajo" yendabuko ibe eyesimanjemanje.

am: የዲጂታል መሣሪያዎች ምቾት ጋር በማስቀመጥ የጋራ መንፈስ የተገናኘ ድልድይ እንደ ነበር።
en: It was like a bridge that connected the communal spirit of saving with the convenience of digital tools.
ha: Ya zamanto kamar gada ce da ta haɗa son tara kuɗi na al’ada tare da nutsuwar kayan aiki na zamani.
sw: ilikuwa kama daraja lililounganisha njia za jadi za uhifadhi wa fedha na vifaa rahisi vya kidijitali.
yo: Ó dà bíi afárá tí ó ń mú àsopọ̀ ìwà àjọfowópamọ́ pẹ̀lú ìlò àwọn ohun èlò alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ amáyédẹrùn ni.
zu: Kwakufana nebhuloho elixhumanisa umoya womphakathi wokonga nokusebenziseka kalula kwamathuluzi edijithali.

am: በዚህ ባህሪ፣ ሱዛን በመጪው የቤተሰብ ክስተት ላይ ለማዳን ወንድሞ ቿን በልበ ሙሉነት ማሰባሰብ ትችላለች።
en: With this feature, Susan could confidently rally her siblings to save towards the upcoming family event.
ha: Da wannan yanayin, Susan za ta iya samun ƙwarin guiwar jan ra’ayin ‘yan’uwanta game da tara kudi don bikin mai gabatowa.
sw: Kwa sifa hizi, Susan angeweza kuwaalika ndugu zake kuhifadhi fedha kwa uhakika zaidi kwa ajiri ya tukio lijalo la familia.
yo: Pẹ̀lú àbùdá yìí, Susan máa lè fi ìgboyà kó àwọn tẹ̀gbọ́ntàbúrò rẹ̀ jọ láti wá jọ fi owó pamọ́ fún ayẹyẹ mọ̀lẹ́bí tí ó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà náà.
zu: Ngalesi sici, uSusan wayekwazi ukuhlanganisa izingane zakubo ngokuzethemba ukuze zongele umcimbi womndeni ozayo.

am: የባንክሊ የቡድን ቁጠባ ባህሪ ግልጽነት እና ተጠያቂነትን የሚፈጥር የጋራ ቁጠባ ፈጠራ አቀራረብ ነው።
en: Bankly's Group Savings feature is an innovative approach to communal savings that creates transparency and accountability.
ha: Yanayin ajiyar kuɗi a Ƙungiyance Bankly na wani mataki ne na ƙirƙira domin ajiyar kuɗi na al’umma wanda yake samar da gaskiya da amana.
sw: Kipengele cha Akiba cha Kundi la Bankly ni mbinu bunifu ya uwekaji akiba ya jumuiya inayounda uwazi na uwajibikaji.
yo: Àbùdá Ìfowópamọ́ Oníjọ orí Bankly jẹ́ ọ̀nà àtinúdà sí àjọfowópamọ́ tí ó ní ètò àkóyawọ́ pẹ̀lú ìsirò ni.
zu: Isici seBankly's Group Savings siyindlela entsha yokonga edala ukubonakala obala nokuziphendulela.

am: እንደ ሱዛን ያሉ ሰዎች አስፈላጊ ለሆኑ ፍላጐቶች ማዳን በሚፈልጉበት ጊዜ መውጫ መንገድ ለመስጠት ተደራሽነትን፣ ለተጠቃሚ ምቹ በይነገጽን እና ግልጽነትን አጽንኦት ይሰጣል።
en: It combines accessibility, user-friendly interface, and emphasis on transparency to give people like Susan a way out when they need to save for important needs.
ha: Yana haɗa yanayin samuwa, da kuma mu'amala mai kyau ga masu amfani, da kuma mayar da hankali game da amana domin ba wa mutane kamar Susan dama a lokacin da suke son ajiyar kuɗi domin buƙatu masu mahimmanci.
sw: inahusisha uwajibikaji, utumiaji rahisi na msisitizo kwenye uwazi kuwapa watu kama Susan njia rahisi ya kutunza fedha zao kwa mahitaji muhimu.
yo: Ó ṣe àkópọ̀ ìráàyèsí, ojú-ìwò ìsẹ̀rọmáṣàmúlò tí ó rọrùn, pẹ̀lú ìtẹ̀mọ́ àkóyawọ́ láti pèsè ọ̀nà àbáyọ fún àwọn èèyàn bíi Susan nígbà tí wọ́n bá nílò láti fi owó pamọ́ fún àwọn ìnílò pàtàkì.
zu: Ihlanganisa ukufinyeleleka, isixhumi esibonakalayo esisebenziseka kalula, kanye nokugcizelela obala ukuze kunikeze abantu abafana noSusan indlela yokuphuma lapho bedinga ukulondolozela izidingo ezibalulekile.

am: የቡድን ቁጠባ ባህሪው በየቀኑ የሚከፈለው የ 15% ተወዳዳሪ ዓመታዊ የወለድ መጠን ይሰጣል፣ ይህም በጊዜ ሂደት የተረጋጋ እና ቀጣይነት ያለው እድገት እድል ይሰጣል። ያ ብቻ አይደለም።
en: The Group Savings feature also offers a competitive annual interest rate of 15% accrued daily, providing an opportunity for steady, continuous growth over time. That’s not all.
ha: Yanayin Ajiyar Kuɗin a Ƙungiyance haka nan yana bada kuɗin ruwa na shekara a kashi 15% na abin da aka samu a rana, domin samar da dama don cigaba mai ɗorewa zuwa wani lokaci. Wannan ba shi ke nan ba.
sw: Kipengele cha Akiba cha Kundi pia kinatoa kiwango cha riba cha kila mwaka cha ushindani cha 15% kinachokusanywa kila siku na kutoa fursa kwa ukuaji thabiti na endelevu kadri muda unavyopita. Hiyo siyo yote.
yo: Àbùdá Ìfowópamọ́ Oníjọ náà tún ń pèsè owó èlé ọlọ́dọọdún tí kò lẹ́gbẹ́, tí ó jẹ́ ìdá 15% owó ojoojúmọ́, èyí tí ó tún ń pèsè àǹfààní fún ìdàgbàsókè tí ó dára tí ó sì ní ìtẹ̀síwájú.
zu: Isici seGroup Savings siphinde sinikeze isilinganiso senzalo saminyaka yonke esingu-15% esinqwabelene nsuku zonke, sinikeza ithuba lokukhula okuzinzile, okuqhubekayo ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. Akugcini lapho.

am: ተጠቃሚዎች ለቡድን የቁጠባ ዕቅዳቸው የቁጠባ መርሃግብሮችን፣ የዒላማ መጠኖችን እና የማጠናቀቂያ ቀናትን ማዘጋጀት ይችላሉ፣ ይህም የፋይናንስ አንድነት እና የጋራ ኃላፊነት ስሜትን ያበረታታል።
en: Users can set savings schedules, target amounts, and maturity dates for their group savings plan, fostering a sense of financial unity and shared responsibility.
ha: Masu amfani za su iya saita tsarin ajiyar kuɗi, da yawan kuɗin, da kuma lokacin da ya isa a ɗiba domin tsarin tara kuɗi na ƙungiyarsu, domin nuna yanayin haɗin kai wajen lamuran kuɗi da kuma rarraba ayyuka.
sw: Mtumiaji anaweza kutengeneza ratiba ya kutunza fedha zake, kiasi cha lengo na tarehe ya lengwa ya kuhifadhi fedha za kikundi chao ili kukuza umoja wa kifedha na uwajibikaji wa pamoja.
yo: Àwọn aṣàmúlò lè ṣètò bí wọ́n ṣe fẹ́ kí owó máa lọ sí ìpamọ́, iye owó tí wọ́n fẹ́ máa fi pamọ́ àti ọjọ́ tí wọ́n bá máa gba owó náà fún ètò ìfowópamọ́ oníjọ wọn, èyí tí yóò mú ìṣọ̀kan àti ojúṣe alájọṣe bá ètò owó wọn.
zu: Abasebenzisi bangasetha amashejuli okonga, amanani aqondiwe, namadethi okuvuthwa ohlelo lwabo lokonga lweqembu, okukhuthaza umuzwa wobunye bezezimali kanye nomthwalo wemfanelo okwabelwana ngawo.

am: የበለጠ ግልጽነትን ለመፍጠር የቡድን ቁጠባ ባህሪ ለአባላት ተቀማጭ ገንዘብ እና ገንዘብ ማውጣት ፈጣን ማሳወቂያዎችን ለማቅረብ የታጠቁ ናቸው፣ ሁሉም ሰው መረጃውን እንዲያውቅ ያረጋግጣል፣ ይህም ለትርፍ ሰጭዎች ምቾት ለመስጠት እና በቡድኑ ውስጥ መተማመንን ለመገንባት ይረዳል።
en: To create even more transparency, the Group Savings feature is equipped to provide members with instant notifications for deposits and withdrawals, ensuring everyone stays informed, which helps to give comfort to contributors and build trust within the group.
ha: Domin samar da amana sosai, yanayin ajiyar kuɗin ƙungiyar an tsara shi ne domin samarwa da ‘yan ƙungiyar alama ta nan take na kuɗin da aka saka da kuma wanda aka cire, domin tabbatar da cewa kowa ya samu bayani, wanda hakan zai taimaka wajen sanya nutsuwa ga masu sanya kuɗinsu da kuma samar da yarda a tsakanin juna a ƙungiyar.
sw: ili kuwa na uwazi zaidi, kikundi cha uhifadhi kinatoa vifaa kwa wanachama vyenye taarifa za papo hapo za kuweka na kutoa fedha, kuhakikisha kila mmoja anapata taarifa, kitu ambacho kinasaidia kuleta utulivu kwa wachangiaji na kujenga uaminifu kwenye kikundi.
yo: Láti tún ṣàfihàn àkóyawọ́ síi, wọ́n tún fi ìtanijí kíákíá fún àwọn ìsanwówọlé àti ìgbowójáde sínú àbùdá Ìfowópamọ́ Oníjọ náà fún àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀, tí ó ń ṣe àrídájú pé gbogbo olùkópa ní ìmọ̀ sí ohun tí ó ń ṣẹlẹ̀, tí yóò fi ọkàn àwọn olùkópa balẹ̀ tí yóò sì tún mú ìgbàgbọ́ rinlẹ̀ síi nínú ẹgbẹ́ náà.
zu: Ukudala obala nakakhulu, isici seGroup Savings sihlonyiselwe ukunikeza amalungu izaziso ezisheshayo zamadiphozithi nokuhoxiswa kwemali, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi wonke umuntu uhlala enolwazi, okusiza ukunikeza induduzo kwabanikelayo nokwakha ukwethembana phakathi kweqembu.

am: ባንክሊ ማይክሮ ፋይናንስ ባንክ ተልዕኮውን በመወጣት የፋይናንስ አከባቢን እንደገና ለመቅረጽ እና እንደ ሱዛን ያሉ ግለሰቦችን የዕለት ተዕለት የገንዘብ ተግዳሮቶችን በሚያሟሉ የምርት ባህሪዎች አማካይነት ለማጐልበት ቁርጠኛ ነው።
en: True to its mission, Bankly Microfinance Bank is dedicated to reshaping the financial landscape and empowering individuals like Susan through product features that cater to everyday financial challenges.
ha: Daidai da manufarsu, Bankly Microfinance Bank ya dage wajen sake saita mahallin kuɗin da kuma tallafawa mutane ɗaiɗaiku kamar Susan ta hanyar yanayin kayayyakin da suke kula da dukkan ƙalubale na yau da kullum.
sw: Amini katika maono yetu, Bankly Microfinance Bank ilijitolea kuunda upya hali ya uchumi na kuwawezesha watu kama Susan kupitia sifa za bidhaa ambazo zinaondoa changamoto za kila siku za uchumi.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ìṣòdodo sí ìlépa rẹ̀, Báǹkì Alájẹṣẹ́kù Bankly ní ìfarajìn láti ṣe àtúnkọ́ àyè iṣẹ́ ajẹmówó tí yóò sì ṣe ìrólágbára àwọn èèyàn bíi Susan nípasẹ̀ àwọn àbùdá ohun ìṣàmúlò tí yóò yanjú àwọn ìpènijà ojoojúmọ́ lórí owó.
zu: Ngokuvumelana nomgomo wayo, iBankly Microfinance Bank izinikele ekulungiseni kabusha isimo sezezimali futhi inikeze amandla abantu abafana noSusan ngokusebenzisa izici zomkhiqizo ezibhekana nezinselele zezimali zansuku zonke.

am: የቁጠባን ጽንሰ-ሀሳብ ከቤት ውስጥ ሥራ ወደ አኗኗር እየቀየሩ ነው፣ ይህም ሰዎች የግል፣ የቤተሰብ እና የንግድ እድገትን እንዲያገኙ ይረዳቸዋል።
en: They are transforming the notion of savings from a chore, to a lifestyle that helps people achieve personal, family, and business growth.
ha: Suna canja tsarin ajiyar kuɗin daga aiki, zuwa ga ɓangaren rayuwa da yake taimakawa mutane su cim ma cigaban kansu , na iyali, da kuma kasuwanci.
sw: wanabadilisha dhana ya kutunza fedha nyumbani, kwenda kwenye mfumo wa maisha ambao watu watapata maendeleo binafsi, fanilia na biashara.
yo: Wọ́n ń mú àyípadà bá èrò pé iṣẹ́ ńlá ni ìfowópamọ́, tí wọ́n sì ń sọ ọ́ di ọ̀nà ìgbáyé tí ó ń ran àwọn èèyàn lọ́wọ́ láti lè mú ìdàgbàsókè bá ara wọn, mọ̀lẹ́bí àti òkòwò wọn.
zu: Baguqula umbono wokonga usuka emsebenzini, ube indlela yokuphila esiza abantu ukuthi bathole ukukhula komuntu siqu, umndeni, kanye nebhizinisi.

am: ስለ ባንክሊ የቡድን ቁጠባ ባህሪ ተጨማሪ መረጃ ለማግኘት እባክዎን የማሳያ ቪዲዮውን ለመመልከት እዚህ ጠቅ ያድርጉ ወይም bankly.ng ን ይጐብኙ።
en: For more information about the Bankly Group Savings Feature, please click here to watch the demo video, or visit bankly.ng.
ha: Domin ƙarin bayani game da Yanayin Bankly na Ajiye Kuɗi a Ƙungiyance, ka danna nan domin kallon bidiyon demo, ko ka ziyarci shafin bankly.ng.
sw: Kwa taarifa zaidi kuhusu kikundi cha kuhifadhi fedha cha Bankly; Tafadhali bofya hapa kutazama video au tembelea tovuti ya bankly.ng.
yo: Fún àlàyé síwájú sí i nípa Àbùdá Ìfowópamọ́ Oníjọ ti Bankly, jọ̀wọ́ síratẹ ibí yìí láti wo fọ́nràn asàpéjúwe náà, tàbí kí o lọ sí bankly.ng.
zu: Ukuze uthole ulwazi olwengeziwe mayelana Nesici Sokulondoloza Iqembu Le-Bankly, sicela uchofe lapha ukuze ubuke ividiyo yedemo, noma vakashela ku-bankly.ng.

am: ሌጎስ ስቴት ሲኒየር ሞዴል ኰሌጅ ባዶሬ በፕሮጀክት አይኮሙኒቲ ኢስቲም ውድድር አሸነፈ
en: Lagos State Senior Model College Badore Wins Project iCommunity STEAM Competition Organised for Public Schools in Lagos
ha: Kwalejin Senior Model Badore ta Jihar Legas ta ci Gasar Babban Project iCommunity STEAM wadda aka shirya domin maƙarantun gwamnati a Jihar Legas
sw: Lagos State Senior Model College, Badore chashinda Mashindano ya Mradi wa iCommunity STEAM yaliyoandaliwa kwa ajili ya Shule za Umma huko Lagos
yo: Senior Model College Badore ti Ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó Jáwé olúborí níbi Ìdíje Iṣẹ́-àkànṣe iCommunity ti STEAM tí wọ́n Ṣètò fún àwọn Ilé-ìwé Gbogboogbò ní Èkó
zu: ILagos State Senior Model College iBadore Iwina Umncintiswano weProjekthi iCommunity STEAM Ehlelelwe Izikole Zomphakathi e-Lagos

am: ቼቭሮን ናይጄሪያ ሊሚትድ( ሲኤንኤል) ከናይጄሪያ ብሔራዊ ፔትሮሊየም ሊሚትድ( ኤንኤንፒሲኤል) ጋር በመተባበር ከ እስቴም ፈን ፌስት ጋር በመተባበር የፕሮጀክት አይኮሙኒቲ ውድድርን አዘጋጅቷል።
en: Chevron Nigeria Limited (CNL) in partnership with Nigerian National Petroleum Limited (NNPCL) in collaboration with STEAM Fun Fest organized the Project iCommunity STEAM Competition.
ha: Chevron Nigeria Limited (CNL) tare da haɗin guiwar Nigerian National Petroleum Limited (NNPC) tare da STEAM Fun Fest suka shirya gasar Project iCommunity STEAM.
sw: Chevron nigeria Limited (CNL) kwa kushirikiana na Nigeria National Petroleum Limited (NNPL) kwa kuungana na STEAM Fun Fest waliandaa mashindano ya mradi wa iCommunity STEAM.
yo: Chevron Nigeria Limited (CNL) ní ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú Nigerian National Petroleum Limited (NNPCL) ni wọ́n fọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ pẹ̀lú STEAM Fun Fest láti ṣètò Ìdíje STEAM ti Ìdíje iCommunity.
zu: IChevron Nigeria Limited (iCNL) ngokubambisana neNigerian National Petroleum Limited (iNNPCL) ngokubambisana neSTEAM Fun Fest bahlele uMqhudelwano weProject iCommunity STEAM.

am: በላጎስ ስቴት የትምህርት ዲስትሪክት 3 ሥር ከሚገኙ የሕዝብ ትምህርት ቤቶች የተውጣጡ 500 ተማሪዎች በቅርብ ጊዜ በወጣት ተማሪዎች መካከል ወሳኝ አስተሳሰብን እና የችግር መፍቻ ክህሎቶችን ለማዳበር የታለመ ተነሳሽነት ያለው የስቲም ውድድር ላይ ተሳትፈዋል።
en: 500 students from public schools under Lagos State Education District III recently participated in an inspiring STEAM competition aimed at cultivating critical thinking and problem-solving skills among young students.
ha: Ɗalibai 500 daga maƙarantun gwamnati da ke ƙarƙashin State Education District III na Jihar Legas ne suka fafata a gasar mai amfani ta STEAM wadda ta himmatu wajen samar da zurfafan tunani da kuma dabarun magance matsala a tsakanin ɗalibai matasa.
sw: Wanafunzi 500 kutoka shule za umma zilizo chini ya usimamizi wa Lagos State Education District III walishiriki kwenye shindano la kusisimua la hivi karibuni la STEAM lililolenga kuandaa wanafunzi wenye fikra yakinifu na ujuzi wa kutatua matatizo kwa wanafunzi vijana.
yo: Àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ 500 láti àwọn ilé-ìwé gbogboogbò tí wọ́n wà lábẹ́ Lagos State Education District III ni wọ́n ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ kópa níbi ìdíje amóríyá STEAM, èyí tí wọ́n gbé kalẹ̀ pẹ̀lú àfojúsùn láti fi ẹ̀kọ́ ìṣàròjinlẹ̀ àti ìṣàwárí ojútùú sí ìṣòro sínú àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ kéékéèké náà.
zu: Abafundi abangu-500 abavela ezikoleni zomphakathi ngaphansi kweSifunda Semfundo Sesifunda Sesithathu saseLagos muva nje babambe iqhaza emqhudelwaneni okhuthazayo weSTEAM okuhloswe ngawo ukuthuthukisa amakhono okucabanga ngokujulile nokuxazulula izinkinga phakathi kwabafundi abasebasha.

am: በእስተም ፈን ፌስት የተዘጋጀው ፕሮጀክት ከሌጎስ ግዛት የትምህርት አውራጃ 3ኛ ጋር በመተባበር እስቴም አፕ ሌጎስ ለ 20 መምህራን እና ለአራት (4) ሳምንታት የዲዛይን አስተሳሰብ ስልጠና በአውራጃው ውስጥ ለሚገኙ 10 ትምህርት ቤቶች ተማሪዎች በማስተማር ጀመረ።
en: Project iCommunity organized by STEAM Fun Fest in partnership with Lagos State Education District III, STEAM UP Lagos began with a teacher training session for 20 teachers and four (4) weeks of design thinking training for students in 10 schools across the district.
ha: Project iCommunity da STEAM Fun Fest ta shirya tare da haɗin guiwar Education District III ta jihar Legas, STEAM UP Lagos ta fara ne da bayar da horo ga malamai guda 20 da kuma makonni 4 na bayar da horon tunanin zane-zane ga ɗalibai 10 a gaba ɗaya gundumar.
sw: Mradi wa iCommunity uliyoandaliwa na STEM Fun Fest kwa kushirikiana na Lagos State Education District III, STEAM UP Lagos ulianza na kipindi cha mafunzo ya ualimu kwa walimu 20 kwa majuma manne (4) ya mafunzo ya ubunifu wa kufikiria kwa wanafunzi wa shule 10 zilizo kwenye hiyo wilaya.
yo: Iṣẹ́-àkànṣe iCommunity ti STEAM Fun Fest ṣètò ní ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú Lagos State Education District III, ìyẹn STEAM UP Lagos bẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ètò ìdánilékọ̀ọ́ àwọn olùkọ́ni fún àwọn olùkọ́ 20 pẹ̀lú ọ̀sẹ̀ mẹ́rin (4) fún ẹ̀kọ́ àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ nípa ìrònú aṣẹ̀yàaṣẹ́ ní àwọn ilé-ìwé 10 káàkiri ẹkùn náà.
zu: IProject iCommunity ehlelwe yiSTEAM Fun Fest ngokubambisana neLagos State Education District III, iSTEAM UP Lagos iqale ngeseshini yokuqeqesha othisha abangu-20 kanye namasonto amane (4) okuqeqeshwa kokuklama ukucabanga kwabafundi ezikoleni eziyi-10 kuso sonke isifunda.

am: የውድድሩ የመጨረሻ ምዕራፍ ቅዳሜ ሐምሌ 8 ቀን 2023 የተካሄደ ሲሆን በዚህ ወቅት የተመረጡት ትምህርት ቤቶች የፕሮቶታይፕ ፕሮጀክቶቻቸውን ለተከበሩ ዳኞች፣ ለትምህርት ባለሙያዎች እና ለስፖንሰር ድርጅቶች አቅርበዋል።
en: The final stage of the competition took place on Saturday, July 8, 2023, during which the selected schools presented their prototype projects to a distinguished panel of judges, education experts, and sponsoring organizations.
ha: Matakin ƙarshe na gasar ya kasance ne ranar Asabar, 8 ga Yuli, 2023, wanda a sannan maƙarantun da aka zaɓa suka gabatar da aikinsu na farko ga manyan alƙalai, masana ilimi, da kuma ƙungiyoyi masu bada tallafi.
sw: Hatua ya fainali ya mashindano itafanyika jumamosi, Julai, 8, 2023, wakati ambao shule zilizochaguliwa zitawasilisha malengo muhimu ya miradi yao mashuhuri ya mfano kwa jopo la majaji, wataalam wa elimu na mashirika yaliyodhamini.
yo: Ìpele ìkẹyìn fún ìdíje náà wáyé ní ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta 8, oṣù Keje, ọdún 2023, níbi tí àwọn ilé-ìwé àṣàyàn ti ṣe àfihàn àwòṣe àkọ́ṣe iṣẹ́ àkànṣe wọn si ìgbìmọ̀ pàtàkì àwọn adájọ́, àwọn amòye nípa ẹ̀kọ́, àti àwọn àjọ tí wọ́n ń ṣe ìgbọ̀wọ́ ètò náà.
zu: Isigaba sokugcina somncintiswano senzeka ngoMgqibelo, ziyi-8 kuNtulikazi wezi-2023, lapho izikole ezikhethiwe zethula amaphrojekthi azo esibonelo kuphaneli yamajaji avelele, ochwepheshe bezemfundo, nezinhlangano ezixhasayo.

am: የላጎስ ስቴት ሲኒየር ሞዴል ኰሌጅ ባዶሬ በባትሪ ኃይል ለሚሠራው ልዩ የሙቅ ውኃ ጠርሙስ ፕሮጀክት በ እስቴም ውድድር አሸናፊ በመሆን 1,000,000 ናይራ ታላቅ ሽልማት አግኝቷል.
en: Lagos State Senior Model College, Badore won the STEAM competition for their exceptional Battery-Powered Hot Water bottle project, receiving a grand prize of 1,000,000 naira.
ha: Babbar Kwalejin Model ta Jihar Legas, Badore ta cinye gasar ta STEAM dalilin aikinsu na gorar ruwan zafi mai amfani da baturin hasken rana, inda suka samu kyautar Naira 1,000,000.
sw: Lagos State Senior Model College, Bodore kilishinda shindano la STEAM kwa mradi wao wa kipekee wa Batter-Powered Hot water bottle na kupokea zawadi kuu ya naira 1,000,000.
yo: Lagos State Senior Model College, Badore jáwé olúborí níbi ìdíje STEAM fún ìgo Alòtànsán-Òòrùn Gbóná Omi aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ tí wọ́n ṣe, tí wọ́n sì gba ẹ̀bùn owó 1,000,000 náírà fún ipò kínní.
zu: ILagos State Senior Model College, iBadore iwine umncintiswano weSTEAM ngephrojekthi yabo eyingqayizivele yebhodlela Lamanzi Ashisayo Ebhethri-Powered, ithole umklomelo omkhulu we-1,000,000 naira.

am: በቪክቶሪያ ደሴት የሚገኘው የኩራሞ ሲኒየር ኰሌጅ ሁለተኛ ደረጃ ትምህርት ቤት በአስደናቂው ገመድ አልባ የሲሲቲቪ ካሜራ ፕሮጀክታቸው ሁለተኛውን ቦታ በማግኘት የ 500,000 ናይራ ሽልማት አሸነፈ።
en: Kuramo Senior College High School, Victoria Island secured the second position with their impressive Wireless CCTV camera project, winning a prize of 500,000 naira.
ha: Babbar Maƙarantar Kwalejin Kuramo da ke Victoria Island sun zamanto a mataki na biyu dalilin aikinsu na kyamarar CCTV marar waya mai ƙayatarwa, inda suka samu kyautar Naira 500,000.
sw: Kuramo Senior College High School kutoka kisiwa cha Victoria, walishika nafasi ya pili kwa mradi wao wa kuvutia wa Wireless CCTV Canera na kushinda zawadi ya naira 500,000.
yo: Kuramo Senior College High School ní Victoria Island ni wọ́n ṣe ipò kejì pẹ̀lú iṣẹ́ àkànṣe kámẹ́rà Aṣàgbàsílẹ̀ Fídíò Àyíká Aláìlokùn tí ó wúni lórí tí wọ́n ṣe, wọ́n gba ẹ̀bùn owó 500,000 náírà.
zu: IKuramo Senior College High School, eVictoria Island ithole isikhundla sesibili ngephrojekthi yekhamera yeWireless CCTV ehlaba umxhwele, yawina umklomelo we-500,000 naira.

am: የንጉስ አዶ ሲኒየር ሁለተኛ ደረጃ ትምህርት ቤት ለእንጨት የእግር መንገድ ፕሮጀክታቸው 250,000 ናይራ የ3ኛ ደረጃ ሽልማት ሲያገኙ የልጃገረዶች ሲኒየር አካዳሚ ላጎስ ደሴ ደግሞ የትምህርት ትምህርት አፕ እና የመንግስት ከፍተኛ ኮሌጅ ኢኮይ ከሶላር ፓወርድ ኤሌክትሪክ አምፖሎች ፕሮጀክቱ ጋር ሁለቱም 100,000 ናይራ አሸናፊ ሆነዋል። ሁለቱም 4ኛ እና 5ኛ ደረጃ አሸናፊዎች ሆነዋል።
en: King Ado Senior High School received the 3rd place prize of 250,000 naira for their Wooden Walking Way project, while Girls Senior Academy Lagos Island, with its Educational Learning App, and Government Senior College Ikoyi with its Solar Powered Electric Bulbs project both won 100,000 naira, respectively as 4th and 5th place winners.
ha: Babbar Maƙaranta ta King Ado ce ta zo a mataki na uku inda suka samu kyautar Naira 250,000 dalilin aikinsu na Wooden Walking Way, yayin da Babbar Maƙarantar Mata ta Academy Lagos Island, tare da aikinsu na Manhajar KoyonI, da kuma Babbar Kwalejin Gwamnati Ikoyi da aikinsu na Ƙwan Lantarki mai Amfani da Hasken Rana duka suka ci Naira 100,000, a mataki na 4 da na 5 jere.
sw: King Ado Senior High School ilipokea zawadi ya nafasi ya 3 ya naira 250,000 kwa mradi wao wa Wooden Walkin Way, wakati Girls Senior Academy Lagos Island, pamoja na program yake ya Kujifunza Kielimu (educational learning App) na Government Senior College Ikoyi na mradi wake wa Solar Powered Electric Bulbs, zote zilishinda naira 100,000 mtawalia kama washindi wa 4 na 5.
yo: King Ado Senior High School ni ó gba ẹ̀bùn owó 200,000 náírà fún ipò kẹta fún iṣẹ́ àkànṣe Ojú-ọ̀nà Onípákó tí wọ́n ṣe, nígbà tí Girls Senior Academy ní Lagos Island pẹ̀lú iṣẹ́ àkànṣe Ohun Èlò Ìmúkẹ́kọ̀ọ́-ìwéṣe wọn, àti Government Senior College ní Ìkòyí pẹ̀lú iṣẹ́ àkànṣe Gílòbù Oníná Alòtànsán-Òòrùn tí wọ́n sì jọ gba ẹ̀bùn owó 100,000 gẹ́gẹ́ bí olúborí ipò kẹrin àti ìkarùn-ún bákan náà.
zu: IKing Ado Senior High School ithole umklomelo wendawo yesi-3 we-250,000 naira ngephrojekthi yabo yeWooden Walking Way, kuyilapho iGirls Senior Academy Lagos Island, ne-Educational Learning App, kanye ne-Government Senior College Ikoyi ngephrojekthi yayo yeSolar Powered Electric Bulbs zombili ziwine i-100,000 naira, ngokulandelana njengabawine indawo yesi-4 neyesi-5.

am: ሁሉም 10 ፕሮጀክቶች ፈጠራን እና ወሳኝ ተግዳሮቶችን ለመቅረፍ ቁርጠኝነትን አሳይተዋል።
en: All 10 projects showcased ingenuity and a commitment to addressing critical challenges.
ha: Dukkan ayyukan guda 10 sun yi nuni da haɗin kai da kuma mayar da hankali wajen magance matsalolin zurfin tunani.
sw: Miradi yote kumi ilionyesha werevu na kujitolea katika kuainisha changamoto muhimu.
yo: Gbogbo àwọn iṣẹ́ àkànṣe 10 náà ni wọ́n ṣàfihàn ọgbọ̀n inú àti ìfarajìn láti wá ọ̀nà àbáyọ sí àwọn ìṣòro pàtàkì.
zu: Wonke amaphrojekthi ayi-10 abonise ubuhlakani nokuzibophezela ekubhekaneni nezinselele ezibucayi.

am: ከ እሲቴም ፈን ፌስት አስተባባሪዎች መካከል አንዱ የሆኑት ጃዴሶላ አዴዴጂ እንዳሉት" በሁሉም ተሳታፊዎች ባሳዩት የላቀ ስኬት እጅግ በጣም ኵራት ይሰማናል።
en: According to Jadesola Adedeji one of the organisers of STEAM Fun Fest, "We are extremely proud of the outstanding achievements demonstrated by all the participants.
ha: Kamar yadda Jadesola Adedji ya bayyana ɗaya daga cikin masu shiryawa na STEAM Fun Fest, “muna matuƙar alfahari da ƙyayataccen cigaban da dukkan ‘yan takara suka gabatar.
sw: Kulingana na Jadesola Adedeji mmoja wapo ya waandaaji wa STEAM Fun Fest "tunajivunia sana kwa mafanikio bora yaliyoonyesha na washiriki.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Jadesola Adedeji, ọ̀kan lára àwọn elétò STEAM Fun Fest ti ṣe sọ, "Àwọn àṣeyọrí ńláńlá ti gbogbo àwọn olùkópa ṣe àfihàn náà ni ó jẹ́ ohun ìwúrí fún wa.
zu: NgokukaJadesola Adedeji omunye wabahleli beSTEAM Fun Fest, "Siyaziqhenya kakhulu ngempumelelo ekhonjiswe yibo bonke ababambiqhaza.

am: በዘንድሮው የ እስቴም ውድድር ዋናው ዓላማችን በላጎስ ወጣት አእምሮዎች ውስጥ ለትምህርት፣ ለችግር መፍታት እና ለፈጠራ ጥልቅ ፍቅርን ማቀጣጠል ነበር።
en: In this year's STEAM competition, our primary objective was to ignite a profound passion for learning, problem-solving, and innovation among the young minds of Lagos.
ha: A wannan gasar ta STEAM ta wannan shekarar, babban abin da muka ba wa mahimmanci shi ne na sanya ra’ayin koyo, magance matsala, da kuma ƙirƙira a tsakanin matasa na jihar Legas.
sw: Kwenye mwaka huu wa STEAM Competition, lengo letu la msingi lilikuwa ni kumlika kina cha shauku ya mafunzo, utatuzi wa matatizo na uvumbuzi wa akili za vijana wa Lagos.
yo: Ní ìdíje STEAM ọdún yìí, èròńgbà tí a ní gan ni láti mú ìfẹ́ fún ẹ̀kọ́ kíkọ̀, ìṣàwárí ojútùú àti ọgbọ́n àtinúdá gbilẹ̀ nínú àwọn ọ̀dọ́mọde ìlú Èkó.
zu: Emqhudelwaneni walo nyaka we-STEAM, inhloso yethu eyinhloko bekuwukuvusa intshiseko ejulile yokufunda, ukuxazulula izinkinga, nokusungula izinto ezintsha phakathi kwemiqondo yabancane yaseLagos.

am: ከተማሪዎቹ ቅንዓት ያገኘነው መነሳሳት ይህንን ተነሳሽነት በላጎስ ብቻ ሳይሆን በመላው ናይጄሪያ ለሚገኙ ትምህርት ቤቶች ለማስፋት ተስፋ በማድረግ የበለጠ እንድንጣጣር አነሳስቶናል።
en: The inspiration we drew from the students' enthusiasm has motivated us to strive for more, with the hope of expanding this initiative to schools not only within Lagos but throughout Nigeria.”
ha: Ƙwarin guiwar da muka samu daga ɗaliban farin ciki ya sanya mana ƙwarin guiwar domin cigaba da nema, tare da burin faɗaɗa wannan ƙirƙirar ga maƙarantu da ba a cikin Legas kawai ba hatta gaba ɗaya Nijeriya.”
sw: Msukumo tuliyoutengeneza kwenye shauku ya wanafunzi kwa kutushawishi kuongeza jitihada na mtazamo kwenye upanuzi wa mradi kwa kushirikisha shule zilizopo nje ya mji wa Lagos na nchi za jirani
yo: Àwòkọ́ṣe tí a rí fàyọ láti ìfẹ́ tí àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ náà fihàn tún fún wa ní kóríyá láti ṣe sí i, pẹ̀lú ìrètí láti mú ètò àtinúdá yìí gbòòrò sí àwọn ilé-ìwé tí wọ́n wà káàkiri orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria, yàtọ̀ sí ìlú Èkó nìkan."
zu: Ugqozi esiluthole entshisekweni yabafundi lusishukumisele ukuba silwele okwengeziwe, ngethemba lokwandisa lolu hlelo ezikoleni hhayi kuphela eLagos kodwa kulo lonke elaseNigeria."

am: ቼቭሮን ናይጀሪያ ሊሚትድ፣ የናይጀሪያ ብሔራዊ ፔትሮሊየም ሊሚትድ ( ኤንኤንፒሲኤል )እና የቴክሳኮ ናይጀሪያ ኦተር ሼልፍ ሊሚትድ(ታንቶስ) ፣ ላደረጉት ድጋፍና ድጋፍ አመስግነዋል። ይህም የእስቴም ውድድር ስኬታማ እንዲሆን አስተዋፅኦ አደረገ።
en: She thanked Chevron Nigeria Limited, Nigerian National Petroleum Limited (NNPCL), and Texaco Nigeria Outer Shelf Limited (TNOS), for their support and sponsorship, which ensured the success of the STEAM competition.
ha: Ta godewa Chevron Nigeria Limited, Nigerian National Petroleum Limited (NNPCL), dangane da goyon bayansu da kuma tallafi, wanda ya tabbatar da nasarar gasar ta STEAM.
sw: Aliwashukru Chevron Nigeria Limited (CNL), Nigeria National Petroleum Limited (NNPL) na Texaco Nigeria Outer Shelf Limited (TNOS) kwa msaada na udhamini wao wa msingi katika kufanikisha STEAM Competition.
yo: Ó dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ Chevron Nigeria Limited, Nigerian National Petroleum Limited (NNPCL) àti Texaco Nigeria Outer Shelf Limited (TNOS) fún àtìlẹ́yìn àti ìgbọ̀wọ́ wọn, èyí tí ó mú àṣeyọrí ìdíje STEAM wáyé.
zu: Ubonge iChevron Nigeria Limited, iNigerian National Petroleum Limited (iNNPCL), kanye neTexaco Nigeria Outer Shelf Limited (iTNOS), ngokumeseka noxhaso lwabo, oluqinisekise impumelelo yomncintiswano weSTEAM.

am: የወጣት ተማሪዎችን ተሰጥኦ ለማሳደግ እና ሌጎስ ውስጥ ትምህርትን ለማስተዋወቅ የሚያደርጉት ቁርጠኝነት ከፍተኛ አድናቆት አለው ''ብላ ጨምራለች።
en: “Their commitment to nurturing the talents of young students and promoting education in Lagos is greatly appreciated,” she added.
ha: “Himmatuwarsu wajen bunƙasa fasahar matasan ɗalibai da kuma kuma ciyar da ilimi gaba a jihar Legas abu ne da aka jinjina masa,” ta ƙara da haka.
sw: Malengo yetu ya kulea vipaji vya anafunzi vijana na kukuza elimu jijini Lagos limekubalika sana.
yo: "A mọ rírì ìfarajìn wọn láti máa ṣe ìyànjú ìdàgbàsókè ẹ̀bùn àwọn ọ̀dọ́ akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ wọ̀nyìí àti láti ṣe ìgbélárugẹ ètò ẹ̀kọ́ ní ìlú Èkó," ó ṣe àfikún.
zu: "Ukuzinikela kwabo ekukhuliseni amathalente abafundi abasebasha kanye nokuthuthukisa imfundo eLagos kwaziswa kakhulu," engeza.

am: ስቲም አዝናኝ ፌስት በ(4) መሪ ኤድቴክ ኩባንያዎች- 9አይጃኪድስ፣ ስቲም-ሜትስ፣ የኤዱፉን ቴክኒክ እናሳቢቲክ አጋርነት ነው።
en: STEAM Fun Fest is a partnership by four (4) leading Edtech companies - 9ijakids, STEM-METS, Edufun Technik, and Sabiteach.
ha: STEAM Fun Fest na da haɗin guiwar kamfanoni masu jagoranci guda 4 na Edtech-9ijakids, STEM-METS, Edufun Technik, da kuma Sabiteach.
sw: STEAM Fun Fest ni ushirika wa kampuni nne (4) za teknolojia ya elimu ambazo ni 9ijakids, TEM-METS, Edufun Technik na Sabiteach.
yo: STEAM Fun Fest jẹ́ àjọṣepọ̀ láàárín olórí ilé-iṣẹ́ Afìmẹ̀ẹ̀rọṣètò-ẹ̀kọ́ mẹ́rin (4) - 9ijakids, STEM-METS, Edufun Technik, àti Sabiteach.
zu: ISTEAM Fun Fest iwubambiswano lwezinkampani ezine (4) ezihamba phambili ze-Edtech - i-9ijakids, iSTEM-METS, i-Edufun Technik, neSabiteach.

am: የክዋራን ኤስኤምኢዎች ኃይል መስጠት ዘላቂ ተፅዕኖ ንግድ ሌንዳ ኤሴምኢ ፌር አጋሮች ከክዋራ መንግስት እና ዲቲኦ ፋውንዴሽን ጋረ ይሰራል
en: Empowering Kwara's SMEs: Trade Lenda SME Fair Partners With Kwara State Government And DTO Foundation For Lasting Impact
ha: Tallafawa SMEs a Kwara: Trade Lenda SME Fair sun yi haɗin guiwa da gwamnatin Jihar Kwara da kuma DTO Foundation domin tasiri mai daɗewa.
sw: kuwezesha SMEs za Kwara: Trade Lenda SME Fair Washirika wa SME Fair na Serikali ya Jimbo la Kwara na DTO Foundation kwa Athari za kudumu
yo: Ṣíṣe ìrónilágbára fún àwọn SME (òkòwò kékeré àti alábọ́dé) ní ìlú Kwara: Ìpéjọtajà SME Trade Lenda Fọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ pẹ̀lú Ìjọba Ìlú Kwara àti DTO Foundation fún Ipa Alálòpẹ́
zu: Ukunika amandla ama-SME akwa-Kwara: ITrade Lenda SME Fair Partners neKwara State Government And DTO Foundation For Lasting Impact

am: ትሬድ ሌንዳ ፌር ኤስኤምኢ ፌርከክዋራ መንግሥትና ከዶ/ር ቶባ ኦሎይዴ (ዲቲኦ) ፋውንዴሽን ጋር በመተባበር በሀገር ውስጥ የአነስተኛና መካከለኛ ኢንተርፕራይዞች ዕድገትና ዕድገት ድጋፍ በማድረግ በሌጎስ ስቴት በሚካሄደው ስመ ጥር የንግድ ሌንዳ ስሚ ትርኢት ላይ ተሳታፊ የሚሆኑ 7 ተስፋ ሰጪ ባለድርሻ አካላትን በስፖንሰር ነት እንደሚደግፍ በማሳወቁ ኩራት ይሰማዋል።
en: Trade Lenda SME Fair is proud to announce that it has partnered with the Kwara State Government and Dr. Toba Oloyede (DTO) Foundation to support the growth and development of Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs) in the state through sponsorship of 7 promising entrepreneurs, who will be participating in the prestigious Trade Lenda SME Fair in Lagos State.
ha: Trade Lenda SME Fair tana afaharin sanar da cewa ta haɗa guiwa da gwamnatin jihar Kwara da kuma Dr. Toba Oloyede (DTO) Foundation domin taimakawa cigaba da kuma tafiyar da ƙanana da kuma matsakaitan sana’o’i (SME) a cikin jihar ta hanyar tallafawa masu sana’ar hannu guda 7, wanda za su dama a cikin sanannen bikin Trade Lenda SME Fair a jihar Lagos.
sw: Trade Lenda SME Fair wanajivunia kutangaza kuwa tayari wanashirikiana na serikali ya jimbo la Kwara pamoja na DR. Toba Oloyode (DTO) Foundation kusaidia ukuaji na maendeleo ya wajasiriamali wadogo na wa kati (SMEs) kupitia udhamini wa wajasiriamali 7 waliyoahidi, ambao watakuwa wanaingia kwenye kongamano la Trade Lenda SME litakalofanyika jijini Lagos.
yo: Ó jẹ́ ohun ìwúrí fún Ìpéjọtajà SME ti Trade Lenda láti kéde ìfọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú Ìjọba Ìlú Kwara àti Dr. Toba Oloyede (DTO) Foundation láti ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún ìdàgbàsókè àti ìmúgbòòrò àwọn Òkòwò Kékeré àti Alábọ́dé (SMEs) ní ìlú náà nípasẹ̀ ṣíṣe onígbọ̀wọ́ àwọn olùṣòwò tí wọ́n ní ọjọ́-iwájú 7, àwọn tí wọn yóò máa kópa nínú Ìpéjọtajà SME ti Trade Lenda olókìkí náà ní ìlú Èkó.
zu: ITrade Lenda SME Fair iyaziqhenya ukumemezela ukuthi ibambisene noHulumeni Wesifunda Sakwara kanye ne-Dr. Toba Oloyede (iDTO) Foundation ukusekela ukukhula nokuthuthukiswa Kwamabhizinisi Amancane Naphakathi (amaSME) esifundazweni ngokuxhaswa kwe-7 ethembisayo. osomabhizinisi, abazobe bebambe iqhaza kwiTrade Lenda SME Fair ehlonishwayo eSifundazweni SaseLagos.

am: እ.ኤ.አ ነሀሴ 19 ቀን ሊካሄድ የታቀደው የንግድ ሌንዳ ስሚ ትርኢት የናይጀሪያ የንግድ ድርጅቶች፣ የኢንዱስትሪ መሪዎችእና የመንግስት ተወካዮች ትልቁ ጉባዔ ነው።
en: Scheduled to take place on August 19, the Trade Lenda SME Fair is Nigeria's largest gathering of SMEs, industry leaders, and government representatives.
ha: Wanda zai kasance a Agusta 19, Trade Lenda SME Fair shi ne taro mafi girma na SME a Nigeria, shugabannin masana’antu, da kuma jami’an gwamnati.
sw: Lilipangwa kufanyika Agosti 19, Trade Lenda SMEs Fair ni kongamano kubwa la wajasiriamali wadogo na wa kati (SMEs), viongozi wa viwanda na wajasiriamali wa serikali nchini Nigeria.
yo: Àpèjọtajà SME ti Trade Lenda tí wọ́n ṣètò pé yóò wáyé ní ọjọ́ 19 oṣù Kẹjọ jẹ́ àpèjọ àwọn SME, olórí ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ àti àwọn aṣojú ìjọba tí ó tóbi jùlọ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria.
zu: Ihlelelwe ukuthi ibe ziyi-19 kuNcwaba, iTrade Lenda SME Fair ingumbuthano omkhulukazi waseNigeria wamaSME, abaholi bezimboni, nabamele uhulumeni.

am: ይህ ድጋፍ የክዋራ ስቴት እና ዲቲዎ ፋውንዴሽን የአካባቢውን የንግድ ድርጅቶች ሥልጣን ለመስጠት እና በአካባቢው ኢኮኖሚያዊ እድገትን ለማሳደግ ያላቸውን ውሳኔ ያንጸባርቃል።
en: This sponsorship reflects Kwara State and DTO Foundation's dedication to empowering local businesses and fostering economic progress in the region.
ha: Wannan tallafin yana nuna himmar jihar Kwara da kuma DTO Foundations wajen tallafawa kasuwancin cikin gida da kuma kula da cigaban tattalin arziki a yankin.
sw: Huu udhamini unaonyesha kujitolea kwa serikali ya jiji la Kwara na DTO Foundation katika kuwezeshabiashara ya ndani na kukuza maendeleo ya uchumi jijini.
yo: Irú ìṣonígbọ̀wọ́ yìí ń ṣe àfihàn ìfarajìn tí Ìlú Kwara àti DTO Foundation ní láti ṣe ìrólágbára fún àwọn òkòwò ìbílẹ̀ àti láti ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún ìlọsíwájú ètò ọrọ̀ ajé ní ẹkùn náà.
zu: Lolu xhaso lubonisa ukuzinikela kweKwara State kanye neDTO Foundation ekunikezeni amandla amabhizinisi endawo kanye nokugqugquzela inqubekelaphambili yezomnotho esifundeni.

am: ሁለቱም አካላት የኢኮኖሚ ዕድገት ኤስኤምኢኤስ በማንሳቱና የሥራ ዕድል በመፍጠር ረገድ የንግድ ድርጅቶች የሚጫወቱትን ወሳኝ ሚና ተገንዝበውታል።
en: Both bodies recognize the crucial role played by SMEs in driving economic growth and creating employment opportunities.
ha: Dukkan ɓangarorin sun gane mahimmiyar rawar da SME suke takawa wajen tafiyar da cigaban tattalin arziki da kuma samar da damarmakin aikin yi.
sw: Taasisi zote hizi zinatambua jukumu kubwa linalofanywa na SMEs katika kusukuma ukuaji wa uchumi na kutengeneza fursa za ajira.
yo: Àwọn àjọ méjéèjì ṣe ìdámọ̀ ipa pàtàkì tí àwọn SME ń kó lórí ìdàgbàsókè ètò ọrọ̀ ajé àti ìṣẹ̀dá iṣẹ́.
zu: Yomibili le nhlangano iyalibona iqhaza elibalulekile elibanjwe ama-SME ekuqhubekiseni ukukhula komnotho nokudala amathuba emisebenzi.

am: ክዋራ ስቴት እና ዲቲኦ ፋውንዴሽን በንግድ ሌንዳ ስሚ ፌይር ላይ እንዲሳተፉ እነዚህን 7 ልዩ የንግድ ድርጅቶች ድጋፍ በማድረግ አዳዲስ ምርቶቻቸውንና አገልግሎቶቻቸውን ለማሳየት የሚያስችል ጠቃሚ መድረክ ለማቅረብ ታቅዶላቸዋል።
en: By sponsoring these 7 exceptional entrepreneurs to participate in the Trade Lenda SME Fair, Kwara State and DTO Foundation aims to provide them with a valuable platform to showcase their innovative products and services.
ha: Ta hanyar tallafawa waɗannan masu sana’ar hannu na musamman guda 7 don su dama a cikin Trade Lenda SME Fair, Jihar Kwara da DTO Foundation sun maida hankali wajen samar musu da manhaja domin bayyana kayan da suka samar da ayyukansu.
sw: Kwa kudhamini wajasiriamali wa kipekee 7 kushiriki kwenye kongamano la Trade Lenda SME Fair, serikali ya jiji la Kwara na DTO Foundation linalolenga kuwatengenezea jukwaa la thamani ili waweze kuonesha ubunifu wa bidhaa na huduma zao.
yo: Nípa ṣíṣe ìgbọ̀wọ́ àwọn olùṣòwò 7 tí wọ́n dá yàtọ̀ wọ̀nyìí láti kópa nínú ètò Àpèjọtajà SME ti Trade Lenda, Ìlú Kwara àti DTO Foundation gbèrò láti pèsè ìkànnì oníyebíye fún wọn láti lè ṣe àfihàn àwọn ohun ìṣàmúlò àti iṣẹ́ alátinúdà wọn.
zu: Ngokuxhasa labo somabhizinisi abayi-7 abakhethekile ukuze babambe iqhaza kuTrade Lenda SME Fair, Kwara State kanye neDTO Foundation ihlose ukubahlinzeka ngenkundla ebalulekile yokukhombisa imikhiqizo yabo emisha namasevisi.

am: የንግድ ሌንዳ የንግድ ድርጅቶች ከኢንዱስትሪ ባለሙያዎች፣ አጋሮች ሊሆኑ ከሚችሉ ሰዎችና ደንበኞች ሊሆኑ ከሚችሉ የተለያዩ አድማጮች ጋር ለመገናኘት የሚያስችል ልዩ አጋጣሚ ይሰጣል።
en: The Trade Lenda SME Fair offers a unique opportunity for entrepreneurs to connect with industry experts, potential partners, and a diverse audience of potential customers.
ha: Trade Lenda SME Fair suna bayar da dama ta musamman ga masu sana’ar hannu domin haɗuwa da ƙwararru game da masana’antu, abokan hulɗa na ƙwarai, da kuma ‘yan mabanbanta na abokan ciniki na nan gaba.
sw: Maonyesho ya Trade Lenda SME Fair yanatoa fursa ya kipekee kwa wajasiriamali kuungana na wataalamu wa sekta hiyo, washirika watarajiwa, na hadhira mbalimbali ya wateja watarajiwa.
yo: Ìpéjọtajà SME ti Trade Lenda ń pèsè àǹfààní aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ fún àwọn olùṣòwò láti mọra kí wọ́n sì ní ìsopọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn onímọ̀ọ́ṣe ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́, àwọn tí ó ṣeéṣe kí wọ́n jọ ṣiṣẹ́ pọ̀ àti onírúurú àwọn èèyàn tí wọ́n lè jẹ́ oníbàárà wọn.
zu: ITrade Lenda SME Fair inikeza ithuba eliyingqayizivele kosomabhizinisi ukuthi baxhumane nochwepheshe bemboni, abangaba ozakwethu, kanye nezilaleli ezihlukahlukene zamakhasimende angaba khona.

am: የንግድ ሌንዳ ኤሴኤም ፌር ላይ በመሳተፍ፣ ስፖንሰር ድርጅቶች ጠቃሚ ማስተዋል ያገኛሉ፣ ጠቃሚ የንግድ ግንኙነት መመሥረት፣ እና አውታረ መረቦቻቸውን ያሰፋሉ።
en: By participating in the Trade Lenda SME Fair, sponsored entrepreneurs will gain valuable insights, establish valuable business relationships, and expand their networks.
ha: Ta hanyar damawa a Trade Lenda SME Fair, masu sana’o’in hannu da aka ɗauki nauyinsu za su samu bayanai masu amfani, za su haɗa alaƙa mai amfani da kasuwanci, kuma su faɗaɗa kasuwancinsu.
sw: kwa kushiriki kwenye kongamano la Trade Lenda SME Fair, wajasiriamali waliyodhaminiwa watapata maarifa bora, wataanzisha ushirikiano bora wa kiuchumi na kupanua wigo wa biashara zao.
yo: Nípa kíkópa níbi Ìpéjọtajà SME ti Trade Lenda náà, àwọn olùṣòwò tí wọ́n ṣe onígbọ̀wọ́ fún wọn yóò jẹ àǹfààní òye oníyebíye, wọn yóò rí ìbáṣepọ̀ ajẹmókòwò gidi, tí wọn yóò sì tún mọ àwọn èèyàn síi.
zu: Ngokubamba iqhaza kuTrade Lenda SME Fair, osomabhizinisi abaxhasiwe bazothola imininingwane ebalulekile, basungule ubudlelwano obubalulekile bebhizinisi, futhi bandise amanethiwekhi abo.

am: በስብሰባው ላይ የተገኙ ሰዎች አዳዲስ ምርቶችን የያዙ የተለያዩ የእንጨቶችን እና በእነዚህ ምርቶች ላይ ብቻ ቅናሽ ለማየት ሊጠብቁ ይችላሉ።
en: Attendees can expect to see diverse SMEs with innovative products, as well exclusive discounts on these products.
ha: Masu halarta za su sa ran ganin SME mabanbanta tare da kayan da suke ƙirƙira, tare da ragi na musamman a kan waɗannan kayayyakin.
sw: Watakaohudhuria wategemee kukutana na wajasiriamali mbalimbali wenye ubunifu wa bidhaa, pamoja na punguzo la moja kwa moja la bidhaa hizo.
yo: Àwọn olùkópa lè máa fojú sọ́nà fún onírúurú àwọn SMEs pẹ̀lú ohun ìṣàmúlò alátinúdà, pẹ̀lú ẹ̀dínwó tí ó yàtọ̀ lórí àwọn ohun ìṣàmúlò wọ̀nyìí.
zu: Abahambele umcimbi bangalindela ukubona ama-SME ahlukahlukene anemikhiqizo emisha, kanye nezaphulelo ezikhethekile kule mikhiqizo.

am: የንግድ ሌንዳ ፌር 2023 ምዝገባ አሁንም አለ፣ እና ሰዎች ትኬታቸውን አሁን እንዲያገኙ እናበረታታለን።
en: Registration for Trade Lenda Fair 2023 is still on, and we encourage people to secure their tickets now.
ha: Yin rijista domin Trade Lenda Fair 2023 na cigaba har a yanzu, kuma muna shawartar mutane da su mallaki tikitinsu a yanzu.
sw: Usajiri wa Trade Lenda SME Fair bado unaendelea, hivyo endelea kuhimiza watu wakate tiketi zao mapema.
yo: Ìforúkọsílẹ̀ fún Àpèjọtajà Trade Lenda 2023 sì ń lọ lọ́wọ́, tí a sì ń rọ àwọn èèyàn láti gba ìwé-ìwọlé wọn sílẹ̀ báyìí.
zu: Ukubhalisela iTrade Lenda Fair 2023 kusaqhubeka, futhi sikhuthaza abantu ukuthi bathenge amathikithi abo manje.

am: የእርስዎን ትኬት እዚህ ያግኙ(ኤችቲቲፒኤስ://ቲክኤክስ.አፍሪካ/ዲስከቨሪ/የንግድላድ) https://tix.africa/discover/tradelenda
en: Get your tickets here: https://tix.africa/discover/tradelenda
ha: Ku samu tikitinku a nan: http://tix.africa/discover/tradelenda
sw: Kata tiketi yako hapa: https://tix.africa/discover/tradelenda
yo: Gba ìwé-ìwọlé rẹ ní ibí yìí: https://tix.afruca/discover/tradelenda
zu: Thola amathikithi akho lapha: https://tix.africa/discover/tradelenda

am: ስለ ትሬድ ሌንዳ
en: About Trade Lenda
ha: Game da Trade Lenda
sw: Kuhusu Trade Lenda
yo: Nípa Trade Lenda
zu: Mayelana neTrade Lenda

am: ትሬድ ለንዳ በናይጄሪያ ውስጥ አነስተኛ እና መካከለኛ ኢንተርፕራይዞች(ኤስኤምኢኤስ) ኃይል ለመስጠት የተቋቋመ ታዋቂ ዲጂታል ባንክ ነው።
en: Trade Lenda is a leading digital bank dedicated to empowering small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) in Nigeria.
ha: Trade Lenda banki ne na yanar gido wanda yake a kan gaba da aka yi shi domin tallafawa matsakaita da ƙananan masana’atu (SMEs) a Nijeriya.
sw: Trade Lenda ni benki kubwa ya kidijitali ambayo imejitolea kuwawezesha wajasiriamali wadogo na wa kati (SMEs) nchini Nigeria.
yo: Trade Lenda jẹ́ adarí báǹkì orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára tí ó ní ìfarajìn láti máa ṣe ìrólágbára àwọn òkòwò kékeré àti alábọ́dé (SMEs) ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria.
zu: ITrade Lenda yibhange ledijithali elihamba phambili elizinikele ekunikezeni amandla amabhizinisi amancane naphakathi nendawo (amaSME) eNigeria.

am: ኤስኤምኢኤስ ትሬድ ሌንዳ ብድርን ፣ ገንዘብማጠራቀምንና ኢንሹራንስን ጨምሮ በተሟላ የገንዘብ አገልግሎቶች አማካኝነት የኢኮኖሚ እድገትን ፣ የገንዘብ ነፃነትንና የንግድ ድርጅቶች ስኬታማ እንዲሆኑ የሚደግፍ የበለጸገ ሥነ ምህዳር ለመፍጠር ጥረት አድርጓል ።
en: Through a comprehensive suite of financial services, including loans, savings and insurance, Trade Lenda aims to drive economic growth, financial independence and create a thriving ecosystem that supports the success of SMEs.
ha: Ta hanyar babban tsarin na ayyukan kuɗi, wanda suka haɗa da bashi, ajiya da kuma inshora, Trade Lenda yana son cim ma bunƙasa tattalin arziki, ‘yancin samun kuɗi da kuma ƙoƙarin samar da yanayin mahalli da take tallafawa nasarar SMSs.
sw: Kupitia huduma bora za kifedha, ikiwemo mikopo, uhifadhi wa fedha na bima, Trade Lenda inapanga kukuza maendeleo ya uchumi, uchumi wa kujitegemea na kutengeneza jamii yenye usitawi katika kusaidia mafanikio ya SMEs.
yo: Nípasẹ̀ ààtò ètò owó tí ó jinná, pẹ̀lú ẹ̀yáwó, ìfowópamọ́ àti ìdójútòfò, Trade Lenda ń gbèrò láti mú ìdàgbàsókè ètò ọrọ̀ ajé, ìlómìnira owó àti láti ṣẹ̀dá àwùjọ onídàgbàsókè tí yóò ṣe ìrànwọ́ fún àṣeyọrí SMEs.
zu: Ngokusebenzisa uchungechunge olubanzi lwezinsizakalo zezezimali, okuhlanganisa ukubolekwa kwemali, ukonga kanye nomshwalense, iTrade Lenda ihlose ukuthuthukisa ukukhula komnotho, ukuzimela ngokwezimali nokudala uhlelo lwezemvelo oluchumayo olusekela impumelelo yamaSME.

am: የወደ ፊቱን መገንባት የሌጎስ የንግድ ትምህርት ቤት የመጀመሪያው የቴክ መስራቾች ጉባዔ በማስተናገድ ላይ ነው
en: Building the Future: Lagos Business School is hosting its maiden Tech Founders’ Summit
ha: Gina Gaba: Maƙarantar Kasuwanci ta Legas za ta gabatar da taron Tech Founders na farko.
sw: Kujenga Wakati Ujao: Shule ya Biashara ya Lagos inaandaa Mkutano wake wa kwanza wa waanzilishi wa Tech
yo: Ṣíṣe iṣẹ́ tọ Ọjọ́-iwájú: Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Òkòwò ti ìlú Èkó (IOE) yóò máa gba àlejò Ìpàdé àwọn Olùdásílẹ̀ Alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àkọ́ṣe rẹ̀
zu: Ukwakha Ikusasa: Isikole Sebhizinisi saseLagos sisingathe iNgqungquthela Yaso Yokuqala Ye-Tech Founders

am: ታዋቂው የሌጎስ የንግድ ትምህርት ቤት(ኤልቢኤስ) ሐሙስ ነሐሴ 17 ቀን 2023 ዓ.ም. በአጃ፣ ሌጎስ ካምፓስ አዳራሽ በዋለችው የጀመዷ ቴክ መሥራቾች ጉባዔ ላይ የናይጄሪያን የቴክኖሎጂ ምሕዳራዊ ሥነ ምህዳር ባለድርሻ አካላትን በማስተናገድ ላይ ይገኛል።
en: The prestigious Lagos Business School (LBS) will be hosting stakeholders of the Nigerian tech ecosystem at the maiden Tech Founders’ Summit at its Campus Auditorium in Ajah, Lagos, on Thursday, August 17, 2023.
ha: Babbar Maƙarantar Kasuwanci ta Legas (LBS) za ta yi taron masu faɗa a ji na Nigerian tech ecosystem a karon farko na tech Founders Summit a cikin ɗakin taron maƙarantarsu da ke Ajah, Legas, a ranar talata, 17 Agusta, 2023.
sw: Shule maarufu ya Biashara ya Lagos (LBS) itakuwa mwenyeji wa wadau wa mfumo ikolojia wa Nigeria katika Mkutano wa Waanzilishi wa Tech katika Ukumbi wake wa Chuo huko Ajah, Lagos, Alhamisi, Agosti 17 2023.
