yo: Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ olókìkí tí wọ́n ti ń kọ́ nípa Òkòwò ní ìlú Èkó (IOE) yóò máa gba àlejò àwọn òpómúléró ní àwùjọ ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ní Nigeria níbi Ìpàdé àwọn Olùdásílẹ̀ Alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àkọ́ṣe rẹ̀ tí yóò wáyé ní Campus Auditorium rẹ̀ ní Ajah, Lagos, ní Ọjọ́'bọ 17 oṣù Kẹjọ, ọdún 2023.
zu: Isikole esihlonishwayo saseLagos Business School (LBS) sizosingatha ababambiqhaza be-ecosystem yezobuchwepheshe baseNigeria eNgqungqutheleni yabasunguli beTech yokuqala e-Campus Auditorium e-Ajah, eLagos, ngoLwesine, ziyi-17 kuNcaba wezi-2023.

am: የፊውቸር ግንባታ ቴክኖሎጂ፣ ኢኖቬሽንእና ኢንትራፕሬሽፕ በሚል ጭብጥ የተካሄደው ጉባዔ የቴክኖሎጂ መስራቾች፣ ኢንቨስተሮች፣ የኢንዱስትሪ መሪዎችና ባለሙያዎች፣ የፖሊሲ አውጪዎች፣ ምሁራንና የቴክኖሎጂ ተመራጭ ዎች አንድ ላይ በመሆን የናይጀሪያውን የቴክኖሎጂ ህዋ የወደፊት ዕጣ ለሰንጠረዥ ለማቅረብ ነው።
en: The summit with the theme “Building the Future: Technology, Innovation, and Entrepreneurship” aims to bring tech founders, investors, industry leaders and professionals, policymakers, scholars, and tech enthusiasts together to chart the future of the Nigerian tech space.
ha: Taron wanda yake da taken “Building the Future:Technology, Innovation, and Entrepneurship” wanda yake son tattaro kan masu ƙirƙirar fasaha, masu hannun jari, shugabannin masana’antu da kuma ƙwararru, mahukunta, malamai, da masu sha’awar fasaha waje ɗaya domin tattauna cigaban mahallin fasaha ta Nijeriya.
sw: Kongamano lenye dhamira ya kujenga wakati ujao: Teknolojia, Ubunifu na ujasiriamali linalenga kuwaleta watafiti wa teknolojia, wawekezaji, viongozi wa viwanda na wataalam, watunzi wa sera, wasomi na wapenda teknolojia pamoja ili kuorodhesha mustakabali wa anga lijalo la teknolojia ya Nigeria.
yo: Ìpàdé náà tí àkòrí rẹ̀ jẹ́ "Ṣíṣe iṣẹ́ tọ Ọjọ́-iwájú: Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ, Ìṣàtinúdá, àti Ìṣòwò" ń gbèrò láti kó àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ, àwọn olùkówólókòwò, àwọn adarí ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ àti àwọn alámọ̀dájú, àwọn aṣòfin, àwọn ọ̀mọ̀wé, àti àwọn olùfẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ papọ̀ láti jọ ya ọjọ́-ọ̀la àyè ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ní Nigeria.
zu: Le ngqungquthela enendikimba ethi “Ukwakha Ikusasa: Ubuchwepheshe, Ukuqamba Okusha, kanye Nosomabhizinisi” ihlose ukuhlanganisa abasunguli bezobuchwepheshe, abatshalizimali, abaholi bezimboni kanye nongoti, abenzi bezinqubomgomo, osolwazi, kanye nabathandi bezobuchwepheshe ndawonye ukuze bahlele ikusasa lesikhala sobuchwepheshe saseNigeria.

am: ኤልቢኤስ ይህን የመሪዎች ጉባዔ ለምን እያደራጀ እንደሆነ ለቴክፖይንት አፍሪካ ሲናገሩ ሴጉን ቶማስ፣ ሄድ፣ ፕሮድት ዴቨሎፕመንት ኤንድ ኢኖቬሽን በLBS እንዲህ ብለዋል፣ "ብዙ ሰዎች ወደ ቴክኖሎጂው ጀማሪ ቦታ እየገቡ መሆኑን አይተናል። ነገር ግን መሰረታዊ ነገሮች አሁንም አልጠፉም።
en: Speaking to Techpoint Africa on why LBS is organising this summit, Segun Thomas, Head, Product Development and Innovation at LBS, said, "We’ve seen that a lot of people are entering the tech startup space, but the fundamentals are still missing.
ha: Yayin magana da Techpoint Africa game da dalilin da ya sa LBS ta haɗa taron, Segun Thomas, Shugaban Samar da Kaya da kuma ƙirƙira a LBS, ya ce, “Mun ga mutane da yawa suna shiga mahallin fasaha na kamfani mai tasowa, amma maƙasudin har yanzu babu shi.
sw: Akizungumza na Techpoint Africa kuhusu kwanini LBS wanaendesha kongamano hili, Seguna Thomas, mkuu wa maendeleo ya bidhaa na ubunifu katika LBS alisema, tumeona kuwa watu wengi watajiunga kwenye nafasi ya kuanza kwa teknolojia, lakin mambo ya msingi bado hayapo.
yo: Nígbà tí IOE ń bá Techpoint Africa sọ̀rọ̀ lórí ìdí tí wọ́n fi ń ṣètò ìpàdé yìí, Segun Thomas, Olórí, Ìṣẹ̀dá àti Ìṣàtinúdá Ohun-ìṣàmúlò ní IOE, wí pé, "A ti rí pé ọ̀pọ̀ èèyàn ń wọ àyè ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ìpìlẹ̀ tí ó ṣe kókó kò sí níbẹ̀.
zu: Ekhuluma ne-Techpoint yase-Africa ngokuthi kungani i-LBS ihlela le ngqungquthela, u-Segun Thomas, iNhloko, Ukuthuthukiswa Komkhiqizo kanye Ne-Innovation e-LBS, uthe, "Sibonile ukuthi abantu abaningi bangena endaweni yokuqala yobuchwepheshe, kodwa okuyisisekelo sisashoda.

am: አንዳንድ መሥራቾች የቴክኖሎጂ ሰው ናችው ግን በንግድ ሥራና በቴክኖሎጂ መካከል ያለውን ግንኙነት መረዳት ለአንዳንዶች አሁንም አስቸጋሪ ነው ።
en: Some founders are techies, but understanding the nexus between business management and technology is still difficult for some.
ha: Wasu masu samarwar masu fasaha ne, amma fahimtar abin da ya haɗa kula da kasuwanci da kuma fasaha har yanzu yana da wahala ga wasu.
sw: waanzilishi wengi ni wataalam wa teknolojia lakini kuelewa uhusiano kati ya teknolojia na biashara bado ni vigumu kwa baadhi yao.
yo: Onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ní àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ kan, ṣùgbọ́n ìmọ̀ nípa ìbáṣepọ̀ láàárín ìṣàkóso òkòwò àti ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ sì tún le fún àwọn kan.
zu: Abanye abasunguli bangabasebenza ngobuchwepheshe, kodwa ukuqonda ukuhlobana phakathi kokuphathwa kwebhizinisi nobuchwepheshe kusenzima kwabanye.

am: ለዚህ ዝግጅት የኤልቢኤስ አላማ እልፍ ፈተናዎች ስላሏቸው ከነዚህ ጀማሪዎች ፍላጎት ጋር የሚጣጣሙ መፍትሄዎችን እንድናመጣ ለማስቻል ነው።
en: The goal of LBS for this event is to enable us to come up with solutions tailored to the needs of these startups because they have myriad challenges.
ha: Burin LBS ga wannan taron shi ne su ba mu damar zuwa da wasu maganin matsala wanda yake tare da buƙatun waɗannan kamfanoni masu farawa ɗin saboda suna da ƙalubale da dama.
sw: Lengo la LBS kwenye hili tukio ni kutuwezesha kupata suluhu linaloendana na mahitaji ya waanzilishi hawa kwa sababu wana changamoto nyingi.
yo: Ìlépa IOE fún ètò yìí ni láti jẹ́ kí á wá àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ tí yóò wà ní ìbámu pẹ̀lú ìnílò àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ wọ̀nyìí nítorí pé wọ́n ní oríṣiríṣi ìpéníjà.
zu: Umgomo we-LBS walo mcimbi ukwenza sikwazi ukuqhamuka nezixazululo ezihambisana nezidingo zalezi ziqalo ngoba zinenqwaba yezinselelo.

am: ኤልቢኤስ በዚህ ረገድ ምርቶችን እና መፍትሄዎችን ለማግኘት በቅድሚያ እየደረሱባቸው ያሉ ችግሮችን መረዳት ያስፈልገናል. በተጨማሪም በስርዓቱ ውስጥ ባሉት ኦፕሬተሮቹ ሁሉ መካከል ውህደት ማምጣት ያስፈልገናል።"
en: For LBS to come up with products and solutions in this regard, we need to first have an understanding of the problems they are going through, and we also need to bring convergence between all the operators in the system."
ha: Don LBS ta zo da wasu kayayyaki da kuma maganin matsala a wannan fagen, da farko sai mun fara fahimtar matsalar da suke fuskanta, kuma muna da buƙatar haɗa dukkan masu gudanarwa a cikin tsarin.”
sw: Kwa LBS kuja na bidhaa na suluhu kwenye suala hili, tunatakiwa kwanza kuelewa tatizo wanalopitia na pia tunatakiwa kuleta muunganiko kati ya waendeshaji wote waliyopo kwenye mfumo
yo: Fún IOE láti mú àwọn ohun ìṣàmúlò àti ọ̀nà àbáyọ jáde báyìí, a ní láti kọ́kọ́ mọ àwọn ìṣòro tí à ń kojú, a sì tún ní láti ní ìfẹnukò láàárín àwọn oníṣẹ́ tí wọ́n wà nínú ètò iṣẹ́ náà."
zu: Ukuze i-LBS iqhamuke nemikhiqizo nezixazululo mayelana nalokhu, kudingeka siqale siqonde izinkinga ababhekana nazo, futhi sidinga ukuletha ukuhlangana phakathi kwabo bonke abasebenza ohlelweni. "

am: አክሎም የኢንቨስተሮች፣ መስራቾችና ህዋ ላይ ስርዓት ለማምጣት የሚጥሩ ሰዎች ፍላጎት የሚታይበት ሁኔታ ለመፍጠር ጥረት እያደረጉ መሆኑን ገልጸዋል። ከዚያም በቴክኖሎጂው ህዋ ውስጥ ያሉ የሁሉንም ኦፕሬተሮች የስቃይ ነጥብ የሚያስተናግድ ነገር በቦርዱ ላይ መስራት ችለዋል።
en: He added that they are trying to create an environment where the needs of investors, founders, and people who are trying to bring regulation to the space are seen, and then they are able to draw something across the board that addresses the pain points of all the operators in the tech space.
ha: Ya ƙara da cewa suna ƙoƙarin samun mahalli inda ake ganin buƙatar masu sanya hannun jari, masu samarwa, da kuma mutane da suke ƙoƙarin kawo gyara a mahallin, kuma suna da damar samar da wani abu a kan matsalar wanda yake magance abin da ya damu masu gudanarwar a mahallin fasahar.
sw: Aliongeza kuwa wanajaribu kuunda mazingira ambayo mahitaji ya wawekezaji, waanzilishi na watu wanaojaribu kuleta udhibiti kwenye nafasi yanaonekana, na kisha wanaweza kuchora kitu kote ambacho kinashughulikia maumivu ya wote. Waendeshaji katika nafasi ya teknolojia.
yo: Ó tún ṣe àfikún pé àwọn ń gbìyànjú láti ṣẹ̀dá àyíkà níbi tí àwọn ìnílò àwọn olùkówólókòwò, olùdásílẹ̀, àti àwọn èèyàn tí wọ́n ń gbìyànjú láti mú àkóso bá àyè náà yóò ti ṣe é rí ni, tí wọn yóò sì ti lè fa nǹkan tí yóò yanjú àwọn kókó ìṣòro gbogbo àwọn oníṣẹ́ ní àyè ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ jáde ni.
zu: Ubuye wengeza ngokuthi bazama ukwakha indawo lapho izidingo zabatshalizimali, abasunguli, kanye nabantu abazolawula indawo, bese bekwazi uthola amaphuzu abalulekile angabaphethe kahle abasebenza kwezobuchwepheshe.

am: በቴክ መስራቾች ጉባዔ ላይ ምን ይጠበቃል
en: What to expect at the Tech Founders’ Summit
ha: Abin da ya kamata ka yi zato game da taron Tech Founders
sw: Tutegemee nini kwenye kongamano la waanzilishi wa teknolojia?
yo: Ohun tí o lè fojú sọ́nà fún níbi Ìpàdé àwọn Olùdásílẹ̀ Alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ
zu: Ongakulindela Engqungqutheleni YeTech Founders'

am: ከፍተኛ ደረጃ ያላቸው የግንኙነት እድሎች ይህ ጉባዔ ተሰብሳቢዎች ከውሳኔ-ሰጪዎች እና መስራቾች ጋር ለመገናኘት መድረክ ያዘጋጃል።
en: High-level networking opportunities: This summit provides a platform for attendees to connect with decision-makers and founders.
ha: Damarmakin haɗuwa da manyan mutane:Taron zai samar da manhaja ga masu zuwa taron domin haɗuwa da mahukunta da kuma masu samarwa.
sw: Fursa kubwa ya ushirikiano wa kibiashara: hili kongamano linatoa jukwaa kwa watu watakaohudhuria kuungana na watoa maamuzi na waanzilishi.
yo: Àǹfààní ìmọ̀ọ̀yàn tí ó ga jùlọ: Ìpàdé yìí yóò pèsè ìkànnì fún àwọn olùkópa láti mọ́ àwọn aṣèpinnu àti àwọn olùdásílẹ̀.
zu: Amathuba okuxhumana asezingeni eliphezulu: Le ngqungquthela ihlinzeka ngenkundla yabahambele lo mcimbi ukuthi baxhumane nabathatha izinqumo nabasunguli.

am: ስትራቴጂያዊ የንግድ ጥምረት እንዲመሰርቱ ያስችላቸዋል።
en: Enabling them to strike potential strategic business alliances.
ha: Samar musu damar manyan damarmaki na ƙulla kasuwanci.
sw: linawasaidia wao kuanzisha ushirikiano wa kimkakati wenye manufaa ya kibiashara.
yo: Èyí tí yóò fún wọn ní àǹfààní láti lè jọ sọ̀rọ̀ àjùmọ̀ṣòwò papọ̀.
zu: Ukubavumela ukuthi bakhe ubudlelwano nabanye osomabhizinisi.

am: ከኢንዱስትሪ መሪዎች እይታ ተሳታፊዎችም ከኢንቨስተሮች፣ መስራቾች፣ ፖሊሲ አውጪዎች እና ሌሎች የኢንዱስትሪ መሪዎች፣ሌሎችም መስማት መጠበቅ አለባቸው።
en: Insights from industry leaders: Participants should also expect to hear from investors, founders, policymakers, and other industry leaders, among others.
ha: Hange daga shugabannin masana’antu: Masu shiga taron kuma su saurari ji daga masu hannun jari, masu samarwa, mahukunta, da sauran shugabannin masana’antu daga sauransu.
sw: Maarifa kutoka kwa viongozi wa sekta: pia, washiriki watarajie kusikia kutoka kwa kwa wawekezaji, waanzilishi, watunga sera, na viongozi wengine wa sekta, miongoni mwa wengine.
yo: Òye láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn adarí ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́: Àwọn olùkópa tún lè máa retí láti gbọ́ ọ̀rọ̀ lẹ́nu àwọn akówólókòwò, àwọn olùdásílẹ̀, àwọn aṣòfin àti àwọn olórí ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ mìíràn, àti àwọn mìíràn.
zu: Imininingwane evela kubaholi bezimboni: Ababambiqhaza kufanele futhi balindele ukuzwa kubatshalizimali, abasunguli, abenzi benqubomgomo, nabanye abaholi bezimboni, phakathi kwabanye.

am: የተለያዩ የእድገት ደረጃዎችን እንዴት መጓዝ እንደሚቻል፣ ከሀብት ማሳደግ አንስቶ ኢንቨስትመንቶች ምን እንደሚፈልጉ እስከማወቅ፣ የሚጠብቁትን ነገር ከማስተዳደር፣ እና ከሁሉም በላይ ደግሞ በኢንዱስትሪቸው ውስጥ እንዴት እንደሚያድጉ ውይይት ማድረግ እንደሚችሉ መጠበቅ ይኖርባቸዋል።
en: They should expect conversations around how to navigate various stages of growth, from raising capital to knowing what investors are looking for, managing expectations, and most importantly, thriving in their industry.
ha: Za su saurari tattaunawa a kan yadda zasu binciki matakai da dama na cigaba, daga neman jari zuwa ga sanin abin da masu hannun jari suke da buƙata, kula da buriƙa, sannan mafi amfani, yadda zasu bunƙasa a masana’antunsu.
sw: Wanapaswa kutarajia mazungumzo kuhusu jinsi ya kupitia hatua mbalimbali za ukuaji, kutoka kwa kuongeza mtaji hadi kujua kile ambacho wawekezaji wanatafuta kudhibiti matarajioa na muhimu zaidi, kustawi katika tasnia yao.
yo: Kí wọ́n máa retí àwọn ìtàkúsọ̀rọ nípa bí a ti lè la onírúurú ìpele ìdàgbàsókè kọjá, bẹ̀rẹ̀ láti ṣíṣe àgbàjọ owó ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ òkòwò dé mímọ ohun tí àwọn olùkówólókòwò ń wá, ṣíṣe àmójútó àfọkànsí, àti pàápàá júlọ, sísa ipa láti yè ní ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ wọn.
zu: Kufanele balindele izingxoxo eziphathelene nezigaba zokuthuthuka , kusukela ekukhuphuleni imali kuye ekutholeni ulwazi ngokuthi abatshalizimali bafunani, indlela yokuphatha elindelekile, okubaluleke kakhulu nokusimama embonini yabo.

am: ለውይይቱ አስተዋፅኦ፤ ተሳታፊዎች በውይይት የመሳተፍ እና የናይጄሪያን የቴክኖሎጂ ምህዳር ለማራመድ የበኩላቸውን አስተዋፅኦ የማድረግ እድል ይኖራቸዋል።
en: Contribution to the conversation: Participants will have the opportunity to engage in discussions and contribute to advancing the Nigerian tech ecosystem.
ha: Gudunmawa game da tattaunawar: Masu shiga tsarin za su samu damar tattaunawa da kuma taimakawa wajen cigaban tsarin mahallin fasahar Nijeriya.
sw: Mchango katika mazungumzo: washiriki watapata nafasi ya kuchangia kwenye mjadala na kuchangia kwenye maendeleo ya mfumo wa teknolojia wa Nigeria.
yo: Dídásí ìtàkúrọ̀sọ náà: Àwọn olùkópa yóò ní àǹfààní láti dá sí ọ̀rọ̀ tí wọn yóò sì le ṣe àfikún sí ètò ìtẹ̀síwájú àyè alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ní Nigeria.
zu: Igalelo engxoxweni: Abahlanganyeli bazothola ithuba lokuzibandakanya ezingxoxweni futhi babambe iqhaza ekuthuthukisweni kwe-ecosystem yezobuchwepheshe e-Nigeria.

am: ከኤልቢኤስ የተሟላ መፍትሔዎች አደራዳሪዎቹ, ሌጎስ ቢዝነስ ስኩል, በጉባዔው ወቅት ባለው ማስተዋል እና ውይይት ላይ የተመሰረተ በባለሙያ የሚመሩ መፍትሄዎችን ለማዘጋጀት አቅደዋል።
en: Comprehensive solutions from LBS: The organisers, Lagos Business School, plan to develop practitioner-led solutions based on the insights and discussions during the summit.
ha: Cikakkun hanyoyin magance matsaloli daga LBS: Masu tsarawar, Makarantar Kasuwanci ta Legas, ta tsara bunƙasa magance matsala ta masu gudanarwa bisa ga hangen nesa da kuma tattaunawa yayin taron.
sw: Ufumbuzi wa kina kutoka LBS: waandaaji, Shule ya biashara ya Lagos (LBS) wanapanga kuandaa watendaji watakaoongoza suluhisho litakalojikita kwenye maarifa na majadiliano kipindi cha kongamano.
yo: Àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ alásọyé láti IOE: Àwọn elétò náà, Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Òkòwò ti ìlú Èkó, ṣètò láti mú àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ tí àwọn onímọ̀ọ́ṣe yóò darí wáyé látààrí àwọn òye àti ìjíròrò tí wọ́n bá ní nínú ìpàdé náà.
zu: Izixazululo eziphelele ezivela ku-LBS: Abahleli, i-Lagos Business School, bahlela ukuthuthukisa izixazululo eziholwa ochwepheshe ngokusekelwe ekuqondeni nasekuxoxweni phakathi nengqungquthela.

am: በሸንጎው ላይ ንግግር ለማድረግ የሚጠበቁት የሚከተሉት የኢንዱስትሪ መሪዎች ናቸው ኦሉግበንጋአግቦላ፣ መስራችና ዋና ሥራ አስኪያጅ፣ ፍሊተርዌቭ; ዶ/ር ኦላ ብራውን፣ መስራችና ዋና ስራ አስኪያጅ፣ ሄልዝካፕ አፍሪካ፤ ዶክተር ቦሱን ቲጃኒ, መስራች እና ዋና ሥራ አስኪያጅ, ሲሲሁብ፣ በዲጂታል ትራንስፎርሜሽን ላይ የቀድሞ ከፍተኛ ልዩ ረዳት የነበሩት ኦስቫልት ጉባዲያ፤ጎኮሉቢሲ፣ የጋራ መስራች እና ዋና ሥራ አስኪያጅ፣ ሄሊየም ሄልዝ፤ ፕሮፌሰር ኦሌይንካ ዴቪድ ዌስት፣ ተባባሪ ዲን፣ ሌጎስ የንግድ ትምህርት ቤት፣ ታዋቂ የሆኑ ከፍተኛ የበረራ መሣሪያዎች ይገኙበታል።
en: Tentatively expected to speak at the summit are the following industry leaders: Olugbenga Agboola, founder and CEO, Flutterwave; Dr Ola Brown, Founder and CEO, HealthCap Africa; Dr Bosun Tijani, founder and CEO, CcHub; Oswald Guobadia, former Senior Special Assistant to the President on Digital Transformation; Goke Olubisi, Co-founder and CEO, Helium Health; Professor Olayinka David West, Associate Dean, Lagos Business School, among other notable high-flyers.
ha: Waɗanda ake tunanin za su yi bayani a taron su ne waɗannan shugabannin masana’antun: Olugbenga Agboola, Shugaba kuma wanda ya samar da Flutterwave; Dr Ola Brown, Shugaba kuma wadda ta samar da HealthCap Afirka; Dr Bosun Tijani, Shugaba kuma wanda ya samar da CcHub; Oswald Guabadia, tsohon Babban Mataimakin Shugaban Ƙasa a kan harkar fasahar zamani;Goke Olubisi, Shugaba kuma wanda ya samar da Helium Health; Professor Olayinka David West, Associate Dean, Maƙarantar Kasuwanci ta Legas, daga cikin manyan mutane sanannu.
sw: Wanaotarajia kuzungumza katika Mkutano huo ni viongozi wafuatao wa sekta hiyo: Olugbenga Agboola, Mwanzilishi na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji, Flutterwave; Dk Ola Brown, Mwanzilishi na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji, HealthCap Africa; Dk Bosun Tjiani, Mwanzilishi na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji, CcHub; Osward Guobadia, aliyekuwa Msaidizi Maalum Mwandamizi wa Rais kuhusu Mabadiliko-Mwenza na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji, Helium Health; Profesa Olayinka David West, Dean Mshiriki, Shule ya Biashara ya Lagos, miongoni mwa wasafiri wengine mashuhuri.
yo: Àwọn tí wọ́n ń retí láti sọ̀rọ̀ níbi ìpàdé náà ni àwọn adarí ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ wọ̀nyìí: Olugbenga Agboola, olùdásílẹ̀ àti Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Flutterwave; Dr Ola Brown, Olùdásílẹ̀ àti Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí HealthCap Africa; Dr Bosun Tijani, olùdásílẹ̀ àti Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí CcHub; Oswald Guobadia, Amúgbálẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ Àgbà Pàtàkì tẹ́lẹ̀ sí Ààrẹ lórí Ìṣàyípadà Ìlò-ayélujára; Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Olayinka David West, Alábàáṣe Díìnì ní Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Òkòwò ti ìlú Èkó, láàárín àwọn èèyàn jàǹkàn jàǹkàn mìíràn.
zu: Okulindeleke ukuba bakhulume engqungqutheleni yilaba abaholi bemboni abalandelayo: U-Olugbenga Agboola, umsunguli kanye ne-CEO, uFlutterwave; UDkt Ola Brown, Umsunguli kanye noMphathi Omkhulu, i-HealthCap Africa; UDkt Bosun Tijani, umsunguli kanye ne-CEO, i-CcHub; u-Oswald Guobadia, owayenguMsizi Omkhulu Okhethekile KaMongameli mayelana Nokuguqulwa Kwedijithali; Goke Olubisi, Umsunguli kanye noMphathi Omkhulu, iHelium Health; USolwazi u-Olayinka David West, uMdidiyeli Ohlangene, iSikole Sebhizinisi saseLagos, phakathi kwamanye amaflaya aphezulu aphawulekayo.

am: በቴክ መስራቾች ጉባዔ ላይ ለመገኘት ፍላጎት ያላቸው ግለሰቦች በቀረበው ሊንክ በመጠቀም መመዝገብ ይችላሉ። (ኤችቲቲፒኤስ፡ኤል/ቴክ-መስኣቾች-ጉባኤ) https://bit.ly/tech-founders-summit።
en: To attend the Tech Founders' Summit, interested individuals can register using the provided link: https://bit.ly/tech-founders-summit.
ha: Domin halartar taron Tech Founders, masu sha’awar za su iya yin rijista ta amfani da mahaɗi da aka samar:http:?//bit.ly/tech-founders-summit.
sw: ili kuhudhuria kongamano la waanzilishi wa teknolojia, watu wanaohitaji wanaweza kujisajiri kwa kutumia kiunganishi cha https://bit.ly/tech-founders-summit.
yo: Láti kópa nínú Ìpàdé àwọn Olùdásílẹ̀ Alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ, àwọn tí wọ́n nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí i lè forúkọsílẹ̀ nípa lílo ọ̀nà àsopọ̀ yìí: https://bit.ly/tech-founders-summit.
zu: Ukuze bathamele Ingqungquthela Yabasunguli Bezobuchwepheshe, abantu abanentshisekelo bangabhalisa besebenzisa isixhumanisi esinikeziwe: https://bit.ly/tech-founders-summit.

am: በጉባዔው ላይ የመፍትሔ ሐሳቦቻቸውን ለማሳየት ለሚፈልጉ የንግድ ድርጅቶች የገንዘብ ድጋፍና የኤግዚቢሽን አጋጣሚ ማግኘት ይቻላል።
en: Sponsorship and exhibition opportunities are available for businesses interested in showcasing their solutions at the summit.
ha: Da akwai damarmakin tallafi da kuma baje haja domin masu kasuwancin da suke da ra’ayin nuna magancewar matsala a taron.
sw: Ufadhili na fursa za maonyesho ya kibiashara zinapatikana kwa ajili ya kuonesha suluhisho lao kwenye kongamano.
yo: Àǹfààní láti ṣe ìgbọ̀wọ́ àti láti fi ọjà hàn náà ṣí sílẹ̀ fún àwọn òkòwò tí wọ́n bá ń fẹ́ láti fi èlò àbáyọ wọn hàn níbi ìpàdé náà.
zu: Amathuba oxhaso nawemibukiso ayatholakala kumabhizinisi anentshisekelo yokubonisa izisombululo zawo engqungqutheleni.

am: አንዳንድ ለንግድ ስራዎች ክፍት ከሆኑ ጥቅማ ጥቅሞች መካከል ዋነኛው ራስን ማሳየት፣ የግንኘነት መረቦች እድሎች መጨመር እና መሪ ትውልድ እና ሌሎችም ናቸው።
en: Some of the perks open to businesses are prime exposure, increased networking opportunities, and lead generation, among others.
ha: Wasu daga cikin abubuwan da aka buɗewa masu kasuwanci sun haɗa da wayewa, Ƙarin damarmakin hanyoyi, da kuma samun abokan ciniki, daga cikinsu.
sw: Baadhi ya manufaa yaliyofunguliwa katika biashara ni kufichuliwa, kuongezeka kwa fursa za mitandaoni na kizazi kinachoongoza, miongoni mwa mengi.
yo: Ara àwọn àǹfààní tí ó ṣí sílẹ̀ fún àwọn òkòwò ni ìṣàfihàn tí kò lẹ́gbẹ́, àǹfààní ìmọ̀ọ̀yàn sí i, àti àmújáde ọ̀rọ̀-ìdarí, àti àwọn mìíràn.
zu: Ezinye zezinzuzo ezivulekele amabhizinisi ukuchayeka okuphambili, ukwanda kwamathuba okuxhumana, nokukhiqiza okuphambili, phakathi kokunye.

am: ሬቨን ባንክ የ 400,000 ተማሪዎች በከቲንግ ኤጅ 'ላባ ኢንተርኔት' - በካምፓስ ነጻ ዋይፋይ
en: Raven Bank Empowers 400,000 Students with Cutting-Edge ‘Feather Internet’ - Free WiFi on Campus
ha: Bankin Raven ya tallafawa ɗalibai 400,000 da sabuwar fasahar ‘Intanet mai Fukafuki’- WiFi na Kyauta a Harabar maƙarantar
sw: Benki ya Raven yawawezesha Wanafunzi 400,000 kwa kukata-Edge feather internet -WiFi ya bila malipo kwenye Chuo
yo: Raven Bank ṣe Ìrónilágbára fún àwọn Akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ 400,000 pẹ̀lú 'Feather Internet' tí ó Tayọ-jùlọ - Èlò aṣàsopọ̀-ẹ̀rọ-mọ́-ayélujára aláìlowáyà Ọ̀fẹ́ ní Ọgbà ilé-ìwé
zu: I-Raven Bank Inika Abafundi Abangu-400,000 Amandla Nge-Cutting-Edge ‘Feather Internet’ - I-WiFi yamahhala ekhempasini

am: ሬቨን ባንክ በፌዘር ኢንተርኔት ኢንሺቲቭ አማካኝነት በናይጄሪያ ካምፖች ውስጥ በነፃ ዋይፋ በመስጠት ለትምህርት ዘርፍ አስተዋጽኦ ማበርከት ጀምሯል።
en: Through the Feather Internet Initiative, Raven Bank has begun contributing to the educational sector by providing free WIFI across Nigerian campuses.
ha: Ta dalilin Feather Interpret Initiative, Bankin Raven sun fara tallafawa ɓangaren ilimi ta hanyar samar da wifina kyauta a harabar maƙarantun Nijeriya.
sw: Kupitia mpango wa Feather Internet, benki ya Raven imeanza kuchangia sekta ya elimu kwa kutoa WiFi bila malipo kwenye vyuo vikuu vya Nigeria.
yo: Nípasẹ̀ Ètò àtinúdá Feather Internet náà, Raven Bank ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ní lọ́wọ́ sí ẹ̀ka ètò ẹ̀kọ́ nípa pípèsè èlò aṣàsopọ̀-ẹ̀rọ-mọ́-ayélujára aláìlowáyà ọ̀fẹ́ káàkiri àwọn ọgbà ilé-ìwé Nigeria.
zu: Ngohlelo lwe-Feather Internet Initiative, iRaven Bank isiqalile ukufaka isandla emkhakheni wezemfundo ngokuhlinzeka nge-WIFI yamahhala kuwo wonke amakhempasi aseNigeria.

am: ባፊ ሽልማት፣ 2022 ኒዮ ባንክ ኦቭ ዘ ይር፣ በሪቨር ስቴት ውስጥ በሚገኘው ኢግናሽየስ አጁሩዩኒቨርሲቲ ውስጥ ሬቨንፊዘር ኢንተርኔት የመጀመሪያ በተጀመረበት ዓርብ ላይ ተነሳሽነት ይፋ አደረገ።
en: The BAFI Award, 2022 Neo Bank of the Year, unveiled the Initiative on Friday during the maiden launch of Raven Feather Internet at the Ignatius Ajuru University, Rumolumeli, Port Harcourt, in Rivers State.
ha: Kyautar BAFI,2022 Neo Bank ta shekara, ta bayyana tunanin ranar Juma’a yayin ƙaddamar da Raven Feather Internet a Jami’ar Ignatius Ajuru, Rumolumeli, Pot Harcourt, a jihar Rivers.
sw: Tuzo ya BAFI, 2022 Neo Bank of the Year, ilizindua mpango huo siku ya Ijumaa wakati wa uzinduzi wa kwanza wa Raven Feather Internet katika Chuo kikuu cha Ignatius Ajuru, Rumolumeli, Port Harcourt katika Jimbo la Rivers.
yo: Àmì Ẹ̀yẹ BAFI, Báǹkì Aṣèṣúná orí Ẹ̀rọ fún ọdún 2022, ni ó ṣí aṣọ lójú Ètò àtinúdá náà ní ọjọ́ Ẹtì níbi ìfilọ́lẹ̀ àkọ́ṣe Raven Feather Internet ní Fáfitì Ignatius Ajuru, Rumolumeli, Port Harcourt ní Ìpínlẹ̀ Rivers.
zu: Umklomelo we-BAFI, 2022 Neo Bank of the Year, wethule Uhlelo NgoLwesihlanu ngesikhathi kwethulwa okokuqala kwe-Raven Feather Internet e-Ignatius Ajuru University, eRumolumeli, ePort Harcourt, e-Rivers State.

am: የሬቨን ባንክ ዋና አመራር ኃላፊ ኡቼና ኖዲም ይህን አስደናቂ ውጤት በማክበር ይህ በአገሪቱ ውስጥ በሚገኙ የፌደራል እና የመንግሥት ዩኒቨርሲቲዎች ውስጥ ከ400,000 በላይ ተማሪዎችን የትምህርት ውጤት ለማሳደግ በነፃ ብሮድባንድ የኢንተርኔት አገልግሎት ለመስጠት የሚያስችል የመጀመሪያው እርምጃ እንደሆነ ገለጹ።
en: Celebrating the impressive feat, Uchenna Nnodim, Chief Executive Officer of Raven Bank, revealed that this was the first step towards the bank’s goal of empowering over 400,000 students across Federal and State universities in the country with free high-speed broadband internet access to boost academic performance.
ha: Yayin murnar cigaban, Uchennan Nnodim, Babban Daraktan Bankin Raven, ya bayyana cewa wannan ne mataki na farko na manufar bankin don tallafawa ɗalibai fiye da 400,000 a faɗin jami’oin Tarayya da na jaha da ke ƙasar da yanar gizo mai ƙarfi da sauri domin taimakawa ƙwazon ƙaratu.
sw: Akifurahia kazi hiyo ya kuvutia , Uchanna Nnodim, Afsa mkuu mtendaji wa Benki ya Raven, alifichua kuwa hii ilikuwa ni hatua ya kwanza kuelekea lengo la benki la kuwawezesha zaidi ya wanafunzi 400,000 kwenye vyuo vikuu vya shirikisho na serikali kwa ufikiaji wa mtandao wa kasi ya juu bila malipo. ili kuongeza ufanisi wa kitaaluma.
yo: Níbi àjọyọ̀ àṣeyọrí awúnilórí náà, Uchenna Nnodim, Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Raven Bank, ṣàfihàn pé èyí jẹ́ ìgbésẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ sí ìlépa báǹkì náà láti ṣe ìrónilágbára tí yóò pèsè àǹfààní ìṣàsopọ̀ ayélujára ayákánkán ọ̀fẹ́ tí yóò mú iṣẹ́ ètò ẹ̀kọ́ gbòòrò sí i fún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ káàkiri àwọn fásitì Ìjọba Àpapọ̀ àti ti Ìlú ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà.
zu: Ebungaza lo msebenzi oncomekayo, u-Uchenna Nnodim, oyiSikhulu Esiphezulu se-Raven Bank, uveze ukuthi lesi yisinyathelo sokuqala esibheke emgomweni waleli bhange wokunikeza amandla abafundi abangaphezu kwama-400,000 kuwo wonke amanyuvesi kahulumeni ezweni ngokuthola mahhala i-inthanethi ye-broadband esheshayo ukuze kuthuthukiswe ezemfundo.

am: የኢንተርኔት አጠቃቀም ውስን በመሆኑ የተስፋፋውን የዲጂታል ክፍፍል ለመፍታት የተጀመረው ጥረት ስትራቴጅካዊ መፍትሔ ሆኖ መፈጠሩን ይፋ አድርጓል። ይህ ደግሞ በርካታ የናይጄሪያ ተማሪዎች የገጠማቸው መሰናክል ነው።
en: He unveiled that the initiative emerged as a strategic remedy to address the prevalent digital divide resulting from limited internet access, a hurdle encountered by numerous Nigerian students.
ha: Ya bayyana cewa tunanin ya zamanto wata dabara don kawo gyara ga rarrabuwar fasaha da ke zuwa daga ƙarancin damar samun yanar gizo, matsalar da ɗaliban Nijeriya da dama suka fuskanta.
sw: Alifichua kuwa huo mpango uliibuka kama suluhu la kimkakati la kushughulikia mgawanyiko wa kidijitali uliyoenea unaotokana na ufikiaji mdogo wa mtandao, kikwazo kilichowakumba wanafunzi na raia wengine wa Nigeria.
yo: Ó ṣàfihàn pé ètò àtinúdá náà jáde gẹ́gẹ́ bí i ètò ìṣàtúnṣe láti yanjú ìsòro ààfọ ẹ̀kọ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tí ó gbalẹ̀ kan, èyí tí àìráyè sí ayélujára déédé dá sílẹ̀, ìdíwọ́ tí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ní Nigeria ń kojú.
zu: Udalule ukuthi lesi sinyathelo siqhamuke njengekhambi lesu lokubhekana nokuhlukana okukhona kwedijithali okubangelwa ukufinyelela okulinganiselwe kwe-inthanethi, okuyisithiyo abafundi abaningi baseNigeria ababhekana nakho.

am: ከራሱ የትምህርት ጉዞ በመነሳት፣ በኢንተርኔት አማካኝነት መረጃ ለማግኘት ያጋጠሙትን እንቅፋቶች በግልጽ አካፍሎታል።
en: Drawing from his own educational journey, he candidly shared the obstacles he confronted in procuring online information.
ha: Bayar da misali daga yadda ya samu nasa ilimin, ya bayyana matsalolin da ya fuskanta wajen samun bayanai a yanar gizo.
sw: Kufuatia safari yake ya elimu, alieleza waziwazi vikwazo alivyokumbana navyo katika kupata taarifa mtandaoni.
yo: Nígbà tí ó ń fi àjò ẹ̀kọ́ tiẹ̀ ṣe àkàwé, ó sọ àwọn ìdíwọ́ tí ó kojú bí ó bá fẹ́ wá ìwífún ní orí ayélujára.
zu: Ethathela ohambweni lwakhe lwezemfundo, ubalule ngezithiyo ayebhekana nazo ukuze athole ulwazi ku-inthanethi.

am: ይህም፣ በጄን ዜ እና በሺህ ዓመታት ውስጥ የገንዘብ መሃይምነትን ለማሻሻል ከሬቨን ቁርጥ ውሳኔ ጋር ተዳምሮ ለዚህ የራእይ ተነሳሽነት የግድ አስፈላጊ እንዲሆን አነሳሳው።
en: This, coupled with Raven's resolute commitment to enhancing financial literacy among Gen Z and millennials, spurred the imperative for this visionary initiative.
ha: Wannan, tare da yanda Raven ya mayar da hankali wajen samun ilimin kuɗi tsakanin Gen Z da millennials, shi ne ya haifar da wannan hangen nesan mai amfani.
sw: Hili, pamoja na kujitolea kwa uthabiti kwa Raven katika kuimarisha ujuzi wa kifedha kati ya Gen Z na milenia, ilichochea umuhimu wa mpango huu wa maono.
yo: Èyí, àti ìfarajìn aláìmikàn tí Raven ní láti mú ètò ẹ̀kọ́ owó dàgbà sókè láàárín àwọn Ìran Z àti àwọn tí wọ́n bí láàárín ogun ọdún sí ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ 2000, ni ó jẹ́ kí ètò àtinúdá onírànran yìí ṣe pàtàkì.
zu: Lokhu, kuhambisana nokuzibophezela kukaRaven ekuthuthukiseni ulwazi lwezezimali phakathi kwe-Gen Z kanye nezinkulungwane zeminyaka, kukhuthaze ukubaluleka kwalolu hlelo lombono.

am: እሱ ተናገረ፣''70 በመቶ የሚሆኑት የናይጄሪያ ተማሪዎች ኢንተርኔት እንደማያገኙ ተረዳን።
en: He said, “We realised that about 70 per cent of Nigerian students do not have access to the internet.
ha: Ya ce, “mun fahinmci cewa kusan kaso 70 na ɗaliban Nijeriya ba su da damar shiga yanar gizo.
sw: Alisema, tuligundua kuwa takribani 70% ya wanafunzi wa Nigeria hawana mtandao.
yo: Ó wí pé, "A rí i pé bí i ìdá 70 nínú ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ilẹ̀ Nigeria ní kò rí àyè sí ayélujára.
zu: Uthe, “Sibone ukuthi cishe amaphesenti angama-70 abafundi baseNigeria abanayo i-inthanethi.

am: ይህ ብዙ ቁጥር ነው ።
en: This is a large number.
ha: Wannan adaɗi ne mai girma.
sw: Hii ni idadi kubwa.
yo: Èyí jẹ́ nọ́ḿbà tí ó pọ̀.
zu: Lena inombolo enkulu.

am: በዘመናዊው ዘመን በኢንተርኔት ላይ የሚገኘው የመረጃ እና የእውቀት መጠን ከመጠን በላይ ማጉላት እንደማይቻል በጣም እናውቃለን።
en: We are also very much aware that in modern times the volume of information and knowledge that exists on the internet cannot be overemphasised.”
ha: Sannan kuma muna da cikakken sani cewa a lokutan zamani yawan bayanai da ilimin da yake a yanar gizo ba abin da za a wuce gona da iri ba ne.”
sw: Pia tunafahamu sana kwamba katika nyakati za kisasa wingi wa habari na ujuzi uliyopo kwenye mtandao hauwezi kusisitizwa kupitia siasa
yo: A sì tún mọ̀ dáadáa pé ní ayé ọ̀làjú yìí, iye ìwífún àti ìmọ̀ tí wọ́n wà ní orí ayélujára kò ṣe é fọwọ́ rọ́ sẹ́yìn."
zu: Sazi kakhulu futhi ukuthi ezikhathini zanamuhla umthamo wemininingo nolwazi olukhona ku-inthanethi ngeke kugcizelelwe ngokweqile.”

am: በኢንተርኔት አማካኝነት ማንኛውንም እውቀት ወይም መረጃ ማግኘት ይችላሉ፣ ስለዚህ ለትምህርት እና ለአካዳሚክ ብቃት ኢንተርኔት ማግኘት በጣም አስፈላጊ ነው።''
en: “You can literally have access to any knowledge or information via the internet, so access to the internet is so crucial for educational and academic excellence.”
ha: “Za ka iya samun damar kowanne irin ilimi ko bayanai da yanar gizo, don haka samun damar shiga yanar gizo abu ne mai matuƙar amfani ga cigaban ilimi da kuma ƙaratu.”
sw: Unaweza kupata maarifa au taarifa yoyote kupitia mtandao, kwa hivyo ufikiaji wa mtandao ni muhimu sana kwa ubora wa elimu na kitaaluma
yo: "O lè rí àyè sí èyíkéyìí ìmọ̀ tàbí ìwífún lórí ayélujára, torí náà ìráàyè sí ayélujára ṣe pàtàkì fún ìtayọ lẹ́nu ìwé àti ẹ̀kọ́."
zu: "Ungakwazi ukufinyelela kunoma yiluphi ulwazi noma imininingo nge-inthanethi, ngakho ukufinyelela ku-inthanethi kubaluleke kakhulu ukuze uphumelele kwezemfundo futhi uphase izifundo kahle."

am: በተጨማሪም ንኖዲም የመጀመሪያዋ እርምጃ በአይኤዩኢ የመጀመሪያዋ መንኮራኩር መሆኗን አስተውሉ።
en: Nnodim further noted that the maiden launch at IAUE was the initiative's first step.
ha: Nnodim ya cigaba da cewa ƙaddamarwar farko a IAUE ita ce matakin farko na cigaban.
sw: Nnodim alibainisha zaidi kuwa uzinduzi wa kwanza katika IAUE ulikuwa wa hatua ya kwanza ya mpango huo.
yo: Nnodim túbọ̀ tọ́ka pé ìfilọ́lẹ̀ àkọ́ṣe náà ní IAUE jẹ́ ìgbésẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ ètò àtinúdá náà.
zu: UNnodim uphinde waphawula ukuthi ukwethulwa kokuqala kwe-IAUE kwakuyisinyathelo sokuqala salolu hlelo.

am: ዛሬ (ዓርብ) የጀመርነው የመጀመርያ ቦታችን ነበር፤ ለፕሮጀክቱ ግን ትልቅ እቅድ አለን።
en: “Our launch today (Friday) was our maiden location, but we have big plans for the project.
ha: “Ƙaddamarwarmu ta yau (Juma’a) ita ce wajen mu na farko, amma muna da babban shiri domin aikin.
sw: Uzinduzi wetu leo (ijumaa) ulikuwa kwenye eneo letu la kwanza, lakini tuna mipango mikubwa ya mradi huo.
yo: "Ìfilọ́lẹ̀ wa lónìí (ọjọ́ Ẹtì) ní àyè àkọ́ṣe wa, ṣùgbọ́n a ní àwọn ètò ńlá fún iṣẹ́ àkànṣe náà.
zu: “Ukwethulwa kwethu namuhla (ngoLwesihlanu) bekuyindawo yethu yokuqala, kodwa sinezinhlelo ezinkulu ngalo msebenzi.

am: ቢያንስ 400,000 ተማሪዎችን ማግኘት እንደምንፈልግ አስቀድሜ ተናግሬያለሁ፤ እንዲሁም ለማስፋት የምንፈልጋቸውን ሌሎች 26 ቦታዎች ካርታ አውጥተናል።"
en: I have already stated we want to reach at least 400,000 students, and we have already mapped out 26 other locations we are exploring to expand.”
ha: Na riga na faɗa cewar muna so mu isa ga aƙalla ɗalibai 400,000, kuma ma har mun samo wasu wuraren guda 26 da muke so mu faɗaɗa.”
sw: Tayari nimeshasema kuwa tunataka kufikia angalau wanafunzi 400,000, na tayari tumepanga maeneo mengine 26 tunayochunguza ili kuyapanua
yo: Mo ti sọ tẹ́lẹ̀ pé a fẹ́ nawọ́ sí àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ 400,000 ó kéré jù, a sì ti ya àwọn ibi 26 mìíràn tí à ń ṣètò láti mú ọwọ́jà dé."
zu: Sengike ngasho ukuthi sifuna ukufinyelela okungenani kubafundi abangama-400,000, futhi sesivele senza imephu yezinye izindawo ezingu-26 esizihlolayo ukuze sizikhulise.”

am: ከነዚህ ሌሎች ቦታዎች አስተዳደር ጋር እየተነጋገረን ነዉ፤ ዉይይቱ በተሳካ ሁኔታ እየተካሄደ ነዉ።
en: “We are in talks with the management of these other locations, and the conversation is going smoothly.
ha: “Muna kan tattaunawa da hukumomi sauran waɗannan wuraren, kuma tattaunawar tana tafiya ba wata matsala.
sw: Tunafanya mazungumzo na uongozi wa maeneo haya mengine, na mazungumzo yanaendelea vizuri.
yo: "À ń bá àwọn alákòóso àwọn ibi mìíràn wọ̀nyìí sọ̀rọ̀ lọ́wọ́, tí ìtàkurọ̀sọ̀ náà sì ń lọ ní wẹ́rẹ́wẹ́rẹ́.
zu: “Sixoxisana nabaphathi balezi ezinye izindawo, ingxoxo ihamba kahle.

am: እቅዳችን በእነዚህ ቦታዎች በ2024 ሁለተኛ አራተኛ ጊዜ ውስጥ መፈጸም ነው፣" አክለውም ተናግረዋል።
en: Our plan is to execute in these locations by the second quarter of 2024,” he added.
ha: Shirinmu shi ne mu aiwatar a waɗannan wurare a kwata ta biyu ta 2024,”ya faɗa.
sw: Mpango wetu ni utekelezaji katika maeneo haya kufikia robo ya pili ya mwaka 2024.
yo: Èrò wa ni láti bẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́ ní àwọn àyè wọ̀nyìí títí ìdáméjì ọdún 2024," ó ṣe àfikún.
zu: Uhlelo lwethu wukwenza kulezi zindawo ngekota yesibili yowezi-2024,” engeza.

am: ሬቨን ፌዝ ኢንተርኔት በይፋ መጀመር የጀመረው ራቨን ሲ ኤፍ ኦ ቺዲንማ ማዱዌሲ ባዘጋጀው የአንድ ሰዓት መስተጋብራዊ መስሪያ ቤት ሲሆን፣ የቁጠባ፣ የኢንቨስትመንት፣ የድርጅትና ሌሎች ጉዳዮችን በተመለከተ አጨራራሽ ውይይት አካሂዷል።
en: The official launch of Raven Feather Internet commenced with an hour-long interactive workshop, hosted by Raven CFO Chidinma Maduwesi, featuring engaging dialogues on topics spanning savings, investments, entrepreneurship, and more.
ha: Ƙaddamar da Raven Feather Internet na gaske ya fara ne da tattaunawa ta tsawon awa ɗaya, wanda Shugaban Raven Chidinma Maduwesi ya gabatar, wanda ya fito da sanya tattaunawa a kan darussa da suka shafi ajiya, sanya hannun jari, sana’ar hannu, da sauransu.
sw: uzinduzi rasmi wa Raven Feather Internet ulianza kwa warsha ya maingiliano ya saa moja, iliyoandaliwa na Raven CFO Chidinma Maduwesi, inayojumuisha midahalo ya kuvutia kuhusu mada zinazohusu uwekaji akiba, uwekezaji, ujasiriamali na zaidi.
yo: Ìfilọ́lẹ̀ aláṣẹ Raven Feather Internet bẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ onísọ̀rọ̀-ǹ-gbèsì wákàtí kan tí Adarí Ètò Owó ní Raven, ìyẹn Chidinma Maduwesi ṣe ìgbàlejò rẹ̀, pẹ̀lú àwọn ìtàkurọ̀sọ̀ adùnmọ́ni lórí àwọn àkòrí tí ó dá lé ìfowópamọ́, ìkówólókòwò, ìṣòwò, àti àwọn mìíràn.
zu: Ukwethulwa ngokusemthethweni kwe-Raven Feather Internet kuqale ngomhlangano wokucobelelana ngolwazi othathe ihora lonke, ophethwe ngu-Raven CFO Chidinma Maduwesi, ohlanganisa izingxoxo ezithinta izihloko mayelana nokonga, ukutshalwa kwezimali, ezohwebo, nokunye.

am: ከፍተኛ ግምት የሚሰጠው የመሥሪያ ቤቱ አባላት ኡቼና ኖዲም ፣ ሬቨን ዋና ሥራ አስኪያጅ ፣ ሬቨን ፖስ አሰባሳቢ ቤንጃሚን ኢዲሲ እና ዘ ቦርድሩም የፋይናንስ ትምህርት ሰጪ የሆኑት ኬሌቺ ጎድፍሬ ናቸው ።
en: The esteemed workshop panel comprised Uchenna Nnodim, Raven CEO, Raven POS aggregator Benjamin Idisi, and Kelechi Godfrey, Financial Educator from The Boardroom.
ha: Shugabannin tattauawar sun haɗa da Uchenna Nnodim, Shugaban Raven, Raven POS aggregator Benjamin Idris, da kuma Kelechi Godfrey, mai koyar da harkokin kuɗi daga The Bedroom.
sw: Jopo tukufu la warsha lilijumuisha Uchenna Nnodim, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Raven, mkusanyaji wa Raven POS Benjamin Idisi, na Kelechi Godfrey, Mwalimu wa Fedha kutoka The Boardroom.
yo: Uchenna Nnodim tí ó jẹ́ Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Raven, Aṣàkóso ẹ̀rọ Ìsanwó Ọjà Raven, ìyẹn Benjamin Idisi, àti Kelechi Godfrey, Olùkọ́ni nípa Ètò-owó ni wọ́n wà nínú ìgbìmọ̀ ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ pàtàkì náà.
zu: Iphaneli yomhlangano wokucobelelana ngolwazi ihlanganisa u-Uchenna Nnodim, i-CEO ye-Raven, i-Raven POS aggregator Benjamin Idisi, kanye no-Kelechi Godfrey, Uthisha Wezezimali wase-The Boardroom.

am: በተጨማሪም በዝግጅቱ መገባደጃ ላይ ተማሪዎች በተመረጡ የሥነ ጥበብ ሰዎች ትርዒት ተማረኩ ።
en: And students were captivated in the later half of the event by performances from selected artistes.
ha: Kuma ɗalibai sun nishaɗantu a rabin lokacin taron da abubuwan nishaɗi daga zaɓaɓɓun fasihai.
sw: Na wanafunzi walivutiwa katika nusu ya baadaye ya tukio na maonyesho kutoka kwa wasanii waliyochaguliwa.
yo: Eré tí àwọn eléré àṣàyàn ṣe ni ó fa ojú àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ mọ́ra nígbà tí ètò náà yóò fi fẹ́ parí.
zu: Futhi abafundi bakhangwe engxenyeni yakamuva yomcimbi ngamaciko akhethiwe.

am: በተጨማሪም የኢግናሽየስ አጁሩ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ምክትል ቻንስለር የሆኑት ፕሮፌሰር ኦኪ ኦኬቹኩኩ በስብሰባው ላይ ተገኝተው ነበር ።
en: Also in attendance at the launch was Professor Okey Okechukwu, Vice Chancellor of Ignatius Ajuru University of Education.
ha: Kuma cikin wanda suka halarci ƙaddamarwar akwai Professor Okey Okechukwu, Shugaban Jami’ar Ilimi ta Ignatius Ajuru.
sw: Pia waliyohudhuria uzinduzi huo ni Profesa Okeyi Okechukwa, makamu chansela wa Chuo Kikuu cha Elimu cha Ignatius Ajuru.
yo: Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Okey Okechukwu, Igbákejì Olórí ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ ní Fásitì Elétò-ẹ̀kọ́ ti Ignatius Ajuru náà wà níbi ìfilọ́lẹ̀ náà.
zu: Omunye obekhona emcimbini wokwethulwa nguSolwazi Okey Okechukwu, iPhini likaShansela we-Ignatius Ajuru University of Education.

am: በንግግሩ ላይ፣ የሬቨን አስተዳደር በካምፓስ ውስጥ ላባ የኢንተርኔት ተነሳሽነት ተግባራዊ በማድረግ እና በማስፈጸም ረገድ ላከናወኑት ስኬታማ ስራ አወድሰውታል።
en: In his speech, he extolled the Raven management for their successful work in the implementation and execution of the Feather Internet initiative on campus.
ha: A bayaninsa, ya yaba wa masu gudunarwar Raven game da nasarar aikinsu wajen aiwatarwa da gabatar da Ƙaddamarwar Intanet mai Fukafuki a harabar jami’oi.
sw: Katika hotuba yake, alisifu usimamizi wa Raven kwa kazi yao yenye mafanikio katika utekelezaji wa mpango wa Feather Internet kwenye chuo kikuu.
yo: Nínú ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀, ó lu àwọn alákòóso ní Raven lọ́gọ ẹnu fún àṣeyọrí iṣẹ́ wọn lórí ìṣètò àti ìmúṣẹ ètò àtinúdá Feather Internet nínú ọgbà ilé-ẹ̀kọ́.
zu: Enkulumeni yakhe, utuse abaphathi beRaven ngomsebenzi wabo oyimpumelelo ekuqalisweni nasekusebenziseni uhlelo lwe-Feather Internet ekhempasini.

am: በሌላ በኩል ደግሞ ለፓይለት ፕሮጀክቱ ተቋሙን በመምረጣቸው ባንኩን አመስግነዋል።
en: At the same time, commending the bank for choosing the institution for the pilot project.
ha: A lokaci guda, ya kuma ya ba wa bankin wajen zabar maƙarantar domin gabatar da aikin.
sw: Wakati huohuo, aliipongeza benki kwa kuchagua taasisi ya mradi wa majaribio.
yo: Bákan náà, ó tún yin báǹkì náà pé ó yan ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ náà fún àkọ́ṣe iṣẹ́ àkànṣe náà.
zu: siphinde sincoma ibhange ngokukhetha isikhungo sephrojekthi yokuhlola.

am: በተጨማሪም ተማሪዎቹ በካምፓስ በነፃ ኢንተርኔት ተጠቃሚ እንዲሆኑ አበረታቷቸው፣ ኢንተርኔት የትምህርት ማበልጸግ ብቻ ሳይሆን ተማሪዎቹን ለበርካታ የህይወት ክህሎቶች ያጋልጣል፣ በትምህርት ጉዟቸውም ሆነ ከዚያ ባለፈ ኃይል ይሰጣቸዋል።
en: He further encouraged the students to take advantage of the free internet on campus, adding that the internet not only offers academic enrichment but also exposes students to a wide array of life skills, empowering them throughout their academic journey and beyond.
ha: Ya kuma ƙarfafawa ɗaliban guiwa da su yi amfani da yanar gizo ta kyauta a harabar jami’ar, ya ƙara da cewa ita yanar gizon ba ƙarfafa ƙaratu kawai take ba sai dai tana ƙara buɗe idon ɗaliban zuwa ga dabaru da dama, da tallafa musu a gaba ɗayan rayuwar ƙaratunsu da kuma fiye da haka.
sw: Aidha anewahimiza wanafunzi hao kutumia fursa ya mtandao wa bure chuoni hapo na kuongeza kuwa mtandao hautoi uboreshaji wa masomo pekee bali pia unawaweka wazi wanafunzi kwenye aina mbalimbali za stadi za maisha, kuwawezesha kwenye safari yao ya masomo na kuendelea.
yo: Ó tún rọ àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ láti ṣe àmúlò àǹfààní ayélujára ọ̀fẹ́ ní inú ọgbà, tí ó sì tún ṣe àfikún pé ayélujára kò ní ọrọ̀ ajẹmẹ́kọ̀ọ́wé nìkan ṣùgbọ́n ó tún ń ṣí ojú àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ sí àwọn ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe amáyérọrùn tí ó pọ̀, èyí tí yóò ró wọn lágbára títí ẹ̀kọ́ wọn àti lẹ́yìnwá.
zu: Uphinde wakhuthaza abafundi ukuthi basebenzise i-internet yamahhala esikhungweni, wengeza ngokuthi i-inthanethi ayigcini nje ngokucebisa ezifundweni kodwa iphinde yenze bafundi bathole izinhlobonhlobo zamakhono empilo, ibanike amandla kulo lonke uhambo lwabo lokufunda nangale kwalokho.

am: የላባኢንተርኔትን ጥልቅ ተፅዕኖ በድጋሚ ሲያረጋግጥ፣"ይህ ፕሮግራም በተለይ በናይጀሪያ ተማሪዎች ህይወት ላይ ከፍተኛ ተፅዕኖ ለማሳረፍ የታለመ ነው" ሲሉ ንኖዲም ገልፀዋል። ለ400,000 የናይጄሪያ ተማሪዎች በየቀኑ መሰረት ነፃ ኢንተርኔት እንዲያገኙ ለማድረግ የታቀደ ነው፤ ይህ የልጃገረዷ መንኮራኩር እና በአንድ ቦታ ብቻ ነው፤ ወደ ሌሎች ዩኒቨርስቲዎች ለማስፋፋት አስበናል።
en: Reaffirming the profound impact of Feather Internet, Nnodim expressed, “This programme is specifically targeted to have a high-level impact in the lives of Nigerian students.” “It is aimed at giving 400,000 Nigerian students access to free internet on daily bases; this is the maiden launch and just in one location; we intend to extend it to other Universities.
ha: Don tabbatar da amfanin Intanet mai Fukafuki, Nnodim ya bayyana, “wannan shirin an tsara shi ne kawai don ya samar da amfani mai yawa a rayuwar ɗaliban Nijeriya.” An yi shi ne da manufar ba wa ɗalibai 400,000 damar amfani da yanar gizo ta kyauta a kowacce rana; wannan shi ne ƙaddamarwar farko kuma a waje ɗaya kawai, muna da niyyar kai wa wasu jami’o’in.
sw: Akithibitisha tena athari kubwa ya Feather Internet, Nnodim alieleza kuwa, program hii inalenga mahususi kuwa na athari ya hali ya juu katika maisha ya wanafunzi wa Nigeria, inayolenga kuwapa wanafunzi 400,000 wa Nigeria fursa ya kupata mtandao bila malipo kwenye misingi ya kila kitu siku:.
yo: Nígbà tí ó ń ṣe ìtẹnumọ́ ipa pàtàkì tí Feather Internet ní, Nnodim wí pé, "Ètò yìí ní àfojúsùn láti ní ipa ńlá ní ayé àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ilẹ̀ Nigeria ní pàtó." "Ó ní àfojúsùn láti fún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ilẹ̀ Nigeria 400,000 ní àyè sí ayélujára ọ̀fẹ́ ní ojoojúmọ́; ìfilọ́lẹ̀ àkọ́ṣe ni èyí àti pé ibì kan ni; à ń gbèrò láti mú u lọ sí àwọn Fásitì mìíràn.
zu: Eqinisekisa umthelela omkhulu we-Feather Internet, uNnodim uzwakalise ukuthi, “Lolu hlelo luqondiswe ngqo ukuba nomthelela osezingeni eliphezulu ezimpilweni zabafundi baseNigeria.” “Kuhloswe ngayo ukunikeza abafundi baseNigeria abangama-400,000 ukuba bathole i-inthanethi yamahhala nsuku zonke; lokhu ukwethulwa kwezintombi futhi endaweni eyodwa nje; sihlose ukuwenabela nakwamanye amaNyuvesi.

am: ዋናው ቁም ነገር ተማሪዎች ለትምህርት፣ ለምርምር እና ፍላጎት ያላቸውን ማንኛውንም ዕውቀት እንዲያገኙ ለማድረግ የኢንተርኔት አገልግሎት እንዲያገኙ ማድረግ ነው።"
en: The essence is to ensure that students have access to the internet for their academic pursuit, for research and to enable them to have access to any knowledge they have interest in.”
ha: Manufar ita ce a tabbatar da cewa ɗalibai sun samu damar shiga yanar gizo domin neman iliminsu, domin bincike sannan kuma ya ba su damar samun kowanne irin ilimi suke da ra’ayi.”
sw: kiini ni kuhakikisha kwamba, wanafunzi wanapopata mtandao kwa ajiri ya shughuli zao za masomo, kwa ajiri ya utafiti na kuwawezesha kupata maarifa yoyote wanayohitaji
yo: Pàtàkì rẹ̀ ni láti ṣe àrídájú pé àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ráàyè sí ayélujára fún ètò ẹ̀kọ́ wọn, fún ìṣèwádìí kí wọ́n sì tún lè rí àyè sí èyíkéyìí ìmọ̀ tí wọ́n bá nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí."
zu: Okubalulekile wukuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi bayayithola i-inthanethi ukuze benze izifundo zabo, benze ucwaningo futhi bakwazi ukufinyelela kunoma yiluphi ulwazi abaluthandayo.”

am: ከስሙ ጀርባ ያለውን ሃሳብ ሲያስረግጥ፣ የኩባንያው ማጅስቲክ ሬቨን የሆነው የቁራ ላባ ስሙን እንደ በደለ ጠቆሙ።
en: Addressing the idea behind the name, he pointed out that the feathers of the majestic raven, the company’s mascot, birthed the name.
ha: Yayin bayani game da tunanin da ke da alaƙa da sunan, ya nuna cewa fukafukan hankaka mai girman gaske, sa’ar kamfanin, shi ya haifar da sunan.
sw: Akizungumzia wazo lililo nyuma ya jina hilo, alisema kwamba manyoya ya kunguru mkubwa, Mascot wa hiyo kampuni, ndiyo yaliyotoa hilo jina.
yo: Bí ó ṣe ń sọ èrò tí wọ́n ní lọ́kàn lórí orúkọ náà, ó tọ́ka pé ìyẹ́ ẹyẹ ìwò aládé orí igi, èlò aṣèdámọ̀ ilé-iṣẹ́ náà, ni ó mú orúkọ náà wáyé.
zu: Ekhuluma ngombono waleli gama, waveza ukuthi izimpaphe zegwababa elikhulu, okuyisilwane esimele inkampani, zaqamba leli gama.

am: ቡድኑ በክንፎቹ ፈጣንነት በመነሳሳት ከዳር እስከ ዳር ያለውን ድረ ገጽ ስም በመሰየም ከላባዎቹ በኋላ በዲጂታል አማካኝነት እርስ በርስ የሚገናኝበትን መንገድ እንደገና ይለዋውጠዋል።
en: Inspired by the swiftness of its wings, the team named the network transcending borders, redefining digital interaction after its feathers.
ha: Koyi da saurin fukafukansa, ƙungiyar suka sanyawa hanyar sadarwar ƙetare iyakoki, don sauya hadahadar fasahar zamani tayi sauri la'akari da fukafukansa.
sw: ikihamashishwa na wepesi wa mbawa zake, timu iliuita mtandao unaovuka mipaka, ikifafanua upya mwingiliano wa kidijitali baada ya manyoya yake.
yo: Bí àwọn ìyẹ́ apá rẹ̀ ṣe ti yára tó ni ó wú ìgbìmọ̀ náà lórí láti fi àwọn ìyẹ́ rẹ̀ fún ìtakùn tí ó kọjá àwọn ìpínlẹ̀, èyí tí yóò ṣe àtúnṣe ìbáṣepọ̀ orí ẹ̀rọ ní orúkọ.
zu: Ligqugquzelwa ukushesha kwamaphiko alo, ithimba laqamba inethiwekhi eyeqa imingcele, lichaza kabusha ukusebenzisana kwedijithali ngezimpaphe zayo.

am: ስለ ሬቨን ባንክ ተለዋዋጭ የላባ ኢንተርኔት ፕሮግራም ተጨማሪ መረጃ ለማግኘት እና የዚህ ታሪካዊ ጉዞ አካል ለመሆን፣ በሁሉም መድረኮች ላይ (@ዘሬቨንባንክ)@theravenbank ሬቨን ባንክ ን ይከተሉ።
en: To discover more about Raven Bank’s transformative Feather Internet Program and become part of this historic journey, follow Raven Bank on @theravenbank across all platforms.
ha: Domin samun ƙarin bayani game da Shirin Fukafuki na Intanet mai ilmantarwa da kuma zama wani ɓangare na wannan tafiya mai tarihi, ka bibiyi Raven Bank@theravenbank a dukkan manhajoji.
sw: ili kugundua zaidi kuhusu mpango wa mabadiliko wa Raven Bank Feather Internet na uwe sehemu ya safari hii ya kihistoria, fuata Raven Bank kwenye @theravenbank kwenye mifumo yote.
yo: Láti mọ̀ sí i nípa ètò aláyìídà Feather Internet ti Raven Bank kí o sì darapọ̀ mọ́ ìrìn-àjò olókìkí yìí, tẹ̀lé Raven Bank lórí @theravenbank káàkiri gbogbo àwọn ìkànnì.
zu: Ukuze uthole okwengeziwe ngohlelo lwe-inthanethi lwe-Raven Bank oluguqulayo futhi ube yingxenye yalolu hambo oluyingqophamlando, landela i-Raven Bank ku-@theravenbank kuzo zonke izinkundla.

am: ሬቨን ባንክ "ሬቨን" ወይም "አርኤምኤፍቢ" ከናይጄሪያ ጀምሮ ለአፍሪካውያን ፈጣን፣ አስተማማኝ እና አስተማማኝ የገንዘብ አገልግሎት የሚሰጥ ዲጂታል ባንክ ነው።
en: Raven Bank “Raven” or “RMFB” is a digital bank that provides fast, secure and reliable financial services to the African people starting from Nigeria.
ha: Bankin Raven ”Raven” ko “RMFB” banki ne na zamani da yake samar da ayyukan hada-hadar kuɗi cikin sauri, aminci da kuma dogaro ga mutanen Afirka farawa daga Nijeriya.
sw: Benki ya Ravenni benki ya kidijitali ambayo hutoa huduma za kifedha za haraka, salama na za kutegemewa kwa watu wa Afrika kuanzia Nigeria.
yo: Raven Bank "Raven" àbí "RMFB" jẹ́ báǹkì orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára tí ó ń pèsè ètò owó tí ó yára, tí ó ní ààbò tí ó sì ṣe é fọkàn tán fún àwọn èèyàn ilẹ̀ Africa bẹ̀rẹ̀ láti Nigeria.
zu: I-Raven Bank “iRaven” noma “i-RMFB” iyibhange ledijithali elihlinzeka ngezinsizakalo zezezimali ezisheshayo, ezivikelekile nezithembekile kubantu base-Afrika kusukela eNigeria.

am: የህዝብ ባንክ ኦፍ አፍሪካ - ሬቨን ባንክ በራዕዩ ላባ ኢንተርኔት ፕሮግራሙ አማካኝነት አገናኝና ትምህርትን እንደገና ለመግለፅ ቁርጠኛ የሆነ አዲስ ነገር በግንባር ቀደምትነት ይቆማል።
en: The “People’s Bank of Africa” - Raven Bank stands at the forefront of innovation, committed to redefining connectivity and education through its visionary Feather Internet Program.
ha: “People’s of bank ofa Afirka” – Bankin Raven ya kasance a sahun farko na ƙirƙira, wanda ya dage wajen tabbatar da haɗuwa da kuma ilimantuwa ta hanayar hangensu na Feather Internet Program.
sw: The People Bank, Bank of Africa-Raven Bank ipo mstari wa mbele katika uvumbuzi, iliyojitolea kufafanua upya muunganisho na elimu kupitia Mpango wake wenye maono wa Feathe Internet.
yo: "Báǹkì àwọn Èèyàn ilẹ̀ Africa" - Raven Bank jẹ́ aṣáájú ọgbọ́n àtinúdá, wọ́n ní ìfarajìn láti mú àtúnṣe bá ìṣàsopọ̀ àti ẹ̀kọ́ látààrí Ètò Feather Internet onírànran rẹ̀.
zu: I-“People’s Bank of Africa” - Ibhange iRaven lihamba phambili ekusunguleni izinto ezintsha, lizibophezele ekuchazeni kabusha ukuxhumana nemfundo ngohlelo lwayo lwe-Feather Internet olunombono.

am: ሬቨን ባንክ ተማሪዎችን ሀይል ለመስጠት እና የዲጂታል ክፍፍልን ለመፍታት የማይናወጥ ውሳኔ በማድረግ፣ ቴክኖሎጂ ሕይወትን የሚያበለጽግበት እና ህልሞችን የሚያቀጣጠልበት አለም በዓይነ ሕሊናው ይታየዋል።
en: With an unwavering dedication to empowering students and bridging the digital divide, Raven Bank envisions a world where technology enriches lives and fuels dreams.
ha: Tare da cikakken mayar da hankali wajen tallafawa ɗalibai da kuma daidaita rabuwar fasahar zamani, Raven Bank yana hango wata duniya da fasaha ke azurta rayuka da kuma tabbatar da mafarkai.
sw: kwa kujitolea bila kuyumbayumba katika kuwawezesha wanafunzi na kurekebisha mgawanyiko wa kidijitali, Benki ya Raven inatazamia ulimwengu ambao teknolojia inaboresha maisha na kuchochea ndoto.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ìfarajìn aláìmikàn sí ṣíṣe ìrónilágbára fún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti láti dí ààfo ẹ̀kọ́ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ, Raven Bank níran ayé níbi tí ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ti ń mú ayé dẹrùn tí ó sì ń koná mọ́ àlá àwọn èèyàn.
zu: Ngokuzinikezela okungaguquki ekunikezeni abafundi amandla kanye nokuvala ukuhlukana kwedijithali, iRaven Bank ibona umhlaba lapho ubuchwepheshe bucebisa khona izimpilo futhi buqhubekisela phambili amaphupho.

zu: Owinile Kwisakhiwo Somkhiqizo/Imidiya Nogesi Wasekhaya

am: ኢንፊኒክስ ኖት 30 ስማርት ስልክ በተንቀሳቃሽ ስልክ አውታረ መረቦች ላይ እንዲሠራ የተቀየሰ ሞባይል ስልክ ነው። የጠቅላላው ስልክ ቅርጽ ጠፍጣፋ እና ቀላል ነው። እና ሁለት የተለያዩ ቁሳቁሶች፣ ብርጭቆ እና ተራ ቆዳ የባትሪ ሽፋን ዲዛይን አለው።
en: The Infinix NOTE 30 smartphone is a mobile phone designed to run on cellular networks.The shape of the whole phone is flat and simple.And it has a battery cover design of two different materials, glass and plain leather.
ha: Wayar zamani ta Infinix NOTE 30 wayar hannu ce da aka ƙera ta domin tafiya a kan hanyar sadarwar salula. Ƙirar wayar gaba ɗayanta a shafe take kuma sauƙakaƙƙiya. Kuma tana ƙirar batir mai rufewa mai kayayyaki iri biyu, gilashi da fata mara zane.
sw: Simu mahiri (simu janja) ya Infinix NOTE 30 ni simu ya rununu iliyotengenezwa kwa kutumia mitandao ya simu, umbo la simu nzima ni bapa na rahisi, na ina muundo wa kifuniko cha betry cha nyenzo mbili tofauti, kioo na ngozi ya kawaida.
yo: Fóònù alágbèéká ayárabíàṣá Infinix NOTE 30 jẹ́ fóònù alágbèéká tí wọ́n ṣe ẹ̀yà iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ láti máa ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú àwọn ìtakùn alágbèéká. Ìrísí fóònù náà pẹlẹbẹ, kò sì pariwo. Ó tún ní aṣààbò fún bátírì tí wọ́n fi ohun èlò méjì ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ ṣe ẹ̀yà iṣẹ́ rẹ̀, ìyẹn gílàsì àti awọ lásán.
zu: Isimathifoni se-Infinix NOTE 30 iyiselula eklanyelwe ukusebenza kunethiwekhi yeselula.Umumo wayo yonke ifoni uyisicaba futhi ulula.Futhi inomklamo wekhava yebhethri yezinto ezimbili ezihlukene, ingilazi nesikhumba esingenalutho.

am: ግሎቮ ጁሚያ ፉድ፣ ቦልት ፉድ እና ሌሎችንም በማሸነፍ በናይጄሪያ የዶሮ ሪፐብሊክ የአቅርቦት አጋር ሆኗል
en: Glovo beats Jumia Food, Bolt Food, others to become one of Chicken Republic's delivery partners in Nigeria
ha: Glovo sun wuce Jumia food, Bolt food, da sauransu domin zama ɗaya daga cikin abokan hulɗar kai saƙon Chicken Republic a Nageriya.
sw: Glovo yashinda Jumia Food, Bolt Food na wengine kuwa mmoja wa washirika wa utoaji wa kuku wa Chicken Republic nchini Nigeria.
yo: Glovo na Jumia Food, Bolt Food àti àwọn mìíràn láti di ọ̀kan nínú àwọn alábàáṣe ìfọjàjíṣẹ́ fún Chicken Republic ní Nigeria
zu: I-Glovo yehlula i-Jumia Food, i-Bolt Food, abanye ukuba ngomunye wabalingani be-Chicken Republic eNigeria

am: ግሎቮ ዛሬ በናይጄሪያ ውስጥ የዶሮ ሪፐብሊክ ማቅረቢያ አጋሮች አንዱ እንዲሆን የሚያደርገውን አጋርነት አስታውቋል።
en: Glovo has today announced a partnership that will see it become one of Chicken Republic's delivery partners in Nigeria.
ha: Glavo a yau ya bayyana hadin guiwa wanda zai sanya ya zamanto ɗaya daga cikin abokan hulɗar kai saƙo na Chicken Republic a Nijeriya.
sw: Glovo leo imetangaza ushirikiano ambao utaifanya kuwa mmoja wa washirika wa utoaji wa Chicken Republic nchini Nigeria.
yo: Glovo ti kéde ìbáṣepọ̀ tí yóò sọ ọ́ di ọ̀kan nínú àwọn alábàáṣe ìfọjàjíṣẹ́ fún Chicken Republic ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria lónìí.
zu: I-Glovo namuhla imemezele ubudlelwano obuzokwenza ukuthi ibe ngomunye wabalingani bokulethwa kwe-Chicken Republic eNigeria.

am: በነሐሴ ወር የተጀመረው አጋርነት የዶሮ ሪፐብሊክ ከግሎቮ ጋር አብሮ በመስራት ከጁሚያ ፉድ እና ከቦልት ፉድ ጋር ያለውን አጋርነት ያበቃል።
en: The partnership, which began in August, will see Chicken Republic work with Glovo, ending partnerships with Jumia Food and Bolt Food.
ha: Hadin guiwar, wadda ta fara a Agusta, zai tabbatar da aikin Chicken Republic da Glovo, wanda zai kawo karshen hulɗar Jumia Food da kuma Bolt Food.
sw: Ushirikiano huo uliyoanza Agosti, utaifanya Chicken Republic kufanya kazi na Glovo, na kusitisha ushirikiano na Jumia Food na Bolt Food.
yo: Ìbáṣepọ̀ náà, tí ó bẹ̀rẹ̀ ní oṣù Kẹjọ, yóò mú Chicken Republic máa ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú Glovo, tí yóò mú ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú Jumia Food àti Bolt Food wá sí òpin.
zu: Ubambiswano, oluqale ngoNcwaba, luzobona i-Chicken Republic isebenza ne-=Glovo, iqeda ubudlelwano ne-Jumia Food kanye ne-Bolt Food.

am: በተጨማሪም አጋርነቱ ሁለቱ ኩባንያዎች ቀድሞውኑ በሚንቀሳቀሱበት ጋና ሊስፋፋ ይችላል።
en: Furthermore, the partnership could be extended to Ghana, where both companies already operate.
ha: Hari la yau, za a iya fadada hulɗar zuwa Ghana, inda dukkan kamfanunuwan suke aiki.
sw: Zaidi ya hayo, ushirikiano huo unaweza kuendelezwa hadi Ghana, ambako makampuni yote mawili tayari yanafanya kazi.
yo: Ní àfikún, ìbáṣepọ̀ náà lè tún ràn dé Ghana, níbi tí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ méjéèjì ti ń ṣiṣẹ́.
zu: Ngaphezu kwalokho, ubudlelwano bungasatshalaliswa eGhana, lapho zombili izinkampani sezivele zisebenza khona.

am: በናይጄሪያ ግሎቮ በአሁኑ ወቅት በሌጎስ፣ በኢባዳን እና በአቡጃ ውስጥ የሚሠራ ሲሆን ከ 58 የዶሮ ሪፐብሊክ ሱቆች ጋር ይሠራል።
en: In Nigeria, Glovo currently operates in Lagos, Ibadan, and Abuja, where it works with 58 Chicken Republic outlets.
ha: A Nageriya, Glovo a yanzu tana aiki a Lagos, Ibadan, da Abuja, inda suke aiki da rassan Chicken Republic guda 58.
sw: Nchini Nigeria, Glovo kwa sasa inafanya kazi Lagos, Ibandan na Abuja ambako inafanya kazi na maduka 58 ya Chicken Republic.
yo: Ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria, Glovo ń ṣiṣẹ́ ní ìlú Èkó, Ìbàdàn àti Abuja lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́, níbi tí ó ti ń ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹ̀ka Chicken Republic 58.
zu: ENigeria, i-Glovo njengamanje isebenza eLagos, Ibadan, nase-Abuja, lapho isebenza khona nezitolo ezingama-58 ze-Chicken Republic.

am: በሌላ በኩል ደግሞ የዶሮ ሪፐብሊክ በመላው ናይጄሪያ ከ 300 በላይ ሱቆችን ይሠራል፣ እናም ይህ አጋርነት ለግሎቮ በመላው ናይጄሪያ መስፋፋት ቅድመ ሁኔታ ነው ወይ የሚል ጥያቄ ይነሣል።
en: On the other hand, Chicken Republic operates over 300 outlets across Nigeria, and one wonders if this partnership is a precursor to Glovo's expansion across Nigeria.
ha: A wani ɓangaren, Chicken Republic tana aiki a rassa fiye da 300 a Nijeriya, kuma wani yana zaton cewa wannan hulɗar itace jagoran fadadar Glovo a Nijeriya.
sw: kwa upande mwingine, Chicken Republic inaendesha zaidi ya maduka 300 kote Nigeria, na mtu anashangaa kama ushirikiano huu ni utangulizi wa Glovo nchini Nigeria.
yo: Ní ìdàkejì, Chicken Republic ń ṣiṣẹ́ ní àwọn ẹ̀ka tí ó lé ní 300 jákèjádò orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria, tí èèyàn yóò sì máa ṣe ààhin pé bóyá ìbáṣepọ̀ yìí ni ó fa ìmúgbòòrò tí Glovo ṣe káàkiri Nigeria.
zu: Ngakolunye uhlangothi, iChicken Republic isebenza ngezitolo ezingaphezu kwama-300 kulo lonke elaseNigeria, futhi umuntu uyazibuza ukuthi ingabe lobu budlelwano buyisandulela sokwanda kwe-Glovo yonkana eNigeria.

am: ሆኖም የግሎቮ ሥራ አስፈጻሚዎች በሌጎስ፣ ኢባዳን እና አቡጃ ላይ ለማተኮር ያላቸውን ፍላጐት በተከታታይ አጠናክረዋል።
en: However, Glovo executives have consistently reinforced their desire to focus on Lagos, Ibadan, and Abuja.
ha: Duk da haka, shugabannin Glovo sau tari suna nuna ra’ayinsu na maida hankali a Legas, Ibadan, da Abuja.
sw: Hata hivyo, watendaji wa Glovo wanaongeza mara kwa mara hamu yao ya kuzingatia Lagos, Ibadan na Abuja.
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n, àwọn aláṣẹ ní Glovo ti ń ṣe àtẹ̀mọ́ ìfẹ́ tí wọ́n ní láti gbájú mọ́ ìlú Èkó, Ìbàdàn àti Abuja.
zu: Kodwa-ke, abaphathi be-Glovo bebelokhu beqinisa isifiso sabo sokugxila eLagos, e-Ibadan nase-Abuja.

am: የምግብ ጽንሰ-ሀሳቦች ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኮፊ አቡኑ አጋርነቱ የደንበኞቹን ተሞክሮ እንደሚያሻሽል እና አቅርቦቶችን እንደሚያሻሽል ተስፋ እንዳደረጉ ገልጸዋል፣ አዲስ የተሾሙት የግሎቮ ናይጄሪያ ዋና ሥራ አስኪያጅ ላሚዴ አኪኖላም በአጋርነት በመደሰታቸው ደስታቸውን ገልጸዋል።
en: Kofi Abunu, CEO of Food Concepts, expressed hope that the partnership will improve its customers' experience and improve deliveries, while Lamide Akinola, the newly appointed General Manager for Glovo Nigeria, also expressed delight at the partnership.
ha: Kofi Abunu, shugaban Food Concepts, yayi fatan hulɗar zata inganta kwarewar abokan ciniki da kuma inganta aikawa da saƙo, yayin da Lamide Akinola, sabon babban manajan da aka nada a Glovo Nigeria, shima ya bayyana farin ciki game da hulɗar.
sw: Kofi Abunu, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Food Concepts, alielezea matumaini kuwa ushirikiano huo utaboresha uzoefu wa wateja wake na kuboresha utoaji, wakati Lamide Akinola, Meneja Mkuu aliyeteuliwa hivi karibuni wa Glovo Nigeria, pia alielezea kufurahishwa na ushirikiano huo.
yo: Kofi Abunnu, Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Food Concepts fi ìrètí tí ó ní pé ìbáṣepọ̀ náà yóò mú ìrírí àwọn oníbàárà dára sí i hànde, tí yóò sì tún mú ìfọjàjíṣẹ́ dára sí i, nígbà ti Lamide Akinola, Adarí Ìṣàkóso tí wọ́n ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ yàn fún Glovo Nigeria náà fi ìdùnnú rẹ̀ nípa ìbáṣepọ̀ náà hàn.
zu: U-Kofi Abunu, oyi-CEO ye-Food Concepts, uzwakalise ukuthi unethemba lokuthi ukubambisana kuzothuthukisa ulwazi lwamakhasimende abo futhi kuthuthukise ukudiliva, kuyilapho u-Lamide Akinola, iMenenja-Jikelele esanda kuqokwa ye-Glovo Nigeria, naye ezwakalise ukujabula ngokubambisana.

am: በግንቦት 2022 ከቺከን ሪፐብሊክ ጋር ከመጀመሪያው ትብብራችን ጀምሮ ለደንበኞቻቸው ፈጣን እና የላቀ አገልግሎት የመስጠት ችሎታን አሳይተናል።
en: "Since our initial collaboration with Chicken Republic in May 2022, we have demonstrated the ability to provide a fast and superior service for their customers.
ha: “Tun hadin guiwar mu ta farko da Chicken Republic a Mayu 2022, mun nuna iyawarmu wajen samar da aiki mafi kyau kuma mai sauri ga abokan cinikin mu.
sw: "Tangu ushirikiano wetu wa awali na Chicken Republic mnamo Mei 2022, tumeonyesha uwezo wa kutoa huduma ya haraka na bora kwa wateja wao.
yo: "Láti ìgbà tí a ti kọ́kọ́ fọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ pẹ̀lú Chicken Republic ní oṣù Karùn-ún ọdún 2022, a ti ṣe àfihàn pé a ní ipá láti pèsè ìjíṣẹ́ tí ó yára kánkán tí ó sì tayọ fún àwọn oníbàárà wọn.
zu: “Kusukela ekusebenzisaneni kwethu okokuqala ne-Chicken Republic kuNhlaba wezi-2022, sikhombise amandla okuhlinzeka ngomsebenzi osheshayo nosezingeni eliphezulu kumakhasimende abo.

am: ስለሆነም፣ በናይጄሪያ መሪ የሆነው የዶሮ ሪፐብሊክ የእኛን ሙያዊ እውቀት በማወቁ እና በመምረጡ በጣም ኵራት ይሰማናል" ብለዋል አኪኖላ።
en: Thus, we are very proud that Chicken Republic, the leading QSR in Nigeria, has recognized our expertise and chosen us," Akinola said.
ha: Don haka, muna matukar alfahari cewa Chicken Republic, QSR maja gaba a Nijeriya sun fahimci kwarewarmu suka zabe mu,” Akinola ya fada.
sw: Kwa hiyo, tunajivunia kwamba Chicken Republic, QSR inayoongoza nchini Nigeria, imetambua utaalam wetu na kutuchagua" alisema Akinola.
yo: Nítorí náà, ohun ìwúrí ni ó jẹ́ fún wa pé Chicken Republic, adarí Ilé-ìtaúnjẹ Ayáraṣiṣẹ́ (IAs) ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria, ti mọ rírì ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe wa tí wọ́n sì yàn wá," Akinola dáhùn.
zu: Ngakho-ke, siyaziqhenya kakhulu ngokuthi iChicken Republic, i-QSR ehamba phambili eNigeria, ibubonile ubuchwepheshe bethu futhi yasikhetha, ”kusho u-Akinola.

am: ግሎቮ በ 2021 ወደ ናይጄሪያ ገበያ ከገባበት ጊዜ አንሥቶ በሚያገለግላቸው ከተሞች ውስጥ በማስታወቂያ ሰሌዳዎች አማካኝነት በጠንካራ የማስፋፊያ ግፊት ላይ ይገኛል።
en: Since getting into the Nigerian market in 2021, Glovo has been on an aggressive expansion push, with billboards across the cities it serves.
ha: Tun sanda suka shiga kasuwar Nijeriya a 2021, Glovo ta fadada sosai, tare da allaon hotuna a gaba ɗaya birnin da suke aiki.
sw: Tangu ilipoingia kwenye soko la Nigeria mwaka 2021, Glovo imekuwa katika msukumo mkali kwa upanuzi, kwa kubandika mabango kwenye miji inayohudumia.
yo: Láti ìgbà tí wọ́n ti wọ ọjà orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria ní ọdún 2021, Glovo ti ń tiraka gidigidi láti gbòòrò sí i, pẹ̀lú àwọn àwòrán ìpolówó káàkiri àwọn ìlú tí wọ́n ti ń ṣiṣẹ́.
zu: Selokhu yangena emakethe yaseNigeria ngo-2021, i-Glovo ibilokhu izama ukunweba, namabhodi ezikhangiso kuwo wonke amadolobha asebenzayo.

am: በግንቦት 2023 ጉብኝት ወቅት የግሎቮ ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ኦስካር ፒየር የኩባንያው ግብ በናይጄሪያ ፈጣን ንግድ ዘርፍ የበላይ ተጫዋች መሆን መሆኑን አስረድተዋል።
en: During a visit in May 2023, Glovo CEO, Oscar Pierre explained that the company's goal is to become a dominant player in Nigeria's quick commerce sector.
ha: Yayin kai ziyara a Mayu 2023, shugaban Glovo, Oscar Pierre yayi bayanin cewa manufar kamfanin shi ne zama masu damawa na dindindin a ɓangaren siye da siyarwa cikin sauri a Nageriya.
sw: Wakati wa ziara mnamo Mei 2023, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Glovo, Oscar Pierre alieleza kuwa lengo la kampuni hiyo ni kuwa muendeshaji mkuu katika sekta ya biashara ya haraka nchini Nigeria.
yo: Níbi àbẹ̀wò kan nínú oṣù Karùn-ún ọdún 2023 kan tí Oscar Pierre, ẹni tí ó jẹ́ Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Glovo, ṣe ni ó ti ṣe àlàyé pé ìlépa ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ni láti di ògbóǹtarìgì akópa ní ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ ayárafọjàjíṣẹ́ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria.
zu: Ngesikhathi sokuvakasha ngoNhlaba wezi-2023, i-CEO ye-Glovo, u-Oscar Pierre wachaza ukuthi inhloso yenkampani ukuba ngumdlali ovelele emkhakheni wezohwebo osheshayo waseNigeria.

am: ግሎቮ ናይጄሪያ በሀገሪቱ ውስጥ ከ1,000 በላይ ፖስታ መላኪያዎችን እና ወደ 50 የሚጠጉ ሠራተኞችን ቀድሞውኑ ይጠቀማል።
en: Already, Glovo Nigeria employs more than 1,000 couriers and about 50 employees in the country.
ha: Tuni, Glova Nijeriya ta ɗauki ma’aikatan kai saƙo fiye da 1,000 da kuma ma’aikata kusan 50 a Nijeriya.
sw: Tayari, Glovo nchini Nigeria inaajiri zaidi ya wasafirishaji 1,000 na takribani wafanyakazi 50 nchini humo.
yo: Ní báyìí, Glovo Nigeria ti gba àwọn afọjàjíṣẹ́ tí ó lé ní 1000 àti àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ bí i 50 ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà.
zu: Kakade, i-Glovo Nigeria iqashe abathumeli bezincwadi abangaphezu kuka-1,000 kanye nezisebenzi ezingaba ngu-50 ezweni.

am: በተጨማሪም፣ ፒየር የኩባንያው ዋነኛ ዓላማ የደንበኞችን ቍጥር ማሳደግ እና አገልግሎቱን ማሻሻል መሆኑን ቢያስረዳም ጅማሬው በናይጄሪያ ከ 3 ሚሊዮን ዶላር በላይ እንዳወጣ ገልጧል።
en: Additionally, Pierre disclosed that the startup has spent more than $3 million in Nigeria, even as he explained that the company's primary goal is to increase its customer base and improve its services.
ha: Kari a kan haka, Pierre ya bayyana cewar startsup sun kashe fiye da miliyan $3 a Nijeriya, duk da ya bayyana cewa burin kamfanin na farko shi ne kara mahallin abokan cinikinsu da kuma inganta aikinsu.
sw: Zaidi ya hayo, Pierre alielezea kuwa kampuni hiyo imetumia zaidi ya dola milioni 3 nchini Nigeria, hata alivyoeleza kuwa lengo la kuu la kampuni hiyo ni kuongeza wateja wake na kuboresha huduma zake.
yo: Ní àfikún, Pierre ṣe àfihàn pé ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ náà ti ná owó tí ó ju mílíọ̀nù $3 lọ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria, kódà bí ó tún ti ṣe ń ṣe àlàyé pé ìlépa àkọ́kọ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ni láti ní àwọn oníbàárà tí ó pọ̀ sí i kí ó sì tún mú àwọn iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ dára sí i.
zu: Ukwengeza, uPierre udalule ukuthi ukuqalisa kusebenzise imali engaphezu kwezigidi ezintathu zamaRandi eNigeria, njengoba achaza ukuthi inhloso eyinhloko yenkampani ukukhulisa isisekelo samakhasimende nokuthuthukisa izinsizakalo zayo.

am: የግሎቮ ናይጄሪያ የሀገር ሥራ አስኪያጅ የአሰራር ወጪዎች ቢጨምሩም በጥያቄ አቅርቦት ላይ ያለው ፍላጐት እንደሚቀጥል ይጠብቃሉ።
en: Glovo Nigeria's country manager expects the demand for on-demand delivery to continue despite increased operating costs
ha: Manajan kasa na Glovo Nigeria yana son buƙatar kai saƙo yayin da aka nema ya cigaba duk da ƙarin kuɗin aiwatarwa.
sw: Meneja wa Glovo nchini Nigeria, anatarajia mahitaji ya uwasilishaji unaotarajia kuendelea licha ya kuongezeka kwa gharama za uendeshaji
yo: Olùṣàkóso ẹ̀ka orílẹ̀-èdè ti Glovo Nigeria ní ìrètí pé ìbéèrè fún ìfọjàjíṣẹ́ ní kíákíá yóò túbọ̀ wà bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé owó ìṣètò iṣẹ́ pọ̀ gan.
zu: Umphathi wezwe lase-Glovo Nigeria ulindele ukuthi isidingo sokulethwa okudingekayo siqhubeke naphezu kokukhuphuka kwezindleko zokusebenza

am: ኤክስ( የቀድሞው ትዊተር) የሕግ ክፍያዎችህን ለመሸፈን ይፈልጋል
en: X (formerly Twitter) wants to take care of your legal fees
ha: X (wadda a da take Twitter) tana son kula da kuɗin shari’arku.
sw: Mtandao wa X (zamani Twitter) unataka kulipia ada zako za kisheria
yo: X (ń jẹ́ Twitter tẹ́lẹ̀) fẹ́ bá ọ yanjú owó iṣẹ́ amòfin rẹ̀
zu: U-X (owayekade engu-Twitter) ufuna ukukhoka izimali zakho zezomthetho

am: የቦሱን ቲጃኒ ሚኒስትር ሹመት ዜና ሲወጣ የናይጄሪያ የቴክኖሎጂ ምህዳር በደስታ ተሞልቷል።
en: When news about Bosun Tijani's ministerial nomination broke, Nigeria's tech ecosystem was filled with excitement.
ha: Yayin da labarin shigar sunan Tijani Bosun cikin wanda za a zaɓa a jerin minisitoci ya bayyana, tsarin mahallin fasaha na Nijeriya ya cika da murna.
sw: Wakati habari kuhusu uteuzi wa waziri wa Bosun Tijani ziliposambaa, mfumo wa kiteknolojia wa Nigeria ulijawa na msisimko.
yo: Nígbà tí ìròyìn ìfàkalẹ̀ Bosun Tijani fún ipò mínísítà tán kiri, ìdùnnú gbalẹ̀ ní àyè iṣẹ́ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria.
zu: Ngesikhathi kuvela izindaba zokuqokwa kuka-Bosun Tijani njengongqongqoshe, i-tech ecosystem yaseNigeria yajabula kakhulu.

am: የናይጄሪያ ትልቁ የቴክኖሎጂ ማዕከል የሆነው የቲጃኒ ሲሲኅብ በሀገሪቱ ውስጥ ካሉ ትላልቅ የቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያዎች መካከል አንዳንዶቹን በመፍጠር ረገድ ትልቅ ሚና ተጫውቷል።
en: Tijani's CcHub, Nigeria's largest tech hub, played a major role in birthing some of the country's biggest tech companies from its humble beginnings in Yaba, Lagos.
ha: Tijani CcHub, cibiya na fasaha mafi girma a Nijeriya, sun taka mahimmiyar rawa wajen samar da wasu kamfanonin fasaha mafi girma na kasar daga fawararsu a hankali a Yaba, Legas.
sw: CcHub ya Tijani, kitovu kikubwa zaidi cha teknolojia nchini Nigeria, kilichukua jukumu kubwa katika kuzaa baadhi ya makampuni makubwa zaidi ya kiteknolojia nchini kutoka mwanzo wake duni huko Yaba, Lagos.
yo: CcHub, ibùdó iṣẹ́ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tí ó tóbi jùlọ ní ilẹ̀ Nigeria tí Tijani bẹ̀rẹ̀ ní Yaba, ìlú Èkó ni ó ti kó ipa ribiribi nínú ìṣàgbédìde àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ńláńlá ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà.
zu: I-CcHub ka-Tijani, isikhungo sezobuchwepheshe esikhulu kunazo zonke e-Nigeria, sibambe iqhaza elikhulu ekukhiqizeni izinkampani ezinkulu zezwe kusukela ekuqaleni kwayo eYaba, eLagos.

am: እንደ ቲጃኒ ያለ አንድ ሰው የሥነ-ምህዳሩን ሚንስትር ደረጃ የሚወክል መሆኑ በቦታው ውስጥ ያሉ ባለድርሻ አካላትን ችግር ስለሚረዳ ትርጕም ይሰጣል።
en: Having someone like Tijani represent the ecosystem at a ministerial level makes sense as he understands the plight of stakeholders in the space.
ha: Samun wani kamar Tijani ya jagoranci yanayin mahalli a matsayi na minister yayi ma’ana sosai saboda ya fahimci matsalolin masu madafun iko a mahallin.
sw: kuwa na mtu kama Tijani kuwasilisha mfumo wa ikolojia katika ngazi ya mawaziri inaleta maana kwani anaelewa masaibu ya wadau katika nafasi hiyo.
yo: Níní irú èèyàn bí i Tijani tí ó ń ṣojú àwùjọ náà ní ipò ti mínísítà mú ọpọlọ dání nítorí ó mọ tìfuntẹ̀dọ̀ ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ tí àwọn òpómúléró ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ náà ń kojú.
zu: Ukuba nomuntu onjengoTijani omele i-ecosystem ezingeni longqongqoshe kunomqondo ophusile njengoba eqonda usizi lwababambe iqhaza kulomkhakha.

am: ይሁን እንጂ በ ኤክስ( የቀድሞው ትዊተር) ላይ ስለ ናይጄሪያ ባሰፈረው ጽሑፍ ምክንያት ሹመቱ በሀገር ወዳድነት ላይ የተመሰረተ ነው በሚሉ ወገኖች ጥያቄ ውስጥ ገብቷል።
en: His nomination, however, has been called into question by those who regard him as unpatriotic based on a post he made about Nigeria on X (formerly Twitter).
ha: Zaɓarsa da aka yi, duk da haka, ya janyo alamar tambaya ga wanda suke ganinsa a matsayin mara kishin kasa dalilin wani saƙo da ya tura akan Nijeriya a X(wadda aka fi sani da Twitter a da).
sw: Uteuzi wake, hata hivyo, umetiliwa shaka na wale wanaomwona kuwa hana uzalendo kulingana na chapisho alilotoa kuhusu Nigeria kwenye mtandao wa X (zamani Twitter).
yo: Sùgbọ́n àwọn kan tí wọ́n wí pé kò nífẹ̀ẹ́ ìlú rẹ̀ látààrí ìfiléde kan tí ó fi sí orí ìkànnì X (Twitter tẹ́lẹ̀) nípa orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria ni wọ́n ti ń ṣe iyèméjì lórí ìfàkalẹ̀ rẹ̀.
zu: Nokho ukuqokwa kwakhe sekuke kwaba nezinsolo ngabamthatha njengomuntu ongathandi izwe ngenxa yemibhalo ayibhale ngeNigeria ku-X (owayeyiTwitter).

am: ""ናይጄሪያ'' ከስምህ ጋር ለመያዝ እጅግ ውድ የሆነ መለያ ነው።
en: ""Nigeria" is a bloody expensive tag to have against your name.
ha: “Nijeriya” banzar alama ce da za ka samu game da sunanka.
sw: ""Nigeria" ni lebo ya bei ghali ya kumwaga damu dhidi ya jina lake.
yo: ""Nigeria" jẹ́ àmì ìdánimọ̀ tí ó burú jáì fún orúkọ èèyàn.
zu: Kuyinkinga ukuba igama lakho libandakanyeke "ne-Nigeria" .

am: ለአንድ ደቂቃ ሀገር ወዳድነትን ተው- ያ መለያ የኃይል ማባከን ነው።
en: Leave patriotism for a minute - that tag is a bloody waste of energy.
ha: A bar kishin ƙasa na ɗan lokaci – wannan alamar asarar banza ce ta kuzari.
sw: Acha uzalendo kwa dakika moja - kitambulisho hicho ni utezaji wa damu.
yo: Kí á pa ìfẹ́ ìlú tì fún ìṣẹ́jú kan ná - àmì ìdánimọ̀ yẹn jẹ́ ìfagbára ṣòfò gbáà.
zu: Khohla ukuthanda izwe umzuzwana - lokubandakanyeka kuwukumosha amandla nje.

am: ሁለተኛው የውጭ አገር ፓስፖርት" ኃጢአቱን" ለማጽዳት በቂ አይደለም።"
en: A second foreign passport isn't sufficient to clean the "sin."
ha: Fasfon wata kasa na biyu bai isa ya goge “zunubin” ba.
sw: Pasipoti ya pili ya kigeni haitoshi kusafishia "dhambi"
yo: Ìwé ìrìnnà kejì láti ìlú òkèèrè gan ò tilẹ̀ tó láti fọ "ẹ̀ṣẹ̀" náà mọ́.
zu: Iphasipothi yesibili yangaphandle ayanele ukususa "isono."

am: በሚኒስትራዊ ፍተሻው ወቅት ይቅርታ ጠይቆ እነዚህን ልጥፎች እንዲጽፍ ያደረጓቸውን ሁኔታዎች አብራርቷል።
en: He apologised during his ministerial screening and explained the circumstances that led to him making those posts.
ha: Ya bada haƙuri lokacin tantanceshi a minister ya kuma yi bayanin abin da ya sa shi tura wadancan saƙonnin.
sw: Aliomba radhi wakati wa mchujo wake wa uwaziri na kueleza mazingira yaliyompelekea kushika nyadhifa hizo.
yo: Ó tọrọ àforíjìn nígbà tí wọ́n ń ṣe àyẹ̀wò fún ipò mínísítà fún un tí ó sì ṣe àlàyé pé àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ní àsìkò náà ni ó mú òun ṣeàwọn ìfilède náà.
zu: Uxolisile ngesikhathi ehlolwa njengongqongqoshe wachaza nezimo eziholele ekutheni abhale ezikhundleni zokuxhumana.

am: እኔና የሥራ ባልደረቦቼ ተከራክረናል።
en: My colleagues and I have argued.
ha: Ni da abokan aikina munyi musu.
sw: Mimi na marafiki zangu tumebishana.
yo: Èmi àti àwọn akẹgbẹ́ mi ti jiyàn.
zu: Mina nozakwethu sike saxabana.

am: "የተሳሳተ ነገር ስላላደረገ ይቅርታ መጠየቅ አልነበረበትም።''
en: "He shouldn't have apologised because he did nothing wrong."
ha: “Bai kamata ya bada haƙuri ba saboda bai yi wani abu mara kyau ba.”
sw: "Hakupaswa kuomba msamaha kwa sababu hakufanya kosa lolote"
yo: "Kò yẹ kí ó tọrọ àforíjìn kankan nítorí kò ṣe nǹkankan tí kò dára."
zu: "Bekungamele axolise ngoba akonanga lutho."

am: "ሥራውን ከራስ ወዳድነቱ አስበልጦ ቢመለከት ይሻላል።''
en: "It's better for him to put his work above his ego."
ha: “Zai fi kyau ya sanya aikinsa saman girman kansa.”
sw: "ni bora kwake kuweka kazi yake juu ya ubinafsi wake"
yo: "Yóò dára fún un bí ó bá lè gbé iṣẹ́ gorí bí ó ṣe pàtàkì ara rẹ̀."
zu: "Kungcono abeke umsebenzi wakhe ngaphezu kokuzicabangela yena."

am: ቲጃኒ ብትሆን ኖሮ ምን ታደርግ ነበር?
en: What would you have done if you were Tijani?
ha: Me za ka yi idan kai ne Tijani?
sw: Ungekuwa Tijani ungefanya nini?
yo: Kínni o ò bá ti ṣe bí ó bá ṣe pé ìwọ ni Tijani?
zu: Wawungenzenjani ukube ubunguTijani?

am: ሰኞዎን በእነዚህ ታሪኰች ይጀምሩ:
en: Start your Monday with these stories:
ha: Ka fara Litinin dinka da waɗannan labaran:
sw: Anza jumatatu yako na hadithi hizi:
yo: Fi àwọn ìtàn wọ̀nyìí bẹ̀rẹ̀ ọjọ́ Ajé rẹ̀:
zu: Qala uMsombuluko wakho ngalezi zindaba:

am: የኤክስ እቅድ የሕግ ሂሳቦችዎን ለመሸፈን ነው
en: X's plan to cover your legal bills
ha: X tana shirin kula da kuɗin shari’arka
sw: Mpango wa X wa kulipia bili zako za kisheria
yo: Ètò tí X ní láti bá ọ yanjú owó iṣẹ́ amòfin rẹ̀
zu: Uhlelo luka-X lokumboza izikweletu zakho zezomthetho

am: ዌማ + ናይጄሪያ የቴክኖሎጂ ማዕከሎችን ይጀምራል
en: Wema + Nigeria to launch tech hubs
ha: Wema + Nijeriya zasu ƙaddamar da tech hubs
sw: Wema + Nigeria kuzindua vituo vya teknolojia
yo: Wema + Nigeria fẹ́ ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ àwọn ibùdó iṣẹ́ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ
zu: I-Wema + Nigeria izokwethula izindawo zobuchwepheshe

am: በቢግ ካባል ሚዲያ ውስጥ መቀነስ
en: Layoffs at Big Cabal Media
ha: Korar ma'aikata Big Cabal Media
sw: kuachishwa kazi katika Big Cable Media
yo: Àwọn Ìyọniníṣẹ́ ní Big Cabal Media
zu: Ukudilizwa emsebenzini kwe-Big Cabal Media

am: ኤክስ የሕግ ክፍያህን ይከፍልሃል ከሥራህ ብትባረር
en: X will take care of your legal fees if you're fired for your post
ha: X za ta kula da kuɗin shari’arka idan aka koreka saboda saƙon da ka wallafa
sw: X itashughulikia ada zako za kisheria ikiwa utafukuzwa kazi kutokana na chapisho lako
yo: X máa bá ọ yanjú owó iṣẹ́ amòfin rẹ̀ bí wọ́n bá lé ọ lẹ́nu iṣẹ́ fún ìfiléde rẹ
zu: U-X uzokhokhela izindleko zakho zezomthetho uma uxoshwa emsebenzini wakho

am: እሁድ፣ ነሐሴ 6 ቀን 2023 የኤክስ( ቀደም ሲል የትዊተር) አለቃ ኢሎን ማስክ" በዚህ መድረክ ላይ አንድ ነገር በመለጠፍ ወይም በመወደድ በአሠሪዎ ኢ-ፍትሃዊ በሆነ መንገድ ከተያዙ እኛ የሕግ ሂሳብዎን እንከፍላለን። ምንም ገደብ የለም.
en: On Sunday, August 6, 2023, X (previously Twitter) boss, Elon Musk, posted, "If you were unfairly treated by your employer due to posting or liking something on this platform, we will fund your legal bill. No limit.
ha: Ranar Lahadi, 6 ga Agusta, 2023, shugaban X (wadda ta kasance Twitter a da), Elon Musk, ya wallafa, “ idan wanda kakewa aiki yayi maka rashin kyautawa saboda abin da ka wallafa ko ka so wani abu a wannan manhajar, zamu biya kuɗin shari’arka . Ba kayyadewa.
sw: Mnamo jumapili, Agosti 6, 2023, mmiliki wa mtandao wa X (uliyokuwa Twitter awali), Elon Musk, alichapisha kuwa "ikiwa haukutendewa isivyo haki na muajiri wako kwa sababu ya kuchapisha au kupenda kitu kwenye jukwaa hili, tafadhali bili yako ya kisheria haina kikomo.
yo: Ní ọjọ́ Àìkú 6, oṣù Kẹjọ ọdún 2023 ní ọ̀gá ní X (Twitter tẹ́lẹ̀), ìyẹn Elon Musk fi léde pé, "Bí agbanisíṣẹ́ rẹ kò bá ṣe dáadáa sí ọ lẹ́nu iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ nítorí ìfiléde rẹ tàbí nítorí o fẹ́ràn nǹkan lórí ìkànnì yìí, a máa sanwó iṣẹ́ fún aṣojú òfin rẹ. Kò sí gbèdéke o.
zu: NgeSonto, zi-6 kuNcwaba wezi 2023, uMphathi we-X (owayekade engu-Twitter), u-Elon Musk, wabhala, "Uma umqashi wakho eye wakuphatha ngokungafanele ngenxa yokuthumela noma ukuthanda okuthile kule nkundla, sizokuxhasa ngokukhokhela isikweletu sakho sezomthetho. Akunamkhawulo.

am: እባካችሁ አሳውቁን።"
en: Please let us know."
ha: Muna son mu sani.”
sw: "Tafadhali tujulishe"
yo: Dákun jẹ́ kí á mọ̀."
zu: Ngicela usazise."

am: ኤክስ በዕዳ ተራራ ውስጥ አይደለምን?
en: Isn't X in a mountain of debt?
ha: Shin X ba tana cikin ɗimbin bashi ba ne?
sw: Je, X haipo katika mlima wa madeni?
yo: Ṣé kì í ṣe pé X wà nínú òbítíbitì gbèsè báyìí?
zu: Ingabe u-X akekho enkingeni yezikweletu?

am: ለዚህ ትዊተር ያደረኩት የመጀመሪያ ምላሽ" ሎል" የሚል ነበር፤ ምክንያቱም ይኸውልህ።
en: My first reaction to this tweet, I mean, post, was, "Lol" and here's why.
ha: Abin da na fara faɗa game da wannan saƙon, ina nufin wallafar, shi ne “lol” kuma ga dalili.
sw: Maoni yangu ya kwanza kwenye chapisho hili la Twitter, ninamaanisha, chapisho, lilikuwa "Lo!" na hii ndiyo sababu.
yo: Ìṣesí àkọ́kọ́ nígbà tí mo rí ìfiléde orí Twitter yìí, àbí ìfiléde náà ni "Ẹ̀rín àríntàkìtì", ìdí sì rè é.
zu: Ukusabela kwami ​​kokuqala kule-tweet, ngisho, okuthunyelwe, bekuwukuthi, "Lol" nayi imbangela.

am: ኤክስ በአሁኑ ወቅት በአሜሪካ ሳን ፍራንሲስኮ በሚገኘው ዋና መስሪያ ቤቱ ያልተከፈለ የቤት ኪራይ 136,250 ዶላር ዕዳ አለበት።
en: X is currently owing $136,250 in unpaid rent at its HQ in San Francisco, USA.
ha: A hanlin yanzu ana bin X $136,250 na kuɗin haya da ba su biya ba a HQ ɗinsu dake San Francisco, USA.
sw: Mtandao wa X kwa sasa unadaiwa $136.250 ya kodi ambayo haijalipwa kwenye makao makuu yake huko San Francisco, Marekani.
yo: X jẹ gbèsè owó àyè ilé-iṣẹ́ $136,250 ní olú-iléeṣẹ́ wọn tí ó wà ní San Fransisco, USA lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́.
zu: U-X okwamanje ukweleta u-$136,250 werenti engakhokhelwanga kuma-HQ ayo e-San Francisco, e-USA.

am: የኒው ዮርክ ታይምስ ዘገባ እንደሚያመለክተው ኤክስ ወጪን ለመቀነስ ሲባል በዓለም ዙሪያ በሚገኙ ቢሮዎቻቸው ውስጥ የቤት ኪራይ እየከፈለ አይደለም።
en: A report from the New York Times even indicates that X hasn't been paying rent in all its global offices as a cost-cutting measure.
ha: Wani rahoto daga jaridar New York Times ma ta nuna cewa X bata biyan kuɗin haya a dukkan ofisoshin sun a duniya a wani mataki na rage kashe kuɗi.
sw: Taarifa kutoka kwenye gazeti la New york Times inaonyesha kuwa, mtandao wa X huwa haulipi kodi kwenye ofisi zake zote za kimataifa kama hatua ya kupunguza gharama.
yo: Ìròyìn kan láti New York Times tilẹ̀ ń ṣàfihàn pé X ò san owó àyè ilé-iṣẹ́ ní gbogbo àwọn ọ́fíìsì tí ó ní káríayé gẹ́gẹ́ bí i ìgbésẹ̀ ìgèwónàá.
zu: Umbiko ovela ku-New York Times uze ubonise ukuthi u-X ubengakhokhi irenti kuwo wonke amahhovisi awo omhlaba njengendlela yokunciphisa izindleko zabo.

am: ይህ ብቻ አይደለም ኤክስ እና ሙስክ በአሁኑ ወቅት 14 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ያልተከፈሉ ሂሳቦችን በመጠየቅ ክስ እየቀረበባቸው ነው።
en: That's not all: X and Musk are currently facing lawsuits claiming $14 million in unpaid bills.
ha: Ba shikenan ba: X da Musk a halin yanzu suna fuskantar shari’a game da miliyan $14 na kudaden da basu biya ba.
sw: Siyo hayo peke yake: mtandao wa X na Musk wanakabiliwa na kesi ya madai ya $14 milioni za bili ambazo hazijalipwa.
yo: Ìyẹn nìkan kọ́: X àti Elon Musk ń kojú àwọn ẹjọ́ tí ó gbà tó gbèsè owó mílíọ̀nù $14 tí wọ́n kò tí ì san.
zu: Akugcini lapho: U-X noMusk njengamanje babhekene namacala okumangalela ama-dollar ayizigidi eziyi-14 ngezikweletu ezingakhokhiwe.

am: ያለምንም ክፍያ የተሰናበቱ ሠራተኞችም 500 ሚሊየን ዶላር እየጠየቁ ነው።
en: Employees fired without severance are also suing for $500 million.
ha: Ma’aikatan da aka kora ba tare da dalili ba suma sun kai kara suna neman miliyan $500.
sw: Wafanyakazi ambao walifukuzwa kazi bila malipo pia wanadai $5000 milioni.
yo: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ tí wọ́n lé lẹ́nu iṣẹ́ láì sí owó gbà-má-bínú fún ìtán-àdéhùn-iṣẹ́ náà ń pè wọ́n lẹ́jọ́ fún mílíọ̀nù $500.
zu: Abasebenzi abaxoshwe ngaphandle kokunikezwa izimali zabo nabo babavulela icala lezigidi ezingama- $500.

am: ዙም አውት፡ወደ ኋላ መለስ ብለን ስንመለከት ማስክ ያደረጋቸውን አንዳንድ ነገሮች ስንመለከት የእሱ ልጥፍ ግብዝነት ይመስላል።
en: Zoom out: Looking back at some of the things Musk has done, his post comes off as hypocritical.
ha: Zukowa waje: Dubawa baya zuwa ga wasu abubuwan da Musk yayi, saƙonnin da yake wallafawa suna zuwa kamar munafurci.
sw: Vuta: tukitangalia nyuma baadhi ya mambo ambayo Musk amefanya, chapisho lake alilochapisha ni la kinafiki.
yo: Kí á wò ó láti òkèèrè: Bí a bá bojú wẹ̀yìn wo díẹ̀ nínú àwọn nǹkan tí Musk ti ṣe, ìfiléde rẹ̀ jọ ti alábòsí.
zu: Hlehla: Uma ubheka emuva kwezinye zezinto uMusk azenzile, akubhalile kumveza njengomuntu ongenalo iqiniso.

am: በኖቬምበር 2022፣ ስለ ኤክስ ባወጣው የተሳሳተ ልኡክ ጽሑፍ ምክንያት ጠርቶት የነበረውን የኤክስ መሐንዲስ አባረረ።
en: In November 2022, he fired an X engineer who called him out for an erroneous post he made about X.
ha: A watan Numabba 2022, ya kori injiniyan X wanda ya yi masa magana game da wani saƙo mara kyau da ya yi game da X.
sw: Mnamo Novemba 2022, alimfukuza kazi mhandisi wa X ambaye alimwita atoke nje kwa chapisho lenye makosa alilotoa kuhusu X.
yo: Ní oṣù Kọkànlá ọdún 2022, ó lé onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ X kan tí ó pè é jáde fún ìfiléde aláṣìṣe kan tí ó ṣe nípa X dànù.
zu: NgoLwezi wezi-2022, waxosha unjiniyela we-X owamlungisa ngephutha alenza mayelana no-X.

am: በርካታ ሠራተኞችም ስለ ኤክስ የተሰጡትን የተሳሳቱ መግለጫዎች በማጋለጣቸው ስለመባረራቸው ጽፈዋል።
en: Several employees also made posts about being fired for exposing Musk's inaccurate statements about X.
ha: Ma’aikata da yawa sun wallafa saƙo game da korar su da aka yi saboda sun tona sirrin maganganun Musk na ƙarya game da X.
sw: Wafanyakazi kadhaa pia walichapisha machapisho kuhusu kufukuzwa kazi katika kufichua taarifa zisizo sahihi za Musk na mtandao wa X.
yo: Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ni wọ́n tún ṣe àwọn ìfiléde pé wọ́n lé àwọn dànù lẹ́nu iṣẹ́ nítorí wọ́n ṣe àfihàn àwọn gbólóhùn tí kò bára mu nípa X tí Musk sọ.
zu: Abasebenzi abaningana nabo babhala ngokuxoshwa kwabo ngokudalula izitatimende ezingalungile zikaMusk ngo-X.

am: እስቲ ቆም በል፣ልክ ጽሑፍ ከመጻፍህ በፊት አንድ ቀን እንደሚያባርርህ አስብ፣ ማስክ አንድ ቀን አንድ ነገር እንደሚናገር እና በሚቀጥለው ቀን ሃሳቡን እንደሚቀይር አስታውስ።
en: Wait: Before you make that post that could get you fired, remember Musk and how he says something one day and changes his mind the next.
ha: Dakata: Kafin ka wallafa wannan saƙon da zai iya sawa a kore ka, da tuna Musk da kuma yadda wata rana ya faɗi wani abu sannan kuma ya sauya ra’ayinsa daga baya.
sw: Subiri: kabla ya kuchapisha chapisho hilo ambalo linaweza kukufukuzisha kazi, kumbuka Musk na jinsi anavyosema jambo leo na kubadilisha mawaze yake kesho.
yo: Dúró: Kí o tó ṣe ìfiléde tí ó lè gba iṣẹ́ lọ́wọ́ rẹ yẹn, rántí Musk kí o sì rántí bí o ṣe máa ń sọ nǹkan ní ọjọ́ kan tí yóò sì yí ọkàn rẹ̀ padà ní ọjọ́ kejì.
zu: Linda: Ngaphambi kokuba ubhale okungase kukuxoshise, khumbula ukuthi ubani u-Musk nokuthi unokusho into ngolunye usuku bese eshintsha umqondo wakhe ngokulandelayo.

am: ቢግ ካባል ሚዲያ የሰራተኞችን ቍጥር በ19% ቀንሷል
en: Big Cabal Media reduces workforce by 19%
ha: Big Cabal Media sun rage yawan ma’aikata da kaso 19%
sw: Big Cable Media, yapunguza nguvu kazi kwa 19%
yo: Big Cabal Media dín àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ rẹ̀ kù pẹ̀lú 19%
zu: I-Big Cabal Media yehlisa abasebenzi ngo-19%

am: የቴክ ካባል፣ ዚኮኮ እና ሲቲዘን እናት ኩባንያ የሆነው ቢግ ካባል ሚዲያ" በከባድ የገበያ ሁኔታ" ምክንያት 19% ሠራተኞቹን አሰናበተ።
en: Big Cabal Media, the parent company of TechCabal, Zikoko and Citizen, has laid off 19% of its workforce due to "harsh market conditions."
ha: Big Cabal Media, iyayen kamfanin TechCabal, Zikoko da Citizen, sun rage %19 na ma’aikatansu saboda “tsananin yanayin kasuwa.”
sw: Big Cable Media, ni kampuni mama ya TechCable, Zikoko na Citizen, imepunguza 19% ya wafanyakazi wake kutokana na "hali ngumu ya soko"
yo: Big Cabal Media, ìyá ilé-iṣẹ́ fún TechCabal, Zikoko àti Citizen ti ní kí ìdá 19% àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ rẹ̀ ó máa lọ ilé wọn látààrí "ọjà tí kò rẹ́rìn-ín."
zu: IBig Cabal Media, okuyinkampani yeTechCabal, i-Zikoko ne-Citizen, ikhiphe u-19% wabasebenzi bayo ngenxa "yezimo ezibucayi zemakethe."

am: የቢግ ካባል ሚዲያ ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ቶሚቪያ አላዴኮሞ ለሠራተኞቹ ባስተላለፉት የውስጥ ማስታወሻ" የዛሬው ውሳኔ ደስ የሚል አይደለም፣ ነገር ግን እኛን ለቀው የሚሄዱ ሰዎች በሥራቸው እና ተፅዕኖቸው ሊኮሩ ይችላሉ።
en: In an internal memo to employees, Big Cabal Media CEO Tomiwa Aladekomo, said, "Today’s decision isn’t pleasant, but those leaving us can take pride in their work and their impact.
ha: A wata takarda ta cikin gida da aka turawa ma’aikatan, shugaban Big Cabal Media Tomiwa Aladekomo, yace, “hukuncin yau baiyi daɗi ba, amma wadanda zasu bar aiki da mu zasu iya yin alfahari da nuna isa a aikinsu da kuma amfaninsu.
