sw: Kwenye memo ya ndani kuhusu wafanyakazi, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Big Cable Media Tomiwa Aladekomo, alisema "Uamuzi wa leo siyo mzuri lakini wale wanaotuacha wanaweza kujivunia kazi yao na athari zao.
yo: Nínú àtẹ̀jáde ilé-iṣẹ́ alábẹ́lé tí ó fi ṣọwọ́ sí àwọn òṣìṣẹ́, Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Big Cabal Media, Tọ̀míwá Aladekomo wí pé, "Ìpinnu ti òní kò dùn mọ́ni rárá, ṣùgbọ́n ipa àti iṣẹ́ tí àwọn tí wọ́n máa fi wá sílẹ̀ ti ní ni yóò máa jẹ́ ohun ìwúrí fún wọn.
zu: Kumemo yangaphakathi eya kubasebenzi, iCEO yeBig Cabal Media, uTomiwa Aladekomo, uthe, “Isinqumo sanamuhla asimnandi, kodwa labo abasishiyayo bangaziqhenya ngomsebenzi wabo kanye nomthelela ababe nawo.

am: ለቀሪዎቻችን በአህጉሪቱ ውስጥ በጣም አስፈላጊ ከሆኑት የመገናኛ ብዙኃን ንግዶች አንዱን ለመገንባት እንደማንኛውም ጊዜ ቁርጠኛ መሆናችንን እናውቃለን።
en: For those of us who remain, know that we are as committed as ever to building one of the most important media businesses on the continent.
ha: Game da wasu daga cikinmu da suka zauna, kusani cewa mun bada himma sosai ga gina ɗaya daga cikin mafi mahimmancin kasuwancin sadarwa a nahiyar.
sw: Kwa sisi tuliyobakia, tufahamu kuwa tumejitolea kama zamani kujenga moja wapo ya biashara muhimu zaidi za vyombo vya habari barani.
yo: Fún àwa tí a kù, ẹ mọ̀ pé a ṣì ní ìfarajìn bí i ti àtẹ̀yìnwá láti ṣe àgbédìde ọ̀kan lára àwọn òkòwò agbéròyìnjáde pàtàkì ní ilẹ̀ Africa.
zu: Kuthina esisele, yazini ukuthi sizibophezele njengakuqala ekwakheni elinye lamabhizinisi abaluleke kakhulu kwezezindaba ezwenikazi.

am: ይህ ተልዕኮ ይቀጥላል፣ እናም ለዚህ ተልዕኮ የበኩላችሁን አስተዋጽኦ በማበርከት ልትኮሩ ትችላላችሁ።''
en: That mission continues, and you can be proud to contribute to it.”
ha: Wannan manufar zata ci gaba, kuma za ka yi alfaharin taimaka mata.”
sw: Hiyo dhamira inaendelea na utajivunia kuchangia
yo: Iṣẹ́ náà kò dúró, tí yóò sì jẹ́ ohun ìwúrí fún un yín láti dá sí i."
zu: Lo msebenzi usaqhubeka, futhi ungaziqhenya ngokufaka isandla kuwo.”

am: ዜጐች፣ በአስተዳደር እና ፖለቲካ ላይ የሚያተኩረው የኩባንያው አዲስ ኅትመት በሥራ መልቀቂያዎች በጣም ይነካል።
en: Citizen, the company's new publication that focuses on governance and politics will be most affected by layoffs.
ha: Jama’a, sabon wallafar kamfanin daya mayarda hankali akan jagoranci da siyasa shi ne korar ma’aikatan zaifi shafa.
sw: Chapisho jipya la kampuni hiyo, linaloangazia utawala na siasa litaathiriwa zaidi na wafanyakazi wake kuachisha kazi.
yo: Citizen, ẹ̀ka atẹ̀ròyìnjáde ilé-iṣẹ́ náà tí ó gbájú mọ́ ètò ìṣèjọba àti òṣèlú ní yóò fara gbá ìyọniníṣẹ́ yìí jùlọ.
zu: I-Citizen, ushicilelo olusha lwenkampani olugxile kwezokuphatha nepolitiki luzothinteka kakhulu ngokudilizwa.

am: ኩባንያው" በተለየ የንግድ አከባቢ ውስጥ ዜጐች ዘላቂ የገቢ ምንጮችን ለመለየት ከ 12 እስከ 18 ወራት እንዲኖራቸው አስበን ነበር" ብሏል።
en: The company said, "In a different business environment, we intended for Citizen to have 12-18 months to figure out sustained revenue streams."
ha: Kamfanin yace, “a wani mahallin kasuwanci na daban, muna zaton jama’a zasu sami watanni 12 zuwa 18 don fahimtar hanyoyin samun kuɗin shiga.”
sw: Hiyo kampuni ilisema "katika mazingira tofauti ya biashara, tulikusudia mwananchi kuwa na miezi 12- 13 ili kubaini njia endelevu za mapato
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ náà wí pé, "Ní àyè òkòwò mìíràn, a gbèrò fún Citizen láti lo oṣù 12-18 láti wá àwọnọ̀nà ìmówówọlé alálòpẹ́."
zu: Le nkampani ithe, "Ezindaweni ezihlukile zebhizinisi, besihlose ukuthi izakhamizi zibe nezinyanga eziyi-12-18 ukuze zithole imithombo eqhubekayo yemali engenayo."

am: በሁለተኛው ግማሽ ዓመት መጨረሻ ላይ 180% የዓመት-ዓመት የገቢ እድገት ቢመዘግብም እንደ የገንዘብ ማሽቆልቆል እና የኢኮኖሚ ማሽቆልቆል ያሉ ኢኮኖሚያዊ እውነታዎች በገቢ ትንበያዎች ላይ ተጽዕኖ አሳድረዋል።
en: While it recorded 180% year-on-year revenue growth by the end of H1, economic realities such as a funding downturn and an economic slowdown, affected revenue projections.
ha: Yayin da suke samun 180% akan bunkasar kuɗin shiga na shekara da shekara a karshen H1, gaskiyar tattalin arziki kamar raguwar samun tallafi da kuma rashin cigaban tattalin arziki, ya shafi samuwar kuɗin shiga.
sw: ingawa ilitunza taarifa za mwaka hadi mwaka hadi mwisho wa H1, hali halisi za kiuchumi kama vile kuzorota kwa ufadhili na kushuka kwa uchumi viliathiri makadirio ya mapato.
yo: Bí ó ti ṣe ṣe àkọọ́lẹ̀ ìdá ìdàgbàsókè 180% níbi owó àmúwọlé ọdún-sí-ọdún ní ìparí ìdáméjì àkọ́kọ́ fún ọdún òkòwò náà, àwọn ìṣòro ọrọ̀ ajé bí i àìrówó ìrànwọ́ àti ètò ọrọ̀ ajé tí ń fà lẹ́yìn ni ó kóbá àwọn àfojúsùn fún owó àmúwọlé.
zu: Nakuba iqophe ukukhula kwemali engenayo ngonyaka ngo-180% ekupheleni kwe-H1, amaqiniso ezomnotho afana nokwehla kwezimali kanye nokwehla komnotho, kunomthelela emalini engenayo.

am: ቢግ ካባል ሚዲያ አሁን በቴክ ኬባል እና በቴክ ኬባል ኢንሳይትስ እና ዚኮኮ ላይ ያተኩራል።
en: Big Cabal Media will now focus on TechCabal and TechCabal Insights and Zikoko.
ha: Big Cabal Medai a yanzu zai mayar da maida hankali ne akan TechCabal da kuma TechCabal Insights da Zikoko.
sw: Big Cable Media sasa itaangazia TechCable na TechCable Insights na Zikoko.
yo: Big Cabal Media yóò gbájú mọ́ TechCabal báyìí àti TechCabal Insights àtí Zikoko.
zu: I-Big Cabal Media manje isizogxila ku-TechCabal ne-TechCabal Insights kanye ne-Zikoko.

am: ናይጄሪያ የዲጂታል ማዕከሎችን ለማስጀመር ከዌማ ባንክ ጋር ትተባበራለች
en: Nigeria partners with Wema Bank to launch digital hubs
ha: Nijeriya tayi hadin guiwa da Wema Bank domin ƙaddamar da digital hubs.
sw: Nigeria inashirikiana na Benki ya Wema kuzindua vituo vya kidijitali
yo: Orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria ní ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú Wema Bank láti ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ àwọn ibùdó iṣẹ́ orí ayélujára
zu: I-Nigeria ibambisene ne-Wema Bank ukwethula izindawo zedijithali

am: የናይጄሪያ ፌዴራል መንግሥት በ7 ግዛቶች የዲጂታል ማዕከሎችን ለማስጀመር ከዌማ ባንክ ጋር ሽርክና ፈጥሯል።
en: Nigeria's federal government has partnered with Wema Bank to launch digital hubs in seven states.
ha: Gwamnatin tarayyar Nijeriya tayi hadin guiwa da Wema Bank don ƙaddamar da digital hubs a jahohi bakwai.
sw: Serikali ya shirikisho ya Nigeria imeshirikiana na Benki ya Wema kuzindua vitu vya kidijitali kwenye majimbo saba.
yo: Ìjọba àpapọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria ni ó ti ní àjọṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú Wema Bank láti ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ àwọn ibùdó iṣẹ́ orí ayélujára ní àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ méje.
zu: Uhulumeni wobumbano waseNigeria ubambisene ne-Wema Bank ukwethula izindawo zedijithali ezifundazweni eziyisikhombisa.

am: የናይጄሪያው ምክትል ፕሬዚዳንት ካሺም ሼቲማ የመረጃ ዳይሬክተር ኦሉሶላ አቢዮላ በሰጡት መግለጫ መሠረት ማዕከሎቹ በአገሪቱ ውስጥ አንድ ሚሊዮን ወጣቶችን በዲጂታል ክህሎቶች ኃይል ይሰጣሉ።
en: According to a statement by Olusola Abiola, Director of Information for Nigeria's Vice President, Kashim Shettima, the hubs will empower one million youths in the country with digital skills.
ha: Kamar yadda bayanin Olusola Abiola ya bayyana, daraktan yada labarai na mataimakin shugaban kasa , Kashim Shettima, hubs din zasu tallafawa matasa miliyan daya a kasar da dabarun fasaha.
sw: Kwa mujibu wa taarifa ya Olusola na Obiola, Mkurugenzi wa Habari wa Makamu wa Rais wa Nigeria, Kashimu Shettim, vituo hivyo vitawawezesha vijana milioni moja nchini kwa ujuzi wa dijitali.
yo: Bí ọ̀rọ̀ tí Olusola Abiola, Olùṣàkóso Ìwífún fún Igbákejì Ààrẹ orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria, Kashim Shettima ṣe fihàn, àwọn ibùdó iṣẹ́ náà yóò ṣe ìrónilágbára ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe orí ẹ̀rọ fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ mílíọ̀nù kan ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà.
zu: Ngokwesitatimende sika-Olusola Abiola, onguMqondisi Wolwazi wePhini likaMengameli waseNigeria, uKashim Shettima, lezi zikhungo zizohlomisa intsha eyisigidi kuleli ngamakhono edijithali.

am: የዌማ ባንክ ተወካዮች እና ምክትል ፕሬዚዳንቱ በቅርቡ በአቡጃ ከተገናኙ በኋላ ተነሳሽነት እንደነበራቸው ገልጸዋል።
en: He disclosed that Wema Bank's representatives and the vice president came up with the initiative after a recent meeting in Abuja.
ha: Ya bayyana cewa wakilan Wema Bank da kuma mataimakin shugaban kasa sun zo da wani tsari bayan haɗuwar kwanannan a Abuja.
sw: Alieleza kuwa wawakilishi wa Benki ya Wema na Makamu wa rais walikuja na mpango huo baada ya mkutano wa hivi karibuni mjini Abuja.
yo: Ó ṣe àfihàn pé àwọn aṣojú Wema Bank àti igbákejì ààrẹ ni wọ́n mú àbá ètò alátinúdà náà wáyé lẹ́yìn ìpàdé tí ó wáyé láìpẹ́ ní ìlú Abuja.
zu: Udalule ukuthi abamele ibhange iWema kanye nephini likamengameli baqhamuke nalolu hlelo ngemuva komhlangano wakamuva obuse-Abuja.

am: በሌጎስ እና በቦርኖ ግዛቶች ይጀምራል-የመጀመሪያዎቹ ማዕከላት የሚጀመሩት በሌጎስ እና በቦርኖ ግዛቶች ሲሆን ኦዮ እና ክሮስ ሪቨርን ጨምሮ ሌሎች ግዛቶች ደግሞ በኋላ ላይ ያገኛሉ።
en: It starts with Lagos and Borno States: The first set of hubs will launch in Lagos and Borno States while other states, including Oyo and Cross River, will get theirs later.
ha: An fara da jihohin Legas da Borno: Kashin farko na hub din zai fara ne a jihohin Legos da Borno Yayin da sauran jihohi kuma, da suka hada da Oyo da Cross River, zasu samu nasu daga baya.
sw: Inaanza na Majimbo ya Lagos na Borno: Seti ya kwanza ya vituo itazinduliwa kwenye majimbo ya Lagos na Borno huku majimbo mengine yakiwemo Oyo na Cross River yatapata kituo chao baadaye.
yo: Ó bẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó àti Borno: ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ààtò àkọ́kọ́ àwọn ibùdó iṣẹ́ náà máa wáyé ní ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó àti Borno tí àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ mìíràn, tí Ọ̀yọ́ àti Cross River wà nínú wọn yóò máa gba tiwọn lẹ́yìnwá.
zu: Iqala ngeLagos ne-Borno States: Uhlu lokuqala lezindawo izokwethulwa eLagos nase-Borno States kanti ezinye izifundazwe, okubandakanya i-Oyo ne-Cross River, zizothola ezazo kamuva.

am: የኤፍጂኤን/አላት ዲጂታል እና እስኪልኖቬሽን ኀብ ተብሎ የሚጠራው" በዲጂታል ፈጠራዎች ከፍተኛ ፍላጐት ያላቸው እና የቴክኖሎጂ እድገትን ለማሽከርከር የሚመኙ የቴክኖሎጂ አዋቂ ወጣቶችን የገንዘብ መፍትሄዎችን፣ ስልጠናዎችን እና ወደ ስትራቴጂካዊ ሽርክናዎች መዳረሻ በመስጠት ይደግፋል"።
en: Dubbed the FGN/ALAT Digital and SkillNnovation Hub, it will support "tech-savvy youths with keen interest in digital innovations and aspire to drive technological advancements, by providing them with financial solutions, training and access to strategic partnerships."
ha: Dubbed the FGN/ALAT D igital and SkillNnovation Hub, zasu tallafawa “matasan masu kwarewa a fasahar zamani da kuma sha'awa sosai a kirƙirar fasahar zamani da kuma cigaban bunkasar fasaha, ta hanyar samar musu da maganin matsalar kuɗi, horo da kuma samun damar dabarun hulɗa.”
sw: Inayopewa jina la la FGN/ALAT Digital na SkillNnovation Hub, itasaidia "vijana wenye ujuzi wa teknolojia waliyo na shauku kubwa katika uvumbuzi wa kidijitali na kutamani kuendeleza maendeleo ya teknolojia, kwa kuwapatia ufumbuzi wa kifedha, mafunzo na ufikiaji wa ushirikiano wa kimkakati
yo: Tí wọ́n pé àkòrí rẹ̀ ní FGN/ALAT Digital and SkillNnovation Hub, yóò ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún "àwọn ọ̀dọ́ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tí wọ́n nífẹ̀ẹ́ tí ó tayọ sí àwọn ètò alátinúdà orí ẹ̀rọ, tí wọ́n sì ní ìrètí láti wakọ̀ ìtẹ̀síwájú fún ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ, nípa pípèsè ọ̀nà àbáyọ ajẹmówó, ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti àǹfààní sí àwọn ìbáṣepọ̀ tí ó ní ètò."
zu: Ibizwa ngokuthi i-FGN/ALAT Digital kanye ne-SkillNnovation Hub, izosekela "intsha enolwazi ngezobuchwepheshe nenentshisekelo ejulile futhi efisa ukuletha intuthuko yezobuchwepheshe, ngokubanikeza izixazululo zezimali, ukuqeqeshwa kanye nobambiswano lwamasu."

am: ኤፍጂ አጋሮች ዌማ ባንክ በመላ ግዛቶች ዲጂታል እና ስኪልኖቬሽን ማዕከሎችን ለማቋቋም
en: FG Partners Wema Bank To Establish Digital and SkillNovation Hubs Across States
ha: FG sunyi hadin guiwa da Wema Bank domin samar da hubs na fasaha a gaba ɗayan jihohi.
sw: FG ambao ni washirika wa Wema Bank kuanzisha Vitovu vya Dijitali na Ujuzi kwenye majimbo
yo: Ìjọba Àpapọ̀ ní Àjọṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú Wema Bank Láti Dá àwọn SkillNovation Hub sílẹ̀ Káàkiri àwọn Ìpínlẹ̀
zu: I-FG Partners Wema Bank izosungula izindawo ezidijithali nezithuthukisa amakhono Kuwo wonke amazwe

am: የናይጄሪያ መሪ የፈጠራ ባንክ የሆነው ዌማ ባንክ ከናይጄሪያ ፌዴራል መንግሥት ጋር በመተባበር በመላ አገሪቱ ግዛቶች የዲጂታል እና የክህሎት ፈጠራ ማዕከሎችን በማቋቋም አንድ ሚሊዮን ወጣቶችን በዲጂታል እና በሌሎች ተዛማጅ ክህሎቶች የማብቃት ዓላማ አለው።
en: Wema Bank, Nigeria's leading innovative bank, has partnered with the Federal Government of Nigeria to establish digital and skill innovation hubs across states in the country, with a target to empower one million youths with digital and other relevant skills.
ha: Wema Bank, bankin Nijeriya dake kan gaba wajen ƙirƙira, ya yi haɗin guiwa da Gwamnatin Tarayyar Nijeriya don samar da hubs na ƙirƙira da fasaha a jihohin ƙasar, da nufin tallafawa matasa miliyan ɗaya da dabarun fasaha da kuma wasu dabarun daban.
sw: Benki ya wema ni benki inayoongoza kwa ubunifu nchini Nigeria, benki hiyo imeshirikiana na serikali ya shirikisho la Nigeria kuanzisha vituo vya uvumbuzi wa kidijitali na ujuzi katika majimbo yote nchini, kwa lengo la kuwawezesha vijana milioni moja kwa ujuzi wa kidijitali na ujuzi mwingine husika.
yo: Wema Bank, báǹkì adarí ọgbọ́n àtinúdá ní Nigeria ti fọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ pẹ̀lú Ìjọba Àpapọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria láti dá àwọn ibùdó iṣẹ́ ẹ̀rọ ayélujára àti ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe alátinúdá káàkiri àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà, pẹ̀lú àfojúsùn láti ṣe ìrónilágbára onímọ̀ọ́ṣe nípa ẹ̀rọ ayélujára àti àwọn ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe tí ó wúlò mìíràn fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ mílíọ̀nù kan.
zu: I-Wema Bank, ibhange elihamba phambili e-Nigeria, ibambisene noHulumeni Wombuso waseNigeria ukuze kusungulwe izindawo ezidijithali futhi zokuthuthukisa amakhono kuzo zonke izifundazwe ezweni, ngenhloso yokuthuthukisa intsha eyisigidi ngamakhono edijithali namanye afanelekile.

am: ኤፍጂኤን/አላት ዲጂታል እና ስኪልኖቬሽን ማዕከል በመባል የሚታወቀው ተነሳሽነት በባንኩ ተወካዮች እና በምክትል ፕሬዝዳንት ካሺም ሼቲማ መካከል በአቡጃ በተደረገው ስብሰባ ላይ የተስማሙ ሲሆን ይህም የፕሬዚዳንት ቦላ ቲኑቡ አስተዳደር ለናይጄሪያ ወጣቶች ተጨማሪ ዲጂታል ስራዎችን ለመፍጠር ካለው ቁርጠኝነት ጋር የተጣጣመ ነው።
en: The initiative, known as FGN/ALAT Digital and SkillNovation Hub, was agreed upon during a meeting between representatives of the bank and Vice President Kashim Shettima in Abuja, aligning with President Bola Tinubu's administration’s commitment to creating more digital jobs for young Nigerians.
ha: Tsarin, wanda aka sani da FGN/ALAT Digital da SkillNnovation Hub, an yarda da shi ne lokacin da akai ganawa tsakanin wakilan banki da kuma na Mataimakin Shugaban kasa Kashim Shettima a Abuja, wanda ya hada da himmar mulkin Shugaban Ƙasa Bola Ahmed Tinubu wajen samar da ayyukan fasahar zamani da yawa ga matasan Nijeriya.
sw: Mpango huo, unaojulikana kama FGN/ALAT Digital na SkillNovation Hub, ulikubali wakati wa mkutano kati ya wawakilishi wa wa benki hiyo na Makamu wa Rais Kashim Shettiman mjini Abuja, wakishirikiana na utawala wa Rais Bola Tinubu dhamira ya kuunda zaidi. kazi za kidijitali kwa vijana wa Nigeria.
yo: Wọ́n fẹnukò lórí ètò àtinúdá náà, tí ó ń jẹ́ FGN/ALAT Digital SkillNovation Hub níbi ìpàdé láàárín àwọn aṣojú báńkì náà àti Igbákejì Ààrẹ Kashim Shettima ní ìlú Abuja ní ìbámu pẹ̀lú ìfarajìn sí ìṣàkóso Ààrẹ Bola Tinubu láti ṣẹ̀dá àwọn iṣẹ́ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria.
zu: Lolu hlelo, olwaziwa nge-FGN/ALAT Digital kanye ne-SkillNovation Hub, kwavunyelwana ngalo ngesikhathi somhlangano phakathi kwabamele ibhange kanye nePhini likaMongameli u-Kashim Shettima e-Abuja, okuhambisana nokuzibophezela kukaMongameli u-Bola Tinubu ekwakheni amathuba emisebenzi eminingi yedijithali kubantu abasha baseNigeria.

am: ባለፉት ዓመታት ዌማ ባንክ በባንክ ኢንዱስትሪ ውስጥ በዲጂታል ትራንስፎርሜሽን ውስጥ ፈር ቀዳጅ በመሆን የፈጠራ፣ የመማር እና የዕድገት ባህልን ለማጐልበት ቁርጠኛ ነው።
en: Over the years, Wema Bank has been a pioneer in digital transformation within the banking industry, committed to fostering a culture of innovation, learning, and growth.
ha: A shekarun da suka gabata, Wema Bank ya kasance babban kusa wajen sauyin fasahar zamani a masana’antar banki, wanda suka dage wajen tabbatar da al’adar ƙirƙira, koyo, da kuma bunkasa.
sw: Kwa miaka mingi, Benki ya Wema iimekuwa mwanzilishi wa mabadiliko ya kidijitali kwenye sekta ya uchumi, iliyojitolea kukuza utamaduni wa uvumbuzi, kujifunza na ukuaji.
yo: Láti ọdún sí ọdún ni Wema Bank ti jẹ́ aṣáájú amáyìídà onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ní ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ ìfowópamọ́, tí ó sì ní ìfarajìn sí àṣà ìṣàtinúdá, ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti ìdàgbàsókè.
zu: Eminyakeni edlule, i-Wema Bank ibe yingqalabutho ekuguquleni idijithali embonini yamabhange, izibophezele ekukhuthazeni isiko lokusungula izinto ezintsha, ukufunda nokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono.

am: የዌማ ባንክ ማኔጂንግ ዳይሬክተር እና ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ሞሩፍ ኦሴኒ እንደተናገሩት ይህ ፈጠራ ተነሳሽነት ወጣት ሥራ ፈጣሪዎች እና ሠራተኞች ከቴክኖሎጂ፣ ከሥራ ፈጠራ እና ከችሎታ ልማት ጋር የሚገናኙበትን መንገድ ለመለወጥ የተቀየሰ ነው።
en: Wema Bank's Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer, Moruf Oseni, says the innovative initiative is designed to revolutionize the way young entrepreneurs and employees interact with technology, entrepreneurship, and skill development.
ha: Manajan Darakta na Wema Bank kuma babban ofisa, Moruf Oseni, yace anyi tsarin kirƙirar don kawo sauyi ga yadda matasan masu sana’ar hannu da ma’aikata suke hulɗa da fasaha, sana’ar hannu, da kuma bunkasa dabaru.
sw: Mkurugenzi mtendaji na Afisa Mtendaji Mkuu wa benki ya wema, Moruf Oseni, anasema mpango huo wa kibunifu umeundwa kuleta mapinduzi katika namna ambayo wajasiriamali na wafanyakazi wachanga wanavyoingiliana na teknolojia, ujasiriamali na ukuzaji wa ujuzi.
yo: Adarí Ìṣàkóso àti Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Wema Bank, ìyẹn Moruf Oseni wí pé wọ́n piyamọ ètò alátinúdà náà láti mú àyípadà bá bí àwọn ọ̀dọ́ olùṣòwò àti òṣìṣẹ́ ṣe ń lo ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ, ìṣòwò àti ìdàgbàsókè ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe ni.
zu: OnguMdidiyeli kanye neSikhulu Esiphezulu sebhange iWema, uMoruf Oseni, uthi lolu hlelo olusha lwenzelwe ukuguqula indlela osomabhizinisi abasebasha nabasebenzi abasebenzisana ngayo nobuchwepheshe, amabhizinisi kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono.

am: የዲጂታል እና የክህሎት ፈጠራ ማዕከል በቴክ-አዋቂ ወጣት ሥራ ፈጣሪዎች፣ በተፈጥሮ ወጣት ሥራ ፈጣሪዎች እና ወጣት ሠራተኞችን የሚያበረታታ የበለጸገ ሥነ ምህዳርን ለማጐልበት ያለንን ቁርጠኝነት የሚያንጸባርቅ ሲሆን ይህም በመላ አገሪቱ የኢኮኖሚ እድገትን እና ዘላቂ እድገትን ያስገኛል።
en: "The Digital & SkillNovation Hub reflects our dedication to fostering a thriving ecosystem that empowers Tech-Savvy Youth Entrepreneurs, Youth Entrepreneurs by Nature, and Young Employees, driving economic growth and sustainable progress across the nation.
ha: “The Digital & SkillNnovation Hub yana nuna himmar mu wajen tabbatar da yanayin mahalli mai aiki wanda zai tallafawa matasa masu sana’ar hannu na Tech-Savvy, matasa masu sana’ar hannu na yanayi, da kuma matasa ma’aikata, da suke tafiyar da bunkasar tattalin arziki da kuma cigaba mai dorewa a kasar.
sw: "Kituo cha dijitali & SkillNovation kinaonyesha kujitolea kwetu kukuza mfumo wa ikolojia unaositawi kwa kuwawezesha wajasiriamali vijana wa Tech-Savvy, vijana wajasiriamali kwa asili, na waajiriwa vijana, kuendeleza ukuaji wa uchumi na maendeleo endelevu kote nchini.
yo: "Digital & SkillNovation Hub náà ń ṣe àfihàn ìfarajìn wa láti mú irú àwùjọ onídàgbàsókè tí yóò ṣe ìrólágbára fún àwọn Ọ̀dọ́ Olùṣòwò Onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ, àwọn Ọ̀dọ́ Olùṣòwò Alámùútọ̀runwá, àti àwọn Ọ̀dọ́ Òṣìṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ń mú ìdàgbàsókè bá ètò ọrọ̀ ajé àti ìdàgbàsókè alálòpẹ́ jákèjádò orílẹ̀-èdè náà.
zu: "I-Digital & SkillNovation Hub ibonisa ukuzinikela kwethu ekukhuthazeni i-ecosystem ephumelelayo enikeza amandla Osomabhizinisi Abasebasha bakwa-Tech-Savvy, Osomabhizinisi Abasebasha ngokweminyaka, kanye Nabasebenzi Abasebasha, abathuthukisa umnotho nenqubekelaphambili esimeme ezweni lonke.

am: ይህ ማዕከላዊ መድረክ የዲጂታል እንቅስቃሴዎችን፣ ትብብርን እና የመረጃ ልውውጥን ለማመቻቸት ዘመናዊ ዲጂታል መሣሪያዎችን፣ ቴክኖሎጂዎችን እና ሀብቶችን ያዋሕዳል" ሲሉ አክለው ተናግረዋል።
en: This centralized platform will integrate cutting-edge digital tools, technologies, and resources to streamline digital activities, collaboration, and information sharing," adds Oseni.
ha: Wannan manhajar ta bai daya zata hada kayan aikin fasahar zamani na cutting-edge, fasahohi, da kuma kayan amfani domin haska ayyukan fasahar zamani, hadin guiwa, da kuma raba bayanai,” Oseni ya fada.
sw: Jukwaa hili la kati litaunganisha zana za kisasa za kidijitali, teknolojia na rasilimali ili kurahisisha shughuli za kidijitali, ushirikiano na ugomvi wa habari, anaongeza Osen.
yo: Ìkànnì alákòóso náà yóò ṣe àmúlò àwọn irinṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ, àwọn ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àti àwọn èlò iṣẹ́ tí ó tayọ jùlọ láti mú àwọn iṣẹ́ onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ, àjọṣepọ̀ àti pínpín ìwífún yá fáfá," Oseni ṣe àfikún.
zu: Le nkundla emaphakathi izohlanganisa amathuluzi edijithali aphambili, ubuchwepheshe, kanye nezinsiza ukuze kuqondiswe imisebenzi yedijithali, ukubambisana, kanye nokwabelana ngolwazi," kwengeza u-Oseni.

am: ከፕሬዚዳንት ምክትል ጽሕፈት ቤት በተሰጠው መግለጫ መሠረት የዲጂታል እና ክህሎት ፈጠራ ማዕከል በመጀመሪያ የሚከፈተው በሌጎስ እና በቦርኖ ግዛቶች ሲሆን ካትሲና፣ ክሮስ ሪቨር፣ አናምብራ፣ ኦዮ እና ካኖ ግዛቶችም ይከተላሉ።
en: According to a statement from the office of the Vice President, the Digital & SkillNovation Hub will first open in Lagos and Borno States, with Katsina, Cross River, Anambra, Oyo, and Kano states following suit.
ha: Kamar yadda wani jami’I daga ofishin mataimakin shugaban kasa ya bayyana, The Digital anda SkillNnovation Hub zai fara aiki ne a jihohin Legas da Borno, sai kuma jihohin Katsina, Cross River, Anambra, Oyo, da kuma Kano su biyo baya.
sw: Kulingana na taarifa kutoka kwenye ofisi ya Makamu wa Rais, dijitali & SkillNovation Hub itafunguliwa kwanza katika majimbo ya Lagos na Borno, huku majimbo ya Katsina, Cross- River, Anambra, Oyo, na Kano yatafuata huo mkondo.
yo: Nínú ọ̀rọ̀ kan láti ọ́fíìsì Igbákejì Ààrẹ, Digital SkillNovation Hub náà yóò kọ́kọ́ ṣí ní ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó àti Borno, tí Katsina, Cross-River, Anambra, Oyo àti Kano yóò sì ṣí tẹ̀lé wọn.
zu: Ngokwesitatimende esivela ehhovisi lePhini Likamongameli, i-Digital & SkillNovation Hub izoqale ivulwe e-Lagos nase-Borno States, bese kulandela i-Katsina, i-Cross River, i-Anambra, i-Oyo, ne-Kano.

am: ይህ ተነሳሽነት የገንዘብ መፍትሄዎችን፣ ስልጠናዎችን እና ወደ ስትራቴጂካዊ ሽርክናዎች መዳረሻን በማቅረብ ወጣት ሠራተኞችን የናይጄሪያ የሰው ኃይል አካል እንዲሆኑ በተለይም በኤንዋይኤስሲ በኩል የተሰማሩትን ለማጐልበት ያለመ ነው።
en: The initiative aims to provide financial solutions, training, and access to strategic partnerships, empowering young employees to become an integral part of Nigeria's workforce, especially those deployed through the NYSC.
ha: Tsarin ya maida hankali ne wajen samar da hanyar magance matsalar kuɗi, bada horo, da kuma samun damar hulɗar samar da dabaru, tallafawa matasan ma’aikata domin zama ɓangare na ma’aikatan Nijeriya, musamman wanda aka tura su ta NYSC.
sw: Mpango huo unalenga kutoa suluhu za kifedha, mafunzo na upatikanaji wa ushirikiano wa kimkakati, kuwawezesha wafanyakazi wa Nigeria, hasa wale waliyotumwa kupitia NYSC.
yo: Ètò àtinúdá náà gbèrò láti pèsè ọ̀nà àbáyọ ajẹmówó, ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́, àti ìráàyè sí àwọn ìbáṣepọ̀ elétò, síṣe ìrólágbára fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ òṣìṣẹ́ láti di èèkàn pàtàkì ní iye àpapọ̀ òṣìṣẹ́ orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria, pàápàá júlọ àwọn tí wọ́n ètò Àgùnbánirọ̀ fi ránṣẹ́.
zu: Lolu hlelo luhlose ukuhlinzeka ngezixazululo zezezimali, ukuqeqeshwa, kanye nokufinyelela ekubambisaneni kwamasu, ukunika amandla abasebenzi abasebasha ukuthi babe ingxenye ebalulekile yabasebenzi baseNigeria, ikakhulukazi labo abalethwe nge-NYSC.

am: ባለሞያዎች በመላው ናይጄሪያ 500,000 ኤስኤምኢኤስን እንደሚያስተምሩ እና አሰልጣኞችም ለንግድ እድገት ስልጠና እና ክህሎትን እንደሚያሳድጉ መግለጫው አክሏል።
en: The statement adds that experts will mentor 500,000 SMEs across Nigeria, while coaches will provide training and up skilling for business growth.
ha: Bayanin ya bayyana cewa kwararru zasu koyar da SMEs 500,000 a fadin Nijeriya, Yayin da koci zasu bayarda horo da kara dabarun bunkasa kasuwanci.
sw: Taarifa hiyo inaongeza kuwa wataalam wameshauri SMEs 500,000 kote nchini Nigeria, wakati washauri watatoa mafunzo na ujuzi zaidi kwa ukuaji wa biashara.
yo: Ọ̀rọ̀ náà tún ṣe àfikún pé àwọn onímọ̀ọ́ṣe yóò jẹ́ alámọ̀ràn àwọn SME (òkòwò kékeré àti alábọ́dé) 500,000 káàkiri Nigeria, nígbà tí àwọn olùkọ́ni yóò pèsè ìdánilékọ̀ọ́ àti ètò ṣíṣe ìtẹ̀síwájú ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe fún ìdàgbàsókè òkòwò.
zu: Isitatimende sengeza ngokuthi ongoti bazoluleka ama-SME angu-500,000 kulo lonke elaseNigeria, okuyilapho abaqeqeshi bezohlinzeka ngoqeqesho futhi bathuthukise amakhono okukhula kwezamabhizinisi.

am: በፕሮጀክቱ መሠረት የገንዘብ ድጐማዎች በፌዴራል መንግሥት እና በዌማ ባንክ መካከል ባለው የትብብር ዝግጅት አማካይነት የሚቀርቡ ሲሆን ለኤስኤምኢዎች እና ለቴክ ሥራ ፈጣሪዎች የሚሰጥ 500 ሚሊዮን ናራ ይመደባል።
en: Under the scheme, grants will be provided through a collaborative arrangement between the Federal Government and WEMA Bank, allocating N500 million to be given to SMEs and Techpreneurs.
ha: A ƙarƙashin tsarin, za a bayar da kuɗi ta hanyar yarjejeniyar hadin guiwa tsakanin gwamnatin tarayya da WEMA Bank, wanda za a bayar da miliyan N500 da za a rabawa SMEs da kuma masu sana’ar hannu.
sw: Chini ya mpango huo, ruzuku zitatolewa kupitia mpango wa ushirikiano kati ya serikali ya shirikisho na Benki ya Wema, ikitenge milioni 500 zitakazotolewa kwa SME na Techpreneurs.
yo: Lábẹ́ ètò náà, wọn yóò pèsè ẹ̀bùn owó ìṣiṣẹ́ nípasẹ̀ ètò alájọṣe láàárín Ìjọba Àpapọ̀ àti WEMA Bank, tí wọ́n ti máa fún àwọn SME àti àwọn olùṣòwò alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ní mílíọ̀nù ₦500.
zu: Ngaphansi kwalolu hlelo, izibonelelo zizonikezwa ngohlelo lokusebenzisana phakathi kukaHulumeni Wombuso kanye ne-WEMA Bank, kwabelwa izigidi ezingu-N500 ezizonikezwa ama-SME namaTechpreneurs.

am: የ ኤፍጂኤን/አላት ዲጂታል ስኪልኖቬሽን ማዕከላት አንድ ሚሊዮን ወጣቶችን በሶፍትዌር ኢንጂነሪንግ፣ በምርት አስተዳደር፣ በንግድ ትንተና፣ በደመና ኮምፒዩተር እና በምርት ዲዛይን ላይ በማሰልጠን ላይ ያተኩራሉ።
en: The FGN/ALAT Digital SkillNovation hubs will focus on training one million young adults in software engineering, product management, business analysis, cloud computing, and product design, using specialized resources.
ha: The FGN/ALAT Digital Nnovation hubs zai maida hankali ne akan bayar da horon manyan matasa miliyan daya aka software engineering, lura da kayayyaki, nazarin kasuwanci, cloud computing, da kuma tsara kaya, ta hanyar amfani da kayan aiki na musamman.
sw: Vituo vya EGN/ALAT Digital na SkillNovation vinalenga kutoa mafunzo kwa vijana milioni moja kwenye uhandisi wa program, usimamizi wa bidhaa, tanakrishi ya wingu, na muundo wa bidhaa kwa kutumia rasilimali maalum.
yo: Àwọn FGN/ALAT Digital SkillNovation Hub yóò máa gbájú mọ́ kíkọ́ àwọn ọ̀dọ́ mílíọ̀nù kan ní ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àìrídìmú, ìṣàkóso ohun ìṣàmúlò, ìṣàtúpalẹ̀ òkòwò, ìkodùẹ̀rọ lórí àkójọpọ̀ orísun ìmọ kọ̀mpútà, àti ìṣẹ̀yàaṣẹ́ ohun ìṣàmúlò, nípa lílo àwọn àkànṣe èlò iṣẹ́.
zu: Izindawo ze-FGN/ALAT Digital SkillNovation zizogxila ekuqeqesheni abantu abasha abayizigidi eziyinkulungwane kwezobunjiniyela bezinhlelo zekhompyutha, ukuphathwa kwemikhiqizo, ukuhlaziya ibhizinisi, ukusebenzisa ikhompyutha emkhathini, nokuklama umkhiqizo, kusetshenziswa izinsiza ezikhethekile.

am: ኢሳካ ከኦኒቻ ቢዝነስ ትምህርት ቤት ጋር በመተባበር ተማሪዎችን በዓለም አቀፍ ደረጃ ፍላጐት ባላቸው ክህሎቶች እና የምስክር ወረቀቶች ለማጐልበት
en: ISACA Collaborates with Onitsha Business School to Empower Students with Globally In-demand Skills and Credentials
ha: ISACA ta haɗa guiwa da Onitsha Business School don tallafawa dalibai da dabarun da ake buƙata a duniya da kuma takardu
sw: ISACA inashirikiana na shule ya biashara ya Onitsha ili kuwawezesha wanafunzi kupata ustadi wa vitambulisho unaohitajika ulimwenguni
yo: ISACA ń Siṣẹ́ pọ̀ pẹ̀lú Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Òkòwò ti Onitsha láti ṣe Ìrónilágbára Àwọn Ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe àti Ìwé-ẹ̀rí tí ó ń Tà-lọ́wọ́ fún àwọn Akẹ́kọ̀ọ́
zu: I-ISACA Isebenzisana ne-Onitsha Business School ukuze Ithuthukise Abafundi Ngamakhono Nemininingwane Edingeka Emhlabeni Wonke

am: በናይጄሪያ በአናምብራ ግዛት የሚገኘው ዓለም አቀፍ የቴክኖሎጂ ማህበር ኢሳካ እና ኦኒትሻ ቢዝነስ ስኩል ተማሪዎች በአይቲ ኦዲት፣ በኢንተርኔት ደህንነት፣ በታዳጊ ቴክኖሎጂ፣ በአስተዳዳር እና በግላዊነት ሙያ ለመጀመር የፍላጎት ክህሎትና ብቃት በሚሰጥ ልዩ ፕሮግራም የመማር ልምዳቸውን እንዲያሳድጉ እድል ለመስጠት የሚያስችል የትምህርት አጋርነት ማስፈጸማቸውን አስታውቀዋል።
en: Global technology association ISACA and Onitsha Business School, located in Anambra State in Nigeria have announced an academic partnership to give students the opportunity to enhance their learning experience with a unique program that provides in-demand skills and credentials to begin a career in IT audit, cybersecurity, emerging tech, governance and privacy.
ha: Global technology association ISACA da Onitsha Business School, wanda yake a jihar Anambra a Nijeriya sun bayyana hulɗar karatu don bawa dalibai damar bunkasa kwarewar koyon su da wani shiri na musamman da yake samarda dabaru da ake nema da kuma takardu domin fara aiki da IT audit, cybersecurity, tech masu tasowa, governance da privacy.
sw: Jumuiya ya teknolojia ya ISAC na shule ya biashara ya Onitsh, iliyopo kwenye jimbo la Anambra nchini Nigeria imetangaza ushirikiano wa kitaalam ili kuwapa wanafunzi fursa fursa ya kuboresha uzoefu wao wa kujifunza kwa program ya kipekee ambayo inatoa ujuzi na sifa zinazohitajika ili kuanza kazi katika ukaguzi wa IT, usalama wa mtandao, teknolojia inayoibuka, utawala na faragha.
yo: Àjọ onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ní àgbáyé, ISACA àti Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Òkòwò ti Onitsha, tí ó wà ní Ìpínlẹ̀ Anambra ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria ni wọ́n ti kéde ìbáṣepọ̀ ajẹmẹ́kọ̀ọ́wé láti fún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ní àǹfààní láti mú ìrírí ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ wọn dára sí i pẹ̀lú ètò aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ tí ó ń pèsè àwọn ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe àti ìwé-ẹ̀rí tí ó ń tà wàràwàrà kí wọ́n lè bẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́ wọn nínú àyẹ̀wò Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ Ìwífún orí ayélujára, ààbò orí ayélujára, ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ aṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀jáde, ètò ìṣàkóso àti àsírí bíbò.
zu: Inhlangano yezobuchwepheshe yomhlaba wonke i-ISACA kanye ne-Onitsha Business School, eseSifundazweni sase-Anambra eNigeria bamemezele ukubambisana kwezemfundo ukuze kunikezwe abafundi ithuba lokuthuthukisa ulwazi lwabo lokufunda ngohlelo oluyingqayizivele olunikeza amakhono adingekayo kanye nemininingwane ukuze baqale umsebenzi wokucwaninga nge-IT, Ezokuphepha ngotwamkhathi , ubuchwepheshe obusafufusa, ukubusa kanye nobumfihlo.

am: ኢሳካ የአካዳሚክ አጋርነት መርሃ ግብርን ያዘጋጀው በአይቲ፣ በአይቲ ኦዲት፣ በአደጋ፣ በደኅንነት፣ በመረጃ፣ በሳይበር ደኅንነት፣ በአስተዳደር ወይም በግላዊነት ውስጥ ሙያ ለመጀመር የሚያስፈልጉትን ተግባራዊ ክህሎቶች በመጠቀም የተሻሻለ የመማር እድሎችን ለማቅረብ ነው።
en: ISACA developed the Academic Partnership Program to provide opportunities for enhanced learning through hands-on skills needed to begin a career in IT, IT audit, risk, security, data, cybersecurity, governance, or privacy.
ha: ISACA sun bunkasa shirin hulɗar karatu domin samar da damarmaki na inganta koyo ta hanyar dabaru na hannu da ake buƙata domin fara aiki a IT audit, risk, security, data, cybersecurity, governance, ko privacy.
sw: ISACA iliendeleza mpango wa ushirikiano kitaaluma ili kutoa fursa za mafunzo yaliyoimarishwa kupitia ujuzi unaohitajika katika kufanya kazi ili kuanza taaluma ya IT, ukaguzi unaohitajika ili kuanza taaluma ya IT, ukaguzi wa TEHAMA, hatari, usalama, takwimu, usalama wa mtandao, utawala na faragha.
yo: ISACA mú Ètò Ìbáṣepọ̀ Ajẹmẹ́kọ̀ọ́wé wáyé láti pèsè àwọn àǹfààní ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ síwájú síi nípasẹ̀ àwọn ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe oníkòópa tí wọ́n máa nílò láti bẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́ ní Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ Ìwífún orí ayélujára, àyẹ̀wò Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ Ìwífún orí ayélujára, ewu , ààbò, dátà, ààbò orí ayélujára, ètò ìṣàkóso àbí àṣírí bíbò.
zu: I-ISACA ithuthukise Uhlelo Lobambiswano Lwezemfundo ukuze inikeze amathuba okufunda okuthuthukisiwe ngokusebenzisa amakhono adingekayo ukuze kuqalwe umsebenzi we-IT, ukuhlolwa kwe-IT, ubungozi, ukuphepha, imininingo, ukuvikeleka ku-inthanethi, ukubusa, noma ubumfihlo.

am: እርምጃዎቻችን በኢንዱስትሪው ውስጥም ሆነ ከዚያ ውጭ ከፍተኛውን ማህበራዊ ጥቅም፣ አካታችነት እና ፍትሃዊነት በሚያስገኙ ዓለም አቀፍ ፕሮግራሞች እና ሽርክናዎች ላይ ኢንቬስት ለማድረግ የኢሳካ ጥልቅ ቁርጠኝነት ጋር የተጣጣሙ ናቸው።
en: Our actions are aligned to ISACA’s deep commitment to invest in global programs and partnerships that afford maximum social benefits, inclusivity, and equity, both within the industry and beyond.
ha: Matakanmu suna hade ne da babbar himmar ISACA don sanya hannun jari a shirye-shiryen duniya da huldodi wanda zai kara alfanun al’umma da yawa, da damawa, da equity, a cikin masana’antar da kuma wajenta duka.
sw: Matendo yetu yanashabiiana na dhamira ya kina ya ISACA kuweka kwenye mpango na ushirikiano wa kimataifa unaomudu manufaa ya juu zaidi ya kijamii, ushirikishwaji na usawa na usawa ndani ya sekta hiyo na nje ya hapo.
yo: Àwọn ìṣe wa wà ní ìbámu pẹ̀lú ìfarajìn ọlọ́jọ́ pípẹ́ tí ISACA ní láti fi ara fún àwọn ètò àti ìbáṣepọ̀ àgbáyé tí yóò mú èrè bá àwùjọ, tí yóò ṣe ìgbàmọ́ra, tí kò sì ní sí ojúsàájú, àti nínú ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ àti jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ.
zu: Izenzo zethu zihambisana nokuzibophezela okujulile kwe-ISACA kokutshala izimali ezinhlelweni zomhlaba wonke kanye nobambiswano olunikeza izinzuzo eziphezulu zezenhlalakahle, ukuhlanganiswa, nokulingana, kobubili ngaphakathi kwemboni nangale kwayo.

am: የዚህ አጋርነት አካል እንደመሆኑ መጠን፣ ኢሳካ የአባላቱን አባልነትና የንግድና የቴክኖሎጂ የምሥክር ወረቀቶችን ያቀርባል፤ ከእነዚህም መካከል የምሥክር ወረቀት መረጃ ሲስተምስ ኦዲተር (ሲ አይ ኤስ ኤ)፣ በአደጋና በመረጃ ሥርዓት መቆጣጠሪያ የምሥክር ወረቀት (ክሪስክ)፣ በአደጋና በመረጃ ሥርዓት መቆጣጠሪያ የምሥክር ወረቀት (ክሪስክ)፣ የምሥክር ወረቀት የመረጃ ደህንነት ሥራ አስኪያጅ (ሲ አይ ኤስ ኤም)፣ የምሥክር ወረቀት ያለው የዳታ ምሥጢራዊነት መፍትሔዎች መሐንዲስ (ሲዲ ፒ ኤስ ኤ)፣ በኢመርጂንግ ቴክኖሎጂ (ከት)፣ በኢንፎርሜሽን ቴክኖሎጂ የምሥክር ወረቀት ተባባሪ (ኢትካ) እና ሌሎችም ለኦኒሻ የንግድ ትምህርት ቤት ተማሪዎች ቅናሽ ዋጋ ይሰጣሉ።
en: As part of this partnership, ISACA will offer membership and its suite of business and emerging technology certifications including Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA), Certified in Risk and Information Systems Control (CRISC), Certified Information Security Manager (CISM), Certified Data Privacy Solutions Engineer (CDPSE), Certified in Emerging Technology (CET), Information Technology Certified Associate (ITCA) and more at a discounted price to students of Onitsha Business School.
ha: A matsyain ɓangaren wannan hulɗar, ISACA zasu bayar da shaidar zama mamba da kuma kasuwanci da dama da shaidar fasaha mai tasowa wanda ya kunshi Certified Information System Auditor (CISA), Certified in Risk and Information System Control(CRISC), Certified Information Security Manager (CISM), Certified Data Privacy Solutions Engineer(CDPSE), Certified in Emerging Technology (CET), Information Technology Certified Associate (ITCA) da kuma fiye a ragaggen farashi ga daliban Onitsha Business School.
sw: Kama sehemu ya ushirikiano huu, ISACA itatoa uanachama na safu yake ya vyeti vya biashara na teknolojia iliyoibuka ikiwa ni pamoja na Mkaguzi Aliyeidhinishwa wa mifumo ya taarifa (CISA), Udhibiti wa Hatari na Mifumo ya Taarifa (CRISC), Meneja wa Usalama wa Taarifa Uliyoidhinishwa (CISM), Faragha ya Takwimu iliyoidhinishwa. Mhandisi wa Solutions (CDPSE), aliyeidhinishwa katika Teknolojia inayochipuka (CET), Mshirika aliyeidhinishwa na Teknolojia ya Habari (ITCA), na zaidi kwa bei iliyopunguzwa kwa wanafunzi wa shule ya biashara ya Onitsha.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ara ìbáṣepọ̀ yìí, ISACA yóò pèsè ètò ìjọ́mọ-ẹgbẹ́ àti àwọn ààtò ìwé-ẹ̀rí ìdókòwò àti ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ aṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀jáde, tí ìwọ̀nyìí wà nínú wọn, Oníwèé-ẹ̀rí Aṣàyẹ̀wò àwọn Ẹ̀rọ Ìwífún (OAẸI), Ìgbàwé-ẹ̀rí ní Ìṣàkóso Ewu àti àwọn Ẹ̀rọ Ìwífún (OAEẸI), Oníwèé-ẹ̀rí Olùṣàkóso Ààbò Ìwífún (OOAI), Oníwèé-ẹ̀rí Onísẹ́-ẹ̀rọ Ọ̀nà àbáyọ Ààbò Dátà (OOỌAD), Ìgbàwé-ẹ̀rí ní Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ Aṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀jáde (IIA), Alábàáṣe Oníwèé-ẹ̀rí Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ Ìwífún (AOII) àti bẹ́ẹ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ ní ẹ̀dínwó fún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Òkòwò ti Onitsha.
zu: Njengengxenye yalokhu kubambisana, i-ISACA izohlinzeka ngobulungu kanye nezitifiketi zayo zezamabhizinisi kanye nezitifiketi zezobuchwepheshe obusafufusa okuhlanganisa Umcwaningimabhuku Oqinisekisiwe Wezinhlelo Zolwazi (CISA), Ugunyazwe Ku-Risk and Information Systems Control (CRISC), Umphathi Wokuphepha Kolwazi Oluqinisekisiwe (CISM), Ubumfihlo Beimininingo Eqinisekisiwe. I-Solutions Engineer (CDPSE), Certified in Emerging Technology (CET), Information Technology Certified Associate (ITCA) nokunye okwengeziwe ngentengo enesaphulelo kubafundi base-Onitsha Business School.

am: ዓለም አቀፍ የመማር ድርጅት እንደመሆኑ መጠን፣ አይ ኤስ ኤሲኤ ለምናገለግላቸው ተማሪዎች እና ባለሙያዎች የምናቀርበውን የትምህርት መስዋዕትነት ተፅዕኖ ለማስፋት ትስስርን እና ማህበረሰብን የመገንባት ኃይል እንዳለው ያምናል ይላሉ የISACA ዋና ዳይሬክተር፣ የአካዳሚክ እና የሠራተኞች ልማት።
en: “As a global learning organization, ISACA believes in the power of building connections and community to expand the impact of our educational offerings for the students and professionals we serve,” says Jeff Angle, ISACA Senior Director, Academic and Workforce Development.
ha: “ A matsayin ma’aikatar koyo ta duniya, ISACA sun yarda da ƙarfin gina alaƙa da al’umma domin fadada amfanin bayarda ilimin mu ga dalibai da kwararru da muke wa aiki,”Jeff Angle yace, babban daraktan ISACA, Academic da Workforce Development.
sw: Kama shirika la kimataifa la kujifunzia, ISACA inaamini katika uwezo wa kujenga miunganiko na jumuiya ili kupanua athari za utoaji wetu wa elimu kwa wanafunzi na wataalamu tunaowahudumia, anasema Jeff Angel, Mkurugenzi mkuu wa ISACA, Maendeleo ya masomo na nguvu kazi.
yo: "Gẹ́gẹ́ bí i àjọ olùkọ́ni àgbáyé, ISACA ní ìgbàgbọ́ nínú agbára ṣíṣẹ̀dá ìsopọ̀ àti àwùjọ láti mú ipa ẹ̀kọ́ tí à ń pèsè fún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti onímọ̀ọ́ṣe tí à ń bá ṣiṣẹ́ gbòòrò sí i," Jeff Angle, Olùdarí Àgbà ní ISACA ní ẹ̀ka Ìdàgbàsókè Ẹ̀kọ́-ìwé àti Òṣìṣẹ́.
zu: "Njengenhlangano yokufunda yomhlaba wonke, i-ISACA ikholelwa emandleni okwakha ukuxhumana kanye nomphakathi ukwandisa umthelela weminikelo yethu yemfundo kubafundi nongoti esisebenzela bona," kusho uJeff Angle, uMqondisi Omkhulu we-ISACA, Ukuthuthukiswa Kwezemfundo Nokusebenza Kwabasebenzi.

am: ከኦኒቻ ቢዝነስ ትምህርት ቤት ጋር ስላለን አጋርነት እና ለተማሪዎች አዳዲስ የመማር እና የሙያ መንገዶችን ለመክፈት እና በዲጂታል እምነት ዙሪያ ትርጕም ባለው ውይይት ለመሳተፍ በጋራ ልናደርጋቸው ስለምንችላቸው እርምጃዎች ደስተኞች ነን።
en: “We are excited about our partnership with Onitsha Business School and the strides we can make together to open new learning and career pathways for students and engage in meaningful conversations around digital trust.”
ha: “Muna farin ciki game da hulɗarmu da Onitsha Business School da kuma matakin da zamu iya ɗauka a tare dominbuɗe sababbin hanyoyin koyo da aiki ga dalibai da kuma yin tattaunawa mai ma’ana dangane da amincin fasahar zamani.”
sw: Tunafurahia kuhusu ushirikiano wetu na shule ya biashara ya Onitsha na hatua tunazoweza kufanya pamoja ili kufungua njia mpya ya kujifunza na taaluma kwa wanafunzi na kushiriki katika mazungumzo ya maana kuhusu uaminifu wa kidijitali
yo: "Inú wa dùn fún ìbáṣepọ̀ wa pẹ̀lú Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Òkòwò ti Onitsha àti àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ ńlá tí a lè jọ gbé papọ̀ láti ṣí àwọn ọ̀nà ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti iṣẹ́ tuntun fún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti láti ní àwọn ìtàkúrọ̀sọ onítumọ̀ nípa ìgbẹkẹ̀lé orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára."
zu: “Sijabulile ngokubambisana kwethu ne-Onitsha Business School kanye nezinyathelo esingazithatha ndawonye ukuze sivule izindlela ezintsha zokufunda nezindlela zomsebenzi zabafundi futhi sizibandakanye ezingxoxweni ezinengqondo mayelana nokwethembeka kwedijithali.”

am: ኦኒቻ ቢዝነስ ትምህርት ቤት( ኦቢኤስ) በናይጄሪያ አናምብራ ግዛት ኦኒቻ የንግድ ከተማ ውስጥ እና በአከባቢው ያለውን የንግድ፣ የኢንዱስትሪ እና የሥራ ፈጠራ ችሎታዎችን ለማዳበር እና ለማሰልጠን ተገቢ የትምህርት ሀብቶችን ለማዳበር የተቀየሰ ተነሳሽነት ነው።
en: “Onitsha Business School (OBS) is an initiative designed to harness appropriate educational resources to develop and train the massive pool of commercial, industrial and entrepreneurial talents in and around the commercial city of Onitsha in Anambra State, Nigeria.
ha: “Onitsha Business School (OBS) wani shiri ne da aka tsara shi domin samar da kayan amfanin neman ilimi domin horarwa da bunkasa ƙwarewar cinikayya, masana’anta da sana’o’in hannu masu dinbin yawa a ciki da wajen birnin kasuwanci na Onitsha dake jahar Anambra, Nijeriya.
sw: Shule ya biashara ya Onitsha (OBS) ni mpango uliyobuniwa kutumia rasilimali zinazofaa za elimu ili kukuza na kufundisha kundi kubwa la vipaji vya kibiashara, viwanda na ujasiriamali ndani na karibu na jiji la kibiashara la Onitsha kwenye jimbo la Anambra, Nigeria.
yo: "Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Òkòwò ti Onitsha (IOO) jẹ́ ètò àtinúdá ti a ṣètò láti ṣe àmúlò àwọn èlò iṣẹ́ ajẹmẹ́kọ̀ọ́wé tí ó tọ́ láti mú ìdàgbàsókè bá àti láti kọ́ àkójọ àwọn ẹ̀bùn ní ẹ̀ka ìṣòwò, ilé-iṣẹ́ àti olùṣòwò ní ìlú olówò Onitsha ní Ìpínlẹ̀ Anambra, Nigeria àti àwọn agbègbè rẹ̀.
zu: “I-Onitsha Business School (OBS) iwuhlelo olwenzelwe ukusebenzisa izinsiza zezemfundo ezifanele ukuthuthukisa nokuqeqesha inqwaba yamathalente ezentengiselwano, ezezimboni kanye nezamabhizinisi edolobheni eliseduze nelase-Onitsha eSifundazweni sase-Anambra, eNigeria.

am: ከ50 ዓመታት በላይ ኢሳካ ምርጥ ተሰጥኦዎችን፣ እውቀትን እና ትምህርትን በቴክኖሎጂ በማጐልበት በሙያቸው እንዲሻሻሉ እና ድርጅቶቻቸውን እንዲለውጡ አድርጓል።
en: For more than 50 years, ISACA has advanced the best talent, expertise and learning in technology with credentials, education, and community to progress their careers and transform their organisations.
ha: Fiye da shekaru 50, ISACA sun bunkasa mafi kyawun fasaha, kwarewa da kuma koyo a fasaha tare da takardu, ilimi, da al’umma domin cigaban aikinsu da kuma kawo sauyi a ma’aikatan su.
sw: Kwa zaidi ya miaka 50, ISACA imeendeleza talanta bora, utaalamu na kujifunza katika teknolojia na sifa, elimu na jamii ili kuendeleza taaluma zao na kubadilisha mashirika yao.
yo: Láti ó lé ní ọdún 50 kọjá sẹ́yìn, ISACA ti mú ìtẹ̀síwájú bá ẹ̀bùn àwọn ọ̀dọ́, ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe àti ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ nínú ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ pẹ̀lú ìwé-ẹ̀rí, ẹ̀kọ́ àti àwùjọ láti mú ìlọsíwájú bá iṣẹ́ wọn àti láti mú àyípadà bá àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ wọn.
zu: Eminyakeni engaphezu kwengama-50, i-ISACA isithuthukise amathalente ahamba phambili, ongoti abaziwayo nokufunda kwezobuchwepheshe, ezemfundo, kanye nomphakathi ukuze bathuthuke emisebenzini yabo futhi baguqule izinhlangano zabo.

am: ከኢሳካ ጋር ስላለው አጋርነት እና በደቡብ ምሥራቅ ናይጄሪያ ክልል ውስጥ በዲጂታል እምነት ባለሙያዎች ላይ ስላለው የለውጥ ተጽዕኖ በጣም ደስተኞች ነን ብለዋል ፕሮፌሰር ኦሉሴጉን ኦኒትሻ ቢዝነስ ትምህርት ቤት ዋና ዳይሬክተር ዳፖ ሶግቤሳን።
en: We are delighted about this partnership with ISACA and the transformative impact it will have on digital trust professionals in the Southeastern region of Nigeria,” says Professor Olusegun ‘Dapo Sogbesan, Director General, Onitsha Business School.
ha: Muna matukar farin ciki da hulɗar mu da ISACA da kuma sauyi mai amfani da zasu samu akan kwararrun masu amincin fasahar zamani a yankin kudu maso gabashin Nijeriya,”professor Olusegun Dapo Sogbesan ya fada, babban darakta, na Onitsha Business School.
sw: Tumefurahishwa na ushikiano huu na ISACA na matokeo ya mageuzi ambayo watakuwa nayo kwa wataalamu wa uaminifu wa kidijitali katika eneo la kusini mashariki mwa Nigeria anasema profesa Olusegun Dapo Sogbesan, Mkurugenzi mkuu wa shule ya biashara ya Onitsha.
yo: Inú wa dùn fún ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú ISACA yìí àti ipa aláyìídà tí yóò ní lórí àwọn onímọ̀ọ́ṣe fún ìgbẹkẹ̀lé orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára ní ẹkùn Gúúsù ìlà-oòrùn ilẹ̀ Nigeria," Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Olusegun 'Dapo Sogbesan, Olùdarí Gbogbogbo ní Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Òkòwò ti Onitsha fèsì.
zu: Sijabule ngalobu budlelwano ne-ISACA kanye nomthelela woguquko oluzoba nawo kongoti bezokwethembeka kwedijithali esifundeni esiseNingizimu neMpumalanga eNigeria, "kusho uSolwazi Olusegun 'Dapo Sogbesan, uMqondisi Jikelele, e-Onitsha Business School.

am: በተጨማሪም፣ የዚህ ትብብር አካል በመሆን የኦኒትሻ ቢዝነስ ትምህርት ቤት እና የኢሳካ አቡጃ ቻፕተር መምህራን እና አባላት በጋራ በዎርክሾፖች፣ ኮንፈረንሶች እና ሌሎች ዝግጅቶች ላይ በመሳተፍ የሃሳቦችን፣ እውቀቶችን እና ምርጥ ልምዶችን መጋራት ያበረታታሉ።
en: Additionally, as part of this collaboration, faculty and members of Onitsha Business School and ISACA Abuja Chapter will engage together in workshops, conferences and other events to promote the sharing of ideas, knowledge and best practices.
ha: Kari akan haka, a ɓangare na wannan hadin guiwa, faculty da mambobi na Onitsha Business School da shiyar ISACA dake Abuja za suyi aiki tare a tattaunawa, taruka da sauran bukukuwa domin bayyana ra’ayi, ilimi da mafi kyawun aiki a bayyane.
sw: Zaidi ya hayo, kama sehemu ya ushirikiano huu, kitivo na wanachama wa shule ya biashara ya Onitsha na sura ya ISACA Abuja watashiriki pamoja kwenye warsha, makongamano na matukio mengine ili kukuza ushirikiano wa mawazo, ujuzi na mazoezi bora.
yo: Ní àfikún, gẹ́gẹ́ bí i ara ìbáṣepọ̀ yìí, ẹ̀ka ẹ̀kọ́ àti àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Òkòwò ti Onitsha àti ISACA Ẹ̀ka Abuja yóò jọ ṣiṣẹ́ pọ̀ ní àwọn àyè iṣẹ́, àwọn ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti àwọn ètò mìíràn tí yóò ṣe ìgbélárugẹ pínpín èrò, ìmọ̀ àti ọ̀nà ìṣe tí ó dára jùlọ.
zu: Ukwengeza kulokhu, njengengxenye yalokhu kubambisana, umnyango kanye namalungu e-Onitsha Business School kanye ne-ISACA Abuja Chapter bazohlanganyela ndawonye kumihlangano yokucobelelana ngolwazi, izinkomfa neminye imicimbi ukukhuthaza ukwabelana ngemibono, ulwazi kanye nemikhuba emihle yokusebenza.

am: የአቡጃ ምዕራፍ ስትራቴጂካዊ እቅድ አካል እንደመሆኑ የአካዳሚክ ግንኙነቶች አገናኝ ቡድናችን በምዕራብ አፍሪካ የትምህርት ማህበረሰብ ውስጥ የቢዝነስ ቴክኖሎጂ መሪ እንደመሆኑ የኢሳካ ምስልን በንቃት በማጐልበት እንዲሁም በአካዳሚክ እና በተለማማጆች መካከል ግንዛቤ እና መስተጋብር እንዲጨምር አድርጓል።
en: “As part of the Abuja chapter’s strategic plan, our academic relations liaison team has actively enhanced the image of ISACA as a leader in business technology within the education community in West Africa and increased awareness and interaction between academia and practitioners.
ha: “A ɓangaren tsarin dabarun shiyar Abuja, masu hulɗa na ɓangaren alaƙarmu ta ilimi sun kyautata hoton ISACA a matsayinsu na shugaba a kasuwancin fasaha a tsakanin al’ummar ilimi a Afirka ta yamma kuma sun kara yawan fadakarwas da tattaunawa tsakanin masu karatu da masu aiki.
sw: Kama sehemu ya mpango mkakati wa jiji la Abuja, jopo letu la mawasiliano ya mahusiano ya kitaalam imeboresha kikamilifu taswira ya ISACA kama kiongozi kwenye teknolojia ya biashara ndani ya jumuiya ya elimu Afrika magharibi na kuongeza ufahamu na mwingiliano kati ya wasomi na watendaji.
yo: "Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ara ìgbésẹ̀ elétò ẹ̀ka Abuja, ìgbìmọ̀ ajíròrò ìbáṣepọ̀ ajẹmẹ́kọ̀ọ́wé wa ti mú ìdàgbàsókè bá ìwòye ISACA gẹ́gẹ́ bí i olórí ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ olókòwò láàárín àwùjọ ẹlẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ní Ìwọ̀-oòrùn Africa tí wọ́n sì mú ìbáṣe àti ìmòye láàárín àwọn ẹlẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti òníṣẹ́ pọ̀ sí i.
zu: “Njengengxenye yohlelo lwesu lesahluko se-Abuja, ithimba lethu labaxhumanisi nobudlelwano bezemfundo liye lathuthukisa indlela ebukeka ngayo i-ISACA njengomholi wezobuchwepheshe kwezamabhizinisi phakathi komphakathi wezemfundo eNtshonalanga ne-Afrika futhi lakhulisa ukuqwashisana nokusebenzisana phakathi kwezemfundo nabasebenzi.

am: ከሣሃራ በታች ባሉ የአፍሪካ አገራት ከሚገኙ በርካታ የአካዳሚክ ሽርክናዎች መካከል የመጀመሪያውን በማክበር ደስተኞች ነን" ብለዋል የኢሳካ አቡጃ ቻፕተር ፕሬዝዳንት ኢማኑኤል ኦሞኬ።
en: We are elated to celebrate the first of several academic partnerships to come across sub-saharan Africa,” says Emmanuel Omoke, ISACA Abuja Chapter President.
ha: Muna farin cikin yin murnar hulɗar karatu na farko daga cikin huldodi masu yawa wanda ya iso sub-saharan Africa,” shugaban shiyar ISACA dake Abuja, Emmanuel Omoke ya faɗa.
sw: Tunayo furaha kusherehekea ushirikiano wa kwanza wa kitaalamu katika Afrika ya Kusini mwa jangwa la sahara, anasema Emanuel Omoke, Rais wa ISACA Abuja.
yo: Inú wa dùn láti ṣe àjọyọ̀ àkọ́kọ́ onírúurú ìbáṣepọ̀ ajẹmẹ́kọ̀ọ́wé tí yóò wá sí Gúúsù Sahara Africa," Emmanuel Omoke, Ààrẹ Ẹ̀ka ISACA Abuja dáhùn.
zu: Sijabule kakhulu ukugubha ubudlelwano kwezemfundo bokuqala kobuningi obuke babakhona e-sub-saharan Africa,” kusho u-Emmanuel Omoke, uMongameli we-ISACA Abuja Chapter.

am: ስለ ኢሳካ
en: About ISACA
ha: Game da ISACA
sw: Kuhusu ISACA
yo: Nípa ISACA
zu: Mayelana ne-ISACA

am: አይሳካ(®ደብሊውደብሊውደብሊው.አይሳካ.ኦርግ) ®( www.isaca.org) ግለሰቦችን እና ድርጅቶችን በዲጂታል መተማመን ፍለጋቸው የሚያራምድ ዓለም አቀፍ ማህበረሰብ ነው።
en: ISACA® (www.isaca.org) is a global community advancing individuals and organizations in their pursuit of digital trust.
ha: ISACA (www.isaca.org) al’umma ce ta duniya dake inganta mutane da ma’aikatu a wajen neman amincin fasahar zamaninsu.
sw: ISACA (www.isaca.org) ni jumuiya ya kimataifa inayoendeleza watu binafsi na mashirika kwenye harakati zao za uaminifu wa kidijitali.
yo: ISACA® (www.isaca.org) jẹ́ àwùjọ àgbáyé tí ó ń mú ìdàgbàsókè bá àwọn èèyàn àti àwọn àjọ bí wọ́n ti ṣe ń ṣe àwárí ìgbẹkẹ̀lé orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára.
zu: I-ISACA® (www.isaca.org) umphakathi womhlaba wonke othuthukisa abantu nezinhlangano ekutheni bathole idijithali ethembekile.

am: ከ 50 ዓመታት በላይ፣ አይሳካ ግለሰቦችን እና ድርጅቶችን በሙያቸው እንዲራመዱ፣ ድርጅቶቻቸውን እንዲለውጡ እና የበለጠ እምነት የሚጣልበት እና ሥነ ምግባራዊ ዲጂታል ዓለም እንዲገነቡ በእውቀት፣ በምስክር ወረቀቶች፣ በትምህርት፣ በስልጠና እና በማህበረሰብ አስታጥቋል።
en: For more than 50 years, ISACA has equipped individuals and enterprises with the knowledge, credentials, education, training and community to progress their careers, transform their organizations, and build a more trusted and ethical digital world.
ha: Fiye da shekaru 50, ISACA sun wadata mutane da kamfununuwa da kayan aiki da ilimin,takardu, karatu, horo da kuma al’umma domin su ci gaba da aikinsu, su kawo sauyi a ma’aikatunsu, sannan su gina duniyar fasahar zamani mafi aminci gaskiya.
sw: Kwa zaidi ya miaka 50, ISACA imewapa watu vifaa, biashara na maarifa, stakabadhi, elimu, mafunzo na jumuiya ya kuendeleza taaluma zao, kubadilisha mashirika yao na kujenga ulimwengu wa kidijitali unaoaminika zaidi na wenye maadili.
yo: Láti ó lé ní ọdún 50 kọjá sẹ́yìn, ISACA ti fún àwọn èèyàn àti ilé-iṣẹ́ ní ìmọ̀, àwọn ìwé-ẹ̀rí, ẹ̀kọ́, ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti àwùjọ láti lè tẹ̀síwájú nínú iṣẹ́ wọn, mú àyípadà bá ilé-iṣẹ́ wọn, àti láti ṣẹ̀dá àyè díjítà tí ó ṣe é fọkàn tán tí ó sì ní àṣà ìṣe.
zu: Sekuyiminyaka engaphezu kwengama-50, i-ISACA ihlomise abantu namabhizinisi ngolwazi, iziqinisekiso, ezemfundo, ukuqeqeshwa kanye nomphakathi ukuze bathuthuke emisebenzini yabo, baguqule izinhlangano zabo, bakhe izwe ledijithali elithembekile nelinokuziphatha okuhle.

am: ኢሳካ እንደ መረጃ ደኅንነት፣ አስተዳደር፣ ማረጋገጫ፣ አደጋ፣ ግላዊነት እና ጥራት ባሉ ዲጂታል የመተማመን መስኮች ውስጥ የሚሠሩ ከ 170,000 በላይ አባላቱን እውቀት የሚጠቀም ዓለም አቀፍ የሙያ ማኅበር እና የመማር ድርጅት ነው።
en: ISACA is a global professional association and learning organization that leverages the expertise of its more than 170,000 members who work in digital trust fields such as information security, governance, assurance, risk, privacy and quality.
ha: ISACA ƙwararriyar ƙungiya ce ta duniya kuma ma’aikata ce ta koyo da ke taimakawa ƙwarewar mambobinta fiye da 170,000 da suke aiki a guraren aminci na fasahar zamani kamar information security, governance, assurance, risk, privacy da quality.
sw: ISACA ni chama cha kitaalamu cha kimataifa na shirika la kujifunzia ambalo linatumia ujuzi wa wanachama wake zaidi ya 170,000 wanaofanya kazi katika nyanja za uaminifu wa dijitali kama vile usalama wa habari, utawala, uhakiki, hatari, faragha na ubora.
yo: ISACA jẹ́ àjọ onímọ̀ọ́ṣe àgbáyé àti ilé-iṣẹ́ ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tí ó ń ṣàmúlò ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ tí wọ́n ju 170,000, tí wọ́n ń ṣiṣẹ́ ní àwọn ẹ̀ka ìgbẹkẹ̀lé orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára bí i ààbò ìwífún, ètò ìṣàkóso, ìṣèdánilójú, ewu, àṣírí bíbò àti ìwọ̀n ìmúdára.
zu: I-ISACA iyinhlangano yabasebenzi nenhlangano yokufunda yomhlaba wonke esebenzisa ubuchwepheshe bamalungu ayo angaphezu kuka-170,000 asebenza emikhakheni yezokwethembeka kwedijithali efana nokuvikeleka kolwazi, ukubusa, isiqiniseko, ubungozi, ubumfihlo kanye nekhwalithi.

am: በዓለም ዙሪያ 225 ምዕራፎችን ጨምሮ በ 188 አገሮች ውስጥ ይገኛል።
en: It has a presence in 188 countries, including 225 chapters worldwide.
ha: Ta bayyana a kasashe 188, wanda ya hada da shiyoyi 225 a duniya baki ɗaya.
sw: ina uwepo katika nchi 188, pamoja na sura 225 duniani.
yo: Ó ní ojú ní àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè 188, pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹ̀ka 225 káàkiri àgbáyé.
zu: Itholakala emazweni ayi-188, kufaka phakathi izahluko ezingama-225 emhlabeni jikelele.

am: የኢሳካ ፋውንዴሽን ዋን ኢን ቴክ በመባል በሚታወቀው ፋውንዴሽኑ አማካኝነት አነስተኛ ሀብት ላላቸው እና ዝቅተኛ ውክልና ላላቸው ህዝቦች የአይቲ ትምህርት እና የሙያ ጎዳናዎችን ይደግፋል።
en: Through its foundation One In Tech, ISACA supports IT education and career pathways for underresourced and underrepresented populations.
ha: Ta dalilin ƙungiyarsu ta One In Tech, ISACA ta tallafawa ilimin IT da hanyoyin aiki ga mutanen da ba su da kuɗi kuma ba su da wakilci.
sw: Kupitia msingi wake wa One In Tech, ISACA inasaidia elimu ya IT na njia za kazi kwa watu wasiyo na rasilimali na uwakilishi mdogo.
yo: Nípasẹ̀ ìdásílẹ̀ rẹ̀ One In Tech, ISACA ń ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn ẹ̀kọ́ Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ Ìwífún àti ọ̀nà iṣẹ́ fún àwọn èèyàn tí wọ́n kò ní tó àti àwọn tí wọ́n wọ́pọ̀ lẹ́nu iṣẹ́ kan.
zu: Ngesisekelo sayo i-One In Tech, i-ISACA isekela imfundo ye-IT kanye nezindlela zemisebenzi kubantu abangenazo izinsiza ezidingekayo nabangamelwe muntu.

am: ስለ ኦኒሻ ቢዝነስ ትምህርት ቤት
en: About Onitsha Business School
ha: Game da Onitsha Business School
sw: Kuhusu shule ya biashara ya Onitsha
yo: Nípa Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Òkòwò ti Onitsha
zu: Mayelana ne-Onitsha Business School

am: ኦኒትሻ የንግድ ትምህርት ቤት (ኦቢኤስ) ኦኒትሻ የንግድ ከተማ ውስጥ እና አካባቢዋ ያለውን ግዙፍ የንግድ, የኢንዱስትሪ እና የድርጅት ተሰጥኦዎች ለማዳበር እና ለማሰልጠን ተገቢ የትምህርት ሀብቶችን ለመጠቀም ታስቦ የተዘጋጀ ነው።
en: Onitsha Business School (OBS) is an initiative designed to harness appropriate educational resources to develop and train the massive pool of commercial, industrial and entrepreneurial talents in and around the commercial city of Onitsha.
ha: Onitsha Business School (OBS) wani tsari ne da aka shirya shi don samar da kayan karatu da suka dace da cigaba da kuma bayar da horo ga masu kwazon cinikayya, masana’o’in hannu masu dinbin yawa a ciki da wajen birnin kasuwanci na Onitsha.
sw: Shule ya biashara ya Onitsha (OBS) ni mpango uliyobuniwa kutumia rasilimali zinazofaa za elimu ili kukuza na kufundisha kundi kubwa la vipaji vya kibiashara, viwanda na ujasiriamali ndani na karibu na jiji la kibiashara la Onitsha kwenye jimbo la Anambra,.
yo: "Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Òkòwò ti Onitsha (IOO) jẹ́ ètò àtinúdá ti a ṣètò láti ṣe àmúlò àwọn èlò iṣẹ́ ajẹmẹ́kọ̀ọ́wé tí ó tọ́ láti mú ìdàgbàsókè bá àti láti kọ́ àkójọ àwọn ẹ̀bùn ní ẹ̀ka ìṣòwò, ilé-iṣẹ́ àti olùṣòwò ní ìlú olówò Onitsha ní Ìpínlẹ̀ Anambra, Nigeria àti àwọn agbègbè rẹ̀.
zu: I-Onitsha Business School (OBS) iwuhlelo oluklanyelwe ukusebenzisa izinsiza zezemfundo ezifanele ukuthuthukisa nokuqeqesha iqoqo elikhulu lamathalenta ezentengiselwano, ezezimboni kanye nezamabhizinisi edolobheni eliseduze nelase-Onitsha.

am: ምሥረታዋ የተቀሰቀሰው በከተማይቱና በአናምብራ ግዛት በተለይም በናይጀሪያ ልዩና ልዩ ፍላጎት የተነሳ ቢሆንም ትኩረቷና ተልዕኮዋ በስትራቴጂክ የተነደፈ የአመራር፣ የሙያና የንግድ ተዛማጅ የትምህርት፣ የሙያና ሙያዊና ክህሎት ላይ የተመሰረተ ፕሮግራም ለተመረጡ ተማሪዎች ምድብ በማድረስ በስፋት የተወደደ የትምህርት ማዕከል ለመሆን ነው።
en: While its establishment has been triggered by the peculiar and specific needs of the city and Anambra state, Nigeria in particular, its focus and mission is to become a widely acclaimed Center for educational excellence delivering a strategically crafted range of leadership, vocational and business related academic, professional, and skills-based programs to a selected category of prospective students.
ha: A yayin da aka ƙaddamar da shi dalilin bukatun birnin na musamman da kuma jahar Anambra, musamman Nijeriya, sun maida hankali ne da burin zama santar da zata samu karbuwa a ko’ina domin bayarda cikakken ilimin shugabanci da akatsara shi cikin dabaru, wajen koyon sana’a da da kuma karatun da ya shafi kasuwanci, kwararre, da kuma shirye shiryen da suka shafi koyon dabaru ga wasu yankin daliabai da aka zaɓa.
sw: ingawa uanzishwaji wake umechochewa na mahitaji ya kipekee na mahususi ya jiji na jimbo la Anambra nchini Nigeria, lengo na dhamira yake ni kuwa kituo kinachosifika sana kwa ubora wa elimu kinachotoa anuwai ya uongozi, ufundi na biashara inayohusiana na taaluma, programu za kitaalamu zinazotegemea ujuzi wa aina iliyochaguliwa ya wanafunzi wanaotarajiwa.
yo: Nígbà tí ó jẹ́ pé àwọn ìnílò pàtàkì kan ní ìlú náà àti ìpínlẹ̀ Anambra, ilẹ̀ Nigeria ní pàtó ni o mú ìdásílẹ̀ rẹ̀ wáyé, àfojúsùn àti ìlépa rẹ̀ ni láti di Gbọ̀ngán fún ẹ̀kọ́ tí ó peregede tí yóò di mímọ̀ káàkiri. Èyí tí yóò máa pèsè oríṣiríṣi ètò ìdarí, iṣẹ́-ọwọ́, ẹ̀kọ́ ajẹmókòwò, ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe àti àwọn ètò oníṣẹ́ tí wọ́n fi ètò gbé kalẹ̀ fún ẹ̀yà àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tí yóò wá síbẹ̀.
zu: Nakuba yasungulwa ngenxa yezidingo ezingavamile neziqondile zedolobha kanye nesifunda sase-Anambra, eNigeria ikakhulukazi, ukugxila kwayo kanye nomgomo wayo wokuba yiSikhungo esihlonishwa umhlaba wonke sokwenza kahle kwezemfundo esiletha uhla lobuholi obuklanywe ngamasu obuholi, umsebenzi wezandla kanye nezamabhizinisi. , izinhlelo zobungcweti, nezisekelwe kumakhono esigabeni esikhethiwe sabafundi abangaba abafundi.

am: ይህ ትምህርት ቤት ተማሪዎች የንግዱን ዓለም ተግባራዊ እውነታዎች ለመረዳት ከክፍል ውጭ ይወስዳል።
en: This school takes students beyond the classroom to understand the practical realities of the business world.
ha: Wannan Makarar tana ɗaukan dalibai fiye da cikin aji domin su fahimta a aikace abinda ke faruwa a duniyar kasuwanci.
sw: shule hii inachukua wanafunzi zaidi ya darasa ili kuelewa hali halisi ya dunia ya biashara.
yo: Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ yìí ń mú àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ kọjá yàrá ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ láti mọ̀ nípa bí ó ṣe ń lọ ní ayé òkòwò gan ni.
zu: Lesi sikole sifundisa abafundi okungaphezu kokwenziwa ekilasini ukuze baqonde amaqiniso ngomhlaba wezamabhizinisi.

am: ተፈታታኝ ሁኔታዎችን ለመወጣት የአስተዳደር እና የመሪዎች ችሎታ ይጎለብት።
en: The Capabilities of managers and leaders are enhanced to address challenges.
ha: Ana bunkasa iyawar manajoji da shugabannin domin tunkarar kalubale.
sw: uwezo wa wasimamizi na viongozi unaimarishwa ili kushughulikia changamoto.
yo: Wọ́n ń ṣàmúlò ipa àwọn olùṣàkóso àti àwọn olórí láti yanjú àwọn ìpènijà.
zu: Amakhono abaphathi nabaholi ayathuthukiswa ukuze kubhekwane nezinselele.

am: ሰዎች ለከፍተኛ አስተሳሰብ የተጋለጡ ከመሆናቸውም በላይ የንግድ ድርጅቶች ስኬታማ ለመሆን የሚያስችል ስትራቴጂያዊ ጥረት እንዲያደርጉ ይገፋፋሉ።
en: People are exposed to leading edge-thinking and by that ensure that businesses have the strategic drive to succeed.
ha: Ana wayar da mutane game da tunani na zamani da wannan kuma ake tabbatar da kasuwanci ya samu dabarun cigaba da nasara.
sw: Watu wamejikita zaidi kwenye fikra kuu za uongozi na kwa hiyo wanahakikisha kuwa biashara zina msukumo wa kimkakati wa kufanikiwa.
yo: Wọ́n ń mú àwọn èèyàn mọ dídarí ìròrí ọ̀nà àbáyọ tí ìyẹn yóò sì ṣe àrídájú pé àwọn òkòwò ní ipa elétò láti ṣe àṣeyọrí.
zu: Abantu balekelelwa ukuba bakwazi ukucabanga futhi ngalokho baqinisekisa ukuthi amasu abanawo ngamabhizinisi ayaphumelela.

am: ሃክቲቪስቶች በናይጀሪያ ላይ የሳይበር ጦርነት አወጁ
en: Hacktivists declare cyber war on Nigeria
ha: Masu yaki da kutse sun bayyana yakin yanar gizo a Nijeriya.
sw: Wahasibu wametangaza vita vya mtandao dhidi ya Nigeria
yo: Àwọn ajìjàgbara agbọ̀nàẹ̀bùrúwayélujára kéde ogun ayélujára ní Nigeria
zu: Ama-Hacktivists amemezela impi yotwamkhathi eNigeria

am: አፕል የራሱን ኤአይ ቻትቦት ሊጀምር ነው፣ እናም አፕል ጂፒቲ ይባላል።
en: Apple is going to launch its own AI chatbot, and it will be called Apple GPT.
ha: Apple zasu ƙaddamar da Al chatbot dinsu, kuma za a kira shi da Apple GPT.
sw: Apple itazindua chatbot yake ya AI, na itaitwa Apple GPT.
yo: Apple máa ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ èlò afọ̀rọ̀jèèyàn Onímọ̀-àtọwọ́dá tiẹ̀, tí yóò sì máa jẹ́ Apple GPT.
zu: I-Apple izokwethula eyayo i-AI chatbot, futhi izobizwa nge-Apple GPT.

am: አፖል ከቴክኖሎጂ አዝማሚያዎች ጋር በመተባበርና ተጠቃሚዎቹን ቴክኖሎጂው ከዚህ በፊት ኖሮ እንደማያውቅ ለማሳመን የሚያስችል ዘዴ አለው።
en: Apple has a way of joining technology trends and convincing its users that the tech never existed before.
ha: Apple nada hanyar shiga yayin fasaha da kuma gamsar da masu amfani da shi cewar ba a taba samun fadshar a baya ba.
sw: Apple ina njia ya kujiunga na teknolojia inayovuma na kuwashawishi watumiaji wake kuwa teknolojia hiyo haijawahi kutokea hapo kabla.
yo: Apple ní ọ̀nà tí ó fi máa ń dara pọ̀ mọ́ àṣà ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tí yóò sì tún mú àwọn aṣàmúlò rẹ̀ gbàgbọ́ pé ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ náà kò tí wà tẹ́lẹ̀.
zu: I-Apple inendlela yokujoyina izitayela zobuchwepheshe futhi benze abayisebenzisayo bakholwe ukuthi ubuchwepheshe abuzange bubekhona ngaphambilini.

am: የአፕል ጂፒቲ እንዴት እንደሚጎትት ለማየት እፈልጋለሁ።
en: I really want to see how it will pull off Apple GPT.
ha: Ina matukar son naga yadda zasu tabbatar da Apple GPT.
sw: Ninatamani kuona namna itakavyoitoa Apple GPT.
yo: Èmi tilẹ̀ fẹ́ mọ bí yóò tí ṣe ṣe Apple GPT.
zu: Ngifuna ngempela ukubona ukuthi izoyikhipha kanjani i-Apple GPT.

am: የሚያሳዝነው ግን በቅርቡ አይመጣም ።
en: Sadly, it is not coming anytime soon.
ha: Abun haushi, ba zai faru ba a nan kusa.
sw: Kwa kusikitisha haitakuja hivi karibuni.
yo: Ó ṣeni láàánú pé kò lè wá láìpẹ́ rárá.
zu: Okudabukisayo ukuthi angeke ifiki maduzene.

am: እንደ አብዛኞቹ ነገሮች ሁሉ አፖልም ጣፋጭ ጊዜውን የሚወስድ ከመሆኑም በላይ ፍጹም ያልሆነ ቴክኖሎጂ ወይም ገጽታ እንዲዘረጋ ጫና አይደረግበትም።
en: Like most things, Apple is taking its sweet time and will not be pressured into rolling out a technology or feature that is not perfect.
ha: Kamar abubuwa da dama, Apple na ɗaukan lokacinsu sosai kuma ba zasu bari a takura musu ba wajen samar da fasahar da bata zama dari bisa dari ba.
sw: Kama vitu vingi, Apple inachukua wasaha wake mzuri na haitashinikizwa kuzindua teknolojia au kipengele ambacho siyo kamili.
yo: Bí ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn nǹkan, Apple ń fi ara balẹ̀ tí kò sì ní jẹ́ kí ojú ó kan óun láti fi ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àbí àbùdá tí kò pé síta.
zu: Njengezinto eziningi, i-Apple ithatha isikhathi sayo futhi ngeke ibe nengcindezi yokukhipha ubuchwepheshe noma isici esingaphelele.

am: ምንም እንኳ በሐምሌ ወር የወጣ አንድ የብሉምበርግ ሪፖርት የአፕል ጂ ፒ ቲ በ2024 ሊመጣ እንደሚችል ቢነግረንም የአፕል ተንታኝ የሆኑት ሚንግ ቺ ኩው ገና ብዙ ዓመታት እንደቀሩ ተናግረዋል።
en: Although a Bloomberg report told us in July that Apple GPT could be coming in 2024, Apple analyst, Ming-Chi Kuo said it is still many years away.
ha: Duk da dai rahoton Bloomberg ya gaya mana a watan Juli cewar Apple GPT zai iya zuwa a 2024, mai nazarin Apple, Ming-Chi Kuo yace da akwai sauran shekaru kafinnan.
sw: ingawa ripoti ya Bloomberg ilituambia kuwa mnamo Julai Apple GPT inaweza kuzinduliwa mwaka 2024, mchambuzi wa Apple, Ming-Chi Kuo alisema bado ni miaka mingi.
yo: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé àbọ̀ Bloomberg sọ fún ní oṣù Keje pé Apple GPT lè jáde síta 2024, aṣètúpalẹ̀ ní Apple, Ming-Chi Kuo sọ pé ọdún tí yóò jáde sí jìnnà réré.
zu: Nakuba umbiko we-Bloomberg usitshele ngoNtulikazi ukuthi i-Apple GPT ingase ifike ngo-2024, umhlaziyi we-Apple, uMing-Chi Kuo uthe kusasele iminyaka eminingi.

am: መቼም ቢሆን፣ የአፕል ፋንቦይስ የአፕል ጂፒቲ እስኪጀምር ድረስ ኤ አይ ቻት ቦቶች ጨርሶ እንዳልነበሩ ለማስመሰል መንገድ እንደሚያገኙ አውቃለሁ።
en: Regardless of when it comes out, I know Apple fanboys will find a way to make Apple GPT seem like AI chatbots never existed until the launch of Apple's
ha: Koma dai wani lokaci zata fito, nasan cewa Apple fanboys zasu samu hanyar sanya Apple GPT ya zamo kamar Al chatbots bai taba kasancewa ba sai lokacin da suka ƙaddamar da na su.
sw: Bila kujali itazinduliwa lini, najua mashabiki wa Apple watapata njia ya kufanya ili Apple GPT ionekane kama gumzo la AI Chatbots ambazo hazikuwepo hadi kuzinduliwa kwa Apple.
yo: Ìgbàkúùgbà tí yóò bá jáde, mo mọ̀ pé àwọn olùfẹ́ Apple yóò wá ọ̀nà láti jẹ́ kí Apple GPT mú àwọn èlò afọ̀rọ̀jèèyàn Onímọ̀-àtọwọ́dá mìíràn kò tilẹ̀ ṣáájú ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ti Apple
zu: Noma ingaphuma nini, ngiyazi ukuthi abalandeli be-Apple bazothola indlela yokwenza i-Apple GPT ibonakale sengathi i-AI chatbots ayizange ibe khona kuze kube kwethulwa ayakwa-Apple.

am: አፕል የአይ ኤስ ባንድዋጎን እንዲቀላቀል ስንጠብቅ፣ ዛሬ ለእርስዎ ያለኝ ነገር ይኸውልዎት።

zu: Ngenkathi sisalinde i-Apple ukuthi ibe yingxenye yalomphakathi we-AI, nakhu engikuphathele kona namuhla:

sw: Wadukuzi wanakuja nchini Nigeria

am: ወርልድ ኮይን በኢሪስ ስካን በኬንያ ለመቀጠል አቅዷል
en: Worldcoin plans to continue iris scans in Kenya
ha: Worldcoin suna shirin cigaba da ɗaukar hoton kwayar ido a Kenya
sw: Worldcoin inapanga kuendelea na uchunguzi wa irisi nchini Kenya
yo: Worldcoin gbèrò láti túbọ̀ máa ṣe àyẹ̀wò ẹyinjú ni Kenya
zu: I-Worldcoin ihlela ukuqhubeka nokuskena isiyingi samehlo eKenya

am: ረቡዕ ነሐሴ 2፣ 2023 የኬንያ ባለሥልጣናት የፕላኔቷን እያንዳንዱን ሰው አይሪስ በመቃኘት የማንነት ዳታቤዝ ለመፍጠር የሚፈልገውን የክሪፕቶ/ ብሎክቼይን ፕሮጀክት የወርልድኮይን እንቅስቃሴዎችን አቁመዋል።
en: On Wednesday, August 2, 2023, Kenyan authorities suspended the activities of Worldcoin, the crypto/blockchain project that wants to create an identity database for every human on the planet by scanning their iris.
ha: A ranar Laraba, 2 ga Agusta,2023, mahukuntan Kenya suka sallami aikin Worldcoin, aikin crypto/blockchain da yake son samar da bayanai na alamar shaida ga kowanne mutum a duniya ta hanyar ɗaukar hoton kwayar idonsa.
sw: siku ya jumatano, Agosti 2, 2023, Mamlaka za Kenya walisimamisha shughuli za Worldcoin, mradi wa crypto/blockchain ambao unataka kuunda hifadhi ya takwimu za utambulisho kwa kila mtu duniani kwa kuchanganua iris zao.
yo: Ní Ọjọ́'bọ 2 oṣù Kẹjọ, ọdún 2023, àwọn aláṣẹ ilẹ̀ Kenya dá àwọn iṣẹ́ Worldcoin dúró, ó jẹ́ iṣẹ́ àkànṣe owó àkósódù/àká dátà àkósódù tí ó fẹ́ ṣẹ̀dá ibi ìpamọ́ dátà aṣèdámọ̀ fún gbogbo èèyàn ní orílẹ̀ ayé nípa ṣíṣe àyẹ̀wò ẹyinjú wọn.
zu: NgoLwesithathu, zi-2 kuNcwaba wezi-2023, iziphathimandla zaseKenya zamisa imisebenzi ye-Worldcoin, iphrojekthi yebhukunyazi/blockchain efuna ukwakha isizindalwazi sabo bonke abantu emhlabeni ngokuskena isiyingi samehlo abo.

am: እገዳው ቢኖርም ዎርልድ ኮይን ወደ ኋላ አይልም።
en: Despite the suspension, Worldcoin is not backing down.
ha: Duk da datakatar da su din, Worldcoin basu karaya ba.
sw: Licha ya kusimamishwa, Worldcoin haiungi mkono.
yo: Bí wọ́n ti ṣe dá wọn lọ́wọ́ kọ́ tó, Worldcoin ò dẹ̀yìn rárá.
zu: Nakuba imisiwe, iWorldcoin ayihlehli.

ha: Dakata, menene Worldcoin?
sw: Subiri, Worldcoin ni nini?
yo: Dúró ná, kínni Worldcoin?
zu: Ima, yini iWorldcoin?

am: አሁንም ወርልድ ኮይን ፕሮጀክት ሁሉ ስለ ምን እንደሆነ ላይ ፈዚይ ከሆነ፣እዚህ ላይ አጭር መግለጫ ማረጋገጥ ይችላሉ።
en: If you're still fuzzy on what the whole Worldcoin project is all about, you can check out a brief description here.
ha: Idan har yanzu baka gama yarda da abin da dukkan aikin Worldcoin ya kunsa ba, za ka iya duba dan gajeran kwatance a nan.
sw: ikiwa bado hujui mradi wa Worldcoin unamaanisha nini, unaweza kusoma taarifa fupi hapa.
yo: Bí gbogbo iṣẹ́ àkànṣe Worldcoin náà bá sì tún ń rú ọ lójú, o lè ṣe àyẹ̀wò àlàyé ṣókí níbí yìí.
zu: Uma namanje udidekile ngokuthi imayelana nani yonke iphrojekthi ye-Worldcoin, ungabheka incazelo emfushane lapha.

am: ያም ሆነ ይህ ወርልድ ኮይን ለቴክ ክራንች እንደተናገረው ይህንን" ማቆም" እየተጠቀመበት ነው" የተሻለ የመቀላቀል ሂደቶችን እና የሕዝብ ቊጥጥር እርምጃዎችን ለማምጣት።
en: Anyway, Worldcoin, told TechCrunch that it is using this "pause" "to come up with better onboarding processes and crowd control measures.
ha: Duk da haka, Worldcoin, sun gaya wa TechChrunch suna amfani da wannan “dakatarwar” domin samo wata hanayar tafiayrwa mafi kyau da kuma lura da hanyar magance cunkoso.
sw: Hata hivyo Worldcoin iliiambia TechCrunch kuwa inatumia "kusimamishwa" huku "kuja na michakato bora ya uingiaji na hatua za kudhibiti umati.
yo: Àmọ́ ṣá, Worldcoin sọ fún TechCrunch pé òun ń lo àkókò "ìdádúró" yìí "láti wá àwọn ètò ìgbaniwọlé àti ìṣàkóso èrò tí ó dára ju tẹ́lẹ̀ lọ.
zu: Noma kunjalo, i-Worldcoin, itshele i-TechCrunch ukuthi isebenzisa lokhu "kumiswa kwesikhashana" "ukuze iqhamuke nezinqubo ezingcono zokugibela kanye nezindlela zokulawula isixuku.

am: ይህ ከአካባቢያዊ ባለሥልጣናት ጋር በመስራት ወርልድኮይን ስለሚተገብራቸው የግላዊነት እርምጃዎች እና ግዴታዎች ግንዛቤን ለማሳደግ በተጨማሪ ነው።''
en: This is in addition to “work[ing] with local officials to increase understanding of the privacy measures and commitments Worldcoin implements."
ha: Wannan kari ne akan “aiki da mahukuntan cikin gida domin kara fahimtar matakan sirri da kuma kwazon da Worldcoin take aikatawa.”
sw: Hii ni pamoja na kufanya kazi na maafisa wa eneo ili kuongeza uelewa wa hatua za faragha na ahadi zinazotekelezwa na Worldcoin
yo: Èyí wà ní àfikún sí "[ṣíṣe] iṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú àwọn alákòóso ìlú láti jẹ́ kí irú àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ ààbò àti ìfarajìn tí Worldcoin ń lòdi mímọ̀ dáadáa."
zu: Lokhu kungaphezu "kokusebenza nezikhulu zendawo ukuze kwandiswe ukuqonda kwezinyathelo zobumfihlo nezibopho ezisetshenziswa yi-Worldcoin."

am: በኦፕንኤአይ ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ሳም አልትማን የተመሰረተው ወርልድኮይን ከ350,000 በላይ ኬንያውያንን አስመዝግቧል።
en: Co-founded by OpenAI CEO, Sam Altman, Worldcoin has signed up over 350,000 Kenyans.
ha: Wanda shugaban OpenAl ya samar, Sam Altman, Wolrdcoin yayi wa fiye da mutanen Kenya fiye da 350,000 rijista.
sw: Worldcoin ilianzishwa kwa ushirikiano wa Mkurugenzi mtendaji wa OpenAI, Sam Altman, imesajiri wakenya zaidi ya 350,000.
yo: Sam Altman, ẹni tí ó jẹ́ Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí OpenAI ni alájọdásílẹ̀ Worldcoin, àwọn èèyàn ilẹ̀ Kenya tí ó lé ní 350,000 ni wọ́n ti forúkọsílẹ̀ fún ètò náà.
zu: Ixhaswe ngokubambisana ne-OpenAI CEO, uSam Altman, iWorldcoin ibhalise abantu baseKenya abangaphezu kwama-350,000.

am: የ50 ዶላር የምዝገባ ጉርሻ ለማግኘት አይሪስን ለመቃኘት የተሰለፉ ብዙ ሰዎች ታይተዋል።
en: Large crowds of people have been seen queuing up to scan their iris for a $50 signup bonus.
ha: Anga taron mutane da dama sunyi layi domin ɗaukan hoton kwayar idonsu a kan ribar shiga ta $50.
sw: umati mkubwa wa watu ulipanga foleni kuchunguza irisi yao, wapate bonasi ya kujisajiri ya $50.
yo: Ọ̀gọ̀ọ̀rọ́ àwọn èèyàn ni wọ́n ti rí tí wọ́n ń tò láti ṣe àyẹ̀wò ẹyinjú wọn fún owó àjẹmọ́nú fún ìforúkọsílẹ̀.
zu: Izixuku ezinkulu zabantu zibonakale ziklelisa ukuzohlola isiyingi samehlo abo ukuthola ibhonasi yokubhalisa engu-$50.

am: ይህ ብዙ ገንዘብ ነው።አዎ፣ነው።
en: That's a lot of money: Yes, it is.
ha: Wannan kuɗi ne mai yawa: Eh, haka yake.
sw: Hiyo ni pesa nyingi, ndiyo ni pesa nyingi.
yo: Owó tí ó pọ̀ sì ni: Bẹ́ẹ̀ni, ká má parọ́.
zu: Yimali eningi leyo: Yebo, ikhona.

am: ከበርካታ ሳምንታት በፊት ወርልድ ኮይን በይፋ ቢጀመርም 500 ሚሊዮን ዶላር የገንዘብ ድጋፍ አግኝቷል።
en: And while Worldcoin launched officially a few weeks ago, it has secured $500 million in funding.
ha: Kuma Yayin da Worldcoin suka ƙaddamar a hukumance satika kaɗan da suka gabata, sun samu miliyan $500 na tallafi.
sw: Na wakati Worldcoin ilipozinduliwa rasmi majuma machache yaliyopita, tayari imepata ufadhili wa $500 milioni.
yo: Bí ó sì ṣe jẹ́ pé Worldcoin ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ aláṣẹ ní ọ̀sẹ̀ bí i mélòó sẹ́yìn ni, ó ti rí owó ìrànwọ́ mílíọ̀nù $500.
zu: Futhi ngenkathi i-Worldcoin yethulwa ngokusemthethweni emasontweni ambalwa edlule, ithole uxhaso lwezigidi ezingu-500 zamaRandi.

am: ዙም አውት፣የወርልድ ኮይን መግለጫ በኬንያ እንቅስቃሴው መቋረጡን አይገልጽም።
en: Zoom out: Worldcoin's statement doesn't include an admission that its activities have been suspended in Kenya.
ha: Zuko waje: Bayanan Worldcoin basu bayyana cewa sun amince da dakatar da ayyukansu a Kenya ba.
sw: Vuta zaidi: Taarifa ya Worldcoin haijumuishi kukiri kwamba shughuli zake zimesitishwa nchini Kenya.
yo: Kí á wò ó láti òkèèrè: Ọ̀rọ̀ tí Worldcoin fi léde kò sọ pé àwọn iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ ní Kenya ti wà ní ìdádúró.
zu: Hlehlisa: Isitatimende se-Worldcoin asikufaki ukuvuma ukuthi imisebenzi yayo imisiwe eKenya.

am: ለጉዳዩ ማብራሪያ ሲባል" በከፍተኛ ጥንቃቄ እና የሰዎችን ብዛት ለመቀነስ ሲባል የማረጋገጫ አገልግሎቶች ለጊዜው ተቋርጠዋል" ብሏል።
en: For context, it said, “Out of an abundance of caution and in an effort to mitigate crowd volume, verification services have been temporarily paused.”
ha: Saboda Karin bayani, sun ce, “saboda yawaitar tsawatarwa da kuma ƙoƙarin rage yawan cunkoso, an tsayarda aikin tantancewa na wucin gadi.”
sw: Kwa mktadha huu, ilisema, kutokana na tahadhari kubwa na jithada za kupunguza wingi wa watu, huduma za uthibitishaji zimesitishwa kwa muda
yo: Fún àkọọ́lẹ̀, ó wí pé, "Pẹ̀lú àkíyèsí tí ó pọ̀ àti ìgbìyànjú láti dín àwọn èrò kù, a ti dá ètò ìṣẹ̀rí ìdánimọ̀ dúró fún ìgbà díẹ̀."
zu: Ngokomongo, ithe, "Ngenxa yokuqapha okukhulu nangomzamo wokunciphisa umthamo wesixuku, izinsizakalo zokuqinisekisa ziye zamiswa okwesikhashana."

am: የሚገርመው፣ የኬንያ የአይሲቲ ሚኒስትር ኤሊውድ ኦዋሎ ቀደም ሲል የወርልድ ኮይን እንቅስቃሴዎች በሕጉ መሠረት መሆኑን ተናግረዋል፤ ታዲያ ይህ ድንገተኛ ለውጥ ለምን ተደረገ?
en: Interestingly, Kenya's ICT minister, Eliud Owalo, already said Worldcoin's activities are within the law, so why the sudden u-turn?
ha: Abun sha’awa, ministan ICT na Kenya, Eliud Owalo, ya riga yace ayyukan Worldcoin suna kan tsarin shari’a, to me ya kawo dawo da maganar nan da nan?
sw: Cha kufurahisha ni kwamba, waziri wa ICT wa Kenya, Eliudi Owalo, tayari alisema shughuli za Worldcoin ziko ndani ya sheria, kwa nini polisi wavamie ghafla?
yo: Ó yani lẹ́nu, Eliud Owalo tí ó jẹ́ mínísítà fún Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ Ìwífún àti Ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ ti sọ pé àwọn ìṣe Worldcoin ò lòdì sí òfin, kí wá ni ó fa àyípadà òjijì náà?
zu: Kuyathakazelisa ukuthi ungqongqoshe we-ICT waseKenya, u-Eliud Owalo, usevele wathi imisebenzi ye-Worldcoin isemthethweni, kungani sekushintshwa inkulumo ngokushesha?

am: ሀከርስ ወሳኝ የናይጄሪያ መሠረተ ልማት ላይ ዒላማ አድርገዋል
en: Hackers target vital Nigerian infrastructure
ha: Masu kutse sun fuskanci manyan gurare a Nijeriya
sw: Wadukuzi wanalenga kudukua miundo mbinu maalum nchini Nigeria
yo: Àwọn agbọ̀nà-ẹ̀bùrúwayélujára ń fojú sun èlò amúṣẹ́dẹrùn pàtàkì Nigeria
zu: Abagqekezi bahlose ingqalasizinda ebalulekile yaseNigeria

am: አኖኒሞስ ሱዳን የተባለ የሃክቲቪስት ቡድን በናይጄሪያ ወሳኝ የሆኑ የዲጂታል መሠረተ ልማቶችን አደጋ ላይ የሚጥል የሳይበር ጥቃት ለማካሄድ አቅዷል።
en: A hacktivist group called Anonymous Sudan is planning a cyberattack that puts vital digital infrastructure in Nigeria at risk.
ha: Wata ƙungiyar masu kutse da ake kira da Anonymous Sudan suna tsara kai harin yanar gizo wanda zai sanya manyan guraren fasahar zamani a Haɗari.
sw: Kundi la wanaharakati liitwalo Anonymous Sudan linapnga mashambulizi ya mtandaoni ambayo yanalenga miundo mbinu muhimu ya kidijitali nchini Kenya.
yo: Ẹgbẹ́ ajìjàgbara agbọ̀nàẹ̀bùrúwayélujára kan tí wọ́n pé ara wọn ní Anonymous Sudan ni wọ́n ń gbèrò ìkọlù orí ayélujára tí yóò mú jàḿbá bá àwọn èlò amúṣẹ́-ẹ̀rọ-ayélujára-dẹrùn ní Nigeria.
zu: Iqembu labagqekezi elibizwa nge-Anonymous Sudan lihlela ukuhlasela i-inthanethi okubeka engcupheni ingqalasizinda yedijithali eNigeria.

am: የብሔራዊ የኢንፎርሜሽን ቴክኖሎጂ ልማት ኤጀንሲ( ኤንአይቲዲኤ) በጋዜጣዊ መግለጫው የሃክቲቪስቶች እንቅስቃሴ መገኘቱን እና ሕዝቡ ከቡድኑ ለሚሰነዘሩ የሳይበር ጥቃቶች እንዲዘጋጅ ማሳሰቡን ገልጿል።
en: The National Information Technology Development Agency (NITDA), said in a press release that it detected the activities of the hacktivists and told the public to brace up for cyberattacks from the group.
ha: The National Information Technology Development Agency (NITDA), sun bayyana a taron manema labarai cewa sun gano ayyukan masu kutsen sannan suka gaya wa al’umma da su yi shiri domin harin yanar gizon daga ƙungiyar.
sw: shirika la Taifa la maendeleo ya teknolojia na habari (NITDA), alisema kwenye taarifa yake kwa vyombo vya habari kuwa liligundua shughuli za wadukuzi hao na kuwaambia wananchi wajiandae kwa mashambulizi ya mtandao kutoka kwa kundi hilo.
yo: Àjọ Aṣètòìdàgbàsókè Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ Oníwìífún ní ilẹ̀ Nigeria lápapọ̀ (NITDA), sọ nínú ìròyìn ìfiléde kan pé òun fura àwọn ìṣeṣí àwọn ajìjàgbara agbọ̀nàẹ̀bùrúwayélujára náà tí ó sì sọ fún àwọn èèyàn láti gbáradì fún àwọn ìkọlù orí ayélujára láti ọ̀dọ̀ ẹgbẹ́ náà.
zu: I-National Information Technology Development Agency (i-NITDA), esitatimendeni sabezindaba ithe ithole okwenziwa yizigebengu ezigqekezayo futhi yatshela umphakathi ukuthi uzilungiselele ngokuhlaselwa kotamkhathi okuzobe kusuka kuleli qembu.

am: ለምን ናይጄሪያን ዒላማ ያደርጋሉ?
en: Why are they targeting Nigeria?
ha: Me yasa suka fuskanto Nijeriya?
sw: kwa nini wanalenga Nigeria?
yo: Kí lódé tí wọ́n fi dójú lé orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria?
zu: Kungani bebhekise eNigeria?

am: በቡድኑ የቴሌግራም ቻናል ውስጥ ገብቼ" ከፈረንሳይ ኢምፔሪያሊስቶች ጐን በመቆም ኒጀርን ለመዋጋት" በመወሰኗ በናይጄሪያ ላይ ተቆጥተዋል።
en: I got into the group's Telegram channel, and they said they were mad at Nigeria because it decided to "stand with French Imperialists and Fight Niger."
ha: Na shiga tashar Telegram ta ƙungiyar, kuma sun ce suna jin haushin Nijeriya saboda yanke shwarar “sun goyi bayan shugabannin Faransa kuma sun yaki Nijar.”
sw: Niliingia kwenye chaneli ya kundi la Telegram, na walisema wameikasirikia Nigeria kwa sababu iliamua "kusimama na mamabeberu wa ufaransa na kupigana na Niger"
yo: Mo wọ yára ẹgbẹ́ náà lórí ìkànnì Telegram, tí wọ́n sì sọ pé inú Nigeria ló ń bí àwọn nítorí pé ó pinnu láti "fara mọ́ àwọn Afipágbàjọba Faransé tí ó sì Dojú ìjà kọNiger."
zu: Ngangena esiteshini saleliqembu ku-Telegram, futhi bathi bahlanyiswa iNigeria ngoba inqume "ukweseka nabacindezeli baseFrance futhi ilwe neNiger."

am: ራሳቸውን በዓለም ዙሪያ ለተጨቆኑ ሙስሊሞች በመወከል የሳይበር ጦርነት የሚያካሂዱ የአፍሪካ ሃክቲቪስቶች አድርገው ይገልጻሉ።
en: They describe themselves as African hacktivists waging cyber war on behalf of oppressed Muslims all over the world.
ha: Sun bayyana kansu a matsayin masu yin kutse na Afika da suka ƙaddamar da yakin yanar gizo a madaɗin musumin da ake takurawa a duniya baki ɗaya.
sw: Wanajieleza kama wadukuzi wa kiafrika wanaoendesha vita vya mtandaoni kwa niaba ya waislamuwanaokandamizwa kote ulimwenguni.
yo: Wọ́n ṣàfihàn ara wọn bí i ajìjàgbara agbọ̀nàẹ̀bùrúwayélujára ilẹ̀ Africa tí wọ́n ń pilẹ̀ ogun orí ayélujára fún gbogboàwọn Mùsùlùmí àgbáyé tí wọ́n ti fìyà jẹ.
zu: Bazichaza njengabagqekezi base-Afrika abalwa nempi ye-inthanethi egameni lamaSulumane acindezelwe emhlabeni wonke.

am: ምን ያህል መጨነቅ ይኖርብሃል?
en: How worried should you be?
ha: Yaya ya kamata mu damu?
sw: Je, unapaswa kuwa na wasiwasi gani?
yo: Báwo ni kí ẹ̀rù ṣe ti bà ọ́ tó?
zu: Kufanele ukhathazeke kangakanani?

am: ስማቸው ያልታወቀ ሱዳን ሲመታ እምብዛም አይሳሳትም።
en: Anonymous Sudan rarely misses when it hits.
ha: Da wahala Anonymous Sudan su rasa idan sunkai hari.
sw: Sudani isiyojulikana hukosa mara chache inapopiga.
yo: Atamátàsé ni Anonymous Sudan.
zu: I-Sudan Anonymous ayivamisile ukugeja uma ifika.

am: በቅርቡ ኬንያን በመምታት የኬንያ ዜጐች የመንጃ ፈቃድ እድሳት እና የቪዛ እድሳት የመሳሰሉ አገልግሎቶችን ማግኘት የሚችሉበትን የኢሲቲዜን ፖርታል ለመሰረዝ ችለዋል።
en: They hit Kenya recently and were able to hack the eCitizen portal, where Kenyan citizens can access services like driving licence renewal and visa renewal.
ha: Sun kaiwa Kenya hari kwanannan kuma sunyi kutse a shafin eCitizen, inda mazauna Kenya zasu iya samun ayyuka kamar sabunta lasisin tuki da sabin da biza.
sw: Waliikumba Kenya hivi karibuni na waliweza kudukua tovuti ya eCitizen, ambayo raia wa Kenya wanaweza kupata huduma kama vile kuweka upya leseni ya kuendesha gari na kutengeneza upya visa.
yo: Wọ́n kọlu Kenya láìpẹ́ yìí tí wọ́n sì rí àyè gbọ̀nà ẹ̀bùrú wọ òpọ́-ìwọlé sí eCitizen, níbi tí àwọn èèyàn ilẹ̀ Kenya ti lè rí àyè sí àwọn ètò bí i ìsọdọ̀tun ìwé-àṣẹ ìwakọ̀ àti ìsọdọ̀tun ìwé-ìwọ̀lú.
zu: Bahlasele iKenya muva nje futhi bakwazi ukugebenga ingosi ye-eCitizen, lapho izakhamizi zaseKenya zingakwazi ukuthola izinsiza ezifana nokuvuselelwa kwelayisensi yokushayela kanye nokuvuselelwa kwe-visa.

am: ኤምቲኤን ላይ ቀድሞውኑ ጥቃት ደርሶበታል፤ ረቡዕ ጠዋት ነሐሴ 2 ቀን 2022" ናይጄሪያ ዛሬ ተዘጋጅ" በቴሌግራም ቻናላቸው ላይ ተለጠፈ።
en: They've already attacked MTN: On Wednesday morning, August 2, 2022, "Nigeria be prepared today" was posted on their Telegram channel.
ha: Sun riga da sun kaiwa MTN hari: A ranar Laraba da safe, 2 ga Agusta, 2022, “Nijeriya ku zama cikin shiri a yau” shi ne abin da aka wallafa a tashar su ta Telegram.
sw: Tayari wameishambulia MTN: Jumatano asubuhi, Agosti 2, 2022, "Nigeria jiandae leo" ilichapishwa kwenye chaneli yao ya Telegram.
yo: Wọ́n ti kọlu MTN tẹ́lẹ̀: Ní àárọ̀ Ọjọ́'rú 2 oṣù Kẹjọ, ọdún 2022, "Nigeria gbáradì lónìí" ni wọ́n kọ sí orí ìkànnì Telegram wọn.
zu: Sebevele bayihlasele i-MTN: NgoLwesithathu ekuseni, zi-2 kuNcwaba wezi-2022, "Nigeria zilungiselele namuhla" kuthunyelwe esiteshini sabo seTelegram.

am: ከሰዓት በኋላ ቡድኑ" በናይጄሪያ ኤምቲኤን የቴሌኰም ኔትወርክ ላይ ጥቃት ማድረሱን አስታወቀ።
en: By afternoon, the group announced it had attacked "MTN telecom network in Nigeria.
ha: Zuwa da yammaci, ƙungiyar ta bayyana cewar takaiwa kamfanin sadarwa na MTN dake Nijeriya hari .
sw: Kufikia mchana, kundi hilo lilitangaza kuwa limeshambulia "mtandao wa mawasiliano wa MTN nchini Nigeria.
yo: Nígbà tí yóò fi di ọ̀sán, ẹgbẹ́ náà kéde pé òun ti kọlu "ìtakùn ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ olórí afẹ́fẹ́ MTN ní Nigeria.
zu: Ntambama, leli qembu lamemezela ukuthi selihlasele "inethiwekhi yezokuxhumana ye-MTN eNigeria.

am: በከፊል መቋረጥ እና ከፍተኛ መዘግየት ይታያል።''
en: Partial outages and huge lag will be noticed."
ha: “Za a fahimci daukewar sabis kaɗan da kuma rashin samun mutane a yawa sosai.”
sw: Kukatika kwa kiasi na ucheleweshaji mkubwa utaonekana
yo: Àkíyèsí ìdáṣẹ́dúró ní apá kan àti ìfàsẹ́yìn ńlá yóò wà.
zu: Kuzobonakala ukunqamuka kwengxenye kanye nokusalela okukhulu."

am: ናይጄሪያ በዚህ ረገድ ምን እያደረገች ነው?
en: What is Nigeria doing about this?
ha: Me Nijeriya take yi game da hakan?
sw: Nigeria watafanya nini kwenye hili?
yo: Kínni ohun tí orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria ń ṣe sí èyí?
zu: INigeria yenzani ngalokhu?

am: የ ኒትዳ የኮምፒውተር ድንገተኛ አደጋ ዝግጁነት እና ምላሽ ቡድን የመንግሥት ኤጀንሲዎች ከስም-አልባ ሱዳን የሚመጡ ጥቃቶችን እንዴት መከላከል እንደሚችሉ ምክር ሰጥቷል፣ ነገር ግን እነዚህ እርምጃዎች ውጤታማ መሆን አለመሆናቸውን ጊዜው ብቻ ያሳያል።
en: NITDA's computer emergency readiness and response team has advised government agencies on how to prevent attacks from Anonymous Sudan, but only time will tell if these measures will work.
ha: Ƙungiyar ɗaukar matakin karta kwana na na’ura mai kwakwalwa daga NITDA sun bawa hukumomin gwamnati shawara game da yadda zasu kiyaye harin daga Anonymous Sudan, amma lokaci ne kawai zai bayyana idan wadannan matakan zasu yi aiki.
sw: kamati ya utayari wa dharura ya tanakrishi na kukabiliana na hali ya tanakrishi ya NITDA imeshauri mashirika ya serikali kuhusu jinsi ya kuzuia mashambulizi kutoka kwa wasiojulikana Sudan, lakini muda utaonyesha kama hatua hizi zitafanya kazi.
yo: Ìgbìmọ̀ aṣèdáhùn àti ìgbáradì pàjáwìrì orí ẹ̀rọ kọ̀mpútà ti NITDA ti gba àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ìjọba ní ìmọ̀ràn lórí àwọn ọ̀nà tí wọ́n lè gbà láti dènà àwọn ìkọlù láti Anonymous Sudan, ṣùgbọ́n bí àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ wọ̀nyìí yóò bá ṣiṣẹ́ lóòótọ́, ìgbẹ̀yìn ni yóò dun olókùú àdá.
zu: Ithimba le-NITDA elilungiselela izimo eziphuthumayo kanye nezimpendulo zekhompiyutha liye leluleka izinhlangano zikahulumeni ngokuthi zingakuvimbela kanjani ukuhlasela okuvela kwi-Sudan Anonymous, kodwa yisikhathi kuphela esizosho ukuthi lezi zinyathelo zizosebenza yini.

am: የአፍሪካ ወጣት ፈጠራዎችን ማነቃቃት: የ ኤስቲም መዝናኛ ፌስት 2023 በ ኤስቲም ትምህርት ውስጥ አዲስ ሪኮርዶችን ያስቀምጣል!
en: Igniting Africa's Young Innovators: STEAM Fun Fest 2023 Sets New Records in STEAM Education!
ha: Farfado da matasan Afirka masu ƙirƙira: STEAM Fun Fest 2023 ya samu sabuwar shaida a STREAM Education!
sw: kuwasaidia vijana wavumbuzi barani Afrika, tamasha la STEAM Fun Fest 2023 limeweka kumbukumbu mpya kwenye elimu ya STEAM!
yo: Ìṣekóríyá fún àwọn Ọ̀dọ́ Ọlọ́gbọ́n-àtinúdá ilẹ̀ Africa: STEAM Fun Fest 2023 Ṣe Àkọsílẹ̀ Ẹ̀kọ́ STEAM Tuntun!
zu: Kufundiswa Abasunguli base-Afrika Abasebasha: I-STEAM Fun Fest 2023 yenza Amarekhodi Amasha Kwezemfundo ze-STEAM!

am: ሐምሌ 22 ቀን 2023 የተካሄደው ሦስተኛው የእስቴም ፈን ፌስት እትም በብዙ ሺህ የሚቆጠሩ ታዳጊዎችን፣ ችግሮችን የሚፈቱና መሪዎችን ልብና አእምሮ የማረከ ታላቅ ስኬት ሆኖ ተገኝቷል።
