en: The third edition of the STEAM Fun Fest, held on July 22nd, 2023, proved to be a resounding success, captivating the hearts and minds of thousands of young innovators, problem-solvers, and leaders.
ha: Kashi na uku na STREAM Fun Fest, wanda aka gabatar da shi a Juli 22nd, 2023, ya tabbatar da kasancewa mai cikakkaciyar nasara, wanda ya shiga ran dubban matasa masu ƙirƙira, masu magance matsala, da kuma shugabanni.
sw: Toleo la tatu la STEAM Fun Fest lililofanyika tarehe 22 Julai, 2023, lilipata mafanikio makubwa kwa kuvutia mioyo na akili za maelfu wabunifu vijana, wasuluhishi wa matatizo na vijana.
yo: Apá kẹta ètò STEAM Fun Fest tí ó wáyé ní ọjọ́ 22 oṣù Keje, ọdún 2023 ni ó ti mú èso rere jáde, èyí tí ó fa ojú àti ọkàn àwọn ẹgbẹẹgbẹ̀rún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ ọlọ́gbọ́n-àtinúdá, àwọn olùyanjú ìsòro, àti àwọn olórímọ́ra.
zu: Uhlelo lwesithathu lwe-STEAM Fun Fest, ebelubanjwe zingama-22 kuNtulukazi wezi-2023, lube yimpumelelo emangalisayo, luthathe izinhliziyo nezingqondo zezinkulungwane zabasunguli abasha, abaxazululi bezinkinga, nabaholi.

am: በአህጉሪቱ ትልቁ የ ስቲም ፌስቲቫል በመባል በሚታወቀውና በወጣቶች ዘንድ ለሳይንስ፣ ቴክኖሎጂ፣ ኢንጂነሪንግ፣ አርትስ እና ማቲማቲክስ( ስቲም) ያላቸውን ፍቅር በማቀጣጠል የተዘጋጀው ይህ ልዩ ዝግጅት በቲቲ አደዋሲ (9አይጂይኪድስ)፣ ጃዴሶላ አዴደጂ (ስቲም ሚትስ)፣ ኡቼና ኦንዋማኤግቡ-ኡግዉ (ኢዱፈን ቴክኒ)፣ ወሎ ኦጉንጆቢ (ሳቢተች)፣ ኩኒ አደይንፔቢ (ጋምር) እና ቡኮላ አኪንባዴ (ኩቼዛ)ጋር በመተባበር ተዘጋጅቷል።
en: This extraordinary event, organized by the visionary collaboration of Titi Adewusi (9ijakids), Jadesola Adedeji (STEM METS), Uchenna Onwuamaegbu-Ugwu (Edufun Technik), Wale Ogunjobi (Sabiteach), Kunmi Adenipebi (Gamr), and Bukola Akingbade (Kucheza), truly lived up to its reputation as the largest STEAM festival on the continent, igniting a passion for Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, and Mathematics (STEAM) among the youth.
ha: Wannan taron na musamman, wanda visionary collaboration of Titi Adewusi(9ijakids), Jadesola Adedeji(STEM METS), Uchenna Onwuamaegbu-Ugwu(Edufun Technik), Wale Ogunjobi(Sabitech), Kunmi Adenipebi(Gamr), da kuma Bukola Akingbade (Kucheza), suka shirya da gaske ya kai matsayin sunansa na bikin STREAM mafi girma a nahiyar, wanda ya farfado da kaunar kimiyya, fasaha, Engineering, Arts, da kuma lissafi (STREAM) a tsakanin kananan matasa.
sw: Tukio hili la ajabu liliandaliwa kwa ushirikiano wa maono ya Titi Adewusi (9ijakids), Jadesola Adedeji (STEAM METS), Uchenna Onwuamaegbu-Ugwau (Edufun Technik), Wale Ogunjobi (Sabiteach), Kunmi Adenpebi (Gamri) na Bukola Akingbade (Kucheza), kwa kweli iliishia kupatana na sifa yake kama tamasha kubwa zaidi la STEAM barani na kuongeza shauku ya sayansi, Teknolojia, uhandisi, sanaa na Hisabati (TEAM), miongoni mwa vijana.
yo: Ayẹyẹ olókìkí yìí, tí àjọṣepọ̀ onírànran Titi Adewusi (9ijaKids), Jadesola Adedeji (STEM METS), Uchenna Onwumaegbu-Ugwu (Edufun Technik), Wale Ogunjobi (Sabiteach), Kunmi Adenipebi (Gamr), àti Bukola Akingbade (Kucheza) mú ètò náà wáyé, ṣe tó bí òkìkí rẹ̀ ti kàn tó gẹ́gẹ́ bí i àjọ̀dún STEAM tí ó tóbi jùlọ ní ilẹ̀ Africa, èyí tí ó ń mú ìfẹ́ fún ìmọ̀ Sáyẹ́nsì, Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ, Iṣẹ́-ẹ̀rọ, Iṣẹ́-ọnà, àti Ìṣirò (STEAM) gbilẹ̀ láàárín àwọn ọ̀dọ́.
zu: Lo mcimbi ongajwayelekile, obuhlelwe ukubambisana okunombono ka-Titi Adewusi (9ijakids), Jadesola Adedeji (STEM METS), Uchenna Onwuamaegbu-Ugwu (Edufun Technik), Wale Ogunjobi (Sabiteach), Kunmi Adenipebi (Gamr), kanye no-Bukola Akingbade (Kucheza) , ngempela iphile ngokuvumelana nesithunzi sayo njengefestiveli ye-STEAM enkulu kunazo zonke ezwenikazi, ivunguza uthando lweSayensi, Ubuchwepheshe, Ubunjiniyela, Ubuciko, Nezibalo (STEAM) entsheni.

am: የ ኤስቲም ፈንፌስት ዋና ዓላማ ቀጣዩን ትውልድ ወደፊት በስራ እና በዲጂታል ዘመን ለማደግ የሚያስፈልጉትን አስፈላጊ ክህሎቶች እና ዕውቀቶች ኃይል መስጠት ነው።
en: The main objective of the STEAM Fun Fest is to empower the next generation with the essential skills and knowledge needed to thrive in the future of work and the digital age.
ha: Babbar manufar STREAM Fun Fest shi ne tallafawa al’umma masu tasowa nan gaba da kwarewar data kamata ko ilimin da ake buƙata domin damawa wajen aikin nan gaba da kuma lakocin fasahar zamani.
sw: Lengo kuu la STEAM Fun Fest ni kuwezesha kizazi kijacho kupata ujuzi muhimu na maarifa yanayohitajika ili kusitawi katika siku zijazo za kazi na wakati wa kidijitali.
yo: Èròńgbà àkọ́kọ́ fún STEAM Fun Fest ni láti ṣe ìrónilágbára fún àwọn ìran tí ó ń bọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe àti ìmọ̀ tí wọ́n máa nílò láti yè ní ọjọ́ ọ̀la iṣẹ́ àti ayé díjítà.
zu: Inhloso ebaluleke kakhulu ye-STEAM Fun Fest ukunikeza isizukulwane esilandelayo amakhono abalulekile nolwazi oludingekayo ukuze baphumelele emisebenzini yesikhathini esizayo kanye nasenkathini edijithali.

am: በዝግጅቱ ወቅት ከ4000 በላይ የሚሆኑ ተሰብሳቢዎች ከሮቦቶች፣ ከጨዋታ ንድፍ፣ ከእውነታው እንዲሁም ከ3ዲ ሞዴሊንግ አንስቶ እስከ አኒሜሽን፣ ግራፊክስ ዲዛይንና ሳይንስ ሙከራዎች ድረስ ባሉ የተለያዩ እንቅስቃሴዎች ራሳቸውን የመጠመቅ አጋጣሚ ነበራቸው።
en: During the event, over 4000 attendees had the opportunity to immerse themselves in a diverse array of STEAM activities, ranging from robotics, game design, virtual reality, and 3D modelling to animation, graphics design, and science experiments.
ha: A yayin bikin, fiye da mutum 4000 da suka halarta sun samu damar kutsa kansu a jerin ayyukan STREAM mabanbanta, kama daga robotics, tsara wasanni, virtual reality, da kuma samfurin hotunan hallita na 3D, da kuma gwaje-gwajen kimiyya.
sw: Wakati wa hafla hiyo, zaidi ya watu 4000 waliyohudhuria walipata fursa ya kuingia kwenye fursa mbalimbali, za shughuli za STEAM, kama vile robotiki, michezo ya ubunifu, uhalisia pepe, uundaji wa 3D hadi uhuishaji, muundo wa michoro na majaribio ya sayansi.
yo: Níbi ayẹyẹ náà, àwọn olùkópa tí wọ́n ju 4000 lọ ni wọ́n ní àǹfààní láti gbájú mọ́ onírúurú àwọn ètò iṣẹ́ láti ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ nípa èlò afìṣejèèyàn, ìyaṣẹ́ géèmù, ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ afèèyànságbègbè afarajòótọ́ orí ẹ̀rọ, àti ìṣàwòṣe 3D sí ìfàwòránṣènìyàn, ìyaṣẹ́ àwòrán, àti àwọn ìdánwò sáyẹ̀nsì.
zu: ngesikhathi somcimbi, abahambele umcimbi abangaphezu kwama-4000 babe nethuba lokusebenza ezintweni ezihlukahlukene ze-STEAM, kusukela kwezerobhothi, isakhiwo somudlalo, okwenzeka ngobuchwepheshe, imodeli ye-3D yopopayi, izakhiwo zezithombe, nokuhlolwa kwesayensi.

am: በዓሉ ከ7-15 ዓመት ዕድሜ ባላቸው ልጆች ዘንድ ለኤስቲም ትምህርት ፍቅርን እያነሳሳ የነቃፊ አስተሳሰብን፣ ችግሮችን የመፍታትእና የመተባበርን ኃይል ለማዳበር ነበር።
en: The festival aimed to cultivate critical thinking, problem-solving, and the power of collaboration, all while inspiring a love for STEAM education among children ages 7-15 years.
ha: Burin bikin shi ne samar da tunani mai zurfi, magance matsala, da kuma kafrin hadin guiwa, dukka yayin karfafa guiwar kaunar ilimin STREAM a tsakanin yara ‘yan shekara 7-15.
sw: Tamasha hilo lililenga katika kukuza fikra makini, utatuzi wa matatizo na nguvu ya ushirikiano, yote hayo yalihimiza upendo wa elimu ya STEAM miongoni mwa watoto wenye umri wa miaka 7 - 15.
yo: Àjọ̀dún náà ní àfojúsùn láti mú ọ̀nà ìṣàròjinlẹ̀, ìyanjú ìṣòro, àti agbára àjọṣepọ̀ gbilẹ̀, tí yóò sì mú ìfẹ́ ẹ̀kọ́ STEAM pọ̀ sí i lọ́kàn àwọn ọmọdé láti ọdún 7-15.
zu: Inhloso yomkhosi bekuwukuthuthukisa ukucabanga okujulile, ukuxazulula izinkinga, namandla okubambisana, ukugqugquzela uthando lwemfundo ye-STEAM phakathi kwezingane ezineminyaka eyi-7-15.

am: የኤስቲም ትምህርት ዓላማ እውቀቱን/ክህሎቱን ለራሳቸው ከመጠበቅ ይልቅ እውነተኛ ሰዎችን ለሚነኩ ማህበራዊ ችግሮች መፍትሄ ለመስጠት በግላቸው መስክ የኤስቲም እውቀት ያላቸው ወጣት አዕምሮዎች ተባብረው እንዲሰሩ ነው ያሉት ኢየን አቦዬጂ (ሲኢኦ, ፉውቸር አፍሪካ) በሚል ጭብጥ ዝግጅቱ ተጀምሯል።
en: The event kicked off with a keynote by Iyin Aboyeji (CEO, Future Africa) who said that the purpose of STEAM education is for young minds who have STEAM knowledge in their individual fields to collaborate to provide a solution to social problems that affect real people rather than keeping the knowledge/ skills to themselves.
ha: An bude taron da bayani mai mahimmanci daga Aboyeji (shugaban Future Africa) wanda yace amfanin ilimin STREAM ga kananun yara da suke da ilimin STREAM a ɓangare daban daban shi ne su hada guiwa don samar da mafita ga matsalolin al’umma da yake damun mutane akan su boye ilimi/ ko kwarewar a wajen su.
sw: Tukio hilo lilianza kwa maelezo ya Lyin Aboyeji (Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Future Africa), ambaye alisema kuwa malengo ya elimu ya STEAM ni kupanua akili za vijana ambao wana ujuzi wa STEAM, katika nyanja zao binafsi kwa kushirikiana ii kuleta suluhisho la matatizo ya kijamii ambayo huathiri watu halisi kuliko kuweka maarifa au ujuzi kwao wenyewe.
yo: Ayẹyẹ náà bẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ọ̀rọ̀ ìṣáájú láti ẹnu Iyin Aboyeji (Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Future Africa) tí ó sọ pé pàtàkì ẹ̀kọ́ STEAM ni fún àwọn ìsínwẹẹrẹ tí wọ́n ní ìmọ̀ STEAM ní ọ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ wọn láti lè ní àjọṣepọ̀ láti pèsè ọ̀nà àbáyọ sí àwọn ìṣòro àwùjọ tí ó ní ipa lórí àwọn èèyàn dípò kí wọ́n máa pa ìmọ̀ náà mọ́ra.
zu: Umcimbi uqale ngenkulumo yosuku ka-Iyin Aboyeji (u-CEO, e-Future Africa) othe inhloso yemfundo ye-STEAM wukuba izingqondo ezisencane ezinolwazi lwe-STEAM emikhakheni yazo zihlanganyele ukuze zinikeze isisombululo ezinkingeni zomphakathi ezithinta abantu kunokuthi bagcine ulwazi/amakhono kubona.

am: ከኢንዱስትሪ ባለሙያዎች የተውጣጡ ሌሎች የፓናል ስብሰባዎች ነበሩ፣ ከእነዚህም መካከል የእስሊክ ሲቲ ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ማሊክ አፌግቡዋ፣ የፍለተርዌቭ ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ቦዴ አቢፋሪን፣ የኦሬኦሉዋ ሌሲ መስራች ውቴክ፣ ላንሬ ባሚሴቢ፣ ኤዲ፣ አክሰስ ኮርፖሬሽን እና ጆላ አድሬሚ-ማኪንዴ፣ ጉግል እና ሌሎችም ነበሩ።
en: There were other panel sessions from industry experts which included Malik Afegbua CEO of Slick City, Bode Abifarin CEO of Flutterwave, Oreoluwa Lesi Founder WTEC, Lanre Bamisebi, ED, Access Corporation and Jola Aderemi-Makinde, Google amongst others.
ha: Da akwai wasu ɓangarorin tattaunawa daga kwararru na masana’antu wanda suka hada da Malik Afegbua shugaban Slick City, Bode Abifarin shugaban Flutterwave, Oreoluwa Lesi wanda ya samar da WTEC, Lanre Bamisebi ED, Access Corporation da kuma Jola Aderemi-Makinde, da kuma Google da sauransu.
sw: Kulikuwa na vikao vingine vya jopo kutoka kwa wataalamu wa sekta hiyo ambavyo vilijumuisha Maliki Afegbua Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Slick City, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Bode Abifarin wa Flutterwave, mwanzilishi wa Oreoluwa Lesi WTEC, Lanre Bamisebi, ED, Access Corporation na Jola Aderemi - Makinde, Google miongoni mwa wengine.
yo: Àwọn àkókò ìtàkúrọ̀sọ ìgbìmọ̀ mìíran wáyé láti ẹnu àwọn onímọ̀ọ́ṣe bí i Malik Afegbua, Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Slick City; Bode Abifarin, Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Flutterwave; Oreoluwa Lesi, Olùdásílẹ̀ WTEC; Lanre Bamisebi, ED Access Corporation àti Jola Aderemi-Makinde, Google àti àwọn mìíràn.
zu: Kube nezinye izikhathi zezikhulumi ezivela kochwepheshe bemboni ababehlanganisa uMalik Afegbua oyi-CEO ye-Slick City, i-Bode Abifarin CEO ye-Flutterwave, uMsunguli we-Oreoluwa Lesi i-WTEC, u-Lanre Bamisebi, u-ED, i-Access Corporation no-Jola Aderemi-Makinde, u-Google phakathi kwabanye.

am: የዘንድሮው ዝግጅት እንደ እስቴም ኮምፒቲሽን ፒች እናቴክ ኬሪየር ኮርነር ያሉ በፕሮግራሙ ላይ አዲስ የተጨመሩ ነገሮችን ያካተተ ሲሆን ኤስቲም ፃናት ከኢንተረእስዊች፣ሜንዋን፣ ጁሚያ፣አልቲቪያ፣ ፍለተርዌቭ እናአተስኩል ካሉ ከፍተኛ የቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያዎች ባለሙያዎች ጋር ስለቴክኖሎጂ ሙያዎች አንድ ለአንድ ውይይት አድርገዋል።
en: This year’s event included new additions to the program such as a STEAM Competition Pitch and a Tech Career Corner where children had one on one chats about tech careers with professionals from top tech companies like Interswitch, MainOne, Jumia, Utiva, Flutterwave, and AltSchool.
ha: Bikin na wannan shekarar ya kunshi sababbin abubuwa da aka kara a shirin kamar STREAM competition Pitch da kuma Career corner inda yara suke tattaunawa gaba da gaba game da aikin fasaha tare da kwararru daga manyan kamfanonin fasaha kamar Interswitch, MainOne, Jumia, Utiva, Flutterwave da kuma AltSchool.
sw: Tukio la mwaka huu lilijumuisha nyongeza mpya kwenye mpango wa STEAM Competition Pitch na Tech Career Corner ambapo watoto walikuwa na gumzo moja kwa moja kuhusu taaluma za teknolojia na wataalamu kutoka makampuni ya juu ya teknolojia kama vile Interswitch, MainOne, Jumia, Utiva, FlutterWave na AltSchool.
yo: Ayẹyẹ ọdún yìí ní àwọn àfikún tuntun sí ètò náà bi i Ìdíje STEAM Pitch, àti Abala nípa Iṣẹ́ Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ níbi tí àwọn ọmọdé ti bá àwọn onímọ̀ọ́ṣe láti àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ńláńlá bí i Interswitch, MainOne, Jumia, Utiva, Flutterwave, àti AltSchool sọ̀rọ̀ ní oríjorí nípa àwọn iṣẹ́ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ.
zu: Umcimbi wakulonyaka uhlanganise okusha ohlelweni okufana ne-STEAM Competition Pitch kanye ne-Tech Career Corner lapho izingane zibe nezingxoxo mayelana nemisebenzi yezobuchwepheshe nochwepheshe obuvela ezinkampanini zobuchwepheshe eziphezulu njenge-Interswitch, MainOne, Jumia, Utiva, Flutterwave, ne-AltSchool.

am: ለ ኤስቲም ውድድር ውድድር ከ 9 እስከ 15 ዓመት ዕድሜ ያላቸው ስድስት የመጨረሻ ተወዳዳሪዎች ከሪሳይክል፣ ከአካባቢ፣ ከዘላቂነት እና ከታዳሽ ኃይል ጋር የተያያዙ ችግሮችን ለመፍታት መፍትሄዎችን ለዳኞች ቡድን አቅርበዋል።
en: For the STEAM Competition Pitch, six finalists made up of children ages 9 -15 years pitched to a panel of judges the solutions to tackle problems with regard to Recycling, Environment, Sustainability, and Renewable Energy.
ha: Game da STREAM Competition Pitch, mutum shida na matakin karshe da suka hada da yara ‘yan shekara 9-15 sun bawa alkalan matakai na magance matsaloli na abin da ya shafi sabuntawa, mahalli, sustainability, da kuma renewable energy.
sw: Kwa mashindano ya STEAM Pitch, washindi sita wanaojumuisha watoto wa kuanzia mika 9-15 walijitokeza kwenye jopo la majaji wakiwa na suluhu ya matatizo kuhusu usafirishaji, mazingira, uendelevu na nishati mbadala.
yo: Fún Ìdíje STEAM Pitch, àwọn aláṣekágbá mẹ́fà tí wọ́n kún fún àwọn ọmọ ọdún 9-15 ni wọ́n polówó àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ láti yanjú àwọn ìṣòro tí ó jẹ mọ́ Ìṣàtúnlò, Agbègbè, Ìṣàlòpẹ́, àti Agbára Onísọdọ̀tun.
zu: Ku-STEAM Competition Pitch, abafinyelele kowamanqamu abayisithupha abakhiwe izingane ezineminyaka engu-9 -15 baphonsele iphaneli yamajaji izixazululo zokubhekana nezinkinga eziphathelene Nokwenza Kabusha, Imvelo, Ukusimama, kanye Namandla Avuselelekayo.

am: በኢኮሮዱ ግሬስ ሴንት ትምህርት ቤት የሚገኘው የ9 ዓመት ልጅ ካምዲሊቹኩ ቹኩዌታ አዲስ ላፕቶፕ እና የ400,000 ናራ የገንዘብ ሽልማት በመውሰድ የ STEAM ውድድር አሸናፊ ሆነ።
en: Kamdilichukwu Chukwuneta, a 9-year-old boy from Grace Saint School, Ikorodu, emerged as the STEAM Competition winner, taking home a brand-new laptop and a cash prize of N400,000.
ha: Kamdilichukwu Chukwuneta, wani yaro dan shekara 9 daga Grace Saint School, Ikorodu, shi ne ya zamanto zakaran gasar STREAM, wanda ya koma gida da sabuwar na’ura mai kwakwalwa da kuma kuɗi N400,000.
sw: Kamdilichukwu Chukwuneta, mvulana mwenye umri wa miaka 9 kutoka shule ya Grace Saint, Ikorodu, aliibuka mshindi wa shindano la STEAM, akitwaa tanakrishi mpakato (Laptop) mpya kabisa na zawadi ya fedha taslimu N400,000.
yo: Kamdilichukwu Chukwuneta, ọmọkùnrin ọmọ-ọdún-mẹ́sàn-án láti Grace Saint School, Ìkòròdú ni o jáwé olúborí Ìdíje STEAM Pitch, tí ó sì mú ẹ̀rọ ayárabíàṣá àgbélétan tuntun àti ẹ̀bùn owó ₦400,000 lọ sílé.
zu: U-Kamdilichukwu Chukwuneta, umfana oneminyaka eyi-9 wase-Grace Saint School, e-Ikorodu, unqobe umncintiswano we-STEAM, egoduka nesibekwamathangeni esisha kanye nomklomelo wemali ongu-N400,000.

am: ቀኑን ሙሉ ቦታው በበርካታ አስደሳች እንቅስቃሴዎች ተሞልቷል የኤስቲም ላቦራቶሪዎች፣ የኢስፖርት ዞን፣ የድሮን እግር ኳስ እና ከ 30 በላይ የ ኤስቲም ኤግዚቢሽኖች።
en: Throughout the day, the venue buzzed with a plethora of exciting activities – STEAM labs, Esport zone, drone soccer, and over 30 STEAM exhibitors.
ha: A ranar baki ɗaya, dakin taron ya cika da abubuwan masu kayatarwa—dakin gwaji na STREAM, ɓangaren Esport, kwallon drone, da kuma masu baza haja fiye 30 na STREAM.
sw: Siku nzima, ukumbi ulijaa shughuli mbalimbali za kusisimua, maabara za STEAM, michezo ya ndege zisizo na rubani na waonyeshaji zaidi ya 30 wa TEAM.
yo: Títí ilẹ̀ ọjọ́ náà fi sú, onírúurú àwọn ètò aládùn ni ó ṣẹlẹ̀ níbi ayẹyẹ náà — yára ìdánwò STEAM, àyè Ìṣèdárayá-orí-ayélujára, ìfèlòabẹ́yẹfò-kékeré-gbá-bọ́ọ̀lù, àti àwọn afisẹ́hàn STEAM tí ó ju 30 lọ.
zu: Usuku lonke, indawo ibigcwele imisebenzi ethokozisayo - amalebhu e-STEAM, indawo ye-Esport, ibhola likanobhutshuzwayo elingakhokhelwa, kanye nababukisi be-STEAM abangaphezu kuka-30.

am: የኤስቲም ላቦራቶሪዎች ልጆችን ለኮዲንግ፣ ኢንጂነሪንግ፣ ሮቦቲክስ፣ የሳይንስ ሙከራዎች፣ አኒሜሽን፣ ዩአይ/ ዩኤክስ ዲዛይን፣ ኤአይ መሣሪያዎች እና የጨዋታ ልማት አስተዋውቀዋል።
en: The STEAM Labs introduced children to Coding, Engineering, Robotics, Science Experiments, Animation, UI/UX design, AI Tools, and Game Development.
ha: Dakin gwajin STREAM ya gabatar da yara ga tsara shirin na’aura mai kwakwalwa, aikin fasaha, robotics, gwaje-gwajen kimiyya, zanen aljanu, ƙera Ul/UX, kayan anfanin Al, da kuma bunkasa wasa.
sw: Maabara ya STEAM iliwaletea watoto usimbaji, uhandisi, Roboti, majaribio ya sayansi, uhuishaji, muundo wa UI/UX, zana za AI, na ukuzaji wa michezo.
yo: Yàrá-ìdánwò STEAM mú àwọn ọmọdé mọ ìmọ̀ Ìkodù, ìmọ̀ nípa Iṣẹ́-ẹ̀rọ, ìmọ̀ nípa Èlò-afìṣejèèyàn, àwọn Ìdánwò Sáyẹ̀nsì, Ìfàwòránṣènìyàn, ìmọ̀ OI/AA (Ojú-ìwò Ìsẹ̀rọmáṣàmúlò/Amúrìírí-Aṣàmúlò-dùn), àwọn Irinṣẹ́ Ìmọ̀-àtọwọ́dá, àti Ìṣẹ̀dá Géèmù.
zu: I-STEAM Labs yethule ikhodingi, Ezobunjiniyela, Ezamarobhothi, Ukuhlolwa kwezesayensi, Izithobe zopopayi, idizayini ye-UI/UX, Amathuluzi e-AI, kanye Nokuthuthukiswa Kwegeyimu ezinganeni.

am: አደራዳሪዎቹ ለአስደናቂው ድጋፍ ሰጪዎች ከልብ የመነጨ ምስጋና አቅርበዋል። አክሰስ ባንክ፣ አርጀንቲል ካፒታል፣ ሎተስ ባንክ፣ ፍለተርዌቭ፣ ኪቦ፣ ፍሎር ሚልዝ፣ ዘ ፕሊስ ሬስቶራንት፣ ሃይድ ኢነርጂ፣ ኤ.ጂ ሌቨንተስ፣ ናይጀሪያ ኮሙኒኬሽን ኮሚሽን (ኤንሲሲ) እና ኤምቲኤን።
en: The organizers extend heartfelt gratitude to the incredible sponsors: Access Bank, Argentil Capital, Lotus Bank, Flutterwave, Kibo, Flour Mills, The Place Restaurant, Hyde Energy, A.G Leventis, Nigeria Communication Commission (NCC), and MTN.
ha: Masu tsarawar sun mika dimbin godiya ga masu ɗaukar nauyi: Access Bank, Argentil Capital, Lotus Bank, Flutterwave, Kibo, Flour Mills, The Place Restaurant, Hyde Energy, A.G Leventis, Nigerian Communication Commission(NCC), da kuma MTN.
sw: Waandaaji wanatoa shukrani za dhati kwa wafadhili wa ajabu: Access Bank, Argentil Capital, Lotus Bank, FlutteWave, Kibo, Elour Mills, tume ya mawasiliano ya Nigeria (NCC) na MTN.
yo: Àwọn elétò ayẹyẹ náà dá ọpẹ́ pàtàkì lọ́wọ́ àwọn onígbọ̀wọ́ pàtàkì: Access Bank, Argentil Capital, Lotus Bank, Flutterwave, Kibo, Flour Mills, The Place Restaurant, Hyde Energy, A.G Leventis, Àjọ elétò Ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ ní ilẹ̀ Nigeria (AIN/NCC), àti MTN.
zu: Abahleli badlulisa ukubonga okusuka enhliziyweni kubaxhasi: i-Access Bank, i-Argentil Capital, i-Lotus Bank, i-Flutterwave, i-Kibo, i-Flour Mills, i-The Place Restaurant, i-Hyde Energy, i-A.G Leventis, i-Nigeria Communication Commission (NCC), ne-MTN.

am: ኤስቲም ፍን ፌስት 2023 በእርስዎ የማይናወጥ ድጋፍ እንዲቻል ተደርጓል።
en: The STEAM Funfest 2023 was made possible by your unwavering support.
ha: The STREAM Fun Fest 2023 ya tabbata ne saboda dimbin tallafinku.
sw: STEAM Fun Fest 2023iliwezeshwa na msaada wako wa uhakika.
yo: STEAM Fun Fest 2023 wá sí ìmúṣẹ pẹ̀lú àtìlẹ́yìn adúróṣinṣin yín.
zu: I-STEAM Funfest 2023 ibe yimpumelelo ngenxa yokusekwa yinina.

am: መጋረጃው በኤስቲም ፈን ፌስት 2023 ላይ ሲወድቅ ተፅዕኖው ከዝግጅቱ ቀን እጅግ የላቀ ነው።
en: As the curtain falls on STEAM Fun Fest 2023, its impact resonates far beyond the event day.
ha: A yayin da STREAM Fun Fest 2023 ya zo karshe, amfaninsa ya wuce ranar taron kwarai.
sw: Kadri pazia linapoangukia STEAM Fun Fest 2023, athari yake inaonekana zaidi ya siku ya tukio.
yo: Bí STEAM Fun Fest 2023 ṣe ń lọ sí òpin, ipa tí ó ní gbalẹ̀ kọjá ọjọ́ ayẹyẹ náà.
zu: Njengoba iphela i-STEAM Fun Fest 2023, umthelela wayo mukhulu udlulela ngale kosuku lomcimbi.

am: በወጣት ልቦች ውስጥ ለኤስቲም ትምህርት ያለው ፍቅር፣ አዳዲስ ነገሮችንና ትምህርቶችን ከማሳደድ ጋር ተዳምሮ፣ የናይጄሪያ የወደፊት ዕጣ ይበልጥ ብሩህ፣ በርታና ማለቂያ በሌላቸው አማራጮች የተሞላ እንዲሆን ያደርጋል።
en: The passion for STEAM education instilled in young hearts, combined with the relentless pursuit of innovation and learning, ensures that Nigeria's future will be brighter, bolder, and filled with endless possibilities.
ha: Kaunar ilimin STREAM da aka sanya a zuciyar yara kanana, da aka hada da neman ƙirƙira da koyo sosai, ya tabbatar da cewa gaban Nijeriya za tayi kyau, da ƙarfin guiwa, wanda zai cika da damarmaki marasa yankewa.
sw: shauku ya elimu ya STEAM iliyopandikizwa kwenye mioyo ya watoto, ikiunganishwa na hatakati zisiisha za uvumbuzi na mafunzo, inahakikisha kuwa mustakabali wa Nigeria utakuwa mzuri zaidi, wenye ujasiri na kujazwa na uweekano usiyoisha.
yo: Ìfẹ́ ẹ̀kọ́ STEAM tí wọ́n ti gbìn sí inú àwọn ọkàn kéékéèké náà, pẹ̀lú ìlépa aláìdẹ̀yìn fún ọgbọ́n àtinúdá àti ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ń ṣe àrídájú pé ọjọ́-ọ̀la Nigeria yóò dára, yóò túbọ̀ gbòòrò sí i tí àǹfààní aláìlópin yóò sì wà jantirẹrẹ.
zu: Intshisekelo yemfundo ye-STEAM efakwe ezinhliziyweni zabancane, kuhlanganiswe nokungapheli amandla kusungulwa izinto ezintsha nokufunda, iqinisekisa ukuthi ikusasa laseNigeria lizoba eliqhakazile, libe nabanesibindi, futhi ligcwale amathuba angapheli.

am: እንደ ስቲም ፋን ፌስት ያሉ ተነሳሽነቶችን ማክበራችንን እና መደገፋችንን እንቀጥል፣ እነዚህ ተነሳሽነት የሚሰጡና የአፍሪካን ወጣት የፈጠራ ባለሞያዎች ለቀጣይ ትውልዶች የወደፊቱን ለመቅረጽ የሚያስታጥቁ ናቸው።
en: Let's continue to celebrate and support initiatives like STEAM Fun Fest, as they inspire and equip Africa's young innovators to shape the future for generations to come.
ha: Mu cigaba da murna da kuma tallafawa shirye-shirye kamar STREAM Fun Fest, saboda suna koyawa da tallafawa kananan masu ƙirƙira a Afirka wajen gyara gaban al’umma masu zuwa.
sw: Hebu tuendelee kusherehekea na kuunga mkono mipango kama vile STEAM Fun Fest inapowatia moyo na kuwapa moyo wabunifu wachanga barani Afrika kuandaa kesho kwa vizazi vijavyo.
yo: Ẹ jẹ́ kí á túbọ̀ máa ṣe àjọyọ̀ kí a sì máa ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún irú àwọn ètò àtinúdá bí i STEAM Fun Fest, bí wọ́n ṣe ń fún àwọn ọlọ́gbọ́n àtinúdá wẹẹrẹ ní kóríyá tí wọ́n ṣe ìrónilágbára fún wọn láti ṣe àtúntò ọjọ́-ọ̀la fún àwọn ìran tí wọ́n ń bọ̀.
zu: Masiqhubeke sigubhe futhi sisekele izinhlelo ezifana ne-STEAM Fun Fest, njengoba zikhuthaza futhi zihlomisa abasunguli abasha base-Afrika ukuze balolonge ikusasa lezizukulwane ezizayo.

am: የ ሲሲሀብ ቦሱን ቲጃኒ ለፕሬዚዳንት ቲኑቡ ካቢኔ የሚኒስትርነት ዕጩነት አግኝቷል
en: CcHUB's Bosun Tijani gets ministerial nomination for President Tinubu's cabinet
ha: Bosun Tijani na CcHUB ya samu shiga cikin wanda aka zaɓa a minister na gwamnatin shugaban kasa Tinubu.
sw: Bosun Tijani wa CcHUB amepata uteuzi wa uwaziri wa baraza la mawaziri la Rais Tinubu
yo: Wọ́n fa Bosun Tijani ti CcHub kalẹ̀ fún ipò mínísítà lábẹ́ ìṣàkóso ìjọba Ààrẹ Tinubu
zu: U-Bosun Tijani we-CcHUB ukuqokwe njengongqongqoshe kwikhabhinethi kaMongameli Tinubu

am: ፕሬዚዳንት ቦላ ቲኑቡ የናይጄሪያ ትልቁ የቴክኖሎጂ ማዕከል የሆነው የኮ-ክሪኤሽን ማዕከል( ሲሲሀብ) ተባባሪ መስራች እና ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚ ቦሱን ቲጃኒን በሚኒስትሮች ዝርዝር ሁለተኛ ስብስብ ውስጥ አካትተዋል።
en: President Bola Tinubu has included Bosun Tijani, the co-founder and CEO of Nigeria's biggest tech hub, Co-Creation Hub (CcHUB), in the second batch of his ministerial list.
ha: Shugaban kasa Bola Tinubu ya sanya Bosun Tijani, shugaba kuma wanda ya samar da babban kamfanin fasaha na Tech hub, Co-Creation Hub (CchHub), a tsari na biyu na jerin ministocinsa.
sw: Rais Bora Tinubu amemjumuisha Bosun Tijan, mwanzilishi mwenza na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa kituo kikuu cha teknolojia nchini Nigeria, Co-Creation Hub (CcHUB), katika kundi la pili la orodha ya mawaziri wake.
yo: Ààrẹ Bola Tinubu ti mú Bosun Tijani, alájọdásílẹ̀ àti Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí ibùdó iṣẹ́ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tí ó tóbi jùlọ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria, Co-Creation Hub (CcHub), nínú ìṣí kejì ààtò àwọn mínísítà rẹ̀.
zu: UMongameli u-Bola Tinubu ufake u-Bosun Tijani, umsunguli kanye noMphathi Omkhulu wesikhungo esikhulu sezobuchwepheshe saseNigeria, i-Co-Creation Hub (CcHUB), eqenjini lesibili lohlu lwakhe longqongqoshe.

am: ይህ ዕጩነት የሙያ ፖለቲከኞች፣ የቀድሞ ገዥዎች እና ሴናተሮች ከተሞሉበት ዝርዝር ላይ ጉልህ ለውጥ አምጥቷል።
en: This nomination marks a significant departure from a list laden with career politicians, past governors, and senators.
ha: Wannan zabin ya nuna sauyi mahimmanci akan yadda aka saba na zabi d ke dauke da ‘yan siyasa, tsofaffin gwamnoni, da sanatoci.
sw: Uteuzi huu unaashiria kuondoka kwa orodha iliyojaa wanasiasa wenye taaluma, Magavana wa zamani na maseneta.
yo: Ìfàsílẹ̀ yìí tọ́ka àyípadà kúrò níbi ààtò tí ó máa ń kún fún àwọn oníṣẹ́ olóṣèlú, àwọn gómìnà tí wọ́n ti jẹ sẹ́yìn àti àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ìgbìmọ̀ aṣòfin.
zu: Lokhu kuqokwa kusho ukushiya ohlwini olugcwele osopolitiki, ababusi besikhathi esidlule, nezigele.

am: ሐምሌ 20 ቀን 1977 የተወለደው የቲጃኒ የቴክኖሎጂ ጕዞ የተጀመረው በኮምፒተር ሳይንስ ዲፕሎማ እና በኢኮኖሚክስ የመጀመሪያ ዲግሪ ከጆስ ዩኒቨርሲቲ ነው።
en: Born on July 20, 1977, Tijani's tech journey began with a diploma in Computer Science and a Bachelor of Science in Economics from the University of Jos.
ha: Wanda aka haifeshi a 20 ga Juli, 1977, rayuwar fasahar Tijani ta fara ne da difiloma a ilimin na’ura mai kwakwalwa da kuma digiri na daya a kimiyyar tattalin arziki daga jami’ar Jos.
sw: Alizaliwa Julai 20, 1977, safari ya teknolojia ya Tijani ilianza na sitashahada ya sayansi ya tanakrishi (kompyuta) na Shahada ya sayansi ya uchumi kutoka chuo kikuu cha Jos.
yo: Tijani tí wọ́n bí ní ọjọ́ 20 oṣù Keje, ọdún 1977 bẹ̀rẹ̀ ìrìn-àjò ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú dípílómà ní Ìmọ̀ Ẹ̀rọ Ayárabíàṣá, àti Ìwé-ẹ̀rí ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́gbòye àkọ́kọ́ onímọ̀ Sáyẹ̀nsì nínú Ètò ọrọ̀-ajé láti Fásitì Jos.
zu: Wazalwa zingamna-20 kuNtulikazi we-1977, uhambo lukaTijani lwezobuchwepheshe lwaqala ngediploma yeSayensi yezeKhompiyutha kanye neBachelor yeSayensi yezoMnotho yaseNyuvesi yaseJos.

am: በትምህርታዊ ስራዎቹ በዎርዊክ ቢዝነስ ትምህርት ቤት በኢንፎርሜሽን ሲስተምስ እና ማኔጅመንት የማስተርስ ዲግሪ እና በሌስተር ዩኒቨርሲቲ በፈጠራ እና በኢኮኖሚ ልማት የዶክትሬት ዲግሪ አግኝተዋል።
en: His academic pursuits continued with a Master's degree in Information Systems and Management from Warwick Business School and a PhD in Innovation and Economic Development at the University of Leicester.
ha: Neman iliminsa ya cigaba ne da digiri na biyu a Information Management daga Warwick Business School da kuma digiri na uku a Innovation and Economic Development a jami’ar Leicester.
sw: Shughuli zake za masomo ziliendelezwa na shahada ya uzamili katika mifumo na usimamizi wa habari kutoka shule ya biashara ya Warwick na Shahada ya uzamivu ya ubunifu na maendeleo ya kiuchumi katika chuo kikuu cha Leicester.
yo: Ó tẹ̀síwájú pẹ̀lú ẹ̀kọ́ ìwé rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú Ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́gbòye kejì ní Ìṣàkóso àti àwọn Ẹ̀rọ Ìwífún láti Ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Òkòwò ti Warwick àti Ẹ̀kọ́ Ìmòye ní Ìdàgbàsókè Ètò ọrọ̀-ajé àti ọgbọ́n Àtinúdá ní Fásitì Leicester.
zu: Ukulandela kwakhe imfundo kwamuholela ekutheni athole iziqu ze-Mastazi kwezoBuchwepheshe bezoKwazisa nokuPhatha azithola e-Warwick Business School kanye ne-PhD yezoKusha nokuThuthukiswa koMnotho e-University of Leicester.

am: የቲጃኒ የሙያ ልምድ እኩል አስደናቂ ነው።
en: Tijani's professional experience is equally impressive.
ha: Kwarewar Tijani abun burgewa ce.
sw: Uzoefu wa kitaalam wa Tijan unavutia vilevile.
yo: Ìrírí ajẹmọ́ṣẹ́ Tijani náà tún wúni lórí jọjọ.
zu: Isipiliyoni sikaTijani sobungoti naso sihlaba umxhwele.

am: ከዴሊቨሪኪንግ ጋር የንግድ ልማት ሥራ አስኪያጅ በመሆን ከሄውሌት ፓካርድ( ኤችፒ) ግሎባል ማይክሮ-ኢንተርፕራይዝ ማፋጠን ፕሮግራም( ጂኤምኢኤፒ) ጋር በአፍሪካ የማሰማራት መሪ በመሆን ከመስራት ጀምሮ ለቴክኖሎጂው ቦታ ያበረከተው አስተዋጽኦ በጣም ጥልቅ ነው።
en: From working as a Business Development Manager with DeliveryKing to serving as Deployment Lead (Africa) with Hewlett Packard (HP) Global Micro-enterprises Acceleration Programme (GMEAP), his contribution to the tech space is quite deep.
ha: Daga aiki a matsayin mai tafiyar da bunkasar kasuwanci tare da DeliveryKing zuwa kuma aiki a matsayin Deployment Lead(Africa) da Hewlette Packard(HP) Global Micro-enterprises Acceleration Programme(GMEAP), gudunmawar sa ga bangaren fasaha yana da yawa.
sw: Kuanzia kufanya kazi kama Meneja wa Maendeleo na Biashara na DeliveryKing, hadi kutumika kama kiongozi wa usambazaji (Afrika) na Hewlet Parckard (HP) Global Micro-enterprises Acceleration programme (GMEAP), mchango wake katika anga la teknolojia ni wa kina sana.
yo: Láti ṣíṣe iṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bí i Olùṣàkóso Ìdàgbàsókè Òkòwò pẹ̀lú DeliveryKing sí ṣíṣe iṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bí i Adarí Ìfọjàjíṣẹ́ (Africa) pẹ̀lú Ètò Ìmúṣẹ́yá àwọn Ilé-iṣẹ́ Kéékéèké ní Àgbáyé (GMEAP/EIIAK) ti Hewlett Packard (HP), ìdásí rẹ̀ tí àyè ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ jinlẹ̀ gan.
zu: Kusukela eyiMenenja Yokuthuthukiswa Kwezamabhizinisi ne-DeliveryKing kuya ekusebenzeni njenge-Deployment Lead (i-Africa) ne-Hewlett Packard (i-HP) Global Micro-enterprises Acceleration Programme (i-GMEAP), umnikelo wakhe endaweni yezobuchwepheshe ujule kakhulu.

am: በመላው አፍሪካ የመማር ማስተማር ማዕከላትን ተቆጣጥሮ ጉልህ ፕሮጀክቶችን ጀምሯል። ከእነዚህም መካከል ማርክ ዙከርበርግ ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ በናይጄሪያእና ከሰሃራ በታች ባሉ የአፍሪካ አገሮች ያደረገው ጉብኝት እንዲሁም የማይክሮሶፍት መስራች ቢል ጌትስ ተገናኝተው ነበር።
en: He has managed learning centres across Africa and initiated significant projects, including Mark Zuckerberg's first visit to Nigeria and sub-Saharan Africa as well as a meet up with Bill Gates, Founder of Microsoft.
ha: Ya gudanar da wuraren koyo a Afirka baki ɗaya ya kuma kirkiro ayyuka masu amfani, wanda ya hada da ziyarar Mark Zuckerberg ta farko a Nijeriya da kuma sub-saharan Afirka har ma da haɗuwa da Bill Gates, wanda ya samar da Microsoft.
sw: Amesimamia vitu vya mafunzo barani Afrika na kuanzisha miradi muhimu, ikijumuisha ziara ya kwanza ya Mark Zuckerberg nchini Nigeria na Afrika ya kusini mwa jangwa la sahara na pia kukutana na Bill Gates, muanzilishi wa Microsoft.
yo: Ó ti ṣe àkóso àwọn gbọ̀ngán ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ káàkiri ilẹ̀ Africa tí ó sì ti pilẹ̀ àwọn iṣẹ́ àkànṣe pàtàkì, èyí tí àbẹ̀wò àkọ́kọ́ tí Mark Zuckerberg ṣe sí Nigeria àti gúúsù-Sahara Africa pẹ̀lú ìpàdé-tàkúrọ̀sọ pẹ̀lú Bill Gates, Olùdásílẹ̀ Microsoft wà nínú wọn.
zu: Uphathe izikhungo zokufunda e-Afrika yonkana futhi waqala amaphrojekthi abalulekile, okuhlanganisa ukuvakasha kokuqala kuka-Mark Zuckerberg eNigeria nase-sub-Saharan Africa kanye nokuhlangana noBill Gates, uMsunguli we-Microsoft.

am: በቲጃኒ መሪነት፣ ሲሲኅብ በያባ ውስጥ ከነበረበት ትሁት ጅምር ጀምሮ በመላው አፍሪካ ዋና ዋና ማዕቀፎችን ለማግኘት በማደግ ላይ ነው፤ ይህም ፓን አፍሪካዊ የቴክኖሎጂ ኢንኩቤተር እንዲሆን በማድረግ፣ ወጣቶች ተፅዕኖ ያላቸውን ተፅዕኖ ዎች ለማስጀመር የሚያስፈልጋቸውን መሣሪያዎች፣ ማህበረሰቦች እና ካፒታል ኃይል ይሰጣል።
en: Under Tijani's leadership, CcHUB has grown from its humble beginnings in Yaba to acquiring major hubs across Africa, making it a pan-African tech incubator, empowering young people with the tools, communities, and capital they need to launch impactful ventures.
ha: A ƙarƙashin jagorancin Tijani, CcHUB ta bunkasa daga faraway kaɗan a Yaba zuwa mallamar manyan hubs a Afirka , wanda ya sanya suka zamo masu rainon pan-African tech, wanda suke tallafawa kananan matasa da kayan aiki, al’umma, da kuma jarin da suke buƙata domin ƙaddamar da kamfanoni masu amfani.
sw: Chini ya uongozi wa Tijan, CcHUB ilikuwa kutoka kwenye mwanzo wake duni huko Yaba hadi kupata vitu vikuu barani Afrika, na kuifanya kuwa chanzo cha teknolojia ya kiafrika, kwa kuwawezesha vijana kwa zana, jumuiya, na mitaji wanayohitaji ili kuzindua miradi yenye matokeo.
yo: Lábẹ́ ìdarí Tijani, CcHub ti gbòòrò láti Yaba tí ó jẹ́ orísun ìpìlẹ̀ rẹ̀ láti máa ṣe ìràpíngbàkóso àwọn ibùdó iṣẹ́ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ńlá káàkiri ilẹ̀ Africa, tí ó sì sọ ọ́ di aṣètò ìrànwọ́ onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ fún ìdàgbàsókè tí ó ń ṣe ìgbélárugẹ ilẹ̀ Africa, tí ó sì ń ṣe ìrónilágbára fún àwọn èèyàn pẹ̀lú àwọn irinṣẹ́, àwọn àwùjọ àti owó ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ òkòwò tí wọ́n máa nílò láti bẹ̀rẹ̀ àwọn òkòwò onípa.
zu: Ngaphansi kobuholi bukaTijani, i-CcHUB ikhule kusukela ekuqaleni kwayo e-Yaba yafinyelela ekutholeni izindawo ezinkulu e-Afrika yonkana, okuyenza ibe incubator yobuchwepheshe base-Afrika, inika abantu abasha amandla ngamathuluzi, imiphakathi, kanye nemali abayidingayo ukuze baqalise amabhizinisi anomthelela omuhle.

am: ሲሲሀአብ በቢሊዮን ናይራ እድገት ፈንድ አማካኝነት በአፍሪካ የትምህርት እና የጤና እንክብካቤ ሥርዓቶች ውስጥ አዳዲስ ምርቶችን በሚገነቡ የመጀመሪያ ደረጃ መስራቾች ላይ ኢንቬስት ያደርጋል።
en: With a billion naira growth fund, CcHub invests in early-stage founders building innovative products in Africa's education and healthcare systems.
ha: Tare da tallafin bunkasawa na biliyan naira, CcHUB suna sanya hannun jari a kamfanunuwan da aka fara samarwa da suke a matakin farko da suke da kayayyakin ƙirƙira a fannin ilimin Afirka da kuma ɓangaren kula da lafiya.
sw: Kwa udhamini wa ukuaji wa naira bilioni, CcHUB inawekeza kwa waanzilishi wa miradi ya hatua ya awalikatika kuimarisha bidhaa za ubunifu kwenye mifumo ya elimu na afya barani Afrika.
yo: Pẹ̀lú owó ìrànwọ́ bílíọ̀nù naira kan fún ìdàgbàsókè, CcHub ń kówó lé àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ aṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀-bẹ̀rẹ̀ tí wọ́n ń ṣẹ̀dá àwọn ohun ìṣàmúlò alátinúdà ní ẹ̀ka ẹ̀kọ́ àti ètò ìlera ní ilẹ̀ Africa.
zu: Ngokukhula kwesikwama se-naira esingamabhiliyoni, i-CcHub itshala imali kubasunguli abasaqala ukwakha imikhiqizo emisha ezinhlelweni zemfundo nokunakekelwa kwezempilo zase-Afrika.

am: ቦሱን ቲጃኒ የኮሙኒኬሽንእና ዲጂታል ኤኮኖሚ ሚኒስትር በመሆን?
en: Bosun Tijani as Minister of Communications and Digital Economy?
ha: Bosun Tijani a matsayin ministan sadarwa da tattalin arziki na zamani?
sw: Bosun Tijan kama waziri wa mawasiliano na uchumi wa dijitali?
yo: Bosun Tijani gẹ́gẹ́ bí i Mínísítà fún Ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ àti Ètò ọrọ̀-ajé Díjítà?
zu: U-Bosun Tijani njengoNgqongqoshe Wezokuxhumana kanye Nomnotho Wedijithali?

am: የቲጃኒ ምርጫ ለኮሚኒኬሽን እና ዲጂታል ኢኮኖሚ ሚኒስትር ሚና እየታሰብ መሆኑን ይጠቁማል።
en: Tijani's nomination suggests that he is being considered for the Minister of Communications and Digital Economy role.
ha: Zabin Tijani ya nuna cewa an zabe shi ne a matsayin ministan sadarwa da tattalin arziki na zamani.
sw: Uteuzi wa Tijan unaonyesha kuwa anatarajiwa kuwa waziri wa mawasiliano na uchumi wa dijitali.
yo: Bí wọ́n ṣe ti fa Bosun Tijani kalẹ̀ ń ṣipẹ̀ pé wọ́n ń wò ó fún ipò Mínísítà fún Ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ àti Ètò ọrọ̀-ajé Díjítà.
zu: Ukuqokwa kukaTijani kubika ukuthi kunemicabango yokumfaka esikhundleni sokuba nguNgqongqoshe Wezokuxhumana kanye Nomnotho Wedijithali.

am: ይህ እርምጃ ፕሬዚዳንት ቲኑቡ በዘመቻው ወቅት በናይጄሪያ የቴክኖሎጂ ሥነ ምህዳር ላይ ካተኮሩበት ሁኔታ ጋር ይስማማል። ይህ ግን ብቸኛው አማራጭ አይደለም።
en: This move aligns with President Tinubu's focus on Nigeria's tech ecosystem during his campaign, but that's not the only option.
ha: Wannan matakin daga shugaban kasa Tinubu ya maida hankali ne akan tsarin mahallin fasaha na Nijeriya a lokacin yakin neman takararsa, amma ba wannan ne kadai zabin ba.
sw: Hatua hii inalingana na mwelekeo wa Rais Tinubu kwenye mfumo wa teknolojia wa Nigeria wakati wa kampeni zake, lakini hilo siyo chaguo pekee.
yo: Ìgbésẹ̀ yìí bá àfojúsùn Ààrẹ Tinubu lórí àyè ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ní àsìkò ìpolongo ìbò rẹ̀ mu, ṣùgbọ́n ìyẹn nìkan kọ́ ni àṣàyàn tí ó wà.
zu: Lesi sinyathelo sihambisana nokugxila kukaMongameli uTinubu ku-tech ecosystem yaseNigeria ngesikhathi somkhankaso wakhe, kodwa akukona lokho kuphela okukhona.

am: የቲጃኒ ሰፊ ልምድ እና አዳዲስ አስተሳሰብ ለሌሎች ሚኒስቴሮችም ዋና ተወዳዳሪ ሊያደርገው ይችላል።
en: Tijani's extensive experience and innovative mindset could also make him a key competitor for other ministries.
ha: Cikakkiyar kwarewar Tijani da kuma tunin ƙirƙira zai iya sanya shi ya zamanto dan takara babba ga sauran hukumomin.
sw: Uzoefu mkubwa wa Tijan na mawazo yake ya kibunifu pia yanaweza kumfunya kuwa mshindani mkuu wa wizara nyingi.
yo: Ìrírí gbòòrò tí Tijani ní àti ìròrí ìṣatínúdá rẹ̀ lè mú kí ó jẹ́ olùfigagbága pàtàkì fún àwọn ipò mínísítà mìíràn.
zu: Ulwazi oluningi luka-Tijani kanye nengqondo yakhe ecabanga izinto ezintsha nakho kungamenza abe yimbangi enkulu yezinye izikhundla zobungqongqoshe.

am: በኢኮኖሚክስ ውስጥ ያለው አስተዳደግና የቴክኖሎጂ ችሎታው ከኢኮኖሚ እድገት ወይም ከትምህርት ጋር የተያያዙ ሚኒስቴሮችን በበላይነት የመከታተል እጩ እንደሆነ አድርጎ ይሾመታል።
en: His background in economics, coupled with his tech expertise, positions him as a potential candidate for overseeing ministries related to economic development or education.
ha: Iliminsa a fannin tattalin arziki, tare da kwarewarsa a fannin fasaha, ya sanya shi zama dan zabin daya dace wajen kula da hukumomin da suke da dangantaka da bunkasar tattalin arziki ko ilimi.
sw: Asili yake kwenye uchumi, pamoja na utaalamu wake kwenye teknolojia, inamweka kama mgombea anayetarajiwa kusimamia wizara zinazohusiana na maendeleo ya uchumi au elimu.
yo: Ìmọ̀ tí ó ní nínú ètò ọrọ̀-ajé, pẹ̀lú ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tí ó ní jẹ́ kí ó di òǹwápò aláfiyèsí tí ó lè máa àmójútó àwọn ọ́fíìsì mínísítà tí ó jẹmọ́ ìdàgbàsókè ètò ọrọ̀ ajé àbí ẹ̀kọ́.
zu: Isizinda sakhe kwezomnotho, sihambisana nobuchule bakhe kwezobuchwepheshe, kumbeka njengomuntu ongase angamele izikhundla zobungqongqoshe eziphathelene nokuthuthukiswa komnotho noma ezemfundo.

am: ይሁን እንጂ፣ በቀረበው አገልግሎት ዙሪያ፣ ከሚኒስቴርነት ሹመኞች ዝርዝር ውስጥ የቦሱን ቲጃኒ ፕሮፋይል ብቻ አይደለም።
en: However, in the context of the proposed ministry, Bosun Tijani's profile is not the only option among the list of ministerial nominees.
ha: Duk da haka, a bayanan da aka bayar na wannan hukumar, bayanan Tijani Bosun ba shi ne kadai zabi ba daga jerin ministocin da za a zaɓa.
sw: Hata hivyo, katika mktadha wa wizara inayopendekezwa, wasifu wa Bosun Tijani siyo chaguo pekee katika orodha ya mawaziri wateule.
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n, ní ti àyè ipò mínísítà tí à ń gbèrò, àkójọ iṣẹ́ Bosun Tijani nìkan kọ́ ni àṣàyàn kan ṣoṣo láàárín àwọn tí wọ́n fà kalẹ̀ fún ipò mínísítà.
zu: Kodwa-ke, kumongo womsebenzi wobungqongqoshe ohlongozwayo, iphrofayili kaBosun Tijani akuyona kuphela inketho phakathi kohlu lwabaqokelwe ukuba ungqongqoshe.

am: የኦሉቡንሚ ቱንጂ-ኦጆ ፕሮፌይልም ለአይሲቲ ሚኒስትር ነት ጠንካራ ተወዳዳሪ መሆኑ ጎልቶ ይታያል።
en: Olubunmi Tunji-Ojo's profile also stands out as a strong contender for the position of ICT minister.
ha: Bayanan Olubunmi Tunji-Ojo ma ya nuna cewar yana ɗaya daga cikin ‘yan takara masu ƙarfi a mukamin ministan ICT.
sw: Wasifu wa Olubunmi Tunji-Ojo pia unajitosheleza kuwa mgombea mkubwa wa nafasi ya waziri wa ICT.
yo: Àkójọ iṣẹ́ Olubunmi Tunji-Ojo náà tayọ gẹ́gẹ́ bí i olùdíje fún ipò mínísítà fún Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ Ìwífún àti ọ̀nà Ìbánisọ̀rọ̀.
zu: Iphrofayili ka-Olubunmi Tunji-Ojo nayo ibonakala njengembangi enamandla esikhundleni sikangqongqoshe we-ICT.

am: በኤሌክትሮኒክስ እና በኮሙኒኬሽን ኢንጂነሪንግ ሰፊ የኋላ ታሪክ፣ የማትሪክስ አይቲ ሶሉሽንስ ሊሚትድ ዋና ሥራ አስኪያጅ በመሆን ስኬታማ የስራ መስክ እና የህዝብ ተወካዮች ምክር ቤት አባል በመሆን የፖለቲካ ልምድ ያለው የቱንጂ-ኦጆ ብቃት ከድርሻው ጋር ፍፁም ይጣጣማሉ።
en: With an extensive background in electronics and communication engineering, a successful career as the CEO of Matrix IT Solutions Limited, and political experience as a member of the House of Representatives, Tunji-Ojo's qualifications align perfectly with the role.
ha: Wanda yake da ilimi a fannin fasahar kayan lantarki da sadarwa, aiki mai cike da nasara a matsayin shugaban Matrix IT Solution Limited, ga kuma kwarewar siyasa a matsayin mamba na majalisar wakilai, kwarewar tunji ta dace kwarai da mukamin.
sw: Akiwa na wasifu mkubwa wa uhandisi wa kielekroniki na mawasiliano, taaluma iliyomfanya kuwa Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Matrix IT Solutions Limited na uzoefu wa kisiasa kama mjumbe wa Baraza la wawakilishi, sifa za Tunji-Ojo zinaendana kabisa na jukumu hilo.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ìmọ̀ àmọ̀dùnjù nínú iṣẹ́-ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ àti ẹ̀rọ iná, àṣeyọrí lẹ́nú iṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bí i Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Matrix IT Solutions Limited, àti ìrírí ètò ìṣèlú gẹ́gẹ́ bí i ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ Ilé Aṣojúṣòfin, àwọn àṣeyọrí Tunji-Ojo bá ipò náà mu dáadáa ni.
zu: Njengoba enemvelaphi ebanzi kwezobunjiniyela be-elekthronikhi nokuxhumana, ukuphumelela emsebenzini njenge-CEO ye-Matrix IT Solutions Limited, nolwazi lwezombangazwe njengelungu leNdlu yabaMeli, iziqu zika-Tunji-Ojo zihambisana kahle nendima.

am: እንደ ቲጃኒ ያሉ የቴክኖሎጂ መሪዎች ምርጫ በናይጄሪያ የፖለቲካ መልክአ ምድራዊ አቀማመጥ ላይ ተስፋ ሰጪ ለውጥ ሊሆን ይችላል።
en: The nomination of tech leaders like Tijani could be a promising shift in Nigeria's political landscape.
ha: Zabin shugabannin fasaha kamar Tunji zai iya zama sauyi mai kyau a mahallin siyasar Nijeriya.
sw: Uteuzi wa viongozi wa teknolojia kama Tijani unaweza kuleta mabadiliko na matumaini katika nyanja ya siasa ya Nigeria.
yo: Ìfàkalẹ̀ àwọn adarí alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ bí i Tijani lè jẹ́ ìrètí ayípadà ní àyè ìṣèlú ní Nigeria.
zu: Ukuqokwa kwabaholi bezobuchwepheshe abafana noTijani kungaba wushintsho oluthembisayo esimweni sezepolitiki saseNigeria.

am: የቴክኖሎጂ ኢንዱስትሪ ያለውን ጠቀሜታ አምኖ ከመቀበሉም በላይ አዳዲስና ወደፊት የሚያስቡ አስተዳደሮች እንዲስፋፉ መንገድ ይጠርጋል።
en: It not only acknowledges the importance of the tech industry but also paves the way for innovative and forward-thinking governance.
ha: Ba amfanin masana’antar fasaha kawai take kula ba amma kuma tana share hanyar ƙirƙira da kuma tunanin cigaba a gwamnati.
sw: Haiangalii umuhimu wa tasinia ya teknolojia lakini pia hufungua njia kwa utawala wa kibunifu na wa kufikiria mbele.
yo: Kì í ṣe pé ó ń ṣe ìtẹ́wọ́gbà pàtàkì ẹ̀ka ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ nìkan, ṣùgbọ́n ó tún ń ṣíná fún ìṣèjọba tí ó ní ọgbọ́n àtinúdá tí ó sì ń ronú ọjọ́-ọ̀la.
zu: Akugcini nje ngokuvuma ukubaluleka kwemboni yezobuchwepheshe kodwa futhi kuvula indlela yokubusa okusha nokucabanga okuya phambili.

am: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ምክር ቤት የምርመራ ሂደቱን ሲቀጥል፣ የቴክኖሎጂ ማህበረሰብ እና በአጠቃላይ ሀገሪቱ የመጨረሻውን ውሳኔ በጉጉት ይጠባበቃሉ። ቴክኖሎጂና ፈጠራ በናይጄሪያ ዕድገት ውስጥ ማዕከላዊ ደረጃ ላይ እንደሚደርሱ ተስፋ ያደርጋል።
en: As the Senate continues the screening process, the tech community and the nation at large eagerly await the final decision, hopeful for a future where technology and innovation take centre stage in Nigeria's development.
ha: A Yayin da sanatocin suke cigaba da aikin tantancewa, al’ummar fasaha da kuma kasar baki ɗaya suna jiran sakamakon karshe, cikin zaton rayuwar gaba inda fasaha da ƙirƙira zasu zamo abun dubawa a cigaban Nijeriya.
sw: Wakati seneti ikiendelea na mchakato wa uchunguzi, jumuiya ya teknolojia na taifa kwa ujumla wnasubiri kwa hamu uamuzi wa mwisho, wenye matumaini kwa siku zijazo ambapo teknolojia na uvumbuzi huchukua hatua kuu katika maendeleo ya Nigeria.
yo: Bí ilé Aṣòfin ṣe ń bá ètò àyẹ̀wò lọ, àwùjọ onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àti orílẹ̀-èdè ní àpapọ̀ ń dúró dé ìpinnu ìkẹyìn pẹ̀lú ìtara, pẹ̀lú ìrètí fún ọjọ́-iwájú níbi tí ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àti ọgbọ́n àtinúdá yóò gba àyè ààrin gbungbun ìdàgbàsókè ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria.
zu: Njengoba iSigele siqhubeka nenqubo yokuhlola, umphakathi wezobuchwepheshe kanye nesizwe ngokubanzi silindele ngokulangazela isinqumo sokugcina, sinethemba ngekusasa lapho ubuchwepheshe nokusungula kuzothatha indawo ebaluleke kakhulu ekuthuthukisweni kweNigeria.

am: ሲሲሀብ በአሁኑ ጊዜ በአዲሱ የአሜሪካ የቦታ ህንፃ በያባ ቢሮ ውስጥ 5 ፎቆች ይይዛል
en: CcHub now occupies 5 floors in Yaba office with the new American Spaces facility
ha: A yanzu CcHub suna rike da hawa biyar a ofishin Yaba tare da sabon mahallin Ameriƙa.
sw: CcHub sasa ina orofa 5 katika ofisi ya Yaba na kituo kipya cha Nafasi za Marekani
yo: CcHub ti gba àjà 5 ní ọ́fíìsì tí ó wà ní Yaba pẹ̀lú àwọn irinṣẹ́ American Spaces tuntun
zu: I-CcHub manje inezitezi ezi-5 ehhovisi le-Yaba nendawo entsha ye-American Spaces

am: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ኮንስል ጄኔራል ኤፍ ጆን ብራይ ዛሬ ማለዳ ላይ ኮ-ክሪኤሽኑ ሃብ በያባ፣ ሌጎስ የአሜሪካ ቦታዎችን በማቋቋም ረገድ ይፋዊ አጋራቸው እንደሚሆን አስታውቀዋል።
en: The United States Consul General F. John Bray announced earlier today that the Co-creation Hub will be their official partner in setting up American Spaces in Yaba, Lagos.
ha: The United States Consul General F.John Bray ya sanar ayau cewar Co-creation Hub zai zama abokin hulɗar su wajen tsara mahallin Ameriƙa a Yaba, Legas.
sw: Balozi Mdogo wa Marekani F. John Bray alitangaza mapema leo, kwamba Co-Creation Hub itakuwa mshirika wao rasimi katika kuanzisha Nafasi za Marekani huko Yaba, Lagos.
yo: Ọ̀gá Aṣojú Ìjọba ilẹ̀ United States F. John Bray ti kéde ní kùtùkùtù lónìí pé Co-Creation Hub ni yóò jẹ́ alábàáṣe tí ó ní àṣẹ fún ṣíṣe ètò American Spaces ní Yaba, Lagos.
zu: I-United States Consul General u-F. John Bray umemezele ekuqaleni kwanamuhla ukuthi i-Co-creation Hub izoba ngumlingani wabo osemthethweni ekumiseni i-American Spaces eYaba, eLagos.

am: በዓለም ዙሪያ በ152 አገሮች ውስጥ ከ700 የሚበልጡ ቦታዎች የሚገኙባቸው የአሜሪካ ቦታዎች ጎብኚዎች ስለ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ መገናኘትና መማር የሚችሉበት አካባቢ አላቸው።
en: With over 700 Spaces in 152 countries worldwide, American Spaces provides environments where visitors can connect and learn about the United States.
ha: Tare da wurare fiye da 700 a kasashe 152 a duniya baki ɗaya, mahallan Ameriƙa suna samar da wurare inda baki zasu iya haɗuwa kuma su samu ilimi game da Ameriƙa.
sw: ikiwa na nafasi zaidi ya 7000 kwenye nchi zaidi ya 152 duniani kote, American Spaces hutoa mazingira ambayo wageni wanaweza kuunganishwa na kujifunza kuhusu marekani.
yo: Pẹ̀lú àwọn 700 Spaces ní àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè 152 ní àgbáyé, American Spaces ń pèsè àwọn agbègbè níbi tí àwọn àlejò ti lè ní ìbáṣe kí wọ́n sì mọ̀ sí i nípa United States.
zu: Ngezikhala ezingaphezu kuka-700 emazweni angu-152 emhlabeni jikelele, i-American Spaces inikeza izindawo lapho izivakashi zingaxhuma futhi zifunde mayelana ne-United States.

am: #ሲጂብሬይ በሌጎስ በሚገኘው የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ሚሲዮን ናይጄሪያ(@ዩኤስኢንናይጀሪያ) (@USinNigeria) ጥቅምት 28, 2016 አዲስ ቅድሚያ አሜሪካን እስፔስ ለማቋቋም እንደ አጋራችን (@ሲሲ_ሀብ)@Cc_HUB ልዩ ሽልማት እንገነዘባለን።
en: #CGBray: We recognize a unique award to @Cc_HUB as our partner to set up & run a new Priority #AmericanSpace at the Co-Creation Hub in Lagos— U.S. Mission Nigeria (@USinNigeria) October 28, 2016
ha: #CGBray: Mun gano kyauta ta musamman ga @Cc—HUB a matsayin abokan hulɗarmu wajen samarwa da kuma gudanar da new priority #AmericanSpace a Co-creation Hub a Legas—U.S Mission Nijeriya (@USinNigeria) 28 Oktoba, 2016.
sw: #CGBray: Tunatambua tuzo ya kipekee kwa @Cc_HUB kama mshirika wetu wa kuanzisha na kuendeleza Kipaumbele kipya, #AmericanSpaces katika Co-Creation HUB huko Lagos, U. S. Mission Nigeria (@USinNigeria) Oktoba 28, 2016
yo: #CGBray: A ṣẹ̀rí ìfifún aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ fún @Cc_HUB gẹ́gẹ́ bí i alábàáṣe wa láti ṣètò àti láti darí ohun Pàtàkì tuntun #AmericanSpace ní Co-Creation Hub ní Lagos— U.S. Mission Nigeria (@USinNigeria) ọjọ́ 28 oṣù Kẹwàá, ọdún 2016
zu: #CGBray: Sibona umklomelo oyingqayizivele ku-@Cc_HUB njengozakwethu wokusetha nokusebenzisa i-Priority entsha #AmericanSpace ku-Co-Creation Hub e-Lagos— U.S. Mission Nigeria (@USinNigeria) zingama-28 kuMfumfu wezi-2026

am: የአሜሪካ ስፔስ ቢሮ የዩናይትድ ስቴትስን የውጭ ፖሊሲ ዓላማዎች ለመደገፍ ከውጭ አገር ዒላማ ከሆኑት አድማጮች ጋር ሕዝባዊ ዲፕሎማሲ ለማድረግ ዘመናዊና ውጤታማ የሆኑ አካላዊ መድረኮችን ያዘጋጃል እንዲሁም ይደግፋል።
en: The Office of American Spaces develops and supports modern, effective physical platforms for public diplomacy engagement with foreign targeted audiences in support of United States foreign policy objectives.
ha: Ofishin American Sapace yana bunkasawa tare a tallafawa manhajojin zamani masu amfani don hulɗar diflomasiyyar jama’a, tare da ƙoƙarin janyo ra’ayin mutanen waje don bada goyon baya ga manufofin kasar waje ta Ameriƙa.
sw: Ofsi ya American Spaces hutengeneza na kubuni majukwaa ya diplomasia ya umma na watazamaji walengwa wa kigeni ili kuongeza ubunifu wa malengo ya sera ya kigeni ya marekani.
yo: Ọ́fíìsì American Spaces ń ṣẹ̀dá tí ó sì ń ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ àwọn ìkànnì àrídìmú ìgbàlódé fún ìṣàkóso ìbáṣe ìlú òkèèrè onígbogboogbò pẹ̀lú àwọn èrò ìlú òkèèrè àfojúsùn láti lè ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún àwọn ìlépa òfin òkèèrè United States.
zu: Ihhovisi Lezikhala ZaseMelika lithuthukisa futhi lisekele izinkundla zesimanjemanje, ezisebenzayo zokuxoxisana komphakathi nezithameli eziqondiswe kwamanye amazwe ekusekeleni izinjongo zenqubomgomo yezangaphandle yase-United States.

am: ሕዋስ ቴክኖሎጂን ከውበታ ጋር በማዋሃድ ፣የአሜሪካ መልክና ስሜት ያላቸው ቀጣይ የሆኑ ግዑዝ ቦታዎች ይሰጣሉ።
en: Combining technology with aesthetics, the Spaces provides dynamic physical spaces that have an American look and feel.
ha: Hada fasaha da aesthetics, Spaces din suna samar da mahalli na fili da ke da irin tsarin Ameriƙa a ido da yanayi.
sw: Kwa kuchanganya teknolojia na urembo, Space hutoa nafasi zinazobadilika ambazo zina mwonekano na hisia za kimarekani.
yo: Nípa ṣíṣe àmúlò ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ papọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn ọnà ẹlẹ́wà, Spaces náà ń pèsè àwọn àyè àfojúrí aláyìídà tí ó ní ìwò àti ìmọ̀lára America.
zu: Ukuhlanganisa ubuchwepheshe nobuhle, i-Spaces inikeza izindawo ezibonakalayo eziguqukayo ezinokubukeka nomuzwa waseMelika.

am: የአሜሪካ ስፔስ 2015 ዓመታዊ ሪፖርት እንደሚያሳየው በዚህ ዓመት በስፔስ ላይ አንዳንድ ማስተካከያዎች ይደረጋሉ።
en: According to the American Spaces 2015 annual report, there are certain adjustments that will be made to the Spaces this year.
ha: Kamar yadda American spaces suka bayyana a rahotonsu na shekara a 2015, da akwai wasu gyare gyare da za ayi a Spaces din a wannan shekarar.
sw: Kulingana na taarifa ya kila mwaka ya Spaces 2015, kuna marekebisho fulani ambayo yatafanyiwa kazi kwenye Spaces mwaka huu.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí àbọ̀ ọdọọdún American Spaces ti ọdún 2015 ṣe sọ, ó ní àwọn àtúnṣe kọ̀ọ̀kan tí yóò di ṣíṣe sí Spaces náà ní ọdún yìí.
zu: Ngokombiko wonyaka we-American Spaces 2015, kukhona ukulungiswa okuthile okuzokwenziwa ku-Spaces kulo nyaka.

am: ከእነዚህ ማስተካከያዎች መካከል ሁለቱ የዲጂታል ተሳትፎ እና የቴክኖሎጂ ማሻሻያዎች ናቸው።
en: Two of such adjustments are internet upgrades for digital engagement and technology that enables virtual programming.
ha: Biyu daga wadannan gyaran sune bunkasa yanar gizo domin ayyukan zamani da fasaha da yake bada damar virtual programming.
sw: Marekebisho mawili kati ya haya ni uboreshaji wa mtandao wa ushirika wa kidijitali na teknilojia ambayo huwezesha upangaji programu halisi.
yo: Méjì nínú àwọn àtúnṣe náà ni ìmúdójúìwọ̀n ayélujára fún ìbáṣe orí ẹ̀rọ àti ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tí yóò fi àyè gba ìṣètò ìpàdé orí ayélujára.
zu: Okubili kwalolo shintsho ukuthuthukiswa kwe-inthanethi kokusebenzelana kwedijithali nobuchwepheshe obuvumela ukuhlela okubonakalayo.

am: #ያባ ውስጥ ሌላ ፎቅ ተጨምሮበት በድምሩ 5 ፎቅ እንዲሆን አድርጓል ።
en: Yet another floor added to our facility in #Yaba making it 5 floors in total.
ha: Kuma wani hawan da aka kara a wajenmu na #Yaba da ya maida shi hawa biyar gaba ɗaya.
sw: Bado ghorofa nyingine imeongezwa kwenye kituo chetu huko #Yaba na kufanya kuwa jumla ya ghorofa 5.
yo: Síbẹ̀ àjà mìíràn tí wọ́n fi kún àyè iṣẹ́ wa ní #Yaba jẹ́ kí ó di àwọn àjà 5 ní àpapọ̀.
zu: Kanti esinye isitezi sengezwe endaweni yethu e-#Yaba okwenza izitezi ezi-5 sezizonke.

am: #ያባ እና # ቴክ ናይጄሪያ ትልቅ ድል ነው።
en: A big win for #Yaba & #Tech in #Nigeria.
ha: Babbar nasara ga #Yaba&#Tech in Nigeria.
sw: Ushindi mkubwa kwa #Yaba & #Tech nchini #Nigeria.
yo: Àṣeyọrí ńlá fún #Yaba & #Tech ní #Nigeria.
zu: Ukuwina okukhulu kwe-#Yaba & #Tech e-#Nigeria.

am: ቅድሚያ የሚሰጡዋቸውን #አሜሪካን እስፔስ#ምዕራብ አፍሪካ።
en: First Priority #AmericanSpace in #WestAfrica.
ha: Abu mafi mahimmanci na farko#AmericanSpace in #West Africa.
sw: Kipaumbele cha kwanza cha Amercan Spaces Afrika ya Magharibi.
yo: Ìfisọ́kàn Àkọ́kọ́ #AmericanSpace ní #WestAfrica.
zu: Okokuqala okubalulekile #AmericanSpace in #WestAfrica.

am: ይህም ትብብርን እና ግኝትን ያቀላጥፋል!
en: This will facilitate collaboration & access!
ha: Wanna zai taimakawa hadin guiwa & samun dama!
sw: Hii itarahisisha ushirikiano na ufikiaji!
yo: Èyí yóò mú àjọṣepọ̀ àti ìráàyèsí ṣiṣẹ́.!
zu: Lokhu kuzokwenza lula ukusebenzisana nokufinyelela!

am: ከዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ኤምባሲ ጋር አዲሱ ሽርክና ጋር የሲሲ ኅብ በአሁኑ ጊዜ በያባ፣ ሌጎስ ሕንፃ ውስጥ በድምሩ አምስት ፎቆች አሉት።
en: With the new partnership with the United States Embassy, the CcHub now has a total of five floors in the Yaba, Lagos facility.
ha: Da sabuwar hulɗa tare da ofishin jakaɗancin Amurka, CcHub a yanzu suna da hawa biyar gaba ɗaya a Yaba, mahallin Legas.
sw: Kwa ushirikiano mpya na ubalozi wa Marekani, CcHUB kwa sasa ina jumla ya ghorofa tano kwenye kituo cha Yaba, Lagos.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ìbáṣepọ̀ tuntun pẹ̀lú Ilé-iṣẹ́ United States ní orílẹ̀-èdè yìí, CcHub ti ní àpapọ̀ àjà márùn-ún ní àyè iṣẹ́ tí ó wà ní Yaba, Lagos.
zu: Ngobambiswano olusha neNxusa Lase-United States, i-CcHub manje isinesamba sezitezi ezinhlanu endaweni yaseYaba, eLagos.

am: ቦሱን ቲጃኒ እና የሲሲኅብ ቡድን ስትራቴጂያዊ በሆነ መንገድ በቴክኖሎጂ ማዕከል ላይ የተመሠረተውን ሕንፃ በሙሉ ለማግኘት አንድ እርምጃ ቅርብ ናቸው።
en: Bosun Tijani and the CcHub team are one step closer to acquiring the entire building which is strategically based in a technology hub.
ha: BosunTijani da ƙungiyar CcHub suna gab da mallakar gaba ɗayan ginin wanda a dabarance yake a hub din fasaha.
sw: Bosun Tijani na jopo la CcHUB wanakaribia kupata jengo ambalo limewekwa kwa ajiri ya mikakati ya kitovu cha teknolojia.
yo: Ó kù tíún kí Bosun Tijani àti ìgbìmọ̀ CcHub ó kúkú ra odidi ilé náà tí ó wà láàárín ibùdó iṣẹ́ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ.
zu: U-Bosun Tijani kanye nethimba le-CcHub bayisinyathelo esisodwa sokusondela ekutholeni sonke isakhiwo esisekelwe ngamasu asendaweni yezobuchwepheshe.

am: የደቡብ አፍሪካ የንግድ ካፒታል ኩባንያ ለፕሮፕቴክ ፈንድ ከ10 ሚሊዮን ዶላር በላይ አሰባሰበ
en: South African venture capital firm raises more than $10 million for proptech fund
ha: Kmafanin venture capital na Afirka ta kudu sun samu fiye da miliyan $10 ga proptech fund
sw: Kampuni ya mitaji ya ubia nchini Afrika Kusini inachangisha zaidi ya $10 milioni kwa ajiri ya mfuko wa proptech
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ akówólókòwò-gbàpín-òwò ilẹ̀ South Africa ti ṣe àgbàjọ owó tí ó ju mílíọ̀nù $10 fún owó ìrànwọ́ ìfìmẹ̀ẹ̀rọṣètòolé àti ilẹ̀
zu: Inkampani yaseNingizimu Afrika yezohwebo inyusa imali engaphezu kwezigidi eziyishumi zamaRandi ukuze kuxhaswe isikhwama se-proptech

am: ሪዳይሜንሽን ካፒታል የተባለው የደቡብ አፍሪካ የንግድ ካፒታል ኩባንያ ለምርቃት ገንዘቡ ከ10 ሚሊዮን ዶላር በላይ አሰባስቧል፤ የሪኢዴሽን ሪል እስቴት ቴክኖሎጂና ዘላቂነት ፈንድ።
en: South African venture capital firm, REdimension Capital, has raised over $10 million for its inaugural fund, the REdimension Real Estate Technology and Sustainability Fund I.
ha: Kamfanin venture capital na Afirka ta kudu, REdimentsion Capital, sun samu fiye da miliyan $10 na kuɗin inaugural, the REdimension Real Estate Technology and Sustainability Fund!.
sw: Kampuni ya mtaji wa ubia ya Afrika Kusini, REdimension Capital, imechangisha zaidi ya $10 milioni kwa ajili ya hazina yake ya uzinduzi, REdimension Real Estate Technology na Sustainability Fund I.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ akówólókòwò-gbàpín-òwò ilẹ̀ South Africa, REdimension Capital ti ṣe àgbàjọ owó tí ó ju mílíọ̀nù $10 lọ fún owó ìrànwọ́ àkọ́ṣàgbajọ rẹ̀, REdimension Real Estate Technology and Sustainability Fund I.
zu: Inkampani yaseNingizimu Afrika, i-REdimension Capital, iqoqe imali engaphezu kwezigidi eziyishumi zamaRandi esikhwameni sayo sokuqala, i-REdimension Real Estate Technology and Sustainability Fund I.

am: ይህም የራንድ ንግድ ባንክ፣ የኢንቨስትመንት ንብረት ፈንድ፣ እና ግሮውዝፖይት ፕሮፐርቲስ እንደ ውስን አጋሮች የሚቆጥረው የገንዘቡ የመጀመሪያ ማጠናቀቂያ ነው።
en: This is the first close of the fund, which counts Rand Merchant Bank, Investec Property Fund, and Growthpoint Properties as limited partners.
ha: Wannan shi ne samun kuɗi na farko, da ya hada da Rand Merchant Bank, Investec Property Fund, da kuma Growthpoint Propertiesa matsayin abokan hulɗa na musamman.
sw: Huu ni ufunguzi wa kwanza wa hazina hiyo, ambayo inajumuisha Rand Merchant Bank, Investec Propety Fund na Growthpoint Prperties kama washiriki wachache.
yo: Ìparí owó ìrànwọ́ gbígbà àkọ́kọ́ nìyìí, èyí tí ó ka Rand Merchant Bank, Investec Property Fund, àti Growthpoint Properties gẹ́gẹ́ bí i alábàáṣe onígbà.
zu: Lesi wukuvalwa kokuqala kwalesi sikhwama, esibala i-Rand Merchant Bank, i-Investec Property Fund, kanye ne-Growthpoint Properties njengabalingani abalinganiselwe.

am: ሌሎቹ ኢንቨስተሮች ደግሞ ሊበርቲ ሁለት ዲግሪ፣ ሊበርቲ ግሩፕ እና ስፌር ሆልዲንግስ ናቸው።
en: Other investors include Liberty Two Degrees, Liberty Group, and Sphere Holdings.
ha: Sauran masu hannun jarin sun hada da Liberty Two Degrees, Liberty Group, da Sphere Holdings.
sw: Wawekezaji wengine ni pamoja na Liberty two Degrees na Sphere Holdings.
yo: Àwọn olùkówólókòwò mìíràn ni Liberty Two Degrees, Liberty Group àti Sphere Holdings.
zu: Abanye abatshalizimali bahlanganisa i-Liberty Two Degrees, i-Liberty Group, ne-Sphere Holdings.

am: ድርጅቱ የገንዘቡ የመጨረሻ መደምደሚያ ጥር 2025 ላይ ለማጠናቀቅ ተስፋ አለው ።
en: The firm hopes to complete the final close of the fund by January 2025.
ha: Kamfanin nason su zo karshen rufe kuɗin zuwa Janairu 2025.
sw: Kampuni inatarajia kukamilisha kufunga mwaka kwa hazina ifikapo Januari 2025.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ní ìrètí láti parí gbígba owó ìrànwọ́ náà ní oṣù Kínní ọdún 2025.
zu: Le nkampani inethemba lokuthi izoqeda ukuvalwa kokugcina kwesikhwama ngoMasingana wezi- 2025.

am: በ2021 በፒተር ክላርክ እና በማት ማርሻል የተመሰረተው፣ የ ሪኢካውንሽን ሪል እስቴት ቴክኖሎጂ እና ዘላቂነት ፈንድ የማይንቀሳቀስ ንብረት ዘርፍን ዲጂቲዝ ለማድረግ መፍትሄዎችን በመገንባት ላይ ባሉ ጀማሪዎች ላይ ኢንቨስት አደርጋለሁ።
en: Founded in 2021 by Peter Clark and Matt Marshall, the REdimension Real Estate Technology and Sustainability Fund I will invest in startups that are building solutions to digitise the real estate sector.
ha: REdimension Real Estate Technology and Sustainability wanda Peter Clark da Matt Marshall suka samar a 2021, zasu sanya hannun jari a startup da suke samar da mafita domin zamanantar da ɓangaren gine ginen gidaje.
sw: ilianzishwa mnamo 2021 na Peter Clark na Matt Marshall, Mfuko wa Teknolojia ya Majengo na Uendelevu Redimension.
yo: Peter Clark àti Matt Marshall dá a sílẹ̀ ní ọdún 2021, REdimension Real Estate Technology and Sustainability Fund I yóò kówó lé àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ tí wọ́n ń ṣẹ̀dá àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ láti sọ ẹ̀ka aṣàkóso ilé àti ilẹ̀ di alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ.
zu: Isungulwe ngo-2021 ngu-Peter Clark no-Matt Marshall, i-REdimension Real Estate Technology and Sustainability Fund ngizotshala kumabhizinisi asaqala akha izixazululo zokwenza umkhakha wezindawo ezithengiswayo ube yidijithali.

am: በተጨማሪም ድርጅቱ ዘላቂነት እንዲኖር በማድረግ የኃይል ፍጆታን የሚያጠናክሩና የካርቦን ዱካ እንዲቀንስ የሚያደርጉ ሥራዎችን ለመደገፍ እቅድ አወጣ።
en: With an eye on promoting sustainability, the firm also plans to back startups that promote energy efficiency, and lower carbon footprint.
ha: Da duna game da bunkasa cimma buri, kamfanin kuma ya shirya goyon bayan startup da suke inganta ƙarfin kuzari, da kuma lower carbon footprint.
sw: kwa kuzingatia katika kukuza uendelevu, kampuni pia inapanga kurudisha nyuma uanzishaji ambao unakuza ufanisi wa nishati na kiwango cha chini cha kaboni.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ìṣàkun láti ṣe ìgbélárugẹ ìlàlòpẹ́, ilé-iṣẹ́ náà tún ń gbèrò láti ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ tí wọ́n ń ṣe ìgbélárugẹ ìṣàmúlò agbára, àti ìdínpakábọ́ọ̀nùkù.
zu: Ngeso lokuthuthukisa ukusimama, inkampani iphinde ihlele ukubuyisela emuva amabhizinisi asaqala akhuthaza ukusebenza kahle kwamandla, kanye nezinyathelo zekhabhoni ephansi.

am: የአፍሪካ የፕሮፕቴክ ዘርፍ እያደገ ነው፣ ነገር ግን ባለፉት ሦስት ዓመታት ውስጥ ቀስ በቀስ እድገት ተመልክቷል።
en: Africa's proptech sector is nascent, but has slowly witnessed growth in the last three years.
ha: Africa proptech na son cigaba, amma ya fuskanci cigaban ahankali a shekaru uku.
sw: Sekta ya teknolojia barani Afrika ni changa, lakiniilikuwa inakuwa polepole katika miaka mitatu iliyopita.
yo: Ẹ̀ka ìfìmẹ̀ẹ̀rọṣètòolé àti ilẹ̀ ní ilẹ̀ Africa ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ ń jáde ni, ṣùgbọ́n ìdàgbàsókè díẹ̀díẹ̀ ti ńndé bá a láti ọdún mẹ́ta sẹ́yìn.
zu: Umkhakha we-proptech wase-Afrika uyakhula, kodwa ubone ukukhula kancane eminyakeni emithathu edlule.

am: በ2022፣ 15 ፕሮፕቴክ ጅምሮች 16.6 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ቢያስገኙም ከ50% በላይ የሆነው ኢንቨስትመንት ግን ወደ ቅድመ ዘር ጅማሮዎች ሄደ።
en: In 2022, 15 proptech startups raised $16.6 million, but more than 50% of the investment went to pre-seed startups.
ha: A 2022, proptech startup 15 sun samar da miliyan $16.6, amma fiye da kaso 50% na hannun jarin sun tafi ne ga pre-seed startup.
sw: Mnamo 2022, waanzilishi 15 wa prptech walikusanya $16.6 milioni, lakini zaidi ya 50% ya uwekezaji ulienda kwa uanzishaji wa mbegu.
yo: Ní ọdún 2022, àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ afìmẹ̀ẹ̀rọṣètòolé àti ilẹ̀ 15 ṣe àgbàjọ mílíọ̀nù $16.6, ṣùgbọ́n ìdá tí ó ju 50% lọ nínú owó ìdókòwò náà ni ó lọ sí ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ aṣàkọ́gba owó ìrànwọ́ ìbẹ̀rẹ̀.
zu: Ngo-2022, iziqalo eziyi-15 ze-proptech zakhuphula u-$16.6 wezigidi, kodwa ngaphezu kuka-50% wemali etshalwe kumamabhizinini asaqala.

am: በተጨማሪም የተገኘው ጠቅላላ ገንዘብ ከቀድሞው ዓመት 13 % የሚበልጥ ሲሆን ይህም የኢንቨስትመንት ወለድ እየጨመረ መሄዱን ያመለክታል ።
en: The total amount raised was also 13% higher than the previous year, signifying growing investor interest.
ha: Gaba dayn kuɗin da aka samar ya zama 13% fiye da shekarar da ta gabata, wanda yake nun Karin cigaban ra’ayin masu sanya hannun jari.
sw: Jumla ya kiasi kilichopatikana, kilikuwa juu kwa 13% kuliko mwaka uliyopita, kuashiria kuongezeka kwa riba ya wawekezaji.
yo: Àpapọ̀ owó tí wọ́n gbà jọ tún fi ìdá 13% ju ti ọdún tí ó kọjá lọ, èyí tí ó ń ṣàfihàn ìnífẹ̀ẹ́sí àwọn olùkówólókòwò.
zu: Isamba semali esiqoqiwe siphinde saphakama ngo-13% kunonyaka odlule, okubonisa ukukhula kwenzalo yabatshalizimali.

am: ለታወቁት አብዛኞቹ የፕሮፕቴክ ሽያጭዎችም ግብፅና ናይጄሪያ ተጠያቂዎች ነበሩ ።
en: Egypt and Nigeria were also responsible for most of the disclosed proptech deals.
ha: Egypt da Nijeriya suna da hannu a yawancin yarjejeniyar proptech da aka bayyana.
sw: Misiri na Nigeria pia ziliwajibika kwa mikataba mingi ya proptech iliyofichuliwa.
yo: Egypt àti Nigeria náà tún ní ìpín tí ó pọ̀ nínú àwọn àdéhùn ìṣòwò àwọn afìmẹ̀ẹ̀rọṣètòolé àti ilẹ̀ tí wọ́n fi léde.
zu: I-Egypt kanye neNigeria nabo babenesibopho sezivumelwano eziningi ezidaluliwe ze-proptech.

am: ግሬይ፣ የናይጄሪያ የፊንቴክ ጅምር አስተናጋጆች ክሊክ፣ ከኢንዱስትሪ መሪዎች ጠቃሚ ማስተዋል ጋር መነሻ መሥራቾች ኃይል ለመስጠት ልዩ እራት
en: Grey, A Nigerian Fintech Startup, Hosts Clique, An Exclusive Dinner to Empower Startup Founders with Valuable Insights from Industry Leaders
ha: Kamfani mai Farowa na Grey, Fintech na Nijeriya, sun Gudanar da Walimar dare ta musamman domin Tallafawa masu samar da kamfani mai tasowa da mahimman nazari daga shugabannin sasana’antu
sw: Grey, Mwanzili wa Fintech wa Nigeria, Hosts Clique, Chakula cha jioni cha Kipekee cha ambacho kuwawezesha Waanzilishi na kupata maarifa ya Thamani kutoka kwa viongozi wa sekta.
yo: Grey, ilé-iṣẹ́ Àdìdeelẹ̀ Afìmẹ̀ẹ̀rọṣètòòṣúná ilẹ̀ Nigeria, Gbàlejò Clique, Ayẹyẹ ìwẹ̀jẹwẹ̀mu Oníyàsọ́tọ̀ láti ṣe Ìrónilágbára àwọn Olùdásílẹ̀ ilé-iṣẹ́ Àdìdeelẹ̀ pẹ̀lú Òye Iyebíye láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn Adarí Ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́
zu: Grey, I-Fintech ibhizinisi elisaqala laseNigeria, iHosts Clique, Isidlo Sakusihlwa Esikhethekile Sokunika Abasunguli Bamabhizinisi asaqala Amandla Ngemininingwane Ebalulekile evela kubaholi Bemboni

am: ግሬይ፣ የተባለ ታዋቂ የፊንቴክ ኩባንያ በቅርቡ በናይጄሪያ ሌጎስ በሚገኘው ታዋቂ የምግብ ምግብ ቤት ኢሌ ኤሮስ የተባለ ለብቻው የእራት ዝግጅት በማድረግ ከተለያዩ ዘርፎች የተውጣጡ 16 ቀጣይ የጅምላ መሥራቾች አሰባስበዋል።
en: Grey, a leading fintech company, recently hosted Clique, an exclusive dinner event at the renowned gastronomic restaurant, Ile-Eros, in Lagos, Nigeria, bringing together 16 dynamic startup founders from diverse sectors.
ha: Grey, kamfanin fintech na gaba, a kwannan sun gudanar da bikin walimar dare a wajen cin abinci fitacce na gastronomic, lle-Eros, a Legas, Nijeriya, wanda ya haɗo kan masu samar da kamfanoni masu tasowa 16 daga ɓangarori mabanbanta.
sw: Grey, kampuni inayoongoza ya fintech, hivi karibuni karibuni iliandaa Clique, hafla ya kipekee ya chakula cha jioni kwenye mgahawa maarufu wa chakula cha jioni, Ile-Eros, huko Lagos, Nigeria, inayowaleta pamoja waanzilishi 16 wa sekta mbalimbali.
yo: Grey, adarí ilé-iṣẹ́ afìmẹ̀ẹ̀rọṣètòòṣúná kan, ni ó ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ gba àlejò Clique, ayẹyẹ ìwẹ̀jẹwẹ̀mu oníyàsọ́tọ̀ ní ilé-ìtaúnjẹ aládìídùn, Ile-Eros, ní Lagos, Nigeria, tí ó ń kó àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ alágbára 16 láti onírúurú ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́.
zu: IGrey, inkampani ehamba phambili ye-fintech, isanda kusingatha u-Clique, umcimbi wesidlo sakusihlwa okhethekile endaweni yokudlela edumile, i-Ile-Eros, eLagos, eNigeria, ehlanganisa abasunguli bokuqalisa abanamandla abayi-16 abavela emikhakheni eyahlukene.

am: የዚህ የቅርበት ስብሰባ አላማ ድረ-ገፅን ማሳደግ፣ ጠቃሚ ማስተዋልን ማጋራት፣ እና ለቀጣይ ትውልድ የጀማሪ መስራቾች ስኬታማ ጅምር ለመገንባት አስፈላጊ የሆኑ ዕውቀቶችን ማጎልበት ነበር።
en: The purpose of this intimate gathering was to foster networking, share valuable insights, and empower the next generation of startup founders with knowledge essential for building successful startups.
ha: Dalilin wannan haɗuwar shi ne haɗa hanyoyi, da bayyana tunani, da kuma tallafawa masu samar da kamfani mai farowa da za su zo nan gaba da ilimin da ya dace don gina kamfani mai farowa mai cike da nasara.
sw: Madhumuni wa mkutano huu wa karibu ilikuwa kukuza mtandao, kushiriki maarifa muhimu, na kuwezesha kizazi kijacho cha waanzilishi kwa kuanzisha maarifa muhimu kwa ajiri ya kujenga miradi yenye mafanikio.
yo: Kókó ìpàdé oníbàárẹ́ yìí ni láti ṣe ìyànjú ìmọ̀nìyàn, kí wọ́n fi òye iyebíye jomitoro, kí wọ́n sì ṣe ìrónilágbára fún àwọn ìran olùdásílẹ̀ ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ tí ó ń bọ̀ pẹ̀lú ìmọ̀ tí ó ṣe pàtàkì fún ṣíṣe àgbédìde ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ tí ó ní àṣeyọrí.
zu: Inhloso yalo mbuthano osondelene kwakuwukugqugquzela ukuxhumana, ukwabelana ngemininingwane ebalulekile, kanye nokunika amandla isizukulwane esilandelayo sabasunguli bokuqalisa ngolwazi olubalulekile ekwakheni iziqalo eziphumelelayo.

am: በኢሌ-ኤሮስ የነበረው የኤፊቆሪያን ተሞክሮ ለየት ያለ ነበር፤ እንግዶች በጥንቃቄ በተለጠፉ ኮክቴሎችና ጥሩ የወይን ጠጅዎች ተጨዋወቱ።
en: The Epicurean experience at Ile-Eros was nothing short of exceptional, as guests were treated to an exquisite 4-course culinary delight, complemented by carefully crafted cocktails and fine wines.
ha: Ƙayataccen daɗin da aka samu a lle-Eros na musamman ne, domin an ba wa baki abinci kashi huɗu mai daɗi, wanda aka haɗa shi da abubuwan sha na musamman da kuma giya.
sw: Epicurean Experience huko Ile-Eros haikuwa ya kipekee, kwani wageni walisitarehereheshwa kwa utamu wa pishi la kozi 4, ukisaidiwa na visa vilivyotengenezwa kwa uangalifu na divai nzuri.
yo: Ìrírí alájẹyíràá ní Ile-Eros kọjá àfẹnuròyìn, torí àwọn àlejò jẹ ìgbádùn oúnjẹ àjẹpọ́nnulá ẹ̀ẹ̀mẹrin, tí wọ́n sì fi àwọn ọtí ẹlẹ́rìndòdò àti àwọn aláìpara tí wọ́n fi pẹ̀lẹ́ ṣe.
zu: Okuhlangenwe nakho kwama-Epikhuru e-Ile-Eros kwakungeyona into encane njengokungavamile, njengoba izihambeli zanikezwa ukudla oku-4, okuhambisana nama-cocktail aklanywe ngokucophelela namawayini amahle.

am: ከዚህም በተጨማሪ አንድ ጥሩ ችሎታ ያለው ቫዮሊን ተጫዋች በእንግዶቹ ላይ የሚዘፈኑ ዘፈኖችን በመዝናናት አስደሳችና የማይረሳ ምሽት እንዲዘጋጅ አድርጓል።
en: Adding to the ambience, a talented violinist played renditions of hit songs to the amusement of the guests, setting the stage for an engaging and memorable evening.
ha: Don ƙayata wajen, ƙwararren makiɗi ya yi waƙoƙi masu daɗi domin nishaɗantar da baƙin, wanda ya sanya wajen ya zamanto cikin harka da yammaci da za a tuna.
sw: Kuongezea mazingira, mpiga Violini mwenye kipawa alicheza matoleo ya nyimbo zilizovuma kwa burudani ya wageni, akiweka jukwaa la jioni ya kuvutia na ya kukumbukwa.
yo: Kí agbègbè náà lè bá ayẹyẹ mu, olórin fayolíìnì tí ó lẹ́bùn kan ń fi irinṣẹ́ rẹ̀ kọ àwọn orin tí wọ́n gbajúgbajà fún ìgbádùn àwọn àlejò, tí ó sì ṣe ààtò ìtàgé náà fún ìrírí mánigbàgbé aládùn ní ìrọ̀lẹ́ ọjọ́ náà.
zu: Ukwengeza kwimpatho, umdlali wevayolini onethalente wadlala izingoma ezishisa izikhotha ukuze kujabule izihambeli, okwenxa kwaba ubusuku obungeke babukhohlwa.

am: የዝግጅቱ ጉልህ ገጽታ የግሬ፣ የኢዴ ኦቦንግ እና የፌሚ አጌዶ ተባባሪ መሥራቾች መገኘታቸው ነው። በአፍሪካ የጀማሪነት ዓለም ውስጥ የሚነቃቃ የስኬት ታሪክ ነው።
en: The highlight of the event was the presence of the co-founders of Grey, Idee Obong and Femi Aghedo, an inspiring success story in the African startup world.
ha: Madubin taron shi ne kasancewar masu samar da Grey, Idee Obong da Femi Aghedo, labarin nasara mai daɗi a duniyar kamfanoni masu farowa na Afirka.
sw: Kivutio cha hafla hiyo kilikuwa uwepo wa waanzilishi-wenza wa Gray, Idee Obono na Femi Aghedo, hadithi ya mafanikio katika ulimwengu wa manzo wa Afrika.
yo: Àmúyẹ pàtàkì ayẹyẹ náà ni bí àwọn alájọdásílẹ̀ Grey, Idee Obong àti Femi Aghedo ṣe wà níbẹ̀. Wọ́n dà gẹ́gẹ́ bí i ìtàn àṣeyọrí afúnniníkóríyá ní àyè òkòwò àdìdeelẹ̀ ní ilẹ̀ Africa.
zu: Okugqame kakhulu kulo mcimbi wukuba khona kwabasunguli beGrey, u-Idee Obong no-Femi Aghedo, indaba ekhuthazayo yempumelelo emhlabeni wokuqala wase-Afrika.

am: ተባባሪ መሥራቾች አስደናቂ በሆነው ጉዟቸው ተሰብሳቢዎቹን ማረኩ፤ ይህም እያንዳንዱ መሥራች ሥራውን ስለመገንባት ማወቅ ያለበትን ጠቃሚ ማስተዋልና ትምህርት ሰጣቸው።
en: The Co-Founders captivated the audience with their remarkable journey, providing invaluable insights and lessons that every founder needs to know about building a startup.
ha: Masu samarwar sun ɗauki hankalin masu saurare da tafiyar su mai ma’ana, yadda suka bayar da tunani mai amfani da kuma darussa da kowanne mai samarwa yake da buƙatar sani game da gina kamfani mai farowa.
sw: Waanzilishi-wenza walivutia hadhira kwa kusimulia hadithi za maisha yao na maarifa na mafunzo muhimu ambayo kila mwanzilishi anahitaji kujua kuhusu kuanzisha mradi.
yo: Àwọn alájọdásílẹ̀ náà fi ìtàn àjò wọn fa àwọn èèyàn mọ́ra, wọ́n pèsè àwọn òye oníyebíye àti àwọn ẹ̀kọ́ tí wọ́n ṣe pàtàkì fún gbogbo olùdásílẹ̀ ní láti mọ̀ nípa dídá òkòwò àdìdeelẹ̀ sílẹ̀.
zu: Abasunguli Abahlanganyeli bahehe izethameli ngohambo lwabo olumangalisayo, banikeza imininingwane ebalulekile nezifundo wonke umsunguli okudingeka akwazi mayelana nokwakha ibhizinisi elisaqala.

am: ኢዲ፣ ገንዘብን በተሳካ ሁኔታ ለማሰባሰብ የጠቀማቸውን ቁልፍ ስልቶች አካፍሏቸዋል፣ ግሬይ በዓለም ላይ ታዋቂ ከሆኑት የጀማሪዎች ፈጣን ማሽከርከሪያዎች አንዱ የሆነው ኮምቢኔተር አካል ለመሆን ጉዞ ላይ ብርሃን ፈንጥቋል።
en: Idee, shared the key strategies they employed to raise funds successfully, shedding light on Grey's journey to becoming a part of Y Combinator, one of the world's most prestigious startup accelerators.
ha: Idee, ya bayyana manyan dabarun da suka yi amfani da ita wajen samar da kuɗi cikin nasara, tare da nuni a kan tafiyar Grey wajen zama ɓangare na Y Combinator, ɗaya daga cikin manyan masu habbaka kamfanoni masu tasowa a duniya.
sw: Idee, alishiriki mikakati muhimu waliyotumia ili kupata pesa kwa mafanikio, akitoa mwanga kuhusu safari ya Grey ya kuwa sehemu ya Y Combinator, mojawapo ya viongeza kasi vya uanzishaji vilivyo maarufu zaidi duniani.
yo: Idee sọ nípa àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ pàtàkì tí wọ́n gbé láti ṣe àṣeyọrí àgbàjọ owó ìrànwọ́, ó tan ìmọ́lẹ̀ sí ìrìn-àjò Grey tí ó fi di ara Y Combinator, ọ̀kan lára àwọn aṣètòòdàgbàsókè àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ tí ó gbayì púpọ̀ ní àgbáyé.
zu: U-Idee, wabelane ngamasu abalulekile abawasebenzisile ukuze bathole izimali ngempumelelo, ekhanyisela uhambo lukaGrey lokuba yingxenye ye-Y Combinator, enye yamabhizinisi asaqala akhule ngokushesha edume kakhulu emhlabeni.

am: በተጨማሪም፣ ፌሚ የሥራ ቅልጥፍናና ወጪ ቆጣቢ እርምጃዎች በተለይም ለጀማሪዎች ምን ያህል አስፈላጊ እንደሆነ አጽንኦት ሰጥተዋል።
en: In Addition, Femi emphasized the significance of operational efficiency and cost-saving measures, especially for startups.
ha: Ƙari a kan haka, Femi ya bayyana mahimmancin gudanarwa mai kyau da kuma matakan rage kasha kuɗi, musamman ga kamfanoni masu tasowa.
sw: Kwa kuongezea, Femi alisisitiza umuhimu na ufanisi wa uendeshaji na hatua za kuokoa gharama hasa kwa wanaoanza.
yo: Ní àfikún, Femi tún ṣe àtẹnumọ́ pàtàkì agbára iṣẹ́ ṣíṣe àti àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ ìgèwónàá, pàápàá júlọ fún àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀.
zu: Ukwengeza, u-Femi ugcizelele ukubaluleka kokusebenza kahle kanye nezinyathelo zokonga izindleko, ikakhulukazi kumabhizinisi asaqala.

am: ወደ እድገት እና ዘላቂ ስኬት ለመጀመር ስትራቴጂያዊ ትብብር ያለውን ኃይል በከፍተኛ ስሜት ጎላ አድርገው ጎላ አድርገው ገለፁ።
en: He passionately highlighted the power of strategic partnerships in propelling a startup towards growth and sustainable success.
ha: Cikin ƙwarewa ya nuna ƙarfin hulɗar dabaru wajen tafiyar da kamfani mai tasowa ga cigaba da samun nasara.
sw: Alisisitiza kwa shauku nguvu ya ya ushirikiano wa kimkakati katika kuendeleza mradi kuelekea ukuaji na mafanikio endelevu.
yo: Ó tun mẹ́nu ba agbára àwọn ìbáṣepọ̀ ọlọ́gbọ́n ìjìnlẹ̀, èyí tí ó máa ń ti ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ láti dàgbà sókè àti láti ṣe àṣeyọrí onígbà pípẹ́.
zu: Wagqamisa ngentshiseko amandla obambiswano lwamasu ekuqhubekiseleni phambili isiqalo esibheke ekukhuleni nasekuphumeleleni okusimeme.

am: በፔስታክ የጀማሪነት አጋር የሆነው ዳፖ አዎቦኩን የምሽቱን አስደሳች ጊዜ በልዩ እንግዳነት አከናወነ።
en: Adding to the allure of the evening, Dapo Awobokun, the startup partner at Paystack, graced the occasion as a special guest.
ha: Domin ƙara wa yammacin armashi, Dapo Awobokun, abokin hulɗar kamfani mai farowa na Paystack, ya halarci bikin a matsayin babban baƙo.
sw: Kuongeza mvuto wa jioni hiyo, Dapo Awobokun, mshirika wa kuanzisha Paystack, alipamba hafla hiyo kama mgeni maalum.
yo: Dapo Awobokun, alábàáṣe àdìdeelẹ̀ ní Paystack, tí ó jẹ́ àlejò pàtàkì náà tún dá ayẹyẹ náà lọ́lá tí ó sì tún mú ayẹyẹ náà dùn sí i.
zu: Ukwengeza ekuhehekeni kwakusihlwa, u-Dapo Awobokun, uzakwethu wokuqala e-Paystack, uphathe umcimbi njengesivakashi esikhethekile.

am: ዳፖ በፊንቴክ ኢንዱስትሪ ውስጥ ያለው ሰፊ ልምድና ችሎታ መሥራቾቹ ስለእየተሻሻሉት መልክዓ ምድራዊ አቀማመጥ ና ለጀማሪዎች ስለሚገኙት አጋጣሚዎች ጠቃሚ ማስተዋል እንዲያገኙ አድርጓል።
en: Dapo's vast experience and expertise in the fintech industry provided the founders with invaluable insights into the evolving landscape and emerging opportunities for startups.
ha: Yawan ilimin Dapo da ƙwarewarsa a masana’antar fintech sun samarwa da masu farawar da tunani mai amfani zuwa ga mahallin da yake tasowa da kuma damarmakin da suke zuwa ga kamfanoni masu farowa.
sw: Uzoefu na utaalamu mkubwa wa Dapo katika tasnia ya teknolojia ya uchumi uliwapa waanzilishi maarifa muhimu katika mazingira yanayoendelea na fursa zinazoibuka za kuanza.
yo: Ìrírí aláìníwọ́n àti ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe tí Dapo ní ní ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ ìfìmẹ̀ẹ̀rọṣètòòṣúná tún fún àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ ní òye oníyebíye tí wọ́n lè gbà láti tọ ọ̀nà ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ náà kí wọ́n sì ṣe àwárí àwọn àǹfààní fún òkòwò àdìdeelẹ̀.
zu: Ulwazi oluningi luka-Dapo nobungcweti embonini ye-fintech bunikeze abasunguli imininingwane ebalulekile ngendawo eguqukayo kanye namathuba avelayo okuqalisa.

am: ከዚህም በላይ፣ ዳፖ ለመሥራቾቹ ንግግር በማቅረብ ባሕል መጀመሪያ ላይ ትልቅ ቦታ ሊሰጠው እንደሚገባ ጎላ አድርጎ ገልጿል ።
en: Furthermore, Dapo addressed the founders, emphasizing the paramount significance of Culture within a startup.
ha: Haka kuma, Dapo ya yi wa masu samarwar bayani, yana ƙara bayyana mahimmancin al’ada a cikin kamfani mai farowa.
sw: Zaidi ya hayo, Dapo alihutubia waanzilishi, akisisitiza umuhimu mkubwa wa utamaduni ndani ya mradi.
yo: Síwájú sí i, Dapo bá àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ sọ̀rọ̀, ó sì ṣe ìtẹnumọ́ pàtàkì Àṣà ìṣe nínú ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀.
zu: Ngaphezu kwalokho, uDapo wakhuluma nabasunguli, egcizelela ukubaluleka okukhulu kweSiko kwibhizinisi elisaqala.

am: ባህል አንተ ነህ።
en: "Culture is You.
ha: “Al’ada ita ce Kai.
sw: "Utamaduni ni wewe".
yo: "Ìwọ gan ni Àṣà ìṣe.
zu: "Isiko nguwe.

am: በመቀበያው ላይ ከተለጠፉት ደንቦችና መመሪያዎች በላይ ነው ።
en: It transcends mere rules and regulations posted at your reception.
ha: Tana nuni da dokoki da ƙa’idojin da aka ɗaura a kanka.
sw: inavuka sheria na kanuni zilizochapishwa kwenye mapokezi yako.
yo: Ó kọjá àwọn òfin àti ìlànà iṣẹ́ tí ó wà lẹ́nu ọ̀nà yára ìgbàlejò lásán lọ.
zu: Yeqa imithetho nemithethonqubo nje ethunyelwe endaweni yakho yokwamukela izivakashi.

am: መሥራቾች፣እንደመሆንዎ የድርጅታችሁን ባህል ማስፋት እና ተልእኮውን በሙሉ ልብ መቀበል አለባችሁ" ብለዋል።
en: As founders, you must embody your company's culture and wholeheartedly embrace its mission" he said.
ha: A matsayin masu samarwa, dole ne ka riƙe al’adar kamfaninka da da kuma riƙe ƙuɗirinsa da dukkan zuciyarka ya faɗa.
sw: Kama waanzilishi, lazima muigize tamaduni za kampuni yenu na kukumbatia malengo yake kwa moyo wote.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí i olùdásílẹ̀, o gbọdọ̀ fi gbogbo ara gba àwọn àṣà ìṣe ilé-iṣẹ́ rẹ kí o sì fi tọkàntọkàn gba ìlépa rẹ̀" ó dáhùn.
zu: Njengabasunguli, kufanele nihlanganise isiko lenkampani yenu futhi niwamukele ngenhliziyo yonke umsebenzi wayo,” kusho yena.

am: የእራት ጉባዔ የጀማሪ መሥራቾች ከተለያዩ ዘርፎች ከሚሰሩ መሰል አስተሳሰብ ያላቸው እኩዮች ጋር ለመገናኘት፣ የኢንደስትሪ ትብብርን እና አዳዲስ ሃሳቦችን ለመለዋወጥ ልዩ መድረክ ሆኖ አገልግሏል።
en: The dinner gathering served as a unique platform for startup founders to connect with like-minded peers from different sectors, fostering cross-industry collaborations and the exchange of innovative ideas.
ha: Taron cin abincin daren ya zamanto wani dandali ne na musamman ga masu samar da kamfani mai farowa da su haɗu da masu irin tunaninsu daga ɓangarori daban-daban, tare da samar da haɗin guiwa tsakanin masana’antu da kuma musayar tunanin ƙirƙira.
sw: Mkusanyiko wa chakula cha jioni ulitumika kama jukwaa la kipekee kwa waanzilishi wa kuanzisha kuungana na wenzao wenye nia moja kutoka sekta tofauti, kukuza ushirikiano wa sekta mbalimbali na kubadilishana mawazo ya ubunifu.
yo: Ayẹyẹ wẹ̀jẹwẹ̀mu náà jẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bí i ìkànnì alárà-ọ̀tọ̀ fún àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ láti ní àsopọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn èèyàn tí ìròrí wọn jọra láti oríṣiríṣi ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́, èyí tí yóò ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn ìbáṣepọ̀ ẹlẹ́kajẹ̀ka àti ìpààrọ̀ èrò àtinúdá.
zu: Umbuthano wesidlo sakusihlwa usebenze njengenkundla eyingqayizivele yabasunguli bamabhizinisi asaqala ukuxhumana nontanga abanomqondo ofanayo abavela emikhakheni eyahlukene, ukukhuthaza ukusebenzisana kwezimboni ezihlukahlukene kanye nokushintshisana ngemibono emisha.

am: ከባቢ አየር በመንፈስ አነሳሽነት እና በድርጅታዊ ስራ አማካኝነት ብሩህ የወደፊት ሕይወት ለመቅረጽ በጋራ ቃል ኪዳን ተሞልቶ ነበር።
en: The atmosphere was filled with inspiration and a shared commitment to shaping a brighter future through entrepreneurship.
ha: Wajen cike yake da ƙarfin guiwa da kuma bayyana saɗaukarwa wajen tsara makoma mai kyau ta hanyar yin sana’ar hannu.
sw: Mazingira yalijaa msukumo na dhamira ya pamoja ya kuunda mstakabali mzuri kupitia ujasiriamali.
yo: Agbègbè náà kún fún móríyá àti ìfarajìn tí wọ́n jọ ní láti ṣe ààtò ọjọ́ ọ̀la tí ó dára sí i nípa ṣíṣẹ̀dá àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ aláṣeyọrí.
zu: Umkhathi wawugcwele ugqozi kanye nokuzibophezela okwabiwe ekubumbeni ikusasa eliqhakazile ngosomabhizinisi.

am: የግሬይ ተባባሪ መሥራች የሆኑት ኢዴ ኦቦንግ "ግሬይ የጀማሪዎችን አቅም ሙሉ በሙሉ ለመጠቀም የሚያስችል ኃይል በመስጠት ጠንካራ እምነት አላቸው" ብለዋል።
en: "Grey firmly believes in empowering startups to reach their full potential," said Idee Obong, Co-founder of Grey.
ha: “Grey sun yarda ƙwarai da tallafawa kamfanoni masu farowa su cim ma burinsu,” Idee Obong ya faɗa, wanda ya samar da Grey.
sw: "Grey, anaamini kabisa kuwawezesha wanaoanza kufikia uwezo wao kamili" alisema Idee Obong, mwanzilishi mwenza wa Grey.
yo: "Grey ní ìgbàgbọ́ tí ó rinlẹ̀ nínú ṣíṣe ìrónilágbára fún àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ kí wọ́n lè dé èbúté ògo wọn," Idee Obong, Alájọdásílẹ̀ Grey fèsì.
zu: "UGrey ukholelwa ngokuqinile ekunikezeni amandla abaqalayo ukuze bafinyelele kumamakhono abo aphelele," kusho u-Idee Obong, umsunguli we-Grey.

am: ይህ የእራት ዝግጅት የተሳካ ጅምር በመገንባት ረገድ እውቀቶችንና ተሞክሮዎችን ለማካፈል የሚያስችል ግሩም አጋጣሚ ሰጥቶናል።
en: "This exclusive dinner event provided a perfect opportunity for us to share knowledge and experiences on building a successful startup.
ha: “Wannan walimar daren ta musamman ta samar da cikakkiyar dama a gare mu wajen bayyana ilimi da ƙwarewa wajen gina kamfani mai tasowa mai cike da nasara.
sw: Tukio hili la kipekee la chakula cha jioni lililotoa fursa nzuri kwetu kubadilishana maarifa na uzoefu juu ya kuanzisha mradi.
yo: "Ayẹyẹ wẹ̀jẹwẹ̀mu oníyàsọ́tọ̀ yìí fún wa ní àǹfààní tí ó dára jùlọ láti jọ fi ìmọ̀ àti àwọn ìrírí jomitoro kí á lè ṣẹ̀dá òkòwò àdìdeelẹ̀ aláṣeyọrí.
zu: “Lo mcimbi wesidlo sakusihlwa okhethekile usinikeze ithuba elihle lokwabelana ngolwazi nolwazi lokwakha isiqalo esiyimpumelelo.

am: የንግድ ልውውጡን ሥነ ምህዳሩን ለማሳደግ እና ምኞት ያላቸው መሥራቾች የለውጥ ጉዞአቸውን በሚጀምሩበት ጊዜ ድጋፍ ለማድረግ ቆርጠናል።"
en: We are committed to nurturing the entrepreneurial ecosystem and supporting aspiring founders as they embark on their transformative journeys."
ha: Mun yi saɗaukarwa wajen kula da tsarin mahallin sana’ar hannu da kuma tallafawa masu samarwa yayin da suke fara tafiyarsu ta kawo sauyi.”
sw: Tumejitolea kukuza mfumo wa ikolojia wa ujasiriamali na kusaidia waanzilishi wanaotaka kuanza safari zao za kuleta mabadiliko
yo: A ní ìfarajìn láti mú àwùjọ ìṣòwò dàgbà kí á sì ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún àwọn tí wọ́n ń lépa ìdásílẹ̀ bí wọ́n yóò ṣe ń bẹ̀rẹ̀ ìrìn-àjò aláyìídà wọn."
zu: Sizibophezele ekuthuthukiseni uhlelonhlaliswano lokuphilayo nokungaphili kwezamabhizinisi kanye nokweseka abasafufusa abasunguli njengoba beqala uhambo lwabo oluletha uguquko."

am: ድርጊቱ በጀመረው ማኅበረሰብ ላይ የማይፋቅ ተጽዕኖ በማሳደር፣ ምኞት ያላቸው መሥራቾች እና የኢንዱስትሪ መሪዎች አንድነት እንዲኖራቸው በማድረግ የላቀ ችሎታ እና አዳዲስ ነገሮችን በማሳደድ ላይ ነበር።
en: The event left an indelible impression on the startup community, uniting aspiring founders and industry leaders in a shared pursuit of excellence and innovation.
ha: Bikin ya bar yanayi mai daɗi ga al’ummar kamfanoni masu tasowa, da haɗa masu samarwa da kuma shugabannin masana’antu wajen bayyana nasara da ƙirƙira.
sw: Tukio hili liliacha hisia isiyoweza kufutika kwa jumuiya ya waanzilishaji, liliwaunganisha waanzilishi na viongozi wa tasnia ya teknolojia katika harakati za pamoja za ubora na uvumbuzi.
yo: Ayẹyẹ náà ní ipa mánigbàgbé ní àwùjọ ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀, ó so àwọn tí wọ́n ń lépa ìdásílẹ̀ àti àwọn adarí ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ papọ̀ pẹ̀lú bí wọ́n ṣe jọ ń lépa àṣeyọrí tí ó tayọ àti ọ̀nà àtinúdá.
zu: Umcimbi ushiye umbono ongenakucimeka emphakathini yamabhizinisi asaqala, uhlanganisa abasunguli abasafufusa nabaholi bezimboni ekuphishekeleni okwabiwe kokwenza kahle nokusungula izinto ezintsha.

am: ስለ ግሬይ
en: About Grey
ha: Game da Grey
sw: Kuhusu Grey
yo: Nípa Grey
zu: Mayelana noGrey

am: ግሬይ ለነፃ ሠራተኞች፣ ለሩቅ ሠራተኞች እና ለንግድ ድርጅቶች የውጭ አገር ክፍያዎችን በመላክና በመቀበል ላይ ነው።
en: Grey is simplifying sending and receiving foreign payments for freelancers, remote workers and businesses.
ha: Grey shi ne sauƙaƙa karɓa da tura biyan kuɗin waje ga masu zaman kansu, ma’aikatan kusa da kuma kasuwanci.
sw: Grey inarahisisha kutuma na kupokea malipo ya kigeni kwa wafanyakazi huru, wafanyakazi wa mbali na biashara.
yo: Grey ń mú owó sísan àtí owó gbígbà láti òkèèrè fún àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ aláìládèéhùn ìgbàsíṣẹ́, àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ aṣiṣẹ́látilé àti àwọn òkòwò rọrùn.
zu: UGrey wenza lula ukuthumela nokwamukela izinkokhelo zangaphandle zabazisebenzayo, abasebenzela emakhaya namabhizinisi.

am: በ አይዶረይኒም ኦቦንጎ እናፌሚ አግሄዶ በ 2020 አጋማሽ የተመሰረተ ግሬይ ያለ ምንም ገደብ ዓለም አቀፍ ክፍያዎችን ለመላክ እና ለመቀበል ቀላል መንገድ ነው።
en: Founded in mid-2020 by Idorenyin Obong and Femi Aghedo, Grey is the easiest way to send and receive international payments without restrictions.
ha: Idorenyin da Obong ne suka samar da shi a tsakiyar 2020 , Grey shi ne hanya mafi sauƙi da za ka tura ko ka karɓi biyan kuɗin daga ƙasashen waje ba tare da an maka iyakoki ba.
sw: ilianzishwa katikati ya 2020 na Idorenyin Obong na Femi Aghedo, Grey ndiyo njia rahisi zaidi zaidi ya kutuma na kupokea malipo ya kimataifa bila vikwazo.
