yo: Idorenyin Obong àti Femi Aghedo dá Grey sílẹ̀ ní ààrin ọdún 2020, ó jẹ́ ọ̀nà tí ó rọrùn jùlọ láti fí owó ránṣẹ́ tàbí láti gba owó láti òkèèrè láì sí ìdíwọ́.
zu: Yasungulwa maphakathi no-2020 ngu-Idorenyin Obong kanye no-Femi Aghedo, iGrey iyindlela elula yokuthumela nokwamukela izinkokhelo zamazwe ngamazwe ngaphandle kwemingcele.

am: ከፊንትራክ በካናዳ እና በዩኤስኤ ውስጥ ከፊንሲኢኤን የገንዘብ አገልግሎት የንግድ ፈቃድ ጋር፣ ግሬይ በፍጥነት ሰዎች ድንበር ላይ ገንዘብ መላክ እንዲችሉ አድርጓል።
en: With a Money Service Business license from FINTRAC in Canada & FinCEN in the USA, Grey has made it possible for people to send money across borders quickly.
ha: Tare da lasisin aikin kasuwancin kuɗi daga FINTRAC da ke Canada &FinCEN da ke USA, Grey ya ba wa mutane damar tura kuɗi tsakanin ƙasashe cikin sauƙi.
sw: Akiwa na leseni ya biashara ya huduma ya pesa kutoka FINTRAC nchini kanada & FinCEN nchini marekani, Grey amewawezesha watu kutuma pesa kuvuka mipaka haraka.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ìwé-àṣẹ òkòwò elétò owó láti FINTRAC ní Canada & FinCEN ní USA, Grey tí jẹ́ kí ó ṣeéṣe fún àwọn èèyàn láti máa fi owó ránṣẹ́ láti ìlú sí ìlú ní kíákíá.
zu: Ngelayisensi Yebhizinisi Lomsebenzi Wemali evela kwa-FITRAC eCanada & FinCEN e-USA, uGrey wenze kwalula ukuba abantu bathumele imali kwamanye amazwe ngokushesha.

am: ፕሪምብሊ ቱነል በማዳበር፣ በማደግ ላይ ባሉ ገበያዎች ላይ የገንዘብ መረጃ አቅም በማስፋፋት የአከባበርና የደኅንነት ተቋማትን ያጠናክራል
en: Prembly Strengthens Compliance and Security Infrastructure by Acquiring Tunnel, Expanding Financial Data Capabilities across Emerging Markets
ha: Prembly Yana Ƙarfafa Biyayya da Tsarin Tsaro ta hanyar Mallakar Tunnel, Faɗaɗa Ƙarfin Bayanan Kuɗi a cikin Kasuwanni masu Tasowa.
sw: Prembly Huimarisha Uzingatiaji na Miundombinu ya Usalama kwa Kupata Njiia, Kupanua Uwezo wa Takwimu za Kifedha katika Masoko Yanayoibuka
yo: Prembly Fún okùn agbára mọ́ Irinṣẹ́ Amétòoṣẹ́-àti-ààbòbófinmu nípa Ríra Tunnel, tí ó ń ṣe Ìmúgbòòrò Ipa Dátà Ètò-owó jákèjádò àwọn Ọjà Tuntun
zu: I-Prembly Iqinisa Ukuthobelana Nengqalasizinda Yezokuphepha Ngokuthola Umhubhe, Ukwandisa Amakhono Emininingo Yezezimali kuzo wonke Amamakethe Ezisafufusa

am: ለታዳጊ ገበያዎች ታዛዥነትና የደኅንነት ተቋማት ግንባር ቀደም ሯጭ የሆነው ፕሪምብሊ፣ በንግድ ድርጅቶች ውስጥ ሕጋዊ መረጃዎችን የሚያካፍሉ አዳዲስ ኩባንያ የሆነው ቱነሎዎችን መግዛቱን አስታውቆል።
en: Prembly, a front-runner in compliance and security infrastructure for emerging markets has announced its acquisition of Tunnel, an innovative company driving legitimate data sharing across businesses.
ha: Prembly, wanda yake gaba-gaba wajen bin ƙa’ida da kayan aikin tsaro don kasuwanni masu tasowa ya sanar da siyan Tunnel, wani sabon kamfani mai tukin halaltaccen musayar bayanai a duk kasuwancin.
sw: Prembly, mtangulizi katika utiifu na miundo mbinu ya usalama kwa masoko yanayoibuka imetangaza kupata Tunnel, kampuni bunifu inayoendesha ugavi halali wa takwimu katika biashara zote.
yo: Prembly, aṣáájú ní irinṣẹ́ amétòoṣẹ́-àti-ààbòbófinmu fún àwọn ọjà tuntun ti kéde bí ó ṣe ràpíngbàkóso Tunnel, ilé-iṣẹ́ alátinúdá tí ó ń pín dátà lọ́nà tí ó bá òfin mu láàárín àwọn òkòwò.
zu: Ngaphambilini, ohamba phambili ekuthobeleni nasekuvikeleni ingqalasizinda yamamakethe asafufusa umemezele ukutholwa kwayo kwe-Tunnel, inkampani esungulwe eqhuba ukwabiwa kweimininingo okusemthethweni kuwo wonke amabhizinisi.

am: ይህ ውህደት የፕሬምብሊ የደህንነት ማቀነባበሪያዎችን ያሻሽላል እና የገንዘብ አገልግሎቶችን ያሰፋል፣ የተሟላ የገንዘብ መረጃ በማቀናጀት ጠንካራ ማንነት ለማረጋገጥ ያስችላል።
en: This integration enhances Prembly's security suite and expands financial services, enabling robust identity verification through comprehensive financial data integration.
ha: Wannan haɗin kai yana haɓaka babban tsaro na Prembly kuma yana faɗaɗa ayyukan kuɗi, yana ba da damar tabbatar da tabbaci ta ainihin bayanan kuɗi.
sw: Ujumuishaji huu huimarisha mfumo wa usalama wa Prembiy, na kupunguza huduma za kifedha, kuwezesha uthibitishaji thabiti wa utambulisho, kupitia ujumuishaji wa takwimu za kifedha kwa kina.
yo: Ìṣàsopọ̀ yìí yóò mú ààtò iṣẹ́ ààbò Prembly dára sí i tí yóò sì fẹ àwọn ètò iṣẹ́ owó, èyí tí yóò mú ẹ̀rí ìdánimọ̀ tí ó múyán ṣeéṣe látààrí ìṣàsopọ̀ dátà owó tí kún tí ó sì yéni.
zu: Lokhu kuhlanganiswa kuthuthukisa ukuphepha kwePrembly futhi kwandise nezinsizakalo zezezimali, okuvumela ukuqinisekiswa kobunikazi obuqinile ngokuhlanganiswa kwemininingo yezezimali ngokuphelele.

am: የዳታ መሰረተ ልማትና ትንተና ኩባንያ ቱነል አበዳሪዎችን ከከፍተኛ ጥራት መረጃና ዘላቂ ቴክኖሎጂ ጋር በማገናኘት በዱቤና በማንነት ኢንዱስትሪ ውስጥ እምነት የሚጣልበት አጋር ሆኖ ራሱን አቋቁሟል።
en: The data infrastructure and analytics company, Tunnel, has established itself as a trusted partner in the credit and identity industry by connecting lenders to high-quality data and sustainable technology.
ha: Kamfanin samar da bayanai da kamfanin nazari, Tunnel, ya kafa kansa a matsayin amintaccen abokin tarayya a cikin masana'antun bashi da ainihi ta hanyar haɗa masu ba da bashi zuwa bayanai masu inganci da fasaha mai ɗorewa.
sw: Kampuni ya miundo mbinu ya takwimu na uchanganuzi, Tunnel, imejiimarisha kama mshirika anayeaminika katika sekta ya mikopo na utambulisho kwa kuunganisha wakopeshaji na takwimu ya ubora wa hali ya juu na teknolojia endelevu.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ aṣètúpalẹ̀ àti amétòoṣẹ́dátàrọrùn náà, Tunnel ti fi ara rẹ̀ sípò alábàáṣe tí ó ṣe é fọkàn tán ní ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ ẹ̀yáwò àti ìdánimọ̀ nípa ṣíṣe àsopọ̀ àwọn ayánilówó mọ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ dátà tí ó jẹ́ ojúlówó oníyebíye tí ó sì jẹ́ alálòpẹ́.
zu: Ingqalasizinda yemininingo nenkampani yezibalo, i-Tunnel, izimise njengozakwethu othembekile embonini yezikweletu nezomazisi ngokuxhuma ababolekisi kumininingo yangempela esezingeni eliphezulu kanye nobuchwepheshe obuzinzile.

am: በተጨማሪም በጀማሪነት የሚውለውን የፊንቴክ ምርቱን፣ የስልክ ገንዘብ ፣ደንበኞች በተቻለ ፍጥነት ገንዘብ እንዲልኩ ይረዳቸዋል።
en: Its pioneering fintech product, PhoneCash, also helps customers send money as quickly as possible.
ha: Samfurinsa na fintech na farko, PhoneCash, kuma yana taimaka wa abokan ciniki aika kuɗi da sauri.
sw: Biashara yake kuu ya teknolojia ya uchumi, PhoneCash, pia huwasaidia wateja kutunza pesa haraka iwezekanavyo.
yo: Ohun ìṣàmúlò afìmẹ̀ẹ̀rọṣètòòṣúná àkọ́ṣe rẹ̀, PhoneCash tún ń ran àwọn oníbàárà lọ́wọ́ láti fi owó ránṣẹ́ ní kíákíá.
zu: Umkhiqizo wayo ohamba phambili we-fintech, i-PhoneCash, futhi usiza amakhasimende ukuthi athumele imali ngokushesha okukhulu.

am: የቱነል አገልግሎቶች ማቀናበር የንግድ ድርጅቶችን ለስፋት የሚያስችል ጠንካራ መሣሪያ ይሰጣቸዋል፣ ይህም በአንድ ኤፒ አይ አማካኝነት ከበርካታ ምንጮች እውነተኛውን ጊዜ የደንበኞች መረጃ ለማግኘት ያስችላል።
en: The integration of Tunnel's services provides businesses with a powerful tool to scale, enabling access to real-time customer information from multiple sources through a single API.
ha: Haɗin ayyukan Tunnel yana ba kasuwancin kayan aiki mai ƙarfi domin daidaitawa, yana ba da damar samun damar yin amfani da bayanan abokin ciniki na ainihin lokaci daga tushe da yawa ta hanyar API guda ɗaya.
sw: ujumuishaji wa wa huduma za Tunnel huzipa biashara zana madhubuti ya kupima, kuwezesha ufikiaji wa taarifa za wateja kwa wakati halisi kutoka vyanzo vingi kupitia API moja.
yo: Ìṣàsopọ̀ àwọn iṣẹ́ Tunnel yóò fún àwọn òkòwò ní irinṣẹ́ tí ó lágbára láti gbéra sókè, èyí tí yóò fi àyè gba ìwífún oníbàárà lójú ẹsẹ̀ láti ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ orísun nípasẹ̀ ojú-ìwò ìsodùkíkọ móhun-ìṣàmúlò kan ṣoṣo.
zu: Ukuhlanganiswa kwezinsizakalo zeTunnel kunikeza amabhizinisi ithuluzi elinamandla lokukala, okwenza kufinyeleleke olwazini lwesikhathi sangempela lwekhasimende kusuka emithonjeni eminingi nge-API eyodwa.

am: ፕሪምብሊ የገንዘብ መረጃ የማንነት ማረጋገጫ ወሳኝ ክፍል መሆኑን በመገንዘብ ቱነል አሁን ካሉት የማንነት ማረጋገጫ መፍትሔዎች ጋር ለማዋሃድ ስትራቴጂያዊ በሆነ መንገድ መርጧል ።
en: Recognizing the importance of financial data as a crucial component of identity verification, Prembly has strategically chosen to merge Tunnel into its existing identity verification solutions.
ha: Gane mahimmancin bayanan kuɗi a matsayin muhimmin ɓangaren tabbatarwa na ainihi, Prembly ya zaɓi dabara don haɗa Tunnel cikin hanyoyin tabbatar da ainihinsa.
sw: Kwa kutambua umuhimu wa takwimu za kifedha kama sehemu muhimu ya udhibitishaji wa utambulisho, Prembiy imechagua kuunganisha kimkakati Tunnel katika suluh zake zilizopo za ushibitishaji wa utambulisho.
yo: Bí Prembly ṣe ti mọ rírì pàtàkì dátà owó gẹ́gẹ́ bí i ẹ̀ka pàtàkì ní ìjẹ́rìí ìdánímọ̀, ó fi ọgbọ́n yàn láti ní ìsopọ̀ mọ́ Tunnel mọ́ àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ ìjẹ́rìí ìdánímọ̀ tí ó ní tẹ́lẹ̀.
zu: Iqaphela ukubaluleka kwemininingo yezezimali njengengxenye ebalulekile yokuqinisekisa ubuwena, i-Prembly ikhethe ngobuchule ukuhlanganisa i-Tunnel nezixazululo zayo ezikhona zokuqinisekisa ubunikazi.

am: “በገበያዎች ላይ የገጠሙትን ልዩ ልዩ ተግዳሮቶች ተረድተናል። የቱነል መገዛቱን ስናሳዉቅ በጣም ተደስተናል።
en: “We understand the unique challenges faced across the markets and we are thrilled to announce the acquisition of Tunnel.
ha: "Mun fahimci ƙalubale na musamman da ake fuskanta a faɗin kasuwanni kuma muna farin cikin sanar da samun mallakar Tunnel.
sw: Tunatambua changamoto za kipekee zinazokabili soko kote na tunayofurahia kutangaza kupata Tunnel.
yo: "A lóye nípa àwọn ìpènijà aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ tí àwọn ọjà ń kojú káàkiri, tí inú wa sì dùn láti kéde ìràpíngbàkóso Tunnel.
zu: “Siyaziqonda izinselelo eziyingqayizivele ezibhekene nazo zonke izimakethe futhi sijabule kakhulu ukumemezela ukutholwa kweTunnel.

am: ይህም የንግድ ድርጅቶች ጠንካራ የታዛዥነትና የደኅንነት መዋቅር በመስጠት እድገት እንዲያደርጉ ለማስቻል ከፕሬምብሊ ዋነኛ ተልዕኮ ጋር የሚስማማ ነው" በማለት የፕሬምብሊ ዋና ሥራ አስኪያጅ የሆኑት ላነሬ ኦግንግቤ ተናግረዋል።
en: This aligns with Prembly's core mission to protect and enable businesses to thrive by providing robust compliance and security infrastructure.”, says Lanre Ogungbe, CEO Prembly.
ha: Wannan ya yi daidai da ainihin manufar Prembly don karewa da bai wa 'yan kasuwa damar bunƙasa ta hanyar samar da ingantacciyar yarda da abubuwan more rayuwa.", in ji Lanre Ogungbe, Shugaban Prembly.
sw: Hii inawiana na dhamira ya Prembiy ya kulinda na kuwezesha biashara kusitawi kwa kutoa miundo mbinu thabiti ya kufuata na usalama anasema Lanre Ogungbe, Mkurugenzi mtendaji wa Prembiy.
yo: Èyí wà ní ìbámu pẹ̀lú ibi afẹ́dé gbòógì ti Prembly ní láti dáàbò bo àti láti mú àwọn òkòwò yè nípa pípèsè irinṣẹ́ amétòoṣẹ́-àti-ààbòbófinmu.", Lanre Ogungbe, Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Prembly ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀ fèsì.
zu: Lokhu kuhambisana nomgomo oyinhloko ka-Prembly wokuvikela nokwenza amabhizinisi athuthuke ngokuhlinzeka ngengqalasizinda eqinile yokuthobela imithetho nezokuphepha.”, kusho uLanre Ogungbe, oyi-CEO u-Prembly.

am: ቱነል የተቋቋመው ደንበኞችን የተለያዩ የገንዘብ መፍትሔዎችን ማግኘት እንዲችሉ በማድረግ፣ የተደነገጉ መረጃዎችን ማግኘት፣ መጠቀም እና ማካፈል እንዲችሉ ለማድረግ ነው።
en: Tunnel was founded with the mission to facilitate regulated data access, usage, and sharing among providers, providing customers with access to multiple streams of financial solutions.
ha: An samar da Tunnel tare da manufa don sauƙaƙe hanyar shiga bayanai, amfani, da rabawa tsakanin masu samarwa, samar da abokan ciniki damar samun hanyoyi da yawa na hanyoyin kuɗi.
sw: Tunnel ilianzishwa kwa dhamira ya kuwezesha ufikiaji wa takwimu uliyodhibitiwa, matumizi na kushiriki kati ya watoa huduma kuwapa wateja ufikiaji wa mitiririko mingi ya suluhisho za kifedha.
yo: Wọ́n dá Tunnel sílẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ìlépa láti mú ìráàyèsí, ìlò àti pínpín dátà tí ó ní àkóso láàárín àwọn olùpèsè ṣeéṣe, pípèsè àwọn oníbàárà pẹ̀lú àyè sí ọ̀nà àbáyọ àtirówó láti ọ̀nà tí ó pọ̀.
zu: I-Tunnel yasungulwa ngenhloso yokuqondisa ukufinyelela kwemininingo okulawulwayo, ukusetshenziswa, nokwabelana phakathi kwabahlinzeki, okuhlinzeka amakhasimende ngezindlela eziningo zokwenza imali.

am: የቱነል ተባባሪ መስራች እና ዋና ስራ አስኪያጅ ቶቢ ኦኬዴጂ፣ ከፕሬምብሊ ጋር በመተባበር የመፍትሄ ሃሳቦቻቸውን ወደ ሰፊ የአከባበር እና የደህንነት መረብ ማቀናጀታቸውን አጽንኦት ሰጥተው ገልጸዋል።
en: Tobi Okedeji, the co-founder & CEO of Tunnel, expressed his pride in joining forces with Prembly, emphasizing the integration of their solutions into an extensive compliance and security network.
ha: Tobi Okedeji, wanda ya kafa da kuma Shugaba na Tunnel, ya nuna alfaharinsa ga haɗa karfi da ƙarfe tare da Prembly, yana mai da hankali kan haɗe hanyoyin magance su cikin babban yarda da hanyar sadarwa.
sw: Tobi Okedeji, Mwanzilishi mwenza & Mkurugenzi mtendaji wa Tunnel alionyesha fahari yake ya kuunganisha nguvu na Prembiy akisisitiza ujumuishaji wa suluhisho lao katika mtandao mkubwa wa kufuatana usalama.
yo: Tobi Okediji, alájọdásílẹ̀ àti Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Tunnel fi ìréra rẹ̀ láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ Prembly hàn, ó ṣe ìtẹnumọ́ ìṣàsopọ̀ àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ wọn sí ìtakùn ààbò àti ìmúṣẹ́bófinmu tí ó gbalẹ̀ rẹrẹ.
zu: U-Tobi Okedeji, umsunguli kanye no-CEO we-Tunnel, uzwakalise ukuziqhenya kwakhe ngokujoyina i-Prembly, egcizelela ukuhlanganiswa kwezixazululo zabo kunethiwekhi ebanzi yokuthobela nokuvikeleka.

am: ይህ ስትራቴጂያዊ ግኝት ለንግድ ድርጅቶች ሥልጣን በመስጠት የደንበኞችን መረጃና ጠቃሚ ማስተዋል ይሰጣል።
en: This strategic acquisition drives empowerment for businesses, delivering actionable customer information and valuable insights.
ha: Wannan dabarar mallaka tana haifar da ƙarfafawa ga kasuwanci, isar da bayanan abokin ciniki mai aiki da fahimta mai mahimmanci.
sw: Upataji huu wa kimkakati unasukuma uwezeshaji wa biashara, kutoa taarifa za wateja zinazoweza kutekelezeka na maarifa muhimu.
yo: Ìràpíngbàkóso ọlọ́gbọ́n yìí ń mú ìrónilágbára fún àwọn òkòwò, ó ń fi ìwífún àti òye oníyebíye aṣeélò nípa àwọn oníbàárà ránṣẹ́.
zu: Lokhu kutholwa kwamasu kuthuthukisa ukuhlomisa amabhizinisi, ukuletha ulwazi lwamakhasimende olusebenzisekayo kanye nemininingwane ebalulekile.

am: ይህም በፕሬምብሊ አሰራር ላይ ጉልህ ለውጥ ያመጣል፣ መረጃዎችን ማካፈልን ለማሻሻል እና በደንበኞች ማረጋገጫ አደጋዎችን ለመቀነስ የሚያስችል ሥነ ምህዳር ይፈጥራል።
en: This makes a significant difference in Prembly’s operations, creating an ecosystem poised to improve data sharing and mitigate risks with customer verification.
ha: Wannan yana haifar da gagarumin bambanci a cikin ayyukan Prembly, ƙirƙirar yanayin da ke shirye don inganta raba bayanai da rage haɗari tare da tantance da abokin ciniki.
sw: Hii inaleta tofauti kubwa kwenye shughuli za Prembly, kuunda mfumo ikolojia uliyo tayari kuboresha ushirikiano wa takwimu na kupunguza hatari kwa uthibitishaji wa mteja.
yo: Èyí mú ìyàtọ̀ pàtàkì bá àwọn iṣẹ́ Prembly, ó ń ṣẹ̀dá àwùjọ tí yóò mú dátà pínpín dára sí i tí yóò sì dín ipa ewu kù pẹ̀lú ìjẹ́rìí oníbàárà.
zu: Lokhu kwenza umehluko omkhulu ekusebenzeni kwe-Prembly, kubanga uhlelonhlaliswano yokuphilayo nokungaphili elungele ukuthuthukisa ukwabelana ngeimininingo nokunciphisa ubungozi ngokuqinisekiswa kwamakhasimende.

am: ይህም በኩባንያው እድገት ውስጥ አዲስ ምዕራፍ ከፋች ነው እናም የአገልግሎት መስጠትን ለማስፋፋት ስትራቴጂያዊ ትብብር እና አጋርነት ለማጠናከር ጠንካራ ውሳኔን ያጠናክራል።
en: It represents a milestone in the company’s growth and reinforces a strong dedication to fostering strategic collaborations and partnerships to expand service offerings.
ha: Yana wakiltar wani ci gaba a ci gaban kamfani kuma yana ƙarfafa sadaukarwa mai ƙarfi don haɓaka dabarun haɗin guiwa don faɗaɗa sadaukarwar aiki.
sw: inawakilisha hatua muhimu katika ukuaji wa kampuni na unaimarisha kujitolea kwa nguvu katika kukuza ushirikiano wa kimkakati na ubia ili kupanua utoaji wa huduma.
yo: Ó jẹ́ ìgbésẹ̀ pàtàkì nínú ìdàgbàsókè ilé-iṣẹ́ náà tí ó sì ń ṣe ìmúdájú ìfarajìn tí ó lágbára sí mímú ìdàgbàsókè bá àwọn ìbáṣepọ̀ àti ìfọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ ọlọ́gbọ́n láti mú àwọn ìfilọ̀ iṣẹ́ pọ̀ sí i.
zu: Imele ingqophamlando ekukhuleni kwenkampani futhi iqinisa ukuzinikela okuqinile ekukhuthazeni ukusebenzisana kwamasu nokubambisana ukuze kwandiswe iminikelo yomsebenzi.

am: ፕሪምብሊ በመላው አፍሪካ የዲጂታል አንድነትን ለማሻሻል የሚያስፈልጉ ወሳኝ የሆኑ የመሠረተ ልማት አውታሮችን የሚያሻሽል የአከባበር እና የደህንነት ተቋማት ኩባንያ ነው።
en: Prembly is a compliance and security infrastructure company, innovating crucial infrastructure needed to enhance digital integration across Africa.
ha: Prembly kamfani ne mai yarda da tsaro, yana haɓaka mahimman abubuwan more rayuwa da ake buƙata don haɓaka haɗin kai na dijital a duk faɗin Afirka.
sw: Prembiy, ni kampuni ya uzingatiaji na miundo mbinu ya usalama, inayobuni muhimu inayohitajika ili kuimarisha ushirikiano wa kidijitali kote afrika.
yo: Prembly jẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ elétò irinṣẹ́ amétòoṣẹ́-àti-ààbòbófinmu, tí ó ní mú irinṣẹ́ pàtàkì ọlọ́gbọ́n àtinúdá tuntun tí wọ́n nílò láti mú ìṣàsopọ̀ ayélujára káàkiri Africa ṣeéṣe.
zu: I-Prembly yinkampani yengqalasizinda yokuthobela nokuvikeleka, esungula ingqalasizinda ebalulekile edingekayo ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukuhlanganiswa kwedijithali kuyo yonke i-Afrika.

am: በማንነት ማረጋገጫ፣ በማጭበርበር መከላከል/ማወቂያ እና በጀርባ ፍተሻ ረገድ ግንባር ቀደም በመሆን፣ ፕሬምብሊ ከ40 በላይ የአፍሪካ አገራት የንግድ ድርጅቶች በአስተማማኝ ሁኔታ ግብይት እንዲያካሂዱ እና ወደ አፍሪካ ገበያዎች ለመግባት የሚፈልጉ ኩባንያዎች ደህንነታቸው በተጠበቀ ሁኔታ እንዲሠሩ ያስችላቸዋል።
en: Leading the way in identity verification, fraud prevention/detection, and background checks, Prembly enables businesses in over 40 African countries to transact with trust and companies seeking to enter African markets to do so securely.
ha: Yana jagorantar hanyar tantancewa, rigakafin/gano zamba, da bincikar bayanan baya, Prembly yana bai wa 'yan kasuwa a cikin ƙasashen Afirka sama da 40 damar yin mu'amala tare da amincewa da kamfanonin da ke neman shiga kasuwannin Afirka domin yin hakan cikin aminci.
sw: Kuongoza njia katika uthibitishaji wa utambulisho, kuzuia/ugunduzi wa ulaghai na ukaguzi wa usuli, Prembiy inawezesha biashara kwenye nchi zaidi ya 40 za Afrika katika kufanya miamala kwa uaminifu na makampuni yanayotaka kuingia kwenye masoko ya Afrika kufanya hivyo kwa usalama.
yo: Prembly tí ó ń ṣáájú ọ̀nà ní ètò ìjẹ́rìí ìdánímọ̀, ìdènà/ìkẹ́fín jìbìtì, àti ìṣàyẹ̀wò ibi ìṣẹ̀wá, yóò mú kí àwọn òkòwò ní àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè ilẹ̀ Africa tí wọ́n ju 40 lọ lè ṣe káràkátà pẹ̀lú àfọkàntán tí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n fẹ́ wọ ọjà ilẹ̀ Africa lè ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ààbò.
zu: Ehamba phambili ekuqinisekisweni kobunikazi, ekuvimbeleni/ukutholwa kokukhwabanisa, kanye nokuhlolwa kwemvelaphi, i-Prembly yenza amabhizinisi emazweni angaphezu kuka-40 ase-Afrika akwazi ukusebenzisana ngokuthembana nezinkampani ezifuna ukungena ezimakethe zase-Afrika ukuze zenze kanjalo ngokuphepha.

am: ስለ ቱናል:
en: About Tunnel:
ha: Game da Tunnel:
sw: Kuhusu Tunnel:
yo: Nípa Tunnel:
zu: Mayelana neTunnel:

am: ቱናል( ዩዝ ቱናል ሊሚትድ ) የተመሰረተው በቶቢ ኦኬዴጂ፣ በዩሱፍ ባድሞስ እና በላንሬ ኢብራሂም ነው።
en: Tunnel (Usetunnel Limited) is founded by Tobi Okedeji, Yusuf Badmos, and Lanre Ibraheem.
ha: Tunnel (Usetunnel Limited) Tobi Okedeji, Yusuf Badmos, da Lanre Ibraheem ne suka kafa.
sw: Tunnel (usetunnel Limited) imeanzishwa na Tobi Okedeji, Yusufu Badmos na Lanre Ibraheem.
yo: Tobi Okediji, Yusuf Badmos àti Lanre Ibraheem ni wọ́n dá Tunnel (Usetunnnel Limited) sílẹ̀.
zu: I-Tunnel (i-Usetunnel Limited) yasungulwa nguTobi Okedeji, u-Yusuf Badmos, kanye noLanre Ibraheem.

am: በንግዶች መካከል ሕጋዊ የመረጃ መጋራት በማጐልበት ላይ ያተኰረ የመረጃ ትንተና እና የመሠረተ ልማት ኩባንያ ነው።
en: It is a data analytics and infrastructure company focused on empowering legitimate data sharing across businesses.
ha: Ƙididdigar bayanai ne da kamfanin samar da abubuwan more rayuwa da aka mayar da hankali kan ƙarfafa halaltaccen musayar bayanai a cikin kasuwanci.
sw: Ni kampuni ya uchanganuzi wa takwimu na miundo mbinu inayolenga kuwezesha ushiriki halali wa takwimu kwenye biashara hiyo.
yo: Ó jẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ aṣètúpalẹ̀ àti amétòoṣẹ́dátàrọrùn tí ó gbájú mọ́ ṣíṣe ìrónilágbára fún dátà pínpín lọ́nà tí ó bófin mu káàkiri àwọn òkòwò.
zu: Kuyinkampani yokuhlaziya imininingo kanye nengqalasizinda egxile ekunikeni amandla ukwabelana ngemininingo okusemthethweni kuwo wonke amabhizinisi.

am: ብዙ የመረጃ ብድር አገልግሎቶችን በማገናኘት እና የፋይናንስ መረጃን በማጐልበት ረገድ ካለው እውቀት ጋር፣ ዋሻው በፋይናንስ አገልግሎት ኢንዱስትሪ ውስጥ የታመነ አጋር ሆኗል።
en: With its expertise in connecting multiple data lending services and powering financial data, Tunnel has become a trusted partner in the financial service industry.
ha: Tare da ƙwarewarsa wajen haɗa sabis na ba da lamuni da yawa da kuma ƙarfafa bayanan kuɗi, Tunnel ya zama amintaccen abokin tarayya a cikin masana'antar aiki na kuɗi.
sw: Kwa utaalamu wake wa kuunganisha huduma nyingi za kukopesha, takwimu na kuwezesha takwimu za kifedha Tunnel imekuwa mshirika anayeaminika katika sekta ya huduma za kifedha.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe rẹ̀ ní ṣíṣe àsopọ̀ ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn iṣẹ́ ayáninídátà àti ṣíṣe ìrólágbára fún dátà owó, Tunnel ti di alábàáṣe tí ó ṣe é fọkàn tán ní ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ elétò owó.
zu: Ngobuchwepheshe bayo bokuxhumanisa izinsiza eziningi zokuboleka imininingo kanye nokunika amandla imininingo yezezimali, i-Tunnel isibe uzakwethu othembekile embonini yemisebenzi yezezimali.

am: የዲጂታል ትራንስፎርሜሽን ማእከል በናይጄሪያ የመጀመርያ አዋጅ ላይ የፖሊሲ ውይይት ሲያስተናግድ ባለድርሻ አካላት ተባብረው እንዲሰሩ ተጨማሪ ጥሪ ቀረበ
en: More calls for stakeholder collaboration as the digital transformation center hosts a policy dialogue on the Nigerian Startup Act
ha: Ƙarin kira ga haɗin guiwar masu ruwa da tsaki yayin da cibiyar canjin dijital take ɗaukar nauyin tattaunawa game da Dokar Farawa ta Nijeriya
sw: Wito zaidi wa ushirikiano wa washikadau kwani kituo cha mageuzi ya kidijitali kinaandaa mazungumzo ya sera kuhusu Sheria ya Kuanzisha Nigeria
yo: Ìpè sí i fún ìfọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ àwọn òpómúléró bí gbọ̀ngán amáyìídà bá ẹ̀rọ ayélujára ṣe gba àlejò ìfọ̀rọ̀jomitoro òfin iṣẹ́ lórí Nigerian Startup Act
zu: Izingcingo ezengeziwe zokusebenzisana nababambiqhaza njengoba isikhungo soguquko lwedijithali sisingatha inkhulumomphendvulwano yenqubomgomo ngoMthetho Wamabhizinisi Asaqala WaseNigeria owaziwa nge-Nigerian Startup Act.

am: ጂአይዚ/ዲጂታል ትራንስፎርሜሽን ሴንተር( ዲቲሲ) ከአውሮፓ ኅብረት እና ከብሔራዊ የኢንፎርሜሽን ቴክኖሎጂ ልማት ኤጀንሲ( ኒትዳ) ጋር በመተባበር የናይጄሪያ ጅምር ሕግ( ኤንኤስኤ) ላይ ያተኰረ የዲጂታል ፖሊሲ የውይይት ክፍለ ጊዜ አዘጋጅቷል።
en: The GIZ/Digital Transformation Center (DTC), in partnership with the European Union and the National Information Technology Development Agency (NITDA), organised a digital policy dialogue session with the Nigerian Startup Act (NSA) in focus.
ha: Cibiyar Canjin Dijital ta GIZ/DTC tare da haɗin guiwar Tarayyar Turai da Hukumar Bunƙasa Fasahar Sadarwa ta Ƙasa (NITDA), sun shirya taron tattaunawa kan manufofin dijital tare da Dokar Farawa ta Nijeriya (NSA) da aka mayar da hankali.
sw: GIZ/kituo cha mabadiliko ya kidijitali (DTC) kwa ushirikiano na umoja wa ulaya na wakala wa kitaifa wa maendeleo ya teknolojia ya habari nchini Nigeria (NITDA), waliandaa kikao cha mazungumzo ya sera ya kidijitali inayolenga sheria ya miradi nchini Nigeria.
yo: GIZ/Digital Transformation Center (DTC), ní ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú European Union àti Àjọ Aṣètòìdàgbàsókè Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ Oníwìífún ní ilẹ̀ Nigeria (NITDA) ṣètò ìpàdé-tàkúrọ̀sọ láti ṣòfin pẹ̀lú Nigerian Startup Act (NSA) ní àfojúsùn.
zu: I-GIZ/Digital Transformation Centre (i-DTC), ngokubambisana ne-European Union kanye ne-National Information Technology Development Agency (i-NITDA), bahlele iseshini yengxoxo yenqubomgomo yedijithali lapho kugxilwe khona kumthetho wezamabhizinisi asaqala owaziwa nge-Nigerian Startup Act (i-NSA).

am: ዲቲሲ ናይጄሪያ በናይጄሪያ የመጀመር ሥነ ምህዳር እና ዲጂታል ኢኮኖሚ ውስጥ አዳዲስ ነገሮችን፣ ድርጅትን እና ዘላቂ ኢኮኖሚያዊ እድገትን የሚያበረታታ ውጤታማ መዋቅር ለመፍጠር እና ከተጠያቂዎች ጠቃሚ ማስተዋል ለማግኘት ጥረት ያደርጋል።
en: DTC Nigeria aims to foster inclusive discussions and gather valuable insights from stakeholders to create an effective framework that promotes innovation, entrepreneurship, and sustainable economic growth within the Nigerian startup ecosystem and digital economy.
ha: DTC Nigeria na da nufin samar da tattaunawa mai ma'ana tare da tattara bayanai masu mahimmanci daga masu ruwa da tsaki don samar da ingantaccen tsari wanda ke inganta ƙirƙire-ƙirƙire, kasuwanci, da ci gaban tattalin arziki mai ɗorewa a cikin tsarin yanayin Nijeriya na farawa da tattalin arzikin dijital.
sw: DTC Nigeria inalenga kukuza mijadala jumuishi na kukusanya maarifa muhimu kutoka kwa washikadau kuunda mfumo madhubuti unaokuza uvumbuzi, ujasiriamali na ukuaji endelevu wa uchumi ndani ya mfumo wa ikolojia nchini Nigeria na uchumi wa kidijitali.
yo: DTC Nigeria ń gbèrò láti mú àwọn ìtàkúrọ̀sọ oníkòópa wáyé tí yóò sì gba òye oníyebíye jọ lẹ́nu àwọn òpómúléró láti ṣẹ̀dá ìlànà iṣẹ́ tí ń ṣiṣẹ́ tí yóò mú ìdàgbàsókè bá ọgbọ́n ìṣẹ̀dá, ìṣòwò, àti ìdàgbàsókè ètò ọrọ̀ ajé alálòpẹ́ ní àwùjọ ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ àti ètò ọrọ̀ ajé orí ayélujára ní Nigeria.
zu: I-DTC yase-Nigeria ihlose ukugqugquzela izingxoxo ezibandakanya wonke umuntu futhi iqoqe imininingwane ebalulekile evela kubabambiqhaza ukuze kwakhe uhlaka olusebenzayo olukhuthaza ukuqamba okusha, amabhizinisi, kanye nokukhula komnotho okusimeme ngaphakathi kwe-ecosystem yokuqala yaseNigeria kanye nomnotho wedijithali.

am: ሐሙስ ፣ሐምሌ 27 ቀን ፣2023 ዓ.ም. በሌጎስ የተካሄደው አመርቂ ስብሰባ፣ የናይጀሪያ መጀመርያ አዋጅ በሀገር አቀፍ ደረጃ እንዲጸድቅ የሚያስችሉ መንገዶችን ለማወያየት ከሕዝብና ከግል ድርጅቶች የተውጣጡ ባለድርሻ አካላትን በአንድ ክፍል አሰባስቦ ነበር።
en: The productive session, which was held in Lagos on Thursday, July 27, 2023, brought stakeholders from the public and private sectors together in one room to discuss ways to foster the adoption of the Nigeria Startup Act nationwide.
ha: Taron mai albarka wanda aka gudanar a Legas a ranar Alhamis, 27 ga Yuli, 2023, ya tattaro masu ruwa da tsaki daga jama’a da masu zaman kansu a ɗaki ɗaya domin tattauna hanyoyin da za a bi wajen ganin an amince da dokar fara aiki ta Nijeriya a faɗin ƙasar.
sw: Kikao hicho chenye tija ambacho kilifanyika Lagos Alhamis, Julai 27, 2023, kiliwaleta wadau kutoka sekta za umma na binafsi pamoja katika chumba kimoja ili kujadili njia za kuhimizwa kupitishwa kwa sheria ya miradi nchini Nigeria.
yo: Ìjókòó eléso náà, tí ó wáyé ní Lagos ní Ọjọ́'bọ 27 oṣù Keje, ọdún 2023 kó àwọn òpómúléró láti àwọn ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ ìjọba àti aládàáni papọ̀ sí inú yàrá kan láti sọ̀rọ̀ lórí àwọn ọ̀nà tí yóò ṣe ìrànwọ́ ìmúṣiṣẹ́ Nigeria Startup Act káàkiri ilẹ̀ náà.
zu: Iseshini ekhiqizayo, ebibanjelwe e-Lagos ngoLwesine, zingama-27 kuNtulikazi wezi- 2023, yahlanganisa ababambiqhaza abavela emikhakheni kahulumeni nezizimele ndawonye egumbini elilodwa ukuze kudingidwe izindlela zokugqugquzela ukwamukelwa koMthetho Wokuqala waseNigeria ezweni lonke.

am: በፖሊሲ ውይይቱ ላይ የተገኙት ዶ/ር ቱዌባ ዲዋኒ፣ ራስ፣ ጂአይዚ/ዲጂታል ትራንስፎርሜሽን ሴንተር (ዲቲሲ) ናይጀሪያ ናቸው። የእንኳን ደህና መጣችሁ ንግግር አቅርበው ነበር።
en: Present at the policy dialogue was Dr. Thuweba Diwani, Head, GIZ/Digital Transformation Center (DTC) Nigeria, who delivered the welcome address.
ha: Wanda ya halarta a tattaunawar manufofin shi ne Dr. Thuweba Diwani, shugaban GIZ/Digital Transformation Center (DTC) Nigeria, wanda ya gabatar da jawabin maraba.
sw: Aliyekuwepo kwenye mazungumzo ya sera alikuwa Dr, Thuweba Diwani, Mkuu, GIZ/Kituocha cha mabadiliko ya kidijitali (DTC) Nigeria, ndiye aliyetoa hotuba ya ufunguzi.
yo: Níbi ìpàdé-tàkúrọ̀sọ láti ṣòfin náà ni Dr. Thuweba Diwani, Olórí, GIZ/Digital Transformation Center (DTC) Nigeria wà, tí ó sọ ọ̀rọ̀ ìkíni káàbọ̀.
zu: Owayekhona engxoxweni yenqubomgomo bekunguDkt. Thuweba Diwani, iNhloko, ye-GIZ/Digital Transformation Centre (DTC) Nigeria, owenze inkulumo yokwamukela.

am: የናይጄሪያ ጅማሮ ምቹ ሁኔታ ከመፍጠሩም በላይ የአቅም ግንባታን እንደሚያሳድግና እድገትን እንደሚያፋጥን ተናግራለች።
en: She said the Nigerian startup will not only create an enabling environment but also increase capacity building and accelerate development.
ha: Ta ce fara aikin na Nijeriya ba wai kawai zai samar da yanayi mai kyau ba ne, har ma zai ƙara ƙarfafawa da kuma ƙara haɓaka ci gaba.
sw: Alisema miradi ya Nigeria haitajikita katika kuandaa mazingira wezeshi peke yake, lakini pia kuongeza uwezo wa ujenzi na kuharakisha maendeleo.
yo: Ó wí pé ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ ilẹ̀ Nigeria kò ní ṣẹ̀dá agbègbè ìgbàláàyè nìkan ṣùgbọ́n yóò tún ṣe àfikún agbára ìṣẹ̀dá tí yóò sì mú ìdàgbàsókè yá fáfá.
zu: Uthe amabhizinisi asaqala aseNigeria ngeke nje akhe indawo eyenza kusebenzeke kodwa kuzokwandisa nokwakhiwa kwamakhono futhi kusheshise intuthuko.

am: ለዚህም ነው የጀማሪዎች አዋጁን ስኬት ለማረጋገጥ ባለድርሻ አካላት በጋራ መስራት አስፈላጊ ነው።
en: That's why it's important for stakeholders to work together to ensure the success of the Startup Act.
ha: Don haka, yana da kyau masu ruwa da tsaki su haɗa kai don tabbatar da nasarar dokar fara aiki.
sw: Ndiyo maana ni muhimu kwa wadau kufanya kazi kwa pamoja ili kuhakikisha mafanikio ya sheria ya miradi.
yo: Ìdí nìyẹn tí ó fi ṣe pàtàkì fún àwọn òpómúléró láti jọ ṣiṣẹ́ papọ̀ láti jẹ́ kí àṣeyọrí Startup Act ó ṣeéṣe.
zu: Yingakho kubalulekile ukuthi ababambiqhaza basebenzisane ukuze kuqinisekiswe impumelelo yoMthetho Wamabhizinisi asaqala.

am: በተጨማሪም ስብሰባው ማርከስ ዋውሽኩንን፣ ዘላቂ የኢኮኖሚ ልማት ክላስተር (ሴዴክ) አስተባባሪ፣ ጂአይዜድ ናይጄሪያ እና ኢንጋ ስቴፋኖቪች፣ የሴክሽን፣ የአረንጎዴ እና ዲጂታል ኢኮኖሚ፣ የኢዩ ልዑካን ወደ ናይጄሪያ እና ኢኮዋስ አድራሻዎች ነበሩት።
en: The session also had addresses from Markus Wauschkuhn, Sustainable Economic Development Cluster (SEDEC) coordinator, GIZ Nigeria, and Inga Stefanowicz, Head of Section, Green and Digital Economy, EU Delegation to Nigeria and the ECOWAS.
ha: Har ila yau zaman ya samu jawabai daga Markus Wauschkuhn, mai gudanar da Ƙungiyar Bunƙasa Tattalin Arziki mai Ɗorewa (SEDEC), GIZ Nigeria, da Inga Stefanowicz, Shugaban Sashin Tattalin Arziki na Green and Digital, wakilan EU zuwa Nijeriya da ECOWAS.
sw: Kikao hicho pia kilikuwa na hotuba kutoka kwa Markus Wauschkuhn, mratibu wa kundi endelevu la maendeleo ya kiuchumi (SEDEC), GIZ Nigeria, na Inga Stefanowicz, Mkuu wa sehemu, uchumi wa kijan na kidijitali, mjumbe wa EU nchini Nigeria na ECOWAS.
yo: Markus Wauschkuhn, olùṣàkóso ní Sustainable Economic Development Cluster (SEDEC), GIZ Nigeria, àti Inga Stefanowicz, Olórí Ẹ̀ka ní Green and Digital Economy, Aṣojú EU wá sí Nigeria àti ECOWAS náà sọ̀rọ̀ níbi ìjokòó náà.
zu: Iseshini iphinde yaba namakheli avela ku-Markus Wauschkuhn, umxhumanisi we-Sustainable Economic Development Cluster (SEDEC), e-GIZ Nigeria, kanye no-Inga Stefanowicz, iNhloko Yesigaba sehhovisi, e-Green and Digital Economy, Izithunywa ze-EU eNigeria kanye ne-ECOWAS.

am: የኒትዳ ዳይሬክቶሬት ጄኔራል ዳይሬክተር ልዩ አማካሪ ዶ/ር አሚኑ ሎውአል ሙሐመድ በናይጀሪያ የመጀመር አዋጅና በናይጀሪያ በዲጂታል ሽግግር ላይ ስለሚያስከትለው ውጤት ሰፊ ንግግር አድርገዋል።
en: Dr. Aminu Lawal Muhammad, Special Adviser to the Director General of NITDA on digital transformation, spoke extensively on the Nigeria Startup Act and its effects on digital transformation in Nigeria.
ha: Dokta Aminu Lawal Muhammad, mai Bayar da Shawara na Musamman ga Darakta Janar na NITDA a kan canjin dijital, ya yi magana mai zurfi game da dokar fara aikin Nijeriya da tasirinta ga canjin dijital a Nijeriya.
sw: Dk, Aminu Lawai Mohammad, Mshauri maalum wa mkurugenzi mkuu wa NITDA kuhusu mabadiliko ya kidijitali, alizungumza kwa kina kuhusu sheria ya miradi nchini Nigeria na athari zake kwenye mabadiliko ya kidijitali nchini Nigeria.
yo: Dr. Aminu Lawal Muhammad, Olùdámọ̀ràn Pàtàkì sí Adarí-Àgbà ní NITDA lórí Ìmáyìídà bá Ẹ̀rọ Ayélujára, sọ̀rọ̀ kíkún nípa Nigeria Startup Act àti àwọn ipa rẹ̀ lórí ìmáyìídà bá ẹ̀rọ ayélujára ní Nigeria.
zu: UDkt. Aminu Lawal Muhammad, Umeluleki Okhethekile Womqondisi Jikelele we-NITDA mayelana nokuguqulwa kwedijithali, ukhulume kakhulu ngoMthetho Wamabhizinisi asaqala waseNigeria kanye nemiphumela yawo ekuguqulweni kwedijithali eNigeria.

am: በተከናወነው ስራ ላይ ውይይት ያደረጉ ሲሆን፣ ቀጣይነት ያለው ስራና ድጋፍ ከኒትዳ መምጣቱንም አክለዋል።
en: He discussed the work that has been done, adding that continuous work and support will continue to come from NITDA.
ha: Ya tattauna a kan ayyukan da aka yi, inda ya ƙara da cewa za a ci gaba da gudanar da ayyuka da tallafi daga NITDA.
sw: Alizungumzia kazi ambayo imefanywa, na kuongeza kuwa kazi endelevu na msaada utaendelea kutoka NITDA.
yo: Ó sọ̀rọ̀ nípa iṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ti ṣe, tí ó sì ṣe àfikún pé iṣẹ́ àti ìrànwọ́ lemọ́lemọ́ yóò tún tẹ̀síwájú láti ọ̀dọ̀ NITDA.
zu: Uxoxe ngomsebenzi osuwenziwe, wengeza ngokuthi umsebenzi oqhubekayo nokwesekwa kuzoqhubeka kuvela kwa-NITDA.

am: የናይጄሪያ የመጀመር አዋጅ የመንግሥት ጉዲፈቻ መሪ የሆኑት ትሬሲ ኦኮሮ አይዛክ፣ ፈቃደኛ ሠራተኞች ከቀረበላቸው ጥሪ አንስቶ ድንበሮችን የማያቋርጥ ግፊት እስከማድረግና ድርጊቱ ከመፈረሙ በፊት ጉልህ ስፍራ በሚሆኑ ክንውኖች ላይ ጉልህ ስፍራ በሚሆኑ ክንውኖች ላይ እስከተከናወኑት ክንውኖች ድረስ የናይጄሪያን የመጀመር ሕግ በመምራት ተሰብሳቢዎቹን አሳልፈዋል።
en: Tracy Okoro-Isaac, State Adoption Lead for the Nigeria Startup Act, took the audience through the journey that led to the Nigeria Startup Act, from the call for volunteers to the continuous pushing of boundaries and accomplishment of milestones upon milestones leading up to the signing of the act.
ha: Tracy Okoro-Isaac, Shugabar Tallafawa Jiha don Dokar Farawa ta Nijeriya, ta jagoranci yiwa masu sauraro bayanin yadda ta kasance har aka samu dokar fara masana'anta ta aiki a Nijeriya, tun daga kiran masu aikin sa kai zuwa ci gaba da tura iyakoki da cim ma ci gaban da aka samu tun kafin sanya hannu na aikin.
sw: Tracy Okoro-Isaac, Kiongozi wa Jimbo la Kuasili Sheria ya Kuanzisha Nigeria, apitisha hadhira katika safari iliyopelekea Sheria ya Kuanzisha Nigeria, kutoka kwa wito wa watu waliyojitolea hadi kuendelea kusukuma mipaka na kufanikiwa kwa hatua muhimu kabla ya kusainiwa kwa sheria.
yo: Tracy Okoro-Isaac, Adarí Ìmúṣiṣẹ́ ní Ìlú fún Nigeria Startup Act, fi ọ̀nà tí ó mú Nigeria Startup Act wáyé han àwọn olùgbọ́, bẹ̀rẹ̀ láti ìpè fún àwọn olùfarasìnlọ́fẹ̀ẹ́ sí ṣíṣe àtìlẹ́yìn aláìlópin láti jákùn àwọn ìdènà àti ṣíṣe àṣeyọrí ìgbésẹ̀ onídàgbàsókè kan sí òmíràn tí ó fi dé orí bíbu ọwọ́ lu òfin náà.
zu: U-Tracy Okoro-Isaac, Ohola I-State Adoption for the Nigeria Startup Act, uthathe izethameli ohambweni oluholele kuMthetho Wokuqala waseNigeria, kusukela ekubizweni kwamavolontiya ukuya ekusebenzeni kanzima kanye nokufezwa kwezinyathelo ezibalulekile eziholela ekusayineni umthetho.

am: አንዳንድ የድርጊቱን ድንጋጌዎች ጠቅለል አድርገው ገልጸው፣ ጅምሮዎችን በእጅጉ ተጠቃሚ ለማድረግ ታስቦ የተዘጋጀ እንደሆነና ድርጊቱ ሁሉንም ባለድርሻ አካላት ተጠያቂ የሚያደርግ በመሆኑ መንግሥት በንቃት እየደገፋቸው መሆኑን ገልጸዋል።
en: She summarised some of the provisions of the act, adding that it was designed to greatly benefit startups and that the government is actively supporting them given that the act holds all stakeholders accountable.
ha: Ta taƙaita wasu tanade-tanaden dokar, inda ta ƙara da cewa an tsara shi ne domin amfanar masu sana’o’i sosai kuma gwamnati na ba su goyon baya sosai ganin cewa dokar ta ɗorawa duk masu ruwa da tsaki.
sw: Alifupisha muhtasari wa baadhi ya vifungu vya sheria hiyo, na kuongeza kuwa iliundwa ili kuwanufaisha sana miradi na kuwa serikali inawaunga mkono kwa dhati kulingana na kwamba sheria hiyo inawajibisha wadau wote.
yo: Ó ṣe ìsọníṣọ́kí díẹ̀ nínú àwọn ìgbàláàyè òfin náà, tí ó ń ṣe àfikún pé wọ́n ṣètò òfin náà láti ṣe àǹfààní tí ó pọ̀ fún àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ ni, àti pé ìjọba ń ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn gidi fún wọn ni níwọ̀n ìgbà tí òfin náà yóò bá ti jẹ́ kí gbogbo àwọn òpómúléró ṣe ìdúró ni.
zu: Ufingqa ezinye zezinhlinzeko zalo mthetho, wengeza ngokuthi uklanyelwe ukuzuzisa kakhulu amabhizinisi asaqala nokuthi uhulumeni uyabeseka njengoba lo mthetho ubeka zonke izinhlaka ezithintekayo.

am: በጀስቲና ኦሃ፣ መስራች እና ዋና ዲኦ፣ ዲጂታል ኢኪቲ አፍሪካ፣ በየፓነል ተሳታፊዎች አሚና ላዋል፣የዴቭ ኦፕስ መሐንዲስ፣ ሆትስፔስ ጋር የተስተካከለ የፓነል ክፍለ ጊዜ፣ ኢድ ኡኒከሂ፣ መስራች፣ ዜዲ አፍሪካ; ኢንጂነር ያኩቡ ሙሳ፣ አገራዊ አስተባባሪ፣ ኦንዲ ኒታዳ፣ የአፈጻጸም ኮሚቴው ተባባሪ ሊቀመንበር አማል ሀሰን፣ ቻርለስ ኤምኤምቦሉ፣ ተባባሪ መስራችና ዳይሬክተር፣ ሮር ናይጀሪያ ሃብ፤ እና አሚና ሎውአል፣ የዲቮፕስ ኢንጂነር እና ተባባሪ መስራች ሆስትስፔስ፣ የናይጀሪያ መነሻ ህግ በፈጠራ ላይ የሚያሳድረውን ተፅእኖ በጥልቀት ውስጥ ጠልቀው ገቡ።
en: A panel session moderated by Justina Oha, Founder and CEO, Digital Equity Africa, with panellists Amina Lawal, DevOps Engineer, Hostspace; Ized Uanikhehi, Founder, Zedi Africa; Engineer Yakubu Musa, Acting National Coordinator, ONDI NITDA; Amal Hassan, Co-vice chair of the implementation committee; Charles Emembolu, co-founder and director, Roar Nigeria Hub; and Amina Lawal, DevOps Engineer and Co-founder, Hostspace, took a deep dive into the impact of the Nigeria Startup Act on the innovation-driven economy.
ha: Wani zaman taron wanda Justina Oha, Wanda ya kafa kuma Shugaban, Digital Equity Africa, ya jagoranta, tare da mambobin ƙungiya Amina Lawal, Injiniya DevOps, Hostspace; Ized Uanikhehi, Wanda ya kafa, Zedi Africa; Injiniya Yakubu Musa, muƙaddashin mai gudanarwa na ƙasa, ONDI NITDA; Amal Hassan, mataimakiyar shugaban kwamitin aiwatarwa; Charles Emembolu, wanda ya kafa kuma darakta, Roar Nigeria Hub; da Amina Lawal, Injiniya na DevOps kuma Abokin-Samarwa, Hostspace, sun yi cikakken bayani game da tasirin Dokar Farawa ta Nijeriya ga tattalin arzikin da ke haifar da ƙirƙire-ƙirƙire.
sw: Kikao cha jopo kilichosimamiwa na Justina Oha, Mwanzilishi na Mkurugenzi Mtendaji wa Digital Equity Africa, na wanajopo Amina Lawal, Muhandisi wa DayOps, Hostspace; Ized Uanikhehi, Mwanzilishi, Zedi Africa, Mhandisi Yakubu Musa, Kaimu Mratibu wa Taifa, ONDI NITDA, Amal Hassan, Makamu Mwenyekiti wa kamati ya utekelezaji; Charles Emembolu, mwanzilishi mwenza na mkurugenzi, Roar Nigeria Hub: na Amina Lawal, Mhandisi na Mwanzilishi Mwenza wa DevOPS, Hostspace, walichukua mbizi ya kina katika athari za Sheria ya Kuanzisha Nigeria kwenye uchumi unaoendeshwa na uvumbuzi.
yo: Ìjokòó ìgbìmọ̀ kan tí Justina Oha, Olùdásílẹ̀ àti Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Digital Equity Africa, ṣe àmójútó rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú Amina Lawal, Onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ Ìṣẹ̀dá ohun-èlò Àìrídìmú adáṣiṣẹ́ ní Hostspace; Ized Uanikhehi, Olùdásílẹ̀ Zedi Africa; Engineer Yakubu Musa, Adelé Olùṣàkóso ní Orílẹ̀-èdè ní ONDI NITDA; Amal Hassan, Alájọṣegbákejì ìgbìmọ̀ amúṣẹ́ṣe; Charles Emembolu, alájọdásílẹ̀ àti olùdarí ní Roar Nigeria Hub; àti Amina Lawal, Onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ Ìṣẹ̀dá ohun-èlò Àìrídìmú adáṣiṣẹ́ àti Alájọdásílẹ̀ ní Hostspace, tí wọ́n jẹ́ ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ìgbìmọ̀ ni wọ́n jọ sọ̀rọ̀ ní kíkún nípa ipa tí Nigeria Startup Act ní lórí ọrọ̀ ajé tí ọgbọ́n ìṣẹ̀dá ń darí.
zu: Iseshini yephaneli eyenganyelwe ngu-Justina Oha, Umsunguli kanye ne-CEO, we-Digital Equity Africa, enamaphaneli u-Amina Lawal, Unjiniyela we-DevOps, I-Hostspace; u-Ized Uanikhehi, Umsunguli, we-Zedi Afrika; Unjiniyela u-Yakubu Musa, Ibamba Lomxhumanisi Kazwelonke, ONDI NITDA; U-Amal Hassan, Isekela likasihlalo wekomidi elisetshenziswayo; UCharles Emembolu, umsunguli kanye nomqondisi, we-Roar Nigeria Hub; kanye no-Amina Lawal, Unjiniyela we-DevOps kanye nomsunguli, we-Hostspace, bangene ngokujulile kumthelela we-Nigeria Startup Act emnothweni oqhutshwa izinto ezintsha.

am: አማል ይህ ድርጊት የጀመሩ መሥራቾች ጥበቃ እንደሚያደርግላቸውና በዕድሜ የገፉ የንግድ ድርጅቶች መጀመሪያ ላይ የንግድ ድርጅቷን እንደ ምሳሌ በመጠቀም ምን ዓይነት ድጋፍ ሊሰጣቸው እንደሚችል ስለሰጣቸው አንዳንድ ጥቅሞችን ተወያየች፣ ገና ጅማሮ ላይ ያል ቮንቸር በመጠቀም ።
en: Amal discussed some of the benefits of the act given that it protects startup founders and provides them with the kind of support older businesses would have loved to have when they started out, using her early business venture as an example.
ha: Amal ta tattauna a kan wasu alfanun da wannan dokar ke da shi ganin cewa yana kare waɗanda suka kafa sana’o’i da kuma ba su irin tallafin da tsofaffin ‘yan kasuwa za su so su samu a lokacin da suka fara, inda ta yi amfani da sana’arta ta farko a matsayin misali.
sw: Amal alijadili baadhi ya manufaa ya kikao hicho kwa kuzingatia kuwa kinawalinda waanzilishi wanaoanzisha biashara na kuwapa aina ya usaidizi ambayo wafanyabiashara wakubwa wangependa kuwa nayo wakati wanaanza, alitumia ubia wake aliyoanza nao kama mfano.
yo: Amal sọ̀rọ̀ nípa àwọn àǹfààní òfin náà kan tí yóò dáàbò bo àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ tí yóò sì fún wọn ní irú ìrànlọ́wọ́ tí àwọn òkòwò tí wọ́n ti wà tipẹ́ ò bá ti fẹ́ kí wọ́n rí nígbà tí wọ́n ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ ń dìde bọ̀, tí ó sì lo òkòwò àkọ́ṣe rẹ̀ ṣe àpèjúwe.
zu: U-Amal uxoxe ngezinye zezinzuzo zalesi senzo uma kubhekwa ukuthi sivikela abasunguli abasaqala amabhizinisi futhi sibanikeze uhlobo lokusekelwa amabhizinisi amadala abengathanda ukuba nalo lapho eqala, esebenzisa ibhizinisi lakhe lokuqala njengesibonelo.

am: አሚና ቀጣይነት ያለው ስልጠና ና ለሰለጠኑት ግለሰቦቹ ስራ መስጠት አስፈላጊ መሆኑን ለመጠቆም ችላለች።
en: Amina was able to point out the need for continuous training and the provision of jobs for the trained individuals.
ha: Amina ta iya nuna buƙatar cigaba da samun horo da kuma samar da ayyukan yi ga waɗanda aka horar.
sw: Amina aliweza kuonyesha hitaji la mafunzo endelevu na utoaji wa kazi kwa watu waliyofunza.
yo: Amina tọ́ka sí ìdí tí ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àláìdáwọ́dúró ṣe ṣe pàtàkì àti ìpèsè iṣẹ́ fún àwọn èèyàn tí wọ́n ti kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ náà.
zu: U-Amina wakwazi ukuveza isidingo sokuqeqeshwa okuqhubekayo kanye nokuhlinzekwa kwemisebenzi kubantu abaqeqeshiwe.

am: በተጨማሪም ምቹ ሁኔታ መፍጠርና በቴክኖሎጂ የተሰማሩ የንግድ ድርጅቶች እድገት እንዲያደርጉ አስፈላጊውን መሰረተ ልማት ማዘጋጀት አስፈላጊ መሆኑንም ጠይቃለች።
en: She also called for the need to create an enabling environment and provide the necessary infrastructure for tech-enabled businesses to thrive.
ha: Ta kuma yi kira da a samar da yanayi mai dacewa da samar da abubuwan more rayuwa da ake buƙata domin sana’o’in da ke amfani da fasahar zamani su bunƙasa.
sw: Pia alitoa wito ka haja ya kutengeneza mazingira wezeshi na kutoa miundo mbinu muhimu kwa biashara zinazotegemea teknolojia ili kustawi.
yo: Ó tún ṣe àkíyèsí ìnílò láti ṣẹ̀dá agbègbè iṣẹ́ onígbàláàyè àti láti pèsè amúṣẹ́dẹrùn pàtàkì fún àwọn òkòwò alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ láti yè.
zu: Uphinde wacela isidingo sokwakha indawo evumayo kanye nokuhlinzeka ngengqalasizinda edingekayo ukuze amabhizinisi anikwe amandla ezobuchwepheshe athuthuke.

am: ሙሳ ፣ከኒትዳ አቋም በመነሳት ከመንግስት መንግስታት ጋር በመሆን የናይጄሪያን የመጀመርያ አዋጅ በየደረጃው በዲጂታል ትራንስፎርሜሽን እቅዳቸው ተግባራዊ እንዲያደርጉ ለማድረግ እየሰሩ መሆናቸውን ተናግረዋል።
en: Musa, speaking from NITDA’s position, said that they are working with state governments to get them to implement the Nigerian Startup Act in their respective digital transformation plans.
ha: Musa, wanda yake magana a kan matsayin NITDA, ya ce suna aiki tare da gwamnatocin jihohi don ganin sun aiwatar da dokar fara aiki ta Nijeriya a cikin tsare-tsarensu na sauya fasalin dijital.
sw: Musa, alizungumzia kutokana na cheo chake chaNITDA, alisema kuwa wanafanya kazi na serikali za majimbo ili kuwafanya watekeleze sheria ya miradi nchini kulingana na mipango yao ya mabadiliko ya kidijitali.
yo: Musa, tí ó ń fi ìwòye NITDA sọ̀rọ̀, wí pé àwọn ń ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú àwọn ìjọba ìpínlẹ̀ láti jẹ́ kí wọ́n mú Nigeria Startup Act ṣiṣẹ́ nínú ọ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan àwọn ètò ìmáyìídà bá ẹ̀rọ ayélujára wọn.
zu: UMusa, ekhuluma esikhundleni se-NITDA, uthe basebenzisana nohulumeni wezifundazwe ukuze bathole ukuthi basebenzise uMthetho Wokuqala amabhizinisi waseNigeria ezinhlelweni zabo zokuguqula idijithali.

am: ሀገራቱን ጀማሪዎች በመጠቀም ፣እንደ ንድፍ በመጠቀም የየራሳቸውን ጅምላ ተግባር እንዲፈጥሩ ለማድረግ እየሰሩ መሆኑን ተናግረዋል።
en: He said they are working to get the states to create their own startup acts, using the national startup act as a blueprint.
ha: Ya ce suna bakin ƙoƙarinsu don ganin jihohi su ƙirƙiro nasu ayyukan fara aiki, ta hanyar amfani da tsarin fara aiki na ƙasa a matsayin tsari.
sw: Alisema wanafanya kazi ya kushauri majimbo kuunda sheria zao za miradi, kwa kutumia sheria ya miradi ya kitaifa kama mwongozo.
yo: Ó wí pé àwọn ń ṣiṣẹ́ láti mú kí àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ náà ṣẹ̀dá àwọn òfin ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ tiwọn, kí wọ́n fi òfin orílẹ̀-èdè lórí ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ ṣe àwòṣe.
zu: Uthe basebenzela ukuthi izifundazwe ziqale owabo umththo wokuqala amabhizinisi, zisebenzisa umthetho wokuqala amabhizinisi kazwelonke njengohlelo.

am: ኢዜድ ሁሉም ድርሻ ያላቸው ሰዎች በሚገኙበት እና መንግስት ተሳትፎን በሚጨምርበት እና አመኔታ መገንባቱን በሚቀጥልባቸው የአካባቢው ማኅበረሰቦች ውስጥ ተሳትፎ እንዲጨምር ጠይቋል።
en: Ized called for increased participation in local communities where all stakeholders are present and the government increases engagement and continues to build trust.
ha: Ized ya yi kira da a ƙara shiga cikin al'ummomin yankin inda duk masu ruwa da tsaki ke halarta kuma gwamnati ta ƙara yin aiki wajen janyo mutane da ci gaba da samar da yanayi na amana.
sw: Ized, alitoa wito wa kuongezeka kwa ushirikishwaji katika jumuiya za wenyeji ambazo washikadau wote wapo na serikali inaongeza ushirikishaji na inaendelea kujenga uaminifu.
yo: Ized ṣe ìpè fún àlékún nínú ìkópa ní àwọn agbègbè ìbílẹ̀ níbi tí gbogbo àwọn òpómúléró ti pésẹ̀ àti pé kí ìjọba ṣe àfikún ìdásí àti láti túbọ̀ máa ṣẹ̀dá ìfọkàntán.
zu: U-Ized unxuse ukuthi kukhuliswe ukubamba iqhaza emiphakathini yendawo lapho bonke ababambiqhaza bekhona futhi nohulumeni andisa ukuxoxisana futhi eqhubeka nokwakha ukwethembana.

am: የቡድኑ አባላትና ታዳሚዎቹ፣ እያንዳንዱ ዜጋ በድርጊቱ ውስጥ የራሱ ድርሻ ስላለው፣ መንግሥት ብቻውን ሊሰራው እንደማይችል በመጥቀስ በድርጊቱ ውስጥ ያሉት ባለድርሻ አካላት በሙሉ ሙሉ በሙሉ መገናኘት እንዳለባቸው ተስማምተዋል።
en: The panellists and the audience agreed that all the stakeholders in the act need to meet each other fully because each citizen has a stake in the act, citing that the government cannot do it alone.
ha: Jagororin taron da mahalarta taron sun amince da cewa duk masu ruwa da tsaki a harkar akwai buƙatar su gana da juna sosai domin kowane ɗan ƙasa yana da ruwa da tsaki a harkar, inda suka ce gwamnati ba za ta iya yin shi ita kaɗai ba.
sw: Wanakamati na hadhira walikubaliana kuwa wadau wote kwenye hiyo sheria wanatakiwa kukutana kikamilifu kwa sababu kila mwananchi ana mchango kwenye hiyo sheria, huku wakieleza kuwa serikali peke yake ndiyo ambayo haiwezi kufanya hivyo.
yo: Àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ìgbìmọ̀ àti àwọn olùgbọ́ ni wọ́n jọ fi ohùn ṣọ̀kan pé gbogbo àwọn òpómúléró nínú òfin náà ni wọ́n ní láti pàdé kí wọ́n mọra dáadáa nítorí pé ọ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè náà ni wọ́n ní ìpín nínú òfin náà, tí ó sì wí pé ìjọba nìkan ò lè dá a ṣe.
zu: Abakwiphaneli nezethameli bavumelene ngokuthi bonke abathintekayo kulo mthetho kumele bahlangane ngokugcwele ngoba isakhamuzi ngasinye sinesandla kulo mthetho, sathi uhulumeni akakwazi ukukwenza yedwa.

am: ስለዚህ ድርጊቱ ስኬታማ መሆኑ የተመካው በሁሉም የሚመለከተቸው አካላት የማያቋርጥ ትብብር ላይ ነው ።
en: So the success of the act will depend on the continuous collaboration of all stakeholders.
ha: Don haka, nasarar aikin za ta dogara ne a kan ci gaba da haɗin guiwar duk masu ruwa da tsaki.
sw: Mafanikio ya sheria hiyo yatategemea ushirikiano endelevu wa wadau wote.
yo: Nítorí àṣeyọrí òfin náà yóò rọ̀ mọ́ ìfọwọ́sowọ́pọ̀ àláìdáwọ́dúró gbogbo àwọn òpómúléró gan.
zu: Ngakho impumelelo yesenzo izoncika ekubambisaneni okuqhubekayo kwabo bonke ababambiqhaza.

am: ቻርልስ ተጨማሪ የአካባቢው ኢንቨስትመንት እንዲኖርና የአካባቢው ኢንቨስትመንቶች በአካባቢው ኢንቨስትመንት እንዲያደርጉ የሚያነሳሱበት ሁኔታ እንዲቋቋም ጠይቋል ።
en: Charles called for more local investment and the creation of an enabling environment to incentivize local investors to invest in local startups.
ha: Charles ya yi kira da a ƙara saka hannun jari a cikin gida da samar da yanayi mai dacewa don zaburar da masu zuba jari na cikin gida su saka hannun jari a cikin kamfanoni masu farowa na gida.
sw: Charles alitoa wito wa uwekezaji wa ndani na kutengeneza mazingira wezeshi ili kuhamasisha wawekezaji wa ndani kuwekeza kwenye biashara za ndani.
yo: Charles pè fún ìkówólókòwò ìbílẹ̀ àti ìṣẹ̀dá agbègbè iṣẹ́ onígbàláàyè láti ṣe kóríyá fún àwọn olùkówólókòwò ìbílẹ̀ láti kówó lé òkòwò àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ ìbílẹ̀.
zu: U-Charles ucele ukutshalwa kwezimali okwengeziwe kwendawo nokwakha kwendawo eyenza kusebenzeke ukuze kugqugquzelwe abatshalizimali bendawo ukuthi batshale izimali kumabhizinisi asaqala asekhaya.

am: በተጨማሪም ኢዜድ የናይጄሪያን የመጀመር ሕግ ከሚቃረኑ አዳዲስ ፖሊሲዎች እንዲጠበቁ መንግሥት ጥሪ አቅርቧል።
en: Ized also called for the government to ensure that startups are protected from new policies that may contradict the Nigeria Startup Act.
ha: Ized ya kuma yi kira ga gwamnati da ta tabbatar da cewa an kare masu farawa daga sababbin tsare-tsare da ka iya cin karo da dokar fara aikin Nijeriya.
sw: Ized, pia alitoa wito kwa serikali kuhakikisha kuwa wanailinda miradi dhidi ya sera mpya ambazo zinaweza kupingana na sheria ya miradi nchini.
yo: Ized tún pè ìjọba láti ṣe àrídájú pé àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ rí ààbò kúrò lọ́wọ́ àwọn òfin tuntun tí ó lè yapa Nigeria Startup Act.
zu: U-Ized uphinde wacela uhulumeni ukuthi aqinisekise ukuthi amabhizinisi asaqala ayavikeleka kuzinqubomgomo ezintsha ezingase zingqubuzane noMthetho Wokuqala amabhizinisi waseNigeria.

am: ኦስቫልት ጉባዲያ፣ ናይጀሪያ የጀርምአፕ ማስፈፀሚያ ኮሚቴ መሪ፣ ለውይይቱ አስተዋፅኦ አድርገዋል፤ በድርጊቱ ድንጋጌ መሰረት ሃላፊነታቸው መሆኑን ግምት ውስጥ በማስገባት የጀማሪ ድርጅት አዋጁን በሀገሪቱ እንዲፀድቅ የማድረግ ሃላፊነት በኒቲዳ ዴስክ ላይ ነው ብለዋል።
en: Oswald Guobadia, Nigeria Startup Implementation Committee Lead, contributed to the conversation, saying that responsibility lies on the desk of NITDA to increase state adoption of the Startup Act given that it’s their responsibility according to the provisions of the act.
ha: Oswald Guobadia, Shugaban Kwamitin Fara Aiwatarwa a Nijeriya, ya ba da gudummawa ga tattaunawar, yana mai cewa alhakin ya rataya ne a wuyan Hukumar NITDA na ƙara daukar matakin aiwatar da Dokar Farawa a jihohi ganin cewa alhakinsu ne bisa tanadin dokar.
sw: Oswald Guobadia, Kiongozi wa Kamati ya uUtekelezaji wa Nigeria, alichangia kwa kusema katika mazungumzo hayo, akisema kuwa jukumu liko kwenye dawati la NITDA, Kuongeza hali ya kupitishwa kwa Sheria ya Uanzishaji ikizingatiwa kuwa ni wajibu wao kwa mujibu wa vifungu vya sheria.
yo: Oswald Guobadia, Adarí Ìgbìmọ̀ Ìmúṣiṣẹ́ Nigeria Startup, náà dá sí ọ̀rọ̀ náà, ó wí pé iṣẹ́ náà ti di ti NITDA láti ṣe àlékún ìmúṣiṣẹ́ Startup Act náà ní ìpínlẹ̀ níwọ̀n ìgbà tí ó jẹ́ pé iṣẹ́ wọn ni gẹ́gẹ́ bí òfin náà ti ṣe sọ.
zu: U-Oswald Guobadia, Umholi weKomidi Lokuqala Lokuqala amabhizinisi ENigeria, uphawulile engxoxweni, wathi umthwalo usuku-NITDA ukukhulisa ukwamukelwa koMthetho Wokuqala mamabhizinisi njengoba kungumthwalo wabo ngokuvumelana nezinhlinzeko zezomthetho.

am: ስብሰባው ሊደመደም በተቃረበበት ወቅት ትኩረት የሰጠ የቡድን ውይይት ተደረገ ።
en: As the event was drawing to a close, a focus group discussion was held.
ha: A yayin da taron ke ƙara kusantowa, an gudanar da taron tattaunawa na rukuni.
sw: walipokuwa wakikaribia kufunga kikao, walijikita kwenye mjadala wa kundi.
yo: Bí ìpàdé náà ṣe ti ń lọ sí òpin, ìtàkúrọ̀sọ aláfojúsùn ìgbìmọ̀ tún wáyé.
zu: Njengoba umcimbi usuya ngasemaphethelweni, kwaba nengxoxo yeqembu.

am: ተሳታፊዎቹ በአራት ቡድኖች ተከፋፍለው የተሳታፊ የፖሊሲ አፈጻጸም ማዕቀፍ እንዲዳብር ግንዛቤ ለመሰብሰብ ታቅደዋል።
en: The participants were broken into four groups with the aim of gathering insights for the development of a participatory policy implementation framework.
ha: An raba mahalarta gida huɗu da nufin tattara bayanai don bunƙasa tsarin aiwatar da manufofin shiga.
sw: Washiriki waligawanywa katika makundi manne kwa lengo la kukusanya maarifa kwa ajili ya kutengeneza mfumo shirikishi wa utekelezaji wa sera.
yo: Wọ́n pín àwọn olùkópa sí ìgbìmọ̀ mẹ́rin pẹ̀lú àfojúsùn láti ṣe àgbàjọ òye fún ìdàgbàsókè ìlànà iṣẹ́ òfin ìmúṣẹ́ṣe oníkòópa.
zu: Ababambiqhaza bahlukaniswa baba ngamaqembu amane ngenhloso yokuqoqa imininingwane yokwakhiwa kohlaka lokusetshenziswa kwenqubomgomo yokubamba iqhaza.

am: እያንዳንዱ ቡድን የልማት ሂደቶች፣ ባለድርሻ አካላት፣ የአቅም ግንባታ፣ የፖሊሲ አፈጻጸም፣ ቴክኖሎጂ እንደ አቅራቢ፣ እንዲሁም የተጀመረውን ተግባር መከታተልና መገምገም ላይ ያተኮረ ነበር።
en: Each group focused on development processes, stakeholders, capacity building, policy implementation, technology as an enabler, and monitoring and evaluation of the startup act, respectively.
ha: Kowace ƙungiya ta mayar da hankali ne a kan hanyoyin ci gaba, masu ruwa da tsaki, haɓaka iya aiki, aiwatar da manufofi, fasaha a matsayin mai ba da izini, da saka idanu da kimanta aikin farawa, bi da bi.
sw: Kila kikundi kilizingatia michakato ya maendeleo, washikadau, kujenga uwezo, utekelezaji wa sera, teknolojia kama mwezeshaji, ufuatiliaji na tathimini ya sheria ya miradi mtawalia.
yo: Ọ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan àwọn ìgbìmọ̀ náà gbájú mọ́ àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ ìdàgbàsókè, àwọn òpómúléró, ìṣàkójọ agbára, ìmófinṣiṣẹ́, ìfìmẹ̀ẹ̀rọṣiṣẹ́, àti ṣíṣe àkóso àti àyẹ̀wò òfin ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ náà, ní ìtẹ̀léra.
zu: Iqembu ngalinye ligxile kuzinqubo zentuthuko, ababambiqhaza, ukwakhiwa kwamakhono, ukuqaliswa kwenqubomgomo, ubuchwepheshe njengokwenza amandla, nokuqapha nokuhlola ukuqalwa kwamabhizinisi, ngokulandelana.

am: እያንዳንዱ ቡድን በውይይቱ ወቅት የተወያዩበትን የመፍትሔ ሃሳብ አቅርቦ ነበር። ኒትዳ የሰጡንን አስተያየት መዝግቦ ይይዝ ነበር።
en: Each group presented their solutions, which were deliberated upon during the discussion, with NITDA taking note of the feedback.
ha: Kowace ƙungiya ta gabatar da hanyoyin magance su, wanda aka tattauna a yayin tattaunawar, tare da NITDA tana lura da ra'ayoyin.
sw: Kila kikundi kiliwasilisha masuluhisho yao, ambayo yalijadiliwa wakati wa majadiliano, NITDA walizingatia maoni.
yo: Ìgbìmọ̀ kọ̀ọ̀kan fi àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ wọn hàn, èyí tí wọ́n ti sọ̀rọ̀ lé lórí nínú ìtàkúrọ̀sọ náà, tí NITDA sì ń ṣe àkọsílẹ̀ àbọ̀ náà.
zu: Iqembu ngalinye lethule izixazululo zalo, okwaxoxwa ngazo ngesikhathi sengxoxo, i-NITDA yayibhala izimpendulo.

am: ውይይቱ የተጠናቀቀው የአቅም ግንባታ፣ ውጤታማ አስተያየት መስጠት፣ በሕዝብ እና በግል ድርጅቶች መካከል የበለጠ መተባበር፣ እና በናይጄሪያ የመጀመር አዋጅ ድንጋጌዎች ላይ የበለጠ ግንዛቤ እና ትምህርት እንዲሰጥ በሚጠየቁበት ጊዜ ነበር።
en: The dialogue came to a close with more calls for capacity building, effective feedback mechanisms, more engagement between public and private sector stakeholders, and increased awareness and education on the provisions of the Nigerian Startup Act.
ha: Tattaunawar ta zo ƙarshe ne tare da ƙarin kiraye-kirayen inganta iya aiki, ingantattun hanyoyin mayar da martani, da ƙara cuɗanya tsakanin masu ruwa da tsaki na gwamnati da masu zaman kansu, da ƙara wayar da kan jama'a da ilmantar da su kan tanade-tanaden Dokar farawa ta Nijeriya.
sw: Mazungumzo hayo yalifikia tamati huku kukiwa na wito zaidi wa kujenga uwezo, mbinu bora za kutoa maono, ushirikiano miongoni mwa wadau wa sekta za umma na binafsi, na kuongeza uelewa na elimu juu ya masharti ya sheria ya miradi nchini Nigeria.
yo: Ìtàkúrọ̀sọ náà wá sí òpin pẹ̀lú ìpè síwájú sí i fún ìṣàkójọ agbára, ọ̀nà iṣẹ́ ajábọ̀ dáadáa, ìbáṣe púpọ̀ sí i láàárín àwọn òpómúléró ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ ìjọba àti aládàáni, àti ètò ìpolongo àti ẹ̀kọ́ sí i lórí àwọn ìgbàláàyè Nigerian Startup Act.
zu: Inkhulumomphendvulwano ifike esiphethweni ngezingcingo ezengeziwe zokwakhiwa kwamakhono, izindlela ezisebenzayo zokuphendula, ukuxoxisana okwengeziwe phakathi kwababambiqhaza bemboni yomphakathi nezimele, nokwanda kokuqwashisa nokufundisa ngezinhlinzeko zoMthetho Wokuqala WaseNigeria.

am: ስለ ጂአይዚ/ዲቲሲ ናይጄሪያ፡
en: About GIZ/DTC Nigeria:
ha: Game da GIZ/DTC Nigeria:
sw: Kuhusu GIZ/DTC nchini Nigeria:
yo: Nípa GIZ/DTC:
zu: Mayelana ne-GIZ/DTC Nigeria:

am: ጂአይዚ/ዲጂታል ትራንስፎርሜሽን ማዕከል(ዲቲሲ) ናይጀሪያ በአውሮፓ ህብረትና በጀርመን ፌደራላዊ የኤኮኖሚ ትብብርና ልማት ሚኒስቴር (ቢኤምዜድ) በጋራ የሚደገፍ ሲሆን በዶይቸ ዓለም አቀፍ የትብብር ማኅበር (ጂአይዚ) በስራ ላይ ይውላሉ።
en: GIZ/Digital Transformation Center (DTC) Nigeria is jointly funded by the European Union and the German Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ), and it is implemented by Deutsche Gesellschaft fuer Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH.
ha: GIZ/Digital Transformation Center (DTC) Nigeria na samun tallafin haɗin guiwa ne daga Tarayyar Turai da Ma'aikatar Haɗin Kan Tattalin Arziƙi da Raya Ƙasa ta Jamus (BMZ), kuma Deutsche Gesellschaft fuer Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH ce ke aiwatar da ita.
sw: GIZ/kituo cha mabadiliko ya kidijitali(DTC) nchini Nigeria kinachofadhiliwa na Umoja wa Ulaya pamoja na Wizara ya shirikisho la Ujerumani ya ushirikiano wa uchumi na maendeleo (BMZ) na inatekelezwa na Deutsche Gesselschaft Fuer Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH.
yo: European Union àti German Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ) ni wọ́n jọ ń ṣèrànwọ́ owó fún GIZ/Digital Transformation Center (DTC) Nigeria, tí ó sì ń fi Deutsche Gesellschaft fuer Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH ṣiṣẹ́.
zu: I-GIZ/Digital Transformation Centre (i-DTC) yase-Nigeria ixhaswe ngemali ngokuhlanganyela ne-European Union kanye Nomnyango Wesifunda WaseJalimane Wokubambisana Kwezomnotho Nentuthuko (i-BMZ), futhi isetshenziswa yi-Deutsche Gesellschaft fuer Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH.

am: ዲቲሲ ናይጀሪያ ለዲጂታል ፈጠራ ሥነ ምህዳር እድገት የፖሊሲ አፈጻጸም፣ የድርጅቶች አፈጻጸም፣ እና ኔትዎርክ ለዲጂታል ኤኮኖሚ አገልግሎት አቅራቢዎች በመሆን አቅምን ማሻሻል፣ ለዲጂታል ኤኮኖሚ መረጃ ዕድገት ስኬል የሆኑ የዲጂታል መፍትሄዎችንና ብቃቶችን የማቅረብ ዓላማ አለው።
en: DTC Nigeria aims to improve the capacities of the digital innovation ecosystem—policy implementation, performance of organisations, and networks as service providers for the digital economy, offering scalable digital solutions and competencies—for the growth of the digital innovation ecosystem.
ha: DTC Nigeria tana da niyyar inganta iyawar tsarin yanayin na zamani—aiwatar da manufofi, aiwatar da ƙungiyoyi, da hanyoyin sadarwa a matsayin masu ba da sabis don tattalin arzikin dijital, suna ba da mafita da ƙwarewa na dijital—don haɓaka yanayin ƙirƙira na dijital.
sw: DTC Nigeria inalenga kuboresha uwezo wa mfumo wa ikolojia wa ubunifu wa kidijitali kwa kuzingatia utekelezaji wa sheria, utendaji wa mashirika na mitandao kama watoa huduma kwa uchumi wa kidijitali, kwa kutoa suluhisho na uwezo mkubwa wa kidijitali kwa ajili ya ukuaji wa mifumo ya ikolojia ya uvumbuzi wa kidijitali.
yo: DTC Nigeria ní àfojúsùn láti mú ipa àwùjọ ọgbọ́n ìṣẹ̀dá orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára— ìmófinṣiṣẹ́, iṣẹ́ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́, àti àwọn ìtakùn gẹ́gẹ́ bí i olùpèsè ìṣàsopọ̀ fún ọrọ̀ ajé orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára, pípèsè àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ àti ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára tí ó ṣeéṣe —fún ìdàgbàsókè àwùjọ ọgbọ́n ìṣẹ̀dá orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára.
zu: I-DTC Nigeria ihlose ukuthuthukisa amandla ohlelonhlaliswano yedijithali ukuqaliswa kwenqubomgomo, ukusebenza kwezinhlangano, namanethiwekhi njengabahlinzeki bezinsizakalo zomnotho wedijithali, enikeza izixazululo nekhono ledijithali elikhulayo—ukuze kukhule i-ecosystem yokusungulwa kwedijithali.

am: ፕሮጀክቱ በአዳዲስ ምህዳሩ ከናይጄሪያ ተዋናዮች ጋር በቅርበት ይሰራል፣ እንደ ብሔራዊ ኢንፎርሜሽንና ቴክኖሎጂ ልማት ኤጀንሲ (ኒትዳ)፣ የምርምር ተቋማት፣ ፈጠራ ጣቢያዎች፣ ሀብ መረብ፣ ጅማሮዎች፣ ኤምኤስኤስ እና ሴቶች ናቸው።
en: The project works closely with Nigerian actors in the innovation ecosystem, such as the National Information and Technology Development Agency (NITDA), research institutions, innovation hubs, hub networks, startups, MSMEs, and women.
ha: Aikin yana aiki kafaɗa da kafaɗa da fitattun ’yan Nijeriya a cikin tsarin ƙirƙire-ƙirƙire, kamar Hukumar Bunƙasa Fasahar Sadarwa ta Ƙasa (NITDA), cibiyoyin bincike, cibiyoyin ƙirƙire-ƙirƙire, cibiyoyin sadarwa, masu farawa, MSMEs, da kuma mata.
sw: Mradi huu unafanya kazi kwa karibu na waigizaji wa Nigeria kwenye mfumo ikolojia wa uvumbuzi, kama vile Wakala wa Kitaifa na Maendeleo yaHabari na Teknolojia (NITDA), taasisi za utafiti, vitovu vya uvumbuzi, mitandao ya kitovu, wanaoanza, MSMEs na wanawake.
yo: Iṣẹ́ àkànṣe náà ń ṣiṣẹ́ ní ìsúnmọ́ pẹ̀lú àwọn olùkópa ní àwùjọ ọgbọ́n ìṣẹ̀dá, bí i Àjọ Aṣètòìdàgbàsókè Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ Oníwìífún ní ilẹ̀ Nigeria lápapọ̀ (NITDA), àwọn ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ aṣèwádìí, àwọn ibùdó ọgbọ́n ìṣẹ̀dá, àwọn ìtakùn ibùdó, àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀, àwọn òkòwò wẹ́wẹ́, kéékéèké àti alábọ́dé, àti àwọn obìnrin.
zu: Le phrojekthi isebenzisana kakhulu nabalingisi baseNigeria kuhlelonhlaliswano yokuphilayo nokungaphili okusha, njenge-National Information and Technology Development Agency (i-NITDA), izikhungo zocwaningo, izindawo zokusungula izinto ezintsha, amanethiwekhi omphakathi, amabhizinisi asaqala, ama-MSME nabesifazane.

am: ኪዳክስ ለ5 ዓመታት ሲከበር ያከበረውን ክንውን መለስ ብለን እንመልከት
en: A Look Back At Quidax’s Milestones As It Celebrates 5 Years
ha: Waiwaye ga nasarorin Quidax Yayin da Yake Bikin Shekaru 5
sw: Kuangalia Nyuma kwa Maadhimisho ya Quidax Inapoazimisha Miaka 5.
yo: Ìbojúwẹ̀yìn wo àwọn Ìgbésẹ̀ Aláṣeyọrí tí Quidax ti ní Bí Ó ṣe ń ṣe Àjọyọ̀ Ọdún 5
zu: Ukubheka Emuva Ezindabeni Ze-Quidax Njengoba Igubha Iminyaka eyi-5

am: ኪዳክስ፣ አንድ አፍሪካዊ ክሪፕቶከረንሲ ልውውጥ, ኩባንያው በይፋ ሥራውን አምስተኛ ዓመት ሲከናውን አንድ ትልቅ ምዕራፍ ተከናውኗል።
en: Quidax, an African cryptocurrency exchange, has hit a major milestone as the company marks its fifth year of official operation.
ha: Kamfanin Quidax, na musayar cryptocurrency na Afirka, ya sami babban ci gaba yayin da kamfanin ke cika shekaru biyar na aiki a hukumance.
sw: Quidax, ubadilishanaji wa fedha fiche barani Afrika, umepiga hatua kubwa wakati kampuni hiyo inaadhimisha mwaka wake wa tano ya shughuli zake rasmi.
yo: Quidax, ìkànnì ìpààrọ̀ owó àkósódù ní ilẹ̀ Africa, ti ṣe àṣeyọrí pàtàkì bí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ti ṣe pé ọdún márùn-ún tí ó bẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú àṣẹ.
zu: I-Quidax, i-African cryptocurrency exchange, ifinyelele kwingqophamlando njengoba inkampani iqeda unyaka wayo wesihlanu isebenza ngokusemthethweni.

am: ይህን ስኬት ለማክበር ኪዳክስ ከነሐሴ 1 እስከ 7 ቀን ድረስ ለደንበኞቹ የናይራ ክምችቶችንና ማባበያዎችን በነፃ እያቀረበ ነው ።
en: To celebrate the achievement, Quidax is offering free Naira deposits and withdrawals to its customers from August 1st to 7th.
ha: Domin murnar nasarar da aka samu, Quidax yana bayar da ajiya na Naira kyauta da kuma cirewa ga abokan cinikinsa daga ranar 1 ga Agusta zuwa 7 ga Agusta.
sw: ili kusherehekea mafanikio hayo, Quidax inatoa zawadi kwa wateja wake ya kuweka fedha na kutoaa fedha bure kuanzia tarehe 1 hadi 7 Agosti.
yo: Láti wẹ àṣeyọrí yìí, Quidax ń pèsè ìsanwówọlé àti ìgbowójáde ọ̀fẹ́ ní Náírà fún àwọn oníbàárà rẹ̀ láti ọjọ́ kìn-ínní oṣù Kẹjọ sí ọjọ́ keje.
zu: Ukuze igubhe impumelelo, i-Quidax inikezela ngokufaka idiphozithi mahhala i-Naira kanye nokuhoxa kumakhasimende ayo kusukela ngomhlaka zi-1 zi-7 kuNcwaba.

am: በዚህ ጊዜ መካከል፣ ሁሉም ደንበኞች-አሮጌም ይሁን አዲስ- በሁሉም ኩባንያ ጣቢያዎች ላይ ናይራ በነጻ ማስቀመጥ እና ማውጣት ይችላሉ።
en: Between this period, all customers - whether old or new - will be able to deposit and withdraw Naira for free across all of the company’s channels.
ha: A tsakanin wannan lokacin, duk abokan ciniki - tsoho ko sabo - za su iya yin ajiya da cire Naira kyauta a duk tashoshin kamfanin.
sw: Katika kipindi hiki, wateja wote - wawe wa zamani au wapya- wataweza kuweka na kutoa fedha bila malipo bila malipo kwenye chanyeli zote za kampuni.
yo: Láàárín àkókò yìí, gbogbo àwọn oníbàárà - yálà àwọn àtijọ́ àbí àwọn tuntun - yóò lè ṣe ìsanwówọlé àti ìgbowójáde Náírà lọ́fẹ̀ẹ́ káàkiri gbogbo àwọn ìkànnì ilé-iṣẹ́ náà.
zu: Phakathi kwalesi sikhathi, wonke amakhasimende - kungakhathaliseki ukuthi amadala noma amasha - azokwazi ukufaka idiphozithi futhi akhiphe i-Naira mahhala kuzo zonke iziteshi zenkampani.

am: የተከናወነው ነገር ቀላል አይደለም ።
en: The accomplishment isn’t a minor one.
ha: Abin da aka cim mawa ba ƙarami ba ne.
sw: Mafanikio siyo madogo.
yo: Àṣeyọrí náà kì í ṣe kékeré.
zu: Ukuphumelela akuyona into encane.

am: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ የሥራ ስታቲስቲክስ ቢሮ ይፋዊ መረጃ እንደሚያሳየው 65% የሚሆኑት የንግድ ድርጅቶች በመጀመሪያዎቹ አምስት ዓመታት ውስጥ ሳይሳኩ ቀርተዋል።
en: Official data from the U.S. Bureau of Labour Statistics shows that 65% of businesses fail in the first five years.
ha: Bayanai na hukuma daga Ofishin Ƙididdiga na Ma'aikata na Amurka sun nuna cewa kashi 65% na kasuwancin sun gaza a cikin shekaru biyar na farko.
sw: Takwimu rasmi kuto kwenye ofisi ya takwimu za kazi ya Marekani zinaonyesha kuwa 65% ya biashara huwa inakufa katika miaka mitano ya kwanza.
yo: Dátà aláṣẹ láti US Bureau of Labour Statistics ṣe àfihàn pé ìdá 65% àwọn òkòwò ni wọ́n máa ń kùnà láàárín ọdún márùn-ún àkọ́kọ́.
zu: Imininingwane esemthethweni evela e-U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics ikhombisa ukuthi amabhizinisi angama-65% ayahluleka eminyakeni emihlanu yokuqala.

am: በተጨማሪም፣ ኪዳክስ ባለፉት ጥቂት ዓመታት ውስጥ የተለያዩ ተፈታታኝ ሁኔታዎችን መቋቋም ችሏል ።
en: And, Quidax has been able to fight through several challenges of its own in the past few years.
ha: Kuma, kamfanin Quidax ya sami damar yin yaƙi ta hanyar ƙalubale da yawa na kansa a cikin ‘yan shekarun da suka gabata.
sw: Na, Quidax imeweza kupambana na changamoto zake kadhaa ilizopitia miaka michache iliyopita.
yo: Tí Quidax sì ti ja àjàbọ́ kúrò lọ́wọ́ onírúurú àwọn ìpènijà tí ó kojú láàárín ìwọ̀nba ọdún tí ó kọjá.
zu: Futhi, i-Quidax ikwazile ukulwa nezinselelo zayo ezimbalwa eminyakeni embalwa edlule.

am: ኩባንያው ከሚያሳዝናቸው ወቅቶች መካከል አንዳንዶቹን እንመልከት።
en: Let’s walk through some of the company's most notable moments.
ha: Bari mu yi tafiya cikin wasu fitattun lokutan kamfanin.
sw: Hebu tupitie baadhi ya matukio mashuhurizaidi ya kampuni.
yo: Ẹ jẹ́ kí á wo díẹ̀ nínú àwọn àkókò pàtàkì tí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ti là kọjá.
zu: Ake sihambe ngezinye zezikhathi eziphawuleka kakhulu zenkampani.

am: ይፋዊ ማስጀመር
en: Official Launch
ha: Ƙaddamar da Hukuma
sw: Uzinduzi Rasmi
yo: Ìfilọ́lẹ̀ Aláṣẹ
zu: Ukwethulwa Ngokusemthethweni

am: ኪዳክስ በ2018 ቡቺ ኦኮሮ (አጋር-መስራች/ሲኢኦ)፣ ኡዞ አዊሊ (አጋር-መስራች/ሲቲኦ) እና ሞሪስ ኤቢሮማ (አጋር ማስራሽ/ሲአይኦ) ተጀምሯል።
en: Quidax was launched in 2018 by Buchi Okoro (Co-Founder/CEO), Uzo Awili (Co-Founder/CTO), and Morris Ebieroma (Co-Founder/CIO).
ha: An ƙaddamar da Quidax a cikin 2018 ta Buchi Okoro (Co-Founder/CEO), Uzo Awili (Co-Founder/CTO), da Morris Ebieroma (Co-Founder/CIO).
sw: Quidax ilizinduliwa mwaka 2018 na Buchi Okoro, (Mwanzilishi-mweza/Mkurugenzi Mtendaji), Uzo Awili (Mwanzilishi-mwenza/CTO) na Morris Ebieroma (Mwanzilishi-mwenza/CIO).
yo: Buchi Okoro (Alájọdásílẹ̀/Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí), Uzo Awili (Alájọdásílẹ̀/Adarí Ìmọ̀ Ẹ̀rọ), àti Morris Ebieroma (Alájọdásílẹ̀/Adarí Ètò Ìwífún) ni wọ́n ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ Quidax ní ọdún 2018.
zu: I-Quidax yethulwa ngo-2018 nguBuchi Okoro (Co-Founder/CEO), u-Uzo Awili (Co-Founder/CTO), kanye noMorris Ebieroma (Co-Founder/CIO).

am: ኦኮሮ፣ በቃል ኪዳን ዩኒቨርሲቲ አልሙኑስ፣ክሪፕቶከረንሲ ሲነግዱ የነበረው አሳዛኝ የግል ተሞክሮ በኋላ ለኪዳክስ ራዕይ አዳበረው።
en: Okoro, an alumnus of Covenant University, Ota, explained that he had developed the vision for Quidax following an unfortunate personal experience he had while trading cryptocurrencies.
ha: Okoro, wanda tsohon ɗalibi ne na Jami’ar Covenant, Ota, ya bayyana cewa ya bunƙasa hangen nesa na Quidax ne biyo bayan wani rashin jin daɗi da ya samu yayin cinikin cryptocurrencies.
sw: Okoro, mhitimu wa Chuo Kikuu cha Convenant, Ota, alielezea kuwa alikuwa ameendeleza maono ya Quidax kufuatilia uzoefu wa mbaya wa kibinafsi aliyokuwa nao wakati wa kufanya biashara ya sarafu za siri.
yo: Okoro, akẹ́kọ̀ọ́gbòye láti Fásitì Covenant ní Ota, ṣe àlàyé pé òun ti ní ìran fún Quidax lẹ́yìn ìrírí búburú tí ó ní nígbà tí ó ń ṣe òkòwò àwọn owó àkósódù.
zu: U-Okoro, owayengumfundi wase-Covenant University, u-Ota, wachaza ukuthi uthuthukise umbono we-Quidax kulandela isipiliyoni sakhe esidabukisayo ayenaso ngenkathi ehweba ngezezimali zebhikunyazi.

am: “ትምህርት ቤት ሳለሁ ክሪፕቶክዩሪንስ የተባለ የንግድ ልውውጥ ማድረግ ጀምሬ ነበር፤ እንዲሁም በአንድ የተወሰነ የንግድ ልውውጥ ላይ ተጭበረበርኩኝ።
en: “I had started trading cryptocurrencies while in school, and I got scammed on a specific transaction.
ha: “Na fara cinikin cryptocurrencies lokacin da nake maƙaranta, kuma an yi min zamba a kan wata mu’amala ta musamman.
sw: Nilikuwa nimeshaanza kufanya biashara za sarafu za siri nikiwa shuleni na nililaghaiwa kwa shughuli mahususi.
yo: "Mo bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ní ṣòwò owó àkósódù nígbà tí mo wà ní ilé-ẹ̀kọ́, tí wọ́n sì ti gbá mi lórí ìdúnàádúrà kan ní pàtó.
zu: “Ngangiqale ukuhweba ngemali yebhukunyazi ngisesikoleni, futhi ngaqolwa ngokuthengiselana okuthile.

am: ይህ ሁኔታ በጣም ቢጎዳኝም ፣በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ ሰዎች በክሪፕቶ ውሃ ውስጥ የመርበርበር ወንጀል እንደሚደርስባቸውም ተገንዝቤያለሁ።
en: While I was hurt by the experience, I also realized that thousands of people fall victim to fraud in the crypto space.
ha: Yayin da na ji rashin daɗi da zambar, na kuma gane cewa dubban mutane sun faɗa cikin zamba a cikin duniyar crypto.
sw: Wakati niliumizwa na uzoefu huo, niligundua kuwa maelfu ya watu pia wameathirika kwa udanganyifu uliyopo kwenye crypto.
yo: Bí ìrírí náà ti ṣe dùn mí tó, ó tún mú mi mọ̀ pé ẹgbẹẹgbẹ̀rún àwọn èèyàn ní wọ́n ń kó sí ọwọ́ jìbìtì ní àyè owó àkósódù.
zu: Nakuba ngalinyazwa isipiliyoni, ngaphinde ngabona ukuthi izinkulungwane zabantu ziba yisisulu sokukhwabanisa endaweni yezebhukunyazi.

am: ከኪዳክስ ጋር የነበረኝ ግብ ሰዎች ክሪፕቶን ተጠቅመው ሊነግዱበትና ሊነግዱበት የሚችሉበት መድረክ መፍጠር ነበር።"
en: My goal with Quidax was to create a platform where people could trade and transact using crypto safely.”
ha: Burina tare da Quidax shi ne ƙirƙirar dandamali inda mutane za su iya kasuwanci da mu'amala ta amfani da crypto lafiya."
sw: Lengo langu na Quidax lilikuwa kuunda jukwaa ambapo watu wanaweza kufanya biashara kwa usalama kwa kupitia crypto
yo: Ìlépa mi pẹ̀lú Quidax ni láti ṣẹ̀dá ìkànnì tí àwọn èèyàn yóò ti lè máa ṣòwò tí wọn yóò sì máa ṣe ìdúnàádúrà pẹ̀lú owó àkósódù láì sí ewu."
zu: Umgomo wami ne-Quidax bekuwukwakha inkundla lapho abantu bengahweba khona futhi bahwebe ngokusebenzisa i-bhukunyazi ngokuphepha. "

am: በኮቨናንት ዩኒቨርስቲ - ኦኮሮ ከተማሪዎች ጋር በመሆን ኪዳክስ ለመፍጠር ተነሳሱ።
en: Together with Awili and Ebieroma - also students at Covenant University - Okoro set out to create Quidax.
ha: Tare da Awili da Ebieroma – su ma ɗalibai a Jami'ar Covenant - Okoro sun tashi don ƙirƙirar Quidax.
sw: Pamoja na Awili na Ebieroma - pia wanafunzi katika Chuo kikuu cha Covenant-Okoro waliazimia kuunda Quidax.
yo: Lápapọ̀ pẹ̀lú Awili àti Ebieroma -tí àwọn náà jẹ́ akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ní Fásitì Covenant - Okoro dáwọ́ le ìṣẹ̀dá Quidax.
zu: Ndawonye u-Awili no-Ebieroma - nabafundi base-Covenant University - u-Okoro baqala ukwakha i-Quidax.

am: በተጨማሪም፣ ኩባንያው የተወሰነ የዘር ገንዘብ አግኝቶ በ2018 ወደ ቴክስታርስ አፋጣኝ ፕሮግራም ከገባ በኋላ ከመሬት ላይ ወጣ።
en: And, after getting some seed money and entering the Techstars Accelerator Program in 2018, the company got off the ground.
ha: Kuma, bayan samun kuɗin farawa da shigar da Techstars Accelerator Program a cikin 2018, kamfanin ya tashi daga ƙasa.
sw: Na, baada ya kupata pesa za ufadhili na kuingia kwenye mpango wa kuongeza kasi wa Techstars mwaka 2018, hiyo kampuni ilikufa.
yo: Lẹ́yìn tí ó gba owó ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ tí ó sì wọ Ètò Amúṣẹ́yá TechStars ní ọdún 2008, ilé-iṣẹ́ náà gbéra nílẹ̀.
zu: Futhi, ngemuva kokuthola imali yokuqala nokungena kuhlelo lwe-Techstars Accelerator ngo-2018, inkampani yehla phansi.

am: መጀመሪያ ላይ መስፋፋት
en: Initial Expansion
ha: Faɗaɗawar Farko
sw: Upanuzi wa Awali
yo: Ìmúgbòòrò Àkọ́kọ́
zu: Ukwandiswa Kokuqala

am: ለኪዳክስ የመጀመሪያዎቹ ሁለት ዓመታት ከፍተኛ እድገት ተደርጎባቸው ነበር ።
en: The first two years for Quidax were filled with significant expansion.
ha: Shekaru biyu na farko na kamfanin Quidax sun cika da gagarumin haɓakawa.
sw: Miaka miwili ya kwanza ya Quidax ilijazwa na upanuzi wa mkubwa.
yo: Ọdún méjì àkọ́kọ́ Quidax kún fún ìmúgbòòrò pàtàkì.
zu: Iminyaka emibili yokuqala ye-Quidax yanda kakhulu.

am: በወቅቱ.፣ የክሪፕቶ ገበያ በ2016 እና በ2017 ከፍተኛ ደረጃ ላይ ከደረሰ በኋላ የሳንቲም ዋጋ እየቀነሰ በመጣበት ወቅት በጣም አስከፊ ከሆኑት ወቅቶች መካከል አንዱን ሲዋጋ ቆይቷል።
en: At the time, the crypto market had been battling through one of its worst periods, with coin prices tumbling after hitting massive highs in 2016 and 2017.
ha: A lokacin, kasuwar crypto ta kasance tana fama ta ɗayan mafi munin lokutansa, tare da faɗuwar farashin tsabar kuɗi bayan da ya kai babban matsayi a cikin 2016 da 2017.
sw: Wakati huo soko la crypto lilikuwa likipambana na moja wapo ya vipindi vibaya zaidi, huku bei ya sarafu ikishuka badala ya kupanda kwa kiwango kikubwa mwaka 2016 na 2017.
yo: Ní ìgbà náà, ọjà owó àkósódù ń kojú àwọn ìṣòro ńlá kan lọ́wọ́, tí iye owó àwọn owó àkósódù ń já wálẹ̀ lẹ́yìn tí iye wọ́n ti gbéra sókè gidi gan ní ọdún 2016 àti 2017.
zu: Ngaleso sikhathi, imakethe yebhukunyazi ibilokhu ibhekana nesinye sezikhathi zayo ezimbi kakhulu, lapho amanani entengo ehla ngemva kokukhuphuka okukhulu ngo-2016 nango-2017.

am: የሆነ ሆኖ፤ ይህ ወቅት ደግሞ ብዙ ሰዎች ስለ ክሪፕቶከሬንሲስ በተለይም በአፍሪካ ውስጥ ይማራሉ።
en: Nevertheless, this period also saw a lot more people learning about cryptocurrencies - especially in Africa.
ha: Ko ta yaya, wannan lokacin kuma ya ga mutane da yawa suna koyo game da cryptocurrencies - musamman a Afirka.
sw: Hata hivyo kipindi hiki kilikuwa watu wengi sana wakijifunza kuhusu fedha za siri - hasa Afrika.
yo: Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, àkókò yìí tún ni ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn èèyàn ń kọ́ nípa àwọn owó àkósódù - pàápàá júlọ ní ilẹ̀ Africa.
zu: Noma kunjalo, lesi sikhathi siphinde sabona abantu abaningi befunda ngezezimali zebhukunyazi- ikakhulukazi e-Afrika.

am: ይህ የማወቅ ጉጉት በቦታውውስጥ ይበልጥ ተሳትፎ እንዲያደርጉ አደረጋቸው ።
en: And, this curiosity saw them get more involved in the space.
ha: Kuma, wannan sha'awar ya sa su ks ƙara shiga cikin sararin.
sw: Na, udadisi huu uliwaona wakihusika zaidi katika nafasi.
yo: Ìwárìrì yìí sì ní ó jẹ́ kí wọ́n túbọ̀ ní ìkópa sí i ní àyè náà.
zu: Futhi, leli lukuluku libabone behileleka kakhulu kulo mkhakha.

am: ብዙም ሳይቆይ፣ ኪዳክስ የደንበኞች ምቀኛ መሆን የቻለ ከመሆኑም በላይ በከፍተኛ ሁኔታ እያደገ ሄደ።
en: Soon enough, Quidax had achieved an enviable customer base and was growing massively.
ha: Ba da daɗewa ba, kamfanin Quidax ya sami tushen abokin ciniki mai kishi kuma yana girma sosai.
sw: Hivi karibuni, Quidax ilikuwa imepata msingi wa wateja unaovutia na ilikuwa ikikua sana.
yo: Láìpẹ̀, Quidax ti ní àkójọ àwọn oníbàárà tí pọ̀ jọjọ tí wọ́n sì tún ń pọ̀ sí i.
zu: Ngokushesha ngokwanele, i-Quidax yayisizuze isisekelo samakhasimende esinomona futhi yayikhula kakhulu.

am: የሲቢኤን እገዳ ሂደት መቃኘት
en: Navigating the CBN Ban
ha: Kewaya Dakatarwar CBN
sw: Kuelekeza Marufuku ya CBN
yo: Ìtukọ̀ Ìfòfindè láti CBN
zu: Ukuzulazula ku-CBN Ban

am: ይህ በማደግ ላይ ያለው ኩባንያ የካቲት ውስጥ የመጀመሪያውን ታላቅ ፈተና ተቋቁሞ ነበር 2021 የናይጄሪያ ማዕከላዊ ባንክ ክሪፕቶባንኪንግ ግንኙነቶች ላይ እገዳ አስታወቀ።
en: This growing company met its first major challenge in February 2021 as the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) announced a ban on crypto-banking relationships.
ha: Wannan kamfani mai girma ya gamu da babban ƙalubalensa na farko a watan Fabrairun 2021 yayin da Babban Bankin Nijeriya (CBN) ya sanar da dakatar da hulɗar banki-crypto.
sw: Kampuni hii ilikutana na changamoto yake kuu ya kwanza Februari 2021 wakati benki kuu ya Nigeria (CBN) ilipotangaza kupiga marufukuuhusiano wa benki ya crypto.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ tí ó ń dàgbà yìí ṣe àforígbá ìpènijà rẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ ní oṣù Kejì ọdún 2022 bí Báǹkì Àpapọ̀ ilẹ̀ Nigeria ṣe ti kéde ìfòfindè ìbáṣepọ̀ owó àkósódù àti ìfowópamọ́.
zu: Le nkampani ekhulayo ihlangabezane nenselelo yokuqala enkulu ngoNhlolanja wezi- 2021 njengoba iBhange Elikhulu laseNigeria (i-CBN) limemezele ukuvinjelwa kobudlelwane bebhukunyazi namabhange.

am: በወቅቱ፡ የአፔክስ ባንክ በማንኛውም ዓይነት ክሪፕቶ ከረንሲ ጋር ግንኙነት ያላቸውን ባንኮች ላይ እገዳ ነበር።
en: At the time, the apex bank placed a restriction on banks having affiliations with cryptocurrencies of any kind.
ha: A lokacin, babban bankin ya sanya takunkumi ga bankunan da ke da alaƙa da cryptocurrencies kowane iri.
sw: wakati huo benki kuu iliweka kizuizi cha kutokuwa na uhusiano na sarafu za siri za aina yoyote.
yo: Nígbà náà, báǹkì àgbà náà dá àwọn báǹkì lọ́wọ́ kọ́ láti ní àjọṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn owó àkósódù bí ó tile wù kí ó mọ.
zu: Ngaleso sikhathi, i-apex bank yabeka umkhawulo kumabhange anezihlangano nezimali zebhukunyazi anoma yiluphi uhlobo.

am: ይህ ማለት ክሪፕቶ ኩባንያዎች፣ ነጋዴዎችና የንግድ ድርጅቶች ክሪፕቶክዩሪቶችን ተቀብለው የባንክ ሒሳቦቻቸውን ወዲያውኑ እንዲዘጉ አድርገዋቸዋል ማለት ነው።
en: This meant that crypto companies, traders, and businesses accepting cryptocurrencies had their bank accounts shut down immediately.
ha: Wannan yana nufin cewa kamfanonin crypto, 'yan kasuwa, da kasuwancin da ke karɓar cryptocurrencies an rufe asusun ajiyarsu na banki nan-da-nan.
sw: Hii ilimaanisha kuwa makampuni ya crypto, wafanyabiashara na biashara zinazokubali fedha za siri zilifungiwa akaunti zao za kibenki mara moja.
yo: Èyí túmọ̀ sí pé àpò àsùnwọ̀n àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ owó àkósódù, àwọn oníṣòwò, àti àwọn òkòwò tí wọ́n ń gba àwọn owó àkósódù ní báǹkì ti di títìpa lẹ́sẹ̀kẹsẹ̀.
zu: Lokhu kwakusho ukuthi izinkampani zebhukunyazi, abahwebi, namabhizinisi amukela izimali zebhukunyazi avalwa ngokushesha ama-akhawunti abo asebhange.

am: ክሪፕቶ አሁንም እያደገ ያለበት ቦታ መሆኑን ግምት ውስጥ በማድረግ፣ ይህ ውሳኔ ለብዙዎቹ ኪዳክስ ደንበኞች ላይ ነበር።
en: Considering that crypto is still a growing space, this ruling was concerning for many of Quidax’s customers.
ha: Bisa la'akari da cewa crypto har yanzu sarari ne mai girma, wannan hukuncin ya shafi yawancin abokan cinikin Quidax.
sw: kwa kuzingatia kuwa crypto bado ni mfumo unaokuwa, uamuzi huu ulikuwa unahusu wateja wengi wa Quidax.
yo: Pẹ̀lú bí ó ṣe jẹ́ pé owó àkósódù sì jẹ́ àyè tí ó sì ń rí ìdàgbàsókè lọ́wọ́, òfin yìí fa àìbalẹ̀ ọkàn fún ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn oníbàárà Quidax.
zu: Uma kucatshangelwa ukuthi ibhukunyazi isewumkhakha okhulayo, lesi sinqumo sasiphathelene namakhasimende amaningi e-Quidax.

am: ይሁን እንጂ ፣ኪዳክስ ይህን መንገድ ማግኘት ችሏል ።
en: Nevertheless, Quidax was able to find a way through this.
ha: Duk da haka, Quidax ya samu hanyar fita daga wannan.
sw: Walakini, Quidax iliweza kupata njia kupitia hii.
yo: Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, Quidax rí ọ̀nà àbáyọ kọjá nínú èyí.
zu: Noma kunjalo, i-Quidax yakwazi ukuthola indlela kulokhu.

am: ኩባንያው ከእኩዮች ወደ እኩዮች አገልግሎት የጀመረ ሲሆን ይህም ደንበኞች ገንዘባቸውን በአስተማማኝ ሁኔታ ማስቀመጥና ማውጣት እንዲችሉ አስችሏል።
en: The company launched a peer-to-peer service, making it possible for customers to deposit and withdraw funds safely.
ha: Kamfanin ya ƙaddamar da sabis na tsara-zuwa-tsara, wanda ya ba wa abokan ciniki damar yin ajiya da kuma cire kuɗaɗe cikin aminci.
sw: Kampuni ilizindua huduma ya rika-kwa-rika, na kufanya iwezekane kwa wateja kuweka na kutoa pesa kwa usalama.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ iṣẹ́ onírọ̀-sí-irọ̀, èyí tí ó jẹ́ kí ó ṣeéṣe fún àwọn oníbàárà láti ṣe ìsanwówọlé àti ìgbowójáde láìséwu.
zu: Inkampani yethule umsebenzi wontanga, eyenza kubelula ukuba amakhasimende afake futhi akhiphe izimali ngokuphepha.

am: ኪውዳይሬክት ተብሎ የሚጠራው ይህ አገልግሎት ለመተማመን ተጨማሪ ጥቅም ይሰጣል - ከማይታወቅ ሰው ጋር ከመተግበር ይልቅ፡ እርስዎ በቀጥታ ከኪዳክስ ጋር ልውውጥ እያደረጉ ነው።
en: The service, called Qdirect, provides an added benefit of trust - instead of transacting with an unknown person, you’re directly making transactions with Quidax.
ha: Aikin, wanda ake kira Qdirect, yana ba da ƙarin fa'idar amana - maimakon yin mu'amala da wanda ba a sani ba, kai tsaye kuna yin mu'amala tare da Quidax.
sw: Huduma hii, inayoitwa Qdirect, inatoa manufaa ya ziada ya uaminifu - badala ya kufanya miamala na mtu asiyejulikana, unafanya miamala moja kwa moja na Quidax.
yo: Iṣẹ́ náà, tí wọ́n pé ní Qdirect, ń pèsè àǹfààní àlékún ìgbẹkẹ̀lé - dípò kí o máa ṣe ìdúnàádúrà pẹ̀lú ẹni tí o ò mọ̀, Quidax gangan ni ó máa bá ṣe ìdúnàádúrà tààrà.
zu: Isevisi, ebizwa ngokuthi i-Qdirect, ihlinzeka ngenzuzo eyengeziwe yokwethenjwa - esikhundleni sokusebenzelana nomuntu ongaziwa, wenza ukuthengiselana ngokuqondile ne-Quidax.

am: በዚህ መንገድ፣ ደንበኞች ለስላሳና አስተማማኝ የሆነ የንግድ ልውውጥ ማድረግ እንደሚችሉ ማረጋገጫ ተሰጥቷቸዋል ።
en: This way, customers are assured of a smooth, secure transaction.
ha: Ta wannan hanyar, abokan ciniki suna da tabbacin samun sauƙi, amintaccen mu'amala.
sw: Kwa njia hii wateja walihakikishia muamala bora na salama.
yo: Báyìí, ọkàn àwọn oníbàárà yóò balẹ̀ pé ìdúnàádúrà tí ó ní ààbò tí ó sì dán mọ́rán ni.
zu: Ngale ndlela, amakhasimende aqinisekiswa ngomsebenzi obushelelezi, ovikelekile.

am: የኪውዲኤክስ ምልክት ማስጀመሪያ፡
en: QDX Token Launch
ha: Kaddamar da token din QDX
sw: Uzinduzi wa tokeni ya Quidax
yo: Ìfilọ́lẹ̀ Tókìn QDX
zu: Ukwethulwa kwethokheni ye-QDX

am: በግንቦት 2021፣ ኪዳክስ የኩባንያው የቤት ውስጥ ምሥጠራ ቶከን የሆነውን ኪውዲኤክስን ከጀመረ በኋላ አንድ ትልቅ ምዕራፍ ላይ ደርሷል።
en: In May 2021, Quidax also hit a major milestone after the company launched its in-house crypto token, QDX.
ha: A cikin Mayu 2021, Quidax shi ma ya sami babban ci gaba bayan kamfanin ya ƙaddamar da alamar crypto na cikin gida, QDX.
sw: Mwezi Mei 2021, Quidax ilipiga hatua kubwa baada ya kuzindua tokeni yake ya ndani ya crypto, QDX.
yo: Ní oṣù Karùn-ún ọdún 2021, Quidax tún ṣe àṣeyọrí ńlá kan lẹ́yìn ìgbà tí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ tókìn owó àkósódù abẹ́lé tiẹ̀, QDX.
zu: NgoNhlaba wezi-2021, i-Quidax nayo yashaya ingqophamlando ngemuva kokuthi inkampani yethule ithokheni yayo yebhukunyazi yangaphakathi, i-QDX.

am: ይህ ሀብት ለአፍሪካ ክሪፕቶ ህዋ የመጀመሪያውን ምልክት ያደረገ ሲሆን እንደ ሽልማት እና ለሽያጭ ደንበኞች ከፍ ያሉ ጥቅሞችን ይሰጣል።
en: The asset marked a first for the African crypto space, offering benefits such as rewards and staking to the exchange’s customers.
ha: Kadara ta yi alama ta farko ga duniyar crypto na Afirka, yana ba da fa'idoji kamar lada da tarawa ga abokan cinikin musayar.
sw: Kipengele hiki kilichukua nafasi ya kwanza kwenye mfumo wa crypto wa kiafrika, na kutoa manufaa kama vile zawadi na hisia kwa wateja wa ubadilishanaji.
yo: Èlò amówówọlé náà ni ó jẹ́ àkọ́kọ́ fún àyè owó àkósódù ní ilẹ̀ Africa, tí ó ń pèsè àwọn àǹfààní bí i ẹ̀bùn àti ìfìnídógò fún àwọn oníbàárà ìkànnì ìpààrọ̀ náà.
zu: Le mpahla emakiwe eyokuqala emkhakheni wezebhukunyazi yase-Afrika, inikela ngezinzuzo ezifana nemivuzo nokubamba iqhaza kumakhasimende okushintshana.

am: የኪውዲኤክስ አጀማመር ገበያው እየቀነሰ ቢሄድም ከፍተኛ ደስታ ያገኘ ሲሆን ኪዳክስ በአንድ ቀን ውስጥ ከዚህ ተጨማሪ የገንዘብ ድጋፍ 3 ሚሊዮን የአሜሪካ ዶላር አከማችቷል ።
en: Despite a slowing market, the QDX launch was met with significant excitement, and Quidax raised $3 million in additional funding from that launch in a single day.
ha: Duk da raguwar kasuwa, ƙaddamar da QDX ya gamu da gagarumin farin ciki, kuma Quidax ya haɓaka dala miliyan 3 a cikin ƙarin kuɗaɗe daga wannan ƙaddamarwa a cikin rana guda.
sw: Licha ya soko kupungua, uzinduzi wa QDX ulikutana na msisimko mkubwa na Quidax ilikusanya $3 milioni kwa siku kutoka kwenye ufadhili wa ziada wa uzinduzi huo.
yo: Bí ọjà ò ṣe yá tó, ayọ̀ ńlá ni ìfilọ́lẹ̀ QDX bá pàdé, tí Quidax sì ṣe àgbàjọ mílíọ̀nù $3 ní àfikún owó ìrànwọ́ láti ìfilọ́lẹ̀ yẹn ní ọjọ́ kan ṣoṣo.
zu: Naphezu kokuhamba kancane kwemakethe, ukwethulwa kwe-QDX kuhlangatshezwane nesasasa elikhulu, futhi i-Quidax inyuse amaRandi ayizigidi ezi-3 emalini eyengeziwe kusukela kulokho kwethulwa ngosuku olulodwa.

am: የቶኬን ማስጀመርም የኪውዲኤክስ ቫውልት - ኪዳክስ የድር አገልግሎት ማስጀመር ጋር ተያይዞ ነበር።
en: The launch of the token was also accompanied by the launch of the QDX Vault - Quidax’s staking service.
ha: Har ila yau ƙaddamar da token din yana tare da ƙaddamar da QDX Vault - Quidax's staking service.
sw: Uzinduzi wa hiyo tokeni pia uliambatana na uzinduzi wa huduma ya uhakika ya QDX Vault-Qudax.
yo: Ìfilọ́lẹ̀ tókìn náà tún tẹ̀lé ìfilọ́lẹ̀ QDX Vault - iṣẹ́ ìfìnídógò Quidax.
zu: Ukwethulwa kwethokheni kuphinde kwahambisana nokwethulwa kwenkonzo ye-QDX Vault - Quidax.

am: ኪውዲኤክስ ቮልት ጋር፣ የኪዳክስ ተጠቃሚዎች የኪውዲኤክስ ተጠቃሚዎቻቸውን ሊሰሩ እና ከኤር ድሮፕ እና ሌሎች የማስተዋወቂያ ዘመቻዎች ሽልማቶችን ማግኘት ይችላሉ።
