yo: Bí ilẹ̀ Africa ṣe ti ń súnmọ́ ọdún àfojúsùn fún àwọn Ìlépa fún Ìdàgbàsókè Alálòpẹ́ (aIIA), ìṣàmójútó àti ìṣèdáhùn fún dátà ń kó ipa pàtàkì lórí àgbéyẹ̀wò ìlọsíwájú àti láti rí àwọn ìlépa káríayé wọ̀nyìí ṣe.
zu: Njengoba i-Afrika isondela onyakeni ohlosiwe we-Sustainable Development Goals (i-SDGs), ukuqapha imininingo kanye nokuziphendulela kudlala indima ebalulekile ekuhloleni inqubekelaphambili kanye nokufeza lezi zinhloso zomhlaba.

am: በሜሎን 1.0 አማካኝነት ሜሎን በመረጃ ላይ የተመሰረተ ውሳኔ አሰጣጥን በመለወጥ ንግዶች፣ ድርጅቶች እና ፖሊሲ አውጪዎች የመረጃን ኃይል እንዲጠቀሙ እና በተለያዩ ዘርፎች ተጽዕኖ ያላቸውን ውጤቶች እንዲያሳድጉ ያስችላቸዋል።
en: With MELON 1.0, Melon aims to revolutionize data-driven decision-making, enabling businesses, organizations, and policy makers to harness the power of data and drive impactful outcomes across various sectors.
ha: Tare da MELON 1.0, Melon yana da niyya don kawo sauyi ga yanke shawara kan bayanai, ba da damar kasuwanci, ƙungiyoyi, da masu tsara manufofi don amfani da ƙarfin bayanai da fitar da sakamako masu tasiri a sassa daban-daban.
sw: Kwa kutumia MELON 1.0, Tikitimaji inalenga kuleta mapinduzi katika kufanya maamuzi yanayotokana na takwimu, ili kuwezesha biashara, mashirika na watunga sera kutumia uwezo wa takwimu na kuleta matokeo kwenye sekta mbalimbali.
yo: Pẹ̀lú MELON 1.0, Melon ń gbèrò láti mú àyípadà bá ìṣèpinnu alòmọ̀-dátà , èyí tí yóò fún àwọn òkòwò, ilé-iṣẹ́ àti àwọn aṣòfin ní agbára láti ṣàmúlò agbára dátà tí wọn yóò sì mú àbájáde onípa bá ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́.
zu: Nge-MELON 1.0, i-melon ihlose ukuguqula izinqumo eziqhutshwa imininingo, ivumele amabhizinisi, izinhlangano, nabenzi bezinqubomgomo ukuthi basebenzise amandla emininingo futhi baqhube imiphumela enomthelela kuyo yonke imikhakha ehlukahlukene.

am: ሜሎን ዳታ ሰርቪስ ሊሚትድ የአፍሪካ መሪ መረጃ አቀጣጣይ ለመሆን ቁርጠኛ የሆነ የመረጃ ቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያ ነው።
en: Melon Data services LTD is a data-tech company dedicated to becoming Africa's leading Data catalyst.
ha: Melon Data Services LTD kamfani ne na fasahar bayanai da aka sadaukar don zama jagorar bayanan Afirka.
sw: Melon Data Service LTD ni kampuni ya teknolojia ya takwimu iliyojitolea kuwa kichocheo kikuu cha takwimu barani Afrika.
yo: Melon Data services LTD jẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ afìmẹ̀ẹ̀rọṣàkóso dátà tí ó ní ìfarajìn láti di olórí Alodátàmúṣẹ́yá nílẹ̀ Africa.
zu: I-Melon Data services LTD yinkampani yobuchwepheshe bemininingo ezinikele ekubeni i-Data catalyst ehamba phambili e-Afrika.

am: ከዋና መድረክ ጋር፣ ሜሎን 1.0፣ ሜሎን በመረጃ አሰባሰብ፣ በመጠቀም እና በማሰራጨት መካከል ያለውን ክፍተት ለማጥበብ ውሳኔ ሰጪዎችን በአዳዲስ መሣሪያዎች እና አገልግሎቶች ያጠናክራል።
en: With its flagship platform, MELON 1.0, Melon empowers decision-makers with innovative tools and services to bridge the gap between data collation, utilization, and dissemination.
ha: Tare da dandalin flagship, MELON 1.0, Melon yana ƙarfafa masu yanke shawara tare da sababbin kayan aiki da ayyuka don cike giɓin da ke tsakanin tattara bayanai, amfani, da kuma yaɗawa.
sw: Kwa kutumia jukwaa lake kuu, Melon 1.0, Tikitiki huwawezesha watoa maamuzi kwa zana na huduma bunifu ili kuziba pengo kati ya mgongano wa takwimu , matumizi na usambazaji.
yo: Látààrí ìkànnì pàtàkì rẹ̀, MELON 1.0, Melon ń ṣe ìrónilágbára fún àwọn aṣèpinnu pẹ̀lú àwọn irinṣẹ́ àti iṣẹ́ láti lè dí ààfo tí ó wà láàárín ìgbàjọ, ìṣàmúlò àti ìṣàpínká dátà.
zu: Ngengosi yayo ephambili, i-MELON 1.0, i-melon inika abenzi bezinqumo amandla ngamathuluzi amasha nezinsizakalo zokuvala igebe phakathi kokuqoqwa kwemininingo, ukusetshenziswa, nokusabalalisa.

am: ሜሎን እጅግ የላቁ የመረጃ ሳይንስ ቴክኒኮችን እና በጥሩ ሁኔታ የተጠና ሪፖርት የማድረግ ማዕቀፍን በመጠቀም ውጤቶችን ለማመቻቸት እና በመላው አፍሪካ ተጽዕኖን ለማሳደግ ያለመ ነው።
en: By leveraging cutting-edge data science techniques and a well-researched reporting framework, Melon aims to optimize outcomes and drive impact across Africa
ha: Ta hanyar yin amfani da dabarun kimiyyar bayanai masu mahimmanci da ingantaccen tsarin bayar da rahoto, Melon yana da niyyar haɓaka sakamako da haifar da tasiri a duk faɗin Afirka.
sw: kwa kutumia mbinu za kisasa za sayansi ya takwimu na mfumo wa kutoa taarifa uliyofanyiwa utafiti vizuri, Melon inalenga kuboresha matokeo na kuleta athari kote Afrika
yo: Nípa ṣíṣe àmúlò ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe ìmọ̀ọ̀jìnlẹ̀ nípa dátà tí ó tayọ àti ìlànà ìjábọ̀ káríayé tí ìwádìí ní kíkúnná wà lórí rẹ̀, Melon gbèrò láti mú àbájáde dára sí i kí ó sì ní ipa káàkiri ilẹ̀ Africa.
zu: Ngokusebenzisa amasu esayensi yemininingo asezingeni eliphezulu kanye nohlaka lokubika olucwaningwe kahle, i-melon ihlose ukuthuthukisa imiphumela futhi iqhube umthelela kuyo yonke i-Afrika.

am: ስለ ሜሎን እና ስለ ሜሎን 1.0 ቤታ ስሪት ተጨማሪ መረጃ ለማግኘት እባክዎን ይጐብኙ(ኤቸቲቲፒኤስ፡//.ሜሎን.ኤንጂ)፡// https:///melon.ng/ ወይም እኛን ያነጋግሩን(፡ሶሊውሽንስ@ሜሎን.ኤንጂ )solutions@melon.ng እና እንቅስቃሴዎቻችንን በሊንክ ዲን እና በትዊተር ይከተሉ።
en: For more information about Melon and the beta release of MELON 1.0, please visit https://melon.ng/ or contact us: solutions@melon.ng and follow our activities on LinkedIn and Twitter

sw: Kwa maelezo zaidi kuhusu Tikitimaji na toleo la beta la MELON 1.0, tafadhali tembelea https://melon.ng/ au wasiliana nasi: solutions@melon.ng na ufuatilie shughuli zetu kwenye LinkedIn na Twitter
yo: Fún ìwífún sí i nípa Melon àti ìfisíta ẹ̀yà-ìṣàyẹ̀wò alòjọaṣàmúlò MELON 1.0, jọ̀wọ́ lọ sí https://melon.ng/ àbí kí o kàn sí wa ní: solutions@melon.ng kí o sì tẹ̀lé àwọn ètò iṣẹ́ wa ní LinkedIn àti Twitter.
zu: Ukuze uthole ulwazi olwengeziwe mayelana ne-melon nokukhishwa kwe-beta kwe-MELON 1.0, sicela uvakashele ku-https://melon.ng/ noma uxhumane nathi: solutions@melon.ng futhi ulandele imisebenzi yethu ku-LinkedIn naku-Twitter.

am: የናይጄሪያው የጤና ቴክኖሎጅ ጅምር ኩባንያ ሪሜዲል ሄልዝ የአገልግሎቱን ተደራሽነት ለማስፋት የ 12 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ተከታታይ ገንዘብ አሰባስቧል
en: Nigerian healthtech startup, Remedial Health, raises $12 million in Series A funding to expand the reach of its services
ha: Fararren kamfanin healthtech na Nijeriya, Remedial Health, ya tara dala miliyan $12 a cikin jerin kuɗaɗe na Series A don faɗaɗa ayyukansa.
sw: Kuanzishwa kwa teknolojia ya afya ya Nigeria Remedial Health, kumeongeza $12 milioni katika ufadhili wa mpangilio A ili kupanua ufikiaji wa huduma zao
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ afìmẹ̀ẹ̀rọṣètò-ìlera ti orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria, Remedial Health, ṣe àgbàjọ owó ìrànwọ́ mílíọ̀nù $12 níbi ìṣèrànwọ́ Àṣetẹ̀léra A láti fẹ ọwọ́jà àwọn ètò iṣẹ́ rẹ̀
zu: Ukuqala kwe-healtech yaseNigeria, I-Remedial Health, inyusa ama- $ 12 wezigidi ku-Series A uxhaso ukuze kwandiswe ukufinyeleleka kwezinsizakalo zayo

am: የናይጄሪያው የጤና ቴክኖሎጂ ጅምር ኩባንያ ሬሚዲል ሄልዝ በአገሪቱ ውስጥ የአገልግሎቱን ተደራሽነት ለማስፋት የ 12 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ተከታታይ የገንዘብ — 8 ሚሊዮን ዶላር የፍትሃዊነት እና የ 4 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ዕዳ — አሰባስቧል።
en: Nigerian healthtech startup, Remedial Health, has raised $12 million in Series A funding — $8 million in equity and $4 million in debt — to expand the reach of its services in the country.
ha: Kamfanin fasahar kiwon lafiya ta Nijeriya mai farowa, Remedial Health, ya tara dala miliyan $12 a cikin jerin kuɗaɗe na Series A — dala miliyan $8 a cikin daidaito da kuma dala miliyan $4 na bashi — don faɗaɗa isar da ayyukanta a cikin ƙasar.
sw: Kuanzishwa kwa teknolojia ya Afya nchini Nigeria, Remedial Health, imechangisha $12 milioni katika ufadhili wa series A, $8 milioni katika usawa na $4 milioni katika deni ili kupanua ufikiaji wa huduma zake nchini.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọṣètò-ìlera ti orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria, Remedial Health, ti ṣe àgbàjọ owó ìrànwọ́ mílíọ̀nù $12 níbi owó ìrànwọ́ Àṣetẹ̀léra A — mílíọ̀nù $8 fún ìpín ìdókòwò àti mílíọ̀nù $4 gẹ́gẹ́ bíi gbèsè — láti fẹ ọwọ́jà àwọn ètò iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà.
zu: Ukuqalwa kobuchwepheshe bezempilo eNigeria, Impilo Yokulungisa, kunyuse amaRandi ayizigidi ezingu-12 oxhaso lwe-Series A - amaRandi ayizigidi ezingu-8 ngokulingana kanye nezikweletu zamaRandi ayizigidi ezingu-4 - ukwandisa ukufinyelela kwezinsizakalo zakho ezweni.

am: ኩባንያው በናይጄሪያ የመድኃኒት ዘርፍ ውስጥ የንግድ እድገትን ለማሳደግ የታለሙ የፋይናንስ አገልግሎቶችን ለማቅረብ የገንዘብ ድጋፍን ይጠቀማል።
en: The company will also use the funds to support the delivery of targeted financial services to drive business growth across Nigeria’s pharmaceutical sector.
ha: Kazalika, kamfanin zai yi amfani da kuɗaɗen ne wajen tallafawa isar da hidimomin kuɗi da aka yi niyya domin bunƙasa harkokin kasuwanci a sassan harhaɗa magunguna na Nijeriya.
sw: Kampuni pia itatumia fedha hizo kusaidia utoaji wa huduma za kifedha ili kukuza ukuaji wa biashara katika sekta ya dawa ya Nigeria.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ náà yóò tún lo owó ìrànwọ́ náà láti ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún ìrọwọ́rọsẹ̀ àwọn ètò iṣẹ́ ìnáwó tí wọ́n fojú sùn kí ìdàgbàsókè lè bá ẹ̀ka iṣẹ́ ìtajà òògùn káàkiri orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria.
zu: Le nkampani izophinde isebenzise izimali ukusekela ukulethwa kwezinsizakalo zezezimali ezihlosiwe ukuze kuqhutshekwe nokukhula kwebhizinisi kuwo wonke umkhakha wezokwelapha waseNigeria.

am: ኪውኢዲ ኢንቨስተሮች እና ቬንቸርስ መድረክ የፍትሃዊነት የገንዘብ ድጋፍ ዙሩን በጋራ መርተዋል።
en: QED Investors and Ventures Platform co-led the equity funding round.
ha: Masu saka hannun jari na QED da Platform Ventures ne suka jagoranci zagayen samar da kuɗaɗe na gaskiya.
sw: Wawekezaji wa QED na jukwaa la Ubia waliongoza mzunguko wa ufadhili wa hisa.
yo: QED Investors àti Ventures Platform ní wọ́n jọ darí ìyípo ìpínwó ìrànwọ́ agbàpín-ìdókòwò náà.
zu: I-QED Investors and Ventures Platform ihole ngokubambisana emzuliswaneni woxhaso lwezimali.

am: ይህ የአንደኛው የአፍሪካ ጅምር ኢንቨስትመንት ሁለተኛ ኢንቨስትመንት ሲሆን ሁለተኛው ደግሞ ከቅድመ-ዘር ደረጃ ጀምሮ በመልሶ ማቋቋም ጤና ኢንቨስት አድርጓል።
en: While this is the former’s second investment in an African startup, the latter has invested in Remedial Health since the pre-seed stage.
ha: Duk da yake wannan shi ne karo na biyu na hannun jari na farko a cikin kamfanoni masu farowa na Afirka, na ƙarshe ya saka hannun jari a cikin Remedial Health tun farkon matakin farawarsa kanfanin.
sw: Ingawa huu ni uwekezaji wa pili wa awali katika uanzishwaji wa Afrika, wa pili umewekeza katika Afya ya Urekebishaji tangu hatua ya kabla ya mbegu.
yo: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé ìkówólókòwò kejì ti onítọ̀hún yóò ṣe lórí ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ ní ilẹ̀ Africa ni èyí, Ventures Platform ni tiẹ̀ ti kówó lé Remedial Health láti àkókò tí kò tíì gba owó ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́.
zu: Nakuba lokhu kuwutshalomali lwesibili lwangaphambili ekuqaliseni kwe-Afrika, lokhu kutshale kwezempilo Yokulungisa kusukela ekuqaleni kwesigaba sokuxhasa.

am: በተጨማሪም የቬንቸርስ ፕላትፎርም የመጀመሪያው የሴሪ ኤ ኢንቨስትመንት ነው።
en: It is also Ventures Platform's first Series A investment.
ha: Haka nan shi ne jarin farko na Series A na Ventures Platform.
sw: Pia ni uwekezaji wa kwanza wa Series A wa Ventures Platform.
yo: Ó tún jẹ́ ìdókòwò Àṣetẹ̀léra A àkọ́kọ́ lórí Ventures Platform.
zu: Kuphinde kube yi-Ventures Platform yokuqala yokutshala imali yochungechunge A.

am: ጋይንግልስ፣ ቴንሴንት እና አይኮምቢኔተር ቀደም ባሉት ዙሮች ከተሳተፉ በኋላ ተሳትፈዋል።
en: Gaingels, Tencent, and Ycombinator participated after taking part in earlier rounds.
ha: Gaingels, Tencent, da Ycombinator sun shiga an dama da su bayan shiga cikin zagayen da suka gabata.
sw: Gaingels, Tencent, na Ycombinator walishiriki baada ya kushiriki katika mzunguko wa awali.
yo: Giangels, Tencent àti Ycombinator kópa lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n ti kọ́kọ́ kópa nínú àwọn ìyípo tẹ́lẹ̀.
zu: U-Gaingels, u-Tencent, no-Ycombinator babambe iqhaza ngemuva kokubamba iqhaza emizuliswaneni yangaphambili.

am: የአገር ውስጥ እና ዓለም አቀፍ የገንዘብ ተቋማት ጥምረት 4 ሚሊዮን ዶላር የዕዳ ፋይናንስን መርቷል።
en: A consortium of local and international financial institutions led the $4 million debt financing.
ha: Gamayyar cibiyoyin hada-hadar kuɗi na cikin gida da na ƙasa da ƙasa sun jagoranci bayar da bashin dala miliyan $4.
sw: Muungano wa taasisi za fedha za ndani na kimataifa uliongoza ufadhili wa deni la $4 milioni.
yo: Àgbárijọpọ̀ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ elétò owó nílẹ̀ yìí àti ní òkèèrè ni wọ́n darí ètò ìsangbèsè oní mílíọ̀nù $4.
zu: Umfelandawonye wezikhungo zezimali zasekhaya nezamazwe ngamazwe uhole ekuxhasweni kwezikweletu eziyizigidi ezine zamaRandi.

am: በ 2022 በሳሙኤል ኢኩዋዳ( ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚ) እና በቪክቶር ቤንጃሚን( ሲኦኦ) የተጀመረው ሬሜዲያል ጤና የመድኃኒት አቅርቦት ሰንሰለትን ዲጂታል የሚያደርግ የቴክኖሎጂ ጅምር ነው።
en: Launched in 2022 by Samuel Okwuada (CEO) and Victor Benjamin (COO), Remedial Health is a tech startup digitising the pharmaceutical supply chain.
ha: An ƙaddamar da shi a cikin 2022 da Samuel Okwuada (Shugaba) da Victor Benjamin (COO), Remedial Health fararren kamfani ne na fasaha da yake mayar harkar samar da magunguna ta zama ta dijital.
sw: ilizinduliwa mwaka 2022, na Samuel Okwuada (Mkurugenzi Mtendaji) na Victor Benjamini (COO), Remedial Health ni uanzishaji wa kiteknolojia unaoweka kidijitali mnyororo wa usambazaji wa dawa.
yo: Remedial Health tí Samuel Okwuada (Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí) àti Victor Bemjamin (Adarí Ètò Iṣẹ́) ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ rẹ̀ ní ọdún 2022, jẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tí ó ń fi ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ ṣètò ìpínjà òògùn títà.
zu: Yethulwa ngo-2022 nguSamuel Okwuada (i-CEO) kanye no-Victor Benjamin (i-COO), I-Remedial Health iyisiqalo sobuchwepheshe esifaka idijithali uchungechunge lokuhlinzekwa kwemithi.

am: የቢ 2 ቢ ኩባንያ ለፋርማሲዎች እና ለሆስፒታሎች የእነሱን ክምችት እና ሽያጭ ለማስተዳደር ሶፍትዌሮችን ይሰጣል።
en: The B2B company provides software for pharmacies and hospitals to manage their inventory and sales.
ha: Kamfanin B2B yana ba da manhaja don kantin magunguna da asibitoci don sarrafa kaya da tallace-tallace.
sw: Kampuni ya B2B inatoa program kwa maduka ya dawa na hospitaliti ili kudhibisha hesabu zao na mauzo yao.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ àgbọwọ́-òkòwò-sí-òkòwò náà ń pèsè ohun èlò àìrídìmú fún àwọn ilé-ìtajà òògùn àti ilé-ìwòsàn láti máa ṣe àkóso àwọn àkójọ ọjà wọn àti ọjá tí wọ́n tà.
zu: Inkampani ye-B2B ihlinzeka ngohleloxhumano yamakhemisi nezibhedlela ukuphatha i-inventory yabo nokuthengisa.

am: ኩባንያው ፋርማሲዎች ጂኤስኬ ፣ፒኤፍዚኢአር ፣ አስትራ ዘንቻ፣ ኢምሮ እና ፊንድሶን ፊንድሰን የጤና ጥበቃ ጨምሮ ከዋና አምራቾች እና አከፋፋዮች በመደርደሪያዎቻቸው ውስጥ የመድኃኒት ምርቶችን እንዲያገኙ ይረዳል።
en: The company helps pharmacies source pharmaceutical products for their shelves from major manufacturers and distributors, including GSK, Pfizer, AstraZeneca, Emzor, and Fidson Healthcare.
ha: Kamfanin yana taimaka wa kantinan magani samo samfuran magunguna don shagunansu daga manyan masana'anta da masu rarrabawa, da suka haɗa da GSK, Pfizer, AstraZeneca, Emzor, da kuma Fidson Healthcare.
sw: Kampuni husaidia maduka ya dawa kupata huduma za bidhaa za dawa kwa rafu zao, kutoka kwa wazalishaji wakuu na wasambazaji, ikiwa ni pamoja na GSK, Pfizer, Zeneca, Emzor, na Fidson Health cae.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ń ran àwọn ilé-ìtajà òògùn lọ́wọ́ láti ṣe àwárí àwọn ọjà òògùn láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn aṣèlọ́po àti àwọn aṣàpínka ńláńlá bí i GSK, Pfizer, AstraZeneca, Emzor àti Fidson Healthcare fún ilé-ìtajà wọn.
zu: Le nkampani isiza amakhemisi ukuthi athole imikhiqizo yemithi yamashalofu awo kubakhiqizi abakhulu nabasabalalisi, okuhlanganisa i-GSK, i-Pfizer, i-AstraZeneca, i-Emzor, ne-Fidson Healthcare.

am: በተጨማሪም የሚያስፈልጋቸውን መድኃኒቶች ለመግዛት የሚያስፈልጉትን ገንዘብ ላጡ ፋርማሲዎች ወይም ሆስፒታሎች የቁሳቁስና ገንዘብን ይሰጣል።
en: It also offers inventory financing to pharmacies or hospitals that lack the necessary funds to purchase needed drugs.
ha: Haka nan yana ba da kuɗaɗen ƙira ga kantinan magani ko asibitoci waɗanda ba su da kuɗin da ake buƙata don siyan magungunan da ake buƙata.
sw: Pia hutoa ufadhili wa hesabu kwa maduka ya dawa au hospitali ambazo hazina pesa zinazohitajika kununua dawa zinazohitajika.
yo: Ó tún máa ń pèsè ètò ìyáwórajà fún àwọn ilé-ìtajà òògùn àbí ilé-ìwòsàn tí wọn ò ní owó tí ó yẹ láti ra àwọn òògùn tí wọ́n nílò.
zu: Iphinde inikeze uxhaso lwezimali emakhemisi noma ezibhedlela ezingenayo imali edingekayo yokuthenga izidakamizwa ezidingekayo.

am: ለፋርማሲዩቲካል አምራቾች፣ ሬሜዲያል ጤና ለምርቶቻቸው ውጤታማ ወደ ገበያ የሚወስድ መንገድ እና የበለጠ ውጤታማ እቅድ ለማውጣትና ውሳኔ ለመስጠት ሊጠቀሙባቸው የሚችሏቸውን በአካባቢያዊ ገበያዎች ውስጥ በመረጃ የተደገፈ ግንዛቤዎችን ይሰጣል።
en: For pharmaceutical manufacturers, Remedial Health provides an effective route-to-market for their products and data-driven insights into local markets that they can leverage for more effective planning and decision-making.
ha: Ga masu ƙera magunguna, Remedial Health yana ba da ingantacciyar hanya-zuwa-kasuwa don samfuransu da kuma bayanan da aka yi amfani da su a kasuwannin cikin gida waɗanda za su iya yin amfani da su don ingantaccen tsari da yanke shawara.
sw: Kwa watengenezaji wa dawa, Remedial Health hutoa njia mwafaka ya kuelekea sokoni kwa biashara zao na maarifa yanayotokana na takwimu katika masoko ya ndani ambayo yanaweza kujiinua kwa ajili ya kupanga na kufanya maamuzi kwa ufanisi zaidi.
yo: Fún àwọn aṣèlọ́po òògùn, Remedial Health máa ń pèsè ètò ìkọ́jàránṣẹ́ tí ó múnádóko fún àwọn ọjà wọn àti ọgbọ́n ìwífún nípa àwọn ọjà kéékéèké tí wọ́n lè lò fún ètò iṣẹ́ wọn àti ìṣèpinnu tí ó múnádóko.
zu: Kubakhiqizi bemithi, I-Remedial Health inikeza umzila osebenzayo oye emakethe wemikhiqizo yabo kanye nemininingwane eqhutshwa imininingo ezimakethe zasendaweni abangayisebenzisa ukuze bahlele ngempumelelo kakhudlwana nokwenza izinqumo.

am: የናይጄሪያ የጤና ቴክኖሎጂ ጅምር ኩባንያ ሪሜዲል ሄልዝ የመድኃኒት አቅርቦት ሰንሰለቱን ዲጂታል በማድረግ ለፋርማሲዎች የቁሳቁስ ፋይናንስ እያቀረበ ነው።
en: Nigerian healthtech startup, Remedial Health, is digitising the pharmaceutical supply chain and offering inventory financing to pharmacies
ha: Kamfanin fasahar kiwon lafiya ta Nijeriya mai farowa, Remedial Health, yana mayar da sarƙar samar da magunguna dijital tare da ba da kuɗaɗen ƙira ga kantinan magani.
sw: Uanzishaji wa teknolojia ya Afya ya Nigeria, Remedial Health, inaweka kidijitali mnyororo wa usambazaji wa dawa na kutoa ufadhili wa hesabu kwa maduka ya dawa.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ alòmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ṣètò ìlera ti ilẹ̀ Nigeria, Remedial Health ń fi ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ ṣètò ìpínjà òògùn tí wọ́n sì tún ń pèsè ètò ìyáwórajà fún àwọn ilé-ìtajà òògùn.
zu: Ukuqala kobuchwepheshe bezempilo eNigeria, I-Remedial Health, ifaka idijithali uchungechunge lokuhlinzekwa kwemithi futhi inikezela ngezimali zokusungula emakhemisi.

am: ሬሜዲያል በተጨማሪም ሶፍትዌሩን የማይጠቀሙ የፋርማሲ ባለቤቶች በሞባይል መተግበሪያው በኩል ትዕዛዞችን እንዲያደርጉ የሚያስችል የመስመር ላይ ሱቅ አለው።
en: Remedial also has an online shop that allows pharmacy owners who do not use its software to place orders via its mobile app.
ha: Remedial kuma yana da shago kan intanet wanda ke ba masu kantin magani waɗanda ba sa amfani da manhaja ɗinsa yin oda ta hanyar wayar hannu.
sw: Remedial pia ina duka la mtandaoni linaloruhusu wamiliki wa duka ambao hawatumii program yake kuagiza kupitia programu yake ya simu.
yo: Remedial tún ní ilé-ìtajà orí ayélujára tí ó máa ń fún àwọn onílé-ìtajà òògùn tí wọn kò lo ohun èlò àìrídìmú rẹ̀ ní àyè láti bèèrè fún ọjà láti orí ohun èlò ìmúṣẹ́ṣe orí ẹ̀rọ aláàgbéká rẹ̀.
zu: I-Remedial futhi inesitolo esiku-inthanethi esivumela abanikazi bamakhemisi abangasebenzisi uhleloxhumano layo ukufaka ama-oda ngohlelo lwayo lokusebenza lweselula.

am: የሱቅ ባለቤቶች የሞባይል አፕሊኬሽኑን በመጠቀም ከ 8,000 በላይ ምርመራ የተደረገባቸውን ምርቶች ማግኘት ይችላሉ፣ በተመሳሳይ ቀን ማቅረቢያ እና የቁሳቁስ ፋይናንስ በመጠቀም ለወትሮው ትዕዛዞች የገንዘብ ፍሰት መጨናነቅን ለመቀነስ እና የሽያጭ እድሎችን ከፍ ለማድረግ።
en: Store owners can use the mobile app to access over 8,000 vetted products, with same-day delivery and inventory financing to reduce cash-flow friction for routine orders and maximise sales opportunities.
ha: Masu shagunan na iya amfani da manhajar wayar hannu don samun dama ga samfuran kayan da aka tantance sama da 8,000, tare da kawowa a rana guda da kuma ba da kuɗaɗen kaya don rage wahalar shiga da fitar kudi na oda da aka saba kuma ya linka damarmakin siyayya.
sw: Wamiliki wa maduka wanaweza kutumia program ya simu kufikia zaidi ya bidhaa 8,000 zilizohakikiwa, kwa utoaji wa siku hiyo hiyo na ufadhili wa orodha ili kupunguza msuguano wa mtiririko wa pesa kwa maagizo ya kawaida na kuongeza fursa za mauzo.
yo: Àwọn onílé-ìkọ́jàsí lè lo ohun èlò ìmúṣẹ́ṣe orí ẹ̀rọ aláàgbéká náà láti rí àyè sí àwọn ọjà aláṣẹ tí wọ́n lé ní 8,000, pẹ̀lú ìfọjàjíṣẹ́ ọlọ́jọ́kan-náà àti ètò ìyáwórajà láti mú àdínkù bá wàhálà ìṣàn-owó fún ìbéèrè ọjà lóòrèkóòrè àti láti mú kí ọjà títà yá dáadáa.
zu: Abanikazi bezitolo bangasebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza lweselula ukuthola imikhiqizo engaphezu kuka-8,000 ehloliwe, ngokudiliva kosuku olufanayo nokuxhaswa ngezimali kwe-inventory ukuze kuncishiswe ukungqubuzana kwemali etholakalayo kuma-oda avamile nokwandisa amathuba okuthengisa.

am: ሬሜዲያል በመስከረም 2022 የ 4.4 ሚሊዮን ዶላር የዘር ፋይናንስ ማስታወቂያውን ሲያሳውቅ፣ ኢኩዋዳ ጅምር ሥራው ቀድሞውኑ በ 16 የናይጄሪያ ግዛቶች ውስጥ እየሰራ መሆኑን እና ወደ ቀሪው የአገሪቱ ክፍል ለመስፋፋት እቅድ እንዳለው ገልጧል።
en: When Remedial announced its $4.4 million seed funding in September 2022, Okwuada revealed that the startup was already operating in 16 states of Nigeria and had plans to spread to the rest of the country.
ha: Lokacin da Remedial ya sanar da tallafin iri na dala miliyan $4.4 a watan Satumba na 2022, Okwuada ya bayyana cewa kamfanin mai farfaɗowa ya riga ya fara aiki a jihohi 16 na Nijeriya kuma yana da shirin yaɗuwa zuwa sauran sassan ƙasar.
sw: WakatiRemedial ilipotangaza ufadhili muhimu wa $4. 4 milioni mwezi Septemba 2022, Okwuada alieleza kuwa mradi huo ulikuwa tayari unafanya kazi katika majimbo 16 nchini Nigeria ulikuwa na mipango ya kuenea kwa nchi nzima.
yo: Nígbà tí Remedial kéde owó ìdókòwò mílíọ̀nù $4.4 tí ó rí ní oṣù Ọ̀wẹ̀wẹ̀, ọdún 2022 ni Okwuada ṣe àfihàn pé ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ náà ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ní ṣiṣẹ́ ní àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ 16 ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria tí ó sì ń ṣètò láti tàn ká lọ sí àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ tí ó kù ni orílẹ̀-èdè náà.
zu: Ngenkathi i-Remedial imemezela uxhaso lwayo loxhaso lwezigidi ezi--$4.4 ngoMandulo wezi- 2022, u-Okwuada wembula ukuthi ukuqalisa kwase kusebenza ezifundazweni ezingu-16 zaseNigeria futhi kunezinhlelo zokusabalala ezweni lonke.

am: በአሁኑ ወቅት ኩባንያው ከ300 በላይ አምራቾች ጋር እንደሚሰራና ከ5,000 በላይ ሆስፒታሎች፣ ፋርማሲዎች እና የባለቤትነት የፈጠራ ባለቤትነት መድኃኒት አቅራቢዎች( ፒፒኤምቪኤስ) በናይጄሪያ 36 ግዛቶች ውስጥ በ34 አካባቢዎች እንደሚያገለግል ገልጿል።
en: Now, the company says it works with over 300 manufacturers and serves over 5,000 hospitals, pharmacies, and Proprietary Patent Medicine Vendors (PPMVs) across 34 of Nigeria's 36 states.
ha: Yanzu, kamfanin ya ce yana aiki da masana'antu sama da 300 kuma yana hidimtawa sama da asibitoci 5,000, kantinan magani, da kuma masu sayar da magunguna na mallaka (PPMVs) a cikin jihohi 34 na 36 na Nijeriya.
sw: Sasa, kampuni hiyo inasema inafanya kazi na watengenezaji zaidi ya 300 na inahudumia zaidi ya hospitali 5.000, maduka ya dawa na Wauzaji wa Madawa ya Hakimiiki (PPMV2) katka majibu 34 kati ya 36 ya Nigeria.
yo: Báyìí, ilé-iṣẹ́ náà sọ pé òun ń ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú àwọn aṣèlọ́po tí wọ́n lé ní 300 tí òun sì tún ń ṣiṣẹ́ fún àwọn ilé-ìtajà òògùn, ilé-ìwòsàn àti àwọn Òǹtajà Òògùn Alábọ́dé Oníwèé-àṣẹ (PPMVs) tí wọ́n lé ní 5,000 káàkiri àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ 34 nínú àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ 36 ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria.
zu: Manje, inkampani ithi isebenza nabakhiqizi abangaphezu kuka-300 futhi inikeza izibhedlela ezingaphezu kuka-5,000, amakhemisi, kanye nabathengisi bemithi ye-Proprietary Patent Medicine (PPMVs) kuzo zonke izifundazwe ezingama-34 kwezingu-36 zaseNigeria.

am: ኩባንያው ከዓመት ባነሰ ጊዜ ውስጥ እንዴት ወደ አብዛኞቹ የናይጄሪያ ግዛቶች መስፋፋቱን ሲጠየቁ ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚው አገሪቱን እንደተመለከቱ እና አሁን ንግዱ እንዴት እንደሚሠራ እንደሚረዱ ተናግረዋል።
en: When asked how the company had expanded into most states in Nigeria in less than a year, the CEO said he observed the country and now understands how the business works.
ha: Da aka tambaye shi yadda kamfanin ya faɗaɗa zuwa mafi yawan jihohin Nijeriya cikin ƙasa da shekara guda, shugaban ya ce ya lura da ƙasar kuma yanzu ya fahimci yadda kasuwancin yake gudana.
sw: Alipoulizwa jinsi hiyo kampuni ilivyopanuka hadi kufika kwenye majibu mengi hivyo nchini Nigeria ndani ya mwaka mmoja pekee, Mkurugenzi Mtendaji alisema aliangalia na sasa anaelewa jinsi biashara ilivyofanya azi.
yo: Nígbà tí wọ́n bèèrè pé báwo ni ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ti ṣe gbòòrò wọ inú ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ ní ilẹ̀ Nigeria kí ọdún kan tó pé, Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà sọ pé òun ti fimú fínlẹ̀ ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà tí òun sì wá lóye bí òkòwò náà ṣe ń ṣiṣẹ́.
zu: Lapho ebuzwa ukuthi inkampani isikhule kanjani ezifundazweni eziningi eNigeria esikhathini esingaphansi konyaka, i-CEO ithe ibone izwe futhi manje iyaqonda ukuthi ibhizinisi lisebenza kanjani.

am: አክለውም ኩባንያው በተቻለ መጠን ብዙ ሰዎችን ለመድረስ እንደሚፈልግ ተናግረዋል።
en: He added that the company wanted to reach as many people as possible.
ha: Ya ƙara da cewa kamfanin yana son kai wa ga mutane da yawa gwargwadon iko.
sw: Aliongea kuwa kampuni hiyo inataka kuwafikia watu wengi iwezekanavyo.
yo: Ó tún fi kún un pé ilé-iṣẹ́ náà fẹ́ fi ọwọ́ bá ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn èèyàn sí i ni.
zu: Wengeze ngokuthi inkampani ifuna ukufinyelela kubantu abaningi.

am: በተጨማሪም ፣ኩባንያው በሁሉም 36 ግዛቶች ውስጥ ቢሰራጭም በሁለት አካባቢዎች ሠራተኞችን አልቀጠረም ብሏል።
en: Further, he stated while the company distributes in all 36 states, it hasn't hired staff in two locations.
ha: Bugu da ƙari, ya ce yayin da kamfanin ke rarrabawa a duk jihohi 36, bai ɗauki ma’aikata aiki a wurare biyu ba.
sw: Zaidi ya hayo alisema wakati kampuni hiyo inasambaa kwenye majimbo yote 34 hajaajiri wafanyakazi katika maeneo mawili.
yo: Ó tún tẹ̀síwájú pé nígbà tí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ń ṣe ìpínká ọjà ní gbogbo ìpínlẹ̀ 36, kò tí ì gba òṣìṣẹ́ ní ibi méjì.
zu: Ngaphezu kwalokho, uthe ngenkathi inkampani isabalalisa kuzo zonke izifundazwe ezingama-36, ayikaze iqashe abasebenzi ezindaweni ezimbili.

am: ይህ በእንዲህ እንዳለ፣ ያንን ማሳካት ከችግሮች ጋር መጣ፣ እና ኡኩዋዳ እንደ" ሎጂስቲካዊ የምሽት ሰቆቃ" ሲል ይገልፅዋል።''
en: Meanwhile, achieving that came with challenges, and Okwuada described it as a “logistical nightmare.”
ha: A halin da ake ciki, cim ma hakan ya zo da ƙalubale, kuma Okwuada ya bayyana shi a matsayin "mafarkin dabara."
sw: Wakati huo huo, kufikia hilo kulikuja na changamoto na Okwuade alielezea kama ndoto mbaya ya vifaa.
yo: Àmọ́ ṣá, ṣíṣe àṣeyọrí ìyẹn kò wáyé láìsí àwọn ìṣòro rárá, tí Okwuada ṣe àlàyé wọn gẹ́gẹ́ bíi "ìran ìfọjàránṣẹ́ tí ń dẹ́rù bani".
zu: Khonamanjalo, ukufeza lokho kufike nezinselelo, futhi u-Okwuada wakuchaza “njengephupho elibi lokuhlela.”

am: "አንድ ዕቃን በመንገድ ላይ ማንቀሳቀስ የሎጂስቲክስ የምሽት ሰቆቃ ነው፣ —ከፈለጉ የሦስተኛ ወገን አጋርን ከማግኘት —እስከ ደካማ መንገዶች እስከ የነዳጅ ድጐማዎች መወገድ፣ ይህም ለሸማቾች የነዳጅ ጭማሪን ያስከትላል፣ ይህም 100% ማለፍ አይችሉም፣ በመንገድ ላይ ያሉ የሕግ አስከባሪዎችን ለመበዝበዝ እዚያ ይገኛሉ።"
en: "Moving an item on the road is a logistical nightmare, from finding a third-party partner — if you need one — to poor roads to the removal of fuel subsidies, resulting in an increase in fuel to consumers that you cannot pass on 100%, to law enforcement on the road who are there to demand extortion."
ha: “Yawo da kaya a kan titi babban abun damuwa ne, tun daga samun abokin tarayya na uku — idan kuna buƙatar guda ɗaya — zuwa rashin kyawun hanyoyin zuwa cire tallafin mai, wanda ke haifar da haɓakar mai ga masu amfani da ba za ku iya wuce 100% ba, ga jami’an tsaro a kan hanya waɗanda suke can suna neman karbar kuɗi”.
sw: "Kuhaminisha bidhaa barabarani ni ndoto mbaya sana, kuanzia kuatafuta mshirika mwingine- ikiwa unahitaji, hadi barabara mbovu hadi kuondolewa kwa ruzuku ya mafuta, na kusababisha katika ongeeko la mafuta kwa watumiaji ambao huwezi kupitisha 100%, kwa vyombo vya sheria, barabarani ambao wapo kudai ulafi"
yo: "Gbígbé nǹkan lójú òpópónà jẹ́ ìran ìfọjàránṣẹ́ tí ń dẹ́rù bani, láti orí ṣíṣe àwárí alábàáṣe ẹnìkẹta — bí o bá nílò ọ̀kan — sí àwọn ọ̀nà tí kò dára dé orí owó ìrànwọ́ orí epo tí wọ́n yọ, èyí tí ó fa ọ̀wọ́ngógó epo fún àwọn aṣàmúlò tí kò sì ṣe é má lò, sí ti àwọn agbófinró ojú pópó tí wọ́n ń fi ipá gba owó."
zu: “Ukuhambisa into emgwaqeni kuyiphupho elibi, kusukela ekutholeni umaqondana — uma umdinga — kuya emigwaqweni engemihle kuya ekususweni kwezibonelelo zikaphethiloli, okuholela ekunyukeni kukaphethiloli kubathengi ongakwazi ukuwudlulisela ngo-100%. , kwabomthetho emgwaqeni abasuke befuna ukuqolwa."

am: ሆኖም፣ ኩባንያው ተግዳሮቱን እንደሚረዳ እና አገሪቱ እንዴት እንደምትሠራ ሙሉ በሙሉ ባይሆንም በሁሉም ግዛቶች ውስጥ በተሳካ ሁኔታ ለማሰራጨት በሚያስችል ከፍተኛ ደረጃ እንደሚያውቅ ይናገራል።
en: However, he claims that the company understands the challenge and knows how the country works, albeit not completely, but to a high enough level that it can successfully distribute across all states.
ha: Sai dai ya yi iƙirarin cewa kamfanin ya fahimci ƙalubalen kuma ya san yadda ƙasar ke aiki, duk da cewa ba gaba ɗaya ba, amma a matakin da ya dace da zai iya samun nasarar rarrabawa a duk jihohin.
sw: Hata hivyo, anadai kuwa kampuni hiyo inaelewa changamoto hiyo na inajua jinsi nchi inavyofanya kazi, ingawa siyo kabisa, lakini kwa kiwango cha juu cha kutosha ambacho inaweza kufanikiwa kusambazwa katika majimbo yote".
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n ó wí pé ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ti mọ àwọn ìṣòro náà tí ó sì ti mọ bí nǹkan ṣe ń lọ ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà, bí kò tilẹ̀ nímọ̀ kíkún ṣùgbọ́n ó mọ̀ ọ́ dé àyè kan tí yóò fi ṣiṣẹ́ ìfọjàránṣẹ́ ní àṣeyọrí káàkiri gbogbo àwọn ìpínlẹ̀.
zu: Kodwa-ke, uthi inkampani iyayiqonda inselele futhi iyazi ukuthi izwe lisebenza kanjani, nakuba kungenjalo ngokuphelele, kodwa ezingeni eliphezulu ngokwanele ukuthi lingasabalalisa ngempumelelo kuzo zonke izifundazwe.

am: ጅማሬ ገንዘብ ከተቀበለበት ጊዜ ጀምሮ ኩባንያው የሰራተኞቹን ቁጥር በእጥፍ፣ ገቢውን በአምስት እጥፍ እና የደንበኞቹን መሠረት በሦስት እጥፍ ጨምሯል።
en: Since receiving seed funding, the company has increased its headcount by twofold, its revenue by five times, and its customer base by three times.
ha: Tun lokacin da kamfanin ya samu tallafin farawa, ya ƙara yawan kididdigarsa da ninki biyu, kuɗaɗen shigarsa sau biyar, sannan kuma abokan hulɗarsa da sau uku.
sw: Tangu kupokea ufadhili muhimu, kampuni imeongeza idadi yake mara mbili mapato yake mara tano, na wateja wake mara tatu.
yo: Láti ìgbà tí ó ti gba owó ìdókòwò ìbẹ̀rẹ̀, iye àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ti di ìlọ́po méjì, owó àmúwọlé rẹ̀ ti di ìlọ́po márùn-ún, tí àwọn oníbàárà rẹ̀ náà sì ti di ìlọ́po mẹ́ta.
zu: Selokhu yathola uxhaso lokuqala, inkampani ikhulise inani layo ngokuphindwe kabili, imali engenayo ngokuphindwe kahlanu, kanye nenani lamakhasimende ayo ngokuphindwe kathathu.

am: ከዚህም በላይ ሪሜዲያል አሁን ያሉትን አቅርቦቶች በአዳዲስ አገልግሎቶች ለማስፋት አቅዷል፣ ይህም ክፍያዎችን እና እንደ ሐኪም ጉብኝት ወይም የርቀት ምርመራ ያሉ የመጀመሪያ ደረጃ የጤና እንክብካቤ አገልግሎቶችን ያጠቃልላል።
en: What's more, Remedial plans to expand its existing offerings with new services, including payments and primary healthcare services like doctor visits or remote diagnostics.
ha: Mene ne ƙari, Remedial yana shirin faɗaɗa abubuwan da yake bayarwa tare da sababbin ayyuka, gami da biyan kuɗi da sabis na kiwon lafiya na farko kamar ziyarar likita ko bincika lafiya daga nesa.
sw: Zaidi ya hayo, Remedia inapanga kupanua matoleo yake yaliyopo kwenye huduma mpya, ikiwa ni pamoja na huduma za afya ya msingi kama vile kutembelea daktari au uchunguzi wa mbali.
yo: Kí ló tún kù, Remedial ń ṣètò láti ṣe ìfẹ̀lójú àwọn ètò iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ tẹ́lẹ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn iṣẹ́ tuntun, bíi ètò ìsanwó àti ìpèsè àwọn ètò ìlera ìbẹ̀rẹ̀pẹ̀pẹ̀ bíi àbẹ̀wò sí dókítà àbí ìṣàyẹ̀wò àìsàn láti ilé.
zu: Ngaphezu kwalokho, i-Remedial ihlela ukukhulisa ukunikezwa kwayo okukhona ngamasevisi amasha, okuhlanganisa izinkokhelo nezinsizakalo zokunakekelwa kwezempilo okuyisisekelo njengokuvakasha kodokotela noma ukuxilongwa umuntu ekude.

am: የጤና ሌን 2.4 ሚሊዮን ዶላር አሰባስቧል፣ ከዚያም ከታላቅ የሥራ ቦታ ወደ ዕዳ ፣ደመወዝ፣ መባረር እና ፈንድ ማዘዋወር ተጓዘ።
en: Healthlane raised $2.4m, then went from a great workplace to owed salaries, layoffs, and fund diversions.
ha: Healthlane ya tara dala miliyan $2.4, sannan ya tashi daga babban wurin aiki zuwa albashin da ake bin shi, kora, da karkatar da kuɗaɗe.
sw: Healthlane iliongeza $2.4 m, kisha ikatoka mahali pa kazi pazuri kwa mishahara inaodaiwa, kuachishwa kazi na kughairi pesa.
yo: Healthlane ṣe àgbàjọ $2.4m, tí ó sì kúrò ní ilé-iṣẹ́ dáadáa di èyí tí ó ń jẹ owó oṣù, ó lé àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ kúrò lẹ́nu iṣẹ́, tí ó sì darí owó iṣẹ́ sí ibòmíràn.
zu: I-Healthlane inyuse u-$2.4m, yabe isisuka endaweni ekahle yokusebenzela yaya emiholweni eyikweletwayo, yadiliza abasebenzi, yaphinde yahlukaniswa nezimali.

am: አሁን የ ኤ ዝገባን ከፍ እያደረገ ነው
en: Now it’s reportedly raising a Series A
ha: Yanzu an bayar da rahoton cewa yana samar da Series A
sw: Sasa inaripotiwa kuibua Series A
yo: Báyìí wọ́n wí pé ó fẹ́ ṣe àgbéjáde Àṣetẹ̀léra A.
zu: Manje kubikwa ukuthi iphakamisa uchungechunge A

am: የካሜሩን የጤና ቴክኖሎጂ ጅምር፣ የጤና ሌን በተሰጥኦ እናት ውስንነት((የጤና ሌን)፣ ህዳር 9 ቀን 2021 በናይጄሪያ በይፋ ሲጀመር፣ ዋና አዘጋጃችን ኢማኑኤል ፖል በናይጄሪያ ሌጎስ ሌኪ ውስጥ በሚገኘው የጤናሌን ቢሮ በተከናወነው ዝግጅት ላይ ተገኝተዋል።
en: When Cameroonian healthtech startup, HEALTHLANE BY GIFTEDMOM LIMITED (Healthlane), officially launched in Nigeria on November 9, 2021, our Managing Editor, Emmanuel Paul, attended the event at the Healthlane office in Lekki, Lagos, Nigeria.
ha: Lokacin da kamfanin kiwon lafiya mai farowa na Kamaru, HEALTHLANE BY GIFTEDMOM LIMITED (Healthlane), wanda aka ƙaddamar a hukumance a Nijeriya a ranar 9 ga Nuwamba, 2021, Manajan Editanmu, Emmanuel Paul, ya halarci taron a ofishin Healthlane da ke Lekki, Legas, Nijeriya.
sw: Wakati mradi wa teknolojia ya afya ya Kameruni, HEALTLANE BY GIFTEDMOM LIMITED (Healthlane) ulipozinduliwa rasmi nchini Nigeria mwezi Novemba 9, 2021, Mhariri wetu msimamizi, Emmanuel Paul, alihudhuria hafla hiyo kwenye ofsi ya Healthlane huko Lekki, Lagos, Nigeria.
yo: Nígbà tí HEALTHLANE BY GIFTEDMOM LIMITED (Healthlane), ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ afìmẹ̀ẹ̀rọṣètòòlera láti Kenya, ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ alákọọ́lẹ̀ ní ọjọ́ 9 oṣù Kọkànlá, ọdún 2021, Olóòtú Ètò wa, Emmanuel Paul lọ sí ibi ayẹyẹ náà ní ọ́fíìsì Healthlane ní Lekki, ìlú Èkó ti Nigeria.
zu: Ngenkathi ukuqaliswa kobuchwepheshe bezempilo baseCameroonia, HEALTHLANE BY GIFTEDMOM LIMITED (Healthlane), yethulwa ngokusemthethweni eNigeria zi-9, kuL;wezi wezi 2021, Umhleli wethu Ophethe, u-Emmanuel Paul, uhambele umcimbi ehhovisi le-Healthlane eLekki, eLagos, eNigeria.

am: በመክፈቻው ዝግጅት ላይ አላን ንቴፍ( ዋና ሥራ አስፈጻሚ) እና አግቦር አሹማኒ አኮ( የጋራ መስራች እና የህክምና ዳይሬክተር) አፍሪካውያን ጥራት ያለው እና ተመጣጣኝ የጤና እንክብካቤ አገልግሎቶችን እንዲያገኙ ለመርዳት በ 2019 በካሜሩን ውስጥ ሄልዝላኔን እንደጀመሩ ተነግሯል።
en: At the launch event, it was said that Alain Nteff (CEO) and Agbor Ashumanyi Ako (Co-founder and Medical Director) started Healthlane in Cameroon in 2019 to help Africans get quality and affordable healthcare services.
ha: A wajen ƙaddamar da taron, an bayyana cewa, Alain Nteff (Shugaba) da Agbor Ashumanyi Ako (Co-founder and Medical Director) sun fara Healthlane a Kamaru a shekarar 2019 don taimakawa 'yan Afirka su sami ingantaccen sabis na kiwon lafiya mai araha.
sw: Katika hafla ya uzinduzi ilisemekana kuwa Alain Nteff (Mwanzilishi-mwenza na Mkurugenzi wa Matibabu) walianzisha Healthlane nchini Kameruni mwaka 2019, katika kusaidia waafrika kupata huduma bora na za bei nafuu za Afya.
yo: Níbi ayẹyẹ ìfilọ́lẹ̀ náà, wọ́n pé Alain Nteff (Adarí Ètò Iṣẹ́) àti Agbo Ashumanyi Ako (Alájọdásílẹ̀ àti Adarí ètò Ìlera) bẹ̀rẹ̀ Healthlane ní ìlú Cameroon ní ọdún 2019 láti ran àwọn èèyàn ilẹ̀ Africa lọ́wọ́ kí wọ́n lè ní àǹfààní sí àwọn ètò ìlera tí ó jọjú tí kò sì fa àpò ya.
zu: Emcimbini wokwethulwa, kwathiwa u-Alain Nteff (CEO) kanye no-Agbor Ashumanyi Ako (umsunguli kanye noMqondisi Wezokwelapha) baqale i-Heallane eCameroon ngo-2019 ukusiza abantu base-Afrika ukuthi bathole izinsizakalo zezempilo ezisezingeni eliphezulu nezithengekayo.

am: ከጤና ሌን የቤት ውስጥ ሐኪሞች መካከል አንዱ ጅምር እስከ 78 የተለያዩ ምርመራዎችን እንዳቀረበ ገልጧል፣ ውጤቶቹም በተለምዶ በ 45 ደቂቃዎች ውስጥ ናቸው።
en: One of Healthlane’s in-house physicians revealed that the startup provided up to 78 different tests, with results normally out in 45 minutes.
ha: Ɗaya daga cikin likitocin cikin gida na Healthlane ya bayyana cewa kamfanin ya samar da gwaje-gwaje daban-daban har guda 78, tare da sakamako yawanci a cikin mintuna 45.
sw: Mmoja wa madaktari wa ndani wa Healthlane alieleza kuwa uanzishaji huo ulitoa hadi vipimo 78 tofautina matokeo kawaida hutoka ndani ya dakika 45.
yo: Ọ̀kan nínú àwọn onímọ̀-òògùn tí wọ́n jẹ́ òṣìṣẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ṣe àfihàn pé ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ náà ń pèsè irú orísi àyẹ̀wò 78 tí àwọn èsì wọn sì máa ń jáde lẹ́yìn ìṣẹ́jú 45.
zu: Omunye wodokotela abangaphakathi kwaHealtlane uveze ukuthi ukuqalisa kunikeze izivivinyo ezifika kwezingama-78, imiphumela ivamise ukuphuma emizuzwini engama-45.

am: ኩባንያው ከሙከራዎቹ ውጤቶች በመነሳት የአመጋገብ፣ የተጨማሪ ምግብ ወይም የአካል ብቃት እንቅስቃሴ እቅድ አቅርቧል።
en: The company offered a feeding, supplement, or exercise plan from the results of the tests.
ha: Kamfanin ya ba da tsarin ciyarwa, ƙari, ko motsa jiki daga sakamakon gwaje-gwajen.
sw: Kampuni ilitoa mpango wa lishe, nyongeza, au mazoezi kutoka kwenye matokeo ya majaribio.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ náà máa ń ṣe ìyànjú ètò ìjẹun, ètò àjẹsára amárajípépé àbí ètò eré ìdárayá láti ara àwọn èsì àwọn àyẹ̀wò náà.
zu: Inkampani inikeze uhlelo lokuphakela, ukwengezela, noma lokuzivocavoca oluvela emiphumeleni yokuhlolwa.

am: ስለዚህ፣ በ 2022 አንዳንድ የቴክፖይንት አፍሪካ ሠራተኞች — ቺምጎዚሪም ኑዎኮማ፣ ዪንካ አዎሳንያ፣ አማኑኤል ፖል እና ክቡር ሞጎሊ— መድረኩን ተጠቅመዋል።
en: So, in 2022, some Techpoint Africa employees — Chimgozirim Nwokoma, Yinka Awosanya, Emmanuel Paul, and Precious Mogoli— used the platform.
ha: Don haka, a cikin 2022, wasu ma'aikatan Techpoint Africa - Chimgozirim Nwokoma, Yinka Awosanya, Emmanuel Paul, da Precious Mogoli— sun yi amfani da dandalin.
sw: Kwa hiyo, mwaka 2022, baadhi ya wafanyakazi wa Techpoint Africa Chimgozirim Nwokoma, Yinka Awosanya, Emmanuel Paul, na Precious Mogolie walitumia jukwaa hilo.
yo: Nítorí náà, ní ọdún 2022, àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ Techpoint Africa kan — Chimgozirim Nwokoma, Yinka Awosanya, Emmanuel Paul àti Precious Mogoli— lọ lò sí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà.
zu: Ngakho, ngo-2022, abanye abasebenzi be-Techpoint Africa - uChimgozirim Nwokoma, u-Yinka Awosanya, u-Emmanuel Paul, no-Precious Mogoli- basebenzisa inkundla.

am: ሞጎሊ፣ ኑዎኮማ እና ፖል ለሙሉ ሰውነት ምርመራ ሲመዘገቡ አዋሳንያ የሄፓታይተስ ቢ ክትባቱን ለመውሰድ ተመዝግቧል።
en: While Mogoli, Nwokoma, and Paul signed up for a full-body check-up plan, Awosanya signed up to get his Hepatitis B vaccination.
ha: A yayin da Mogoli, Nwokoma, da Paul suka rattaɓa hannu kan shirin duba lafiyar jiki gaba daya, Awosanya ya sanya hannu don samun rigakafin cutar Hepatitis B.
sw: Wakti Mogoli, Nwokoma na Paul walijiandikisha kwa ajili ya mpango wa uchunguzi wa mwili mzima, Awosanya alijiandikisha kupata chanjo yake ya Hepatitis B.
yo: Nígbà tí Mogoli, Nwokoma àti Paul fi orúkọ wọn sílẹ̀ fún ètò àyẹ̀wò gbogbo ara, Awosanya fi orúkọ rẹ̀ sílẹ̀ láti gba abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára fún ààrùn jẹ̀dọ̀jẹ̀dọ̀ B.
zu: Ngesikhathi uMogoli, uNwokoma, kanye no-Paul bebhalisela uhlelo lokuhlola umzimba wonke, u-Awosanya ubhalisele ukuthola umjovo wakhe we-Hepatitis B.

am: ነገር ግን በመስከረም ወር አዋሳንያ የመጨረሻውን የክትባት መጠን መውሰድ በፈለገበት ወቅት የጤና ሌን እየሰራ እንዳልሆነ የሚጠቁሙ አሳሳቢ ምልክቶችን አስተውሏል።
en: But when, in September, Awosanya wanted to take the last dose of the vaccine, he noticed worrying signals suggesting that Healthlane might not be working.
ha: Amma lokacin da, a cikin Satumba, Awosanya ya so ya ɗauki kashi na ƙarshe na maganin, ya lura da alamun damuwa da ke nuna cewa mai yiwuwa Healthlane ba ya aiki.
sw: Lakini wakati, mwezi Septemba, Awosanya alipotaka kuchukua dozi ya mwisho ya chanjo, aliona ishara za wasiwasi zinazopendekeza kuwa Healthlane inaweza kuwa haifanyi kazi.
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n nígbà tí ó di oṣù Ọ̀wẹ̀wẹ̀ tí Awosanya fẹ́ gba ìwọ̀n òògùn àjẹsára ìkẹyìn ni ó ti ń ṣe àkíyèsí tí ó ń kọni lóminú pé Healthlane ò ṣiṣẹ́ mọ́ tààrà.
zu: Kodwa ngenkathi, ngoMandulo, u-Awosanya efuna ukuthatha umthamo wokugcina womgomo, wabona izimpawu ezikhathazayo eziphakamisa ukuthi i-Healthlane ingase ingasebenzi.

am: “የመጀመሪያው ምላሽ ዶክተሩ በዙሪያው የለም የሚል ነበር፣” አዋሳንያ ያስታውሳል” ፣ በኋላ ቢሮአቸው እየተስተካከለ እንደሆነና ወደ ቤቴ ወይም ቢሮዬ መጥተው እንደሚያስተዳድሩት ተነገረኝ። ነገር ግን በጭራሽ አልመጡም።
en: “The initial response was that the doctor wasn’t around,” Awosanya recalls, “Later, I was told that their office was being renovated and that they’d come to my house or office to administer it. But they never did.
ha: “Amsar farko ita ce likitan ba ya nan,” Awosanya ya tuna, “Daga baya, an gaya mini cewa ana gyara ofishinsu kuma za su zo gidana ko ofishina don gudanar da shi. Amma ba su taɓa yi ba.
sw: Jibu la awali lilikuwa kwamba dakitali hayupo, Awosanya anakumbuka, niliambiwa kuwa ofsi yao ilikuwa inafanyiwa ukarabati kwahyo wangekuwa nyumbani au ofsini kwangu kuisimamia. Lakini hawakuwahi kufanya hivyo.
yo: Awosanya rántí sọ pé, "Ìdáhùn àkọ́kọ́ ni pé dókítà ò sí nílé. Nígbà tí ó yá, wọ́n sọ fún mi pé àwọn ń ṣe àtúnṣe ní ọ́fíìsì àwọn àti pé àwọn máa wá sí ilé àbí ọ́fíìsì mi láti fún mi ní òògùn náà. Ṣùgbọ́n wọn ò ṣe nǹkankan.
zu: “Ukusabela kokuqala kwaba ukuthi udokotela wayengekho,” kukhumbula u-Awosanya, “kamuva, ngatshelwa ukuthi ihhovisi labo lalilungiswa nokuthi babeza endlini yami noma ehhovisi ukuze bangiqondise. Kodwa abazange bakwenze lokho.

am: እና ከዚያ በኋላ ፣መተግበሪያቸው መሥራት አቆመ።
en: And afterwards, their app stopped working.”
ha: Kuma bayan haka, app ɗin su ya daina aiki."
sw: Na baadaye programu yao iliacha kufanya kazi
yo: Lẹ́yìn ìgbà náà sì ni ohun èlò ìmúṣẹ́ṣe wọn kò ṣiṣẹ́ mọ́."
zu: Ngemva kwalokho, uhlelo lwabo lwayeka ukusebenza.”

am: በነሐሴ እና መስከረም መካከል፣ በቴክፖይንት አፍሪካ የኤችኤምኦ አገልግሎት አማካኝነት ከሁለት ሐኪሞች ሁለት የተለያዩ ምርመራዎችን ተቀብያለሁ።
en: Between August and September, I received two different diagnoses from two doctors via Techpoint Africa’s HMO service.
ha: A tsakanin Agusta da Satumba, na sami nau'ikan cututtukan guda biyu daban-daban daga likitoci biyu ta hanyar sabis na HMO na Techpoint Africa.
sw: Kati ya Agosti na Septemba, nilipokea vipimo vipimo viwili tofauti kutoka kwa madaktari wawili kupitia huduma ya HMO ya Techpoint Africa.
yo: Láàárín oṣù Kẹjọ àti oṣù Ọ̀wẹ̀wẹ̀, mo ṣe àyẹ̀wò ìwádìí lọ́dọ̀ àwọn dókítà méjì ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ nípasẹ̀ ètò ìṣàkóso ìlera ti ilé-iṣẹ́ Techpoint Africa.
zu: Phakathi kuka-Ncwaba noMandulo, ngathola ukuxilonga okubili okuhlukene kodokotela ababili ngesevisi ye-HMO ye-Techpoint Africa.

am: የምርመራ ውጤታቸው ምን ያህል ትክክለኛ እንደሆነ ለማወቅ ጓጉቼ ነበር።
en: I was wondering how accurate their diagnoses were.
ha: Ina mamakin yadda ingancin bincikensu ya kasance.
sw: Nilikuwa nikishangaa jinsi utambuzi wao ulivyokuwa sahihi.
yo: Mò ń fẹ́ láti ṣe àwáfín bí àyẹ̀wò ìwádìí wọn ṣe bára mu tó.
zu: Bengizibuza ukuyikho kangakanani ukuxilonga kwabo.

am: ከዚህም ባሻገር ፣አንዳንድ መድኃኒቶች ተሰጥተውኝ የነበረ ሲሆን በምርመራው ልዩነት ምክንያት መውሰዴን አቆምኩ።
en: Besides, I was given some medications, which I discontinued due to the distinct difference in diagnosis.
ha: Bayan haka, an ba ni wasu magunguna, waɗanda na dakatar da su saboda bambancin a yadda aka rubata min.
sw: Mbali na hilo, nilipewa baadhi ya dawa, ambazo niliziacha kutokana na utambuzi tofauti tofauti.
yo: Yàtọ̀ fún ìyẹn, wọ́n fún mi ní àwọn òògùn kan, èyí tí èmi ò lò mọ́ látààrí ìyàtọ̀ gédégédé tí ó wà nínú àyẹ̀wò ìwádìí náà.
zu: Ngaphandle kwalokho, nganikezwa imithi ethile, engayekisa ngenxa yomehluko ocacile wokuxilongwa.

am: ለሁለተኛ አስተያየት በመፈለግ ምርመራዎችን ለማረጋገጥ አንዳንድ ምርመራዎችን ማካሄድ ፈለግሁ፣ ስለሆነም የጤናሌን መተግበሪያን ከጉግል ፕሌይ መደብር አውርጄ እየሰራ አለመሆኑን ተገነዘብኩ።
en: Seeking a second opinion, I wanted to run some tests to confirm the diagnoses, so I downloaded the Healthlane app from the Google Play Store only to realise it was not working.
ha: Neman ra'ayi na biyu, ina so in gudanar da wasu gwaje-gwaje don tabbatar da cutar, don haka na sauke manhajar Healthlane daga Google Play Store amma sai na gane cewa ba ya aiki.
sw: Kutafuta maoni ya pili, nilitaka kufanya vipimo ili kuthibitisha utambuzi, kwa hivyo nilipakua program ya Healthlane kutoka kwenye duka la (Google playstore) na kugundua kuwa haifanyi kazi.
yo: Kí n lè tún gbọ́ láti ẹnu kejì, mo fẹ́ ṣe àwọn àyẹ̀wò kan kí n lè ṣẹ̀rí àwọn àyẹ̀wò ìwádìí náà, mo ṣe ìgbàsílẹ̀ ohun èlò ìmúṣẹ́ṣe Healthlane láti orí Google Play Store ni mo bá tún rí i pé kò ṣiṣẹ́ rárá.
zu: Ngifuna umbono wesibili, bengifuna ukuhlolwa ukuze ngiqinisekise ukuxilonga, ngakho ngilande uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-Heallane esitolo u-Google Play ukuze ngibone ukuthi belungasebenzi.

am: በተጨማሪም በአፕል መተግበሪያ መደብር ውስጥ በሚጠረጠር ሁኔታ ጠፍቷል።
en: It was also curiously missing on the Apple App Store.
ha: Har ila yau, babu a kan Apple App Store.
sw: Pia ilikosekana kwa kushangaza kwenye Apple App Store.
yo: Ó tún jẹ́ kàyéfì pé kò sí lórí Apple App Store.
zu: Ibilahlekile futhi ku-Apple App Store.

am: ከኩባንያው ነባርና የቀድሞ ሠራተኞች ጋር መገናኘት ጀመርኩ፤ ያገኘሁት ነገር ደግሞ ከፈራሁት በላይ ነበር።
en: I began reaching out to the company's current and former employees, and what I discovered was bigger than what I feared.
ha: Na fara tuntuɓar ma’aikatan kamfanin na yanzu da na dā, kuma abin da na gano ya fi abin da nake tsoro.
sw: Nilianza kuwasiliana na wafanyakazi wa sasa na wa zamani wa kampuni, nilichogundua kilikuwa kikubwa kuliko kile nilichoogopa.
yo: Mo wá bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ní kàn sí àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ tí wọ́n ń ṣiṣẹ́ ní ilé-iṣẹ́ náà àti àwọn tí wọ́n ti kúrò níbẹ̀, ohun tí mo ṣàwárí ju ohun tí mo lérò lọ.
zu: Ngaqala ukufinyelela kubasebenzi benkampani bamanje nabangaphambili, futhi engakuthola kwakukukhulu kunalokho engangikwesaba.

am: ነገር ግን፣ይህን መረጃ ከማቅረባችን በፊት ወደ መጀመሪያው እንመለስ።
en: But, before I take you through this exposé, let's go back to the beginning.
ha: Amma, kafin in kai ku cikin wannan fallasa, bari mu koma farkon.
sw: Lakini, kabla sijakupitisha kwenye ufichuaji huu, ebu turejee mwanzo.
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n kí n tó máa fún yín ní àwọn ìròyìn tuntun yìí, ẹ jẹ́ kí á padà sí ìbẹ̀rẹ̀pẹ̀pẹ̀.
zu: Kodwa, ngaphambi kokuthi ngikudlulisele kulokhu kudalulwa, ake sibuyele ekuqaleni.

am: መጀመሪያ ላይ
en: In the beginning
ha: A farkon
sw: Hapo wanzo
yo: Ní ìbẹ̀rẹ̀
zu: Ekuqaleni

am: እንደዋና ታሪክ የጤና ሌን የተጀመረው በ 2019 ነው።
en: The official story is that Healthlane was launched in 2019.
ha: Labarin hukuma shi ne an ƙaddamar da Healthlane a cikin 2019.
sw: Hadithi rasmi ni kwamba Healthlane ilizinduliwa 2019.
yo: Ìtàn àkọọ́lẹ̀ ní pé wọ́n ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ Healthlane ní ọdún 2019.
zu: Indaba esemthethweni ukuthi i-Healthlane yethulwe ngo-2019.

am: ሆኖም፣በበርካታ ምንጮች መሠረት፤ በካሜሩን ወይም በናይጄሪያ እስከ 2021 ድረስ አልተጀመረም፣ ይህም በ 2020 የ 2.4 ሚሊዮን ዶላር የመጀመሪያ ኢንቨስትመንት ካገኘ ከአንድ ዓመት በኋላ ነው።
en: However, according to multiple sources, it did not launch in either Cameroon or Nigeria until 2021, a year after raising a $2.4 million seed investment in 2020.
ha: Duk da haka, a cewar majiyoyi da yawa, ba a ƙaddamar da shi a cikin Kamaru ko Nijeriya ba har sai 2021, shekara guda bayan tara jarin iri na dala miliyan $2.4 a cikin 2020.
sw: Walakini, kulingana na vyanzo vingine, haikuzinduliwa Kameruni au Nigeria hadi 2021, mwaka mmoja baada ya kuongeza uwekezaji muhimu wa $2.4 milioni mwaka 2020.
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n bí oríṣiríṣi ìròyìn ṣe ti sọ, kò ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ kankan ní orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon àbí Nigeria àfi ìgbà tí ó di ọdún 2021, ìyẹn ọdún kan lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n ṣe àgbàjọ owó ìrànwọ́ fún ìdókòwò tí iye rẹ̀ jẹ́ mílíọ̀nù $2.4 ní ọdún 2020.
zu: Kodwa-ke, ngokusho kwemithombo eminingi, ayizange yethulwe eCameroon noma eNigeria kuze kube ngu-2021, unyaka ngemuva kokukhuphula utshalomali oluyizigidi ezingama- $ 2.4 ngo-2020.

am: ይህ በእንዲህ እንዳለ፣ አላን ተቴፍ በ 2012 የተንቀሳቃሽ የጤና መድረክ፣ ተሰጥኦ ያላት እናት ወስንነት(ተሰጥኦ ያላት እናት ) ን በጋራ መስራቱን ተናግረዋል፣ ይህም በኋላ ላይ በመጋቢት 2019 ወደ የጤና ሌን ተለውጧል።
en: Meanwhile, Alain Nteff said he co-founded mobile health platform, GiftedMom Limited (GiftedMom), in 2012, which later pivoted to Healthlane in March 2019.
ha: A halin da ake ciki, Alain Nteff ya ce shi ne ya kafa dandalin kiwon lafiya ta wayar hannu, GiftedMom Limited (GiftedMom), a cikin 2012, wanda daga baya ya koma Healthlane a cikin Maris 2019.
sw: Wakati huo huo, Alai Nteff, alisema alianzisha jukwaa la afya kwa simu ya mkononi, Gifftedmom Limited (Gifftedmom), mwaka 2012, ambalo baadae liliegemea Healthlane mwaka 2019.
yo: Ní ìdàkejì ẹ̀wẹ̀, Alan Nteff sọ pé òun jẹ́ olùjọdásílẹ̀ ilé-iṣẹ́ olùpèsè ètò ìlera alágbèéká, GiftedMom Limited (GiftedMom) ní ọdún 2012, tí ó padà di Healthlane ní oṣù Kẹta ní ọdún 2019.
zu: Khonamanjalo, u-Alain Nteff uthe wasungula inkundla yezempilo ephathwayo, i-GiftedMom Limited (GiftedMom), ngo-2012, kamuva eyasebenzisa i-Healthlane ngoNdasa wezi-2019.

am: ነገር ግን በአንዱ ምንጮቻችን መሠረት፣ ሄልዝሌን የተቋቋመው እንደ ተሰጥኦ ያላት እናት በ2012 ሳይሆን በ2015 ነው።
en: But according to one of our sources, Healthlane was incorporated as GiftedMom in 2015, not 2012.
ha: Amma bisa ga ɗaya daga cikin majiyoyinmu, an haɗa Healthlane a zaman GiftedMom a cikin 2015, ba 2012 ba.
sw: Lakini kulingana na moja ya vyanzo vyetu vya habari, Healthlane ilijumuishwa kama GifftedMom 2015, siyo 2012.
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n bí ọ̀kan nínú àwọn olùfitónilétí wa ṣe sọ, wọ́n sọ GiftedMom di Healthlane ní ọdún 2015, kì í ṣe ọdún 2012.
zu: Kodwa ngokomunye wemithombo yethu, i-Healtlane yahlanganiswa njengoGiftedMom ngo-2015, hhayi ngo-2012.

am: ተሰጥኦ ያላት እናት እንደ ፖርትፎሊዮ ጅምር የሚዘረዝር የ ጂኤስኤምኤ ጽሑፍ ይህንን የይገባኛል ጥያቄ የሚያረጋግጥ ይመስላል።
en: A GSMA article, which lists GiftedMom as a portfolio startup, appears to corroborate this claim.
ha: Labarin GSMA, wanda ke lissafin GiftedMom a matsayin kamfani mai farowa na kadaral, ya bayyana yana tabbatar da wannan da'awar.
sw: Makala ya GSMA, ambayo yanaorodhesha GifftedMom kama mwanzo wa kwingineko, yanaonekana kuthibitisha dai hili.
yo: Ó jọ pé àròkọ GSMA kan, tí ó ka GiftedMom gẹ́gẹ́ bí i ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ àṣeékówólé fún ìpín ìdókòwò, náà ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún ọ̀rọ̀ yíì.
zu: I-athikili ye-GSMA, ebala u-GiftedMom njengesiqalo sephothifoliyo, ibonakala iqinisekisa lesi simangalo.

am: ከምንጩ እንደተዘገበው ፣ጅማሬው ባለአክሲዮኖቹን ቀይሮ ያውንዴ ቅርንጫፉን ባልታወቀ ቀን ዘግቷል።
en: According to the source, the startup changed its shareholders and closed its Yaoundé branch on an unknown date.
ha: A cewar majiyar, kamfanin ya canza masu hannun jarinsa tare da rufe reshensa na Yaoundé a wani kwanan wata da ba a sani ba.
sw: Kulingana na chanzo, kampuni hiyo ilibadilisha wanahisa na kufunga tawi lake la Yaound kwa tarehe isiyojulikana.
yo: Bí olùfitónilétí náà ti sọ, ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ náà ti pàrọ̀ àwọn òpómúléró onípìn-ín rẹ̀ tí ó sì ti ẹ̀ka rẹ̀ ní Yaoundé pa ní ọjọ́ tí kò hànde.
zu: Ngokusho komthombo, ukuqala kwashintsha abanikazi bamasheya futhi kwavala igatsha layo laseYaoundé ngosuku olungaziwa.

am: በ 2021፣ በዱዋላ ውስጥ ለመሥራት አንዳንድ ሠራተኞችን ቀጠረ።
en: In 2021, it hired some employees to work in Douala.
ha: A cikin 2021, ya ɗauki wasu ma'aikata aiki a Douala.
sw: Mnamo 2021, iliajiri wafanyakazi wengine kufanya kazi huko Douala.
yo: Ní ọdún 2021, ó gba àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ kan láti ṣiṣẹ́ ní Douala.
zu: Ngo-2021, yaqasha abasebenzi abathile ukuthi basebenze eDouala.

am: በዚህ ምክንያት የዱዋላ ሥራዎች የተጀመሩት በዚያው ዓመት በሐምሌ እና ነሐሴ መካከል ነበር።
en: Consequently, Douala operations started between July and August of the same year.
ha: Sakamakon haka, ayyukan Douala sun fara tsakanin Yuli da Agusta na wannan shekarar.
sw: Kwahiyo shughuli za Doualazilianza kati ya Julai na Agosti mwaka huohuo.
yo: Nítorí náà, iṣẹ́ ní Douala bẹ̀rẹ̀ láàárín oṣù Keje àti oṣù Kẹjọ ní ọdún kan náà.
zu: Ngenxa yalokho, imisebenzi yaseDouala yaqala phakathi kukaNtulikazi noNcwaba ngawo lowo nyaka.

am: በ 2021 በናይጄሪያ እና በካሜሩን ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ ሲጀመር የጤና ሌን ታላቅ የሥራ ባህል እንደነበረው በርካታ ምንጮች ይናገራሉ።
en: Several sources maintain that Healthlane had a great work culture when it first launched in 2021 in Nigeria and Cameroon.
ha: Majiyoyi da yawa sun tabbatar da cewa Healthlane yana da kyakkyawar al'adar aiki lokacin da aka fara ƙaddamar da shi a cikin 2021 a Nijeriya da Kamaru.
sw: Vyanzo kadhaa vinathibitisha kuwa Healthlane ilikuwa na utamaduni mzuri wa kufanya iipozinduliwa kwa mara ya kwanza mwaka 2021, nchini Nigeria na Kameruni.
yo: Oríṣiríṣi ìròyìn tiẹ̀ ló sọ pé Healthlane ní ààtò iṣẹ́ dáadáa nígbà tí ó kọ̀kọ̀ bẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́ ní ọdún 2021 ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria àti Cameroon.
zu: Imithombo eminingi ithi i-Healtlane yayinesiko elihle lomsebenzi ngenkathi yethulwa okokuqala ngo-2021 eNigeria naseCameroon.

am: ብዙዎች የኩባንያው ሥራ በተቀላጠፈ ሁኔታ እንዲከናወን ለማድረግ ከቀጠሮዎቻቸው በላይ ለመሥራት ፈቃደኞች ነበሩ።
en: So much so that many were willing to work past their scheduled shifts to ensure that the company's operations ran smoothly.
ha: Ta yadda mutane da yawa sun yarda su yi aiki da su wuce lokutan da aka tsara su don tabbatar da cewa ayyukan kamfanin sun gudana cikin tsari.
sw: Kiasi kwamba wengi walikuwa tayari kufanya kazi nje ya zamu zao walizopanga ili kuhakikisha kuwa shughuli za kampuni hiyo zinakwenda vizuri.
yo: Ó pọ̀ tó bẹ́ẹ̀ débi pé ọ̀pọ̀ tilẹ̀ máa ń fẹ́ ṣiṣẹ́ ju àkókò iṣẹ́ wọn lọ láti lè rí i dájú pé àwọn iṣẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ń lọ ní ìrọwọ́rọsẹ̀.
zu: Kangangoba abaningi bebezimisele ukusebenza ngaphezu kwamashifu abebewahlelile ukuze baqinisekise ukuthi ukusebenza kwenkampani kuhamba kahle.

am: 'ሁላችንም እርስ በርሳችን ጓደኛሞች የምንሆንበት ጥሩ የሥራ አካባቢ ነበረን።
en: “We just had this good work environment where we were all friends amongst ourselves.
ha: “Muna da wannan kyakkyawan yanayin aiki inda muka kasance abokai a tsakaninmu.
sw: Tulikuwa na mazingira haya mazuri ya kufanya kaz, ambapo sote tulikuwa marafiki miongoni mwetu.
yo: "A kàn ní irú agbègbè iṣẹ́ níbi tí gbogbo wa ti jẹ́ ọ̀rẹ́ ni.
zu: “Sisanda kuba nendawo enhle yokusebenza lapho sonke singabangane.

am: “ባለ ሙሉ ተስፋ ነበርን፤ እናም በእልህ ምርቱን ወደ ገበያ ማውጣቱን ተያያዝነው፤ ምክንያቱም ብዙ ሽያጭ ካስመዘገብን ሁላችንም ከዛ ላይ ተጠቃሚዎች እንደምንሆን ስለምናውቅ ነበር፡፡” ከጉዳዩ ጋር ተዛማችነት የነበረው ምንጭ እንደተናገረው፡፡
en: We were hopeful, and everybody kept pushing the product out because we knew we would benefit from it if we made a lot of sales,” a source familiar with the matter says.
ha: Mun yi ta fata, yayin da kowa ya ci gaba da fitar da samfurin saboda mun san cewa za mu amfana da shi idan muka yi tallace-tallace da yawa," in ji wata majiya da ta san batun.
sw: Tulikuwa na matumaini, na kila mtu aliendelea kuzalisha bidhaa hiyo kwa sababu tulijua tutafaidika nayo kama tutafanya mauzo mengi, chanzo kinachofahamu suala hilo kinasema.
yo: À nírètí, gbogbo ènìyàn sì ń ti ohun èlò náà síta nítorí a mọ̀ wí pé a máa jẹ ànfààní lára rẹ̀ tí a bá ta ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ọjà,” ẹnìkan tó mọ̀ nípa ọ̀rọ̀ náà ló sọ bẹ́ẹ̀.
zu: Besithemba, futhi wonke umuntu wayelokhu ephusha ukukhipha imkhiqizo ngoba besazi ukuthi sizozuza uma sidayise kakhulu,umthombo olwaziyo lolu daba esho.

am: ናይጄሪያ ውስጥ የሚገኙ ሰራተኞች ፤ የድርጅቱን የአካል ብቃት ማጎልበቻ ተቋማት የመጠቀም ፈቃድ ነበራቸው፡፡
en: Employees in Nigeria had access to the company’s fitness facilities.
ha: Ma'aikata a Najeriya sun taɓa samun damar zuwa wuraren motsa jiki na kamfanin.
sw: Wafanyakazi nchini Nigeria walikuwa na ufikiaji wa vifaa vya mazoezi ya mwili vya kampuni.
yo: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ní orílẹ̀-ède Nàìjíríà ní ànfàní sí ààyè-ìdárayá ilé-iṣẹ́ náà.
zu: Abasebenzi baseNigeria babefinyelela kuzindawo zokuzivocavoca zenkampani.

am: በተጨማሪም በተጓዳኝነት የሚቀርቡ አትክልቶች፣ ሰላጣ እና ምሳ ነበር ፤ድርጅቱም የምሳውን ወጪ ግማሹን ይሸፍን ነበር፡፡
en: There were also complimentary fruits, salads, and lunch, with the company covering half the cost of lunch.
ha: Akwai kuma ƙari na kayan marmari da salak da abincin rana, yayin da kamfanin ke biyan rabin farashin abincin rana.
sw: Pia kulikuwa na nyongeza ya matunda, saladi na chakula cha mchana, huku kampuni ikigharamia nusu ya gharama ya chakula cha mchana.
yo: Wọ́n tún ní èso ọ̀fẹ́, sàládì, àti oúnjẹ ọ̀sán, tí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà sì ń san ìdáji owó oúnjẹ ọ̀sán náà.
zu: Kwakukhona nezithelo zesihe, amasaladi,nesidlo sasemini, inkampani izokhokha uhhafu wezindleko zesidlo sasemini.

am: ድርጅቱ ሰራተኞቹን እ.ኤ.አ በ 2022 የሚካሄድ የእረፍት ጉዞን ቃል ገብቶ ነበር፡፡
en: The company also promised the employees a retreat later in 2022.
ha: Kamfanin ya kuma yi wa ma’aikatan alƙawarin ja da baya daga baya a shekarar 2022.
sw: Pia kampuni hiyo iliwaahidi wafanyakazi kutokuwaangusha mnamo 2022.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ náà tún ṣe àdéhùn ìsinmi fún àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ní ìgbà kan ní ọdún 2022.
zu: Inkampani yaphinde yathembisa abasebenzi ukuthi bazoyozivuselela ekupheleni kuka-2022.

am: ምንም ቢሆን ግን እኚህ ሁሉ ጥቅማጥቅሞች ቆይቶ ከሚመጣው ምቹ ያልሆነ የስራ አካባቢ እና ያለአግባብ ከስራ ከመባረር ዝግጁ አላደረጋቸውም ነበር፡፡
en: But none of these perks, however, prepared them for "the termination" and "unfriendly work environment" that was to come.
ha: Amma duk da haka babu wata fa’ida daga cikin waɗannan fa'idojin da ta basu shiri kan abin da zai biyo baya na "kora" da "yanayin aiki maras kyau".
sw: Lakini hakuna hata moja ya manufaa haya, hata hivyo, iliyotayarisha kwa ajili ya "kusitishwa" na "mazingira yasiyo rafiki ya kazi" ambayo yangekuja.
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n kò sí èyíkéyìí nínú àwọn àjẹmọ́nú yìí, síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, tí ó ṣe ìgbaradì fún wọn fún “ìfòpinsí” àti “agbègbè iṣẹ́ tí tò bárarẹ́” tí ó ń bọ̀.
zu: Kodwa azikho kulezizinzuzo, nokho, ezilungiselwe bona "ukuqedwa" "nezindawo zokusebenza ezingathokozisi" lokho kwakusazolandela.

am: በተጨምሪም የእረፍት ጉዞውም አልተደረገም ነበር፡፡
en: Also, the retreat never happened.
ha: Sannan kuma ja da bayan bai faru ba.
sw: Pia mafungo hayajawahi kutokea.
yo: Bákan náà, ìsinmi náà ò wáyé.
zu: Futhi ukuzivuselela akuzange kwenzeke.

am: በካሜሩን ከሚገኝ አንድ ምንጭ እንዳገኘነውም፤ የድርጅቱ መነሻ ግብ የነበረው ቀድሞ በመከላከል ላይ ያተኮረ ከቦታቦታ ተንቀሳቃሽ ህክምናን በመጠቀም ሰዎችን የተሻለ እና እረጅም እድሜ እንዲኖሩ ማገዝ ነበር፡፡
en: According to a source, in Cameroon, the company's initial goal was to use preventive telemedicine to help people live longer and better lives.
ha: A cewar wata majiya, a ƙasar Kamaru, burin kamfanin na farko shi ne kare lafiya ta hanyar amfani da ayyukan likitanci ta nesa, wato telemedicine, don taimakawa mutane wajen samun rayuwa mai tsawo kuma mai inganci.
sw: Kwa mujibu wa duru, nchini Kameruni, lengo mama la kampuni hiyo lilikuwa kutumia kinga ya Telemedicine ili kusaidia watu kuishi maisha bora na marefu.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bi olùjábọ̀ kan, ní orílẹ̀-ède Cameroon, àfojúsùn àkọ́kọ́ tí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ní ni láti lo ìṣègun-orí-ẹrọ ayélujára olùdènà láti mú kí èmí àwọn ènìyàn gùn kí wọ́n sì gbé ìgbésí ayé rere.
zu: Ngokomthombo eCameroon, injongo yasekuqaleni yenkampani kwakuwukusebenzisa imithi yokuvikela ukusiza abantu ukuthi baphile isikhathi eside futhi baphile kangcono.

am: ግን የንግድ አወቃቀራቸው “ምንም አይነት የገበያ ሁኔታ ጥናት እና የሽያጭ መርህ የሌለውና በእምነት ላይ ብቻ የተመሰረተ ነበር”፡፡
en: But, their business model "had no marketing and sales strategy and relied solely on faith."
ha: Amma, tsarin kasuwancin su "ba shi da dabarun tallace-tallace da na sayar da kaya; ya dogara ne kawai kan imani."
sw: Lakini, mtindo wao wa biashara "haukuwa na mkakati wa masoko na uchuuzi ulitegemea zaidi uaminifu".
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n, àgbékalẹ̀ òwo wọn “ò ní ọgbọ́n ìpolówó ọjà àti ìtajà ó sì gbára lé ìgbàgbọ́ nìkan.“
zu: Kodwa imodeli yebhizinisi labo yayingenayo indlela yokuhwebelana namasu okudayisa babencike ethembeni.

am: በስራ ባህል ውስጥ ያለ ለውጥ
en: A shift in work culture
ha: Canji game da yanayin gudanar da aiki.
sw: Mabadiliko katika utaratibu wa kazi
yo: Ìyípadà nínú ìṣesí ibi-iṣẹ́
zu: Ushintsho esikweni lokusebenza

am: አንድ ምንጭ እንዳለው “አሁን አሁን፤ የስራ ባህል የሆነው ሌላ ሳይሆን ግን የመግባባት ጉድለት (ዝምታ)፤ ውሸት፤ ተዛማች አሳተያየቶችን ሳያማክሩ ወደ ድርጊት መግባት፣ አላስፈላጊ ስብሰባዎች እና ራስ ምታት ናቸው፡፡”
en: A source claims that "currently, the work culture is nothing but lack of communication (silence), lying, implementation without consulting relevant opinions, and unnecessary meetings and headaches."
ha: Wata majiya ta yi iƙirarin cewa, "a halin yanzu, yanayin gudanar da aiki ba komai bane illa rashin sadarwa (yin shiru), yin ƙarya, aiwatarwa ba tare da tuntuɓar ra'ayoyin da suka dace ba, da tarurrukan da ba a buƙata, da shiririta."
sw: Chanzo kinadai kwamba, "kwa sasa utaratibu wa kazi si kitu lakini ukosefu wa mawasiliano (kimya), Uongo, utendaji bila mashauriano na maoni husika, mazoea na vikao visivyo na ulaazima".
yo: Olùjábọ̀ kan sọ wí pé “lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́, ìṣesí ibi-iṣẹ́ náà ò ní àpèjẹ́ mìíràn àyàfi àìsí ìfọ̀rọ̀wérọ̀ (ìdákẹ́rọ́rọ́), irọ́ pípa, gbígbé ìgbésẹ̀ láìgba àwọn èrò tí ó yẹ, àti àwọn ìpàdé tí ò bójúmu àti ẹ̀fọ́rí.”
zu: Umthombo uthi njengamanje isiko lokusebenza aliyilutho kodwa alixhumani namuntu, lithule, liqamba amanga, lenza izinto ngaphandle ngaphandle kokuxhumana nemibono efanele,nemihlangano engenasidingo nokuphathwa yikhanda

am: ግን እንዴት የላቀ የስራ ባህል የነበረው ድርጅት እንዲህ በድንገት ሊቀየር ቻለ?
en: But how did a company with an excellent work culture suddenly change?
ha: Amma ta yaya kamfani mai kyakkyawan yanayin gudanar da aiki ya canza lokaci ɗaya?
sw: Lakini kivipi kampuni yenye utaratibu mzuri wa kazi imebadilika ghafla?
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n báwo ni ilé iṣẹ́ tí ó ní ìṣesí ibi-iṣẹ́ tí ó yanrantí ṣe yí padà lójijì?
zu: Kodwa kwenzeke kanjani ukuthi inkampani enesiko lokusebenza elihle kangaka ivele ishintshe nje?

am: ከዚህም በላይ፡- በርካታ ምንጮች ድርጅቱ የሀልዝሌይን መንገዶችን፣ ግቦችን ወይም መርሆችን በተመለከተ ምንም አይነት መዋቅር ወይም አቅጣጫ ዕንደሌለው ይናገራል።
en: Moreover, multiple sources mention that the company has no structure or direction regarding Healthlane’s method, goals, or strategy.
ha: Haka kuma majiyoyi da yawa sun ambata cewa kamfanin ba shi da tsari ko alƙibla dangane da salo da manufofi da dabarun kamfanin Healthlane.
sw: Kwa kuongezea, duru nyingi zinaeleza kwamba kampuni haina muundo au muelekeo kuhusu mbinu, malengo au mkakati wa Healthlane.
yo: Pẹ̀lúpẹ̀lú ẹ, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ olùjábọ̀ mẹ́nu bà á wí pé ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ò ní àgbékalẹ̀ tàbí àfojúsùn nípa ìlànà, àfojúsùn tàbí ọgbọ́n àtinúdá Healthlane.
zu: Ngaphezu kwalokho imithombo eminingi iyasho ukuthi inkampani ayinaso isakhiwo noma indlela ephathelene nendlela yeHealthlane, izinjongo noma isu.

am: ለምሳሌ ፡- አንድ ምንጭ እንዳለው “ካሜሮን ውስጥ የሚገኘው ድርጅት በጣም ከመወዛገባቸው የተነሳ እዚህ ያለው የገበያ ሁኔታ መለየቱን መገንዘብ አቅቷቸው፤ በኢንዱስትሪ በበለፀጉ ሀገራት የሚተገበረውን ሙሉ በሙሉ ወስደው እዚህ ለመተግበር ሞክረው ነበር።
en: For instance, a source says, “The company in Cameroon was so confused that they began imitating what was being done in industrialised nations, failing to recognise that our markets were different.
ha: Alal misali, a cewar wata majiya, “Kamfanin da ke Kamaru ya shiga ruɗani ta yadda har ya fara kwaikwayon abin da ake yi a ƙasashe masu ƙarfin masana’antu, suka kasa gane cewa yadda muke gudanar da kasuwancinmu ya sha bamban da nasu.
sw: Kwa mfano, chanzo kimoja cha habari kinasema, "kampuni nchini Kameruni ilipata hasara mno kwamba ilianza kuiga yaliyokuwa yakifanywa katika mataifa yaliyoendelea kiviwanda, na kushindwa kutambua kuwa masoko yetu yalikuwa tofauti.
yo: Fún àpẹrẹ, olùjábọ̀ kan sọ wí pé “Ilé-iṣẹ́ tí ó wà ní oríle.̀-ède Cameroon dojúrú débi wí pé wọ́n bẹ́rẹ̀ sí kọ́ṣe nǹkan tí wọ́n ń ṣe ní àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè oní ilé-iṣẹ́ ńláńlá, tí wọ́n sì kúnà láti mọ̀ wí pé ọjà wa yátọ̀ọ̀tọ̀.
zu: Isibonelo umthombo uthi,"Inkampani eCameroon yayididekile ngendlela yokuthi baqala balingisa okwakwenziwa emazweni anezinkampani,behluleka ukubona ukuthi izimakethe zethu zazihlukile.

am: ምንም ሽያጭ እንደሌለ በተገነዘቡ ጊዜም ቦታውን ወደ ክሊኒክነት ለመለወጥ ሁሉ አስበው ነበር፡፡’’
en: When they realised there were no sales, they even considered turning the place into a clinic.”
ha: Lokacin da suka fahimci cewa kaya basa sayuwa, har sun yi tunanin mayar da wurin ƙaramin asibiti."
sw: Walipogundua kuwa hakukuwa na mauzo mahali hapo, walifikiri hata kupageuza kuwa kliniki.
yo: Nígbà tí wọ́n rí i wí pé àwọn ò tà, wọ́n tún gbérò láti sọ ààyè náà di ilé-ìwòsàn.
zu: Ngesikhathi bebona ukuthi bekungekho okudayisayo, baze bacabanga ukuguqula lendawo bayenze umtholampilo

am: ግን ያ የተመሰከረለት የመዋቅርና አቅጣጫ ጉድለት ገና መጀመርያው ነበር፡፡
en: But that alleged lack of structure and direction was just the beginning.
ha: Amma wancan zargin na rashin tsari da rashin alƙibla farko ne kawai tukuna.
sw: Lakini madai hayo ya ukosefu wa muundo na muelekeo ulikuwa ni mwanzo tu.
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n ẹ̀sùn àìní àgbékalẹ̀ àti àfojúsùn yẹn ṣẹ̀ ń bẹ́rẹ̀ ni.
zu: Kodwa lokho kusolwa kokungabibikho kwesakhiwo nokuqonda kwakuyisiqalo.

am: በብዙ ሰነዶች ላይ ደመዎዝ ከወሩ መጨረሻ ቀደም ብሎ ነበር የሚከፈለው፤ ይህ ግን የዘለቀው አመራሩ ቡድኑን ለገና በአል ስራ እንደሚዘጋ እስካሳወቀበት እ.ኤ.አ ታህሳስ 2021 ነበር፡፡
en: By multiple accounts, salaries used to be paid before the end of the month, until December 2021, when management informed the team that they would shut down early for the Christmas break.
ha: Ta hanyar asusu da yawa, ana biyan albashi kafin ƙarshen wata, har sai watan Disamba na shekarar 2021, lokacin da masu gudanarwa suka sanar da ma’aikatan cewa za su rufe aiki da wuri don hutun Kirsimeti.
sw: Katika akaunti nyingi mishahara ilikuwa ikilipwa kabla ya mwisho wa mwezi, hadi Desemba 2021, wakati uongozi walipoiarifu timu kuwa wangefunga mapema kwa mapumziko ya krismasi.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ìròyìn láti ẹnu ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀, wọ́n máa ń san owó-oṣù kí oṣù ó tó parí, títí di oṣù Ọ̀pẹ ọdún 2021, nígbà tí àwọn alákòso fi tó àwọn ikọ̀ náà létí pé àwọn yóò tètè kógbáwọlé fún ìsinmi ọdún kérésì.
zu: Ngama akhawunti amaningi, imiholo yayijwayele ukukhokhwa ingakapheli inyanga, kwaze kwaba uZibandlela ngonyaka wezi-2021, Ngesikhathi abaphathi bazisa abasebenzi ukuthi bazosheshe bavale ngamaholidi kaKhisimusi.

am: ሁሉም ሰራተኞችም የአምስት ቀናት አስገዳጅ የስራ ፍቃድ እንዲወስዱ ተጠይቀው ነበር፡፡
en: All staff were also asked to take a compulsory five-day work leave during the break.
ha: An kuma buƙaci dukan ma’aikatan da su ɗauki hutun aiki na tilas na kwanaki biyar a lokacin hutun.
sw: Pia wafanyakazi wote waliombwa likizo ya siku tano za laazima wakati wa mapumziko.
yo: Gbogbo àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ni wọ́n tún sọ fún wí pé kí wọ́n gba ìsinmi ọlọ́jọ́ márùn-ún ní dandan lásíkò ìsinmi náà.
zu: Bonke abasebenzi baphinde bacelwa ukuthi bathathe izinsuku ezinhlanu zokusebenza kube yilivu ngempoqo ngesikhathi sekhefu.

am: የቀድሞ ሰራተኛ ለ ቴክፓይንት አፍሪካ እንዳጋራው “ድርጅቱ የአምስት ቀን የስራ ፍቃድ ሁሉም ሰው እንዲወስድ አስገድዶ ነበር።”
en: “The company enforced the five-day work leave on everyone”, an ex-employee informs Techpoint Africa.
ha: "Kamfanin ya tilasta wa kowa hutun aiki na kwanaki biyar", in ji wani tsohon ma'aikacin kamfanin Techpoint Africa.
sw: Mfanyakazi wa zamani anaiarifu Techpoint Africa, "kampuni ilitekeleza likizo ya siku tano kwa kila mtu".
yo: "Ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ṣe ìsinmi ọlọ́jọ́ márùn-ún lẹ́nu iṣẹ́ ní kàn-ánpá fún gbogbo wọn”, òṣìṣẹ́ tẹ́lẹ̀ rí kan fi tó Techpoint Africa létí.
zu: Inkampani yaphoqa ukwenza ilivu yezinsuku ezinhlanu zokusebenza kuwona wonke umuntu, owayengumsebenzi azisa iTechpoint Africa.

am: እ.ኤ.አ በታህሳስ 16 ቀን 2021 በሀልዝሌይን የቅጥር ግቢ ውስጥ የአመቱ ማብቂያ የሚለውን የመዝናኛ ዝግጅት ከሰራተኞች እና ሻጮች ጋር አዘጋጀ።
en: On December 16, 2021, Healthlane held its end-of-the-year party on its premises with its staff and vendors.
ha: A ranar 16 ga watan Disamba, 2021, kamfanin Healthlane ya gudanar da bikin ƙarshen shekara ga ma'aikatansa da dillalanta a harabarsa.
sw: Mnamo Desemba 16, 2021, ilifanya tafrija yake ya mwisho wa mwaka kwenye majengo yake pamoja na wafanyakazi na wachuuzi wake.
yo: Ní ọjọ́ 16 oṣù Ọ̀pe,̣ ọdún 2021, Healthlane ṣe ayẹyẹ-ìparí-ọdún ní agbègbè ilé-iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ àti àwọn olùtajà rẹ̀.
zu: NgoZibandlela mhlaka 16 ngonyaka wezi-2021, iHealthlane yenza umcimbi wokuphela konyaka endaweni yayo nabasebenzi kanye nabadayisi bayo.

am: ይህንን ተከትሎ በርካታ ምንጮች እንደገለፁት፤ የትኛቸውም ሰራተኞች በታህሳስ መጨረሻ ደምወዛቸውን አልተቀበሉም ነበር፡፡
en: Multiple sources reveal that following that, none of the staff received their salary by December ending.
ha: Majiyoyi da dama sun bayyana cewa, biyo bayan haka, ya zuwa ƙarshen watan Disamba babu wani daga cikin ma’aikatan da ya karɓi albashi.
sw: Duru nyingi zinaonyesha kuwa kufuatilia hilo, hakuna hata mmoja wa wafanyakazi aliyepokea mshahara wake mwishoni mwa Desemba.
yo: Ìròyìn láti ẹnu ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ fi hàn pé lẹ́yìn ìyẹn, kò sí ìkankan nínú àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ náà tí ó gba owó oṣù wọn ní ìparí oṣù Ọ̀pẹ.
zu: Imithombo eminingi yaveza ukuthi ngemva kwalokho akekho umsebenzi owathola iholo lakhe ngokuphela kukaZibandlela.

am: የደመወዝም ክፍያ ተጓተተና እዳ ሆነ፡፡
en: Salaries are delayed and owed
ha: Ana jinkirtawa da bin bashin biyan albashi.
sw: Mishahara inachelewa na madeni
yo: Owó oṣù ò wá lásíkò wọ́n sì tún jẹ ẹ́.
zu: Imiholo yabambezeleka futhi yakweletwa

am: አንድ ምናጭ እንደተናገረው “ገና እ.ኤ.አ በሰኔ 2021 አንደጀመረ ድርጅት ሲታይ ፤በጣም ብዙ ከፍና ዝቅ ይበዛበት ነበር።”
en: “For a company that just started in August 2021, there were a lot of ups and downs,” a source says.
ha: Wata majiya ta ce, "Ga kamfanin da ya fara aiki a watan Agustan 2021, an sami nasarori da rashinsu sosai.".
sw: "Kwa kampuni iliyoanza tu Agosti 2021, kulikuwa na misukosuko mingi", chanzo kinasema.
yo: “Fún ilé-iṣẹ́ tí ó ṣẹ̀sẹ̀ bẹ̀rẹ̀ ní oṣù Ògún ọdún 2021, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ rúkè rúdò ni ó ṣẹlẹ̀,” olùjágbọ̀ kan ló sọ bẹ́ẹ̀.
zu: ngoba yinkampani esanda kuqala ngoMfumfu kunyaka wezi-2021, bekukuningi obekwenzeka, kusho umthombo.

am: ንቴፍ በዘገባው እ.ኤ.አ አስከ ጥር 2022 መገባደጃ ድረስ ተልእኮውን የሚያስፈፅምበት የገንዘብ ድጋፍ እንዳለው ለቡድኑ አረጋግጦ ነበር፡፡
en: Nteff reportedly assured the team that the company had funds to cover its operations until early January 2022.
ha: An ruwaito cewa Nteff ya tabbatar wa tawagar cewa kamfanin yana da kuɗin gudanar da ayyukansa har zuwa farko-farkon watan Janairun 2022.
sw: Nteff aliripotiwa kuihakikishia timu hiyo kuwa kampuni hiyo inazo pesa za kugharamia shughuli zake hadi mapema Januari 2022.
yo: Nteff nínú ìròyìn fi dá ikọ̀ náà lójú pé ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ní owó láti ṣe gbogbo iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ di ìbẹ̀rẹ oṣù Sẹẹrẹ ọdún 2022.
zu: Kubikwa ukuthi uNteff waqinisekisa ithimu ukuthi inkampani yayinayo imali eyibeke eceleni ukubhekelela ukusebenza kuze kube ukuqala kukaMasingana ngonyaka wezi-2022.

am: ስለዚህ ታዲያ፤ ለምን ድርጅቱ ለሰራተኞች እና ለሻጮች ደምወዝ መክፈል እንዳቃተው፣ ግብር ማዘግየትና ከሰራተኛ ደምወዝ ላይ የጡረታ ክፍያንም መቀነሱ “እውነተኛ ትርጉሙ” ምን እንደሆነ ሁል ጊዜ ያሰላስሉ ነበር፡፡
en: So, they always wondered what the “real explanation” was for the company failing to pay staff and vendors and to remit taxes and pensions deducted from staff salaries.
ha: Don haka, suna ta mamakin ko me "bayani na haƙiƙa" yake nufi ga gazawar kamfanin na biyan ma'aikata da dillalai da kuma bayar da haraji da fansho da aka cire daga albashin ma'aikata.
sw: Hivyo, kila mara walijiuliza ni nini "maelezo halisi" ilikuwa kwa ajili ya kampuni kushindwa kulipa wafanyakazi na wachuuzi na kutuma kodi na pensheni inayokatwa kutoka kwa mishahara ya wafanyakazi.
yo: Torí náà, wọ́n máa ń ṣe èèmọ̀ pé kí ni "àlàyé tòótọ́" tí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ní láti kùnà sísan owó òṣìṣẹ́ àti àwon olùtajà tí kò sì tún san owó-orí àti owó-ìfẹ̀yìntì tó ń yọ nínú owó oṣù àwọn òṣìṣẹ́.
zu: Ngakho babehlezi befisa ukwazi incazelo yangempela yokuthi kungani inkampani yayihluleka ukukhokhela abasebenzi nabadayisi nokweqa intela nempesheni ukuthi ithathwe emiholweni yabasebenzi.

am: ብዙ ምንጮች እንዳረጋገጡት፤ እ.ኤ.አ በጥር 2022 መጀመሪያ ላይ ከአመራሩ ስለ ደሞዝ መዘግየት ምንም የተባለ ነገር አልነበረም፡፡
en: Multiple sources confirm that at the beginning of January 2022, there was zero communication from management about why salaries were delayed.
ha: Majiyoyi da dama sun tabbatar da cewa, a farkon watan Janairun 2022, babu wani bayani daga hukumar gudanarwa game da dalilin da ya sa aka jinkirta albashi.
sw: Duru nyingi zinathibitisha kuwa mwanzoni mwa 2022, hakukuwa na mawasiliano kutoka kwa uongozi kuhusu kwa nini mishahara ilicheleweshwa.
yo: ìròyìn láti ẹnu ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ fi ìdi rẹ̀ múlẹ̀ pé ní ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ oṣù Ṣẹẹrẹ ọdún 2022, kò sí ìfọ̀rọ̀wérọ̀ kankan láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn alákòóso nípa ìdí tí owó-oṣù fi ń pẹ́.
zu: Imithombo eminingi iyaqinisekisa ukuthi ekuqaleni kukaMasingana ngonyaka wezi-2022, kwakungekho ukuxhumana okuqhamuka kubaphathi ukuthi kungani imiholo yayibambezelekile.

am: በወሩ መጨረሻም ሰራተኞች ጥያቄዎችን ማንሳት ጀመሩ።
en: Later in the month, employees began to raise eyebrows.
ha: Daga baya, a cikin watan, ma'aikata sun fara nuna rashin jin daɗinsu.
sw: Baadae katika mwezi huo, wafanyakazi walianza kushangaa.
yo: Nígbà tí oṣù yẹn ń tẹ̀síwájú, àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ bẹ́rẹ̀ sí gbójú aágan.
zu: Ngasekupheleleni kwenyanga, abasebenzi baqala bakhombisa ukuthi kukhona abakusolayo.

am: “ጥቂት የገንዘብ እንቅስቃሴ ችግር እንደነበር የሆነ ቀን ጥር ድረስ ቆይቶ ነበር የተነገረን” አንድ ምንጭ አስታውሶ እንደተናገረው፡፡
en: “It wasn’t until sometime in January that we were told the company had ‘some minimal cash flow issues’,” a source recalls.
ha: Wata majiya ta ce, "har sai cikin watan Janairu aka gaya mana cewa kamfanin yana da 'ƙananan batutuwan tsabar kuɗi".
sw: "Haikuwa hadi wakati fulani mnamo Januari ambapo tuliambiwa kampuni hiyo ilikuwa na "masuala machache ya mizunguko ya kifedha", chanzo kimoja kilikaririwa.
yo: Lẹ́yìn àkókò kan nínú oṣù Ṣẹẹrẹ ni wọ́n sọ fún wa pé ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ní "ìṣòro ìpawówọlé kékeré díẹ̀ kan," olùjábọ̀ kan ló sọ bẹ́ẹ̀.
zu: Kwakungenzeki kwaze kwashaya isikhathi ngoMasingana lapho lasatshelwa ukuthi inkampani inezinkinga ezincane ngokungena nokuphuma kwemali, kukhumbula umthombo.

am: አንዳንድ ሰራተኞች የታህሳስ ወር ደምወዝ እ.ኤ.አ በጥር ወር 2022 መገባደጃ ላይ ሲደርሳቸው አንዳንዶች ደግሞ የካቲት ላይ ነበር የደረሳቸው፡፡
en: While some employees received their December salaries later in January 2022, some received in February.
ha: Yayin da wasu ma’aikata suka karɓi albashin watan Disamba daga baya, a watan Janairun 2022, wasu sun karɓi nasu a watan Fabrairu.
sw: Wakati wafanyakazi wengine walipokea mishahara yao ya Desemba baadae mnamo Januari 2022, wengine walipokea mnamo Februari.
yo: Nígbà tí àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ kan gba owó-oṣù Ọ̀pẹ ní àkókò kan ní oṣù Ṣẹẹrẹ ọdún 2022, àwọn kan gbà á ní oṣù Èrèlé.
zu: ngesikhathi abanye abasebenzi bethola imiholo yaZibandlela sekuyophela uMasingana , abanye bayithola ngoNhlolanja ngonyaka wezi-2022.

am: ሀልዝሌይን በዘገባው ላይ አይኑን በጨው አጥቦ አስቀምጦ ድርጊቱን በየካቲት ደሞዝ ላይም ደገመው እናም በመጋቢት ወር የናይጄሪያውም ቅርንጫፍ ድጋሚ የደሞዝ ክፍያን ማዘግየት ጀምሮ ነበር፡፡
en: Healthlane reportedly rinsed and repeated the process for January's salaries, and by May, the Nigerian arm had begun delaying salary payments again.
ha: An ruwaito cewa, kamfanin Healthlane ya wanke kuma ya maimaita tsarin a biyan albashin watan Janairu; ya zuwa watan Mayu kuma, ɓangaren kamfanin na Najeriya ya fara jinkirta biyan albashi kuma du.
sw: Healthlane iliripotiwa kupitia na kurudia mchakato wa mishahara ya Januari, na kufikia Mei, tawi la Nigeria lilikuwa limeanza kuchelewesha malipo ya mishahara tena.
yo: Heathlane nínú ìròyìn ṣe àṣetúnṣe ìgbésẹ̀ yìí fún owó-oṣù Ṣẹẹrẹ, nígbà tí ó di oṣù Èbìbí, ẹ̀ka tí ó wà ní orílẹ-èdè Nàìjíríà tún ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí fi owó-oṣù sísan falẹ̀.
zu: Kubikwa ukuthi iHealthlane yaphinda yaqala phansi uhlelo lwemiholo yangoMasingana, futhi ngoNhlaba, eNigeria yayisiqalile ukubambezela izinkokhelo zemiholo futhi.

am: ይህ ጽሁፍ ለህትመት እስከበቃበት ግዜ ድረስ ድርጅቱ በናይጄሪያ የሚገኙ የሰራተኞቹ ከሀምሌ ወር ጀምሮ የአራት ወር ደሞዝ እዳ እንዳለበት ተዘግቧል ።
en: As of publication time, the company reportedly owes its Nigeria-based employees four months' salary since July.
ha: Ya zuwa lokacin da ake wallafawa, rahotanni sun ce kamfanin na bin ma’aikatansa da ke Najeriya bashin albashin watanni hudu tun watan Yuli.
sw: Kufikia wakati wa uchapishaji, kampuni hiyo inaripotiwa kuwa inadaiwa na wafanyakazi wake wanaoishi Nigeria mshahara wa miezi minne tangu Julai.
yo: Títí di ìgba tí à ń gbé ìròyìn yìí jáde, ilé-iṣẹ́ náà nínú ìròyìn ń jẹ àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ rẹ̀ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà ní owó oṣù mẹ́rin láti oṣù Agẹmọ.
zu: Ngesikhathi sokushicilelwa, kubikwa ukuthi inkampani ikweleta abasebenzi babo baseNigeria imoholo yezinyanga ezine kusekela ngoNtulikazi.

am: እንደ አንድ ምንጭ ከሆነ በካሜሩን ከሚገኙት ሰራተኞች መካከል አንዱ ከአምስት ወር ደሞዝ ቢያንስ የሁለቱን ወር እሰከሚያገኙ ድረስ ሀላፊነታቸውን እንደማይወጡ ለ “አመራሩ” አሳውቆ ነበር፡፡
en: Per a source, one of the employees in Cameroon informed “management” that they would suspend their responsibilities until they receive at least two months of the five months' salary owed.
ha: A cewar wata majiya, ɗaya daga cikin ma'aikatan kamfanin a Kamaru ya sanar da "hukumar gudanarwa" cewa, za su dakatar da ayyukansu, har sai sun karɓi albashin a-ƙalla watanni biyu daga albashin na watanni biyar.
sw: Kulingana na duru, mmoja wa wafanyakazi nchini Kameruni aliutaarifu "Uongozi" kwamba watasitisha majukumu yao mpaka wapate angalau miezi miwili ya mshahara wa miezi mitano wanayodai.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí olùjábọ̀ kan, ọ̀kan nínú àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon fi tó àwọn "alákòso" létí pé àwọn yóò gbé ojúṣe àwọn patì títí àwọn yóò fi gba ó kéré jù oṣù méjì nínú owó oṣù márùn-ún tí wọ́n jẹ.
zu: Ngokomthombo omunye wabasebenzi eCameroon wazisa abaphathi ukuthi bazomisa imisebenzi yabo baze bathole okungenani imiholo yezinganga ezimbili kule yezinyanga ezinhlanu abakweletwa yona.

am: “አመራሩ” ግን ከስራ ገበታው እስከሚያስወግደው ድረስ ጥበቃዎቹን ወደ እሱ ቢሮ እንዳይገባ እንዲያግዳቸው በማዘዝ ነበር ምላሽ የሰጠው፡፡
en: “Management”, however, reacted by “instructing security not to allow them into the office” while it removed them from work platforms.
ha: Duk da haka, “hukumar gudanarwa” ta mayar da martani ta hanyar "umartar jami’an tsaro da cewa kada su bari su shiga ofishin" yayin da ta cire su daga guraben aiki.
sw: "Hata hivyo, "Uongozi" ulijibu kwa "kuwaagiza walinzi kutowaruhusu kuingia ofisini" huku ikiwaondoa kwenye majukwaa ya kazi.
yo: "Alákòso", síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, fẹ̀sì pẹ̀lu "fífún àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ aláàbò ní ìtọ́nisọ́nà lati má jẹ̀ kí wọn ó wọ inú ọ́fíísì" nígbà tí òun náà sì yọ wọ́n kúrò lórí pẹpẹ iṣẹ́.
zu: “Abaphathi” baphendula ngokuthi “bayalele onogada ukuthi bangabavumeli ukuthi bangene emahhovisi ngesikhathi bebasusa ezindaweni zokusebenza.

am: በተጨምሪም በካሜሩን ለሚገኘው የሰራተኛ ቢሮ ሰራተኛው “ሀላፊነቱን እንደተወ” አስታውቆ ነበር፡፡
en: It also informed the labour office in Cameroon that the employee had “abandoned their responsibilities without notice.”
ha: Ya kuma sanar da ofishin ƙwadago na ƙasar Kamaru cewa ma’aikatan sun “bar ayyukansu ba tare da sanarwa ba.”
sw: Pia iliiarifu ofisi ya wafanyakazi nchini Kameruni kwamba wafanyakazi "wameacha majukumu yao bila taarifa".
yo: Ó tún fi tó ọ́fíísì àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon létí pé àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ náà ti "gbé ojúṣe wọn jù sílẹ̀ láìsí àkíyèsí."
zu: Yaphinde yazisa ehhovisis lezabasebenzi eCameroon ukuthi umsebenzi useyeke ukwenza imisebenzi yakhe ngaphandle kwesexwayiso.”

am: እንደ አንድ ናይጄሪያዊ ምንጭ ከሆነ፣ “እ.ኤ.አ በ2022 የሆነ ጊዜ ላይ፣ ምንም መረጃ መስማት አቆምን።
en: According to a Nigerian source, "At some point in 2022, we stopped hearing from the office.
ha: A cewar wata majiya ta Najeriya, “A wani lokaci cikin shekarar 2022, mun daina jin ta bakin ofishin.
sw: Kulingana na chanzo cha Nigeria, "Wakati fulani mnamo 2022, tuliacha kusikia kutoka ofisini.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí olùjábọ̀ kan ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà, "Ní àkókò kan ní ọdún 2022, a ò gbọ́ láti ọ́fíísì náà mọ́.
zu: Ngokomthombo waseNigeria, "Kuke kwafika isikhathi ngonyaka wezi-2022, sasingezwa lutho oluvela ehhovisi.

am: አመራሩ ውሳኔውን በራሱ ብቻ የሚወስን ስለሚመስል እኛም የነሱን ወሬ መስማት አቆምን፡፡
en: Since it seems that the management makes these decisions on their own, we stopped hearing from them.
ha: Tunda dai da alama mambobin hukumar gudanarwar na yanke waɗannan hukunce-hukuncen da raɗin kansu, mun daina jin ta bakinsu.
sw: Kwa vile inaonekana kuwa Uongozi hufanya maamuzi haya peke yao, tuliacha kuwasikiliza.
yo: Nígbà tí ó ti dàbí ẹni pé àwọn alákòso ti ṣe ìpinnu lọ́wọ́ ara wọn, a ò gbọ́ láti ọ̀dọ wọn mọ́.
zu: Njengoba kubonakala ukuthi abaphathi benza izinqumo bebodwa, sayeka ukuzwa ngabo.

am: አንተንም በሂደቱ ላይ አያሳትፉም።
en: They don't carry you along.
ha: Ba sa tafiya da kowa.
sw: Hawakubebi.
yo: Wọn kìí kó wa sòdí.
zu: Abakuthwali.

am: መልስ አይሰጡም ።
en: They don’t respond.
ha: Ba sa ba da amsa.
sw: Hawajibu.
yo: Wọn kìí fésì.
zu: Abaphenduli.

am: አይከታተሉም።”
en: They don’t follow up."
ha: Ba sa bibiyar al’amura”.
sw: Hawafuatilii."
yo: Wọn kìí ṣe ìtọpinoin."
zu: Abalandeleli."

am: ከሌላ ምንጭ እንዳገኘነውም፤ ሰራተኞች ለምን መረጃ በጠቅላይ ስብሰባ ላይ እየወጣ እንዳልሆነ ቅሬታቸውን ማቅረብ ቀጥለው ነበር፡፡
en: Per another source, employees kept complaining about how information wasn't getting out during the general meeting.
ha: A cewar wata majiya kuma, ma'aikata sun ci gaba da kokawa game da yadda ba a samun bayanai yayin babban taron.
sw: Kulingana na chanzo kingine, wafanyakazi waliendelea kulalamika kuhusu jinsi taarifa hazikutolewa wakati wa mkutano mkuu.
yo: Olùjábọ̀ míràn tún sọ pé, àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ń ṣe asọ̀ nípa bí ìròyìn ò ṣe ń jáde lásíkò ìpàdé àpapọ̀.
zu: Ngokomunye umthombo, abasebenzi babelokhu benezikhalo ngokuthi kungani ulwazi lungaphumi ngesikhathi semihlangano.

am: ምን እየተፈጠረ እንደሆነ ከሰራተኞች ጋር መነጋገር ለምን ይሄን ያህል አስቸጋሪ እንደሆነም ብቻቸውን ያሰላስሉም ነበር፡፡
en: They wondered why it was so difficult to communicate with employees about what was happening.
ha: Sun yi mamakin cewa me ya sa sanar da ma'aikata game da abin da ke faruwa yake da wahala.
sw: Walishangaa kwa nini ilikuwa vigumu kuwasiliana na wafanyakazi kuhusu kile kinachotokea.
yo: Ó yà wọ́n lẹ́nu ìdí tí ó fi ṣòro láti bá àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ sọ́rọ̀ nípa ohun tó ń ṣẹlẹ̀.
zu: Babefisa ukwazi ukuthi yini eyenza kube nzima ukutshela abasebenzi ukuthi kwenzakalani.

am: በቀላሉ፤ ለምን ይህ ጀማሪ ድርጅት እንደተጠበቀው እየተንቀሳቀሰ እንዳልሆነ ማወቅ ብቻ ነበር የፈለጉት ፤ ግን “ጥምር መስራቾቹ እውነቱን መናገር አላፈቀዱም።”
en: They simply wanted to know why the startup was not performing as expected, but “the co-founders wouldn’t tell them the truth.”
ha: Su kawai suna so ne su san dalilin da ya sa sabon kamfanin ba ya aiki kamar yadda ake tsammani, amma "waɗanda suka kafa kamfanin sun ƙi faɗa musu gaskiya ba."
sw: Walitaka kujua tu kwa nini mradi haukufanya kama ilivyotarajiwa, lakini "Waanzilishi wenza hawakuwaambia ukweli".
yo: Wọ́n kàn fẹ́ mọ ìdí tí ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ náà ò ṣe ṣe tó bí wọ́n ṣe nírètí, ṣùgbọ́n, "àwọn Olùdásílẹ̀ ò fẹ́ sọ òótọ́ fún wọn."
zu: Babefuna ukwazi nje ukuthi kungani “abantu abaqala umsebenzi bengasebenzi ngendlela elindelekile, kodwa abasunguli babengabatsheli iqiniso.”

am: ብዙ ምንጮች “አመራሩን” ለማግኘት ቢሞክሩም ግን ምንም ምላሽ ባለማግኘታቸው ቅሬታ ያሰማሉ፡፡
en: Multiple sources complain about hardly getting responses from “management” whenever they reach out to them.
ha: Majiyoyi da yawa sun koka game da rashin samun martani daga “hukumar gudanarwa” a duk lokacin da suka tuntuɓe su.
sw: Duru nyingi zina lalamika kuhusu kutopata majibu kutoka kwa "Uongozi" kila zinapowafikia.
yo: Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ṣe asọ̀ nípa fífi agbárakáká gba èsì láti ọ̀dọ àwọn "alámòjútó" nígbà tí wọ́n bá kàn sí wọn.
zu: Imithombo eminingi yayikhononda ngokuthi ayijwayele ukuthola izimpendulo “kubaphathi” noma yinini uma bezama ukuxhumana nabo.
