am: በግልፅ ለማየት እንደሚቻለው፣ ጥምር መስራች 'አሹ'ን ሲያናግሩት እሱ ወደ ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚው ይልካቸዋል፤ ይህም በጉዳዩ ላይ እሱ ምንም ስልጣን እንደሌለው ያሳያል፡፡
en: Apparently, co-founder Ashu always referred them to CEO Nteff whenever they reached out to him, indicating that he had no say in the matter.
ha: Ta bayyana cewa Ashu, ɗaya daga cikin waɗanda suka kafa kamfanin, ya kan tura su ga Shugaban kamfani, wato CEO, Nteff, a duk lokacin da suka tuntuɓe shi, wanda hakan ke nuna cewa ba shi da wani iko a kan lamarin.
sw: Inavyoonekana, mwanzilishi mwenza Ashu kila mara aliwaelekeza kwa mkurugenzi mtendaji Nteff kila walipomfikia, akionyesha kuwa hana la kusema katika suala hilo.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ẹ̀rí tó dájú, olúdásílẹ̀ Ashu máa ń darí wọn sí Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Nteff nígbàkígbà tí wọ́n bá kàn sí i, èyí tó fi hàn pé kò lẹ́nu nínú ọ̀rọ̀ náà.
zu: Omunye wabasunguli uAshu wayehlezi ebadlulisela kuCEO uNteff ngaso sonke isikhathi uma bezama ukuxhumana naye, ekhombisa ukuthi akukho angakusho ngaloludaba.

am: ከስራ ገበታ ቅነሳዎች እና መልቀቂያዎች
en: Layoffs and resignations
ha: Sallama daga aiki da ajiye aiki.
sw: Kufukuzwa kazi na kujiuzulu
yo: Dída òṣìṣẹ́ sílẹ̀ àti kíkọ̀wé fiṣẹ́ sílẹ̀.
zu: Ukumiswa emsebenzini nokusula emsebenzini

am: ምንም እንኳን ድርጅቱ እ.ኤ.አ ከ ታህሳስ 2021 በፊት ጥሩ የስራ ባህል ቢኖለውም፣ ሳይታይ ያለፉት አንዳንድ ቀይ መስመሮች እንደነበሩም ምንጮች ይናገርሉ፡፡
en: While the company had a great work culture before December 2021, sources say that there were a few red flags which they overlooked.
ha: Yayin da kamfanin ke da kyakkyawan yanayin gudanar da aiki kafin watan Disamban 2021, majiyoyi sun ce akwai wasu alamomin faruwar abin waɗanda suka yi watsi da su.
sw: Ingawa kampuni ilikuwa na utaratibu mzuri wa kufanya kazi kabla ya Desemba 2021, duru zinasema kuwa kulikuwa na ishara kadhaa ambazo walizipuuzia.
yo: Nígbà tí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ní ìṣesí ibi-iṣẹ́ tó dára ṣíwájú oṣù Ọ̀pẹ ọdún 2021, àwọn olùjábọ̀ sọ wí pé àwọn àrokò tí ò da díẹ̀ ti wà tí àwọn fojúfò.
zu: Ngesikhathi inkampani inesiko lokusenza elihle ngaphambi kukaZibandlela ngonyaka wezi-2021, imithombo ithi yayizibona izinkomba eziyizexwayiso kodwa ayinakanga.

am: ለምሳሌ እንደ እ.ኤ.አ በመስከረም 2021 ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚው በይፋ አንድን ሰራተኛ ከስራው አባሮ፣ ኋላም ከቦታው ዝቅ ተደርጎ እና ደሞዙ ተቀንሶ ከእንደገና ተቀጠረ፤ ይህም በአንድ ወሩ ደግሞ እስኪባረር ነበር፡፡
en: In September 2021, for instance, the CEO reportedly fired an employee, who was later reinstated with a reduced salary and demoted, only to have their appointment terminated within a month.
ha: Misali, a watan Satumbar 2021, an ruwaito cewa Shugaban kamfani, wato CEO, ya kori wani ma’aikaci, wanda daga baya aka mayar da shi bakin aiki tare da rage masa albashi da rage masa muƙami, yayin da aka koreshi daga aiki wata ɗaya bayan haka.
sw: Mnamo Septemba 2021, kwa mfano, mkurugenzi mtendaji aliripotiwa kumfukuza kazi mfanyakazi, ambae baadae alirejeshwa kazini na alipunguziwa mshahara na kushushwa cheo, na uteuzi wake ukakatishwa ndani ya mwezi.
yo: Ní oṣù Òwẹwẹ̀ ọdún 2021, fún àpẹrẹ, Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí náà nínú ìròyìn lé òṣìṣẹ́ kan, tí wọ́n tún padà gbà síṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú àdínkù owó oṣù àti ìrẹninípò, àfi bí wọ́n tún ṣe wọ́gilé ìgbanisíṣẹ́ wọn láàrín oṣù kan.
zu: Ukwenza isibonelo ngoMandulo ngonyaka wezi-2021 kwabikwa ukuthi iCEO yaxosha umsebenzi, owabuye wabuyiselwa emsebenzini kodwa sekwehliswe umholo futhi esehlisiwe esikhundleni, nokuqashwa kwakhe kwanqanyulwa inyanga ingaphelile.

am: “የስራ ቦታው አለመረጋጋት የድርጅቱ ዋነኛ የማጥቂያ መሳሪያ ነው” ሲል አንድ ምንጭ ገልጿል፤” በርካታ ምክንያቶችን ጨምሮ ከዘገየው እና ከተጓተተው እ.ኤ.አ የታህሰስ ወር 2021 ደሞዝ ጋር ተደምሮ፣ ሁኔታው ከአመቱ ጅማሮ አንስቶ እየከፋ ነው የመጣው ።”
en: "Workplace instability has been one of the company's key weapons,” a source reveals, “The situation has grown since the beginning of the year for a number of reasons combined with delayed and late unpaid pay since December 2021."
ha: "Rashin zaman lafiya a wurin aiki ya kasance ɗaya daga cikin manyan makaman kamfanin," a cewar wata majiya, "Lamarin ya ƙara girma tun farkon shekarar saboda wasu dalilai da suka haɗa da jinkirin biya da kuma rashin biyan albashi tun Disamban 2021."
sw: "Kukosekana utulivu mahali pa kazi imekuwa ni tatizo sugu", chanzo kimoja kinafichua, "Sintofahamu imeongezeka tangu mwanzoni mwa mwaka kwa sababu kadhaa ikiwemo kucheleweshwa na malipo yaliyochelewa ambayo hayajalipwa tangu Desemba 2021."
yo: "Àìṣedéédé ibi-iṣẹ́ ti jẹ́ ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ohun ìja ilé-iṣẹ́ náà," olùjábọ̀ kan ló sọ ọ́ síta, "Ọ̀rọ̀ náà ti fẹjú síi láti ìgbà tí ọdún ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ fún ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìdí tó fi mọ́ ìdádúró tàbí sísan owó àìsan fún ìgbà pípẹ́ láti oṣù Ọ̀pẹ ọdún 2021.
zu: "Ukungazinzi kwenzawo yokusebenza kungenye yezikhali ezibalulekile zenkampani,” kuveza umthombo, “Isimo sesikhulile kusukela ukuqala konyaka ngenxa yezizathu eziningi okuhlanganisa ukubambezeleka, ukufika kamuva kokungakhokhelwa kusukela ngoZibandlela wezi-2021."

am: እ.ኤ.አ በ2021 ላይ ሀልዝሌይን በናይጄሪያ እና በካሜሮን በቁጥር የ12 እና የ10 የቡድን ጥንካሬዎች ነበሩት፡፡
en: As of 2021, Healthlane had team strengths of 12 and 10 in Nigeria and Cameroon, respectively.
ha: Ya zuwa shekarar 2021, kamfanin Healthlane yana da ƙarfi na ma’aikata 12 a Najeriya da ma’aikata 10 a Kamaru.
sw: Kufikia 2021, Healthlane ilikuwa na timu imara ya watu 12, na 10 wakitokea nchini Nigeria na Kameruni, mtawalia.
yo: Títí di ọdún 2021, Healthlane ní ikọ̀ tí agbára rẹ̀ tó 12 àti 10 ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà àti Cameroon, lọ́tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀.
zu: Kusuka ngonyaka wezi-2021 iHealthlane yayinezinto eziqinisa iqembu labawu-12 nabawu-10 eNigeria naseCameroon.

am: በሁለቱ ሀገራትም ስምንት የትርፍ ጊዜ ሰራተኞች ነበሩት፡፡
en: It also had eight part-time staff across both countries.
ha: Har ila yau, yana da ma'aikata masu aikin lokaci-lokaci guda takwas a faɗin ƙasashen biyu.
sw: Pia ilikuwa na wafanyakazi wa muda wanane katika nchi zote mbili.
yo: Ó tún ní àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ aláàbọ-iṣẹ́ mẹ́jọ káàkiri orílẹ̀-èdè méjèèjì.
zu: Yayiphinde ibe nabayitoho abayisishagalombili kuwona womabili amazwe.

am: ሆኖም ግን የናይጄሪያ እና የካሜሩን ምንጮች እንደሚሉት፣ እ.ኤ.አ በ 2022 አ.ም መጀመሪያ ላይ፣ ሰራተኛን ከስራ ገበታ ላይ ማባረር የተለመደ ሆኖ ነበር፡፡
en: However, Nigerian and Cameroonian sources say that layoffs became common at Healthlane at the start of 2022.
ha: Sai dai majiyoyi a Najeriya da Kamaru sun ce sallamar ma’aikata ya zama ruwan dare a Healthlane a farkon shekarar 2022.
sw: Hata hivyo, vyanzo vya Nigeria na Kameruni vinasema kuwa kuachishwa kazi, kumekuwa jambo la kawaida Healthlane mwanzoni mwa 2022.
yo: Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, àwọn olùjábọ̀ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà àti Cameroon sọ wí pé dída òṣìṣẹ́ sílẹ̀ wọ́pọ̀ ní Healthlane ní ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ ọdún 2022.
zu: Kodwa ke imithombo yaseCameroon naseNigeria yathi ukumiswa emsebenzini kwaba yinto ejwayelekile eHealthlane ngesikhathi kuqala unyaka wezi-2022.

am: በካሜሮን አንድ ሰራተኛ ከስራ ሲባረር እና ሁለት ሌሎች ሰራተኞች ደሞ “በአስቀያሚው የስራ ሁኔታ” ምክንያት በፍቃዳቸው ስራቸውን ለቀዋል ።
en: In Cameroon, an employee was fired, and two others resigned due to the "terrible working conditions."
ha: A Kamaru, an kori wani ma'aikaci, wasu ma’aikata biyu kuma sun ajiye aiki saboda "mummunan yanayin aiki."
sw: Nchini Kameruni mfanyakazi alifukuzwa kazi, na wengine wawili walijiuzulu kutokana na "hali mbaya kazini".
yo: ní orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon, wọ́n júwe ilé fún òṣìṣẹ́ kan, àwọn méjì mìíràn sì kọ ìwé fi iṣẹ́ sílẹ̀ nítorí "àwọn ìlànà iṣẹ́ tó burú jáì"
zu: ECameroon umsebenzi waxoshwa abanye ababili basula ngenxa "yezimo zokusebenza ezimbi."

am: ሶስት ሰራተኞች ከስራቸው ከተባረሩት በኋላ፣ተመሳሳይ የስራ ሁኔታ በናይጄሪያ ውስጥ ሰባት ሰዎችን በፍቃዳቸው ከስራ እንዲለቁ አድርጓል፡፡
en: The same conditions apparently made seven people resign in Nigeria after three were laid off.
ha: Ta bayyana cewa irin wannan sharaɗin ya sanya mutane bakwai ajie aiki a Najeriya bayan an sallami uku daga aiki.
sw: Katika hali hiyo hiyo ilisababisha watu saba kujiuzulu nchini Nigeria baada ya watatu kufukuzwa kazi.
yo: Irúu ìlànà yìí pẹ̀lú ẹ̀rí tó dájú ló mú kí ènìyàn méje kọ ìwé fi iṣẹ́ sílẹ̀ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n da àwọn mẹ́ta sílẹ̀.
zu: Okusempeleni izimo ezifanayo ezenza abantu abayisikhombisa basule emsebenzini emva kokuthi abathathu babemisiwe emsebenzini.

am: ይህ ፅሁፍ እስከ ተጠናቀርበት ጊዜ ድረስ ፤ምንጮች እንደሚያሳዩት ጥምር መስራቾቹን ጨምሮ ድርጅቱ ውስጥ አሁን ላይ በናይጄሪያ 3 እና በካሜሩን ደግሞ 4 ሰራተኞች ብቻ ይገኛሉ፡፡
en: At the time of writing, sources indicate that including the co-founders, the company currently has only three employees in Nigeria and four in Cameroon.
ha: Ya zuwa lokacin haɗa wannan rahoto, majiyoyi sun nuna cewa, a halin yanzu, in aka haɗa har da waɗanda suka kafa kamfanin, kamfanin na da ma’aikata uku ne kawai a Najeriya da ma’aikata huɗu a Kamaru.
sw: Wakati wa machapisho, duru zinaonyesha kuwa pamoja na waanzilishi wenza, kwa sasa kampuni hiyo ina wafanyakazi watatu tu nchini Nigeria na wanne nchini Kameruni!.
yo: Títí di àkókò tí à ń kọ àkọsílẹ̀ yìí, àwọn olùjábọ̀ tọ́ka sí i pé tó fi mọ́ àwọn Olùdásílẹ̀, ilé-iṣẹ́ náà lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí ní òṣìṣẹ́ mẹ́ta péré ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà àti mẹ́rin ní orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon.
zu: ngesikhathi sokubhala, imithombo yakhombisa ukuthi kubandakanya abasunguli, njangamanje inkampani inabasebenzi abathathu eNigeria nabane eCameroon.

am: “ስራቸውን የለቀቁት ሰዎች በእውነታው ከታየ ተገደው ነው ማለት ይቻላል።
en: “Those who resigned were practically forced to do so.
ha: “Waɗanda suka ajiye aiki kuma an tilasta musu yin hakan ne.
sw: "Wale waliojiuzulu walilazimishwa kufanya hivyo.
yo: "Wọ́n mú àwọn tí wọ́n kọ̀wé fiṣẹ́ sílẹ̀ ní tipátipá láti ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀ ni.
zu: "Labo abasula emsebenzini babephoqelekile ukwenza njalo.

am: አመራሩ የተጠቀመው ስልት፤ አንተን ጥቅም አልባ በማድረግ በራስህ ግዜ ስራውን እንድትለቅ ማድረግን ነው እናም እነሱ ከማንኛውም ክስ ነፃ ይሆናሉ” ሲል አንድ ሰራተኛ ይናገራል፡፡
en: The strategy of management is to make you so useless that you would resign, and they will be exempt from any charges,” an employee claims.
ha: Dabarar hukumar gudanarwar ita ce, mayar da ku marasa amfani, ta yadda har sai kun ajiye aiki, su kuma su kuɓuta daga duk wani zargi,” in ji wani ma’aikaci.
sw: Mkakati wa Uongozi ni kukufanya usiwe na maana kiasi kwamba ungejiuzulu, na wataondolewa mashtaka yoyote", mfanyakazi anadai.
yo: Ọgbọ́n àtinúdá àwọn alákòso ni láti sọ ènìyàn di aláìmọ̀ọ́ṣe tí yóò fi kọ̀wé fiṣẹ́ sílẹ̀, tí wọn ó sì yọ ara wọn kúrò níbi èyíkéyìí ẹ̀sùn." òṣìṣẹ́ kan ló sọ bẹ́ẹ̀.
zu: Icebo labaphathi ukukwenza ungabi umsebenzi walutho uze usule emsebenzini, futhi bayaxolelwa kunoma yimaphi amacala," kusho umsebenzi.

am: በቴክ ፓይንት አፍሪካ የወጣ አንድ ሰነድ እንደሚያሳየው ድርጅቱ ስምንቱንም የትርፍ ሰአት ሰራተኞች አባሯል፡፡
en: A document seen by Techpoint Africa reveals that the company fired all eight part-time staff.
ha: Wata takarda da Techpoint Africa ta gani ta nuna cewa, kamfanin ya kori dukan ma'aikata takwas masu aikin lokaci-lokaci.
sw: Hati iliyoonekana na Techpoint Africa inaonyesha kuwa kampuni hiyo iliwafuta kazi wafanyakazi wote wanane wa muda.
yo: Àkọsílẹ̀ kan tí Techpoint Africa rí fi hàn pé ilé-iṣẹ́ náà lé gbogbo àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ aláàbọ iṣẹ́ mẹ́jẹ́ẹ̀jọ.
zu: Iphepha elabonwa yiTechpoint Africa liveza ukuthi inkampani yaxosha bonke abasebenzi abayisishagalombili abayitoho.

am: የህንፃ እድሳት እና የስልክ መተግበሪያ ማሻሻያ
en: Building renovations and app update
ha: Gyare-gyaren gine-gine da sabunta manhaja
sw: Ukarabati wa jengo na sasisho la programu
yo: Síṣe àtúnse ilé àti ìsọdọ̀tun ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́
zu: Ukulungiswa kabusha kwebhilidi nohlelokusetshenzwa olubuyekeziwe lokusetshenziswa

am: ቀደም ብሎ የሀልዝሌይን የስልክ መተግበሪያ በአንድሮይድ ስልክ ላይ እንደማይሰራ እና በሚያስገርም ሁኔታም ከአይፎን ስልኮች የመተግበሪያ ማከማቻ ውስጥ እንዴት እንደተሰወረ አንስቼ ተናግሬ ነበር፡፡
en: I earlier mentioned how Healthlane's app was not functioning on Android and curiously missing on the App Store.
ha: A baya na ambaci yadda manhajar Healthlane bata aiki akan manhajar Android, sannan kuma ta ɓace daga kan dandalin App Store.
sw: Hapo awali nilisema jinsi Programu ya Healthlane haikufanya kazi kwenye Android na ilikosekana kwenye App Store.
yo: Mo mẹ́nu bàá ṣáájú bí ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́ Healthlane ò ṣe ṣiṣẹ́ lórí Android àti bí ó ṣe di àwátì lóri App Store.
zu: Ekuqaleni ngike ngakusho ukuthi isisetshenziswa seHealthlane sasingasebenzi kanjani kuAndriod futhi singatholakali kusigcinazisetshenzisa.

am: አንዳንድ የቀድሞ እና የአሁን የድርጅቱን ሰራተኞች የስልክ መተግበሪያው ለምን እንደማይሰራ ሲጠይቋቸው አብዛኛዎቹ ምንም እንደማያውቁ ተናግረዋል፡፡
en: When I asked some of the company’s current and former employees why the app was not working, most of them said they had no idea.
ha: Lokacin da na tambayi wasu daga cikin ma'aikatan kamfanin na yanzu da tsofi kan dalilin da yasa manhajar ba ta aiki, yawancinsu sun ce ba su da masaniya.
sw: Nilipouliza baadhi ya wafanyakazi wa sasa na wa zamani wa kampuni kwa nini Programu haifanyi kazi, wengi wao walisema hawajui.
yo: Nígbà tí mo bèrè lọ́wọ́ àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ náà lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ àti àwon òṣìṣẹ́ tẹ́lẹ̀ ìdí tí ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́ náà ò fi ṣiṣẹ́, ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ wọn sọ wí pé àwọn ò mọ̀ nípa rẹ̀.
zu: Uma ngibuza abasebenzi bamanje nababesebenza kulenkampani ukuthi kungani isisetshenziswa singasebenzi, abaningi babobathi abanalo ulwazi.

am: ከመካከላቸውም አንዱ “አሊን አፕል ላይ እዳ ሊኖርበት እንደሚችል” ሀሳብ አቅርቧል፡፡
en: One of them suggested, “it’s possible that Alain owes Apple.”
ha: Ɗaya daga cikinsu yace, "akwai yiwuwar cewa Apple yana bin Alain bashi."
sw: Mmoja wao alipendekeza, "Inawezekana kwamba Alain anadaiwa na Apple"
yo: Ọ̀kan nínú wọn dábàá pé, "Ó ṣeéṣe kó jẹ́ pé Alain jẹ Apple lówó ni."
zu: Omunye wabo wabeka ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi u-Alaina ukweleta uApple

am: ምንም እንኳን ሀልዝሌይን “በአሁኑ ሰአት በስልክ መተግበሪያው ላይ አንዳንድ ለውጥ እያደረግን ነው” ቢሉም ብዙ ምንጮች መተግበሪያው እ.ኤ.አ ከመስከረም 2022 ጀምሮ እየሰራ እንዳልሆነ አረጋግጠዋል፡፡
en: Although Healthlane claims they “are currently making some changes to the app,” multiple sources confirm that the app hasn’t been functioning since September 2022.
ha: Ko da yake Healthlane ya yi iƙirarin cewa "a halin yanzu suna yin wasu canje-canje ga manhajar," majiyoyi da yawa sun tabbatar da cewa manhajar ba ta aiki tun Satumban 2022.
sw: Ingawa Healthlane inadai "Kwa sasa wanafanya mabadiliko fulani kwenye Programu", duru nyingi zinathibitisha kuwa Programu haifanyi kazi tangu Septemba 2022.
yo: Bótilẹ̀ jẹ́ wí pé Healthlane sọ wí pé àwọn "ń ṣe àwọn àyípadà kọ̀ọ̀kan sí ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́ náà," ìròyìn láti ẹnu ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ fi ìdí rẹ̀ múlẹ̀ pé ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́ náà ò ṣiṣẹ́ láti oṣù Ọ̀wẹwẹ̀ ọdún 2022.
zu: Yize noma uHealthlane uthi okwamanje basenza izinguquko kusisetshenziswa, imithombo eminingi yaqinisekisa ukuthi isissetshenziswa besingasebenzi kusuka ngoMandulo wezi-2022.

am: እ.ኤ.አ በህዳር 2022 ለእነዚህ ነገሮች ሁሉ ትርጉም ለመስጠት ስል፣ አንዳንድ ሄልዝሌይን ላይ ገንዘብ ያፈሰሱ ባለሀብቶችን ለማግኘት ወሰንኩ፡፡
en: On November 9, 2022, in a bid to make sense of all these, I decided to reach out to some of Healthlane's investors.
ha: A ranar 9 ga Nuwamba, shekarar 2022, a ƙoƙarin ganin cewa komai ya fito fili, na yanke shawarar tuntuɓar wasu daga cikin masu hannun jari a Healthlane.
sw: Mnamo tarehe 9 Novemba 2022, katika nia ya kuelewesha haya yote, niliamua kuwasiliana na baadhi ya wawekezaji wa Healthlane.
yo: Ní ọjọ́ 9 oṣù Bẹlu, ọdún 2022, nínú ìgbìyànjú láti mú ọpọlọ jáde nínú gbogbo eléyìí, mo pinnu láti kàn sí àwọn olùdókòwo Healthlane kọ̀ọ̀kan.
zu: Ngomhlaka-9 kuLwezi ngonyaka wezi-2022, kuqhudelwano ngentengo ukwenza umqondo wakho konke lokhu, ngikhethe ukukhuluma nabanye abatshalizimali baseHealthlane.

am: የሚደንቀው፣ በቀጣዩ ቀን የስልክ መተግበሪያው በአንድሮይድ ስልኮች ላይ በድንገት ወደ ተግባራዊነት ተመልሷል፡፡
en: Interestingly, by the next day, the app's functionality on Android devices was suddenly restored.
ha: Wani abin sha'awa shi ne, zuwa washegari, kwatsam manhajar ta ci gaba da aiki kan na'urori masu amfani da manhajar Android.
sw: Inashangaza, kufikia siku iliyofuata, utendaji wa Programu kwenye vifaa vya Android ulirejeshwa ghafla.
yo: Sí ìyàlẹ́nu, nígbà tí yóò fi di ọjọ́ kejì, àwọn àbùdá iṣẹ́ ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́ náà lórí àwọn ẹ̀rọ Android ti padà bọ́ sípọ̀ lójijì.
zu: Okujabulisayo, ngosuku olulandelayo ukusebenza kwezisetshenziswa kumadivayisi akaAndriod kwasukuvele kwavuseleleka.

am: በአይፎን ስልኮች የመተግበሪያ ማከማቻ (አፕ-ስቶር) ውስጥም መገኘት ችሏል፡፡
en: It also became available on the App Store.
ha: Hakanan ta fara samuwa a dandalin App Store.
sw: Pia ikawa inapatiaka kwenye App Store.
yo: Ó tún ti wà lórí App Store bákan náà.
zu: Kwaphinde kwabakhona futhi nakusigcinasisentshenzisa.

am: ነገር ግን፣ የቀጠሮ ማስያዣ መተግበሪያው ለተጠቃሚ የተከለከለ ነበር፡፡
en: However, the appointment booking functionality was unavailable.
ha: Saidai amma ikon tsara alƙawura baya aiki.
sw: Hata hivyo, utendakazi wa kuhifadhi miadi haukupatikana.
yo: Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, àbùdá iṣẹ́ fún ìforúkọsílẹ̀ fún ìfojúrinjú ò sí níbẹ̀.
zu: Kodwa ke ukusebenza kokubhukha kwakungakabi khona.

am: “አሊን የተንቀሳቃሽ ስልክ ባለሞያ አይደለም፡፡
en: “Alain is not a mobile developer.
ha: “Alain ba maƙerin manhajojin wayar hannu ba ne.
sw: "Alain si msanidi wa Simu.
yo: Alain kìí ṣe olùṣẹ̀da ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́.
zu: "U-Alian akanyena umakhi womahambanaye.

am: በመተግበሪያው ላይ እንዲሰሩ በውጪ የሚገኙ ባለሞያዎች ጋር ውል ተፈራርሞ መሆን አለበት”ሲል አንድ የቀድሞ ሰራተኛ ተናግሯል” ይህ በንዲህ እንዳለ ግን በራሱ ባለሞያዎች እና ሰራተኞች በእዳ መያዙን ቀጥሏል፡፡ “
en: He must have contracted external developers to work on the app," says a former employee, "Meanwhile, he continues to owe his internal engineers and staff.”
ha: Dole ma ya zama cewa bayar da kwangilar yayi ga masu ƙirar manhajojin wayar hannu daga wajen kamfanin suka yi aiki kan manhajar," in ji wani tsohon ma'aikaci, "A halin yanzu kuma, injiniyoyinsa da ma'aikatansa na ci gaba da binsa bashi."
sw: Lazima awe amewapa kandarasi watengenezaji wa nje kufanya kazi kwenye Programu", anasema mfanyakazi wa zamani, "wakati huo huo, anaendelea kuwadai wahandisi wake wa ndani na wafanyakazi".
yo: Ó ti gba àwọn olùṣẹ̀da ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́ láti ìta láti ṣiṣẹ́ lóri ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́," òṣìṣẹ́ tẹ́lẹ̀ rí kan ló sọ bẹ́ẹ̀, "Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ó ṣì ń tẹ̀síwájú láti jẹ àwọn onímọ̀-ẹ̀rọ rẹ̀ lábẹ́lé àti àwon òṣìṣẹ́ rẹ̀ lówó."
zu: Kungenzeka ukuthi wenza inkontileka nabathuthukisi bangaphandle ukuthi basebenze isisetshenziswa," kusho owayengumsebenzi, "Okwamanje usaqhubeka nokukweleta onjiniyela bangaphakathi kanye nabasebenzi bakhe."

am: በተጨማሪም “የሄልዝሌይን ድርጅት በወረቀት ላይ ብቻ ነው ያለው ምክንያቱም ምንም ምርት ስለሌለ ነው ፤ያለው የውሸት ጥርቅም ብቻ ነው” ይላሉ፡፡
en: They also claim that Healthlane is only a company on paper because there is no product, “only a bunch of lies.”
ha: Har ila yau, suna da'awar cewa Healthlane kamfani ne a kan takarda kaɗai, saboda babu wani abin da yake samarwa, "tarin ƙarairayi ne kawai."
sw: Pia wanadai Healthlane ni kampuni ya makaratasi tu kwa sababu hakuna bidhaa, "Uongo mtupu."
yo: Wọ́n tún sọ wí pé lórí ìwé lásán ni Healthlane ti jẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ nítorí pé kò sí ọjà kankan, "àfi àdìpọ fáílì nìkan."
zu: Baphinde basho ukuthi iHealthlane inkampani ngokwephepha kuphela ngoba awukho umkhiqizo, "ingwaba yamanga nje kuphela."

am: የናይጄሪያው ሄልዝሌይን ቢሮ መገኛው 16 አድዋሌ ከላዎሌ ክሪሰንት ፣ ሌኪ፣ ላጎስ ከተማ ናይጄሪያ ውስጥ ነበር ይህም ድርጅቱ ህንፃውን ጥሎ እስከወጣበት እ.ኤ.አ ሚያዝያ 2022 ድረስ ነበር፡፡
en: Healthlane’s Nigerian office was situated at 16 Adewale Kolawole Crescent, Lekki, Lagos State, Nigeria “until August 2022 when the company left the building.
ha: Ofishin Healthlane na Najeriya yana nan a 16 Adewale Kolawole Crescent, Lekki, Jihar Legas, Najeriya “har sai watan Agustan 2022 da kamfanin ya bar wurin.
sw: Ofisi ya Healthlane ya Nigeria ilikuwa 16 Adewale Kolawole Crescent, Lekki, Lagos State, Nigeria "hadi Agosti 2022 wakati kampuni ilipoondoka kwenye jengo hilo.
yo: Ọ́fíísì Healthlane ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà wà ní 16 Adewale Kolawole Crescent, Lekki, Ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó, ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nigeria, "títí di oṣù Ògún ọdún 2022 nígbà tí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà fi Ilé náà sílẹ̀.
zu: Ihhovisi leHealthlane laseNigeria laliku-16 Adewale Kolawole Crescent, Lekki, eLagos State, eNigeria "kwaze kwaba NguNcwaba ngonyaka wezi-2022 ngesikhathi inkampani ishiya kuleli bhilidi.

am: የኪራይ ክፍያውም እ.ኤ.አ በሰኔ 30 /2022 ተጠናቆ ነበር፡፡
en: Rent expired on June 30, 2022.”
ha: Kuɗin haya ya ƙare ranar 30 ga watan Yuni, 2022."
sw: Kodi iliisha tarehe 30 Juni 2022.
yo: Owó ilé náà parí ní 30 Okúdu, ọdún 2022.
zu: Irenti yaphelelwa yisikhathi ngoNhlangulana 30 ngonyaka wezi-2022

am: ተከትሎም አንድ የቀድሞ ሰራተኛ “በድርጅቱ የሚካሄድ ምንም አይነት የህንፃ እደሳ የለም“ሲል ተናግሯል።
en: Consequently, an ex-employee maintains that “there are no on-going renovations by the company.
ha: Biyo haka ne wani tsohon ma'aikaci ya tabbatar da cewa "babu wani gyare-gyaren da kamfanin ke yi a halin yanzu.
sw: Kwa hiyo, mfanyakazi wa zamani anasisitiza kuwa "hakuna ukarabati unaofanywa na kampuni.
yo: Fún ìdí èyí, òṣìṣẹ́ tẹ́lẹ̀ rí kan sọ pé "kò sí iṣẹ́ àtúnṣe kankan tó ń lọ ní ilé-iṣẹ́ náà.
zu: Ngenxa yalokho, owayengumsebenzi uyakugcizelela ukuthi "akukho okulungiswayo okwenzekayo kwenziwa yinkampani.

am: ሀልዝሌይን በናጄሪያ በይፋ ቢሮ የለውም፡፡
en: Healthlane Nigeria officially has no office.
ha: A hukumance, Healthlane Nigeria ba shi da ofishi.
sw: Healthlane haina ofisi rasmi Nigeria.
yo: Healthlane ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà ò ní ọ́fíísì.
zu: Ngokusemthethweni iHealthlane eNigeria ayinahhovisis.

am: የድርጅቱ ንብረቶችም ወደ አንድ ሰራተኛ ቤት ተጭነው ሄደዋል እናም ሰራተኞች ቀጣይ የሚመጣው ህልም እየጠበቁ ራሳቸውን ከቤታቸው ሆነው ሲሰሩ አገኙት፡፡
en: The company belongings were packed into an employee's house, and employees found themselves working from home while waiting for the next vision.”
ha: Kayayyakin da kamfanin ke da su na ajiye a gidan wani ma'aikacin kamfanin, yayin da ma'aikata kuma suke aiki daga gida yayin da suke jiran abu na gaba."
sw: Vitu vya kampuni viliwekwa ndani ya nyumba ya mfanyakazi, na wafanyakazi wakajikuta wakifanya kazi nyumbani huku wakingojea mustakbali unaofuata".
yo: Gbogbo ohun ìní ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ni wọ́n kó lọ sí ilé òṣìṣẹ́ kan, àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ṣì bára wọn lẹ́ni tó ń ṣiṣẹ́ láti ilé nígbà tí wọ́n ń dúró de ìran tí ó kàn."
zu: Izinto zenkampani zapakishwa emzini womsebenzi, abasebenzi bazithola besebenzela emakhaya ngesikhathi besalinde umbono olandelayo

am: ሌላው አክሎ “የመጨረሻ ደምበኞቻቸው የታዩት ሀምሌ ውስጥ ነበር ፣ ስለዚህ ከዚያ በሁዋላ ያለው ማንኛውም ነገር ማስመሰል ብቻ ነው፡፡”
en: Another adds, “Their most recent client was seen in July, so anything after that is merely posturing.”
ha: Wani ya ƙara da cewa, "Rabonsu da harƙalla da abokin ciniki tun watan Yuli, don haka duk wani abu bayan wannan lokacin burga ce kawai."
sw: Mwingine anaongezea, "Mteja wao wa hivi karibuni alionekana mnamo Julai, kwa hiyo chochote baada ya hapo ni bure tu".
yo: Òmíràn fi kún-un pé, "Oníbàárà tí wọ́n ní gbẹ́yìn ni wọ́n rí ní oṣù Agẹmọ, torí náà gbogbo nǹkan yòókù lẹ́yìn ìyẹn ẹ̀tàn lásán ni."
zu: Omunye uyengeza ukuthi "Ikhasimende labo lamanje bagcine ukulibona ngoNtulikazi, ngakho okunye emva kwalokho kwakungukwenza nje."

am: ይህን ለማረጋገጥ ማክሰኞ ጠዋት ሌኪ የሚገኘውን የድርጅቱን ተቋም ጎበኘሁ ፡፡
en: I visited the company’s facility in Lekki on a Tuesday morning to confirm this.
ha: Na ziyarci kamfanin a Lekki a safiyar ranar Talata don tabbatar da hakan.
sw: Nilitembelea kituo cha kampuni huko Lekki Jumanne asubuhi ili kuthibitisha hili.
yo: Mo ṣe àbẹ̀wò sí ọgbà ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ní Lekki ní àárọ̀ òjọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun kan láti fi ìdí èyí múlẹ̀.
zu: Ngavakashela indawo yenkampani eLekki ngoLwesibili ukuqinisekisa lokhu.

am: እዛ ስደርስ መጀመሪ የተገነዘብኩት ነገር የሄልዝላዜይን ማስታወቂያ ያለመኖሩን ነው፡፡
en: The absence of Healthlane's signage was the first thing I noticed when I got there.
ha: Rashin wata alama ta Healthlane shi ne abu na farko da na lura da shi da isata wurin.
sw: Kutokuwepo kwa dalili za Healthlane ndilo jambo la kwanza nililoliona nilipofika pale.
yo: Àìsí àkọmọ̀na Healthlane ni àkọ́kọ́ ohun tí mo ṣe àkíyèsí nígbà tí mo dé ibẹ̀.
zu: Ukungabibikho kwezinkombandlela eHealthlane kwaba yinto yokuqala engayiqaphela uma ngifika lapha.

am: በአንድ እይታም ህንፃው ሰው የሌለበት መሆኑ ግልፅ ነበር፡፡
en: One look at the structure and it was apparent it was empty.
ha: Kallo ɗaya na yiwa ginin na gane cewa babu komai a cikinsa.
sw: Aliangalia ofisi ni dhahiri ilikuwa tupu.
yo: Ẹ̀èkan ṣoṣo tí mo wo ilé náà ló ti fi hàn pé ó ti dahoro.
zu: Ukubuka kanye nje kusakhiwo empeleni kwakungekho lutho.

am: ስለ ህንፃው ተጨማሪ ምርመራ ካደረጉ በኋላ ሁለት የተለያዩ ምንጮች በህንፃው ውስጥ በአሁኑ ጊዜ ማንም ሰው እንደማይገኝነት አረጋግጠውልኛል፡፡
en: Following further investigation about the building, two different sources confirmed that no one was currently residing in the building.
ha: Bayan gudanar da ƙarin bincike game da ginin, majiyoyi biyu sun tabbatar da cewa a halin yanzu babu wanda ke zaune a ginin.
sw: Kufuatia uchunguzi zaidi kuhusu jengo hilo, vyanzo viwili tofauti vilithibitisha kuwa kwa sasa hakuna mtu anaeishi katika jengo hilo.
yo: Lẹ́yìn ìtọpinpin díẹ̀ nípa ilé náà, olùjábọ̀ méjì fi ìdi rẹ̀ múlẹ̀ pé ẹnìkankan ò gbé inú ilé náà lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí.
zu: Ukulandela uphenyo olwaluqhubeka ngebhilidi, imithombo emibili yaqinisekisa ukuthi kwakungekhomuntu owayehlala kuleli bhilidi.

am: ድርጅቱ ከሁለት ወራት ቀደም ብሎም መልቀቁን ጠቅሰዋል፡፡
en: They also mentioned that the company had left two months prior.
ha: Sun kuma ce kamfanin ya bar wurin watanni biyu da suka gabata.
sw: Pia walisema kuwa kampuni hiyo ilikuwa imeondoka miezi miwili kabla.
yo: Wọ́n tún mẹ́nu bà á pé ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ti kúrò ní bíi oṣù méjì sẹ́yìn.
zu: Baphinde basho ukuthi inkampani yahamba ezinyangeni ezimbili ngaphambilini.

am: ከሁለቱ አንዱ እንደሚለውም አሁን ህንፃውም መሬቱን ያከራያቸው ሰው ንብረት ሆኗል፡፡
en: According to one of them, the landlord now owns the building.
ha: A cewar ɗaya daga cikinsu, yanzu asalin mai wurin ne ke da mallakin ginin.
sw: Kulingana na mmoja wao, mwenye nyumba sasa anamiliki jengo hilo.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀kan nínú wọn ṣe sọ, onílé ni ó ni ilé náà báyìí.
zu: Ngokomunye wabo umasitende uyena osengumnikazi webhilidi.

am: ምን እየተፈጠረ እንደሆነ ያውቁ እንደሆነ እና አሁንም ከሀልዝሌን ጋር በአጋርነት እየሰሩ መሆናቸውን ለማወቅ የጤና ጥበቃ ማህበር (ጤ.ጥ.ማ) አገልግሎት አቅራቢያችንን አናገርኩት፡፡
en: I contacted our HMO provider to find out if they knew what was happening and if they were still in partnership with Healthlane.
ha: Na tuntuɓi Ƙungiyar Kula da Lafiya, wato HMO, don jin ko sun san abin da ke faruwa, kuma shin har yanzu suna da haɗin gwiwa da Healthlane.
sw: Niliwasiliana na mtoa huduma wetu wa HMO ili kujua kama walijua kinachoendelea na kama bado walikuwa na ushirikiano na Healthlane.
yo: Mo kàn sí olùpèse HMO wa láti mọ̀ bóyá wọ́n mọ nǹkan tó ń ṣẹlẹ̀ àti bóyá wọ́n ṣì ń dòwòpọ̀ pẹ̀lú Healthlane.
zu: Ngaxhumana nomxhasi wethu weHMO ukuthola ukuthi bayazi yini ngokwenzekayo nokuthi babesabambisene neHealthlane.

am: አጋርነታቸውን ቢያረጋግጡም ፣ የሀልዝሌይንን የአሁን መገኛ ቦታ እርግጠኛ አልነበሩም፡፡
en: While they confirmed their partnership, they were unsure of Healthlane's current location.
ha: Yayin da suka tabbatar da haɗin gwiwar su, sun bayyana cewa ba su da tabbacin wurin da Healthlane yake a yanzu.
sw: Ingawa alithibitisha ushirikiano wao, hawakuwa na uhakika na eneo la sasa la Healthlane.
yo: Nígbà tí wọ́n fi ìdọ̀wọ̀pọ̀ wọn múlẹ̀, wọn ò ní ìdánilójú ibi tí Healthlane wà lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́.
zu: Ngesikhathi beqinisekisa ukubambisana kwabo, babengenaso isisqiniseko sendawo lakutholakala iHealthlane.

am: አንድ ምንጭ እንዲህ ሲልም አረጋግጧል “በካሜሩን ምንም እየተካሄደ ያለ የህንፃ እድሳት የለም።”
en: A source confirms that, “There is no ongoing renovation in Cameroon.
ha: Wata majiya ta tabbatar da cewa, “Babu wani gyare-gyare da ake yi yanzu haka a Kamaru.
sw: Chanzo kimoja kinathibitisha kuwa, "Hakuna ukarabati unaoendelea nchini Kameruni.
yo: olùjábọ̀ kan fi ìdi rẹ̀ múlẹ̀ pé, "Kò sí iṣẹ́ àtúnṣe kankan tó ń lọ lọ́wọ́ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon.
zu: Umthombo uyaqinisekisa ukuthi, "Akukho ukulungiswa kabusha owenzekayo eCameroon.

am: ስራ እንዳይሰራ የሚያግድ ምንም አይነት የህንፃ እድሳት አይታየኝም ፡፡
en: I do not see what is there to renovate for operations not to be holding.
ha: Ban ga abin gyarawa game da ayyukan da ba yi ake ba.
sw: Sioni kuna nini cha kukarabati ili shughuli zisifanyike.
yo: Mi ò rí nǹkankan tó wà níbẹ̀ láti ṣe àtúnṣe sí tí kò ní jẹ́ kí iṣẹ́ wáyé.
zu: Angiboni ukuthi yini ekhona ukuze kwenziwe kabusha ukuze ukusebenza kungenzeki.

am: እንደያውም፣ የብዙ ሻጮች እዳ አለባቸው እናም የኤሌክትሪክ ክፍያ እንኳን መክፈል ይከብዳቸዋል፡፡”
en: They are even owing a lot of vendors and find it difficult to pay electric bills.”
ha: Dillalai da yawa ma na bin kamfanin bashi, kuma kamfanin na shan wahalar biyan kuɗin wutar lantarki.”
sw: Wachuuzi wengi wanawadai na imekuwa vigumu hata kulipa bili za umeme".
yo: Wọ́n tún jẹ ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn olùtajà lówó ó sì tún nira fún wọn láti san owó iná."
zu: Bakweleta ngisho abadayisayo abaningi futhi kunzima ngisho ukukhokhela izikwelethu zikagesi."

am: ሌላ ሰራተኛ አክሎም፣ በናይጄሪያ ያለው ተቋም በሀምሌ ወር መዘጋት የግድ የነበረበት፣ ምክንያቱም ለተቋሙ ጥገና የሚስፈልገው የኪራይ፣የኤሌክትሪክ፣ የጥገና ፣የተቀያሪ ሀይል ማመንጫ፣ እና የገንዳ ጥገናን ጨምሮ በሚያስወጣው ከፍተኛ ወጪ ነው።
en: Another employee adds that the facility in Nigeria had to close in July due to the high facility maintenance cost, including rent, electricity, repairs, and generator and pool maintenance.
ha: Wani ma’aikaci ya ƙara da cewa a watan Yuli ne aka rufe ginin kamfanin na Najeriya saboda yawan kuɗin da ake kashewa wajen kula da ginin, wanda ya haɗa da haya, wutar lantarki, gyare-gyare, janareto da kula da wurin wanka.
sw: Mfanyakazi mwingine anaongezea kuwa kituo nchini Nigeria kililazimika kufungwa mnamo Julai kutokana na gharama kubwa ya matengenezo ya kituo, ikiwa ni pamoja na Kodi, Umeme, Ukarabati, na matengenezo ya Jenereta na Bwawa.
yo: Òṣìṣẹ́ mìíràn fi kún-un pé ilé-iṣẹ́ tí ó wà ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà ní láti kógbáwọlé ní oṣù Agẹmọ nítorí ìnáwó ìṣàkóso ilé-iṣẹ́ tó pọ̀, pẹ̀lú owó ilé, iná, àwọn àtúnṣe, àti owó ìṣàkóso ẹ̀rọ amúnáwá àti àmójútó owó.
zu: Omunye umsebenzi uyengeza ukuthi indawo yaseNigeria kwakumele ivalwe nhoNtulikazi ngenxa yokuthi kwakubiza ukuyinakekela, okufaka irenti, ukulungisa okufile, ijeneretha kanye nokunakekela indawo yokubhukuda.

am: ከተዘጋም በኋላ፣ ለሰራተኞች ትንሽ የጊዜያዊ ቦታ እንደሚከራዩ ተነግሯቸው ነበር፡፡
en: After the closure, the staff were informed that a smaller temporary location would be rented.
ha: Bayan an rufe, an sanar da ma'aikatan cewa za a karɓi hayar wani wuri wanda bai kai wannan girma ba na wucin gadi.
sw: Baada ya kufungwa, wafanyakazi walijulishwa kuwa eneo dogo la muda lingekodishwa.
yo: Lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n tì í, wọ́n fi tó àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ létí pé wọn yóò gba ààyè kékeré kan fún ìgbà díẹ̀.
zu: Emva kokuvalwa, abasebenzi batshelwa ukuthi kuzoqashwa indawo encane okwesikhashana.

am: ነገር ግን ከተወሰነ ጊዜ በኋላ፣ ቢሮ እንደማይኖር እና ሀልዝሌይን ይልቁንም የላብራቶሪ ግልጋሎቱን በሌላ ሀገራት ማድርግ ላይ እንደሚያተኩር፣ በተመሳሳይ ጊዜ ድርጅቱ ከባድ የጤና ችግሮችን ክትትል የማድረግ ስልቱን እንደሚያከናውን ነበር የተነገራቸው፡፡
en: However, sometime later, they were told there would be no office and that Healthlane would instead focus on outsourcing the lab's services while carrying out its follow-up care strategies for chronic health conditions.
ha: Amma bayan ɗan wani lokaci aka faɗa musu cewa ba za a karɓi hayar kowane ofishi ba; a maimakon haka, Healthlane zai mai da hankali kan nemo masu ayyukan ɗakin gwaje-gwaje daga waje, yana mai gudanar da dabarun kula da lafiya kan jinyoyin da suka daɗe a jikin mutane.
sw: Hata hivyo, muda fulani baadae, waliambiwa hakutakuwa na ofisi na kwamba Healthlane ingezingatia badala yake kutoa huduma za maabara huku ikitekeleza mikakati yake ya ufuatiliaji wa hali ya afya sugu.
yo: Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, lẹ́yìn ìgbà díẹ̀, wọ́n sọ fún wọn pé kò ní sí ọ́fíísì àti wí pé Healthlane dípò bẹ́ẹ̀ yóò gbájúmọ́ gbígbé àwọn iṣẹ́ ààyè fún ìmọ̀ ìjìnlẹ̀ síta tí yóò sì máa lo ìlànà ìtọ́jú atọpinpin fún àwọn ipò ìlera tó lágbára.
zu: Kodwa ke ekuhambeni kwesikhathi batshelwa ukuthi ngeke kube nehhovisi nokuthi iHealthlane okungcono izogxila kuemisebenzini yezelebhu yangaphandle ngesikhathi benza ukulandelela kwamasu okunakekela kwezifo zezempilo zamahlalakhona.

am: በካሜሩን የነበረው ችግር ግን ይህ አልነበረም።
en: But that was not the case in Cameroon.
ha: Amma ba haka lamarin yake ba a Kamaru.
sw: Lakini haikuwa hivyo nchini Kameruni.
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n ọ̀rọ̀ kò rí bẹ́ẹ̀ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon.
zu: Kodwa kwakungenjalo eCameroon.

am: ቢሮው ባይዘጋም፣ ስልቱ ግን ከክትትል እና እንክብካቤ እቅድ ወደ መርሀ ግብር ቅለሳ እና፣ አሁን በቅርቡ ደግሞ ወደ ምንም እንቅስቃሴ አለማድረግ ተለውጧል፡፡
en: While the office was not closed, the “strategy changed from checkups and care plan to programme reversal and, most recently, to no activity.”
ha: Baya ga cewa ba a rufe ofishin ba, "dabarar ta canza daga duba lafiya da tsarin kula da lafiya zuwa fasa aiwatar da shirye-shirye, yanzu kuma zuwa rashin yin komai."
sw: Wakati ofisi ilikuwa haijafungwa, "mkakati ulibadilika kutoka Ukaguzi na mpango wa matunzo hadi urejeshaji wa mpango na, hivi karibuni, bila shughuli yoyoyte".
yo: Nígbà tí wọn ò ti ofíísì náà, "ìlànà náà yípadà láti àyẹ̀wò àti ìlànà ìtọ́jú sí ìfàsẹ́yìn ètò àti, ní àìpẹ́ yìí, àìsí iṣẹ́."
zu: Ngesikhathi ihhovisi lingakavalwa,isu laguquka kusukwa ekuhlolweni nohlelo lokunakekela lwaya ekuphindiseleni emuva uhlelo, futhi kamuva nje awukho umsebenzi.

am: ይህን ተከትሎም ከጥቅምት ወር ጀምሮ ምንም አይነት ሰራተኛ በውል አልተቀጠረም፤ ምክንያቱም እ.ኤ.አ. ከሚያዚያ 2022 ጀምሮ በካሜሮን ምንም አይነት ደሞዝ፣ ለሰራተኛ ስላልተከፈለ ነበር ።
en: Consequently, no contract staff has been actively employed since October because no salaries have been paid since April 2022 in Cameroon.
ha: Sakamakon haka, babu wani ma’aikaci na kwanturagi da aka ɗauka a matsayin ma’aikaci tun watan Oktoba, saboda ba a biya albashi ba tun watan Afrilun 2022 a Kamaru.
sw: Kwa hiyo, hakuna wafanyakazi wa kandarasi ambao wameajiriwa kikamilifu tangu Oktoba kwa sababu hakuna mishahara iliyolipwa tangu Aprili 2022 nchini Kameruni.
yo: Fún ìdí èyí, wọn ò gba òṣìṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú àdéhùn kankan sẹ́nu iṣẹ́ láti oṣù Ọ̀wàrà nítorí wọn ò tíì san owó oṣù kankan láti oṣù Igbe ọdún 2022 ní orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon.
zu: Ngakho ke abekho abasebenzi benkontileka ababeqashiwe kusuka ngoMfumfu ngoba ayikho imiholo esikhokhiwe kusuka ngoMbasa ngonyaka wezi-2022 eCameroon.

am: የ 1.4 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ጥያቄ
en: A 1.4-million-dollar question
ha: Tambaya kan dala miliyan 1.4.
sw: Swali la dola milioni 1.4
yo: Ìbéèrè 1.4-mílíọ́nu dọ́là.
zu: Umbuzo wesigidi esiwu-1.4 zamadola

am: በአንድ ወቅት ጥሩ የስራ ባህል የነበረው ሀልዝሌይን፣ ከሰራኞቹ ጋር መመካከር ባለመቻሉ፣ ደሞዝ በማዘግየት እና በእዳ በመያዙ፣ እናም ሰራኞቹን ያለ በቂ ምክንያት ከስራ በማባረሩ፤ እንዴት ወደ ብልሽት እንደተቀየረ በማየት፣ መሰረታዊ ችግሩ ምን እንደነበር መገመት አይከብድም፡፡
en: Having seen how Healthlane, which once had a great work culture, became toxic by failing to communicate with its employees, delaying and owing salaries, and erratically firing employees, one could somewhat guess the root cause.
ha: Ganin yadda Healthlane, wanda a da yana da kyakkyawan yanayin gudanar aiki, ya zama shiririta ta hanyar kasa samar da alaƙa mai kyau tsakaninsa da ma'aikatanta, da jinkirta biyan albashi, da saka ma’aikata su bi shi bashin albashi, da korar ma'aikata cikin kuskure, mutum zai iya hasashen tushen dalilin.
sw: Baada ya kuiona jinsi Healthlane, ambayo hapo awali ilikuwa na utamaduni bora wa kufanya kazi, ulivyokuwa hovyo kwa kushindwa kuwasiliana na wafanyakazi wake, kuchelewesha na kudaiwa mishahara, na kuwafukuza kazi kimakosa, mtu angeweza kukisia ipi sababu kuu.
yo: Lẹ́yìn tí a ti rí Healthlane, tí ó ní ìṣesí ibi-iṣẹ́ tó dára nígbà kan ri, tó wá di ààyè burúkú pẹ̀lú kíkúnà láti fọ̀rọ̀wérọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ rẹ̀, dídènà àti jíjẹ owó oṣù, àti lílé òṣìṣẹ́ lọ́nà tí ò tọ́, èniyàn lè fi òye gbé ohun tí ó fà á.
zu: Ngokubona ukuthi iHealthlane ibikade inesiko lokusebenza elihle, yaba yinkathazo ngokuhluleka ukuxhumana nabasebenzi babo, ukubambezeleka nokukweletwa kwemiholo nokuxoshwa kwabasebenzi omunye angayiqagela imbangela yalokhu.

am: ሀልዝሌይን እ.ኤ.አ. በ 2020፣ መነሻ የሚሆን 2.4 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ሰብስቦ፣ አ.ኤ.አ. በ 2021 ስራ ጀመረ።
en: Healthlane raised a $2.4 million seed round in 2020 and began operations in August 2021.
ha: Kamfanin na Healthlane ya tara kuɗin fara aiki na dala miliyan 2.4 a shekarar 2020, kuma ya fara aiki a watan Agusta na shekarar 2021.
sw: Healthlane iliinua mzunguko wa ruzuku wa milioni 2.4$ mnamo 2020 na ilianza kazi mnamo Agosti 2021.
yo: Healthlane ṣe àkójọ $2.4 mílíọ̀nù owó ìdókòwò ní ọdún 2020 ó sì bẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́ ní oṣù Ògún ọdún 2021.
zu: IHealthlane yenza izigidi ezingu-$2.4 wembewu ngonyaka wezi-2020 base baqala ukusebenza ngoNcwaba wezi-2021.

am: ግን እ.ኤ.አ. ከ ሰኔ 2021 ጀምሮ፣ በመጋቢት ወር የጀመረውን የቅጥር ሂደት ተከትሎ፣ ኩባንያው ከ1 ሚሊየን ዶላር በታች ቀርቷል።
en: But as of May 2021, following a hiring process that began in March, the company had less than $1 million left.
ha: Amma ya zuwa watan Mayu na shekarar 2021, bayan tsarin ɗaukar ma’aikata da aka fara a watan Maris, ƙasa da dala miliyan ɗaya ne yayi saura.
sw: Lakini kufikia Mei 2021, kufuatia mchakato wa kuajiri ulioanzia Machi, kampuni ilikuwa imesalia chini ya $1 milioni.
yo: Ṣùgbọ́n nígbà tí yóò fi di oṣù Èbìbí ọdún 2021, lẹ́yìn ìgbésẹ̀ ìgbanisíṣẹ́ tó bẹ́rẹ̀ ní oṣù Ẹ̀rẹnà, $1 mílíọ̀nù dín ló kù tí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ní.
zu: Kodwa kusukela ngoNhlaba kunyaka wezi-2021, kulandela uhlelo lokuqasha olwaqala ngoNdasa, inkampani yayinemali engaphansi kwesigidi esisodwa samadola eyayisele.

am: የ1.4 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ጥያቄ "ሀልዝሌይን ሥራ ከመጀመሩ በፊት የነበረው 1.4 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ምን ሆነ?"
en: The $1.4-million-dollar question is, "What happened to $1.4 million before Healthlane began operations?"
ha: Tambayar ta dala miliyan 1.4 ita ce, "Me ya faru da dala miliyan 1.4 kafin Healthlane ta fara aiki?"
sw: Swali la dola milioni 1.4 ni, "Ni nini kilifanyika kwa milioni $1.4 kabla ya Healthlane kuanza kazi?"
yo: Ìbéèrè 1.4-mílílọ̀nù dọ́là náà ni pé, 'Kí ló ṣẹlẹ̀ sí $1.4 mílíọ̀nù ṣíwájú kí Healthlane tó bẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́?"
zu: Umbuzo wezigidi ezingu-$1.4 uthi, "Kwenzakalani kuzigidi ezingu-$1.4 mande kuqale ukusebenza kweHealthlane?"

am: ለጉዳዩ ቅርበት ያለው ምንጭ እንዳለው ከሆነ፣ ሀልዝሌይን የመሪዎች ጉባኤ እንኳን የለውም፡፡
en: According to a source close to the matter, Healthlane does not have a board of directors.
ha: A cewar wata majiya da ke kusa da lamarin, Healthlane ba ta da kwamitin gudanarwa.
sw: Kwa mujibu wa chanzo kilicho karibu na suala hilo, Healthlane haina Bodi ya wakurugenzi.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí olùjábọ̀ kan tó súnmọ́ Ọ̀rọ̀ náà, Healthlane ò ní ìgbìmọ̀ àwọn adarí.
zu: Ngokomthombo ososndelene naloludaba, iHealthlane ayinalo ibhodi labaqondisi.

am: ዋና ስራ አስፈጻሚው ንፍቴ፣ የድርጅቱ አመራር እና የገንዘብ ደብተር ብቸኛ ፈራሚ ነው፡፡
en: Nteff, the CEO, is "management" and the sole signatory to the company's accounts.
ha: Shugaban kamfani Nteff ne "hukumar gudanarwa", kuma shi kaɗai ne mai sanya hannu kan asusun kamfanin.
sw: Nteff, mkurugenzi mtendaji, ni "msimamizi" na mtia saini pekee kwa akaunti za kampuni.
yo: Nteff, ìyẹn Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí, ni "alákòso" àti olùbuwọ́lù kan ṣoṣo sí àpò ilé ìfowópamọ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ náà.
zu: UNteff iCEO "umphathi" futhi okunguyena osayindela ama akhawunti enkampani.

am: “ድርጅቱ ስራ ከመጀመሩ በፊት ንፍቴ፣ ብዛት ያለው ገንዘብ ማውጣት ጀምሮ ነበር፡፡
en: “Before the company began operations, Nteff was already withdrawing substantial sums of money.
ha: “Kafin kamfanin ya fara aiki, Nteff yayi ta cire maƙudan kuɗaɗe.
sw: "Kabla ya kampuni kuanza kufanya kazi, Nteff alikuwa tayari anatoa kiasi kikubwa cha pesa.
yo: "Kí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà tó bẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́, Nteff ti ń yọ owó tó tówó.
zu: "Ngaphambi kokuba kuqale ukusetshenzwa enkampanini, uNteff wayesevele eqalile ukukhipha izamba zemali.

am: ድርጅቱ ገንዘቡን ወደሌላ ቦታ እያሸሸ መሆኑንም የሚጠቁሙ አጠራጣሪ ግብይቶችም ተከናውነዋል፡፡”
en: There have been suspicious transactions indicating that the company has been diverting funds.”
ha: Akwai mu’amaloli na kuɗi ababen zargi da ke nuna cewa kamfanin na ta karkatar da kuɗaɗe.”
sw: Kumekuwa na miamala ya kutiliwa shaka inayoashiria kuwa kampuni ikielekeza fedha."
yo: Àwọn ìdúnàdúrà tó funilára kan ti wà tó tọ́ka sí i pé ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ti da owó gba ibòmíràn
zu: Kunokukhishwa nokufakwa kwemali okusolisayo okukhombisa ukuthi inkampani ibiyisa kwenye indawo uxhasozimali."

am: ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚውም ሰራተኞችን ሳያማክሩ የመገልገያ መሳሪያዎችን መግዛታቸው ከበርካታ ምንጮች አረጋግጫለሁ፡፡
en: Multiple sources also confirm that the CEO bought equipment without consulting employees.
ha: Haka kuma majiyoyi da dama sun tabbatar da cewa Shugaban kamfani ya sayi kayan aiki ba tare da tuntuɓar ma’aikata ba.
sw: Vyanzo vingi pia vinathibitisha kuwa mkurugenzi mtendaji alinunua vifaa bila kushauriana na wafanyakazi.
yo: Ìròyìn láti ẹnu ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ fi ìdí rẹ̀ múlẹ̀ pé Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí ra àwọn irinṣẹ́ láìkàn sí àwọn òṣìṣẹ́.
zu: Imithombo eminingi iyakuqinisekisa ukuthi iCEO yathenga impahlakusebenza ingazange ixhumane nabasebenzi.

am: ይህም በድርጅቱ ተፈላጊ ወይም አስፈላጊ ያልሆኑ መገልገያ መሳሪያዎች ላይ ገንዘብ እንዲወጣ አድርጓል፡፡
en: That led to spending money on equipment that wasn't necessary or needed by the company.
ha: Hakan ya sa aka kashe kuɗaɗe kan kayan aikin da ba na dole ba ko kuma kamfanin baya buƙata.
sw: Hiyo ilisababisha kutumia pesa kununua vifaa ambavyo havikuwa vya lazima au kuhitajika na kampuni.
yo: Ìyẹn yọrí sí níná owó lórí àwọn irinṣẹ́ tí ò pọn dandan tàbí tí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà kò nílò.
zu: Lokho kwaholela ukuthi kusetshenziswe imali kumpahlakusebenza okwakungenasidingo noma okwakungadingwa yinkampani.

am: ለምሳሌ ድርጅቱ ውስጥ ሁለት በትክክል የሚሰሩ የስነ - ደም ተንታኝ መሳሪያዎች እያሉ እሱ ግን ተጨማሪ አራት ገዛ፡፡
en: For instance, he purchased four haematology analysers when the company already had two functional ones.
ha: Misali, ya sayi na’urorin nazarin jini guda huɗu alhali kamfanin na da guda biyu masu aiki.
sw: Kwa mfano, alinunua vichanganuzi vinne vya damu wakati kampuni tayari ilikuwa na mbili zinazofanya kazi.
yo: Fún àpeere, ó ra ẹ̀rọ aṣònka hóró inú ẹ̀jẹ̀ mẹ́rin nígbà tí ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ti ní méjì tó ń ṣiṣẹ́.
zu: Isibonelo wathenga abahlaziyi bezegazi ngesikhathi inkampani isivele inababili abasebenzayo.

am: “እነዚህን ግዢዎች ምንም እንኳን ፋይዳ ቢስ የሚባሉ ባይሆኑም፣ የተደረጉት ከሚመለከታቸው የቡድን አባላት ጋር ሳይማከሩ ነውና እኚህ የቡድን አባላት ገና በጅማሬው ስራ ፈት ሆነዋል” ሲል አንድ ምንጭ ይናገራል፡፡
en: “While these purchases are not useless, they were made without consulting the relevant team members and, thus, became idle on arrival,” a source claims.
ha: "Ko da yake ba wai waɗannan abubuwan da aka sayo ba su da amfani ba ne, amma an sayosu ne ba tare da tuntuɓar ma’aikatan kamfanin da suka dace ba, wanda hakan ya sa ba a amfani da su tun da aka sayosu," in ji wata majiya.
sw: "ilhali manunuzi haya hayafai, yalifanywa bila kushauriana na washiriki wa timu husika, hivyo wakawa wavivu kufika," chanzo kinadai.
yo: Nígbà tí àwọn nǹkan tó rà wọ̀nyí ò ṣaláìwúlò, wọ́n ṣe wọ́n láì kàn sí àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ikọ̀ tí ó ṣe pàtàkì, nítorí náà, wọ́n di aláìríṣẹ́ṣe nígbà tí wọ́n dé," olùjábọ̀ kan ló sọ bẹ́ẹ̀.
zu: "Ngesikhathi lokhu kuthenga kunesidingo, kwenziwa ngaphandle kokuxhumana namalunga eqembu afanele, ngakho awubanga namsebenzi ngesikhathi ufika," kusho umthombo.

am: በተጨማሪም ንቴፍ “አበዳሪዎቹ በካሜሮንና ናይጄሪያ ውስጥ ሲፈልጉት እሱ ግን እንዴት ለሶስት ወራት ያክል በሌጎስ ከተማ፣ ኤኮ ሆቴል እና ቅንጡ ክፍል ውስጥ ተደብቆ እንደቆየ” ገልፀዋል፡፡
en: They also reveal how Nteff “hid for three months in Eko Hotel and Suites in Lagos while his creditors sought him out in Cameroon and Nigeria."
ha: Sun kuma bayyana yadda Nteff "ya ɓuya na tsawon watanni uku a otal ɗin Eko Hotel and Suites a Legas yayin da masu binsa bashi suke nemansa a Kamaru da Najeriya."
sw: Pia zinafichua jinsi Nteff "alijificha kwa miezi mitatu katika Hoteli ya Eko na Suites huko Lagos huku wadeni wake wakimtafuta nchini Kameruni na Nigeria".
yo: Wọ́n tún ṣàfihàn bí Nteff "ṣe farapamọ́ fún oṣù mẹ́ta ní Eko Hotel and Suites ní Èkó nígbà tí àwọn tó yá a lówó ń wá a ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà àti Cameroon.
zu: Baphinde baveza ukuthi uNteff wazifihla kanjani ezinyangeni ezintathu eHhotela i-Eko nakumaSuthi aseLagos ngesikhathi abakweletisimali bakhe bemkhiphile eCameroon naseNigeria.

am: ምንም እንኳን ለክስ የሚሆን ጠንካራ ማስረጃ ባናገኝም፤ ምንጮች እንደሚናገሩት”ፔይሂፖ ተብለው የሚጠሩት የዕዳ አስመላሽ ወኪሎች ብዙጊዜ ቢሮው ውስጥ ሊያገኙት ሞክረው አልተሳካላቸውም።”
en: Though we couldn’t lay hold of hard evidence, sources say “Payhippo debt recovery agents unsuccessfully tried to find him at the office on multiple occasions.”
ha: Ko da yake mun kasa samun ƙwararan hujjoji, wasu majiyoyi sun ce "A lokuta da yawa jami'an dawo da basussuka na Payhippo sun yi ƙoƙarin samunsa a ofishi cikin rashin nasara."
sw: Ingawa hatukuweza kupata ushahidi wa kutosha, vyanzo vinasema "Mawakala wa kurejesha deni la Payhippo walijaribu kumtembelea ofisini mara kadhaa bila mafanikio"
yo: Bótilẹ̀ jẹ́ wí pé a ò ní ẹ̀rí tó dájú, àwọn olùjábọ̀ kan sọ pé "Àwọn aṣojú agbagbèsè padà Payhippo ṣe ìgbìyànjú àìláṣeyọrí láti rí i ní ọ́fíísì rẹ̀ ní àìmọye ìgbà."
zu: Yize noma bengeke babuthole ubufakazi obuqanda ikhanda kusho umthombo "Ama-ejenti okubuyisa izikweletu iPayhippo ayizange iphumelele ukumthola ehhovisi izikhathi ezingingi."

am: ንቴፍ የድርጅቱን ገንዘብ ለግል ወጪዎቹ በመጠቀሙ፣ የብድር አገልግሎት በሚሰጠው ፋይን ቴክ የስልክ መተግበሪያ ጋር ጨምሮ በብዙ ሻጮች ዘንድ እዳ ውስጥ እንደገባ የተለያዩ ሰነዶች ያሳያሉ፡፡
en: Different documents show that Nteff used company funds for personal expenses, leaving him in debt to several vendors, including fintech apps offering loan services.
ha: Takardu da dama sun nuna cewa Nteff ya yi amfani da kuɗaɗen kamfani wajen sayan abubuwan kansa, inda hakan ya sa dillalai da yawa ke binsa bashi, ciki har da manhajojin hada-hadar kuɗi da ke ba da lamuni.
sw: Nyaraka tofauti zinaonyesha kuwa Nteff alitumia pesa za kampuni kwa gharama za kibinafsi, na kumuacha katika madeni kwa wachuuzi kadhaa, ikiwa ni pamoja ana Programu za Fintech zinazotoa huduma ya mikopo.
yo: Oríṣiríṣi àkọsílẹ̀ fi hàn pé Nteff lo owó ilé iṣẹ́ fún ìnáwó ara rẹ̀, èyí tó sọ ọ́ sínu gbèsè fún ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn olùtajà, pẹ̀lú àwọn ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́ ìsúná onímọ̀ ẹ̀rọ tí wọ́n ń pésè ẹ̀yáwó.
zu: Amadokhumenti amaningi akhombisa ukuthi uNteff wasebenzisa izimali zenkampani ezindlekweni zakhe, kumshiya enezikweletu kubadayisi abaningi kubandakanya isisetshenziswa saka-Fintech esibolekisa ngemali.

am: እ.ኤ.አ መስከረም 2022 በሁለተኛው ዙር የጉግል ለጥቁር መስራቾች በተመደበ ገንዘብ ማሰባሰቢያ ዝግጅት ላይ ሀልዝሌይን ከተመረጡት 60 አፍሪካውያን ጀማሪ ድርጅቶች መሃል አንዱ እንደነበር ታስታውሱ ይሆናል፡፡
en: You might recall that Healthlane was one of the 60 African startups selected for the second cohort of the Google for Startups Black Founders Fund (BFF) in September 2022.
ha: In ba ku manta ba, kamfanin Healthlane yana ɗaya daga cikin sabin kamfanoni na Afirka guda 60 da aka zaɓa a zubi na biyu na shirin Google for Startups Black Founders Fund (BFF) a watan Satumban 2022.
sw: Unaweza kukumbuka kuwa Healthlane ilikuwa moja wapo ya kampuni 60 za kiafrika zilizochaguliwa na kundi la pili la mfuko wa waanzilishi weusi wa Google (BFF) mnamo Septemba 2022.
yo: Ẹ ó rántí wí pé Healthlane jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ 60 tí wọ́n yàn fún ìsí kejì Google for Startups Black Founders Fund (BFF), ní oṣù Ọ̀wẹwẹ̀ ọdún 2022.
zu: Uzokhumbula ukuthi iHealthlane kwakungenye yeziqalo zaseAfrika ezingu-60 ezazikhethiwe ukuhlanganyela okwesibili kuGoogle kuStartups Black Founders Fund (BFF) ngoMandulo ngonyaka wezi-2022.

am: ታዲያ የተሰበሰበው ገንዘብ ምን ሆነ? አሁንስ ምን ይሁን?
en: So, what happened to the funds? What now?
ha: To yanzu me ya faru da kuɗaɗen? Me ya faru da su?
sw: Kwahiyo, nini kilitokea kwa fedha hizo? Nini sasa?
yo: Torí náà, kí ló ṣẹlẹ̀ sí owó náà? Kí wá ni báyìí?
zu: Kwenzakaleni ezimalini? Yini okumele yenzeke manje?

am: አንድ ምንጭ እንደገለፀው፣ ንቴፍ እ.ኤ.አ ጥቅምት 2022 በገባ በሁለተኛው ሳምንት ውስጥ በካሜሩን ወደሚገኘው ቢሮው መምጣት አቁሞ ነበር፡፡
en: According to a source, Nteff stopped coming to the office in Cameroon sometime in the second week of November 2022.
ha: A cewar wata majiya, Nteff ya daina zuwa ofishin a Kamaru cikin mako na biyu na watan Nuwamban 2022.
sw: Kulingana na chanzo, Nteff aliacha kuja ofisini nchini Kameruni wakati fulani katika wiki ya pili ya Novemba 2022.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀rọ olùjábọ̀ kan, Nteff ò wá sí ọ́fíísì ní orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon ní àsìkò kan ní ọ̀sẹ̀ kejì oṣù Bẹlu ọdún 2022.
zu: Ngokomthombo uNteff wayeka ukuza ehhovisis eCameroon esontweni lesibili kuLwezi nhgonyaka wezi-2022.

am: ይህም የሆነው፣ አግበር ቢሮ መምጣት ካቆመ ከበርከት ካሉ ሳምንታት በኋላ ነበር።
en: That came several weeks after Agbor stopped coming to the office.
ha: Hakan ya zo ne makonni da yawa bayan Agbor ya daina zuwa ofishin.
sw: Hilo lilitokea wiki kadhaa baada ya Agbor kuacha kuja ofisini.
yo: Ìyẹn wáyé lẹ́yìn ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ọ̀sẹ̀ tí Agbor ò ti wá sí ọ́fíísì mọ́.
zu: Lokho kwaba amasonto ambalwa emfa kokuthi uAgbor eyekile ukuza ehhovisi.

am: “አለን ከቢሮ ሁሉንም ነገር ሸክፎ ወጣ፡፡
en: “Alain packed everything out of his office.
ha: “Alain ya kwashe komai daga ofishinsa.
sw: "Alain alipakia kila kitu ndani ya ofisi yake.
yo: "Alain kó gbogbo nǹkan kúrò nínú ọ́fíísì rẹ̀.
zu: uAlian wapakisha yonke into ehhovisi lakhe.

am: ቢሮውንም ለሚጠብቀው ግለሰብ፣ የቢሮውን ቁልፍ ለ ሪቪ እንዲሰጥ መመሪያ ሰጥቶ ነበር፡፡”
en: He instructed the person keeping the office to pass on his office key to Reevy.”
ha: Ya umurci wanda ke kula da ofishin da ya kai wa Reevy mabuɗin ofishinsa.”
sw: Alimuagiza mhudumu wa ofisi hiyo kuwapitishia Reevy ufunguo wa ofisi yake"
yo: Ó sọ fún ẹni tó ń ṣàmójútó ọ́fíísì náà pé kí ó mú kọ́kọ́rọ́ rẹ̀ fún Reevy."
zu: Wayalela umuntu onakekela amahhovisi ukuthi adlulisele isikhiye sakhe sehhovisi kuReevy

am: ላውደ ፅሁፉ፣ “ሬቪ” የካሜሩናውያን ድርጅት ሲሆን በሀገሪቱ ውስጥ የሀልዝሌይን የአመጋገብ ስርአት አጋር ነበር፡፡
en: For context, Reevy, a Cameroonian company, was Healthlane’s nutrition partner in the country.
ha: Don ƙarin bayani, Reevy, wani kamfani a Kamaru, shi ne abokin aikin harkokin abinci na kamfanin Healthlane a ƙasar.
sw: Kiuhalisia, Reevy, ni kampuni ya Kikameruni, ilikuwa mshirika wa lishe wa Healthlane nchini humo.
yo: Fún àgbọ́yé, Reevy, ilé-iṣẹ́ kan ní orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon, jẹ́ alájọṣepọ̀ aṣaralóore Healthlane ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà.
zu: Ngokwesimo, iReevy inkampani yaseCameroon yayibambisene ngezinto zezempilo neHealthlane ezweni.

am: ምንጩ እንደገለፀው “አለን ቢሮውን ለሪቪ አሳልፎ ለመሸጥም እያቀደ መሆኑን የሚያሳዩ በርካታ ሹክሹክታዎች አሉ፡፡”
en: According to a source, “there are rumours that Alain is planning to sell out the office to Reevy.”
ha: A cewar wata majiya, "akwai jita-jita cewa Alain na shirin sayar da ofishin ga Reevy."
sw: Kulingana na duru, "kuna uvumi kwamba Alain anapanga kuiuza kampuni kwa Reevy".
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí olùjábọ̀ kan ṣe sọ, "àwọn àhesọ ọ̀rọ̀ kan wà pé Alain ń pète láti ta ọ́fíísì náà fún Reevy."
zu: Ngokomthombo, "kunamahemuhemui athi u-Alian wayehlela ukudayisela uReevy ihhovisi."

am: ይህም ማለት “በአሁኑ ሠአት ሪቪ ቢሮውን ተረክቦ ሥራውን እንደገና ለማስጀመር እየሰራ ነው”፣ ይሁን እንጂ ፤“አሁንም አለን የድርጅቱ የቴክኖሎጂ ዘርፍ ባለቤት ነው፡፡”
en: It means, “presently Reevy has taken over the office and is working on restarting operations.” However, “Alain still owns the technology aspect of the company.”
ha: Wannan yana nufin, "a halin yanzu Reevy ya karɓi ofishin, kuma yana ƙoƙarin sake dawo da yin aiki." Amma "har yanzu Alain na da mallakin fannin fasaha na kamfanin."
sw: Ina maanisha, "Kwa sasa Reevy imechukua ofisi na inafanya kazi ya kuanzisha upya shughuli", hata hivyo, "Alain bado anamiliki kipengele cha teknolojia ya kampuni".
yo: Ó túnmọ̀ sí wí pé, "lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ yìí Reevy ti gba àkóso ọ́fíísì náà ó sì ń ṣiṣẹ́ lórí àti bẹ̀rẹ iṣẹ́ padà." Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, "Alain ṣì ń jẹ ẹ̀ka ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ilé-iṣẹ́ náà lówó."
zu: Kusho ukuthi njengamanje uReevy wayeselithathile ihhovisi futhi esesebenza ukuthi kuqalwe futhi ukusebenza, kodwa ke uAlian wayesaphethe umunxa wezobuchwepheshe benkampani

am: በተጨማሪም፣ ሪቪ የድርጅቱን ስም ሙሉ በሙሉ ከመቀየሩ በፊት ለቀጣዮቹ ስድስት ወራት በካሜሩን ውስጥ እንደ ሀልዝሌይን ሆኖ አገልግሎት እንደሚሰጥ ምንጩ ገልጧል፡፡
en: Further, the source mentions that Reevy will operate as Healthlane in Cameroon for the next six months before changing the name altogether.
ha: Majiyar ta ƙara da cewa Reevy zai yi aiki a matsayin Healthlane a ƙasar Kamaru na tsawon watanni shida masu zuwa kafin ya canza sunan gaba ɗaya.
sw: Kwa kuongezea, chanzo kinasema kuwa Reevy itafanya kazi kama Healthlane nchini Kameruni kwa muda wa miezi sita ijayo kabla ya kubadilisha jina kabisa.
yo: Ní ìtẹ̀síwájú, olùjábọ̀ náà mẹ́nu bà á pé Reevy ni yóò máa ṣiṣẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bíi Healthlane ní orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon fún oṣù mẹ́fà tó ń bọ̀ kí ó tó pààrọ orúkọ rẹ̀ lápapọ̀.
zu: Ukuqhubeka, umthombo uthi uReevy wayezosebenza njengeHealthlane eCameroon ezinyengeni eziyisithupha ezilandelayo ngaphambi kokuba ashintshe igama.

am: እንደነሱም ገለፃ፣ “አለን ሲሪየስ ኤ ማለትም ለመጠናከር የሚሆን የገንዘብ ድጋፍ እስኪያሰባሰብ፤ ድርጅቱ በስራ ላይ ነው እያለ ባለሀብቶችን እያታለለ ለመቆየት ስድስት ወር በቂ ጊዜ ነበር፡፡”
en: According to them, “six months is enough time for Alain to keep fooling investors that the company is in operation so that he can raise a Series A.”
ha: A cewar su, "watanni shida sun ishi Alain yayi ta yaudarar masu zuba jari cewa kamfanin yana aiki don ya samu jerin Series A."
sw: Kulingana na wao, "Miezi sita ni muda wa kutosha kwa Alain kuendelea kuwadanganya wawekezaji kuwa kampuni inafanya kazi ili aweze kuendeleza muendelezo A".
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí wọ́n ṣe sọ, "oṣù mẹ́fà ti tó lásíkò fún Alain láti máa tan àwọn olùdókòwo pé ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ń ṣiṣẹ́ kí ó ba lè tètè ṣe àkójọ Àsetẹ̀léra A.”
zu: Ngokwabo, "izinyanga eziyisisthupha kwakuyisikhathi esanele ku-Alian ukuthi aqhubeke enze abatshalizimali izilima ukuthi inkampani iyasebenza ukuze ezokwazi ukwenza iSeries A."

am: በርከት ያሉ ምንጮችም እንዳሳወቁን ንቴፍ እ.ኤ.አ በ2023 ለመጠናከር የሚሆንየገንዘን ድጋፍ (ሲሪየስ ኤ) የማሰባሰብ እቅድ እንዳለው ተናግረዋል፡፡
en: Multiple sources claim that Nteff is looking to raise a Series A in 2023.
ha: Majiyoyi da yawa sun yi iƙirarin cewa Nteff yana neman samun jerin Series A a shekarar 2023.
sw: Vyanzo vingi vinadai kuwa Nteff anatazamia kuongeza mfululizo A mnamo 2023.
yo: Ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn sọ pé Nteff ń fojúsọ́nà láti ṣe àkójọ Àsetẹ̀léra A ní ọdún 2023.
zu: Imithombo eminingi ibika ukuthi uNteff ubheke ukukhulisa iSeries A ngonyaka wezi-2023.

am: “ይህን የሚያደርገውም፣ በተለይ ብዛት ያላቸውን እዳዎቹን ለመክፈል ነው፤ ለዛም ነው ሀልዝሌይንን መዝጋቱን በግልፅ የማያምነው” ሲል አንድ ምንጭ ተናግሯል፡፡
en: “He's doing this, especially to pay his numerous debts," says one source, "That is why he would deny shutting down Healthlane.”
ha: "Yana yin haka, musamman ma don biyan tarin basukansa," in ji wata majiya, "Shi ya sa zai musanta rufe Healthlane."
sw: "Anafanya hivi, hasa kulipa madeni yake mengi", chanzo kimoja kinasema, "Ndio maana anakataa kuifunga Healthlane"
yo: "Ó ń ṣe eléyìí, pàápàá jùlo láti san ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ gbèse rẹ̀," olùjábọ̀ kan ló sọ bẹ́ẹ̀ "Ìdí nìyẹn tó fi máa sẹ́ kanlẹ̀ pé Healthlane kógbáwọlé."
zu: Ukwenza lokhu ngoba efuna ukukhokhela izikweleti zakhe eziningi kusho umthombo, Yingakho ezokuphika ukuthi uzovala iHealthlane

am: ሌላ ምንጭ ደግሞ፣ “አለን የሀልዝሌይንን የክሊኒካል ቅርንጫፍ የሚገዛው አጋር እያፈላለገ ሲሆን፤ እሱ ደግሞ ለባለሀብቶች ገንዘብ እንዲያወጡ አዘጋጅቶ ባቀረበው የቴሌሜድስን ሀሳብ ላይ እየሰራ መቆየት እንደሚፈልግ” ሰምተናል ብሏል፡፡
en: Another source also claims that they heard that Alain is looking for a partner to buy the clinical arm of Healthlane while he sticks with the telemedicine idea he pitched to investors.
ha: Wata majiya kuma ta yi iƙirarin cewa sun ji cewa Alain yana neman abokin tarayya don sayan sashen asibiti na Healthlane, yayin da ya ci gaba da kafewa tare da ra'ayin telemedicine da ya sanya wa masu saka hannun jari.
sw: Chanzo kingine pia kinadai kwamba walisikia kwamba Alain anatafuta mshirika wa kununua Clinical Arm ya Healthlane huku akishikilia wazo la telemedicine alilotoa kwa wawekezaji.
yo: Olùjábọ̀ kan náà tún sọ pé àwọn gbọ́ pé Alain ń wá alájọṣe láti ra ẹ̀ka ìlera Healthlane nígbà tí òun yóò gbájúmọ́ èro ìṣẹgun orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára tí òun ṣàlàyé fún àwọn olùdókòwo.
zu: Omunye umthombo uthi bezwa ukuthi uAlan ufuna umlimngani abazothenga naye ingxenye yezempilo yeHealthlane ngesikhathi eqhubeka nombono wakhe wemithi yezingcingo awuphakamisa kubatshalizimali.

am: ከዚህ በላይ፣ ይህ ፅሁፍ እስከተጠናቀረበት ጊዜ ድረስ፣ ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚው “የሶስት ወር ደሞዛቸው እንደላከላቸው እና ሊደርሳቸው እንደሚገባ” የሚያሳይ ከስልኩ ምስል ላይ ያነሳውን ፎቶ ከሁለት በላይ ለሚሆኑ ሰራተኞች መላኩን ምንጩ ጠቅሷል፡፡
en: What’s more, a source, as of the time of writing, mentioned that the CEO sent screenshots to more than two staff in Nigeria that he has "wired about 3 months salaries to them that they should confirm it."
ha: Bugu da ƙari, ya zuwa lokacin haɗa wannan rahoto, wata majiya ta bayyana cewa Shugaban kamfanin ya aike da hotunan fuskar na’ura ga ma’aikata sama da biyu a Najeriya cewa ya “yi tura musu albashin kusan watanni 3, su tabbatar da hakan.”
sw: Nini zaidi, chanzo, hadi wakati wa kuandika, kilitaja kwamba mkurugenzi mtendaji alituma picha za skrini kwa zaidi ya wafanyakazi wawili nchini Nigeria kwamba "amewatumia takribani mishahara ya miezi 3 ili wathibitishe".
yo: Kí ló tún kù, olùjábọ̀ kan, ní àkókò tí à ń kọ àkọsílẹ̀ yìí, mẹ́nu bà á pé Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí fi fọ́tò agbàwòrán ránṣẹ́ sí ènìyàn méjì lé ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà pé òun ti "fi bíi owó oṣù mẹ́ta ránṣẹ́ sí wọn pẹ́ kí wọ́n yẹ̀ ẹ́ wò."
zu: Okunye futhi umthombo ngesikhathi sokubhala, washo ukuthi iCEO yathumela izithombe kubasebenzi abangaphezu kwababili eNigeria esho ukuthi usethumele nge inthanethi imiholo yezinyanga ezintathu kubona kumele baqinisekise.

am: ንቴፍ የናይጄሪያውን ቡድን ስብሰባ እንደሚከፋፍለው መናገሩንም ጠቅሰዋል፡፡
en: They also mentioned that Nteff said he'd dissolve the Nigerian team.
ha: Sun kuma bayyana cewa Nteff ya ce zai rufe aikin ma’aikatan Najeriya.
sw: Pia walisema kuwa Nteff alisema ataifuta timu ya Nigeria.
yo: Wọ́n tún mẹ́nu bà á pé Nteff ní òun yóò tú ikọ̀ ti orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà ká.
zu: Baphinde basho ukuthi uNteff wathi uzohlakaza iqembu laseNigeria.

am: ተከትሎም፣ “በናይጄሪያ ለሚገኙት የሁለት ሰራተኞች ደሞዝ በማረጋገጫ አስገብቶ ከስራ ገበታቸው አባሯቸዋል፡፡”
en: Consequently, "the company terminated two employees in Nigeria immediately they confirmed their payment."
ha: Biyo bayan haka, "kamfanin ya sallami ma'aikata biyu a Najeriya nan take bayan sun tabbatar da biyansu."
sw: Kwa hiyo, "kampuni iliwafuta kazi wafanyakazi wawili nchini Nigeria mara tu walipothibitisha malipo yao".
yo: Fún ìdí èyí, "ilé-iṣẹ́ náà wọ́gilé ìgbanisíṣẹ́ àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ mẹ́jì ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà lẹ́sẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ tí wọ́n rí owóo wọn."
zu: Kodwa ke inkampani yaxosha abasebenzi ababili eNigeria emva kokuthi beqinisekise imiholo yabo

am: ይህ ዘገባም እስከተጠናቀረበት ጊዜ ድረስ፤ በካሜሩን ውስጥ ካሉት ሰራተኞች መካከል አንዳቸውም የሰሩበትን ደመዝ አልተቀበሉም፡፡
en: As of the time of writing, none of the staff in Cameroon had received their owed salaries.
ha: Har zuwa lokacin haɗa wannan rahoto, babu wani ma’aikaci a Kamaru da ya karɓi albashin da yake bi bashi.
sw: Kufikia wakati wa chapisho, hakuna wafanyakazi nchini Kameruni walikuwa wamepokea mishahara yao wanayodai.
yo: Títí di àkókò tí à ń kọ àkọsílẹ̀ yìí, kò sí ìkankan nínú àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon tó tíì gba àwọn owó oṣù tí wọ́n jẹ.
zu: Ngesikhathi sokubhalaakekho kubasebenzi baseCameroon owayethole imiholo ababeyikweletwa.

am: ይህንንና ሌሎች ዝርዝር ጉዳዮች ለማረጋገጥ ቴክ ፓይንት አፍሪካ ዋና ስራ አስፈጻሚውን ንቴፍን አነጋግሯል ፡፡
en: Techpoint Africa contacted CEO Nteff to confirm this and other details.
ha: Kamfanin Techpoint Africa ya tuntuɓi Shugaba Nteff don tabbatar da haka da kuma neman sauran cikakkun bayanai.
sw: Techpoint Africa iliwasiliana na mkurugenzi mtendaji Nteff ili kuthibitisha hili na maelezo mengine.
yo: Techpoint Africa kàn sí Nteff Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí láti fi ìdí èyí àti àwon ìròyìn míràn múlẹ̀.
zu: ITechpoint Africa yaxhumana neCEO uNteff ukuqinisekisa lokhu kanye neminye imininingwane.

am: ንቴፍም ”አብዛኛዎቹ መግለጫዎች ተጨባጭነት የሌላቸው ናቸው፡፡
en: Nteff responded saying that “Many of the statements are factually incorrect.
ha: Nteff ya mayar da martanin cewa “Yawancin maganganun ba daidai ba ne.
sw: Nteff alijibu akisema kuwa "Taarifa nyingi sio sahihi".
yo: Nteff fésì ó wí pé "ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ yìí ni ò rí bẹ́ẹ̀ lódodo.
zu: Unteff waphendula ngokuthi izitatimende eziningi azisho iqiniso.

am: ነገር ግን፣ በህገወጥ መንገድ ስለተገኙ የሀልዝሌይን ሰነዶች ላይ እየተካሄደ ባለ ህጋዊ ምርመራ ምክንያት፣ ምንም አይነት ምላሽ የምርመራው ቀን ገደብ ከማለቁ በፊት ለመስጠት አንችልም፡፡
en: However, because of an ongoing legal investigation into some illegal access of Healthlane files by journalists, we cannot provide any response before your deadline.
ha: Saidai saboda bincike na shari'a da ake gudanarwa a halin yanzu kan wasu takardun kamfanin Healthlane da ‘yan jarida suka samu ba bisa ƙa'ida ba, ba za mu iya ba da wata amsa ba kafin wa’adinku ya cika.
sw: Hata hivyo, kwa sababu uchunguzi unaendelea wa kisheria kuhusu ufikiaji haramu wa ofisi za Healthlane na wanahabari, hatuwezi kutoa jibu lolote kabla ya tarehe yako ya mwisho.
yo: Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, nítorí ìwádìí òfin tó ń lọ lọ́wọ́ lórí ànfààní àìbófinmu sí àwọn ìwe Healthlane tí àwọn oníròyìn kan ní, a ò lè fi èsì kankan ṣíwájú gbèdéke yín.
zu: Kepha ke ngenxa yophenyo oluqhubekayo lokufinyelela okungekho emthethweni kumafayela aseHealthlane yizintatheli, ngeke sikwazi ukukunikeza impendulo ngaphambi komqamulajuqu wakho.

am: ከዚህ ምርመራ መጨረሻ ላይ ግን ሙሉ መግለጫ ለመስጠት ፈቃደኛ ነን ”ሲል መልሷል።
en: At the conclusion of this investigation, we will be happy to issue a full statement."
ha: Za mu yi farin cikin yin cikakken bayani bayan an kammala wannan bincike."
sw: Mwisho mwa uchunguzi huu tutafurahi kutoa taarifa kamili."
yo: Lẹ́yìn tí ìwádìí yìí bá parí, inú wa yóò dùn láti fi ọ̀rọ̀ kíkún léde."
zu: Ekupheleni kwakolu phenyo,siyojabula ukukhipha isitatimende esigcwele

am: ሰርኪውን ማስተዋወቅ፡ አለምን የምንቃኝበትን መነፅር ለመለወጥ አልሞ የተነሳ አዲስ የጉዞ የስልክ ላይ መተግበሪያ ነው፡፡
en: Introducing Circue: A new travel app set to revolutionize how we experience the world
ha: Gabatar da Circue: Wata sabuwar manhajar tafiye-tafiye da aka tsara cewa za ta sauya yadda muke ji da ganin duniya
sw: Tunakuletea Circue: Programu mpya ya usafiri iliyowekwa ili kubadilisha jinsi tunavyotumia ulimwenguni
yo: Ìṣàfihàn Circue: ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́ ìrìn-àjò tuntun tí yóò ṣe àyípadà bí a ṣe ń ní ìrírí ilé-ayé
zu: Ukwethula iCircue: isisetshenziswa sokuhamba esisha esibekelwe ukwenza uguquko ukuthi uwubona kanjani umhlaba

am: ከተመሰረተበት ጊዜ ጀምሮ የሰርኪው መለያ አንድ እና አንድ ብቻ አላማ ነበረው ይህም፤ ጉዞን ቀላል ማድረግ፣ ቴክኖሎጂን እና ሰብአዊነትን በማዋሀድ ተደራሽነትን ማምጣት፣ ጥራት ያለው መረጃን ማቅረብ እና ለተጓዦች የህብረተሰባዊነት ስሜትን መስጠት ነበር፡፡
en: Since its inception, the Circue brand has had only one mission - to make travel easier, by merging technology and humanity to bring accessibility, quality information and a sense of community to travelers.
ha: Tun lokacin da aka kafa ta, Circue na da manufa ɗaya tilo – domin sauƙaƙe tafiye-tafiye, ta hanyar gwama fasaha da harkokin ɗan adam don samar da damar shige da fice da bayanai masu inganci da fahimtar al'umma ga matafiya.
sw: Tangu kuanzishwa kwake, Rajamu ya Circue imekuwa na dhamira moja tu- kurahisisha usafiri, kwa kuunganisha teknolojia na ubinadamu ili kuleta ufikiaji, taarifa bora, na hisia ya jumuia kwa wasafiri.
yo: Láti ìgbà tí ó ti bẹ̀rẹ̀, ilé-iṣẹ́ Circue ní àfojúsùn kan ṣoṣo - láti sọ ìrìn-àjò di ìrọ̀rùn, nípa kíkan ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àti ijẹ́ ọmọ ènìyàn pọ̀ láti mú ìṣeémúlò, ìròyìn ojúlówó àti ìjẹ́ aráàdúgbò wá fún àwọn arìnrìnàjò.
zu: Kusuka kulokhu kuqala iCircue ibinenjongo eyodwa - ukwenza ukuhamba kube lula, ngokuhlanganisa ezobuchwepheshe nobuntu ukuletha ukufinyeleleka, ulwazi okuyilo nomuzwa wokuhamba njengomphakathi.

am: በጉዞ ጉዳዮች ላይ ተእጽኖ ፈጣሪው - በዋካዋካ ዶክተር የተዘጋጀው እና በኢኔህ ዶሚኒካ አወያይነት፣ በሚያዚያ ወር በተዘጋጀው ሪላውንችድ ቨርችዋል (በምናብ ደግሞ መነሳት) በተሰኘው መድረክ ላይ ፤ የ'ሰርኪው' የጉዞ መተግበርያ፣ ዋና መስራቹ ታይዎ ባደግጌሲን፡ “አብዮታዊ እና የምርት ስም ተልእኮውን ለማሳካት የተሰራ ታላቅ ስኬት “ብሎ ገልፆታል።
en: The Circue travel app described by Founder Taiwo Gbadegesin as “revolutionary and a huge leap in achieving the brand mission” relaunched virtually in April hosted by travel influencer - wakawaka doctor and moderated by Eneh Dominica.
ha: Manhajar Circue ta tafiye-tafiye wadda Founder Taiwo Gbadegesin ya bayyana a matsayin "wani babban canji kuma babban ci gaba wajen cimma manufar kamfanin" wadda aka sake ƙaddamarwa ta hanyoyin sadarwa na zamani a watan Afrilu, wanda ƙwararre kan tafiye-tafiye - wakawaka doctor - ya karɓi baƙuncinsa, Eneh Dominica kuma ya jagoranta.
sw: Programu ya kusafiri ya Circue iliyofafanuliwa na mwanzilishi Taiwo Gbadegesin kama "mwanamapinduzi na hatua kubwa katika kufikia dhamira ya Rajamu" ilizinduliwa upya karibu Aprili ikisimamiwa na mshawishi wa usafiri - daktari Wakawaka na kusimamiwa na Eneh Dominica.
yo: Ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́ ìrìn-àjò Circue ni Olúdásílẹ̀ Taiwo Gbadegesin ṣàpèjúwe rẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bíi "aṣàyípadà àti ìgbésẹ̀ ńlá láti mú àfojúsùn ilé-iṣẹ́ náà wá sí ìmúṣẹ" tí wọ́n tún fi lọ́lẹ̀ lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára ní oṣù Igbe tí àwòkọ́ṣe lórí ayélujára nípa ìrìnàjò - Wakawaka doctor ṣe ìgbàlejò rẹ̀ tí Eneh Dominica sì jẹ́ adarí ètò.
zu: Isisetshenziswa sokuhamba iCircue sichazwa nguMsunguli uTaiwo Gbadegesin "njengoguquko olukhulu ukufeza injongo yebhrendi", ukuthulwa kabusha bukhoma ngoMbasa eyayisingathwe ngowezokuhamba - udokotela wewakawaka kugadwe ngu-Enech Dominica.

am: መድረኩ በቁም ነገር የታጨቀ ሲሆን፣ በብዙዎች ዘንድ የ አፕሩኮ ዶክተር ተብሎ የሚታወቀው እንደ ዶክተር ቺሞንሶ ኤልቤምባ ፣ የሳይክልብሬዝ መስራች፣ የፌዝ አላኒዪ እና ላቢ ሚዲያ መስራች እና ኦሞላባኤ ኦጋዴሮን የመሳሰሉ እንግዶችን እና የመድረክ ተናጋሪዎች የተሳተፉበትና፣ በወቃታዊ የጉዞ እና የመዛወር ጉዳዮች ላይ ለመወያየት ድምፃቸውን የሰጡበት ትልቅ ዋጋ የነበረው ክስተት ነው፡፡
en: It was a rather value packed event with guests and speakers such as Dr Chinonso Egbemba popularly known as Aproko doctor, Cyclebreeze Founder, Faith Olaniyi and Labby Media Founder, Omolabake Ogundero who lent their voices to discussing topical travel and relocation issues.
ha: Babban taro ne mai cike da abubuwa masu muhimmanci, wanda ya samu halartar baƙi da masu gabatarwa irin su Dr Chinonso Egbemba, wanda aka fi sani da Aproko doctor, da Faith Olaniyi, wanda ya kafa Cyclebreeze, da Omolabake Ogundero, wanda ya kafa Labby Media, waɗanda suka ba da gudunmawa wurin tattauna batutuwan ƙananan tafiye-tafiye na yau da kullum da ƙaura.
sw: Lilikuwa tukio la thamani lililojaa wageni na wazungumzaji kama vile Dkt Chinonso Egbemba anaejulikana kama Aproko doctor, mwanzilishi wa Cyclebreeze, Faith Olaniyi, na mwanzilishi wa Labby Media, Omolabake Ogundero ambao walitoa sauti zao kujadili masuala muhimu ya usafiri na uhamisho.
yo: Ó jẹ́ ètò tí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ iyì sodo sínú rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn àlejò àti àwọn olùdánilẹ́kọ̀ bíi Dr Chinonso Egbemba tí gbogbo ayé mọ̀ sí Aproko doctor, Olùdásílẹ̀ Cyclebreeze, Faith Olaniyi àti Olúdásílẹ̀ Labby Media, Omolabake Ogundero tí wọ́n gbóhùn sókè láti sọ̀rọ̀ nípa àwọn kókó ọ̀rọ̀ nípa ìrìnàjò àti lílọ sí òkè-òkun.
zu: Kwakungumcimbi owawugcwele izihambeli kanye nezikhulumi njengo Dkt Chinoso Egbemba owaziwa ngengo dokotela Aproko, uMsunguli weCyclebreeze, uFaith Olayini noLabby uMsunguli weZokuxhumana, u-Omolabake Ogundero obaboleke izwi ukudingida ezokuhamba nezinkinga zokushintsha indawo.

am: የማህበራዊ ሚዲያ ተፅእኖ ፈጣሪዎቹ አሲዋጆ ሌሪ እና ማሊክም በመድረኩ ላይ ተገኝተው ነበር፡፡
en: Social media influencers Asiwaju Lerry and Maleek were also present.
ha: Masu tasiri a kafafen sada zumunta Asiwaju Lerry da Maleek ma sun halarci taron.
sw: Pia walikuwepo wahamasishaji wa mitandao ya kijamii Asiwaju Lerry na Maleek.
yo: Àwọn àwòkọ́ṣe orí ayélujára Asiwaju Lerry àti Maleek náà wà níbẹ̀ pẹ̀lú.
zu: Abasebenzi bezinkundla zokuxhumana uAsiwaju Lerry noMaleek bebekhona.

am: በዝግጅቱ ላይም፣ መስራቹ ‘ቀዳሚ ተቀባዮች’ ብሎ ለጠራቸውና፣ አላማውንም ለነሱ መልሶ መስጠትን ባደረገው የሽልማት መርሀግብር ላይ ከተገኙት ግለሰቦች ወደ ሰላሳ ለሚደርሱት የሚያስጎመጅ ሽልማቶችን ሰቷል ፡፡
en: At the event, about thirty attendees were winners of mouthwatering rewards in an effort to give back to what the founder called ‘its early adopters’.
ha: A wajen taron, kusan mahalarta talatin ne suka samu kyautuka masu gwaɓi a wani yunƙurin da wanda ya kafa ya kira da bai wa ‘waɗanda suka fara karɓa’.
sw: Katika hafla hiyo, wahudhuriaji wapatao thelathini walikuwa washindi wa zawadi ya Mouthwatering katika jitihada za kurudisha kile mwanzilishi alichokiita "Waliokubali mapema".
yo: Níbi ètò náà, bíi ọgbọ̀n èèyàn tó wá ni wọ́n jẹ ẹ̀bùn tó yanilẹ́nu nínú ìgbìyànjú láti ṣe fún àwùjọ nínú nǹkan tí olùdásílẹ̀ náà pè ní "àwọn tí wọ́n kọ́kọ́ gbà á wọlé.".
zu: Emcimbini cishe abantu abangamashumi amathathu abebethamele abathole imiklomelo econsisa amathe, emzwamweni wokubuyisela emuva umsunguli akubiza ngokuthi "abamukeli bayo bokuqala".

am: ሽልማቶቹም የሚከተሉትን ያካትታሉ፡
en: The rewards included:
ha: Kyautukan sun haɗa da:
sw: Tuzo hizo zilijumuisha:
yo: Nínú ẹ̀bùn náà lati rí:
zu: Imiklomelo ibandakanya:

am: አሸናፊ እድለኞች በናይጄሪያ ሀገር ወንዝ ማቋረጫ በምትገኘው ቀዝቀዝ ባለችው ኦቡዳ ከተማ ውስጥ ተደብቀው የሚገኙትን አስማታዊ ተራሮች የሚጎበኙበት፤ ሙሉ ወጪው የተሸፈነለት ወደ ኦቡዳ ተራራ ሪዞረት (ምስሎች ከኦቡዳ አስገባ) የሚደረግ ጉዞ።
en: An all-expense paid trip to Obudu mountain resort (insert photos from Obudu) Where the lucky winners got to explore the magical mountains tucked away in the chilly town of Obudu, Cross River state Nigeria.
ha: Ɗaukar nauyin tafiya zuwa wurin shaƙatawa na tsaunin Obudu (saka hotuna daga Obudu) Inda waɗanda suka yi sa’ar samu kyautar za su sami damar zuwa tsaunukan masu ƙayatarwa waɗanda ke Boye a garin Obudu mai tsananin sanyi, a jihar Cross River Najeriya.
sw: Safari iliyolipiwa gharama zote hadi kituo cha mapumziko cha milimani cha Obudu (weka picha kutoka Obudu) ambapo washindi waliobahatika walipata kutalii milima ya ajabu iliyo kwenye mji wenye baridi wa Obudu, Jimbo la Cross River Nigeria.
yo: Ìrìnàjò ọ̀fẹ́ lọ sí ààyè ìgbafẹ́ orí òkè Obùdù (fi àwọn àwòrán láti Obudu sí i) níbi tí àwọn olóríire náà máa ti ní ànfààní láti rin orí-òkè alágbára tí ó wà nínú ìgboro olótùútù Òbùdù ní ìpínlẹ̀ Cross River lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà.
zu: Uhambo olukhokhelwe zonke izindleko oluya entabeni iObudu (zifakiwe izithombe zaseObudu) lapho abawinile abanenhlanhla bezobona izintaba zesimanga zifihlekile edolobheni elipholile laseObudu, endaweni iCross River eNigeria.

am: ለተማሪዎች፣ ለንግድ ስራ ባለቤቶች ና ለቴክኖሎጂ እውቀት ፈላጊዎች፤ ላኘቶፖች ።
en: Laptops for students, business owners and tech aspirants.
ha: Akwai kuma kwamfutocin tafi-da-gidanka don ɗalibai da masu kasuwanci da masu shirin shiga fannonin fasaha.
sw: Tanakirishi mpakato kwa wanafunzi, wamiliki wa biashara na wanaopenda teknolojia.
yo: kọ̀npútà alágbèká fún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́, àwọn tí wọ́n ní òwò àti àwọn tí wọ́n ní àlá fún ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ.
zu: amakhompuyutha abafundi, abanini bamabhizinisi nabafisa ukwazi ngobuchwepheshe.

am: ወደ ውጭ ሀገር ለመዛወር በጉጉት ለሚፈልጉ ግለሰቦች የቪዛ ማመልከቻ ክፍያ፡፡
en: Visa application fee for individuals who are actively seeking relocation abroad.
ha: Akwai kuma biyan kuɗin biza ga mutanen da ke neman ƙaura zuwa ƙasashen waje.
sw: Ada ya maombi ya Visa kwa watu binafsi ambao wanatafuta sana kuhamishiwa nje ya nchi.
yo: Owóo gbígba físà fún àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n wá láti kólọ sókè òkun lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́.
zu: Imali yokufaka isicelo sevisa kubantu abafisa ukuthutha bayohlala phesheya.

am: የመጀመሪያ የድህረ ምረቃ ትምርቶቻቸው መከታተል ለሚፈልጉ ግለሰቦች ደሞ የማመልከቻ ክፍያ ከብዙዎቹ ሽልማቶች ውስጥ ናቸው፡፡
en: Application fee for undergraduate and graduate school aspirants, among other things.
ha: Akwai kuma biyan kuɗin cuku-cukun fara karatun gaba da sakandire da digiri na biyu ko na uku da sauran abubuwa.
sw: Ada ya maombi kwa wanaotaka shule ya Shahada ya kwanza na wahitimu, miongoni mwa mambo mengine.
yo: Owó ìforúkọsílẹ fún àwọn tó ní àlá ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ gíga àti lẹ́yìn ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ gíga, pẹ̀lú àwọn nǹkan mìíràn.
zu: Imali yokufaka isicelo kwabafuna iziqu kanye nesikole sabaphothulile, phakathi kwezinye izinto.

am: ይህ በጣም የሚያስደንቅ ነው ብለው ካሰቡ፣ የስልክ ላይ የጉዞ መተግበሪያው ባህሪያት ደግሞ የበለጠ ያስደምሞታል፡፡
en: If you think that's impressive, the features of the travel app will impress you even more.
ha: Idan hakan birgeku, to sai yadda aka tsara manhajar ta tafiye-tafiye ya fi birge ku ma.
sw: Kama wanafikiri hayo yanavutia, vipengele vya Programu ya usafiri vitawavutia zaidi.
yo: Tí o bá lérò wí pé ìyẹn wúnilórí, àwọn àbùdá orí ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́ ìrìnàjò náà yóò wú ọ lórí ju bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ.
zu: Uma ucabanga ukuthi lokhu kuyajabulisa, izinto ezifakwe kusisetshenziswa sokuhamba uzohlabeka umxhwele.

am: አስበው፤ ፍላጎቶችህን የምታጋራበት፣ ሰዎች ጋር የምትገናኝበት፣ ስለብዙ ክልሎች በውስጥ ባለው ካረታ እየጎበኘህ በሚሊዮኖች የሚተመኑ መረጃዎችን የምታገኝበት ፣ የአፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋን ወደ ፈለከው ቋንቋ የሚተረጉምልህ፣ ምንዛሬ የሚቀይርልህ እናም ሌላ ብዙ ብዙ ጥቅሞች ያሉት የስልክ ውሰጥ መድረክ ነው፡፡
en: Picture this, an online platform where you can share your interests, connect, explore millions worth of information about different regions while navigating with its map feature, translate your native language to a preferred language, convert currencies, time - and so much more.
ha: Ƙiyasta wannan a ranku; wani dandali ne na yanar gizo inda za ku iya turawa da karɓan abubuwan da kuke so, kuma ku iya samun haɗuwa da wasu, kuma ku iya bincika miliyoyin bayanai game da yankuna daban-daban na duniya, kuna gane hanyoyi ta hanyar amfani da taswirar dandalin, kuma ku iya fassara yarenku na asali zuwa yaren da kuka ga dama, ku kuma iya canza kuɗi da lissafin lokaci - da dai sauransu.
sw: Fikiria hili, Jukwaa la mtandaoni ambapo unaweza kushirikisha mambo yanayokuvutia, kukuunganisha, kuchunguza mamilioni ya habari muhimu kuhusu maeneo mbalimbali huku uikitumia kipengele chake cha ramani, kutafsiri lugha yako mama hadi lugha unayopendelea, kubadilisha sarafu, wakati - na mengine mengi.
yo: Wòye ǹkan yìí, ìkànni orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára kan tí o ti lè fi èrò rẹ hàn, darapọ̀, ṣàmúlò àwọn ìròyìn tó tó mílíọ̀nù níye nípa oríṣiríṣi agbègbè tí o ó sì tún máa tọ àwọn àbùdá máàpù ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́ rẹ̀, túmọ̀ èdè abínibíì rẹ sí èdè tó bá wù ọ́, ṣe àyípadà owó, àsìkò - àti ǹkan tó jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ.
zu: Kucabange lokhu, inkundla yaku-inthanethi lapho ungakwazi ukwabelana ngezinto ozithakaselayo, ukuxhumana, ukuhlola ulwazi olungabiza izigidi ngezifunda ezahlukene ngesikhathi ubheka ngebalazwe, uhumushele kulimi lwebele kuya olimini oluncamelayo, ukuguqula izimali,isikhathi nokunye okuningi.

am: የሁሉም ተጓዣ ህልም ነው ማለት ይቻላል፡፡
en: Pretty much every traveler's dream.
ha: Ba shakka wannan shi ne burin kowane matafiyi.
sw: Karibu ndoto ya kila msafiri.
yo: Ó dàbí àláa gbogbo arìnrìnàjò.
zu: Okuseqinisweni yiphupho lawo wonke umuntu ohamba izindawo.

am: “ሰርኪውን የፈጠርነው፣ ሰዎች የሚጓዙበትን እና አዲስ ባህልን የሚቀስሙበት መንገድ ላይ ልዩነት መፍጠር ስለፈለግን ነው፡፡
en: “We created Circue because we wanted to make a difference in the way people travel and explore new cultures.
ha: “Mun ƙirƙiri Circue ne saboda muna son kawo sauyi kan yadda mutane ke tafiye-tafiye da kuma gano sabbin al’adu.
sw: "Tuliitengeza Circue kwa sababu tulitaka kuleta mabadiliko katika jinsi watu wanavyosafiri na kuchuguza tamaduni mpya.
yo: "A ṣẹ̀da Circue nítorí a fẹ́ mú àyípadà bá ọ̀nà tí àwọn ènìyàn ń gbà á rìnrìnàjò àti bí wọ́n ṣe ń ṣàwárí àwọn àṣà tuntun.
zu: Sasungula isisetshenziswa iCircue ngoba besifuna ukwenza umehluko ngendlela abantu abahamba ngayo futhi bafunde amanye amasiko.

am: አዳዲስ ቦታዎችን እና ባህሎችን ማሰስ አድካሚ ሊሆን እንደሚችል ተገንዝበናል፤ እናም ጥራት ያለውን መረጃ ሰዎች እንዲያገኙ የሚያረግ፣ ከነዋሪዎች እና ሌሎች ተጓዦቸ ጋር መተዋወቅ የሚያስችል እናም የትንሽ ህብረተሰብ ስሜትን የሚፈጥር መድረክ መገንባት ነበር ፍላጎታችን” ሲል መስራቹ ተናግሯል፡፡
en: We recognized that navigating new places and cultures can be overwhelming, and we wanted to create a platform that would make it easier for people to access quality information, connect with locals and other travelers, and build a sense of community” says the founder.
ha: Mun fahimci cewa gane hanyoyin sabbin wurare da al'adu na da wahala, kuma muna son ƙirƙirar dandalin da zai sauƙaƙawa mutane samun damar samun bayanai masu inganci, da damar haɗuwa ‘yan gari da sauran matafiya, da haɓaka fahimtar al'umma," in ji wanda ya kafa.
sw: Tulitambua kuwa kuvinjari maeneo na tamaduni mpya kunaweza kustaajabisha, na tulitaka kuunda jukwaa ambalo lingerahisishia watu kufikia maelezo bora, kuungana na wenyeji na wasafiri wengine, na kujenga hisia za jumuiya" anasema mwanzilishi.
yo: A rí i wí pé títọ ààyè àti àṣà tuntun máà ń pọ̀ lápọ̀jù, a sì fẹ́ ṣẹ̀da ìkànnì kan tí yóò jẹ́ kí ó rọrùn fún àwọn ènìyàn láti rí ìròyìn tó jẹ́ ojúlówó, darapọ̀ mọ́ àwọn ọmọ ìlú àti àwon arìnrìnàjò míràn, kí a sì ṣẹ̀dá ìbáṣepọ̀ àwùjọ" olúdásílẹ̀ náà ló sọ bẹ́ẹ̀.
zu: Sibonile ukuthi ukubheka izindawo ezintsha namasiko kungaba ngaphezu kwamandlafuthi besifuna ukwakha inkundla ezokwenza kube lula kubantu ukuthi bathole ulwazi olufanelekile, baxhumane nabendawo kanye nabahambi nokwakha umqondo womphakathi kusho uMsunguli.

am: . ለሰርኪው ያለን ራእይ ፤ ለተጓዦች፣ ለስደተኞች እና ልምዳቸውን ለማካፈል መገናኘትን ለሚሹ ነዋሪዎች አለማቀፋዊ ህብረተሰብን መፍጠርና በጉዞአቸው ላይ እርስ በርሳቸው የሚተጋገዙበት ማድረግ ነው፡፡
en: Our vision for Circue is to create a global community of travelers, immigrants, and locals who can connect, share their experiences, and support each other on their journeys.``
ha: Burinmu game da Circue shi ne ƙirƙirar wata al'umma ta matafiya na duk duniya da baƙi da mazauna wurare, ta yadda zasu iya haɗuwa da juna, kuma su samar ko su samu bayanai kan abubuwan da suka sani, kuma su tallafawa juna kan tafiye-tafiyensu.
sw: Maono yetu kwa Circue ni kuunda jumuiya ya kimataifa ya wasafiri, wahamiaji na wenyeji ambao wanaweza kuungana, kubadilishana uzoefu wao na kusaidiana katika safari zao.
yo: Àfojúsùn wa fún Circue ni láti ṣẹ̀dá àwùjọ àgbáyé àwọn arìnrìnàjò, àwọn àtìpó, àti àwọn ọmọ ìlú tí wọ́n lè darapọ̀, sọ ìrírí wọn, tí wọn ó sì ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún ara wọn nínú ìrìnàjò wọn."
zu: Umbono wethu ukwakha umphakathi wabahambi emhlabeni, abokufika nabendawo bangaxhumana, babelane ngolwazi basekane ohambweni labo

am: የሰርኪው የስልክ መተግበሪያ በአፕል እና ጎግልኘሌይ ማከማቻዎች ላይ የተለቀቀ ሲሆን በአለም ላይ በማንኛውም ቦታ ወደ ስልክ መጫን ጀምሯል፡፡
en: The Circue app went live on Apple and GooglePlay stores and is available for downloads anywhere in the world.
ha: Manhajar Circue ta fara samuwa dandalin Apple da dandalin Google Play, ana kuma iya samunta a ko'ina cikin duniya don a sauƙeta.
sw: Programu ya Circue ilipatikana kwenye App Store na Google Play na inapatikana kwa kupakuliwa popote Duniani.
yo: Ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́ Circue ti bọ́ sáyé lórí Apple àti àwọn ẹ̀ka GooglePlay ó sì wà fún gbígbàsílẹ̀ níbikíbi lágbàyé.
zu: Isisetshenziswa iCircue ivele ku-Apple noGooglePlay stores futhi ikhona uma ufuna ukuyilanda noma yikuphi emhlabeni.

am: እ.ኤ.አ በሀምሌ 14/ 2023 ለአገልግሎት ከዋለበት ቀን ጀምሮ፣ በተለይም በየእለቱ መተግበሪያውን በሚጭኑ እና ለመጠቀም በሚመዘገቡት፣ በአስርሺዎች በሚቆጠሩ ተጓዦች ዘንድ ከፍተኛ መጠን ያለው አድናቆትን አግኝቷል።
en: Since it went live on the 14th of July 2023, it has gained a huge amount of traction especially amongst travelers recording daily downloads and sign ups in the tens of thousands.
ha: Tunda ta fara aiki a ranar 14 ga watan Yuli na shekarar 2023, ta samu tsananin karɓuwa musamman a wajen matafiya, inda ake samun dubban gomman masu sauƙewa da masu rajista a kullum.
sw: Tangu ilipoanza kuonekana tarehe 14 Julai 2023, imepata ushawishi mkubwa hususani miongoni mwa wasafiri, wanaorekodi upakuaji wa kila siku na kujisajili makumi kwa maelfu.
yo: Láti ìgbà tó ti bọ́ sáyé ní ọjọ́ 14 oṣù Agẹmọ ọdún 2023, ó ti gba iyì tó pọ̀ gan pàápàá júlọ lọ́dọ̀ àwọn arìnrìnàjò tí ó ń ní àkọsílẹ̀ ìgbàsílẹ̀ àti ìforúkọsílẹ̀ lójoojúmọ́ ní ẹgbẹ̀rún lọ́nà mẹ́wàá.
zu: Ngesikhathi sibakhona bukhoma ngomhlaka-14 kuNtulikazi 2023, sesithole ukunakwa kakhulu ikakhulukazi kwabahambayo belanda okuqoshiwe nsukuzonke nokusayinela ukuba yingxenye ngezinkulungwane eziyishumi.

am: ‘የሰርኪው መተግበሪያ ለሚያስስ ሰው ኦክስጅን ነው” ሲል ከተጠቃሚዎች አንዱ ተናግሯል ።
en: “The circue app is the world explorer’s oxygen,'' says one of its users.
ha: "Manhajar Circue ce dausayin masu yawace-yawace a duniya," in ji ɗaya daga cikin masu amfani da ita.
sw: "Programu ya Circue ni Oksijeni ya wavumbuzi ulimwenguni", anasema mmoja wa watumiaji wake.
yo: "ohun èlò ìmúṣiṣẹ́ Circue ni èémí àmísínú arìnrìnàjò àgbáyé," ọ̀kan nínú àwọn tó ń lò ó ló sọ bẹ́ẹ̀.
zu: "Isisetshenziswa iCircue umoya wokuhlola womhlaba," kusho omunye wabasebenzisi.

am: “ሙንጎ ፓርክ አሁን በጣም ይቀናብናል” አንድ ሌላ ለየት ያለ አስደናቂ አስተያየት፡፡
en: “Mungo Park would be so jealous of us right now”- another rather interesting review.
ha: "Mungo Park zai yi matuƙar kishi da mu a yanzu" – a cewar wani nazari mai ban sha'awa.
sw: "Hifadhi ya Mungo inaweza kutuonea wivu hivi sasa" - mapitio mengine ya kuvutia.
yo: "Mungo Park yóò máa jowú wa báyìí ni"-àwílé míràn tó tún fẹ́rẹ̀ panilẹ́rìn.
zu: "I-Mungo Park ngabe inomona ngathi njengamanje"- okunye ukubhekisisa okujabulisayo.

am: የዚህ መክፈቻ ስኬት ፤እንከን የለሽ የጉዞ ልምድን ለተጓዦች የመስጠት አላማውን ለማሳካት በቁርጠኝነት በሚጓዘው መስራች የሚመራው፣ የማይበገሩትና አዲስ ነገር ፈጣሪ የሆኑት፣ የሰርኪው ቡድን አባላት ውጤት ነው፡፡
en: The success of this launch may be attributed to the resilient and innovative Circue team led by the Founder, who is committed to the mission of providing seamless travel experiences.
ha: Ana iya danganta nasarar wannan ƙaddamarwa ga ƙungiyar Circue mai ƙarfi da basira wadda wanda ya kafata, wanda ya himmatu wajen cimma manufar samar da abubuwan tafiye-tafiye masu kyau da inganci, ke jagoranta.
sw: Mafanikio ya uzinduzi huu yanaweza kutokana na timu thabiti na bunifu ya Circue inayoongozwa na mwanzilishi, ambae amejitolea katika dhamira ya kutoa uzoefu wa usafiri bila vikwazo.
yo: Àṣeyọrí ìfilọ́lẹ̀ yìí ni a lè so mọ́ agbára àti ìmọ̀-ọ̀tun ikọ̀ Circue tí Olùdásílẹ̀ léwájú rẹ̀, ẹni tó ti farajìn fún iṣẹ́ ìpèse ìrírí ìrìnàjò tí ò lábàwọ́n.
zu: Ukuphumelela kwalokhu kwethulwa kungabanomthelela ekubekezeleni nokwenza kabusha kweqembu leCircue eliholwa nguMsunguli,ozimisele kunjongo yokunikela ngolwazi lokuhamba olungenankinga.

am: ለማጠቃለልም ፤ሰርኪው የምንጓዝበትን መንገድ ድጋሚ ለመተርጎም ቆርጦ ተነስቷል፡፡
en: To sum it up, Circue is poised to redefine the way we travel.
ha: A taƙaice dai manhajar Circue ta himmatu wajen sake fasalin yadda muke tafiye-tafiye.
sw: Ili kuhitimisha, Circue iko tayari kufafanua upya njia tunayosafiri.
yo: Ní àkótán, Circue ti ṣetán láti ṣe àtúnṣe bí a ṣe ń rìnrìnàjò.
zu: Ukugoqa konke, iCircue yakhelwe ukwenza kabusha indlela esihamba ngayo.

am: በውስጡ የያዛቸው፤ በማህበረሰብ የተመራው አቀራረቡ እና ተጓዦችን በታታሪነት አገልጋይነቱ ከጊዜ ወደ ጊዜ እየተጨናነቀ በመጣው ገበያ ውስጥ ጎልቶ እንዲታይ አድርጎታል፡፡
en: Its comprehensive features, community driven approach and commitment to travelers makes it stand out in an increasingly crowded market.
ha: Kyawawan tsare-tsarenta da salonta na gudanarwa wanda ya dogara kan al'umma da ba wa matafiya mahimmanci sun sa ta yi fice cikin tsarekunta.
sw: Vipengele vyake vya kina, mbinu inayoendeshwa na jumuiya na kujitolea kwa wasafiri huifanya ionekane katika soko linalozidi kuwa na watu wengi.
yo: Àwọn àbùdá rẹ̀ tó yanilẹ́nu, àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ ajẹmọ́ àwùjọ àti ìfarajìn fún àwọn arìnrìnàjò ló jẹ́ kó dá yátọ̀ nínú ọjà tó ń kún àkúnwọsílẹ̀.
zu: Ubukhulu bezinto, indlela eholwa ngumphakathi nokuzimisela kwabahambayo kukwenza kugqame emakethe ehlezi igcwele.
