yo: Pẹ̀lú bátírì 5000mAh ńlá CAMON 20, o lè rẹ́yìn ọjọ́ pẹ̀lú ìrọ̀rùn, kódà tí o bá lò ó lálójù.
zu: Ngobukhulu buka 5000mAh bebhurethi yeCAMON 20, ungahlala usuku lonke ngokukhululeka ngisho uyisebenzisa kakhulu.

am: እና ለመሙላት ጊዜው ሲደርስ፣ 45W ፈጣን ባትሪ መሙላት በአጭር ጊዜ ውስጥ ወደ ሙሉ ሃይል እንደሚመለሱ፣ እንደተገናኙ እና በጉዞ ላይ እንዲቆዩ ያደርግዎታል።
en: And when it's time to recharge, the 45W fast charging ensures you'll be back to full power in no time, keeping you connected and on the go.
ha: Kuma duk lokacin da aka tashi yin caji, caja mai saurin cajin da yakai ƙarfin 45W zata cika maka ita cikin sauri, kai dai tabbatar da kana haɗe kuma ana samun ka.
sw: Na wakati wa kuichaji upya unapofika, chaji ya haraka ya 45W huhakikisha utarejea kwenye nishati kamili baada ya muda mfupi, hivyo basi kukuweka umeunganishwa na popote ulipo.
yo: Tí ó bá sì ti tó àsìkò láti gba agbára, yíyára gbagbára 45W náà máa rí i dájú pé o ní ẹ̀kún agbára padà láìpẹ́, tí yóò jẹ́ kí o wà lórí ìlà kí o sì tẹ̀síwájú.
zu: Futhi uma sekuyisikhathi sokurishaja, i45W ishaja ngokushesha ikuqinisekisa ukuthi uzobe usunamandla agcwele esikhathini esingesingakanani, ikugcina uxhumekile ube uhamba.

am: የ TECNO CAMON 20 Doodle እትም እርስዎ ጥበብ እና ቴክኖሎጂን የሚለማመዱበትን መንገድ እንደገና ለመወሰን ተዘጋጅቷል።
en: The TECNO CAMON 20 Doodle edition is set to redefine the way you experience art and technology.
ha: Samfurin wayar TECNO CAMON 20 Doodle an tsarata ne don ta sake fasalin yanda kuke more ƙirƙira da fasaha.
sw: Toleo la TECNO CAMON 20 la Doodle limewekwa ili kufafanua upya jinsi unavyotumia sanaa na teknolojia.
yo: Àtúnṣe TECNO CAMON 20 Onírúurú Àwòrán Alákòónú ti ṣetán láti ṣe àyípadà sí bí o ṣe ń rí iṣẹ́ ọnà àti ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ.
zu: Uhlobo lweTECNO CAMON 20 Doodle luhlelelwe ukuchaza kabusha indlela oyazi ngayo ngobuciko nezobuchwepheshe.

am: ስለዚህ፣ ለመማረክ በተዘጋጀው መሳሪያ ውስጥ ፈጠራን እና አዲስ ግኝትን የሚያጣምር ጉዞን ለመጀመር ተዘጋጁ።
en: So, get ready to embark on a journey that fuses creativity and innovation in a device that's designed to impress.
ha: Saboda haka ku shirya yin tafiya data haɗa ƙirƙira da sabunta a wayar da aka tsara don ta burge.
sw: Hivyo, jiandae kuanza safari ambayo inakusanya ubunifu na uvumbuzi katika kifaa ambacho kimeundwa kuvutia.
yo: Torí náà, múrasílẹ̀ láti rin ìrìnàjò tó kó ọgbọ́n àtinúdá àti ìmọ̀ ọ̀tun papọ̀ sínú ohun èlò tí wọ́n ṣe láti wúnilórí.
zu: Ngakho zilungiselele ukuqala uhambo olufaka makhono nokwenza kabusha kudivayisi eyenziwelwe ukuthathekisa.

am: በይፋ የሚለቀቅበትን ጊዜ ይጠብቁ እናም ስሜትዎን ከዋናው የአኗኗር ዘይቤ ጋር ለማዋሃድ ይዘጋጁ!
en: Be on the lookout for its official release and be prepared to indulge your senses with the ultimate lifestyle companion!
ha: Kuci gaba da jiran ranar da za a sake ta a kasuwa, ku kuma kasance a shirye don zurfafa tunaninku tare da abokiyar tsarin rayuwa.!
sw: Kuwa macho kwa ajili ya kutolewa kwake rasmi na kuwa tayari kujiingiza hisi yako na bora maisha mwez!
yo: Fi ojú sọ́nà fún ìgbéjáde rẹ̀ kí o sì múrasílẹ̀ láti fi gbogbo ara jẹ̀gbádùn pẹ̀lú ọ̀rẹ́ abániṣayé tó dára jùlọ.!
zu: Hlala uqaphile ukukhishwa okusemthethweni futhi uzilungiselele ukusebenzisa izinzwa zakho ngomlingani wokugcina wendlela yokuphila.!

am: በፌስቡክ፣ ኢንስታግራም እና ትዊተር ላይ TECNOን ሲከተሉ ተጨማሪ ዝርዝሮችን ያግኙ።
en: Find more details when you follow TECNO on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter.
ha: Zaku samu ƙarin bayanai yayinda kuka bibiyi shafin TECNO a Facebook, Instagram, da kuma Twitter.
sw: Pata maelezo zaidi kwa kuifuatilia TECNO kwenye Faceebook, Instagram na Twitter.
yo: Ṣàwárí àfikún àlàyé nígbà tí o bá tẹ̀lé TECNO lóri Facebook, Instagram àti Twitter.
zu: Thola eminye imininingwane uma ulandela uTECNO kuFacebook, Instagram noTwitter.

am: ውድ የጤና ቴክኖሎጂ ጀማሪ ድርጀቶች፣ 'ጁሚያ' እንጀራችሁን ሊወስድ እየመጣ ነው!
en: Dear healthtech startup, Jumia is coming for your bread!
ha: Sabbin kamfanonin fasahar kiwon lafiya lafiya, Jumia sunzo muku da tallafin kuɗaɗe da kuke buƙata.!
sw: Wapenzi wa healthtech startup, Jumia inakuja kwa mkate wako!
yo: Ẹ̀yin ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ aṣètò-ìlera orí ẹ̀rọ, Jumia ń bọ̀ wá gba kúkúṣì yín!
zu: Siyakubingelela siqalo sezobuchwepheshe bezempilo, uJumia uzokudla isinkwa sakho!

am: እ.ኤ.አ. ማክሰኞ ግንቦት 17/2022፣ የናይጄሪያ ኢ-ኮሜርስ ግዙፉ ኩባንያ 'ጁሚያ' የ2022 የመጀመሪያ ሩብ ዓመት የ ገንዘብ አጠቃቀም ዘገባውን አወጣ።
en: On Tuesday, May 17, 2022, Nigerian eCommerce giant, Jumia released its financial report for the first quarter of 2022.
ha: A ranar Talatar 17 ga watan Mayun 2022, babban kamfanin nan dake Najeriya na cinikayya ta intanet, wato Jumia, ya saki rahoton rubu'in farko na hada-hadar shekarar 2022.
sw: Jumanne, Mei 17, 2022 kampuni kubwa ya kibiashara ya Nigeria, Jumia ilitoa ripoti yake ya fedha kwa robo ya kwanza ya 2022.
yo: Ní ọjọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun, ọjọ́ 17 oṣù Èbìbí, ọdún 2022, àgbà nínú ìṣòwò orí ayélujára ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà, Jumia ṣe àgbéjáde àkọsílẹ̀ ìṣúná rẹ̀ fún ìdá mẹ́rin àkọ́kọ́ ọdún 2022.
zu: NgoLwesibili ziwu-17 kuNhlaba ngo 2022, iNigerian eCommerce enkulu, uJumia yakhipha umbiko wezezimali wekota yokuqala yango-2022.

am: የትዕዛዝ፣ የገቢ እና አጠቃላይ የሸቀጦች ዋጋ (GMV) ካለፉት ዘጠኝ ሩብ ዓመታት ጋር ሲወዳደር ከፍተኛ እድገት እንዳሳየ ጣምራ- ዋና ሥራ አስፈፃሚዎቹ 'ጄረሚ ሆዳራ' እና 'ሳቻ ፖይኖኔክ' ተናግረዋል።
en: Co-CEOs Jeremy Hodara and Sacha Poignonnec shared that orders, revenue, and gross merchandise value (GMV) saw significant growth compared to the last nine quarters.
ha: Shugabannin kamfanin biyu; Jeremy Hodara da Sacha Poignonnec sun bayyana cewa siyayya, rabanu, da kuma babbar darajar ciniki, sun samu gagarumar haɓaka idan aka kwatanta da rubu'ai tara da suka gabata.
sw: Watendaji wakuu wenza Jeremy Hodara na Sacha Poignonnec walishiriki kuwa oda, mapato na thamani ya jumla ya bidhaa (GMV) ilishuhudia ukuaji mkubwa ikilinganishwa na robo tisa zilizopita.
yo: Àwọn Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí Jeremy Hodara àti Sacha Poignonnec sọ wí pé ìbéèrè, ìpawówọlé, àti àpapọ̀ iye ọjà títà (AIO) rí ìdàgbàsókè tó fojú hàn ní àfiwé ìdá mẹ́rin mẹ́sàn-án tó gbẹ́yìn.
zu: I-Co-CEO uJeremy Horada no Sacha Poignonnec babelana ngamaoda,ingenisonzuzo, nenani lokudayisile kukonke (GMV) babona ukukhula okukhulu uma uqhathanisa namakota ayisishagalolunye adlule.

am: ሩ1(Q1) 2021ን ከሩ1 2022 ጋር ሲነነፃፀርም፣ትዕዛዞች ከ6.6 ሚሊዮን ወደ 9.3 ሚሊዮን፣ጂ.ኤም.ቪ ከ198.9 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ወደ 252.7 ሚሊዮን ዶላር አድጓል፣ ገቢው ደሞ ከ33 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ወደ 47.6 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ከፍ ብሏል።
en: Comparing Q1 2021 with Q1 2022, orders grew from 6.6 million to 9.3 million, GMV grew from $198.9 million to $252.7 million, while revenue went from $33 million to $47.6 million.
ha: Idan aka kwatanta rubu'in farko na shekarar 2021 da na 2022, siyayya ta ƙaru daga miliyan 6.6 izuwa miliyan 9.3, babbar darajar ciniki kuma ta ƙaru daga dala miliyan $198.9 izuwa dala miliyan $252.7, yayinda rabanu ya tashi daga dala miliyan $33 izuwa dala miliyan $47.6.
sw: Ikilinganishwa Q1 2021 na Q1 2022, oda iliongezeka kutoka milioni 6.6 hadi milioni 9.3, GMV iliongezeka kutoka milioni 198.9$ hadi milioni 252.7$, huku mapato yakiwa milioni 33$ hadi milioni 47.6$.
yo: Ṣíṣe àfiwé I1 2021 pẹ̀lú I2 2022, ìbéèrè fọ̀ láti 6.6 mílíọ̀nù sí 9.3 mílíọ̀nù, AIO fọ̀ láti $198.9 mílíọ̀nù sí $252.7 mílíọ̀nù, nígbà tí ìpawówọlé lọ láti $33 mílíọ̀nù sí $47.6 mílíọ̀nù.
zu: Uma uqhathanisa uQ1 ngo-2021 no Q1 wango-2022, amaoda akhula kusuka ezigidini ezingu 6.6 kuya ezigidini ezingu 9.3, uGMV wakhula usuka ku $198.9 izigidi uya ku$252.7 izigidi, ngesikhathi ingenisonzuzo isuka ku$33 izigidi iya ku$4.6 izigidi.

am: በዚህ አይነት ዕድገትም ላይ ቢሆንም እንኳን፣ ከወለድ፣ ከግብር፣ ከዋጋ ቅናሽ እና ከክፍያ ኢ.ቢ.ቲ.ዲ.ኤ(EBTDA) ኪሳራ በፊት የተገኘው ገቢ 53 ሚሊዮን ዶላር በመሆኑ ለኩባንያው ሁሉም አስደሳች አይደለም።
en: Even with this growth, it's not all rosy for the company as earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, and amortization (EBITDA) loss was $53 million.
ha: Duk da wannan cigaban, abun baiwa kamfanin yanda yake so ba, inda asarar da aka samu daga ribar kuɗin ruwa, haraji, raguwa daraja, da kuma biyan bashi wato(EBITDA) takai dala miliyan $53.
sw: Pamoja na ukuaji huu, si jambo la kufurahisha kwa kampuni kwani mapato kabla ya riba, kodi, kushuka kwa thamani na malipo ya madeni (EBITDA) hasara ilikuwa milioni 53$.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ìdàgbàsókè yìí, nǹkan ò rọ̀ṣọ̀mù fún ilé-iṣẹ́ náà nítorí iye owó ṣíwájú gbèse èlé, owó-orí, àdínkù owó ohun arídìmú, àdínkù owó ohun àìrídìmú (EOAA) jẹ́ $53 mílíọ̀nù.
zu: Ngisho lokhu kukhula, akukona okuhle kodwa enkampanini njengemiholo ngaphambi kwenzalo,intela, ukwehla nokukhokha izikweletu (EBITDA) ukulahlekelwa kwaba izigidi ezingu-$53.

am: ከ 'ቴክ ክረንች'(TechCrunch) ጋር ባደረገው የስልክ ጥሪ ላይ ኩባንያው የኢ.ቢ.ቲ.ዲ.ኤ(EBITDA) ኪሳራን በ ሩ1 2021 ከተመዘገበው 70 ሚሊዮን ዶላር በታች ለማድረግ ማቀዱን 'ሳቻ ፖይኖኔክ' ተናግሯል።
en: On a call with TechCrunch, Poignonnec shared that the company plans to keep EBITDA loss below the $70 million it recorded in Q1 2021.
ha: A wata ziyara ga TechCrunch, Poignonnec ta bayyana cewar kamfanin na shirye-shiryen rage asarar EBITDA izuwa ƙasa da dala miliyan $70 da suka gamu da ita a rubu'in farko na shekarar 2021.
sw: Kwa simu na TechCrunch, Poignonnec ilishiriki kwamba kampuni inapanga kuweka hasara ya EBITDA chini ya $70 milioni ilirekodi mnamo Q1 2021.
yo: Ní orí ìpè pẹ̀lú TechCrunch, Poignonnec sọ wí pé ilé iṣẹ́ náà ń gbérò láti gbèse EOAA sábẹ́ $70 mílíọ̀nù tí ó ní lámọsílẹ̀ ní I1 ọdún 2021.
zu: Ocingweni neTechCrunch, iPiognonnec yabelana ngezinhlelo zenkampani ukugcina ukulahlekelwa kwe-EBITDA kungaphansi kwezigidi ezingu-$70 kuqoshiwe naku-Q1 wango 2021.

am: አሁን ወደ አንዳንድ ጥሩ እና አስደናቂ ሊሆኑ የሚችሉ እድገቶች።
en: Now to some good and potentially exciting developments.
ha: Yanzu mu koma ɓangaren daddɗan labarin cigaba.
sw: Sasa kwa maendeleo mazuri na yanayoweza kusisimua.
yo: Báyìí sí àwọn ìdàgbàsókè tó dára tó lè múnú eni dùn.
zu: Manje okuhle nentuthuko ejabulisayo engenzeka.

am: ጁሚያ ፔይ' (JumiaPay) ፣ምርጥ የሚባለው የቴክኖሎጂ ምርቱ፣ የክፍያ አገልግሎት መፍትሄ አቅራቢ (PSSP) ፍቃድ አግኝቷል፣ ይህም በናይጄሪያ ውስጥ ላሉ የሶስተኛ ወገን ንግዶች ክፍያዎችን ለማድረግ ያስችለዋል።
en: JumiaPay, its fintech product, has secured a payment service solution provider (PSSP) licence, which will allow it to process payments for third-party businesses in Nigeria.
ha: JumiaPay, kamfanin su na kayan fasaha, ya fito musu wata hanyar biyan kuɗi mai lasisi ta (PSSP), wanda zai basu damar sarrafa biyan kuɗi izuwa sauran kamfanoni a Najeriya.
sw: JumiaPay, ni baadhi ya Fintech, imepata leseni ya mtoa huduma ya malipo (PSSP), ambayo itairuhusu kushughulikia malipo kwa biashara za wahusika wengine nchini Nigeria.
yo: JumiaPay, ohun-èlo ìṣúná orí ẹ̀rọ rẹ̀, ti gba ìwé-àṣẹ ìpèsè ọ̀na-àbáyọ owó sísan (IOOS), tí yóò fún-un ní ànfààní láti ṣèto owó sísan fún àwọn oníṣòwò alàgàta ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà.
zu: IJumiaPay, umkhiqizo wayo we-fintech, isithole ukunikezwa isixazululo sokusebenza kwenkokhelo (PSSP), okuzovumela uhlelo lwenkokhelo lomuntu wesithathu emabhizinisini eNigeria.

am: ይህ እድገት ከ ፔይስታክ(Paystack)፣ ፍለተርዌቭ(Flutterwave)፣ ኢ-ትራንዛክት(eTranzact) እና ሬሚታ( Remita) ጋር ቀጥተኛ ውድድር ውስጥ ያስገባዋል።
en: This development puts it in direct competition with Paystack, Flutterwave, eTranzact, and Remita.
ha: Wannan cigaban ya sanya shi gasa kai tsaye da kamfanonin Paystack, Flutterwave, eTranzact da kuma Remita.
sw: Maendeleo haya yanaiweka katika ushindani wa moja kwa moja na Paystack, Flutterwave, Tranzact, na Remita.
yo: Ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ yìí ti fi í sínú ìfigagbága tààrà pẹ̀lú Paystack, Flutterwave, eTranzact, àti Remita.
zu: Lentuthuko iyibeka ekuncintisaneni ngqo nePaystack, Flutterwave, eTranzact kanye neRemita.

am: ገቢውን ለመጨመር በጣም በሚያስፈልግበት ወቅትም ከመጣ ይህ ሌላ የገቢ ምንጭን ያቀርባል።
en: It also provides another revenue stream when it desperately needs to increase revenues.
ha: Sun kuma samu wata hanyar ƙara samun rabanu, a lokacin da suke tsananin buƙatar ƙara yawansa.
sw: Pia hutoa mkondo mwengine wa mapato wakati inahitaji sana kuongeza mapato.
yo: Ó tún pèsè ọ̀nà ìpawówọlé mìíràn nígbà tí ó nílò láti ṣe àfikún sí ìpawówọlée rẹ̀ láìnírètí.
zu: Ibuye inikezele omunye umnyombo wengenisonzuzo uma isidinga ukunyusa izingenisonzuzo.

am: የክፍያ አገልግሎት መፍትሄ አቅራቢዎች (PSSPs) አብዛኛውን ጊዜ ገንዘባቸውን የሚያገኙት በነሱ ዘንድ ለሚደረግ እያንዳንዱ ግብይት የግብይት ክፍያ በማስከፈል ነው፣ እና እነዚህ ክፍያዎች ብዙ ጊዜ እንደ ግብይቱ ዋጋ ይለያያሉ።
en: PSSPs usually make their money by charging a transaction fee for every transaction they facilitate, and these fees often vary depending on the transaction’s value.
ha: PSSP sun samun kuɗaɗensu ne ta hanyar karɓar ladan hidima daga kowanne hada-hadar kuɗi da suka asassa, waɗannan kuɗaɗen suna dogara ne da girman hada-hada.
sw: PSSPs kwa kawaida hutengeneza fedha zao kwa kutoza ada ya muamala kwa kila muamala wanaouwezesha, na maranyingi ada hizi hutofautiana kulingana na thamani ya muamala.
yo: IOOS máa ń pa owó wọn pẹ̀lú bíbéère owó ìdúnàdúrà fún gbogbo ìdúnàdúrà tí wọ́n bá ṣe, àwọn owó yìí sì máa ń dá lórí iye tí ìdúnàdúrà náà bá jẹ́.
zu: IPSSP ijwayele ukwenza imali yayo ngokubiza imali yokuthengiselana ekutheniselaneni ngakunye abakwenzayo, lezi zimali zijwayele ukwahluka kuncike kunani lokuhwebiselana.

am: በ አንድ ዘገባ እንደተጠቀሰው፣ በጁሚያ ላይ የተደረጉ 34 በመቶ የሚሆኑት ትዕዛዞች ክፍያቸው የተጠናቀቀው ጁሚያ ፔይን እና የሱን ፍቃድ በመጠቀም ነው፣እኚህ የጁሚያ ፔይ ቁጥሮች በሚቀጥሉት ሩብ ዓመታት በከፍተኛ ሁኔታ ሊጨምሩ ይችላሉ።
en: Per the report, 34% of orders placed on Jumia were completed using JumiaPay, and with its licence, JumiaPay’s numbers could significantly increase in the coming quarters.
ha: Bisa ga rahoton, kashi 34 na siyayyar da akayi a Jumia, an kammalasu ne ta hanyar amfani da hanyar biyan kuɗi ta JumiaPay, da kuma lasisinsu, JumiaPay zasu ƙara samun yawan adadin a rubu'o'i masu zuwa.
sw: Kulingana na ripoti hiyo, 34% ya oda zilizowekwa kwenye Jumia zilikamilishwa kwa kutumia JumiaPay, na kwa leseni yake, idadi ya JumiaPay inaweza kuongezeka kwa kiasi kikubwa katika robo hiyo.
yo: Nínú àkọsílẹ̀, ìdá 34% ìbéère ọjà lórí Jumia ni wọ́n parí pẹ̀lú lílo JumiaPay, pẹ̀lú ìwé-àṣẹ rẹ̀, ònka JumiaPay lè lékún gidi gan-an ní àwọn ìdá mẹ́rin tó ń bọ̀.
zu: Ngombiko ngamunye u34% wamaoda afakiwe kuJumia aqediwe ngokusebenzisa uJuminaPay ngemvume yawo,izinamba zikaJumiaPay zinganyuka kumakota azolandela.

am: የጤና ጥበቃ አገልግሎት በከፍተኛ ፍጥነት
en: Healthcare at the drop of a hat
ha: Fasahar kiwon lafiya cikin gaggawa
sw: Healthcare kwenye tone la kofia
yo: Ètò ìlera lẹ́yẹ ò ṣọkà.
zu: Ukunakekelwa kwezempilo kuhamba phambili

am: ምናልባት በዘገባው ውስጥ ከተጋሩት እድገቶች በጣም የሚያስደንቀው ነገር ጁሚያ ወደ ጤና ጥበቃ ዘርፉ ለመግባት መወሰኑ ነው።
en: Perhaps the most interesting thing about the developments shared in the report is Jumia’s decision to venture into the healthcare space.
ha: Wataƙil, abu mafi daɗi game da wannan cigaban da aka yaɗa a rahoton shine, hukuncin da Jumia suka yanke na shiga harkokin kiwon lafiya.
sw: Labda jambo la kuvutia zaidi kuhusu maendeleo yaliyoshirikishwa katika ripoti hiyo ni uamuzi wa Jumia kujitosa katika nafasi ya huduma ya afya.
yo: Bóyá ohun tó wúnilórí jùlọ nípa àwọn ìdàgbàsókè tí wọ́n sọ nínú àkọsílẹ̀ náà ni ìpinnu Jumia láti wọ àwùjọ ètò ìlera.
zu: Mhlampe into ejabulisayo ngezinguquko okwabelwane ngazo embikweni yisinqumo sikaJumia sokwehluka endaweni yokunakekela kwezempilo.

am: ድሆችን ለመርዳት ከአማካሪ ቡድኖች ጋር በመተባበር፣ ተጠቃሚዎች በየወሩ በሚከፈል 1 ዶላር ብቻ በመመዝገብ ዶክተሮችን እንዲያገኙ የሚያስችላቸውን አገልግሎት ለማሳካት እየሞከረ ነው።
en: Via a partnership with Consultative Group to Assist the Poor, the company is testing a service that will allow users to access doctors with a monthly subscription of $1.
ha: Ta hanyar haɗa gwiwa da Consultative Group to Assist the Poor, kamfanin na gwajin wata manhaja da zata baiwa masu amfani da ita damar ganawa da likitoci ta hanyar yin rajista duk wata a dala ɗaya.
sw: Kupitia ushirikiano na Consultative Group ili kusaidia masikini, kampuni inajaribu huduma ambayo itawaruhusu watumiaji kufikia madaktari kwa usajili wa kila mwezi wa $1.
yo: Pẹ̀lú àjọṣepọ̀ rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú Consultative Group to Assist the Poor, ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ń ṣàyẹ̀wo ìpèsè kan tí yóò fún àwọn aṣàmúlò ní ànfààní sí àwọn onímọ̀ ìṣègùn pẹ̀lú àsaánlẹ̀ owó $1 lóṣooṣù.
zu: Ngokubambisana neQembu leConsultative ukuSiza abahlwemou, inkampani ihlola ukusebenza okuzovumela abasebenzisi ukuthi bangene kodokotela ngokukhokha njalo ngenyanga imali engango $1.

am: በገለልተኛነት መነፀር ሲታይ፣ ይህ ጁሚያን አሁን ካሉት የደንበኞች መሰረት እና መሠረተ ልማት ላይ ሰርፆ አንዲገባ የሚያደርግ ታላቅ እርምጃ ነው።
en: Viewed in isolation, this is a great move that could see Jumia tap into its existing customer base and infrastructure.
ha: Idan aka dubashi shi kaɗai, wannan wani babban yunƙuri ne da zai baiwa Jumia damar shiga cikin Kwastomominsu da kuma abubuwan more rayuwa.
sw: Kwa mtazamo wa mbali, hii ni hatua nzuri ambayo inaweza kuiona Jumia ikiingia kwenye msingi wa wateja na miundombinu yake iliyopo.
yo: Wíwò ó ní àdáyanrí, ìgbésẹ̀ tó dára ni eléyìí tí ó sì lè mú Jumia ṣàmúlò àwọn oníbàárà tó ti wà nílẹ̀ àti ohun amáyédẹrùn rẹ̀.
zu: Ngokubhekwa ngokwahlukana, umnyakazo omuhle kakhulu ukuthsibone iJumia ingena esizindeni samakhasimende ayo akhona kanye nengqalasizinda.

am: እንዲሁም ለነባር የጤና ጥበቃ ጀማሪ ድርጅቶች የበለጠ አስፈሪ ተወዳዳሪ መሆኑን ያሳያል።
en: It also represents a more formidable competitor for existing healthcare startups.
ha: Zai kuma wakilci ƙarin ƙaƙƙarfan abokin gasa da tsoffin kamfanonin kiwon lafiya.
sw: Pia inawakilisha mshindani mkubwa zaidi kwa mashirika ya huduma za afya.
yo: Ó tún dúró gẹ́gẹ́ bí alátakọ̀ alágbára fún àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ elétò ìlera tó ti wà tẹ́lẹ̀.
zu: Kuphinde kumele kubancintisani abasabekayo kuziqalo zokunakekelwa kwezempilo ezikhona.

am: የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት (WHO) በአንድ ሀገር ውስጥ ለ600 ሰዎች 1 ሀኪምን ቢመክርም ናይጄሪያ ግን ለ5,000 ሰዎች 1 ሀኪም ነው ያላት።
en: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends 1 doctor per 600 people in a country, but Nigeria has 1 doctor for 5,000 people.
ha: Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya, ta bada shawarar kowane likita ya kamata ya riƙa duba marasa lafiya 600 ne a ƙasa, amma a Najeriya, kowane likita yana duba mutane 5,000 ne.
sw: Shirika la afya Duniani (WHO) linapendekeza daktari 1 kwa kila watu 600 katika nchi, lakini Nigeria ina daktari 1 kwa watu 5,000.
yo: Àjọ tó ń rí sí ètò ìlera lágbàyé (WHO) dámọ́ràn onímọ̀ ìṣègùn 1 fún èèyan 600 ní orílẹ̀-èdè kan, ṣùgbọ́n orílẹ̀-ède Nàìjíríà ní onímọ̀ ìṣègùn 1 fún èèyan 5,000.
zu: Inhlangano yezempilo emhlabeni (WHO) iphakamisa udokotela oyedwa kubantu abangu 600 ezweni, kodwa eNigeria kunodokotela oyedwa kubantu abangu 5000.

am: በተጨማሪም፣ ምንም እንኳን በአፍሪካ ውስጥ የጤና ቴክኖሎጂ ኢንደስትሪ እ.ኤ.አ በ2030 አ.ም 259 ቢሊዮን ዶላር እንደሚያወጣ ቢገመትም ፣ የናይጄሪያ የህክምና ማህበር እንደዘገበው በናይጄሪያ ከተመዘገቡት 72ሺ ዶክተሮች ውስጥ 35ሺዎቹ ብቻ እየሰሩበት ይገኛሉ።
en: Furthermore, the Nigerian Medical Association reports that only 35,000 of the 72,000 registered doctors are practising in Nigeria, while the healthtech industry in Africa is projected to be worth $259 billion by 2030.
ha: Daɗin daɗawa, ƙungiyar likitoci ta ƙasa ta Najeriya, ta fidda wani rahoto daya nuna cewa likitoci 35,000 ne kaɗai daga cikin 72,000 da suke da rajista ke aiki a Najeriya. Yayinda sashin fasahar kiwon lafiya na Afrika ake masa shirin da zai kai dala biliyan $259 nan da shekara ta 2030.
sw: Kwa kuongezea, chama cha madaktari cha Nigeria kinaripoti kuwa ni daktari 35,000 tu kati ya 72,000 waliosajiliwa wanahudumu nchini Nigeria, huku sekta ya teknolojia ya kiafya barani Afrika ikikadiriwa kuwa na thamani ya Bilioni 259$ ifikapo 2030.
yo: Síwájú sí i, Ẹgbẹ́ Àwọn Òṣìṣẹ́ Elétò Ìlera lórílẹ̀-ède Nàìjíríà ròyìn pé 35,000 nínú 72,000 àwọn onímọ̀ ìṣègùn tí orúkọ wọn wà ní àkọsílẹ̀ ni wọ́n fi ń ṣiṣẹ́ ṣe ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà, nígbà tí ẹ̀ka ètò aṣètò-ìlera orí ẹ̀rọ ní ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ni wọ́n ní yóò tó $259 bílíọ̀nù ní ọdún 2030.
zu: Okungaphezu kwalokho Inhlangano yezeMpilo eNigeria ibika ukuthi abantu abangu 35000 kwabangu 72000 ababhalisele ukuba ngodokotela futhi abasebenzayo eNigeria, ngesikhathi imboni yezokunakekelwa kwezempilo eAfrika ihlose ukuba nemali engango $259 amabhiliyoni ngonyaka wezi-2030.

am: ስለዚህ እርምጃ ጥቂት ብቻ የተገለጸ ቢሆንም፣ የአካሄድ ቅየሳው ግን በአፍሪካ በጣም አስቸጋሪ ወደሆነው ዘርፍ መሆኑና ከዋና የንግድ ፈቃዱም ጋር በጥቂቱ እንኳን የማይገናኝ መሆኑ አንዳን ጥያቄዎችን ያስነሳል።
en: Although little detail was provided about the move, its foray into an area that is notoriously difficult in Africa and is not remotely related to its core business warrants some questions.
ha: Koda yake ba ayi wani bayani mai faɗi ba dangane da yunƙurin, ƙoƙarinsu na ganin sun shiga fagen da yayi ƙaurin suna da wahala a Afrika, ba kuma shida alaƙa da kasuwancin su na nesa, ya janyo alamomin tambaya.
sw: Ingawa maelezo kidogo yalitolewa kuhusu hatua hiyo, kuingia kwake katika eneo ambalo ni gumu sana barani Afrika na halihusiani kwa mbali na biashara yake kuu kunahitaji maswali kadhaa.
yo: Bó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ wí pé wọ́n pésè àlàyé díẹ̀ nípa ìgbésẹ̀ náà, títẹ́rí wọ ẹ̀ka tí ó burú gidi gan-an ní ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ tí ò dẹ̀ fi ibìkan súnmọ́ òwo rẹ̀ gangan pè fún àwọn ìbéèrè kọ̀ọ̀kan.
zu: Yize noma imininingwane emincane yanikezwa ngalomnyakazo, ukuhlaselwa kwayo kusendaweni enzima engathandeki eAfrika futhi ayihlobene nebhizinisi ngqo okuvumela imibuzo.

am: በአገሪቱ ውስጥ ያሉ የቴሌ-ጤና ጀማሪ ድርጅቶች ክሪብኤም.ዲ(CribMD)፣አይ.ዌሎ( iWello) እና ዌላሀልዝ(WellaHealth) ያካትታሉ።
en: Existing telehealth startups in the country include CribMD, iWello, and WellaHealth.
ha: Kafaffun kamfanonin sadar da ayyukan likitanci daga nesa da ake dasu a ƙasar sun haɗa da CribMD, iWello, da kuma WellaHealth.
sw: Kampuni za afya zilizopo nchini ni pamoja na CribMD, Wello, na WellaHealth.
yo: Àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ aṣètò-ìlera orí ẹ̀rọ tí wọ́n ti wà ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà ni CribMD, iWello, àti WellaHealth.
zu: Ezempilozocingo ezikhona eziyisiqalo ezweni okubandakanya iCribMD, iWello neWellaHealth.

am: የግል ኩባንያ እንደመሆናቸው ፣ መዝገቦቻቸው ብዙ ጊዜ ለሕዝብ እይታ ግልፅ ቦታ ውስጥ አይደሉም፣ ነገር ግን እ.ኤ.አ. በ2021 ከቴክ ፖይንት አፍሪካ ጋር ባደረጉት ቃለ ምልልስ፣ አይ.ዌሎ( iWello) 140 ደንበኞች እንደነበሩት ዘግቧል፣ ክሪብኤም.ዲ(CribMD) ደግሞ እ.ኤ.አ. እስከ 2021 2,800 ታካሚዎችን እንዳገለገለ ተዘግቧል።
en: As private companies, their records are often not in the public domain, but in a 2021 interview with Techpoint Africa, iWello reported that it had 140 clients, with CribMD reportedly serving 2,800 patients as of 2021.
ha: A matsayinsu na kamfanoni masu zaman kansu, babu bayanansu a ma'aikatun gwamnati. Amma a wata hira da Techpoint Africa a shekara ta 2021, iWell sun bada bayanin cewa sunada abokan hulɗa har guda 140. Yayinda wani rahoton ya nuna CribMD sunada marasa lafiya mutum 2,800 a shekarar ta 2021.
sw: Kama kampuni za kibinafsi, maranyingi rekodi zao haziko katika uwanja wa umma, lakini katika mahojiano ya 2021 na Techpoint Africa, Wello iliripoti kwamba ilikuwa na wateja 140, huku CribMD ikiripotiwa kuwahudumia wagonjwa kufikia 2021.
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ilé-iṣẹ́ aládàni, àwọn àkọsílẹ̀ wọn kì í sí ní gbàgede, ṣùgbọ́n nínú ìfọ̀rọ̀wérọ̀ ọdún 2021 pẹ̀lú Techpoint Africa, iWello sọ wí pé òún ní oníbàárà 140, nígbà tí CribMD ń ṣe ìpèsè fún àwọn aláìsàn 2,800 ní ọdún 2021.
zu: Njengezinkampani ezizimele, imibiko yabo ayijwayeleukuba sendaweni yomphakathi, kodwa ngo 2021 ingxoxo neTechpoint Afrika, iWello yabika ukuthi isibe namakhasimende angu 140, ngeCribMD kubikwa ukuthi isiza iziguli ezingu 2800 kusuka ngonyaka wezi2021.

am: የዌላሀልዝ(WellaHealth) ዋና ስራ አስፈፃሚም፣ ኩባንያው እ.ኤ.አ. በ2017 አ.ም 10ሺ ልዩ ተጠቃሚዎችን ማሳካቱን እና በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ ደግሞ በተጠባባቂ ዝርዝሩ ውስጥ መያዙንም አጋርቷል።
en: WellaHealth’s CEO also shared that the company hit 10,000 unique users in 2017, with thousands on its waitlist.
ha: Shugaban kamfanin WellaHealth shima ya bayyana cewar masu hulɗa da kamfanin na musamman sun kai mutum 10,000 , a shekarar 2017. Tare da wasu dubunnan a layin jira.
sw: Mkurugenzi mtendaji wa WellaHealth pia alishiriki kwamba kampuni ilifikia watumiaji 10,000 wa kipekee mwaka 2017, na maelfu kwenye orodha yake ya wanaosubiri.
yo: Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí WellaHealth náà tún sọ wí pé ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ti ní àwọn aṣàmúlò 10,000 ní ọdún 2017, nígbà tí àwọn ẹgbẹ̀rún ṣì wà lórí ìlà àkójọ orúkọ rẹ̀.
zu: I-CEO yaseWellaHealth iphinde yabelana ngokuthi ngokuthi inkampani ifike ku-10,000 wabasebenzisi abehlukile ngo-2017, nezinkulungwane zabantu abalindile.

am: የአፍሪካ የጤና ጥበቃ ዘርፍ እ.ኤ.አ. በ2021 አ.ም 392 ሚሊዮን ዶላር ቢሰበስብም፣ የእነዚህ ኩባንያዎች የገንዘብ ድጋፍ ከጁሚያ አንፃር በጣም ያነሰ ነው።
en: These companies are significantly less funded than Jumia, with Africa’s healthcare sector raising $392 million in 2021.
ha: Waɗannan kamfanonin a bayyane yake cewa ƙarfin jarinsu bai kai na Jumia ba. Yayinda sashen kiwon lafiya na Afrika ya tara dala miliyan $392 a shekarar 2021.
sw: Makampuni haya yanafadhiliwa kidogo zaidi kuliko Jumia, huku sekta ya afya ya kiafrika ikipata milioni 392$ mwaka 2021.
yo: Àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ yìí ò fi bẹ́ẹ̀ ní ìpèse owó púpọ̀ bíi ti Jumia, pẹ̀lú bí ẹ̀ka ètò ìlera ní ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ṣe ní àkójọ $392 mílíọ̀nù ní ọdún 2021.
zu: Lezi zinkampani kancane ukuneJumia, ngomkhakha wezokunakekelwa kwempilo waseAfrika esikhulise izigidi ezingu-$392 ngonyaka wezi-2021.

am: ሆኖም እነዚህ ኩባንያዎች የዝቅተኛ የኢንተርኔት ግንኙነት ተደራሽነትን፣ እያሽቆለቆለ ያለውን የ ቤተሰብ አባወራ ገቢን እና ለአገልግሎቱ የሚከፍሉ ደንበኞችን ለማግኘትም ሌሎች ባህላዊ ልምዶችን መዋጋት አለባቸው።
en: However, these companies have to combat low Internet penetration, dwindling household incomes, and cultural norms to get paying customers.
ha: Duk da haka,waɗannan kamfanonin dole susha fama da ƙarancin shiga yanar gizo, raguwar kuɗaɗen shiga na gidaje, da kuma ƙalubalen al'adu wajen samun abokan hulɗa da zasu biya.
sw: Hata hivyo, makampuni haya yanapaswa kupambana na ueneaji mdogo wa intaneti, kupungua kwa mapato ya kaya, na kanuni za kitamaduni ili kupata wateja wanaolipa.
yo: Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ yìí ní láti kojú àdínkù wíwọ orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára, ìjẹrodò owó oṣù àwọn ẹbí, àti àwọn ìṣesí àṣà láti rí oníbàárà tó ń sanwó.
zu: Kepha ke lezi zinkampani kumele zilwele ukungena ku inthanethi okuncane, ukunciphisa imali engenayo emakhaya, izimiso zamasiko ukuze bathole amakhasimende akhokhayo.

am: በተጨማሪም፣ ጁሚያ በጤና ጥበቃ ዘርፍ የሚሰሩ ምንም አይነት ባለሞያዎች የሉትም እናም ይህ ስራ ስኬታማ እንዲሆን ከንደገና የትምህርት መንገድ ውስጥ ማለፍ ይኖርበታል።
en: Additionally, Jumia has no expertise operating in the healthcare sector and would likely have to go through a learning curve for this venture to succeed.
ha: Daɗin daɗawa, Jumia basu da gogewa a harkar gudanarda kula da kiwon lafiya, da yiyuwar dole sai sun shiga matakin koyo idan suna son nasarar wannan yunƙuri.
sw: Zaidi ya hayo, Jumia haina utaalamu katika sekta ya afya na italazimika kupitia mkondo wa kujifunza ili mradi huu ufanikiwe.
yo: Ní àfikún, Jumia ò ní àwọn akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ tó ń ṣiṣẹ́ ní ẹ̀ka ètò ìlera yóó sì nílò láti gba ẹ̀kọ́ ìdàgbàsókè láti jẹ́ kí ẹ̀ka yìí ní àṣeyọrí.
zu: Ukwengeza uJumia akanabo ongoti abasebenza emkhakheni wezokunakekelwa kwezempilo abangadlula ekushintsheni kokufunda ukuze abakwenzayo kuphumelele.

am: ልምድ ያላቸው ባለሙያዎችን የመቅጠር ምርጫ ቢኖራቸውም ፣ ነገር ግን ነገሮች ወዲያውኑ እንዳሰቡት ላይሄዱ ይችላሉ።
en: Even with the option of hiring experienced professionals, things will probably not go their way immediately.
ha: Duk da akwai damar da zasu iya ɗaukar ƙwararrun ma'aikata, abubuwa ba zasu gudanar musu yanda suke so ba cikin sauri.
sw: Hata kwa chaguo la kuajiri wataalamu wenye uzoefu, labda punde mambo hayatawaendea sawa.
yo: Kódà pẹ̀lú ànfààní láti gba àwọn akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ tó ní ìrìrí, nǹkan lè má bọ̀ sójú ẹ̀ lẹ́sẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ fún wọn.
zu: Ngisho nombono wokuqasha izifundiswa ezinesipiliyoni, izinto mhlampe ngeke zihambe ngendlela yabo zisuka nje.

am: የጤና ጥበቃ ዘርፉ የተበታተነ አይነት ተፈጥሮው ነባር ተጫዋቾች የሚያጋጥማቸው ሌላው ፈተና ነው።
en: The fragmented nature of the healthcare space is another challenge that existing players face.
ha: Gajeren yanayin da sashen harkar lafiya keda shi, shima wani ƙalubale ne da masu taka rawa a fagen ke fuskanta.
sw: Hali ya kugawanyika kwa Healthcare ni changamoto nyengine ambayo wadau waliopo wanakabiliana nayo.
yo: Ìpínsísọ̀rí ẹ̀ka ètò ìlera jẹ́ ìpèníjà míràn tí àwọn tó ti wà nínú ẹ̀ ń dojúkọ.
zu: Indalo yeziqephu yendawo ezokunakekelwa kwempilo enye ingqinamba abadlali abakhona ababhekana nayo.

am: ለምሳሌ፣ በጣት የሚቆጠሩ ሆስፒታሎች ብቻ ናቸው የዲጂታል መዛግብት ያላቸው እናም የመዝገቡን መረጃ የሚያጋሩት ደግሞ ከዛም ያነሱ ናቸው።
en: For example, there are only a handful of hospitals with digitised records and even fewer still that share this information.
ha: A misali, ƴan asibitoci ƙalilan ne suke da bayanai a kwamfiyuta, kuma kaɗan ne acikinsu suma ke iya yaɗa waɗannan bayanan.
sw: Kwa mfano, kuna hospitali chache tu zilizo na rekodi za kidigitali na bado ni chache ambazo zinashiriki taarifa hii.
yo: Fún àpẹrẹ, àwọn ilé ìwòsan tí ò tó ǹkan ni wọ́n ní àkọsílẹ̀ àkósódù díẹ̀ nínú wọn ló sì ń pín àkọsílẹ̀ yìí.
zu: Isibonelo kukhona izibhendlela ezinomsebenzi omningi namarekhodi angedijithali futhi ngisho nezimbalwa zisabelana ngalolulwazi.

am: ይህ የጤና ቴክኖሎጂ ጀማሪ ድርጅቶች መፍትሄዎችን ለዚህ ዓላማ ሲሉ መገንባታቸውን አስገዳጅ ያደርገዋል።
en: This makes it imperative that healthtech startups build solutions for this purpose.
ha: Wannan yasa yake da matuƙar muhimmanci ga sabbin kamfanonin kiwon lafiya ta hanyar fasaha su samo mafita ga wannan sana'a tasu.
sw: Hii inafanya kuwa muhimu kwamba wanaoanzisha teknolojia ya afya watengeneze masuluhisho kwa madhumuni haya.
yo: Èyí ló sọ ọ́ di pàtàkì pé kí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ aṣètò-ìlera orí ẹ̀rọ wá ọ̀nà àbáyọ fún èyí.
zu: Lokhu kwenza kuphoqe ukuthi iziqalo zokunakekelwa kwezempilo zakhe izixazululo zalenjongo.

am: አጋርነት ለውጤታማ የጤና ጥበቃ ሲባል መገንባት
en: Building partnerships for effective healthcare
ha: Kafa haɗin gwiwa don samar da ingantaccen sashen kula da lafiya.
sw: Kujenga ushirikiano kwa ajili ya huduma bora za afya.
yo: Ṣíṣe àjọṣepọ̀ fún ètò ìlera tó ń ṣiṣẹ́
zu: Ukwakha ukubambisana okuzosebenza kahle kwezokunakekelwa kwezempilo

am: ምንም እንኳ እነዚህ በጁሚያ የጤና ቴክኖሎጂ ዕቅዶች ላይ ተግዳሮቶችን ሊፈጥሩ ቢችሉም፣የሳላይንት አማካሪ ድርጅት ከፍተኛ አማካሪ የሆነው 'ዮሚ ካዚም' ፣ ጁሚያ ስኬታማ ለመሆን የሚያስፈልገው ነገር እንዳለው ያምናል፣ በተለይም ደሞ አጋሮቹ በቀየሱት መንገድ የሚሄድ ከሆነ።
en: While these could pose challenges to Jumia’s healthtech plans, Yomi Kazeem, Senior Consultant, Salient Advisory, believes that Jumia has what it takes to succeed, especially if it goes the partnership route.
ha: Duk da cewa waɗannan abubuwan zasu iya kawo tarnaƙi ga yunƙurin Jumia na tsarin fasahar kiwon lafiya,Yomi Kazeem, wani ƙwararren masani a Salient Advisory, ya ce yayi imani cewa Jumia suna da abubuwa da ake buƙata don cimma nasara, musamman ma idan sun bi ta hanyar haɗin gwiwa.
sw: Ingawa haya yanaweza kuleta changamoto kwa mipango ya teknolojia ya afya ya Jumia, Yomi Kazeem, Mshauri mkuu, na mshauri muhimu, anaamini kuwa Jumia ina kila kinachohitajika kufanikiwa, hususani kama itafuata njia ya ushirikiano.
yo: Nígbà tí àwọn nǹkan wọ̀nyí lè jẹ́ ìpèníjà fún ìpinnu iṣètò-ìlera orí ẹ̀rọ Jumia, Yomi Kazeem, Olùbánidámọ́ràn Àgbà, Olùbánidámọ́ràn Pàtàkì, gbàgbọ́ wí pé Jumia ní gbogbo ohun tó nílò láti ṣe àṣeyọrí, pàápàá jùlọ tó bá tọ ìlànà àjọṣepọ̀.
zu: Ngesikhathi lokhu kungaveza inkingaezinhlelweni zikaJumia kwezokunakekelwa kwezempilo, uYomi Kazeem, uMeluleki oMkhulu, iSeleleko esibalulekile, ukholelwa ukuthi iJumia inawo amandla okuphumelela, ikakhulukazi uma ihamba ngomgudu wokubambisana.

am: ከቴክ ፖይንት አፍሪካ ጋር ባደረገውም ውይይት፣ “ጁሚያ የጤና ቴክኖሎጅ ጨዋታውን ምርመራውን ለማሳለጥ እንዲችል አጋሮቹን በማስፋት በይበልጥ መገንባት ይችላል።
en: In a chat with Techpoint Africa, he said, “Jumia can potentially build out its healthtech play through more partnerships to facilitate diagnostics.
ha: A wata ganawa da Techpoint Africa, ya bayyana cewar "Jumia zasu iya kafa tsarin fasahar kiwon lafiya daga nesa nasu, ta hanyar ƙarin haɗin gwiwa don sauƙaƙa bincike.
sw: Katika mazungumzo na Techpoint Africa, alisema, "Jumia inaweza kuunda uchezaji wake wa healthtech kupitia ushirikiano zaidi ili kuwezesha uchunguzi.
yo: Nínú ìfọ̀rọ̀wérọ̀ pẹ̀lú Techpoint Africa, ó ní, "Jumia lè ṣẹ̀dá ètò ìlera orí ẹ̀rọ tirẹ̀ nípasẹ̀ àjọṣepọ̀ púpọ̀ láti mú ìrọ̀rùn bá àyẹ̀wò ṣíṣe.
zu: Ngesikhathi sikhuluma neTechpoint Africa, uthe, iJumia inawo amandla okwakha ezobuchwepheshebezempilo kwayo ngokuba nababambisani abaningi abazobheka ukuthi konke kuhamba kahle.

am: እንዲሁም ከፋርማሲዎች ጋር በመተባበር፣ የሎጂስቲክስ አውታረ መረቡን በመጠቀም እና የመድሃኒት አቅርቦትን ደሞ ከቴሌ-መድሃኒት አገልግሎቱ ጋር በማጣመር ህመምተኞች ከርቀት ሀኪሞችን ማነጋገር ብቻ ሳይሆን አስፈላጊውን መድሃኒት ያለችግር እንዲቀበሉ ለማድረግ ያስችለዋል።
en: It can also partner with pharmacies, leverage its logistics network, and pair medication delivery with its telemedicine service, so patients are not only speaking to doctors remotely but also receiving needed medication seamlessly.
ha: Zasu kuma iya haɗa hannu da shagunan saida magunguna, suyi amfani da kayan aikin sadarwar su, ta hanyar haɗa kai magani da kuma gabatar da ayyukan likitanci ta nesa, Ta yanda bazai zamana marasa lafiya zasu gana da likita ne kawai daga nesa ba, a a, ya zamana ma zasu iya samun maganin da suke buƙata ba tare da wata matsala ba.
sw: Pia inaweza kushirikiana na maduka ya dawa, kuimarisha mtandao wake wa vifaa, na kuoanisha utoaji wa dawa na huduma yake ya telemedicine, hivyo wagonjwa hawazungumzi tu na madaktari kwa mbali lakini pia wanapokewa dawa zinazohitajika bila changamoto.
yo: Ó tún lè dòwòpọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn ilé ìtàjà òògùn, gbáralé ojú òpó ìfiǹkanránṣẹ́ rẹ̀, kó sì so fífi òògùn ránṣẹ́ pọ̀ mọ́ ìpèsè ètò ìlera orí ẹ̀rọ rẹ̀, tí kò ní jẹ́ wí pé àwọn aláìsàn yóò ma bá àwọn onímọ̀ ìṣègùn sọ̀rọ̀ lórí ẹ̀rọ nìkan ṣùgbọ́n tí wọn ó máa gba àwọn òògùn tí wọ́n nílò pẹ̀lú ìrọ̀rùn.
zu: Ingabambisana futhi namakhemisi, ibambise ngelojistikhi yohlelokuxhumana,futhi ihalnganise ukuhanjiswa kwemithi ngokusebenza kwemithi yocingo,ngakho iziguli azikhulumi nodokotela kuphela kodwa futhi bathola imithi yabo ngendlela elula.

am: "ይህ አካሄድ በጣም አስፈላጊ ነው ምክንያቱም ፣በመጨረሻም እኮ ፣ ምክር ማግኘት የጤና ጥበቃ አንድ አካል ብቻ ነው።
en: “This approach is important because, ultimately, providing access to consultations is only one part of healthcare.
ha: Wannan sigar tana da muhimmanci, saboda gaba ɗaya idan muka ɗauka, bada damar gani da likita wani ɓangare ne guda ɗaya na harkar kiwon lafiya.
sw: "Njia hii ni muhimu kwa sababu, hatimae, hutoa ufikiaji wa mashauriano ni sehemu moja tu ya huduma ya afya.
yo: Ìgbésẹ̀ yìí ṣe pàtàkì nítorí, nígbẹ́yìn, ìpèsè ànfààní sí ìfojúrinjú jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára ẹ̀ka ètò ìlera.
zu: Le ndlela ibalulekile ngoba, ekugcineni ukunikeza ukukwazi ukungena ekuxhumaneni iyona kuphela indlela yokunakekelwa kwezempilo.

am: ከእነዚህ ብዙ ኩባንያዎች ብቅ ማለት ጋር ተያይዞ፣ የተጠቃሚዎችም ግዢ የበለጠ ተወዳዳሪ ሆኗል።
en: With more of these companies emerging, user acquisition becomes more competitive.
ha: Idan aka samu irin waɗannan kamfanonin suka kafu, samun masu amfani dasu zai haifar da gasa.
sw: Pamoja na kampuni hizi nyingi kuibuka, upatikanaji wa watumiaji unakuwa wa ushindani zaidi.
yo: Pẹ̀lú bí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ yìí ṣe ń jáde, níní àwọn aṣàmúlò yóò túbọ̀ máa le sí i.
zu: Ngalezizinkampani eziningi ezivelayo, ukuzuza kwabasebenzisi kuba umncintiswano.

am: በመሠረቱ ፣ ለታካሚዎች ሰፋ ያለ ተደራሽነትን የሚያመቻቹ የሶስተኛ ወገን አጋሮችም ወሳኝ ናቸው።"
en: In essence, third-party partnerships that facilitate access to patients on a larger scale are vital.”
ha: Muhimmi dai, haɗin gwiwa da wani ɓangare zai sauƙaƙa haɗuwa da marasa lafiya masu yawa yanada matuƙar muhimmanci.
sw: Kimsingi, Ushirikiano wa wahusika watatu ambao unawezesha upatikanaji wa wagonjwa kwa kiwango kikubwa ni muhimu"
yo: Ní pàtàkì, àjọṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú alàgàta tó ń fúni ní ànfààní sí àwọn aláìsàn lọ́pọ̀ pẹ̀lú ìrọ̀rùn ṣe pàtàkì.
zu: Ngalokhu, ukubambisana nabantu besithathu okubheka ukungena ezigulini ngezinga eliphezulu kubalulekile

am: ካሉት የጤና ቴክኖሎጂ ተጫዋቾች በተለየ መልኩ፣ ጁሚያ በሶስተኛ ወገን አቅራቢዎች ላይ ጥገኛ ከሆኑ ጀማሪዎች በበለጠ ፍጥነት መድሃኒቶችን ለማቅረብ የሚረዳው የተቋቋመ የሎጂስቲክስ አገልግሎት አለው።
en: Unlike existing healthtech players, Jumia has an established logistics service that could help it deliver medications faster than startups that have to depend on third-party providers.
ha: Ba kamar kamfanonin fasahar kiwon lafiya da ake dasu ba, Jumia suna da rantsatstsun dabarun aiki da zasu taimaka musu gudanar da harkokin kiwon lafiya cikin sauri fiye da sabbin kamfanonin da sun dogara ne da tallafawar wani.
sw: Tofauti na wadau waliopo wa teknolojia ya afya, Jumia ina huduma iliyoanzishwa ya vifaa ambavyo inaweza kusaidia kutoa dawa kwa haraka kuliko zinazoanza ambazo zinapaswa kutegemea watoa huduma wengine.
yo: Yàtọ̀ sí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ aṣètò ìlera orí ẹ̀rọ tó ti wà tẹ́lẹ̀, Jumia ní ìpèsè ìbánifiǹkanránṣẹ́ tó lè ràn-án lọ́wọ́ láti bá a fi òògùn ránṣẹ́ kíákíá yàtọ̀ sí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ tí wọ́n ní láti gbáralé alàgàta.
zu: Akufani nabadlali abakhona bezobuchwepheshebezempilo,uJumia usakhe umsebenzi onengqondo ongasiza ukuhambisa imithi ngokushesha ukuneziqalo okumele zincike kubanikezeli bosizo besithathu.

am: ይህ ጁሚያ ወደ ገበያቸው ሊገባ ይችላል ማለት ቢሆንም፣ ለጁሚያ አንድ ተጨማሪ የገቢ ምንጭ ዥረት እየከፈቱ ቢሆንም እንኳን የጤና ቴክኖሎጂ አገልግሎቶችን በሀገሪቱ ለማስፋፋት ጥሩ እድል ይሰጣል።
en: While this means Jumia could potentially cut into their market, it also presents an opportunity to expand healthtech services in the country while unlocking one more revenue stream for Jumia.
ha: A yayinda hakan ke nufin Jumia nada ƙwanjin kurdawa cikin kasuwa, zai kuma basu wata dama ta faɗaɗa ayyukansu na fasahar kiwon lafiya afaɗin ƙasa, alokaci guda kuma an ƙara samun wata hanyar tara rabanu ga Jumia.
sw: Ingawa hii inamaanisha kuwa Jumia inaweza kuingia katika soko lao, pia inatoa fursa ya kupanua huduma za teknolojia ya afya nchini huku ikifungua mkondo mwengine wa mapato kwa Jumia.
yo: Nígbà tí èyí túmọ̀ sí wí pé Jumia le já wọ ọjàa wọn, ó tún ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ànfààní láti fẹ ìpèsè ètò ìlera lójú sí i ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà nígbà tí wọn ó tùn ṣí ojú òpó ìpawówọlé kan sí i fún Jumia.
zu: Ngesikhathi lokhu kusho ukuthi uJumia angakwazi ukungena emakethe, kuphinde kuveze nethuba lokwandisa umsebenzi wezobuchwepheshe bezempilo ezweni ngesikhathi kuvulwa omunye umnyombo wengenisonzuzo kuJumia.

am: ለምሳሌ ፣የጤና ቴክኖሎጂ ጀማሪዎች፣ ከጁሚያ ጋር በመተባበር ፈጣን እና ቀልጣፋ አገልግሎት መስጠት ይችላሉ።
en: Healthtech startups, for example, can provide faster and more efficient services by partnering with Jumia.
ha: Sabbin kamfanonin kiwon lafiya, a misali, zasu fi samar da gamsashshen tsari kuma mai sauri idan suka haɗa gwiwa da Jumia.
sw: Kwa mfano, waanzishaji wa Healthlane, wanaweza kutoa huduma za haraka na bora zaidi kwa kushirikiana na Jumia.
yo: Àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ aṣètò-ìlera orí ẹ̀rọ, fún àpẹrẹ, lè pèse iṣẹ́ tó yára tó sì tún tó nípa àjọṣepọ̀ ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú Jumia.
zu: Iziqalo zokunakekelwa kwezempilo, isibonelo zinganikezela ngokushesha futhi zenze kahle umsebenzi ngokubambisana neJumia.

am: እንደዚህ አይነት አጋርነትም ለጁሚያ በአመዛኙ ትልቅ ከሆነው የደንበኞች መሰረት ውስጥ ሊያቆራኛቸው ይችላል።
en: Such partnerships could also expose them to Jumia’s considerably larger customer base.
ha: Irin waɗannan haɗin gwiwar zasu basu damar haɗuwa da abokan hulɗar Jumia masu ɗimbin yawa.
sw: Ushirikiano kama huo unaweza pia kuwaweka wazi kwa wateja wengi zaidi wa Jumia.
yo: Irú àjọṣepọ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀ tún lè ṣí ojú wọn sí ẹgbẹ̀lẹ́gbẹ̀ àwọn oníbàárà Jumia.
zu: Ukubambisana okunjena kungabaveza kuJumia mhlampe esizindeni esikhulu samakhasimende.

am: የዚህ አይነት አጋርነት ምሳሌ የሚሆነው 'ኤይርቴል ኬኒያ' ከ'ማይዳዋ' ጋር ያደረጉት ሲሆን፣ ይህም በኬንያ ካለው የበይነ መረብ ላይ በቀጥታ የሚገኘው ፋርማሲ'ማይዳዋ' ውስጥ የኤይርቴል ደንበኞጪ የውሂብ ወጪ ሳይከፍሉ ወደ 'ማይዳዋ' ድረ-ገጽ እንዲገቡ የሚያስችል ሲሆን ፣ ማይዳዋ ደግሞ ለሚገዙ ምርቶች በኤይርቴል ገንዝብ መክፈል የሚያስችል የመክፈያ አማራጭን ይሰጣል።
en: An example of such a partnership is Airtel Kenya’s partnership with MyDawa, an online pharmacy in Kenya that allows Airtel’s customers log into the MyDawa website without incurring data costs while MyDawa provides an option to pay for products with Airtel Money.
ha: Misali irin wannan haɗin gwiwar shine, haɗin gwiwar kamfanin sadarwa na Airtel Kenya da kamfanin MyDawa, wani shagon saida magunguna ta intanet, wanda ya baiwa Kwastomomin Airtel damar shiga shafin intanet na MyDawa ba tare da data ba, yayinda shi kuma MyDawa ya basu damar biyan kayansa da kuɗin layin Airtel.
sw: Mfano wa ushirikiano huo ni ushirikiano wa Airtel Kenya na MyDawa, duka la dawa la mtandaoni nchini Kenya ambalo linawaruhusu wateja wa Airtel kwenye tovuti ya MyDawa bila kulipia gharama za data huku MyDawa ikitoa chaguo la kulipia bidhaa kwa Airtel Money.
yo: Àpẹẹrẹ irú àjọṣepọ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀ ni àjọṣepọ̀ Airtel orílẹ̀-ède Kenya pẹ̀lú MyDawa, ilé ìtajà òògùn orí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára ní orílẹ̀-èdè Kenya tí ó ń fún àwọn oníbàárà Airtel ní ànfààní láti forúkọsílẹ̀ wọ ibùdó ìtàkùn MyDawa láìlo dátà, nígbà tí MyDawa máa pèsè ànfààní láti sanwó fún àwọn ohun-èlò pẹ̀lú Airtel Money.
zu: Isibonelo sokubambisana okunjalo ukubambisana kwe AirtelKenya neMydawa, ikhemesi le inthanethi eKenya elivumela amakhasimende aka Airtel ukuthi angene kuwebusayithi yeMyDawa ngaphandle kokulahleka kokubiza kwemininingo ngesikhathi iMyDawa ikukhethisa ukukhokhela imikhiqizo ngeAirtel Money.

am: በኮቪድ-19 ወረርሽኝ ምንም ያክል ቢበረታታም እንኳ ፣ የጤና ቴክኖሎጂ ጅምር ድርጅቶች የአፍሪካን የጤና ጥበቃ ፍላጎቶች ከማሟላት አንፃር አሁንም በጣም ሩቅ መንገድ ይቀረዋል።
en: Despite being boosted by the COVID-19 pandemic, healthtech startups are still a long way from meeting Africa’s healthcare needs.
ha: Duk da samun cigaba da annobar Covid-19 ta haifar, sabbin kamfanonin kiwon lafiya ta hanyar fasaha har yanzu sunada jan aiki a gabansu wajen cimma muradun Afrika.
sw: Licha ya kuimarishwa na janga la UVIKO 19, uanzishaji wa teknolojia ya afya bado uko mbali kukidhi mahitaji ya kiafya ya Afrika.
yo: Pẹ̀lú wí pé àjàkálẹ̀ ààrùn COVID-19 ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún-un, àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ àdìdeelẹ̀ aṣètò-ìlera orí ẹ̀rọ ṣì jìnà réré sí pípésè àwọn ohun tí ètò ìlera ní ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ nílò.
zu: Ngaphandle kokunyuswa yiCOVID 19 iziqalo zezobuchwepheshe bezempilo zisenendlela ende yokuhlangabezana nezidingo zezokunakekelwa kwezempilo eAfrika.

am: ሆኖም ግን፣ እንደዚህ ያሉ አጋርነቶች ወደፊት ለመሄድ ቁልፍ ሊሆኑ ይችላሉ።
en: However, partnerships such as this could be key going forward.
ha: Duk da haka, haɗaka irin wannan zata zamo mabuɗin cigaba.
sw: Hata hivyo, ushirikiano kama huu unaweza kuwa muhimu kwa maendeleo.
yo: Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, àwọn àjọṣepọ̀ bí èyí lè ṣe pàtàkì lọ́jọ́ iwájú.
zu: Kepha ukubambisana okunjengalokhu kungaba okubalulekile ukuqhubekela phambili.

am: ሲምለስኤች.አር (SeamlessHR)፣ የጌትስ ፋውንዴሽን በናይጄሪያ ላሉ ሰራተኞች ለሰሩት ስራ ለሚያገኙት ደመወዝ የተደራሽነት መፍትሄ አወጣ።
en: SeamlessHR, Gates Foundation Roll Out Earned Wage Access Solution for Workers in Nigeria
ha: Kamfanin SeamlessHR da Gidauniyar Bill Gates sunzo da tsarin hanyoyin samun albashi ga ma'aikata a Najeriya.
sw: SeamlessHR, Gates Foundation zinatoa suluhisho la ufikiaji wa mshahara uliopatikana kwa wafanyakazi nchini Nigeria
yo: SeamlessHR, Gates Foundation Ti Ṣe Àgbéjáde Ọ̀nà Àbáyọ Earned Wage Access fún Àwọn Òṣìṣẹ́ ní Orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà.
zu: ISeamlessHR, iGates Foundation yethula isombululo i-Earned Wage Access yabasebenzi baseNigeria

am: በአፍሪካ ግንባር ቀደሙ የደመወዝ አከፋፈል እና የሰው ሃብት ቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያ ሲምለስስ የሰው ሀብት፣ ከ 'ቢል' እና 'ሜሊንዳ ጌትስ' ፋውንዴሽን ጋር በመተባበር 'ብሬዝ ከፋይ' በተባለው በአዲስ የቴክኖሎጂ መፍትሄ ፣ የመስክ ላይ ሰራተኞችን ደህንነት እና ምርታማነት ማሳደግ ላይ ለመወያየት በናይጄሪያ ከፍተኛ ማእረግ ያላቸውን የመስክ ላይ ሰራተኞችን ቀጣሪዎችን በብቸኝነት በአይነቱ በተለየ መድረክ ላይ አስተናግዷል።
en: Africa’s leading payroll and HR technology company, SeamlessHR, in collaboration with the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, recently hosted the top echelon of employers of blue-collar workers in Nigeria in an exclusive event to discuss the optimisation of blue-collar employee welfare and productivity through a new technology solution, Breeze Payer.
ha: Kamfanin dake gaba-gaba wajen tsara hanyar biyan albashi da harkar fasahar HR, SeamlessHR, tare da haɗin gwiwar Gidauniyar Bill and Melinda Gates, a baya-bayan nan sun shirya wani taron ƙasa na leburori a wani gagarumin taro don tattauna yanda za a kyautata walwalar leburori, da kuma gudanarda aiki ta hanyar sabuwar manhaja mai laƙabin Breeze Payer.
sw: Kampuni inayoongoza barani Afrika ya mishahara na teknolojia ya HR, SeamlessHR, kwa ushirikiano wa Bill na Melinda Gates Foundation, hivi karibuni iliikaribisha safu ya juu ya waajiri wa wafanyakazi wa blue collar nchini Nigeria katika ghafla ya kipekee kujadili uboreshaji kupitia suluhisho la teknolojia mpya, Breeze Prayer.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ onímọ̀ ẹ̀rọ ìsanwọ́ iṣẹ́ àti HR tó ń léwájú nílẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀, SeamlessHR, ní àjọṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, gbàlejò àwọn lọ́gàlọ́gà nínú àwọn tó ń gba àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ agbára ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà láìpẹ́ yìí níbi ètò àdáṣe kan láti sọ̀rọ̀ nípa Ìdàgbàsókè ìgbáyégbádùn àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ agbára àti ìmúrasíṣẹ́ nípasẹ̀ ọ̀nà àbáyọ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ, Breeze Payer.
zu: Uhla lokuholela oluhamba phambili eAfrika nenkampani yezobuchwepheshe beHR, iSeamlessHR ngokubambisana neBill and Melinda Gates Foundation isanda kusingatha umcimbi ophezulu wabasebenzi babasebenzi bekhola eluhlaza eNigeria emcimbini okhethekile ukuxoxa ngezindaba zabasebenzi bokhola oluhlaza nomkhiqizo ngezobuchwepheshe ezintsha zezixazululo, iBreeze Payer.

am: ከ ሰቨን.አፕ የለስላሳ ጠርሙስ አምራች ኩባንያ(7up Bottling Company)፣ ጊነስ ናይጄሪያ(Guinness Nigeria)፣ ላፋሬጅ ሲሚንቶ(Lafarge Cement)፣ ጁሊየስ በርገር(Julius Berger)፣ ቧ ሲሚንቶ(Bua Cement)፣የተባበሩት የአፍሪካ ኩባንያ በናይጄሪያ (የተ.አ.ኩ.ና፣UACNእና እና ሌሎችም የስራ አስፈፃሚዎች አሳታፊ በሆነው የእርስ በርስ የውይይት መድረክ ላይ የተሳተፉ ሲሆን፣ እናም በጌትስ ፋውንዴሽን ተወካዮች እና በ ሲምለስስ የሰው ሀብት የመሪ ቡድን ተወካዮች በተመራውም አነቃቂ እና እውቀት ሰጪ ውይይት ላይ ፣ በአፍሪካ የሰው ሃብት ላይ የሚያጋጥሙትን አንገብጋቢ ተግዳሮቶች በተለይም፣ የሰራተኞች ደህንነትን ማሻሻል እና ምርታማነትን ማጎልበት ላይ የተገኙን አዲስ በቴክኖሎጂ የተደገፉ መፍትሄዎች መዳሰስ ተችሏል።
en: Executives from 7up Bottling Company, Guinness Nigeria, Lafarge Cement, Julius Berger, Bua Cement, UACN and others engaged in an interactive session and also participated in a fireside chat led by representatives of the Gates Foundation and the leadership team at SeamlessHR exploring innovative solutions to the pressing challenges faced by Africa’s workforce, specifically unveiling employee welfare improvement and productivity enhancement technology-driven solution.
ha: Masu gudanarwa daga Kamfanonin 7up Bottling Company, Guinness Nigeria, Lafarge Cement, Julius Berger,Bua Cement, UACN da sauransu ne suka shiga zaman tattaunawar, haka kuma sun sake shiga hirar jin ɗimi da wakilai daga Gidauniyar Bill Gates suka jagoranta, da kuma shugabanci a SeamlessHR, don samo hanyoyin warware matsalolin da ma'aikata ke fuskanta a Afrika, musamman kyautata walwala da jin daɗin ma'aikaci, da kuma inganta tsarin gudanarda aiki ta hanyar amfani da hanyoyin fasaha.
sw: Watendaji kutoka kampuni ya 7up Bottling, Guinness Nigeria, Lafarge Cement, Julius Berger, Bua Cement, UACN na wengine walishiriki katika kikao cha maingiliano na pia walishiriki katika gumzo la moto lililoongozwa na wawakilishi wa Gates Foundation na timu ya uongozi ya SeamlessHR wakiangazia suluhisho la ubunifu katika changamoto kubwa zinazowakabili wafanyakazi wa Afrika, hususani kufichua uboreshaji wa ustawi na wafanayakazi na suluhisho la uboreshaji wa uzalishaji linaloendeshwa kiteknolojia.
yo: Àwọn aláṣẹ láti ilé-iṣẹ́ 7up Bottling Company, Guinness Nigeria, Lafarge Cement, Julius Berger, Bua Cement, UACN àti àwọn tí ó kù kópa nínú sáà ìjírórò wọ́n sì tún kópa nínú ìfọ̀rọ̀jẹ̀wọ̀ọ́ tí àwọn aṣojú Gates Foundation àti àwọn adarí ikọ̀ SeamlessHR léwájú rẹ̀ tí wọ́n ń wá àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ onímọ̀ ọ̀tun sí àwọn ìpèníjà ojúẹsẹ̀ tó ń kojú àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ nílẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀, pàápàá jùlọ ṣíṣíṣọ lójú ọ̀nà àbáyọ onímọ̀ ẹ̀rọ fún ìdàgbàsókè ìgbàyègbádùn àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ àti àtìlẹ́yìn iṣẹ́ ṣíṣe.
zu: Abaphathi be-7up Bottling Company, eGuiness Nigeria, Lafarge Cement, Julius Berger, Bua Cement, UACN nabanye bakhuluma kuseshini okwakukhuluma bonke futhi babamba iqhaza engxoxweni eyayivutha eyayiholwa ngabameli beGates Foundation neqembu lobuholi beSeamlessHR bebheka izixazululo ezintsha kulezizingqinamba eziyinkinga ezibhekene nabasebenzayo eAfrika, okukhethekile ukuveza izindaba zokuthuthuka zomsebenzi nokwengeza kumkhiqizo wesixazululo esiholwa ezobuchwepheshe.

am: በውይይቱ ላይ፣ ሲምለስስ የሰው ሀብት እንደ 'ሰራተኞች የሰሩበት ደሞዝ ተደራሽነት' ባሉ መፍትሄዎች አማካኝነት በሰራተኞቻቸው መካከል ያለውን ችሎታ እና ብቃት ተንከባክቦ ማቆየት የሚያስችልን፣ ለቀጣሪዎች በጣም ጠቃሚ የስልክ ላይ መተግበሪያ የሆነውን 'ብሬዝ ከፋይ'ን አቅርቧል።
en: At the engagement, SeamlessHR unveiled Breeze Payer, a cutting-edge application for employers that will enable drive talent retention among their employees through solutions like Earned Wage Access.
ha: A wajen tattaunawar, SeamlessHR sun gabatar da manhajar Breeze Payer, wata sabuwar manhajar masu kamfanoni, wacce zata basu damar ganowa da riƙe masu baiwa acikin ma'aikatan su, ta hanyar mafita kamar irin ta Earned Wage Access.
sw: Katiaka uchumba hio, SeamlessHR ilizindua Breeze Payer, maombi ya kisasa kwa waajiri ambayo yatawezesha uhifadhi wa talanta miongoni mwa wafanyakazi wao kupitia suluhu kama vile Earned Wage Access.
yo: Níbi ìfọ̀rọ̀wérọ̀ náà, SeamlessHR ṣàfihàn Breeze Payer, ohun-èlò tuntun fún àwọn agbanisíṣẹ́ tí yóò jẹ́ àtìlẹ́yìn fún ẹ̀bùn níní láàrín àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ nípasẹ̀ àwọn ọ̀nà àbáyọ bíi Earned Wage Access.
zu: Esivumelwaneni iSeamlessHR iveze iBreeze Payer, isisetshenziswa esihamba phambili kubasebenzi esizokwazi ukuqhubeka nogqozi lwethalente phakathi kwabasebenzi ngezixazululo ezinjengo Earned Wage Access.

am: ይህ መድረክ፣ የመስክ ላይ ሰራተኞችን አሰሪዎች የተቀጣሪዎቹን ደሞዛቸውን በብቃት እንዲያስተዳድሩ፣ የደመወዝ እና ጥቅማጥቅም ክፍያን እንዲያመቻቹ እና የሰው ሃይላቸውን ከገንዘብ ዝውውር እሴት-ጨማሪ አገልግሎቶች ገበያ ጋር እንዲያገናኙ ያስችላቸዋል።
en: This platform enables employers of blue-collar workers to efficiently manage their payroll, facilitate salary and wage disbursements, and connect their workforce to the market of financial value-adding services.
ha: Wannan manhaja zata baiwa masu ɗaukar leburori damar su gudanar da tsarin biyan kuɗinsu yanda ya kamata, zata sauƙaƙe biyan albashi, za kuma ta haɗa ma'aikatansu da kasuwar hidimar ƙarin darajar kuɗaɗe.
sw: Jukwaa hili huwawezesha waajiri wa wafanyakazi wa kampuni ya blue collar kusimamia vyema mishahara yao, kuwezesha malipo na ulipaji wa mishahara, na kuunganisha wafanyakazi wao kwenye masoko ya huduma za kuongeza thamani ya kifedha.
yo: Ìkànnì náà fún àwọn tó ń gba àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ agbára síṣẹ́ ní ànfààní láti ṣàmójútó ìwé ìsanwó wọn dáadáa, ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún sísan owó oṣù àti owó iṣẹ́, kí wọ́n sì so àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ wọn pọ̀ mọ́ ọjà ìpèsè ìsúná apèsè-ànfààní .
zu: Le nkundla ivumela abasebenzi babasebenzi bakhola oluhlaza ukuthi baphathe kahle uhlankokhelo lwabo, babheke umholo nezinkokhelo zemiholo, nokuxhumanisa umsebenzi wabo nezimakethe zemisebenzi yokkwengeza inani lwezezimali.

am: የጠረጴዛው ዋና መፍትሄ፣ ሰራተኞች ከደመወዝ ቀን በፊት ደመወዛቸውን እንዲያገኙ እና የገንዘብ ነክ ድንገተኛ ሁኔታዎችን ያለ አሰልቺ የማመልከቻ ወረቀት ስራ እና በዝቅተኛ ወጭ እንዲቆጣጠሩ ያስችላቸዋል።
en: The top-of-the-table solution allows employees to access their salaries before payday and manage financial emergencies without paperwork and at a lower cost.
ha: Wannan kyakkyawar mafita zata baiwa ma'aikatan damar taɓa albashin su kafin ranar biya, da kuma basu damar shawo kan matsalolin kuɗi na gaggawa ba tare da cike-ciken takardu ba, a kuma farashi ƙanƙani.
sw: Suluhisho la juu la jedwali hurusu wafanyakazi kupata mishahara yao kabla ya siku ya malipo na kudhibiti dharura za kifedha bila karatasi na kwa gharama nafuu.
yo: Ọ̀nà àbáyọ tó wà lókè ténté tábílì náà fún àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ní ànfààní sí owó iṣẹ́ẹ wọn ṣíwájú ọjọ́ tí wọn ó gbowó kí wọ́n sì ṣàmójútó àwọn ìṣúná pàjáwírì láìsí ìbéèrè ìwé àti lówó tí ò gani lára.
zu: Phezu kwetafula kukhona isixazululo esivumela abasebenzi bangene emiholweni yabo ngaphambi kosuku lokuhola nokuthi bengamele izimoeziphuthumayo zezezimali, ngaphandle kwamaphepha futhi kubiza kancane.

am: በተጨማሪም፣ መድረኩ ደሞዝ ተከፋዮች ለመበደር የሚያስችል የስራ ታሪካቸውን እንዲገነቡ ያግዛቸዋል፣ ይህም በረጅም ጊዜ የሚመለሱ ትላልቅ ብድሮችን እንዲያገኙ እና አጠቃላይ የገንዘብ ነክ እንቅስቃሴ ደህንነታቸውን ሊያሻሽል ይችላል።
en: Additionally, the platform helps wage earners build their credit history, which can facilitate access to larger loans with longer tenors and improve their overall financial well-being.
ha: Daɗin daɗawa kuma, manhajar na taimakawa masu karɓar albashi damar ɗora tarihin bashi, wanda zai basu damar samun manyan basussuka masu dogon lokaci, da kuma inganta musu baki ɗaya walwalarsu ta harkokin kuɗi.
sw: Kwa kuongezea, jukwaa huwasaidia wanaopokea mishahara kujenga kumbukumbu zao za mikopo ambayo inaweza kuwezesha upatikanaji wa mikopo mikubwa na wapangaji wa muda mrefu na kuboresha kiujumla ustawi wao wa kifedha.
yo: Ní àfikún, ìkànnì náà ń bá àwọn tó ń gbowó iṣẹ́ ṣe àkọsílẹ̀ ẹ̀yáwó wọn, èyí tó lè fún wọn ní ànfààní sí ẹ̀yáwó ńlá pẹ̀lú àkókò púpọ̀ tí yóò sì ṣe àtúnṣe sí ìgbàyè-gbádùn ìṣúná wọn lálapọ̀.
zu: Ukwengeza le nkundla isiza abaholi bakhe umlando wezezikweletu zabo, okungasiza ekutholeni izikweletu ezinkulu ngaphandle kwamathena nokwenza kangcono konke okwezezimali kwabo.

am: የሰራተኞች ደህንነት በምርታማነት ላይ እንዴት ተጽዕኖ እንደሚያሳድር የተናገሩት የቢል እና ሜሊንዳ ጌትስ ፋውንዴሽን ምክትል ዳይሬክተር የሆኑት 'ሊን ኢዘንሃርት'፣ በመቀጠልም “ሰራተኞች በጣም ጠቃሚ ሀብታችን ናቸው።
en: Lynn Eisenhart, Deputy Director of the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, who also spoke on how employee welfare impacts productivity, said, “Employees are our most valuable asset.
ha: Lynn Eisenhart, mataimakin Daraktan Gidauniyar Bill and Melinda, wanda yayi jawabi akan yanda jindaɗi da walwalar ma'aikata keda tasiri wajen gudanar aiki, yace, "Ma'aikata sune kadarar mu mafi muhimmanci.
sw: Lynn Eisenhart, naibu mkurugenzi wa Bill na Melinda Gates Foundation, ambae pia alizungumza kuhusu jinsi ustawi wa wafanyakazi unavyoathiri uzalishaji, alisema, "Wafanyakazi ni rasilimali yetu muhimu sana.
yo: Lynn Eisenhart, Igbá Kejì Olùdarí Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, tó sọ́rọ̀ nípa bí ìgbáyégbádùn àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ṣe ń lapa lára iṣẹ́ ṣíṣe, sọ wí pé, "Àwọn Òṣìṣẹ́ ni dúkìá tó níye lórí jùlọ tí a ní.
zu: Ulynn Eisenhart, uSekela Mqondisi weBill and Melinda Gates Foundation, ophinde wakhuluma ngokuthi izindaba zomsebenzi ziwuphazamisa kanjani umsebenzi, uthe, Abasebenzi bayimpahla ebaluleke kakhulu.

am: ሰዎች አንድ ድርጅት ውስጥ የሚቆዩት፣ በድርጅቶቹ የአያያዝ ሁኔታ እና በሚቆዩበትም ጊዜ በሚያገኙት ጥቅማ ጥቅም ነው።
en: People stay because of how organisations treat them and the benefits they enjoy during their stay.
ha: Mutane kan zauna ne bisa ga yanda ma'aikatu suke ta'ammali dasu, da kuma irin tagomashin da suka samu lokacin zamansu.
sw: Watu hukaa kwa sababu jinsi mashirika yanavyowatendea na manufaa wanayopata wakati wa kustaafu kwao.
yo: Àwọn ènìyàn ń dúro nítorí bí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ṣe ń húwà sí wọ́n àti àwọn ànfààní tí wọ́n ń jẹ̀gbádùn nígbà tí wọ́n dúró.
zu: Abantu bahlala ngoba kungukuthi izinhlangano zibaphatha kanjani kanye nabakuzuzayo futhi bakuthokozele ngesikhathi besahleli.

am: የመስክ ላይ ሰራተኞች በገንዘብ ነክ ግልጋሎቶች እና በድርጅቶቻቸው ወስጥ፣ በስራቸው የበለጠ ውጤታማ እንዲሆኑ መበረታታት ይገባቸዋል።
en: Blue-collar workers deserve to be empowered by financial services and empowered by their organisations so they can be more productive.
ha: Leburori sun cancanci a tallafa musu a sha'anin kuɗi, kuma ma'aikatunsu su tallafa musu don su ƙara hazaƙa wajen gudanar da aiki.
sw: Wafanyakazi wa blue collar wanastahili kuwezeshwa na huduma za kifedha na kuwezeshwa na mashirika yao ili waweze kuwa na tija zaidi.
yo: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ agbára ní ẹ̀tọ́ sí ìrónilágbára láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn olùpèsè ìṣúná àti ìrónilágbára láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ wọn kí wọ́n lè máa ṣiṣẹ́ dáadáa sí i.
zu: Abasebenzi bakhola oluhlaza bafanele ukusizwa ngemisebenzi yezezimali nokusizwa yinhlangano yabo ukuze benze ngcono umsebenzi wabo.

am: በ 'ሰራተኞች የሰሩበት ደሞዝ ተደራሽነት' መድረክ በኩል የ ገንዘብ ነክ ሀብቶችን በእጃቸው ጣት ላይ እንዲያገኙ ልንሰጣቸው እንፈልጋለን።
en: We want to give them access to financial resources at their fingertips through the Earned Wage Access platform.
ha: Muna so a basu damar samun tallafin kuɗaɗe a hannunsu ta hanyar Earned Wage Access.
sw: Tunataka kuwapa ufikiaji wa rasilimali za kifedha katika alama zao za vidole kupitia jukwaa la Earned Wage Access.
yo: A fẹ́ fún wọn ní ànfààní sí àwọn orísun ìṣúná ní àrọ́wọ́tó wọn nípasẹ̀ ìkànnì Earned Wage Access.
zu: Sifuna ukubanikeza izinsizakusebenza zezezimali ezandleni zabo ngenkundla yeEarned Wage Access.

am: የሰራተኞች መረጃን ለመጠቀም እና ዘላቂ መፍትሄዎችን ለመፍጠርም ነው ከ ሲምለስስ የሰው ሀብት እና ሌሎች ቀጣሪዎች ጋር የተባበርነው።"
en: This is why we have partnered with SeamlessHR and employers, to leverage employee data and create sustainable solutions.”
ha: Wannan ne yasa muka haɗa hannu da SeamlessHR da masu ɗaukar aiki, don lura da bayanan ma'aikata da kuma samar musu mafita mai ɗorewa.
sw: Hii ndio sababu tumeshirikiana na SeamlessHR na waajiri, kuongeza takwimu za wafanyakazi na kuunda suluhisho endelevu".
yo: Ìdí nìyìí tí a fi darapọ̀ pẹ̀lú SeamlessHR àti àwọn agbanisíṣẹ́, láti ṣàmúlò dátà àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ láti ṣẹ̀dá ọ̀nà àbáyọ alálòpẹ́."
zu: Yingakho sibambisene neSeamlessHR nabasebenzi, ukubambisa ngemininingo yomsebenzi nokwenza izixazululo ezihlalayo

am: በእሱ አስተያየትም፣ የሲምለስ የሰው ሀብት ዋና ሥራ አስፈፃሚ የሆኑት 'ኢማኑኤል ኦኬሌጂ'በተለይም፣ ለቀጣሪዎች እና ለሠራተኞች ሲባል ኩባንያው፣ ድርጅታዊ ቅልጥፍናን ለማሻሻል ስለገነባው የቴክኖሎጂ መፍትሄዎች ተናግረዋል ።
en: In his remarks, CEO of SeamlessHR, Emmanuel Okeleji, spoke on the technology solutions the company has built to improve organisational efficiency, especially for employers and employees.
ha: Anasa jawabin, shugaban SeamlessHR, Emmanuel Okeleji, yayi bayani akan mafitar fasaha da kamfanin ya gina don inganta gudanar da aikin ma'aikatu, ga masu ɗaukar aiki da ma'aikatan.
sw: Katika maelezo yake, mkurugenzi mtendaji wa SeamlessHR, Emmanuel Okeleji, alizungumza juu ya masuluhisho ya kiteknolojia ambayo kampuni imeyaunda ili kuboresha ufanisi wa shirika, hususani kwa waajiri wa wafanyakazi.
yo: Nínú ọ̀rọ rẹ̀, Aláṣẹ àti Olùdarí SeamlessHR, Emmanuel Okeleji, sọ̀rọ̀ nípa ọ̀nà àbáyọ onímọ̀ ẹ̀rọ tí ilé iṣẹ́ náà ṣẹ̀dá láti ṣe àtúnṣe sí iṣẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́, pàápàá jùlọ àwọn agbanisíṣẹ́ àti àwọn òṣìṣẹ́.
zu: Emazwini akhe okuvala Iceo yaka SeamlesHR uEmmanuel Okeleji, ukhulume ngezixazululo zezobuchwepgeshe okumele inkampani izakhe ukwenza kangcono ukusebenza kwenhlangano,ikakhulukazi komqashi nomqashwa.

am: "የሰራተኛ እና የአሰሪ ደሞዝ ክፍያን በእንከን የለሽሽነት እንዲያስተዳድሩ ከሚረዳው እና በዝቅተኛ ወለድ ብድር ለማግኘት ከሚያስችለው፣አዲሱ 'ሰራተኞች የሰሩበት ደሞዝ ተደራሽነት መድረክ'፣ የደመወዝ ክፍያ ማቀናበሪያ ፈጠራችን ጎን ለጎን: ጊዜን እና በስራ ቦታ መገኘትን ለመከታተል የሚያስችል አጠቃላይ የቴክኖሎጂ መሳሪያ ገንብተናል።
en: “Alongside our innovative Earned Wage Access platform, a payroll processing system, which aids the seamless management of employee and employer payroll and also facilitates access to low-interest loans, we have also built a comprehensive technology tool to track time and attendance.
ha: A manhajar Earned Wage Access da muka ƙirƙiro, manhajar tsarin biyan albashi, wacce ta taimakawa mahukuntan Seamless wajen tafiyar da tsarin biyan albashin masu ɗaukar aiki da ma'aikata, ta kuma sauƙaƙa musu samun basuka masu ƙarancin ruwa. Haka kuma mun gina fasahar bai ɗaya ta bibiyar lokaci da kuma halartar zuwa aiki.
sw: "Mbali na jukwaa letu la ubunifu la ufukiaji wa mshahara, mfumo wa ulipaji mishahara, ambao husaidia usimamizi ulio imara wa malipo ya wafanyakazi na mfanyakazi na pia kuwezesha upatikanaji wa riba nafuu, pia tumeunda kifaa cha kiteknolojia cha kina kufuatilia muda na mahudhurio.
yo: Ní ìfẹ̀gbẹ́kẹ̀gbẹ́ pẹ̀lu ìkànnì ìmọ̀ ọ̀tun Earned Wage Access wa, ẹ̀rọ aṣèto owó sísan tó ń pèsè ìrànwọ́ fún àmójútó owó àwọn agbanisíṣẹ́ àti àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ nírọ́rùn, tó sì ń pèsè ànfààní sí ẹ̀yáwó elélèé-kékeré, a tún ti pèse irinṣẹ́ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ kíkún láti tọpa àkókò àti ìwe-orúkọ.
zu: "Ngokuhambisana nokwenzakabusha inkundla ye-Earned Wage Access uhlelo lokwenza uhla lwenkokhelo olusiza ukuphatha abasebenzi kanye nohla lwenkokhelo lukamqashi kanye nokubheka ukungena ezikweletini ezinanzalo encane siphinde sakha ezobuchwepheshe ezinkulu okuyithuluzi lokubheka isikhathi nokwethamela.

am: ይህ የተቀናጀ መፍትሔ በዓለም ዙሪያ ካሉ በስኬታማነት ትግበራዎችን በመነሻነት ይወስዳል፣ ይህም የመስክ ላይ ሰራተኞችን አሳታፊ እና ደጋፊ በሆነ የስራ ቦታ ውስጥ ያላቸውን አቅም እንዲያወጡ እና ተጠቃሚ መሆናቸውን ያረጋግጣል።
en: This integrated solution draws inspiration from successful implementations across the globe, ensuring that blue-collar workers can thrive in an inclusive and supportive work environment.
ha: Wannan mafita ta bai ɗaya ta sanya karsashi bisa nasarar da ta bayar a faɗin duniya, wajen tabbatar da leburori sunyi cara a wajen aiki mai mara musu baya da kuma rungumar su.
sw: Suluhisho hili liliojumuishwa huchota msukumo kutokana na utekelezwaji wenye mafinikio ulimwenguni kote, kuhakikisha kwamba wafanyakazi wa blue collar wanaweza kustawi katika mzingira ya kazi yanayojumuisha na kusaidia.
yo: Ọ̀nà àbáyọ aláfibọ̀ náà gba ìmísí láti àṣeyọrí ìṣàmúlò rẹ̀ kákàkiri àgbáyé, tó ń rí i dájú pé àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ agbára ṣe àṣeyọrí ní àwùjọ iṣẹ́ fún tẹrú-tọmọ àti alátìlẹ́yìn.
zu: Lesi sixazululo esihlanganisiwe silanda ugqozi ekwenzekeni okuyimpumelelo emhlabeni wonke, kuqinisekisa ukuthi abasebenzi bakhola oluhlaza bayaqhakaza endaweni enokweseka emsebenzini.

am: በጌትስ ፋውንዴሽን እና በመስክ ላይ ሰራተኞች ከፍተኛ አሰሪዎች ጋር በተደረገውም አጋርነት፣ በዚህ ዘርፍ ካሉ የአፍሪካ ፈርጦች ላይ ዘላቂ ተጽእኖን መፍጠር እንችላለን።
en: With the partnership of the Gates Foundation and top employers of blue-collar workers, we can create a long-lasting impact on this segment of Africa’s talent.”
ha: Da haɗin gwiwar Gidauniyar Bill Gates da kuma manayan leburori, zamu iya yin tasiri mai ɗorewa a ɓangaren baiwar aiki a Afrika .
sw: Kwa ushirikiano wa Gates Foundation na waajiri wakuu wa wafanyakazi wa blue collar, tunaweza kuleta matokeo ya huduma kwa sehemu hii ya vipaji vya Afrika"
yo: Ní àjọṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú Gates Foundation àti àwọn lọ́gàlọ́gà nínú àwọn tó ń gba àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ agbára a lè kó ipa alálòpẹ́ ní ẹ̀ka ẹ̀bùn ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ yìí."
zu: Ngokubambisana neGates Foundation nabasebenzi abaphezulu babasebenzi bakhola oluhlaza, singakha umthelela wesikhathi eside kulesisiqephu sekhono leAfrika."

am: ዋና ተናጋሪ የነበሩት፣ የሰው ሀብት ልማት ሊቅ - በጆርጅታውን ዩኒቨርሲቲ የሰው ሃብት አስተዳደር ፋኩልቲ ዳይሬክተር - ፕሮፌሰር 'ዳፖ አዴሌዬ'፣ ስለ ሰራተኞች ደህንነትን አስፈላጊነት እና የቴክኖሎጂ አቅም ዛሬ ባለው የሰው ሃይል ላይ ማምጣት ስለሚችለው ለውጥ ፣አመርቂ ገለፃ አድርገዋል።
en: Human capital development expert - Professor Dapo Adeleye, Faculty Director of Human Resources Management at Georgetown University, the keynote speaker, gave an outstanding presentation on the importance of employee welfare and the transformative potential of technology in today's workforce.
ha: Ƙwararren masanin fannin kimar ma'aikata Farfesa Dapo Adeleye, Daraktan Tsangayar Ilimin Ma'aikata ta Jami'ar Georgetown, babban mai maƙala a taron ya gabatar da maƙala mai kyau akan muhimmancin jin daɗin ma'aikaci, da kuma amfanin sauyawa izuwa fasaha a fagen aiki a yau.
sw: Mtaalam wa maendeleo ya mtaji wa binadamu - profesa Dapo Adeyele, mkurugenzi wa kitivo cha usimamizi wa rasilimali watu katika chuo kikuu cha Georgetown, mzungumzaji mkuu, alitoa wasilisho bora kuhusu umuhimu wa ustawi wa wafanyakazi na uwezo wa kuleta mabadiliko ya teknolojia katika nguvu kazi ya leo.
yo: ọ̀jìnnì nípa ìdàgbàsókè ìmọ̀ àwọn òṣìṣẹ́, Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Dapo Adeleye, Adarí Ẹ̀ka-ẹ̀kọ́ Ìdàgbàsókè Ìmọ̀ Àwọn Òṣìṣẹ́ ní Yunifásítì Georgetown, olùdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ kókó pàtàkì, ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tó yanrantí lórí pàtàkì ìgbàyègbádùn àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ àti àyípadà ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ tó ṣe é ṣe láàrín àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ayé òde òni.
zu: Ungoti wezokuthuthukiswa kwengqalabhizinisi yabantu-uSolwazi Dapo Adeleye,uFaculty Director of Human Resources Management eNyuvesi yaseGeorgetown,isikhulumi esiqavile,wethula inkulumo emangalisayo ngokubaluleka kwezindaba zomsebenzi namandla okuguquka kwezobuchwepheshe endaweni yokusebenza namhlanje.

am: "በቦታው ላይ ስለ ሰራተኞች-እሴት እንደገና አመለካከታችንን መቀየር እና መገምገም አለብን።
en: “We need to shift our perspective and reevaluate the employee value proposition.
ha: "Da buƙatar mu matsarda tunaninmu mu sake ƙimanta mas'alar ma'aikaci.
sw: "Tunahitaji kubadilisha mtazamo wetu na kutathmini upya pendekezo la thamani ya mfanyakazi.
yo: "A nílò láti sún ojú ìwòye wa ká sì ṣe àgbéyẹ̀wò àwọn àgbékalẹ̀ nípa iyì àwọn òṣìṣẹ́.
zu: "Sidinga ukushintsha indlela yethu nokuphinda sihlole isiphakamiso somsebenzi.

am: በ ከፍተኛ ቦታ ላይ ካሉ ፈርጦች ላይ ብቻ ከማተኮር ይልቅ፣ ጉልህ የሆነ ብዛት ያለውንና ከመሰላሉ በታች ያሉ የመስክ ላይ ሰራተኞችን የሚያካትተውን የሰራተኛ ክፍል መገንዘብ አለብን።
en: Instead of solely focusing on top talent, we must recognise that a significant portion of the workforce comprises blue-collar workers at the bottom of the ladder.
ha: A maimakon maida hankali kawai akan muhimmiyar baiwa, dolene mu gane cewa akwai kaso mai yawa na ma'aikata, wanda ya ƙunshi leburori na ƙasa-ƙasa.
sw: Badala ya kuongeza vipaji vya hali ya juu pekee, tunalazimika kutambua kuwa sehemu kubwa ya nguvu kazi inajumuisha wafanyakazi wa blue collar wasiojulikana.
yo: Dípò gbígbájúmọ́ àwọn ẹ̀bùn tó dára jùlọ nìkan, a gbọ́dọ̀ mọ̀ wí pé apá kan àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ kún fún àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ agbára tí wọ́n wà ní ìsàlẹ̀ àkàsọ̀.
zu: Esikhundleni sokugxila kuphela ekhonweni eliphezulu, kumele sibone ukuthi ingxenye ebalulekile yokusebenza inabasebenzi bakhola oluhlaza ekugcineni kwesitebhisi.

am: ሰፋ ያለ ጥናት፣ 'ሰራተኞች የሰሩበት ደሞዝ ተደራሽነት' እና የ ሰራተኞችን በገንዘብ ነክ ጉዳዮች ማካተት በሰራተኞች ምርታማነት ላይ ያለውን አስደናቂ ተፅእኖ አሳይቷል።
en: Extensive research has demonstrated the remarkable impact of earned wage access and financial inclusion on employees' productivity.
ha: Zuzzurfan bincike ya nuna irin tasirin da Earned Wage Access da kuma tallafin kuɗaɗe sukayi akan ƙwazon ma'aikata .
sw: Utafiti wa kina umeonyesha athari ya kutisha ya upatikanaji wa mshahara unaopatikana na ushirikishwaji wa kifedha kwenye tija ya wafanyakazi.
yo: Ìtèsíwájú ìwádìí ti ṣe àpèjúwe ipa pàtàkì tí Earned Wage Access àti ìṣúná tẹrú-tọmọ lórí iṣẹ́ àwọn òṣìṣẹ́.
zu: Ucwaningo olunzulu seluveze umthelela oncomekayo wokungena kwemali yomholo nokufakwa kwezezimali ekusebenzeni kwabasebenzi.

am: ለደህንነታቸው ቅድሚያ በመስጠት እና ትክክለኛ መሳሪያዎችን በማቅረብ ፣የሰራተኞቻችንን እውነተኛ አቅም ማስከፈት እናም ለድርጅቶቻችን ዘላቂ እድገት ማምጣት እንችላለን" ብለዋል ።
en: By prioritising their well-being and providing them with the right tools, we can unlock the true potential of our workforce and drive sustainable growth for our organisations.”, he said.
ha: Ta hanyar fifita walwala da samar musu da kayan aiki da suka dace, zamu fito da baiwar ma'aikatanmu, da kuma jawo cigaba mai ɗorewa ga masana'antun mu.", inji shi.
sw: Kwa kutanguliza ustawi wao na kuwapa zana zinazofaa, tunaweza kufungua uwezo halisi wa nguvu kazi yetu na kuendeleza ukuaji endelevu wa mashirika yetu", alisema.
yo: Pẹ̀lú gbígbájúmọ́ ìgbàyè gbádùn wọn àti pípèse irinṣẹ́ tó yẹ fún wọn a lè ṣe ìtúsílẹ̀ agbára tòótọ́ àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ wa kí a sì ní ìdàgbàsókè alálòpẹ́ ní ilé-iṣẹ́ wa.", ó sọ bẹ́ẹ̀.
zu: Ngokuqhakambisa ukuphila kahle kwabo nokubanikeza amathuluzi afanele,singavula amandla angempela ekusebenzeni kwethu, sihole nokukhula okuzogcineka enhlanganweni yethu, usho njalo".

am: ሲምለስስ የሰው ሀብት ተደራሽነቱን እና ተጽኖውን እያሰፋ እየሄደ ባለበት ጎን ለጎን የዚህ ውይይት ሁለተኛው ምዕራፍ በኬንያ ሊካሄድ ታቅዷል፣ ሲምለስስ የሰው ሀብት የአፍሪካን የንግድ ሥራዎች በዲጂታል ለውጥ ለማብቃት በሚያደረገውም ቁርጠኝነት ጸንቷል።
en: The second phase of this engagement is set to hold in Kenya as SeamlessHR continues to expand its reach and impact, it remains steadfast in its dedication to empowering African businesses through digital transformation.
ha: Sashe na biyu na taron an shirya gudanar dashi a ƙasar Kenya, yayinda SeamlessHR ke cigaba da yaɗa tasirinsu, sunyi tsayin daka da jajircewa wajen ƙarfafar kamfanoni a Afrika ta hanyar sauye-sauyen fasahar zamani.
sw: Awamu ya pili ya ushirikiano huu inatazamiwa kufanyika nchini Kenya huku SeamlessHR ikiendelea kupanua ufikiaji na athari zake, inasalia kuwa thabiti katika kujitolea kwake kuwezesha biashara za kiafrika kupitia mageuzi ya kidigitali.
yo: Ìpele kejì ìfọ̀rọ̀wérọ̀ yìí ni yóò wáyé ní orílẹ̀-èdè Kenya pẹ̀lú bí SeamlessHR ṣe ń tẹ̀síwájú láti na ọwọ́jà rẹ̀ àti ipa rẹ̀, ó dúróṣinṣin lórí ìfọkànsìn rẹ̀ láti ró àwọn oníṣòwò nílẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ lágbára pẹ̀lú àkósódù aṣàyípadà.
zu: Isigaba sesibili saloluhlelo sihlelelwe ukuthi senzeke eKenya njengoba iSeamlessHR iqhubeka yanda ekufinyeleleni nasemtheleleni, iyaqhubeka nokushesha ekuzinikeleni kwayo ukusiza amabhizinisi aseAfrika ngoguquko lwezedijithali.

am: ስለ ሲምለስኤች.አር (SeamlessHR)
en: About SeamlessHR
ha: Dangane da SeamlessHR
sw: Kuhusiana na SeamlessHR
yo: Nípa SeamlessHR
zu: NgeSeamlessHR

am: ሲምለስስ የሰው ሀብት፣ የአፍሪካ ግንባር ቀደም የደመወዝ ክፍያ እና የሰው ኃይል ቴክኖሎጂ ኩባንያ ሲሆን፣ የቴክኖሎጂ መፍትሄዎችን በመጠቀም ንግዶች ሙሉ የሰው ኃይላቸውን እና የደመወዝ ዑደታቸውን ከቅጥር እስከ ጡረታ እንዲያስተዳድሩ በመርዳት ላይ ያተኮረ ኩባንያ ነው።
en: SeamlessHR is Africa’s leading payroll and HR technology company, focused on helping businesses manage their entire HR and Payroll lifecycle from hire to retirement, with cutting-edge technology solutions.
ha: SeamlessHR wani kamfani ne da yake gaba-gaba wajen tsara hanyar biyan albashi tare da kamfanin fasahar zamani na HR, Wanda suka duƙufa wajen tallafawa kamfanoni wajen gudanar da tsarikansu na biyan albashi da HR, tun daga ɗaukar aiki har zuwa ritaya, ta hanyar sabbin hanyoyin fasahar zamani.
sw: SeamlessHR ni kampuni ya malipo ya teknolojia ya HR, inayoongoza barani Afrika inayolenga kusaidia biashara, maisha yao yote ya HR na malipo kutoka kuajiriwa hadi kustaafu, na suluhisho la teknolojia ya hali ya juu.
yo: SeamlessHR ni ìwé-ìsanwó tó ń léwájú nílẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ àti ilé-iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ, tó gbájúmọ́ ríran àwọn oníṣòwò lọ́wọ́ láti mójútó gbogbo ìgbésíayé HR àti ìwé-ìsanwó wọn láti ibi ìgbanisíṣẹ́ débi ìfẹ̀yìntì pẹ̀lú ọ̀nà àbáyọ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ tó ń léwájú.
zu: ISeamlessHR iyona ehamba phambili ohlweni lokuholela nenkampani yobuchwepheshe beHR, egxile ekusizeni amabhizinisi akwazi ukuphatha iHR nohla lokuholela kusuka ekuqasheni kuya kumhlalaphansi ngezixazululo ezihamba phambili zobuchwepheshe.

am: ከ20 በላይ ሀገራት ውስጥ ላሉ ከ1,000 በሚሆኑ ከመካከለኛ እስከ ትላልቅ ኢንተርፕራይዞች መሰረት፣ አሁን ኩባንያው በናይጄሪያ፣ ጋና፣ ኬንያ ውስጥ ቢሮዎች ያሉት ሲሆን በቅርቡም በቦትስዋና ሥራውን ጀምሯል።
en: With nearly 1,000 medium to large enterprises across over 20 countries, the company has offices in Nigeria, Ghana, Kenya and recently commenced operations in Botswana.
ha: Tare da manya da matsakaitan kamfanoni kusan 1,000 a cikin ƙasashe sama da 20, kamfanin nada ofisoshi a Najeriya, Ghana, Kenya, sai kuma ba jimawa ya fara ayyuka a Botswana.
sw: Ikiwa na karibu biashara 1,000 za kati hadi kubwa katika nchi zaidi ya 20, kampuni ina ofisi nchini Nigeria, Ghana, Kenya na hivi karibuni ilianza kazi nchini Botswana.
yo: Pẹ̀lú àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ alábọ́dé sí àwọn ilé-iṣẹ́ ńláńlá tó tó 1,000 káàkiri àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè 20, ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ní ọ́fíísì ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà, Ghana, Kenya ní àìpẹ́ yìí ó bẹ̀rẹ iṣẹ́ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Botswana.
zu: Ngokucishe kufike ku-1,000 imisebenzi ephakathi nendawo kuya kwemikhulu emazweni angu-20, inkampani inamahhofisi eNigeria, eGhana, eKenya futhi isanda kuqala ukusebenza eBotswana.

am: ኩባንያው አስደናቂውን የፓን አፍሪካን ማስፋፊያ በእጥፍ ለማሳደግ እና አዲስ የተካተቱ ገንዘብ ነክ ምርቶችን ለመገንባት፣ በቅርቡ በ አንደኛ ዙር የገንዘብ ማሰባሰቢያ ላይ የ10 ሚሊዮን ዶላር የገንዘብ ድጋፍ ያሰባሰበ ሲሆን አንዳንዶቹም ምርቶች በዚህ ዝግጅት ላይ ይቀርባሉ።
en: The company recently raised $10million in a Series A round of funding to double down on its impressive pan-African expansion and build out new embedded finance products, some of which will be presented at this event.
ha: Kamfanin ba a jima ba ya tara dala miliyan $10 a Zangon A na zagayen tara kuɗaɗe don riɓanya faɗaɗa ayyukansu a Afrika, da kuma zuba sabbin kayan kuɗi, waɗanda wasunsu za a nunasu a wannan taron.
sw: Hivi karibuni kampuni ilichangisha $10 milioni katika msururu A wa ufadhili ili kupunguza maradufu ktika upanuzi wake wa kuvutia wa barani Afrika na kuunda bidhaa mpya za kifedha zilizopachikwa, ambazo baadhi yake zitawasilishwa katika hafla hii.
yo: Ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ṣe àkójọ $10 mílíọ̀nù níní ìpele ìpèsè owó Àsetẹ̀léra A láti ṣe ìfirinlẹ̀ ìfẹ̀lójú ajẹmọ́-ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ àti àwọn ohun-èlò alákòónú ìṣúná tí wọn ó ṣe àfihàn àwọn kan nínú rẹ̀ ní àpèjọ yìí.
zu: Inkampani isanda kuqongelela izigidi ezingu-$10 kuChungechunge A lomzuliswano woxhasomali ukuphinda kabili ekukhuleni okujabulisayo kwepan-African nokwakha imikhiqizo emisha efake nezezimali, eminye ezokwethulwa kulomcimbi.

am: የቢል እና ሜሊንዳ ጌትስ ፋውንዴሽን በአፍሪካ ውስጥ ላለው ለመስክ ላይ ሰራተኞች ለታሰበው ውጥን፣ 'ሲምለስስ የሰው ሀብት' የቴክኖሎጂ አጋሩ ነው።
en: SeamlessHR is the technology partner of the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation for the blue-collar worker project in Africa.
ha: SeamlessHR kamfanin fasahar zamani ne daya haɗa hannu da Gidauniyar Bill and Melinda Gates don ayyuka da suka shafi ƙananan leburori a Afrika.
sw: Seamless ni mshirika wa teknolojia wa wakfu wa Bill na Melinda Gates wa mradi wa wafanyakazi wa blue collar barani Afrika.
yo: SeamlessHR jẹ́ alájọṣepọ̀ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ pẹ̀lú Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation fún iṣẹ́ àkànṣe àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ agbára ní ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀.
zu: ISeamlessHR obambisene ngobuchwepheshe kuBill noMelinda Gates Foundation kwakhola oluhlaza wephrojekthi eAfrika.

am: በ ኢንፊኒክስ ኖት 30(Infinix NOTE 30) በአይነቱ አዲስ በሆነው የመተላለፊያ ኃይል የመሙላት ተግባሩ፣የጨዋታ እምቅ ችሎታዎን ይልቀቁ።
en: Unleash Your Gaming Potential with Infinix NOTE 30's Innovative Bypass Charging Function
ha: Fito da baiwarka ta yin wasanni tare da wayar Infinix NOTE 30, ta hanyar amfani da fasahar Bypass Charging.
sw: Fungua uwezo wako wa kucheza kwa kutumia Infinix NOTE 30's Innovative Bypass charging Function
yo: Ṣe àgbéjáde ẹ̀bun ayò títaà rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú Ìṣesí Pípẹ́ Ìgbagbára Tuntun Infinix NOTE 30
zu: Veza amandla onawo okudlala imidlalo ngeInfinix NOTE 30 Innovative Bypass Charging Function

am: ለቋሚ የተንቀሳቃሽ የሞባይል ስልክ ተጫዋቾች፣እንደ "ፍሪ ፋየር" ወይም "አሬና ኦፍ ቫል" ባሉ ታዋቂ አርእስቶች ላይ ከጓደኞች ጋር ለሚደረጉ የጨዋታ ጊዜዎች መሰብሰብ፣ የእለት ተእለት ጭንቀትን ለማርገብ እና ለማቃለል እንደ አንድ መንገድ ያገለግላል።
en: For avid mobile gamers, gathering with friends for gaming sessions in popular titles like "Free Fire" or "Arena of Valor" serves as a way to unwind and alleviate daily stress.
ha: Ga mayun gem a waya, don haɗuwa a shirya zagayen wasanni sanannu kamar su "Free Fire" ko "Arena of Valor", wasannin kan taimaka wajen samar da nutsuwa da kaucewa damuwa ta yau da kullum.
sw: Kwa wachezaji mahiri wa vifaa vya mkononi, kukusanyika na marafiki kwa vipindi vya michezo katika mada maarufu kama vile "Free Fire" au "Arena of Valor" hutumika kama njia ya kutuliza na kupunguza mfadhaiko wa kila siku.
yo: Fún àwọn tó fẹ́ràn ayò títa lórí ẹ̀rọ alágbèéká, kíkó àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ jọ láti ta ayò ní àwọn àkòrí tó gbajúmọ̀ bíi "Free Fire" or "Arena of Valor" dúró gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀nà kan láti gbọnra nù níbi ìdàmú ojoojúmọ́.
zu: Kubadlali abanogqozi , ukuhlangana nabangani kumaseshini okudlala ezihlokweni ezidumile njengo "Free Fire" noma "Arena of Valor" isebenza ngendlela yokuphumula futhi wehlise ingcindezi yosuku.

am: ሆኖም የተለመደ አይነት ፈተና፣ በጨዋታው ወቅት ስልካቸው ባትሪው ሲያልቅ እና ለመቀጠል ቻርጅ ማድረግ ሲጠይቅ፣ ይፈጠራል።
en: However, a common challenge arises when their phones run out of battery during gameplay and require charging to continue.
ha: Duk da haka, wani ƙalubale kan bijiro lokacin da cajin wayoyinsu ya ƙare yayinda suke tsaka da wasan gem, zasu buƙaci caji don cigaba da wasan.
sw: Hata hivyo, changamoto ya kawaida hutokea wakati simu zao zinapoishiwa na chaji wakati wa mchezo na zinahitaji chaji ili kuendelea.
yo: Síbẹ̀síbẹ̀, ìṣòro àjọni tó máa ń ṣúyọ nígbà tí bátírì bá tán lórí ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ wọn nígbà tí wọ́n bá ń ta ayò lọ́wọ́ tí wọ́n sì nílò láti gba agbára sórí rẹ̀ kí wọ́n lè tẹ̀síwájú.
zu: Kepha, izingqinamba ezijwayelekile ziyavela ngesikhathi amafoni ephelelwa yibhurethi ngesikhathi somdlalo futhi ifuna ukushajwa ukuze ukwazi ukuqhubeka.

am: ይህም በ ኤስ.ኦ.ሲ(SoC) ቺፕ የ ሀይል መሙያ ሰዓት በማነሱ ምክንያት፣ ብዙውን ጊዜ መደበኛ የስልክ ባትሪዎች ወደ አልተፈለገ የመሞቅ ችግሮች ይመራል ፣ በዚህም የ ስልኩ የጨዋታ አፈፃፀሙ ተግባር እንዲጎዳ ያደርገዋል።
en: This often leads to overheating issues with regular phone batteries, causing the gaming performance to suffer due to underclocking of the SoC chip.
ha: A mafi yawan lokuta hakan kan jawo ɗaukar zafi ga gama garin batiran wayoyi, wanda hakan kesa baturan suna shan wahala, saboda toshewar faifan SoC.
sw: Maranyingi hii husababisha masuala ya joto kupita kiasi kwa Betri za simu za kawaida, na kusababisha utendaji kazi wa michezo ya kubahatisha kuharibika kwa sababu ya kupunguzwa kwa muda wa chipu ya SoC.
yo: Èyí máa ń yọrí sí ìṣòro àgbónájù pẹ̀lú àwọn bátírì ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ ojoojúmọ́, tí yóò mú kí ìṣesí ayò títa náà ó mẹ́hẹ nítorí ìrosẹ̀ ago èkíká SoC.
zu: Lokhu kujwayele ukuholela ezinkingeni zokushisa ngokweqile emabhurethini amafoni ajwayelekile, okudala ukuthi ukusebenza komdlalo kube nenkinga ngenxa yokukhiyeka kwesivalo seSoC.

am: እንደ እድል ሆኖ፣ ኢንፊኒክስ ኖት 30 ይህንን ስጋት የመተላለፊያ ኃይል የመሙላት ተግባሩ መፍትሄ የሰጠው ሲሆን ይህም ተጫዋቾቹ ጨዋታቸውን እየተጫወቱ ያለ ምንም ሙቀት የስልኩን ባትሪ ኃይል እንዲሞሉ ያስችላቸዋል።
en: Fortunately, Infinix NOTE 30 addresses this concern with its bypass charging function, allowing players to charge while gaming without overheating.
ha: Anyi sa a, wayar Infinix NOTE 30 tazo da maganin wannan damuwar ta hanyar fasahar bypass charging, inda take ba masu wasan gem ɗin damar yin caji yayinda suke wasansu ba tare da ɗaukar zafi ba.
sw: Kwa bahati nzuri, Infinix NOTE 30 inashughulikia tatizo hili kwa kutumia chaguo lake la kuchaji bypass, kuruhusu wachezaji kuchaji huku wanacheza bila ya joto kupita kiasi.
yo: Adúpẹ́, Infinix NOTE 30 ti ṣe àtúnṣe sí àdìsọ́kàn yìí pẹ̀lú ìṣesí pípẹ́ ìgbagbára, tí yóò jẹ́ kí àwọn akópa ó gba agbára nígbà tí wọ́n bá ń tayò láì gbọ́ná jù.
zu: Ngenhlanhla iInfinix NOTE 30 ibhekana nalenkinga ngokudlula kokusebenza kokushaja,okuvumela abadlali ukuthi bashaje ngesikhathi bedlala ngaphandle kokushisa okweqile.

am: በኢንፊኒክስ ኖት 30 ፣ ተጫዋቾች አሪፍ እና ያልተቆራረጠ የጨዋታ ተሞክሮን ማጣጣም ይችላሉ።
en: With the NOTE 30, gamers can enjoy an uninterrupted and cool gaming experience.
ha: Da wayar NOTE 30, masu gem zasu more dogon lokacin wasa mara katsewa kuma cikin kwanciyar hankali.
sw: Kwa NOTE 30, wachezaji wanaweza kufurahia uchezaji usiokatishwa na mzuri.
yo: Pẹ̀lú NOTE 30, àwọn ọ̀ta lè gbádùn ìrírí ayò títa láìsí ìdíwọ́ tí yóò sì rọrùn.
zu: Nge NOTE 30 abadlali bajabulela ukungaphazamiseki nesipiliyoni sokudlala kahle.

am: ኢንፊኒክስ ኖት 30 አስደናቂ የሆነውን 45W ባለገመድ ፈጣን ባትሪ የመሙላት አዲስ ባህሪን አስተዋውቋል፣ ይህም ለ1 ሰአት ከ95 ሰኮንድ የጨዋታ የባትሪ ህይወትን በ5 ደቂቃ ባትሪ መሙላት ብቻ እንዲቆይ ያደርጋል ።
en: The Infinix NOTE 30 introduces an impressive 45W wired fast charging feature, providing 1.95 hours of gaming battery life with just 5 minutes of charging.
ha: Wayar Infinix 30 tazo da ƙayatacciyar fasahar caji cikin sauri, inda take bada cajin yin wasanni na tsawon awa 1.95 da cajin minti biyar kacal.
sw: Infinix NOTE 30 inakuletea kifaa cha kuvutia cha kuchaji kwa haraka waya wa 45W, ikitoa saa 1.95 za kudumu chaji ya michezo ya kubahatisha kwa dakika 5 tu za kuchaji.
yo: Infinix NOTE 30 ṣàfihàn ìṣesí ìgbagbára kíákíá oní wáyà 45W tó wúnilórí, tí yóò pèse wákàtí 1.95 fún ẹ̀mí bátírì ayò títa pẹ̀lú ìgbagbára fún ìṣẹ́jú márùn-ún.
zu: iInfinix NOTE 30 yethula i45W emangalisayo kawaya enento yokushaja ngokushesha, enikeza amahora angu 1.95 okudlala ngebhurethi eshajwe amanithi angu 5.

am: በተጨማሪም፣ በ30 ደቂቃ ውስጥ የ 5000mAh ባትሪን እስከ 75 በመቶ መሙላት ይችላል።
en: Additionally, it can charge up to 75% of the 5000mAh battery in just 30 minutes.
ha: Daɗin daɗawa, tana caja batiri mai ƙarfin 5000mAh izuwa kaso 75% cikin mintuna 30 kacal.
sw: Kwa kuongezea, inaweza kuchaji hadi 75% ya betri ya 5000mAh kwa dakika 30 tu.
yo: Ní àfikún, ó lè gba agbára tó ìdá 75% bátírì 5000mAh náà láàrín ìṣẹ́jú 30.
zu: Ukwengeza, ingashaja kuze kufike ku-75% we-5000mAh ibhurethi ngemizuzu engu-30.

am: ከስልኩ ጎልቶ የሚታየዉ ፈጠራዉ ግን የመተላለፊያ ኃይል የመሙላት ቴክኖሎጅው ነዉ፣ይህም የባትሪው ኃይል እየተሞላ ሳለ ጨዋታዎችን በሚጫወትበት ወቅት በቀጥታ ለማዘርቦርዱ ኃይል የሚሰጥ ተግባር ነው።
en: A standout feature of the phone is its innovative bypass charging technology, which directly powers the motherboard while charging and playing games.
ha: Wani abu da wayar tayi zarra dashi shine fasaharta ta bypass charging, wacce ke baiwa wayar wuta kai tsaye, a lokaci guda kuma tana caja batiri ana kuma wasan gem da ita.
sw: Kipengele kikuu cha simu ni teknolojia yake bunifu ya kuchaji bypass, ambayo huwezesha moja kwa moja ubaomama wakati wa kuchaji na kucheza michezo.
yo: Ìrísí ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ náà tó yátọ̀ gédégbé ni ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ pípẹ́ ìgbagbára tí yóò gbé agbára sórí àpótí agbára tààrà nígbà tí ó bá ń gba agbára tó sì ta ayò.
zu: Into egqamile efonini okusha kwayo kokudlula kwezobuchwepheshe kwezokushaja okunika amandla ngqo imotherboard ngesikhathi ushaja futhi udlala imidlalo.

am: ይህም የባትሪውን ዕድሜ ያራዝመዋል፣ የባትሪውን እርጅናን ይቀንሳል፣ እናም የባትሪው ኃይል እየተሞላ ሳለ ጨዋታዎችን በሚጫወትበት ወቅት ደህንነትን ይጨምራል።
en: This extends battery life, reduces battery aging, and enhances safety during charging and gameplay.
ha: Wannan zai sa batirin ya daɗe, hana batiri tsufa da wuri, da kuma ƙarin kariya yayin da ake caji ana kuma gem.
sw: Hii huongeza muda wa matumuzi ya Betri, hupunguza kuzeeka kwa Betri, na huongeza usalama wakati wa kuchaji na kucheza mchezo.
yo: Èyí máa ń jẹ́ kí ẹ̀mí bátírì ó gùn, ó ń ṣe àdínkù gbígbó bátírì, ó sì ń pèsè ààbò lásíkò ìgbagbára àti ayò títa.
zu: Yengeza impilo yebhurethi, yehlisa ukuguga kwebhurethi yengeze ukuphepha ngesikhathi ushaja futhi udlala imidlalo.

am: በአጭሩ፣ የመተላለፊያ ኃይል የመሙላት ተግባር የኢንፊኒክስ ኖት 30 ምርጡ ባህሪው ነው።
en: Technically, the bypass charging function is a smart feature of the NOTE 30.
ha: A fasahance, fasahar bypass charging wata siffa ce da wayar NOTE 30 ta keɓanta da ita.
sw: Kitaalamu, kipengele cha bypass ni sifa mahiri ya NOTE 30.
yo: Ní ìṣesí, ìṣesí pípẹ́ ìgbagbára náà jẹ́ irísí NOTE 30 tó já fáfá.
zu: Okuseqinisweni, umsebenzi wokudlula kokushaja indlela ephambili yeNOTE 30.

am: የባትሪው ኃይል ደረጃ የመተላለፊያ ኃይል የመሙላት ገደቡ ላይ ሲደርስ ወይም ሲያልፍ (በእውቅናው በ 30%)፣ የኃይል መሙያው ጅረት ባትሪውን ያልፍና በቀጥታ ወደ ማዘርቦርዱ ይሄዳል።
en: When the battery level reaches or surpasses the bypass charging threshold (default at 30%), the charging current bypasses the battery and goes directly to the motherboard.
ha: A lokacin da cajin batiri yakai ko ya wuce matsayin fara bypass charging (kaso 30% na caji), cajin zai riƙa haura batiri da tura wuta kai tsaye izuwa waya.
sw: Wakati kiwango cha betri kinafika au kuvuka kizingiti cha kuchaji cha bypass (chini ya 30%) sasa chaji hupita betri na kwenda moja kwa moja kwenye ubaomama.
