yo: Ẹ ṣeun fún ìtẹ̀síwájú àtìlẹ́yìn yín.
zu: Siyabonga qhubeka usixhase.

am: ቴክ1.ኤም (Tech1M) እንከን የለሽ አለምአቀፍ ቅጥርን ለንግዶች ለመስጠት፣ በ ፋውንደር ኮኔክት (Founders Connect) ላይ በይፋ ይጀምራል።
en: Tech1M Launches at Founders Connect, Empowering Seamless Global Hiring for Businesses
ha: Manhajar Tech1M Yayi Kaddamarwa a Kamfanin Founders Connect, Yana mai Ƙarfafa Tsarin Ɗaunkan Ma'aikata don Kasuwanci a Duniya
sw: Tech1M yazinduliwa katika Founders Connect, kuwezesha mfumo wa kuajiri ulimwenguni kwa biashara
yo: Tech1M Ṣe Ìfilọ́lẹ̀ Founders Connect, fún Ìpèsè Ìgbanisíṣẹ́ Káríayé Aláì ní Ìdíwọ́ fún Àwọn Oníṣówò
zu: ITech1M yethulwa kuFounders Connect,ukusiza okungenankinga kokuqasha emhlabeni kwamabhizinisi

am: በአለም አቀፍ ደረጃ ተሰጥኦዎችን የሚገመግም በሰው ሰራሽ አዋቂ (AI) የሚታገዘው የኢንተርፕራይዝ የ ኮምፒውተር ላይ መተግበሪያ እና በጣም በሚጠበቀው የ የቀጥታ ፋውንደር ኮኔክት (Founders Connect Live) ዝግጅት ላይ ከዋና ስፖንሰሮች አንዱ የሆነው 'ቴክ1.ኤም' አብዮታዊ የሆነውን አለም አቀፍ የቅጥር ምርቱን ጀምሯል።
en: Tech1M, an AI enterprise software for evaluating talents globally and one of the headline sponsors at the highly anticipated Founders Connect Live event, launched its revolutionary global hiring product.
ha: Tech1M, manhajar AI ne na kasuwanci don tantance masu hazaƙa a duniya kuma ɗaya daga cikin masu tallafawa kanun labarai a babban shirin Founders Connect na kai tsaye, ya ƙaddamar da samfurin tsarin ɗaukan ma'aikata a duniya mai ciki da sauyi.
sw: Tech1M, Programu ya biashara ya AI ya kutathmini vipaji Duniani kote na mmoja wa wafadhili wa vichwa vya habari katika tukio linalotarajiwa sana na Founders Connect Live, ilizindua bidhaa yake ya kimapinduzi ya kukodisha kimataifa.
yo: Tech1M, ohun èlò àìrídìmú ilé iṣẹ́ IA fún àyẹ̀wò àwọn tó lẹ́bùn lágbàyé àti ọ̀kan nínú àwọn onígbọ̀wọ́ pàtàkì níbi èto Founders Connect Live tí gbogbo ènìyàn ń retí, ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ohun èlò ìgbanisíṣẹ́ aṣàyípadà káríayé rẹ̀.
zu: ITech1M uhlelokusebenza lwebhizinisi Al yokubhekisisa amathalente emhlabeni futhi omunye wabaxhasi ohamba phambili emcimbi obonwa kakhulu weFounders Connect Live, yethule umkhiqizo woguquko lokuqasha emhlabeni.

am: ይህ የፈጠራ ምርቱ መለቀቅ ጋር፣ ንግዶች በአለም አቀፍ ደረጃ ያሉ ተሰጥኦ ያላቸው ግለሰቦችን ለመገምገም፣ ለመቅጠር እና ለመክፈል ወደር የለሽ መፍትሄ በመስጠት፣ ቴ'ክ1.ኤም' የአቀጣጠር ሁኔታ ደረጃን እንደገና ለመወሰን ተዘጋጅቷል።
en: With the release of its innovative product, Tech1M is set to redefine the standard of hiring, offering businesses an unparalleled solution to evaluate, hire, and pay talents globally.
ha: Tare da fitowar sabon samfurinsa, manhajar Tech1M an saitata don sake fasalta ma'auni na ɗaukar ma'aikata, yana baiwa kasuwanci mafita mara misaltuwa don tantancewa, ɗaukar ma'aikata, da biyan masu hazaƙa a duniya.
sw: Kwa kutolewa bidhaa yake ya kibunifu, Tech1M imedhamiria kufafanua upya kiwango chake cha kuajiri, kutoa suluhisho la biashara lisilo na kifani la kutathmini, kuajiri na kulipa vipaji ulimwenguni.
yo: Pẹ̀lú àgbéjáde ohun èlò ìmọ̀ ọ̀tun rẹ̀, Tech1M ti ṣetán láti ṣe àtúnṣe sí gbèdéke ìgbanisíṣẹ́, tó ń pèsè ọ̀nà àbáyọ aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ fún àwọn oníṣòwò láti ṣe àyẹ̀wò, gbanisíṣẹ́, kí wọ́n sì sanwó fún àwọn tó lẹ́bùn lágbàyé.
zu: Ngokukhishwa komkhiqizo wayo omusha,iTech1M isthwe ukuthi iiphinde ichaze amazinga okuqasha,ukunikeza amabhizinisi esixazululo esihambisanayo sokubhekisisa,ukuqasha,nokukhokhela amathalente emhlabeni.

am: በቅርቡ በ'ጄ.ፒ.ሞርጋን' በሚመራው በ'ቴክስታርስ' የተደገፈው የቴክ1.ኤም (Tech1M) ፈጠራ ምርቱን ለአፍሪካ ገበያ ለማስተዋወቅ የሚያስችለውን ምቹ መድረክ ለማቅረብ ዝግጅቱን ተጠቅሞበታል።
en: Tech1M, recently backed by Techstars by J.P. Morgan, leveraged the event as it offered an ideal platform to introduce its innovative product to the African market.
ha: A kwanakinnan manhajar Tech1M tare da goyon bayan manhajar Techstars ta J.P. Morgan, ya ba da damar taron yayin da yake ba da ingantaccen dandali don gabatar da sabbin samfuransa ga kasuwannin Afirka.
sw: Tech1M, iliyoungwa mkono hivi karibuni na Techstars na J.P Morgan, iliboresha tukio hilo kwani ilitoa jukwaa bora la kutambulisha bidhaa yake ya kibunifu kwenye soko la Afrika.
yo: Tech1M, tí Techstar ti J.P. Morgan ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún láìpẹ́ yìí, ṣàmúlò ètò náà pẹ̀lú bí ó ṣe pèsè ìkànnì tó tọ́ láti ṣe àfihàn ohun èlò ìmọ̀ ọ̀tun rẹ̀ fún ọjà ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀.
zu: ITech1M isanda kusekwa yiTechstars yaJ.P. Morgan isibambiso emcimbini njengoba kunikwe inkundla efanele ukuthi yethule umkhiqizo wayo omusha emakethe yaseAfrika.

am: የቴክ1.ኤም(Tech1M's) በሰው በተሰራ አዋቂ (AI)-የነቃው ምርት በአለም አቀፍ ደረጃ ከ400 ሚሊዮን በላይ የጥቃቅን እና አነስተኛ ኢንተርፕራይዞች የሚያጋጥማቸውን የግምገማ እና የቅጥር ፈተናዎችን ይመለከታል።
en: Tech1M's AI-enabled product addresses the evaluation and hiring challenges faced by over 400 million SMEs globally.
ha: Samfurin AI na manhajar Tech1M yana magance matsalolin game da tantancewa da kuma ɗaukan ma'aikata da fiye SMEs miliyan 400 ke fuskanta a duniya.
sw: Bidhaa iliyowezeshwa na AI ya Tech1M inashughulikia changamoto za tathmini na kuajiri zinazikabili zaidi ya SME milioni 400 Duniani kote.
yo: Tech1M tó jẹ́ ohun èlò IA-ṣiṣẹ́ fún wá ìyanjú sí àwọn ìdojúkọ àyẹ̀wò àti ìgbanisíṣẹ́ tí àwọn 400 mílíọ̀nù àwọn SME ń kojú lágbàyé.
zu: ITech1M yenze umkhiqizo Al ubhekane nokubhekisisa nezingqinamba zokuqasha ezibhekene nezigidi ezingaphezu kuka-400 zamaSME emhlabeni.

am: ከዓለም ዙሪያ ያሉ ተሰጥኦ ያላቸው ግለሰቦችን ያለምንም እንከን በመገምገም እና በመቅጠር፣ ቴክ1.ኤም(Tech1M) ንግዶች ስድስት እጥፍ ፈጣን በሆነ መልኩ፣ ወጪ ቆጣቢ በሆነ እና ብቃት ባለው መልኩ ቅጥርን እንዲያረጉ የሚያበረታታ ፣ ሁሉንም በአንድ ውስጥ የያዘ መድረክ ነው ።
en: By seamlessly evaluating and hiring talents from around the world, Tech1M empowers businesses to hire six times faster, cost-effectively, and more efficiently, all within a single platform.
ha: Ta hanyar tantancewa da ɗaukan masu hazaƙa daga ko'ina a duniya, manhajar Tech1M yana bawa 'yan kasuwa damar ɗaukan ma'aikata da sauri ninki shida, da sauƙaƙaƙƙen farashi mai inganci, kuma a yalwacei, duk a cikin dandali ɗaya.
sw: Kwa tathmini imara na kuajiri vipaji kutoka Duniani kote, Tech1M huwezesha biashara kuajiri kwa haraka mara sita, kwa gharama nafuu, na kwa ufanisi mkubwa, yote ndani ya jukwaa moja.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ṣíṣe àyẹ̀wò àti ìgbanisíṣẹ́ àwọn tó lẹ́bùn káàkiri àgbáyé láì sí ìdíwọ́, Tech1M ń ró àwọn oníṣòwò lágbára láti ṣe ìgbanisíṣẹ́ kíákíá ní ìlọ́po mẹ́fà, lówó tí ò gunpá, tó sì tún ṣíṣẹ́ dáadáa, gbogbo rẹ̀ láàrín ìkànnì kan.
zu: Ukubhekisisa okungenankinga nokuqasha amathalente emhlabeni, ITech1M isiza amabhizinisi ukuthi aqashe okuyisithupha ngokushesha, okubiza kahle futhi okusebenza kahle konke enkundleni eyodwa.

am: የቴክ1ኤም መስራች 'ቶምሚ ኤድዋርድስ' በዝግጅቱ ወቅት ባቀረበችው ምናባዊ ገለጻ ላይ፣ ለመስራቾች እና ለተሰጥኦ ያላቸው ግለሰቦች፣ የቴክ1.ኤምን በአለምአቀፍ ደረጃ ተሰጥኦ ያላቸው ግለሰቦችን ክፍያ በብቃት የመገምገም እና በብቃት የመምራት ችሎታን አብራራች።
en: In her virtual presentation during the event, Tech1M's founder, Tommie Edwards, enlightened the founders and talents on Tech1M's ability to critically evaluate and effectively manage the payment of global talents.
ha: A cikin abubuwan da ta gabatar a lokacin taron, wacce ta ƙirƙiri manhajar Tech1M, Tommie Edwards, ta faɗakar da masu ƙirƙira da masu hazaƙa kan ikon manhajar Tech1M na tantancewa da kulawa yadda ya kamata wajen biyan masu hazaƙa a duniya.
sw: Katika wasilisho lake la mtandaoni wakati wa hafla hiyo, mwanzilishi wa Tech1M, Tommie Edwards, aliwaagiza wanzilishi na vipaji kuhusu uwezo wa Tech1M wa kutathmini kwa kina na kudhibiti malipo ya vipaji vya kimataifa.
yo: Níní àgbékalẹ̀ rẹ̀ lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára nígbà tí ètò náà ń wáyé, olùdásílẹ̀ Tech1M, Tommie Edwards, ṣe ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ fún àwọn olùdásílẹ̀ àti àwọn tó lẹ́bùn lórí ìṣesí Tech1M láti ṣe àyẹ̀wò dáadáa kó sì tún ṣàmójútó ìsanwó fún àwọn ògo àgbáyé bó ṣe yẹ.
zu: Ekwethuleni kwakhe okubonakalayo ngesikhathi somcimbi,uMsunguli weTech1M uTommie Edwards,ucacisele abasunguli namathalente kuTech1M ukukwazi ukubhekisisa kahle nokuphatha kahle izinkokhelo zamathalente omhlaba.

am: እንደ 'ቶሚ ኤድዋርድስ' ገለፃም፣ "ቴክ1ኤም ንግዶችን ከተሰጥኦ ያላቸው ግለሰቦች ጋር ማገናኘት ብቻ አይደለም፤ እነዚህ ንግዶች ተሰጥኦ ያላቸው ግለሰቦችን በተጨባጭ እንዲገመግሙ ለማስቻል እና ለፍላጎታቸው ተስማሚ መሆኑንም ማረጋገጥ ነው።"
en: According to Tommie Edwards, "Tech1M is not just about connecting businesses to talent; it's about enabling these businesses to objectively evaluate the talent, ensuring the right fit for their specific needs."
ha: A cewar Tommie Edwards, "manhajar Tech1M ba kawai yana aiki ne game da haɗa kasuwanci da masu hazaƙa ba ne; yana nufin ba wa waɗannan kasuwancin damar ƙimanta basirar da gaske, yana mai tabbatar da dacewa da takamaiman buƙatunsu."
sw: Kulingana na Tommie Edwards, "Tech1M sio tu kuunganisha biashara na vipaji; ni kuhusu kuwezesha biashara hizi kutathmini vipaji, kuhakikisha inafaa kwa mahitaji yao mahususi".
yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Tommie Edwards ṣe sọ, 'Tech1M kì í ṣe nípa síso àwọn oníṣòwò mọ́ àwọn tó lẹ́bùn nìkan; ó wà fún fífún àwọn oníṣòwò wọ̀nyí ní ànfààní láti ṣe àyẹ̀wò àwọn tó lẹ́bùn pẹ̀lú èròngbà, ṣíṣe àrídájú ẹni tó yẹ fún ohun tí wọ́n nílò gangan."
zu: Ngokuka Tommy Edwards iTech1M ayikho ngokuxhumanisa amabhizinisi ethalenteni,ingokukwazi kwamabhizinisi ukubhekisisa kahle ithalente,ukuqinisekisa ukuthi llifanele isidingo sabo esikhethekile.

am: በቴክ1.ኤም ተልእኮ እምብርት ላይ ያለው፣ ከሰዎች አድልኦ በላይ የሆነ እና በፍጥነት፣ በቅልጥፍና እና በፍትሃዊነትን የሚተገበር፣ አጠቃላይ ተሰጥኦ ያላቸው ግለሰቦች ግምገማን ለማቅረብ ያለው ቁርጠኝነት ነው።
en: At the heart of Tech1M's mission is its commitment to providing comprehensive talent evaluation that transcends human biases and delivers speed, efficiency, and fairness.
ha: Tushen manufar Tech1M ita ce jajircewa don samar da cikakkiyar ƙimanta hazaƙa wanda ya zarce son zuciya kuma yanayi cikin sauri da inganci da kuma gaskiya.
sw: Kiini cha dhamira ya tech1M ni kujitolea kwake kutoa tathmini ya kinaya vipaji ambayo inapita upendeleo wa kibinadamu na kutoa ufanisi, usawa na kasi.
yo: Ní àárín gbùngbùn èròngbà Tech1M ni ìfọkànsìn rẹ̀ láti pèsè àyẹwò àwọn ẹ̀bùn ní kíkún tí ó kọjá ojúsàájú àwọn ènìyàn tí ó sì ń ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ kíákíá, tó ṣíṣe dáadáa, tó sì ń ṣòdodo.
zu: Enhliziyweni yenjongo yeTech1M ukuzinikela ukunikeza ukubhekisiswa kwethalente okukhulu okudlulela ekungachemini komuntu futhi okuletha ngesivinini,ukwenza kahle nangobulungiswa.

am: " የተከፋፈሉ ቡድኖችን በፍጥነት፣ በርካሽ እና በብቃት የመገንባት መሪ መድረክ እንደመሆናችን መጠን፤ የመጫወቻ ሜዳውን ለማመጣጠን ዓላማ እናደርጋለን፣ በዚህም እያንዳንዱ ተሰጥኦ ያለው ግለሰብ በየትኛውም ም ቦታ ሳይወሰን ማግኘት የሚገባውን እድሎች የማግኘት እኩል እድል እንዲኖራቸው ለማድረግም ነው" ቶሚ ኤድዋርድስ።
en: "As the leading platform for building distributed teams faster, cheaper,and more efficiently, we aim to level the playing field, ensuring every talent, regardless of their location, has an equal opportunity to access the opportunities they deserve," stated Tommie Edwards.
ha: Tommie Edwards ta ce "A matsayinmu na kan gaba wajen gina ƙungiyoyin da ake rarrabawa cikin sauri, mai rahusa da inganci, muna da niyyar daidaita wurin aiki, tare da tabbatar da cewa kowane gwani, ba tare da la'akari da wurin da yake ba na da cikakkiyar don isa ga damammakin da suka dace da shi," in ji Tommie Edwards.
sw: "Kama jukwaa linaloongoza la kujenga timu zinazosambazw haraka, kwa bei nafuu, na kwa ufanisi mkubwa, tunalenga kuweka sawa ulingo, kuhakikisha kila kipaji, bila kujali eneo lao, kina fursa sawa ya kupata fursa zinazostahili", Tommie Eward alisema.
yo: "Gẹ́gẹ́ bíi ìkànnì tó ń léwájú fún ṣíṣe ìpínrọ̀ ikọ̀ kíákíá, lówó tí ò gara, tó sì ṣíṣẹ́ dáadáa, a ní èrò láti sọ pápá ìseré náà di adọ́gba, láti rí i dájú pé gbogbo àwọn tó lẹ́bùn, láì níṣe pẹ̀lú ààyè, ní ànfààní kan náà láti wo àwọn ànfààní tí ó tọ́ sí wọn," Tommie Edwards ló sọ bẹ́ẹ̀.
zu: "Njengenkundla ehamba phambili ukwakha amaqembu afakiwe ngokushesha, shibhu futhi ngendlela efanele, sihlose ukulinganisa indawo yokudlala, siqinisekise ukutho ithalente lonke, ngaphandle kwendawo yabo, inethuba elilinganayo ukuthola amathuba abafanele," kusho uTommie Edwards.

am: ወደ ገበያው በአዲስነት ቢገባም፣ ቴክ1ኤም (Tech1M) ፣ቴክስታርስ ከተቀላቀለ በኋላ ፤ ከ12,000 በላይ ተጠቃሚዎች በመድረኩ ላይ እና ከ28 በላይ ንግዶች ጋር በመተባበር ፣ አስደናቂ የ30 በመቶ ሳምንታዊ እድገትን አሳይቷል።
en: Despite its new entrance into the market, Tech1M has already experienced a remarkable 30% weekly growth rate since joining Techstars, with over 12,000 users already on the platform and more than 28 partnerships with businesses.
ha: Duk da kasancewarta sabuwa a kasuwa, manhajar Tech1M ta riga ta samu babban ci gaba na 30% na mako-mako tun lokacin da ta shiga kamfanin Techstars, tare da masu amfani sama da 12,000 da ke kan dandali da kuma fiye da masu haɗaka 28 tare da kasuwanci.
sw: Licha ya kuingia kwake sokoni, Tech1M tayari imepata kasi ya ukuaji wa 30% ya kila wiki tangu ijiunge na Techstars, tayari ina zaidi ya watumiaji 12,000 kwenye jukwaa na kuingia ubia na zaidi ya biashara 28.
yo: Pẹ̀lu bó ṣe jẹ́ wí pé ó ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ wọ ọjà náà ni, Tech1M ti ní ìrírí ìdàgbàsókè 30% aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ lọ́sọ́ọ́sẹ̀ láti ìgbà tó ti darapọ̀ mọ́ Techstar, pẹ̀lú 12,000 àwọn aṣàmúlò tó ti wà lórí ìkànnì náà àti àwọn alájọṣepọ̀ tó lé ní 28 pẹ̀lú òwò.
zu: Ngaphandlekokungena okusha emakethe, iTech1M isinesipiliyoni esincomekayo sezinga lokukhula njalo ngesonto ngo-30% kusuke ijoyine iTechstars ngabasebenzisi abangaphezu kuka-12000 abavele basenkundleni nababambisani kumabhizinisi abangaphezu kuka-28.

am: ከአስደናቂው የምርት ምረቃው በተጨማሪ፣ ተሰጥኦ ያላቸው ግለሰቦች እና ንግዶች ለጋስ የሆነ የገንዘብ ሽልማቶች እና በገዜው ምርጥ የሆኑ መተግበሪያ ቁሶችን እንዲያሸንፉ እድል ተሰጥቷቸዋል፣ ይህም በዝግጅቱ ላይ ያለውን የደስታ መጠን ከፍ አድርጎታል።
en: In addition to its impressive product launch, talents and businesses alike were offered a chance to win generous cash prizes and top-of-the-line gadgets, amplifying the excitement at the event.
ha: Ƙari kan ƙaddamar da samfurinsa mai ban sha'awa, masu hazaƙa sana'a an ba su dama don samun kyaututtuka na tsabar kuɗi da na'urori masu muhimmanci, wanda yake ƙara bayyana jin daɗi a taron.
sw: Pamoja na uzinduzi wa bidhaa yake ya kuvutia, vipaji na biashara sawa zilipewa nafasi ya kushinda zawadi za pesa taslimu na vifaa vya hali ya juu, na hivyo kuongeza msisimko katika hafla hiyo.
yo: Ní àfikún sí ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ohun èlò tó yanilẹ́nu rẹ̀, àwọn tó lẹ́bùn àti àwọn oníṣòwò bákan náà ni wọ́n tún fún ní ànfààní láti jẹ àwọn ẹ̀bùn owó onínúure àti àwọn ohun èlò ojúlówó tó wọ́n, tó ń ṣàfihàn ìdùnnú níbi ètò náà.
zu: Ukwengeza okuthokozisayo kokwethulwa komkhiqizo,amathalente namabhizinisi afanayo anikezwa ithuba lokuwina izipho zemali namagajethi aphezulu, ukwenyusa ukujabula emcimbini.

am: የመስራቾች አገናኝ የቀጥታ ስርጭት(Founders Connect Live) ለመማር፣ ለትብብር እና ለማብቃት ምቹ አካባቢን በማጎልበት፤ ናይጄሪያ ውስጥ ባሉ ታዋቂ መስራቾች የተውጣጡ የተለያዩ ርዕሰ ጉዳዮችን እና ቁልፍ ማስታወሻዎችን አቅርበዋል።
en: Founders Connect Live featured diverse topics and keynote sessions from notable founders in Nigeria, cultivating an environment conducive to learning, collaboration, and empowerment.
ha: Gidan labarai na Founders Connect Live sun gabatar da batutuwa daban-daban da kuma darussa masu muhimmanci daga fitattun masu ƙirƙira a Najeriya, suna haɓaka yanayi mai dacewa don koyo, haɗin gwiwa, da ƙarfafawa.
sw: Founders Connect Live iliangazia mada mbalimbali na vipindi muhimu kutoka kwa waanzilishi mashuhuri nchini Nigeria, wakiandaa mazingira yanayofaa kwa kujifunza, ushirikiano, na uwezeshaji.
yo: Founders Connect Live ní oríṣiríṣi àkòrí àti àwọn sáà tó ṣe kókó láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn ìlúmọ̀ọ́ká olùdásílẹ̀ ní Nàìjíríà, ìfilọ́lẹ̀ àwùjọ tó dára láti kẹ́kọ̀ọ́, àjọṣepọ̀, àti ìrónilágbára.
zu: IFounders Connect Live benza izihlokoezahlukene namaseshini enkulumo ebalulekile kubasunguli abaziwayo eNigeria, ukulima indawo efanele ukufunda, ukubambisana kanye nokusizana.

am: ቴክ1.ኤም(Tech1M)፣ ቀጣሪ አስተዳዳሪዎች በዓለም አቀፍ ደረጃ ተሰጥኦ ያላቸው ግለሰቦችን እንዲገመግሙ፣ እንዲቀጥሩ እና ክፍያ እንዲከፍሉ የሚያስችል ቀዳሚ የድርጅት የኮምፒውተር ላይ መተግበሪያ ነው።
en: Tech1M is a leading enterprise software that empowers hiring managers to evaluate, hire, and pay talents globally.
ha: Tech1M babbar manhaja ce ta kasuwanci wacce ke ba wa manajoji masu ɗaukan ma'aikata damar tantancewa da ɗaukan masu aiki da biyan ƙwararru a duniya.
sw: Tech1M ni Programu inayoongoza ya kibiashara inayowapa uwezo wasimamizi wa kuajiri kutathmini, kuajiri na kulipa vipaji ulimwenguni.
yo: Tech1M Jẹ́ ilé iṣẹ́ ohun èlò àìrídìmú tó ń léwájú tó ń ró àwọn alámòjútó tó ń gbanisíṣẹ́ lágbára láti ṣàyẹ̀wò, gbà síṣẹ́, kí wọ́n sì sanwó fún àwọn tó lẹ́bùn káríayé.
zu: ITech1M uhlelokusetshenizswa kwebhizinisi oluholayo olusiza ukuqasha amamenenja kubhekisiswe ukuqasha kanye nokukhokhela amathalente emhlabeni.

am: በ ሰው ሰራሽ አዋቂው (AI) ታግዞ በማዛመድ፣ ቅርፀ ምስል ቅጥር የማድረግ እና በሌሎች አዳዲስ ባህሪያቱ አማካኝነት የችሎታ ግምገማን ቀላል ያደርገዋል፣ እናም በ120 አገሮች ውስጥ ድንበር ተሻጋሪ ክፍያዎችን ማድረግን ያስችላል።
en: Through AI matching, video hiring, and other innovative features, it simplifies talent evaluation and enables seamless cross-border payments in 120 countries.
ha: Ta hanyar daidaito na AI, da ɗauka na neman ma'aikata, da sauran sabbin fasahohi, tana sauƙaƙa tantance ƙimar basira kuma tana ba da damar biyan kuɗin daga kowace a cikin ƙasashe 120.
sw: Kupitia ulinganishaji wa AI, kukodisha video na vipengele vyengine vya ubunifu, hurahisisha tathmini ya vipaji na kuwawezesha malipo ya mipakani bila matatizo katika nchi 120.
yo: Nípasẹ àsopọ̀ IA, ìgbanisíṣẹ́ oní fídíò, àti àwọn ìrísí ìmọ̀ ọ̀tun mìíràn, ó ń sọ àyẹ̀wò àwọn tó lẹ́bùn di ìrọ̀rùn ó sì ń pèsè ìsanwó ní àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè 120 láìsí ìdíwọ́.
zu: Ngokuqondanisa kweAl, ukuqasha amavidiyo nezinye izinto ezintsha,kwenza kubelula ukubhekisisa ithalente futhi kwenza kube lula ukwenza izinkokhelo ezeqa imingcele emazweni angu 120.

am: ቴክ1ኤም የተከፋፈሉ ቡድኖችን ቀልጣፋ ምልመላ፣ መልሶ ማቋቋም፣ መልሶ ማሰልጠን እና ማቆየትን የሚያመቻች ስነ-ምህዳር በመፍጠር የምልመላ መልክዓ ምድርን እያሻሻለ ነው።
en: Tech1M is revolutionising the recruitment landscape by creating an ecosystem that facilitates efficient recruiting, repurposing, retraining, and retention of distributed teams.
ha: Manhajar Tech1M ta kawo sauyi ga ɗaukar ma'aikata ta hanyar ƙirƙirar yanayi mai sauƙi wanda ke sauƙaƙe ɗaukar ma'aikata, da sake fasalin, da sake horarwa, da riƙe ƙungiyoyin da aka rarraba.
sw: Tech1M inaleta mageuzi katika hali ya kuajiri kwa kuunda mfumo ikolojia unaowezesha kuajiri kwa ufanisi, kupanga upya, kutoa mafunzo upya, na kuhifadhi timu zinasosambazwa.
yo: Tech1M ń mú àyípadà bá àwùjọ ìgbanisíṣẹ́ẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ṣíṣẹ̀dá àwùjọ tí yóò pèsè ìgbanisíṣẹ́ tó péye, àtúnṣe èrèdí, ìtúnikọ́, àti ìdádúró àwọn ikọ̀ tí wọ́n pín.
zu: ITech1M yenza izinguquko endaweni yokuqasha ngokwenza i-ekhosistimu ebheka ukwenza kahle ukuqasha,ukuqeqesha kabusha nokulawula amaqembu akhishiwe.

en: Infinix's remarkable mid-range products have garnered significant attention beyond the usual market boundaries.
ha: Abubuwan ban mamaki kayan kamfanin Infinix madaidaita sun sami kulawa sosai fiye da yadda aka saba a kasuwa.
sw: Bidhaa maarufu za masafa ya kati za Infinix zimepata umakini mkubwa nje mipaka iliyongezeka ya soko.

zu: Umkhiqizo wohlobo oluphakathi nendawo oluncomekayo lweINFINIX seluthole ukunakwa okukhulu ngaphezu kwemingcele yasemakethe ejwayelekile.

am: ለወጣት ተጠቃሚዎች ሌላ ልዩ የአፈጻጸም አማራጭን በማቅረብ፣ ኢንፊኒክስ በቅርብ ጊዜ በጉጉት ሲጠበቅ የነበረውን የኖት 30 ተከታታይ( NOTE 30 series) ይፋ አድርጓል ።
en: The brand recently unveiled the highly anticipated NOTE 30 series, providing young users with another exceptional performance option.
ha: A kwanakinnan ya fitar da jerin abubuwan da ake tsammani a jerin wayoyin NOTE 30, yana ba matasa masu amfani wani zaɓi na musamman na aiki.
sw: Hivi karibuni rajamu hiyo ilizindua muendelezo unaotarajiwa wa NOTE 30, kuwapa watumiaji wachanga chaguo lengine la kipekee la utendaji kazi.
yo: Ilé iṣẹ́ náà láìpẹ́ yìí ṣíṣọ lójú àṣetẹ̀léra NOTE 30 tí gbogbo ènìyàn ń retí, tó sì ń pèsè ànfààní ìṣesí aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ aṣàmúlò.
zu: Uhlobo lusanda kuveza uchungechunge obelulindelwe kakhulu lweNOTE 30 ukunikeza abasebenzisi abasha ngokukhetha okunye kokusebenza okuncomekayo.

am: ታዋቂ የቴክኖሎጂ የብዙሀን መገናኛዎች፣ አስደናቂ የሆነውን የ68 ዋት(W) ፈጣን የኃይል መሙላት ባህሪውን፣ ማራኪ ንድፈ ስሬቱን፣ ሌላ ከፍተኛ ደረጃ ያላቸውን ባህሪያቱን እና ያለውን ተመጣጣኝ ዋጋን በማድነቅ ፣የ'ተከታታዩን' አጠቃላይ ግምገማዎችን አድርገዋል።
en: Prominent technology media outlets have conducted comprehensive evaluations of the series, commending its impressive 68W fast charging, appealing design, top-notch features, and affordable pricing.
ha: Shahararrun kafofin watsa labaru na fasaha sun gudanar da cikakkiyar tantancewa game da jerin, suna mai yaba cajin sauri na 68W mai ban sha'awa, zane mai ban sha'awa, manyan fasalulluka, da kuma farashi mai araha.
sw: vyombo maarufu vya habari vua kiteknolojia vimefanya tathmini ya kina muendelezo huo, na kupongeza uharaka wake wa kuchaji wa 68W, muundo unaovutia, bei nafuu na vipengele vya hali ya juu.
yo: Àwọn ilé ìtàjà ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ akọ̀ròyìn tó gbajúmọ̀ ti ṣe àyẹ̀wò tó kún fún àṣetẹ̀léra náà, tí wọ́n sì ń gbóríyìn fún gbígba agbára 68W rẹ̀ tó yanilẹ́nu, ìṣelọ́jọ̀ tó wunni, àwọn ìrísí onípele gíga, àti owó tí ò ganilára.
zu: Izindaba zobuchwepheshe ezidumile zamaphepha sezenze ukubhekisisa okunzulu kwaloluchungechunge,bencoma okuhle kwe-68W wokushaja ngokushesha, ukwakhiwa okuhehayo, izinto zeqophelo eliphezulu, nokubiza okukhonekayo.

am: አሁን እነዚህ የብዙሀን መገናኛ ባለሙያዎች የሰጡትን ምልከታዎች እንመርምር እና ወደ አዲሱ የኖት 30 ተከታታይ( NOTE 30 series) ማራኪ አለም እንግባ።
en: Let's now explore the insights of these media experts and delve into the captivating world of the all-new NOTE 30 series.
ha: Bari yanzu mu bincika fahimtar waɗannan ƙwararrun kafofin watsa labarai kuma mu shiga cikin duniyar da ke jan hankalin sabbin jerin wayoyin NOTE 30.
sw: Hebu sasa tuchunguze maarifa ya wataalamu wa vyombo hivi vya habari na tuingie katika ulimwengu unaovutia wa muendelezo mpya kabisa wa NOTE 30.
yo: Jẹ́ kí a wá wo ojú ìwòye àwọn akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ akọ̀ròyìn wọ̀nyìí kí á sì kán lu àgbáyé gbogbo àṣetẹ̀léra NOTE 30 tuntun tó yanilẹ́nu.
zu: Manje akwesihlole ukucabanga kongoti bezezindaba besesigubha ekubanjweni komhlaba yilona lonke uchungechunge lweNOTE 30.

am: ታዋቂው የብሪቲሽ የቴክኖሎጂ ተፅእኖ ፈጣሪ 'ሱፐር ሳፍ' የኖት 30 ተከታታይ( NOTE 30 series) የሆኑትን ሶስት ሞዴሎችን በሚገባ ገምግሟል እነሱም: ኖት 30 (NOTE 30)፣ኖት 30 5ጂ (NOTE 30 5G) እና ኖት 30 ፕሮ (NOTE 30 Pro) ናቸው።
en: Renowned British tech influencer SuperSaf thoroughly reviewed the three models of the NOTE 30 series: NOTE 30, NOTE 30 5G, and NOTE 30 Pro.
ha: Shahararren mai tantance fasaha a Burtaniya a SuperSaf yayi nazari sosai akan samfuran uku na jerin wayoyin NOTE 30: NOTE 30 da NOTE 30 5G da kuma NOTE 30 Pro.
sw: Mwanzilishi mashuhuri wa teknilojia wa Uingereza SuperSaf alikagua kwa kina miundo mitatu ya muendelezo NOTE 30: NOTE 30, NOTE 30 5G, NOTE 30 Pro.
yo: Gbajúgbajà àwòkọ́ṣe ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ orí ayélujára ọmọ ilẹ̀ Brítánì SuperSaf ṣe àgbéyẹ̀wò àwòṣe àṣetẹ̀léra NOTE 30 mẹ́ta dáadáa: NOTE 30, NOTE 30 5G, àti NOTE 30 Pro.
zu: Umazi wezobuchwepheshe iRenowned British,iSuperSaf ibhekisise kahle amamodeli amathathu ochungechunge lweNOTE 30: Inote 30,NOTE 30 5G neNOTE 30 Pro.

am: ሁለቱንም ባለ 68 ዋት(W) ባለ ገመድ ፈጣን ባትሪ የመሙያን እና 15 ዋት(W) ገመድ አልባ ፈጣን ባትሪ የመሙያ አቅሞችን የያዘውን፣ ኖት 30 ፕሮ (NOTE 30 Pro)ን ሲመረምር ፣'ሱፐር ሳፍ' አድናቆቱን ከመግለጽ በስተቀር ምንም ማለት አልቻለም።
en: When examining the NOTE 30 Pro, which boasts both 68W wired fast charging and 15W wireless fast charging capabilities, SuperSaf couldn't help but express his admiration.
ha: Lokacin da yake tantance wayar NOTE 30 Pro, wanda ke alfahari da saurin cajin na 68W da kuma damar cajin ba waya ta 15W, dole SuperSaf ya bayyana sha'awar sa.
sw: Wakati wa kuikagua NOTE 30 Pro, ambayo ina sifa ya kuchaji kwa waya wa 68W na uwezo wa kuchaji kwa haraka kwa wati 15 bila waya, SuperSaf hakuweza kujizuia kuelezea jinsi anavyostaajabu.
yo: Nígbà tí wọ́n ń ṣe àyẹ̀wò NOTE 30 Pro náà, tí ó ń ṣe ìyanràn àpapọ gbígba agbára oní wáyà kíákíá 68W àti ìkápá gbígba agbára aláì ní wáyà kíákíá 15W, SuperSaf ò lè mu mọ́ra àfi kó ṣàfihàn ìfẹ́ẹ rẹ̀.
zu: Ngesikhathi kuhlolwa Inote 30 Pro, echoma ngakho kokubili i-68W ukushaja okusheshayo kukawaya no-15W wokukwazi ukushaja ngokushesha okungena waya, iSuperSaf ayikwazanga ukuzibamba kodwa yaveza ukuncoma kwayo.

am: "ኖት 30 ፕሮ (NOTE 30 Pro) ዛሬ ባለው የዘመኑ የተንቀሳቃሽ ስልክ ገበያ ላይ፣ ገመድ አልባ ፈጣን ባትሪ መሙያን በተወዳዳሪ ዋጋ የሚያቀርብ፣ ብርቅዬ ዕንቁ ነው" ሲል ተናግሯል።
en: He stated, "The NOTE 30 Pro is a rare gem in today's smartphone market, offering wireless fast charging at a competitive price."
ha: Ya ce, "Ita wayar NOTE 30 Pro wata abu cee mai wuyar gaske a kasuwannin wayoyin hannu na yau, yana ba da caji cikin sauri a farashi madaidaici."
sw: Alisema, "NOTE 30 pro ni adimu katika soko la kisasa la simu janja, inayotoa malipo ya haraka bila waya kwa bei ya ushindani"
yo: Ó sọ wí pé, "NOTE 30 Pro náà jẹ́ nǹkan tó dára lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀ ní ọjà ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ ayárabíàṣá lónì, tó ń pèsè gbígba agbára aláì ní wáyà kíákíá pẹ̀lú owó abánidíje."
zu: Ukubalulile ukuthi "I-NOTE 30 Pro iyinto engajwayelekile emakethe yamanje yamafoni esimanje,inikeza ukushaja okusheshayo okungena waya ngenani lokuncintisana."

am: ኖት 30 ፕሮ (NOTE 30 Pro) ፣ ባቀረበበት የዋጋ ክልል ውስጥ ፣ገመድ አልባ ፈጣን የባትሪ ኃይል መሙላትን ያቀረበ የመጀመሪያው የዘመኑ የተንቀሳቃሽ ስልክ መሆኑ ልብ ሊባል ይገባል።
en: It's worth noting that the NOTE 30 Pro is the first smartphone in its price range to feature wireless fast charging.
ha: Yana da kyau a lura cewa wayar NOTE 30 Pro ita ce wayar farko mai farashinta da ke da fasalin cajin marar waya cikin sauri.
sw: Ni vyema kutambua kwamba NOTE 30 Pro ndiyo simu janja ya kwanza katika anuwai ya bei kuwa na uchaji wa haraka bila waya.
yo: Ó tọ́ kí a mọ̀ wí pé NOTE 30 Pro náà ni ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ ayárabíàṣá àkọ́kọ́ ní ìpele owó rẹ̀ láti ní gbígba agbára aláì ní wáyà kíákíá.
zu: Akubizi lutho ukuthi iNOTE 30 Pro ifoni yesimanje yokuqala enanini layo ukuba nokushaja okusheshayo okungena waya.

am: ለገንዘብ ምደባዎ በተሻለ ተስማሚ የሆነው 'ኖት 30 '(NOTE 30) እንኳን ይዞ የቀረበው ፣ለየት ያለ ጥቅሞቹ የ'ሱፐርሳፍን' ትኩረት ስቧል።
en: Even the more budget-friendly NOTE 30 caught SuperSaf's attention for its unique advantages.
ha: Ita kanta wacce tafi sauƙin kuɗi wayar NOTE 30 ta ɗauki hankalin SuperSaf don fa'idodinta na musamman.
sw: Hata NOTE 30 ambayo ni rahisi zaidi kwa bajeti ilivutia umakini wa SuperSaf kwa faida zake za kipekee.
yo: Kódà NOTE 30 tó bá àpò ṣọ̀rẹ́ náà pe àkíyèsí SuperSaf sí àwọn ànfààní aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ rẹ̀.
zu: Ingcono kakhulu ngohlelomali olukahle iNOTE 30 idonse amehlo eSuperSaf ngokuhle kwayo okwehlukile.

am: "ኖት 30 (NOTE 30) ለገንዘብ ምደባዎ በተሻለ ተስማሚ የሆኑ የስልክ ክፍል መደብ ውስጥ ጎልቶ ይታያል" ሲል አጉልቶ ተናግሯል።
en: He highlighted, "The NOTE 30 stands out in the budget phone segment."
ha: Ya ƙara da cewa, "Wayar NOTE 30 ta fito fili a ɓangaren waya mai sauƙin kuɗi."
sw: Aliangazia, "NOTE 30 inajitokeza katika sehemu ya simu ya bajeti".
yo: Ó ṣàlàyé pé, "NOTE 30 dá yátọ̀ nínú ìpín ìṣúná ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀.
zu: Ukucacisile ukuthi, Ï-NOTE 30 iyaqhama kuhlelomali lwamafoni."

am: ይህ 'ተከታታይ' እንደ 45 ዋት(W) ፈጣን የባትሪ ኃይል መሙላት አቅም፣ ደመቅ ያለ የ120Hz ስክሪን እና ከ 16GB እስከ 256GB የሚደርስ ለጋስ የሆነ የማከማቻ አቅም፣ አካቶ ሁሉንም በሚያስደንቅ ተወዳዳሪ ዋጋ አርጎ ያቀርባል።
en: This series offers remarkable features such as 45W fast charging, a vibrant 120Hz screen, and a generous storage capacity of up to 16GB+256GB, all at an incredibly competitive price.
ha: Wannan jerin yana ba da fasali na ban mamaki kamar 45W na caji mai sauri, allon na'ura 120Hz mai ƙarfi, da ƙarfin ajiya mai yalwa har zuwa 16GB + 256GB, duk akan farashi mai ban sha'awa.
sw: Muendelezo huu hutoa vipengele vya kustaajabisha kama vile chaja ya kasi ya 45W, skrini nzuri ya 120Hz, na uwezo mkubwa wa kuhifadhi wa hadi GB16 + GB25,vyote kwa bei ya ushindani wa hali ya juu.
yo: Àṣetẹ̀léra yìí ń pèsè àwọn ìrísí tó lápẹrẹ bíi gbígba agbára kíákíá 45W, agbàwòrán 120Hz tó lárinrin, àti ìkápá ìfipamọ́ tó rẹwà tí ó tó 16GB+256GB, gbogbo rẹ̀ lówó abánidíje tó yanilẹ́nu.
zu: Lolu chungechunge lunikeza izinto ezincomekayo njenge 45W wokushaja ngokushesha isikrini esihle sa120 Hz nendawo enkulu yokugcina efika ku 16GB+256GB konke lokhu ngenani elihle labancintisani.

am: በተጨማሪም፣ በ5ጂ አቅሙ እና በሚያስደንቅ የ108 ሜጋ ፒክስል የዋና ካሜራ ጥራቱ፣ ኖት 30 5ጂ (NOTE 30 5G) የተከታታዩን መረብ ያሰፋል።
en: In addition, the NOTE 30 5G expands the series with its 5G capabilities and a remarkable 108MP main camera.
ha: Bugu da ƙari, wayar NOTE 30 5G tana faɗaɗa jerin tare da damar 5G da babbar kyamarar 108MP.
sw: Kwa kuongezea, NOTE 30 5G inapanua mfululizo na uwezo wake wa 5G na kamera kuu ya ajabu ya 108MP.
yo: Ní àfikún, NOTE 30 5G ṣe ìfẹ̀lójú àṣetẹ̀léra náà pẹ̀lú ìkápá 5G rẹ̀ àti ojúlówó Kámẹ́rà 108MP tó lápẹrẹ.
zu: Ukwengeza, iNOTE 30 5G yandisa uchungechunge ngokukwazi kwayo kwe-5G nokuncomeka okungu-180MP kwekhamera.

am: ሱፐርሳፍም ሃሳቡን ይህን በማለትም አካፍሏል፣"ኖት 30 5ጂ በዋጋ ክልሉ ውስጥ ካሉ የማንኛውም የ5ጂ ስልኮች በአጠቃላይ የተሻለ አፈጻጸምን ያቀርባል።"
en: SuperSaf shared his thoughts, stating, "The NOTE 30 5G offers some of the best overall performance of any 5G phone in its price range."
ha: SuperSaf ya bayyana ra'ayinsa, yana mai cewa, "Wayar NOTE 30 5G tana ba da mafi kyawun aikin kowace wayar 5G a cikin kewayon farashinta."
sw: SuperSaf alishirikisha maoni yake, akisema "NOTE 30 5G inatoa utendaji bora wa jumla wa simu yoyote ya 5G katika safu yake ya bei"
yo: SuperSaf fi èro rẹ̀ hàn, ó sọ wí pé, "NOTE 30 5G náà pèsè àwọn àpapọ̀ ìṣesí tó dára jùlọ kọ̀ọ̀kan ju èyíkéyìí ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ tí wọ́n jọ jẹ́ iye kan náà lọ.
zu: USuperSaf wabelane ngemicabango yakhe,ethi "Inote 30 5G inikeza ukusebenza okuhamba phambili kwanoma iyiphi ifoni ye5G kunani layo

am: በመገናኛ ብዙኃን አድናቆት ተችሮታል
en: Critically Acclaimed by the Media
ha: Kafafen Yaɗa Labarai Na Musamman Suka Bayyana
sw: Inasifiwa kwa kiasi kikubwa na vyombo vya habari
yo: Àwọn Ilé Akọ̀ròyìn Gbóríyìn Gidi Gan-an Fún-un
zu: Inconywe Kakhulu yiZindaba

am: የ ኖት 30 ተከታታይ( NOTE 30 series) የበረዶ መስታወት ወይም ከቆዳ የተሰራ የስልክ ጀርባ መሸፈኛ መካከል ያለን ምርጫ ያቀርባል፣ ይህም ውበቱን ይጨምራል።
en: The NOTE 30 series offers a choice between a frosted glass back or a faux leather finish, adding a touch of elegance.
ha: Jerin wayar NOTE 30 yana ba da zaɓi tsakanin gilashin da aka yi sanyi ko kuma ƙarshen fata na faux, ga ƙarin taɓawa mai kyau.
sw: Muendelezo wa NOTE 30 unatoa chaguo kati ya glasi iliyoganda nyuma au uundaji wa ngozi bandia, na kuongeza mguso wa umaridadi.
yo: Àṣetẹ̀léra NOTE 30 náà pèsè ànfààní láàrín ẹ̀yìn oní gílásì tó pamọ́ tàbí píparí pẹ̀lú awọ oníke, tí ó ń ṣe àfikún ẹwà.
zu: Uchungechunge lweNOTE 30 llunikeza ukukhetha phakathi kwegilasi ngemuva noma kufakwe isikhumba ukwengeza isitayela esihle.

am: "የተከበረው የቴክኖሎጂ መገናኛ ብዙኃን 'ጂ.ኤስ.ኤም. አሬና'(GSMArena) የኢንፊኒክስን ምኞት እንዲህ ሲል አወድሶታል፣ " ኢንፊኒክስ ግልፅ የሆነ ምኞት እንዳለው እና ከክፍሉ በላይ ሰብሮ መውጣትንም ይፈልጋል፣ ይህንንም እናደንቃለን።"
en: Esteemed tech media GSMArena praised Infinix's ambition, stating, "Infinix clearly has ambition and wants to punch above its class, which we appreciate."
ha: Kafofin watsa labarai masu daraja kamar GSMArena sun yaba da burin kamfanin Infinix, yana mai cewa, "A bayyane yake kamfanin Infinix yana da buri kuma yana son wucewa sama da ajinsa, wanda muke godiya."
sw: Vyombo vya habari vya tech vinavyoheshimika GSMArena vilisifu nia ya Infinix, vikisema, "Infinix ni dhahiri ina matazamio na inataka kuwa juu ya kiwango chake, ambacho tunathamini".
yo: Ilé akọ̀ròyìn ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ alápọ̀nlé GSMArena gbóríyìn fún èròngba NOTE 30, tó ń sọ wí pé, "Infinix ní èròngbà tó fojú hàn ó sì fẹ́ tayọ àwọn ẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀, tí a sì mọ rírì rẹ̀."
zu: Izindaba zobuchwepheshe ezihloniphekile iGSMArena iyatuswa ngentshisekelo, ukusho Infinix ngokucacile inentshisekelo futhi ifuna ukungena ngaphezu kwekilasi layo, esikujabulelayo

am: የባትሪውን ህይወት በተመለከተ፣ ኖት 30 (NOTE 30) ከሚጠበቀው በላይ አልፏል፣ ሳያልቅ በመቆየት ሙከራዎች ላይም አስደናቂ የ119 ሰዓታትን ቆይታ አሳክቷል።
en: When it comes to battery life, the NOTE 30 exceeded expectations, achieving an impressive 119 hours in endurance tests.
ha: Idan aka zo batun ƙarfin batir, wayar NOTE 30 ta wuce abin da ake tsammani, tana samun sa'o'i 119 a lokacin gwaje-gwajen juriya.
sw: Linapokuja suala la maisha ya betri, NOTE 30 ilizidi matarajio, na kufikia masaa 119 ya kuvutia katika majaribio ya uvumilivu.
yo: Tí ó bá di ọ̀rọ̀ ẹ̀mi bátírì, NOTE 30 náà tayọ ìrètí, ó ṣe àṣeyọrí wákàtí 119 tó yanilẹ́nu nínú àyẹ̀wò ìfaradà.
zu: Uma kuza empilweni yebhurethi, iNOTE 30 yedlula obekulindelekile, ithola okujabulisayo amahora angu-119 esivivinyo sokubekezela.

am: ጂ.ኤስ.ኤም. አሬና'(GSMArena) እንዳመለከተውም ፣"ይህ እኛ ከዚህ ቺፕሴት(chipset) እና የባትሪ አቅም ጥምር ላይ ከጠበቅነው በላይ የተሻለ ነው።"
en: GSMArena noted, "That's even better than what we expected from this chipset and battery capacity combo.
ha: GSMArena ta lura, "Hakan ma ya fi abin da muke tsammani daga wannan ƙwaƙwalwar kwamfuta da ƙarfin batiri.
sw: GSMArena ilibainisha, "Hiyo ni bora zaidi kuliko vile tulivyotarajia kutokakatika chipset hii na mchanganyiko wa uwezo wa betri wa Combo.
yo: GSMArena sọ wí pé, "Ìyẹn tún dára gidi gan ju nǹkan tí à ń retí lára àpapọ̀ àkójọpọ̀ èkíkán yìí àti ìkápá bátírì.
zu: IGSMArena ithe, "Kungcono kakhulu ukunobesikulindele kuleshiphusethi nebhurethi inhlanganisela enamandla.

am: ኖት 30 (NOTE 30) በተለይ በባትሪው በተጠባባቂ የመቆየት አቅሙ የላቀ ነው።
en: The Note 30 excels in standby endurance in particular.”
ha: Bayanin wayar Note 30 ya yi fice a cikin juriyar ta musamman. ”
sw: NOTE 30 inafaulu katika ustahimilivu wa kusubiri haswa"
yo: Note 30 náà yanrantí nínú ìfaradà ìmúrasílẹ̀ ní pàtàkì jùlọ."
zu: INOTE 30 yenza kahle ekubekezeleni kokulinda."

am: ኖት 30 '(NOTE 30) በባትሪ ህይወቱ ማስደነቅ ብቻ ሳይሆን፣ 45 ዋት(W) ፈጣን የኃይል መሙላት አቅሙም የዘላቂ የመገረም ስሜትን ይፈጥራል።
en: Not only does the NOTE 30 impress with its battery life, but its 45W fast charging capability also leaves a lasting impression.
ha: Ba wai kawai wayar NOTE 30 tana burgewa da rayuwar batir ɗinta ba ne, amma ƙarfin cajinta mai sauri na 45W shima yana sanya ra'ayi mai ɗorewa.
sw: NoOTE 30 haivutii tu maisha ya betri, lakini uwezo wake wa kuchaji haraka wa 45W pia huacha mvuto wa kudumu.
yo: Kìí ṣe wí pé NOTE 30 yanilẹ́nu pẹ̀lú ẹ̀mí bátírì rẹ̀ nìkan, ṣùgbọ́n ìkápá gbígba agbára kíákíá 45W rẹ̀ tún ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ èrò mánigbàgbé.
zu: INOTE 30 ayijabulisi abantu kuphela ngempilo yebhurethi kodwa ne-45W wokukwazi ukushaja ngokushesha futhi ihlala isikhathi eside.

am: ስልኩ በማለፊያ (bypass)፣ በግልባጭ (reverse) እና በዘመኑ (smart) ተግባራት፣ አዲስ ፈጠራ የሆነ ሁሉን አቀፍ ፈጣን የኃይል መሙያ መፍትሄን ይሰጣል።
en: The phone features an innovative all-scenario fast charging solution with bypass, reverse, and smart functions.
ha: Wayar tana da sabbin hanyoyin caji mai sauri ta wane salo ta baya, da tdawowa, da ayyuka masu wayo.
sw: Simu ina suluhisho bunifu la kuchaji kwa haraka la hali zote na bypass, kinyume na vitendaji mahiri.
yo: Ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ náà ní ìmọ̀ ọ̀tun ọ̀nà àbáyọ gbígba agbára kíákíá ní gbogbo ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ pẹ̀lú pípẹ́ kọjá, ìdápadà, àti àwọn ìṣesí ayárabíàṣá.
zu: Ifoni inezinto okusha isibonelo sakho konke ukushaja ngokushesha isixazululo sokudlula, ukuhlehla nokusebenza okuphusile.

am: ይህ በተለያዩ ሁኔታዎች ውስጥ ሆነው የባትሪ ኃይልን የመሙላት ልምድን ያሻሽላል።
en: This enhances the charging experience in various situations.
ha: Wannan yana haɓaka ƙwarewar caji a yanayi daban-daban.
sw: Hii huongeza uzoefu wa kuchaji katika hali mbalimbali.
yo: Èyí ń ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn ìrírí gbígba agbára ní oríṣiríṣi ọ̀nà.
zu: Lokhu kwandisa isipiliyoni sokushaja ezimweni ezahlukene.

am: የማለፊያው ባትሪ መሙላት ተግባሩ፣ ለምሳሌ፣ የስልኩን ማዘርቦርድ በቀጥታ ኃይል በመሙላት፣ባትሪው ላይ ያለ ጫናን ይቀንሳል እናም የጨዋታዎን አፈጻጸም ሁኔተሰ ያሻሽላል—ይህ ለባትሪ ጎጂ የሞባይል ተጫዋቾች አስፈላጊ ባህሪ ነው።
en: The bypass charging function, for instance, directly powers the phone's motherboard, reducing battery strain and improving gaming performance—an essential feature for avid mobile gamers.
ha: Cajin kewayawa, alal misali, yana ba da caji kai tsaye ga mahaifar wayar, yana rage nauyin batiri da haɓaka aikin wasanni—wani muhimmin fasali ga ƙwararrun yan wasan hannu.
sw: Kitendaji cha kuchaji cha bypass, kwa mfano, huwasha mazabodi ya simu moja kwa moja, kupunguza shinikizo la betri na kuboresha utendaji kazi wa michezo, kipengele muhimu kwa wachezaji wanaopenda simu za mkononi.
yo: Ìṣesí pípẹ́ ìgbagbára náà, fún àpẹẹrẹ, máa gbé agbára tààrà sí orí àpótí agbára ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ náà, tó sì ń ṣe àdínkù àlòpa bátírì tó sì ń ṣe àtúnṣe ìṣesí ayò títa —ìrísí tó ṣe pàtàkì fún àwọn tó fẹ́ràn ayò títa lórí ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀.
zu: Ukudlula ukusebenza kokushaja,isibonelo, kunika ngqo amandla imathabhodi yefoni, yehlisa ingcindezi kubhurethi nokwenza kangcono ukusebenza kokudlala-into ebalulekile kubadlali abasha bamafoni.

am: ጂ.ኤስ.ኤም. አሬና'(GSMArena) በአፅንኦትም እንዲህ ብሏል ፣"ይህ በጣም ጥሩ ባህሪ ነው፣በተለይም ለስልክ ላይ ጨዋታ እናም የባትሪውን ረጅም ዕድሜ በእጅጉ ሊጨምር ይችላል።"
en: GSMArena highlighted, "This is a great feature, particularly for gaming and can greatly increase the longevity of the battery.”
ha: GSMArena ta yi tsokaci, "Wannan babban fasali ne, musamman don wasanni sannan yana iya haɓaka tsawon rayuwar batiri."
sw: GSMArena aliangazia, "Hiki ni kipengele kizuri, huswa kwa michezo ya kubahatisha na kinaweza kuongeza maisha marefu ya Betri".
yo: GSMArena ṣàlàyé pé, "Èyí jẹ́ ìrísí tó dára, pàápàá jùlọ fún ayò títa ó sì lè ṣe àfikún sí ìṣẹ̀mi bátírì náà gidi gan-an.
zu: GSMArena iveze,Yinto enhle le,ikakhulukazi uma ufuna ukudlala futhi unganyusa kakhulu ubude bebhurethi

am: ታዋቂው አሜሪካዊ የቴክኖሎጂ ጦማሪ(blogger) ሳም ጋጀት ጋይ (SomeGadgetGuy)፣ የኖት 30 ፕሮ (NOTE 30 Pro)ን አጠቃላይ የድምፅ ጥራት፣ በትንሽ መኝታ ቤት ውስጥ የጄ.ቢ.ኤል (JBL) መቃኛን በመጠቀም፣ ፍተሻውን አድርጓል።
en: Renowned American tech blogger SomeGadgetGuy conducted a comprehensive sound quality test of the NOTE 30 Pro with JBL tuning in a small bedroom.
ha: Shahararren marubucin yanar gizo na Amurka SomeGadgetGuy ya gudanar da gwajin ƙwaƙwaf kan ingancin sauti na wayar NOTE 30 Pro tare da kunna JBL a cikin ƙaramin ɗakin kwana.
sw: Mwanablogu mashuhuri wa kiteknolojia wa Marekani SomeGadgetGuy alifanya jaribio la kina la ubora wa sauti la NOTE 30 Pro pamoja na JBL ikitengeneza kwenye chumba kidogo cha kulala.
yo: Gbajúgbajà agbéróyìn ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ jáde-kékeré ọmọ ilẹ̀ Amẹ́ríkà SomeGadgetGuy ṣe àyẹ̀wo ojúlówó ohùn kíkún lórí NOTE 30 Pro pẹ̀lú rédíò JBL nínú yàrá ibùsùn kékeré kan.
zu: Ubhloga wezobuchwepheshe odumile waseAmerica uSomeGadgetGuy wenze isivivinyo sokubheka ubuhle bomsindo omkhulu kuNOTE 30 Pro ngeJBL yokushintsha egumbini lokulala elincane.

am: ግልጽ በሆነ ድምጽ እና በትንሽ የመዛባት አቅም በማስመዝገብ፣ ውጤቶቹም አስደናቂ ነበሩ።
en: The results were impressive, with clear audio and minimal distortion.
ha: Sakamakon ya kasance mai ban sha'awa, tare da bayyanannen sauti da ƙarancin hayaniya.
sw: Matokeo yalikuwa yakuvutia, sauti nzuri na mikwaruzo kidogo.
yo: Àwọn àbájáde náà yanilẹ́nu, pẹ̀lú ohùn tó já gaara àti ìdíwọ́ ìwọ̀nba.
zu: Imiphumela ibincomeka,nokuzwakalayo okucacile,nokulahla umkhondo okuncane.

am: ሳም ጋጀት ጋይ (SomeGadgetGuy)፣ " ማለቴ ይህ በጣም ጥሩ ድምፅ ነው" ሲልም ደምድሟል።
en: SomeGadgetGuy concluded, "I mean, that's pretty good sound."
ha: SomeGadgetGuy ya kammala da cewa, "Ina nufin, wannan kyakkyawan sauti ne."
sw: SomeGadgetGuy alihitimisha, "Namaanisha, hiyo ni sauti nzuri sana."
yo: SomeGadgetGuy parí rẹ̀, "Mo ní, ohun tó dára gidi gan-an nìyẹn."
zu: ISomeGadgetGuy iphethe, "ngichaza ukuthi loyo umsindo ozwakala kahle."

am: ጦማሪው(blogger) ፣ያልተጠበቀ መልካም ተሞክሮን ለተጠቃሚዎች የማድረስ አቅም እንዳለው በማመን፤ በ60Hz፣ 90Hz እና 120Hz የብርሀን መጠኖች መካከል እራሱን በማላመድ ማስተካከያን በሚያቀርበው ስክሪኑም መደሰቱን ገልጿል።
en: The blogger also expressed satisfaction with the screen, which offers adaptive adjustment between 60Hz, 90Hz, and 120Hz, believing it has the potential to deliver an unexpectedly positive experience to users.
ha: Mai rubutun ra'ayi na yanar gizon ya kuma bayyana gamsuwa da allon wayar, wanda ke ba da gyare-gyaren daidaitawa tsakanin 60Hz, 90Hz, da 120Hz, yana mai imani cewa wayar na sadar da ƙwarewa mai kyau ga masu amfani.
sw: Pia mwanablogu alionyesha kuridhishwa na skrini, ambayo inatoa marekebisho yanayobadilika kati ya 60Hz, 90Hz, na 120Hz, akiamini kuwa ina uwezo wa kutoa matumizi chanya yasiyotabiriwa kwa watumiaji.
yo: Agbéróyìnjáde-kékeré náà tún ṣe àfihàn ìtẹ́lọ́rùn rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú agbàwòrán náà, tó ń pèsè àyípadà ìbádọ́gba láàrín 60Hz, 90Hz, àti 120Hz, tó sì nígbàgbọ́ pé ó ní ànfààní láti ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ìrírí rere láìròtẹ́lẹ̀ fún aṣàmúlò.
zu: Ibhloga izwakalise ukwaneliseka ngesikrini, esikunikeza ukushintsheka phakathi kuka60Hz,90Hz no120Hz,sikholelwa ukuthi inamandla okuhambisa isipiliyoni esihle esingalindelekile kubasebenzisi.

am: በተፅእኖ ፈጣሪዎችም የተወደደ ሆኗል
en: Loved by Influencers
ha: Ta samu karɓuwa a wurin masu tasiri
sw: Hupendwa na wahamasishaji
yo: Àwọn Àwòkọ́ṣe Orí Ayélujára Fẹ́ran Rẹ̀
zu: Ithandwa Abanomthelela

am: የአለም አቀፍ ተፅዕኖ ፈጣሪ የቴክኖሎጂ ድረ-ገጾች ፣'9ለ5ጎግል' (9to5Google) እና 'ጂዝቻይና' (GizChina) የ 'ኖት 30 ተከታታይ' ምርትን ወጪ ቆጣቢነትን አወድሰዋል።
en: Influential global technology websites, 9to5Google and GizChina, highly praised the cost-effectiveness of the NOTE 30 series.
ha: Shafukan yanar gizo masu tasiri na fasaha na duniya, 9to5Google da GizChina, sun yaba da ingancin farashi na jerin wayoyin NOTE 30.
sw: Tovuti za kiteknolojia za kimataifa zenye ushawishi, 9to5Google na GizChina, zilisifia sana ufanisi wa gharama wa muendelezo wa NOTE 30.
yo: Ibùdó ìtàkùn ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ gbájúmọ̀ lágbàyé, 9toGoogle àti GizChina, gbé oríyìn ńlá fún ìmúnádóko lówó kékeré àṣetẹ̀léra NOTE 30.
zu: Amawebhusayithi ezobuchwepheshe anomthelela emhlabeni, 9to5Google kanye neGizChina, income kakhulu ukusebenza kokubiza kochungechunge lweNOTE 30.

am: 9ለ5ጎግል' (9to5Google)፣ኖት 30 5ጂ (NOTE 30 5G) በዋጋ ክልሉ ውስጥ ካሉ ከሌሎች አማራጮች እንደሚበልጥ ገልጾ፣ ይህም በዩናይትድ ስቴትስ የላቀ የተጠቃሚ ተሞክሮን ይሰጣል ብሏል።
en: 9to5Google stated that the NOTE 30 5G surpasses other options in its price range, offering a superior user experience in the States.
ha: 9to5Google ya bayyana cewa wayar NOTE 30 5G ta zarce sauran zaɓuɓɓuka a cikin kewayon farashinta, tana ba da ingantaccen ƙwarewar mai amfani a Amurka.
sw: 9to5Google ilisema kuwa, NOTE 30 5G inakaribia machaguo mengine katika safu yake ya bei, na kutoa matumizi bora ya mtumiaji nchini Marekani.
yo: 9toGoogle sọ wí pé NOTE 30 5G tayọ gbogbo àwọn nǹkan mìíràn tí wọ́n jẹ́ iye kan náà, tó sì ń pèsè ìrírí asàmúlò tó tayọ ní States.
zu: I-9to5Google iveze ukuthi iNOTE 30 5G idlula okunye ukukhetha ezingeni lenani layo, ukunikeza ngesipiliyoni esikhulu somsebenzisi eStates.

am: ጂዝቻይና' (GizChina) ለኖት 30 ፕሮ (NOTE 30 Pro) ከ5ቱ የ 4.4 ከፍተኛ ነጥብ ሰጥቶታል፣" እውነተኛ የቪ.ኤፍ.ኤም (VFM) አሸናፊ" በማለትም አውጇል።
en: GizChina awarded the NOTE 30 Pro a high score of 4.4 points, declaring it a "TRUE VFM WINNER."
ha: GizChina ya bawa wayar NOTE 30 Pro babban maki na 4.4, yana mai bayyana ta a matsayin "WAYAR DA TA LASHE VFM BA HAMAYYA."
sw: GizChina iliipa NOTE 30 Pro alama ya juu ya daraja 4.4, ikitangaza kuwa "TRUE VFM WINNER".
yo: GizChina gbé ààmì gíga 4.4 ààmì fún NOTE 30 Pro, tí ó sì kéde rẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí "OLÙJÁWÉOLÚBORÍ VFM TÒÓTỌ́".
zu: IGizChina iklomelise INOTE 30 Pro isiko esiphezulu samaphuzu angu 4.4,isho ukuthi INGUMNQOBI WANGEMPELA WEVFM

am: ሁለቱም ግምገማዎች የ ኖት 30 ፕሮን (NOTE 30 Pro) ልዩ የውበት ንድፍን፣ ኃይለኛ የሃርድዌር( የስልኩ አካላዊ ክፍል) አተገባበርን፣ አስደናቂ የስክሪን ጥራት እና አጠቃላይ ፈጣን የኃይል መሙያ ቴክኖሎጂን አወድሰዋል።
en: Both reviews praised the exceptional aesthetic design, powerful hardware performance, stunning screen quality, and comprehensive fast charging technology of the NOTE 30 Pro.
ha: Dukan tantancewar sun yaba da keɓaɓɓen ƙirar, aiki mai ƙarfi, ingancin allo mai ban sha'awa, da cikakkiyar fasahar caji mai sauri na wayar NOTE 30 Pro.
sw: Mapitio yote mawili yalisifu muundo wa kipekee wa kuvutia, utendaji kazi mzuri wa vifaa, ubora wa kuvutia wa skrini, na teknolojia maridhawa ya kuchaji kwa haraka ya NOTE 30 Pro.
yo: Àgbéyẹ̀wò méjèèjì gbóríyìn fún ìṣelọ́jọ̀ ẹwà aláìlẹ́gbẹ́, ìṣesí ohùn èlò arídìmú alágbára, ojúlówó agbàwòrán tó rẹwà, àti ìmọ̀ gbígba agbára kíákíá tó pé ti NOTE 30 Pro.
zu: Kokubili ukubhekwa kuncome ukwakhiwa okwahlukile,ukusebenza okunamandla kwehadiwe,ungqo wesikhrini esihle nezobuchwepheshe bokushaja ngokushesha kuNOTE 30Pro.

am: በአጠቃላይ የቴክኖሎጂ የብዙሀን መገናኛዎች በ በኢንፊኒክስ ኖት 30 ተከታታዮች(Infinix NOTE 30 series) ላይ እጅግ የላቀ አድናቆትን አቅርበዋል፣ ይህም የላቀ አፈጻጸም እና ልምድን በተመጣጣኝ ዋጋ የማቅረብ ነጥብ ላይ በአንድ ድምፅ እውቅና ሰጥተውታል።
en: Overall, technology media has lavished extremely high praise on the Infinix NOTE 30 series, unanimously acknowledging its outstanding performance and experience at an affordable price point.
ha: Gabaɗaya, kafofin watsa labaru na fasaha sun ba da babbar lambar yabo a kan jerin wayoyin Infinix NOTE 30, tare da amincewa da ƙwarewar aikinta da gogewa a farashi mai araha.
sw: Kiujumla, Vyombo vya habari vya kiteknolojia vimesifia sana muendelezo wa Infinix NOTE 30, na kukubali kwa kauli moja utendajikazi wake bora na uzoefu kwa bei nafuu.
yo: Lápapọ̀, àwọn ilé iṣé ìròyìn ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ ti gbé oríyìn ńlá lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀ fún àṣetẹ̀léra Infinix NOTE 30, tí wọ́n ń fi ìdí ìṣesí aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ rẹ̀ àti ìrírí ní ọ̀gangan iye owó tí ò ganilára múlẹ̀ lóhùn kan.
zu: Kukhona konke izindaba zobuchwepheshe zinconywe kakhulu kuchungechunge lweInfinix NOTE 30, ngokuvumelana bebonga ukusebenza kahle nesipiliyoni ngenani elikhonekayo.

am: ተከታታዩም' ለየት ላለ ጠቀሜታው ምስጋናን ተችሮታል ።
en: The series is lauded for its exceptional value.
ha: An yaba wa jerin wayoyin don ƙimarsa na musamman.
sw: Muendelezo unasifika kwa thamani yake ya kipekee.
yo: Ìgbóríyìn wà fún àṣetẹ̀léra náà fún iyì aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ rẹ̀.
zu: Uchungechunge lushayelwa izandla ngenani lalo elehlukile.

am: ይህ፣ ሙሉ በሙሉ አዲስ የሆነው የኖት 30 (NOTE 30) ተከታታዮች ፣የአነስተኛ ወጪ የስልክ ገበያውን፣ በግማሽ ዓመት ውስጥ እንደሚቆጣጠር ያለንን እምነት ያጠናክራል።
en: This reinforces our belief that the all-new NOTE 30 series will dominate the low-cost phone market in the latter half of the year.
ha: Wannan yana ƙarfafa imaninmu cewa sabon-sabon jerin wayoyin NOTE 30 zai mamaye kasuwar waya mai rahusa a ƙarshen rabin shekara.
sw: Hii inaimarisha imani yetu kwamba muendelezo mpya kabisa wa NOTE 30 utatawala soko la simu za bei nafuu katika nusu ya mwisho wa mwaka.
yo: Ẹ̀yí ń ṣe ìwúrí fún ìgbàgbọ́ wa pé gbogbo àṣetẹ̀léra NOTE 30 tuntun máa borí ọjà ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ olówó-pọ́ọ́kú ní ìdajì ọdún náà tó kàn.
zu: Lokhu kugcizelela ukukholelwa kwethu ukuthi lonke uchungechunge lweNOTE 30 olusha luzogcwala imakethe yamafoni abiza kancane kuhhafu wonyaka.

am: ኢንፊኒክስ' የዛሬውን እና የነገውን ወጣቶች የበለጠ ለማበረታታት በተዘጋጁ የወደፊት የኢንፊኒክስ መሳሪያዎች እና በኖት 30 (NOTE 30) ምርቶቹ፣ የቴክኖሎጂን ደስታ በአለም ዙሪያ ለተጨማሪ ሰዎች ለማምጣት ያለመ ነው።
en: Infinix aims to bring the joy of technology to more people worldwide with the NOTE 30 and future Infinix devices ready to further empower today’s and tomorrow’s youth.
ha: Kamfanin Infinix yana nufin kawo farin cikin fasaha ga mutane da yawa a duk duniya tare da wayar NOTE 30 da na'urorin Infinix na gaba a shirye don ƙara ƙarfafa matasa na yau da gobe.
sw: Infinix inalenga kuleta furaha ya teknolojia kwa watu wengi zaidi Duniani kote kwa NOTE 30 na vifaa vya baadae vya Infinix vilivyotayari kuwawezesha zaidi vijana wa leo na kesho.
yo: Infinix ń gbèrò láti mú ayọ̀ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ wá fún ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ènìyàn káàkiri àgbáyé pẹ̀lú NOTE 30 àti àwọn ohun èlò Infinix ọjọ́ iwájú tí wọ́n ti ṣetán láti tunbọ̀ ró àwọn ọ̀dọ tòní àti tọ̀la lágbára.
zu: Infinix ihlose ukuletha injabulo yezobuchwepheshe kubantu abaningi emhlabeni wonkenge NOTE 30 namadivayisi ekusasa eInfinix bakulungele ukusiza intsha yanamhlanje nakusasa.

am: አይ-አካዳሚ (i-Academy) በቴክኖሎጂ ተሰጥኦ ያላቸው ግለሰቦችን ያበረታታል እናም ሃካቶን(Hackaton) የተሰኘውን የሳይበር ጠላፊዎች ውድድር ስኬትን ያከብራል።
en: i-Academy Empowers Tech Talent and Celebrates Hackathon Success
ha: Makarantar i-Academy tana ba da Hazaƙar Fasaha kuma tana Bukin Nasarar Hackathon
sw: i-Academy huwezesha vipaji vya Tech na kuazimisha mafanikio ya Hackathon
yo: i-Academy Ró Àwọn Tó Lẹ́bùn Ìmọ̀ Ẹ̀rọ Lágbára ó sì Ṣe Ayẹyẹ Àṣeyọrí Ìgbọ̀nàẹ̀bùrúwọlé Ọlọ́gbọran
zu: I-i-Academy isiza iTech Talent futhi ibungaza ukuphumelela kweHackathon

am: በአፍሪካ ፕሩደንትያል ኃ.የተ.የግ.ማ የሚታገዘው አይ-አካዳሚ (i-Academy)፣ በቴክኖሎጂ ኢንዱስትሪ ውስጥ የእድገትና የዕድገት እድሎችን በመፍጠር ረገድ ከፍተኛ እመርታ ማድረጉን ቀጥሏል።
en: i-Academy, the leading tech education initiative powered by Africa Prudential Plc, continues to make significant strides in creating opportunities for growth and advancement in the tech industry.
ha: Makarantar i-Academy, babban shirin koyar da ilimin fasaha wanda Africa Prudential Plc ke tallafawa, yana ci gaba da samun gagarumar nasara wajen samar da damammaki na ci gaba da wayewa a masana'antar fasaha.
sw: i-Academy,mpango unaoongoza elimu wa elimu ya teknolojia unaoendeshwa na Africa Prudential PIc, unaendelea kupiga hatua kubwa katika kuunda fursa za ukuaji na maendeleo katika tasnia ya teknolojia.
yo: i-Academy, ìpilẹ̀ṣẹ̀ ẹ̀kọ́ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ tó ń léwájú tí Africa Prudential Plc ṣe agbátẹrù rẹ̀, ń tẹ̀síwájú láti gbé àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ pàtàkì níbi ìpèsè àwọn ànfààní fún ìdàgbàsókè àti ìtẹ̀síwájú ní ẹ̀ka ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ.
zu: I-i-Academy ehola kwezokufundwa kwezobuchwepheshe iqale ukusizwa yiAfrika Prudential PLc,iyaqhubeka yenza umehluko obalulekile ekwakheni amathuba okukhula nokuya phambili kumbini yezobuchwepheshe.

am: በቴክኖሎጂ ተሰጥኦ ያላቸው ግለሰቦች ፍልሰት ተጽእኖን ለመቀነስ ባለው ቁርጠኝነት፣ አይ-አካዳሚ (i-Academy)፣ ወጣት የቴክኖሎጂ ወዳጆችን ለስራ ዝግጁ እንዲሆኑ አስፈላጊ ክህሎቶችን እና እውቀትን ለማስታጠቅ የተነደፈ ሁሉን አቀፍ የዘጠኝ ወራት የስልጠና መርሃ ግብርን ይሰጣል ፣ እንዲሁም በየጊዜው እያደገ በሚሄደው የቴክኖሎጂ ገጽታ ሂደት የላቀ ብቃት እንዲኖራቸው ያደርጋል ።
en: With its commitment to mitigating the effects of tech-talent attrition, i-Academy offers a comprehensive nine-month training program designed to equip young tech enthusiasts with the necessary skills and knowledge to be job ready, as well as excel in the ever-evolving technology landscape.
ha: Tare da jajircewarta na rage tasirin hazaƙar fasaha, makarantar i-Academy tana ba da cikakkiyar horo na watanni tara da aka tsara don bawa matasa masu sha'awar fannin fasaha da ƙwarewa da ilimin da suka dace don kasancewa a shirye don aiki, tare da yin fice a fanni fasaha da koyaushe ke ƙara faɗaɗa.
sw: Pamoja na dhamira yake ya kupunguza athari za msukosuko wa vipaji vya kiteknolojia, i-Academy inatoa programu kamili ya mafunzo ya miezi tisa iliyoundwa ili kuwapa wapenda teknolojia wachanga ujuzi na maarifa muhimu ili kuwa tayari kazini, vilevile kufaulu katika maendeleo yanayoendelea katika mazingira ya teknolojia.
yo: Pẹ̀lú ìfọkànsìn rẹ̀ láti mú àdínkù bá ipa àdínkù àwọn tó lẹ́bùn ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ, i-Academy ń pèsè ètò ìkọ́ni olóṣù-mẹ́sàn kíkún tí wọ́n gbé kalẹ̀ láti ró àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tí wọ́n nífẹ̀ sí ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ pẹ̀lú àwọn ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe àti ìmọ̀ tó ṣe pàtàkì láti ṣetán iṣẹ́ ṣíṣe, kí wọ́n sì ṣe àṣeyọrí ní àwùjọ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ tó ń yípada ní gbogbo ìgbà.
zu: Ngokuzibophezela kwayo ukunciphisa umethelela kuthalente lezobuchwepheshe, i-i-Academy, inikele ngohlelo olukhulu lokuqeqeshwa kwezinyanga eziyisishagalolunye eyakhelwe ukuqeqesha intsha enentshisekelo kwezobuchwepheshe enamakhono adingekayo nolwazi lokulungela umsebenzi,nokwenza kahle endaweni yokulokhu kushintsha ezobuchwepheshe.

am: የአይ-አካዳሚ የሥልጠና መርሃ ግብር በአስፈላጊ ቀላል መሰረታዊ ክህሎት ስልጠና የታገዘ የወደፊት ዘመን እና ያለፈውን ዘመን የሶፍትዌር ልማትን ያጠቃልላል።
en: The i-Academy training program encompasses frontend and backend software development, supplemented with essential soft skills training.
ha: Shirin horo na i-Academy ya ƙunshi ƙirƙirar manhaja ta gaba da ta baya, wanda aka tsara tare da muhimman horon fasaha mai sauƙi.
sw: Programu ya mafunzo ya i-Academy inajumuisha maendeleo ya programu yajayo na yanyuma, inayoongezewa na mafunzo muhimu ya ujuzi mzuri.
yo: Ètò ìkọ́ni i-Academy rọ kiri ká àgbékalẹ̀ àwọn ohun èlò àìrídìmú ajẹmọ́wájú àti ajẹmẹ́yìn, pẹ̀lú àfikún àwọn ìfikọ́ni ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe àìrídìmú tó ṣe pàtàkì.
zu: Uhlelo lokuqeqeshwa lwe-i-Academy lubandakanya ukuthuthuka kohlelokusebenza lwangaphambili nangemuva,kwengezwa nokuqeqeshwaa kumakhono athambile futhi abalulekile.

am: በድብልቅ የመማር ማስተማር አቀራረቡ፣ ተማሪዎች በተመረቁበት ወቅት ለኢንዱስትሪው ፍላጎቶች በሚገባ መዘጋጀታቸውን የሚያረጋገጥ ጠቃሚ ልምድ እና የእውነተኛ ህይወት ፕሮጀክትን ያገኛሉ።
en: Through a hybrid learning approach, students gain valuable hands-on experience and real-life project exposure, ensuring they are well-prepared for the demands of the industry upon graduation.
ha: Ta hanyar tsarin ilmantarwa a gauraye, ɗalibai suna samun ƙwarewa ta hannu da kuma wayewa da ayyukan rayuwa na zahiri, suna tabbatar da cewa sun shirya sosai don buƙatun masana'antu bayan kammala karatun.
sw: Kupitia mbinu ya msote ya kujifunza, wanafunzi hupata uzoefu muhimu wa kushughulikia na kufichua mradi wa maisha halisi, kuhakikisha kuwa wametayalisha vyama kwa mahitaji ya tasnia hiyo baada ya kuhitimu.
yo: Nípasẹ̀ ìlànà ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ aláfibọ̀, àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ń ní ìrírí ìfikọ́ra oníyebíye àti ìfinimọ iṣẹ́ àkànṣe abáyé-mu, tó ń ṣàrídájú pé wọ́n gbaradì dáadáa fún ohun tí ẹ̀ka náà ń bèèrè fún nígbà tí wọ́n bá kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ jáde.
zu: Indlela eyinhlanganisela yokufunda abavundi bathola isipiliyoni sokuzibambela nokubona amaphrojekthi empilo yangempela,ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bazilungiselele kahle ezimfunweni zemboni uma sebezogogoga.

am: ፈጠራን እና ትብብርን ለማጎልበት ባለው ቁርጠኝነት፣ አይ-አካዳሚ (i-Academy)፣ በቅርቡ እጅግ በጣም የተሳካ ሃካቶን(Hackaton) አስተናግዷል፣ ውድድሩም በአጠቃላይ ዘጠኝ ተሳታፊ ቡድኖችንም አገናኝቷል።
en: As part of its commitment to fostering innovation and collaboration, i-Academy recently hosted a tremendously successful hackathon, featuring a total of nine participating groups.
ha: A wani ɓangare ƙoƙarinta na haɓaka sabbin abubuwa da haɗin gwiwa, kwanannan i-Academy ta karɓi gagarumin gasar hackathon cikin nasara, wanda ke bayyana jimlar ƙungiyoyi tara.
sw: Kama ya sehemu ya dhamira yake ya kukuza uvumbuzi na ushirikiano, i-Academy hivi karibuni iliandaa Hackathon yenye mafanikio makubwa, ikishirikiana na jumla ya vikundi tisa vilivyoshiriki.
yo: Lára ìfọkànsìn rẹ̀ sí ṣíṣe àtìlẹ́yìn fún ìmọ̀ ọ̀tun àti àjọṣepọ̀, i-Academy ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ìgbọ̀nàẹ̀bùrúwọlé ọlọ́gbọran tó jẹ́ àṣeyọrí ńlá láìpẹ́ yìí, tí ó ṣàfihàn àpapọ̀ àwọn irọ̀ akópa mẹ́sàn-án.
zu: Njengengxenye yokuzibophezela ukuze kulondolozwe ukwenza okusha nokubambisana, i-i-Academy isanda kubamba ihackathon eyimpumelelo enkulu,ihambisana nesamba samaqoqo ayisishagalolunye abambe iqhaza.

am: ዝግጅቱ ለተሳተፉት ቡድኖች፣ ያገኙትን እውቀት ተግባራዊነት ለማሳየት፣ ችሎታቸውን ለማሳየት እና ልዩ ችግር ፈቺ አቅማቸውን ለማሳየት የሚያስችል መድረክን አዘጋጅቷል።
en: The event provided a platform for cohorts to showcase the practical application of their acquired knowledge, demonstrate their talents, and exhibit their exceptional problem-solving abilities.
ha: Taron ya samar da dandali ga ƙungiyoyi don nuna aikace-aikacen ilimin da suka samu, da nuna gwanintarsu, da kuma baje kolin ƙwarewar warware matsalolinsu na musamman.
sw: Tukio hili lilipa jukwaa kwa vikundi kuonyesha matumizi ya vitendo ya maarifa waliyo pata, kuonyesha vipaji vyao, na kuonyesha uwezo wao wa kipekee wakutatua matatizo.
yo: Ètò náà pèsè ìkànnì fún àwọn ẹgbẹ́ láti ṣàfihàn ṣíṣe ṣàmúlò ìmọ̀ tí wọ́n gbà, kí wọ́n ṣàpèjúwe ẹ̀bùn wọn, kí wọ́n sì ṣe àfihàn ìṣesí yíanjú-ìṣòro aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ wọn.
zu: Lo mcimbi unikeze inkundla amaqoqo abantu ukuthi aveze ukusebenza kokwenza kolwazi abalutholil,bakhombise amathalente abo,futhi babukise ngokukwazi kwabo ukuxazulula izinkinga okwehlukile.

am: ከተሳታፊ ቡድኖች መካከል 150,000 NGN የገንዘብ ሽልማቱን በማግኘት በአሸናፊነት የወጣው ፣ 4 አስደናቂ ብቃት ያላቸው አራት ግለሰቦችን ያካተተው ቡድን 3 ነው።
en: Out of the participating groups, it was Group 3, comprising four remarkably talented individuals, that emerged as the victorious team, securing the coveted cash prize of 150,000 NGN.
ha: A cikin rukunonin da suka halarci gasar, rukuni na 3 ne wanda ya ƙunshi ƙwararrun mutane huɗu ne suka bayyana a matsayin ƙungiyar da ta yi nasara, inda suka samu kyautar kuɗi na NGN 150,000.
sw: Kuti ya vikundi vilivyo shiriki, lilikuwa ni kundi la tatu, lililo jumuisha watu wanne wenye vupaji vya kushangaza, ambalo liliibuka kama timu ya washindi, na kupata zawadi ya pesa taslimu 150,000 NGN.
yo: Láàrín àwọn irọ̀ tí wọ́n ń kópa, Irọ̀ 3, tó jẹ́ àkójọpọ̀ àwọn tó lápẹrẹ ẹ̀bùn mẹ́rin, ni wọ́n peregedé gẹ́gẹ́ bí ikọ̀ tó jáwé olúborí, tí wọ́n gba ẹ̀bùn owó 150,000 NGN tí wọ́n ń jà fún.
zu: Kumaqembu abambe iqhaza bekuyiqembu 3, elinabantu abane abanethalente elimangazayo,ilona eliqele njengeqembu elinqobile, bethola inani lemali abalifisayo elingu-150,000 NGN.

am: የ ሃካቶን(Hackaton) የዳኝነት መመዘኛዎች: አዲስ እይታን የማየት ክህሎትን እና የፈጠራ ብቃትን ፣ ቴክኒካል ብቃትን ፣ ችግርን የመፍታት አቅም ፣ ትብብር እና የቡድን ስራ ፣ የኮድ ጥራት ፣ የተጠቃሚዎች በልምዱ መደሰት እና የንድፍ ፣ ተፅእኖው እና የልኬቱ ስፋት ፣ አቀራረብ እና የመግባባት አቅምን እንዲሁም የስነምግባር ጉዳዮችን ጨምሮ የተለያዩ ገጽታዎችን ያጠቃልላል።
en: The judging criteria for the hackathon encompassed various aspects, including innovation and creativity, technical proficiency, problem-solving, collaboration and teamwork, code quality, user experience and design, impact and scalability, presentation and communication, as well as ethical considerations.
ha: Ma'aunin shari'a don gasar sun ƙunshi nau'o'i daban-daban, ciki har da ƙirƙira da dabaru, da ƙwarewar fasaha, da iya warware matsaloli, da haɗin gwiwa da haɗin gwiwar aiki, ingancin lambar, ƙwarewar mai amfani da tsari, da tasiri da salon karɓar canji, da gabatarwa da iya sadarwa, da kuma la'akari da ɗabi'a.
sw: Vigezo vya kuhukumu kwa Hackathon vilijumuisha vipengele mbalimbali, ikiwemo ushirikiano na kazi ya pamoja, ubora wa kanuni, uzoefu na usanifu wa mtumiaji, athari na ukubwa, uwasilishaji na mawasiliano, vilevile masuala ya maadili.
yo: Àwọn àwòmọ́ ìdájọ́ fún ìgbọ̀nàẹ̀bùrúwọlé ọlọ́gbọran náà kárí oríṣiríṣi ẹ̀ka, tó fi mọ́ ìmọ̀ ọ̀tun àti ọgbọ́n àtinúdá, ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ, yíyanjú-ìṣòro, àjọṣepọ̀ àti iṣẹ́ àjọṣe, ìjẹ́ ojúlówó àkósódù, ìrírí àwọn aṣàmúlò àti ìṣelọ́jọ̀, ipa àti ìgbéléwọ̀n, àgbékalẹ̀ àti ìbánisọ̀rọ̀, pẹ̀lú àwòmọ́ ìwà.
zu: Indlela yokunquma kuhackathon ifaka izinto ezahlukene, okufaka ukwenza kabusha nekhono, ubungcweti kwezobuchwepheshe, ukuxazulula inkinga, ukubambisana nokusebenza ndawonye, ikhodi yokuhle, nesiiliyoni sokusebenzisa nokudweba, umthyelela nesikalo, ukwethulwa nokuxhumana, nokubhekwa kwenkambiso.

am: እያንዳንዱ ቡድንም: የችግሩን መግለጫ፣ የመፍትሄ ሃሳቦችን፣ ዋና ዋና ባህሪያትን እና ተግባራትን፣ እና ጥቅም ላይ የዋሉ ቴክኖሎጂዎችን እና መሳሪያዎችን በማጉላት የፕሮጀክታቸውን ዝርዝር መግለጫ ማቅረብ ይጠበቅባቸው ነበር።
en: Each team was required to submit a detailed overview of their project, highlighting the problem statement, proposed solution, key features and functionality, and technologies and tools used.
ha: Ana buƙatar kowane rukuni ya gabatar da cikakken bayani game da aikinsu, yana nuna bayanin matsalar, da mafita da aka samar, da muhimman fasali da ayyuka, da fasaha da kuma kayan aikin da aka yi amfani da su.
sw: Kila timu ilitakiwa kuwasilisha muhtasari wa kina wa mradi wao, ikiangazia taarifa ya tatizo, suluhisho lililopendekezwa, vipengele muhimu na utendaji kazi, na teknolojia na zana zilizotumiwa.
yo: Ikọ̀ kọ̀ọ̀kan ni wọ́n ní kí wọ́n ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ìsọniṣókí kíkún nípa iṣẹ́ àkànṣe wọn, ṣíṣe àfihàn àwọn ìṣòro ìwádìí, dábàá ọ̀nà àbáyọ, àwọn ìrísí pàtàkì àti iṣẹ́ wọn, àti àwọn ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ àti irinṣẹ́ tí wọ́n lò.
zu: Iqembu ngalinye bekudingeka balethe imininingwane ephelele yephrojekthi yabo, beveza isitatimende senkinga,baphakamise isixazululo,izinto ezibalulekile nokusebenza,nezobuchwepheshe namathuluzi asebenzile.

am: የተከበሩት የዳኞች ቡድን ያካተተው; የቢዝነስ ትራንስፎርሜሽን አፍሪካ ፕሩደንትያል ኃ.የተ.የግ.ማ.(Africa Prudential Plc) ዋና ሀላፊ የሆነውን አንቶኔት ኤዶዶን ፣ የምርት ኢንጂነሪንግ አፍሪካ ፕሩደንትያል ኃ.የተ.የግ.ማ.(Africa Prudential Plc) ኃላፊ የሆነውን ኦሳሆን ኤላይሆ፣ ኦዲት ተንታኝ በአፍሪካ ፕሩደንትያል ኃ.የተ.የግ.ማ.(Africa Prudential Plc) የሆነው ኦሉሴጉን አዴሲና ; በአፍሪካ ፕሩደንትያል ኃ.የተ.የግ.ማ.(Africa Prudential Plc) የቢዝነስ ተንታኝ መሪ የሆነውን ሮይ አናዶቤ ፣ እና ተንታኝ እና የ በልብ አፍሪካ(Bulb Africa) ዋና መሪ ፊሊፕ ንክዋም፤ ሁሉም ተሳታፊ ቡድኖች ባሳዩት ድንቅ ብቃት በጣም ተደንቀዋል።
en: The panel of esteemed judges, consisting of Antoinette Edodo; Head of Business transformation Africa Prudential Plc, Osahon Elaiho; Head of Product Engineering Africa Prudential Plc , Olusegun Adesina; it Audit Analyst Africa Prudential Plc, Roy Anaedobe; Lead Business Analyst Africa Prudential Plc, and Phillip Nkwam Analytics & ML Leader The Bulb Africa, were thoroughly impressed with the outstanding performances of all the participating groups.
ha: Kwamitin alƙalai masu daraja, wanda ya ƙunshi Antoinette Edodo; Shugaban canjin kasuwanci na Africa Prudential Plc, Osahon Elaiho; Shugaban Kamfanin Injiniya na Afirka Prudential Plc, Olusegun Adesina; shi Audit Analyst Africa Prudential Plc, Roy Anaedobe; Jagoran Manazarcin Kasuwancin Afirka Prudential Plc, da Phillip Nkwam Analytics & ML Leader The Bulb Africa, sun gamsu da yadda dukkan rukunin da suka halarci taron suka nuna sha'awarsu sosai.
sw: Jopo la majaji waheshimiwa, likijumuisha Antoinette Edodo; Mkuu wa mageuzi ya biashara Africa Prudential PIc, Osahon Elaiho; mkuu wa uhandisi wa bidhaa Afrca Prudential PIc, Olusegun Adesina; mchambuzi wa mahesabu Africa prudential PIc, Roy Anaedobe; mchambuzi mkuu wa biashara Africa Prudential PIc, na Philip Nkwam mchanganuzi na kiongozi wa ML The Bulb Africa, walifurahishwa sana na maonyesho bora ya vikundi vyote vilivyoshiriki.
yo: Ìgbìmọ̀ àwọn adájọ́ alápọ̀nlé, níbi tí a ti rí Antoinette Edodo; Olórí Àyípadà Òwò Africa Prudential Plc, Osahon Elaiho; Olórí Aṣàmójútó Ohun èlò Africa Prudential Plc , Olusegun Adesina; Ayànnàná Àyẹ̀wò Ìwe Ajé ní Africa Prudential Plc, Roy Anaedobe; Olórí Ayànnàná Òwò Africa Prudential Plc, àti Phillip Nkwam Adarí Ìyànnàná & ML The Bulb Africa, ni orí wọn wú gidi gan-an pẹ̀lú ìṣesí aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ gbogbo àwọn ikọ̀ tó kópa.
zu: Iphaneli yamajaji ahloniphekile, ehlanganisa u-Antoinette Edodo; iHead of Business Afrika Prudentail Plc, u-Osahon Elaiho; iHead of Product Engineering Afrika Prudential Plc, u-Olusegun Adesina; i-IT Audit Analyst Africa Prudential Plc, uRoy Anaedobe; iLead Business Analyist Africa Prudential Plc, kanye noPhillip Nkwam Analytics & ML Leader, eThe Bulb Africa, bajabula ngampela ngokusebenza okuhle kuwona wonke amaqembu abambe iqhaza.

am: አነስተኛ አዋጭ ምርቶቻቸውን (MVPs) ለማሻሻል እና ፕሮጀክቶቻቸውን የበለጠ ለማሳደግ ግንዛቤዎችን እና አስተያየቶችን በመስጠት ለእያንዳንዱ ቡድን በዋጋ የማይተመን ግብረ መልስም ሰጥተዋል።
en: They provided invaluable feedback to each team, offering insights and suggestions to enhance their Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) and further elevate their projects.
ha: Sun ba da ra'ayi mai ƙima ga kowane rukuni, suna ba da haske da shawarwari don haɓaka Mafi ƙarancin Muhimman Kayayyakin (MVPs) da ƙara haɓaka ayyukansu.
sw: Walitoa maoni yenye thamani kwa kila timu, wakitoa maarifa na mapendekezo ili kuboresha bidhaa zao za chini zinaweza kutumika (Mvps) na kuinua zaidi miradi yao.
yo: Wọ́n ń pèsè àríwísí oníyebíye fún ikọ̀ kọ̀ọ̀kan, wọ́n ń pèsè ìwòye àti àwọn àbá láti ṣe àtúnṣe sí ohun èlò onírísí aṣeélò (MVP) wọn àti láti ṣe ìtẹ̀síwájú àgbéga àwọn iṣẹ́ àkànṣe wọn.
zu: Banike iziphakamiso ezibalulekile iqembu ngalinye, benikeza ngemicabango neziphakamiso ukwengeza kuMinimum Viable Products (MVP) futhi baphakamise amaphrojekthi abo.

am: ከተመረጠው ቡድን ጋር የምናጋራውን፣ ስለ ምርቶቻቸው ለበለጠ መረጃ ይህን ቦታ ይመልከቱ።
en: Watch this space for more about their products, which we will share with a select group.
ha: Kalli wannan fili don ƙarin bayani game da samfuransu, waɗanda za mu raba tare da zaɓin rukuni.
sw: Tazama nafasi hii kwa zaidi kuhusu bidhaa zao, ambazo tutashiriki na kikundi teule.
yo: Wo ààyè yìí fún àlàyé sí i nípa àwọn ohun èlò wọn, tí a máa pín fún àwọn irọ̀ tí a bá yàn.
zu: Bheka okunye okuningi ngemikhiqizo yabo,esizokwabelana ngakho neqembu elikhethiwe.

am: " በቡድን 3 ስኬቶች እና በሁሉም የሃካቶን ተሳታፊዎች አስደናቂ ስኬት ኩራት ይሰማናል" ሲሉ የአይ-አካዳሚ ፕሮግራሞች ዳይሬክተር የሆኑት 'ኢቪ ኢክፕሜ-ምባክዌም ተናግረዋል ።
en: "We are incredibly proud of the achievements of Group 3 and all the participants of the hackathon," said Ivy Ikpeme-Mbakwem, Director of Programmes for i-Academy.
ha: Ivy Ikpeme-Mbakwem, Daraktan Tsare-tsare na i-Academy ya ce "Muna matuƙar alfahari da nasarorin Rukuni na 3 da kuma dukkan mahalarta taron gasar.".
sw: "Tunajuvunia sana mafanikio ya kundi la 3 n washirika wote wa hackathon". Alisema Ivy Ikpeme Mbakwem, mkurugenzi wa Programu wa i-Accademy.
yo: "Orí wa wú gidi gan sí àṣeyọrí Irọ̀ 3 àti gbogbo àwọn akópa nínú ìgbọ̀nàẹ̀bùrúwọlé ọlọ́gbọran náà," Ivy Ikpeme-Mbakwem, Adarí Ètò fún i-Academy ló sọ bẹ́ẹ̀.
zu: "Siyaziqhenya kakhulu ngokuzuzwe iQembu 3 kanye nabo bonke ababambe iqhaza kuhackathon,kusho u-Ivy Ikpeme-Mbakwem,uMqondisi weziNhlelo ze-i-Academy.

am: "የእነሱ ቁርጠኝነት፣ ፈጠራ እና የትብብር መንፈስ በሰልጣኞቻችን ላይ ለመቅረጽ የምንጥርባቸውን ባህሪያት በምሳሌነት ያሳያል።"
en: "Their dedication, innovation, and collaborative spirit exemplify the qualities we strive to instil in our trainees.
ha: “Sadaukarwarsu da ƙirƙira, da ruhin haɗin kai suna misalta halayen da muke ƙoƙarin ɗora wa ɗalibanmu.
sw: "Kujitolea kwao, Uvumbuzi, na roho ya ushirikiano ni kielelezo cha sifu tunazo jitahidi kustawisha kwa wanafunzi wetu.
yo: "Ìfọkànsìn wọn, ìmọ̀ ọ̀tun, àti ẹ̀mí àjọṣepọ̀ ṣe àpèjúwe àwọn ìwà tí à ń tiraka láti gbìn sínú àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ wa.
zu: "Ukuzinikela kwabo, ukwenza kabusha,umoya wokubambisana ukhombisa okuhle esifuna ukufaka kwabaqeqeshwayo.

am: "አይ-አካዳሚ (i-Academy) በናይጄሪያ የቴክኖሎጂ ስነ-ምህዳር ላይ አዎንታዊ ተጽእኖ በመፍጠር፣ የቀጣዩን ትውልድ ጥሩ የቴክኖሎጂ መሪዎች ለመንከባከብ እና ለማብቃት ቁርጠኛ ነው."
en: i-Academy remains committed to nurturing and empowering the next generation of well-rounded tech leaders, creating a positive impact in Nigeria's tech ecosystem."
ha: Makarantar i-Academy ta ci gaba da jajircewa wajen rayawa da ƙarfafawa yara da zasu zama manyan gobe ta hanhyar samun ilimimummuka ta ɓangarori da dama na fasaha masu inganci, da samar da tasiri mai kyau a cikin tsarin fasahar Najeriya."
sw: i-Academy bado imejitolea kulea na kuwawezesha kizazi kijacho cha viongozi wa teknolojia na kuleta matokeo chanya katika mfuo wa kiteknolojia wa Nigeria "
yo: i-Academy sì ní ìfọkànsìn láti rè àti láti ró ìran àwọn olórí ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ tí wọ́n kọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ lọ́jọ́ iwájú, pípèse ipa rere ní àwùjọ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ orílẹ̀-ède Nàìjíríà."
zu: I-i-Academy izohlala izimisele ukunakekela nokusiza isizukulwane esizayo ukuba ngabaholi bezobuchwepheshe abazi B2602 umthelela omuhle ku ekhositimu yezobuchwepheshe baseNigeria

am: በጠንካራ የሥልጠና መርሃ ግብሮቹ እና እንደ ሃካቶን ባሉ አሳታፊ ተነሳሽነቶች፣ አይ-አካዳሚ (i-Academy) ለቴክኖሎጂ ኢንደስትሪው ብሩህ የወደፊት ጊዜን በመቅረፅ፣ ተነሳሽነት ላላቸው የቴክኖሎጂ ወዳዶች አስፈላጊውን ችሎታ እና ድጋፍ እየሰጠ ይቀጥላል።
en: Through its rigorous training programs and engaging initiatives like the hackathon, i-Academy continues to shape a brighter future for the tech industry, providing the necessary skills and support to aspiring tech enthusiasts.
ha: Ta hanyar manya-manyan shirye-shiryenta na horarwa da himma kamar gasar nan, i-Academy na ci gaba da tsara kyakkyawar makoma ga masana'antar fasaha, tana mai ba da ƙwarewa da ake buƙata da tallafi ga masu sha'awar fasaha.
sw: Kupitia programu zake bora za mafunzo na mipango shirikishi kama vile hackathon, i-academy inaendelea kuandaa mustakabali mzuuri wa tasnia ya teknolojia, ikitoa ujuzi wa usaidizi unaoitajika kwa wapenda teknolojia wanaotaka.
yo: Nípasẹ̀ ètò ìkọ́ni líle rẹ̀ àti ṣíṣe àwọn ìpìlẹ̀ṣẹ̀ bíi ìgbọ̀nàẹ̀bùrúwọlé ọlọ́gbọran, i-Academy ń tẹ̀síwájú láti ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ọjọ́ iwájú tó dára fún ẹ̀ka ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ, tó ń pèsè ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe tó yẹ àti àtìlẹ́yìn fún àwọn tó nífẹ̀ sí ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tí wọ́n lérò rẹ̀.
zu: Nezinhlelo zayo ezinamandla zokuqeqesha, nokukhuluma ngokuzanywayo njengehackathon, i-i-Academy iyaqhubeka yakha ikusasa eliqhakazile kulemboni yezobuchwepheshe, inikeza amakhono afanele nokwesekwa kwabafufusayo abanentshisekelo yezobuchwepheshe.

am: ስለ አይ-አካዳሚ (i-Academy) እና ፕሮግራሞቹ የበለጠ መረጃ ለማግኘት እባክዎ https://t.me/iacademy23 ን ይጎብኙ
en: For more information about i-Academy and its programs, please visit https://t.me/iacademy23
ha: Domin samun ƙarin bayani game da i-Academy da shirye-shiryenta, da fatan zaku ziyarci https://t.me/iacademy23
sw: Kwataarifa zaidi kuhusu i-Academy na programu zake, tafadhali tembelea https://t.me/iacademy23.
yo: Fún àlàyé síwájú sí i nípa i-Academy àti àwọn ètò rẹ̀, jọ̀wọ́ kàn sí https://t.me/iacademy23
zu: Ngolwazi olwengeziwe nge-i-Academy nezinhlelo zayo, sicela uvakashele http://t.me/eacademy23.
