am: አይ-አካዳሚ (i-Academy)፣ በአፍሪካ ፕሩደንትያል ኃ.የተ.የግ.ማ የተጎለበተ፣ በናይጄሪያ እና ከዚያም ውጭ ያለውን ብቃት ያለው የቴክኖሎጂ ባለሙያ እጥረት ለመፍታት የተዘጋጀ ትምህርታዊ እና ማህበራዊ-ኢኮኖሚያዊ ተነሳሽነት የያዘ ድርጊት ነው።
en: i-Academy, powered by Africa Prudential Plc, is an educational and socio-economic initiative dedicated to addressing the shortage of skilled tech talent in Nigeria and beyond.
ha: i-Academy, wanda Africa Prudential Plc ke tallafawa, shiri ne na ilimi da zamantakewa da tattalin arziki da aka sadaukar don magance ƙarancin ƙwararru a fannin fasaha a Najeriya da sauran su.
sw: i-Academy, inayozaminiwa na Africa Prodential Plc, mipango ya kielemu na kijamii inayijikita kuangazia uhaba wa vipaji vya kiteknolojia nchni Nigeria na kwengineko.
yo: i-Academy, tí Prudential Plc ṣe agbátẹrù rẹ̀, jẹ́ ìpilẹ̀ṣẹ̀ ètò ẹ̀kọ́ àti ọrọ̀ ajé àwùjọ tí wọ́n fi sọrí wíwá ìyanjú sí àìtó àwọn tó lẹ́bùn ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ ní orílẹ̀-ède Nàìjíríà àti jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ.
zu: I-i-Academy isizwa yiAfrika Prudential Plc, eyezemfundo nezomnotho zenhlalo,umzamo obhekele ukubhekana nokuntuleka kwamakhono ethalente lezobuchwepheshe eNigeria nangale kwayo.

am: በዘጠኝ ወራት የሥልጠና መርሃ ግብሩ፣ አይ-አካዳሚ (i-Academy) ወጣት የቴክኖሎጂ ወዳጆችን በቴክኖሎጂ ኢንዱስትሪው ውስጥ አሸንፎ ለመውጣት የሚያስችላቸውን አስፈላጊ ክህሎቶች እና ዕውቀት ያስታጥቃቸዋል።
en: Through its rigorous nine-month training program, i-Academy equips young tech enthusiasts with the essential skills and knowledge needed to thrive in the tech industry.
ha: Ta hanyar manya-manyan shirinta na horarwa na watanni tara, i-Academy tana bawa matasa masu sha'awar fasaha tare da muhimman ƙwarewa da ilimin da ake buƙata don bunƙasa a cikin masana'antar fasaha.
sw: Kupitia mpango wake bora wa mafunzo wa miezi tisa, i-Academy inawapa vjina wanaopenda teknolojia ujuzi muhimu na maarifa yanyohitajika ili kustawi katika tasnia ya teknolojia.
yo: Nípasẹ̀ ètò ìkọ́ni olóṣù-mẹ́sàn líle rẹ̀, i-Academy ró àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tí wọ́n nífẹ̀ sí ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ lágbára pẹ̀lú àwọn ìmọ̀ọ́ṣe pàtàkì àti ìmọ̀ tí wọ́n nílò láti kẹ́sẹjárí ní ẹ̀ka ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ.
zu: Ngohlelo lwayo olunamandl alokuqeqeshwa kwezinyanga eziyisishagalolunye, i-i-Academy iqeqesha abanetshisekelo kwezobuchwepheshe abasha ngamakhono abalulekile nolwazi oludingekayo ukuphumelela kumboni yezobuchwepheshe.

am: የተነሳሽነት ድርጊቱ የፈጠራ እና የትብብር ባህልን በማጎልበት የእድገት እና የእድገት እድሎችን ለመፍጠር ያለመ ነው።
en: The initiative aims to create opportunities for growth and advancement while fostering a culture of innovation and collaboration.
ha: Shirin na nufin samar da damammaki don haɓakawa da ci gaba yayin da ake haɓaka al'adun ƙirƙira da haɗin gwiwa.
sw: Mpango huo unalenga kutengeneza fursa za ukuaji na maendeleo huku ukikuza utamduni wa uvumbuzi na ushirikiano.
yo: Ìpilẹ̀ṣẹ̀ náà ń gbèrò láti pèsè àwọn ànfààní fún ìdàgbàsókè àti ìtẹ̀síwájú nígbà tí yóò tún máa pèsè àṣà ìmọ̀ ọ̀tun àti àjọṣepọ̀.
zu: Lo mzamo uhlose ukwenza amathuba okukhula nokuyisa phambili ngesikhathi ilondoloza isiko lokwenza kabusha nokubambisana.

am: ኢንድራይቭ (InDrive) የእርስዎን-ዋጋ-ጥሩ- የሚለውን ሞዴሉን ወደ 15 ተጨማሪ የናይጄሪያ ከተሞች ማራዘሙን እናም አዳዲስ የጭነት አገልግሎቶችን መጀመሩን አስታወቀ ።
en: InDrive Announces Extension of its Name-Your-Price Model to 15 additional Nigerian cities and launches innovative freight services
ha: InDrive ta sanar da tsawaita SamfurinFaɗi-abin da-zaka biya zuwa ƙarin biranen Najeriya 15 tare da ƙaddamar da sabbin ayyukan jigilar kayayyaki.
sw: InDrive inatangaza upanuzi wa muundo wake wa Jina-lako-bei hadi miji 15ya ziada ya Nigeria na kuzinudua huduma kibunifu za usafirishaji.
yo: InDrive Kéde Ìtèsíwájú Àwòṣe Name-Your-Price rẹ̀ sí Àwọn Ìlú ní Orílẹ̀-ède Nàìjíríà 15 láfikún ó sì tún ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ iṣẹ́ ìbánikẹ́rù ìmọ̀ ọ̀tun.
zu: I-InDrive imemezele ukwelulwa kweModeli ethi Name-Your-Price kumadolobha engeziwe angu-15 aseNigeria futhi yethule ukusebenza okusha kwentuthuko

am: በ15 አዳዲስ ከተሞች ውስጥ ለአሽከርካሪዎች ከዜሮ-ኮሚሽን በሚያቀርበው አገልግሎት ስራዎቹን ያጠናክራል።
en: Bolsters Operations with Zero-Commission Offer for Drivers in 15 New Cities
ha: Ƙarfafa Ayyuka ba tare bawa Hukuma Sisi ba don Direbobi a cikin Sabbin Birane 15
sw: Inaboresha uendeshaji kwa Ofa ya Tume ya Sifuri kwa madereva katika miji 15 mipya.
yo: Ṣàtìlẹ́yìn fún Iṣẹ́ pẹ̀lu Ìpèsè Àdápadà-owó-Òdo fún àwọn Awakọ̀ ní Àwọn Ìlú Tuntun 15.
zu: IBolsters Operations neZero-Commission inikeza abashayeli kumadolobha angu-15

am: እ.ኤ.አ አርብ፣ ሐምሌ 14 2023፣ በአለም አቀፍ ደረጃ እውቅና ያገኘው የተንቀሳቃሽነት እና የከተማ አገልግሎት መድረክ ኢን ድራቭ (inDrive)፣ የአቻ ለአቻ የራይድ ታክሲ አገልግሎቱን ወደ 15 አዲስ የናይጄሪያ ከተሞች ለማራዘም እና 'ኢን ድራቭ ፍሬይት' (inDrive.Freight) የሚባል የጭነት ምርት አገልግሎትን ለማስጀመር እቅድ እንዳለው ገልጿል።
en: On Friday, July 14, inDrive, the globally recognized mobility and urban services platform, revealed plans to extend its peer-to-peer ride-hailing service to 15 new Nigerian cities and to launch a freight product feature called, inDrive.Freight.
ha: A ranar Juma’a, 14 ga watan Yuli, inDrive, dandalin zirga-zirgar jama'a da sabis na birane a duniya, ya bayyana shirye-shiryen tsawaita sabis ɗin yawo tsakanin abokan tafiya zuwa sabbin biranen Najeriya 15 da kuma ƙaddamar da samfurin jigilar kaya mai suna, inDrive.Freight.
sw: Siku ya Ijumaa, Julai 14, InDrive, jukwaa linalotambulika kimataifa la uhamaji na huduma za mijini, lilieneza wazi huduma yake ya usafiri wa boda kwa boda kwa miji mipya 15 ya Nigeria na juzindua kipengele cha bidhaa za mizigo kiitwacho InDrive.Fright.
yo: Ní ọjọ́ Ẹtì, 14 oṣù Agẹmọ, inDrive, ìkànnì ìrìnkèrindò àti ìpèsè iṣẹ́ ní ìlú ńlá tó ti di mímọ̀ káríayé, ṣàfihàn èròngbà láti fẹ iṣẹ́ pípe-awakọ̀ onírọ̀-sí-irọ̀ lójú sí àwọn ìlú 15 tuntun ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà àti láti ṣe ìfilọ́lẹ̀ ìrísí ohun èlò ìbánikẹ́rù tí wọ́n pè ní, inDrive.Freight.
zu: NgoLwesihlanu, ngomhlaka-14 kuNtulikazi, i-inDrive okuhambayo okubonwa umhlaba wonke nenkundla yokusiza emadolobheni, iveze izinhlelo zokwelula izinsiza zokugibela umuntu nomuntu kuya emadolobheni angu-15 eNigeria nokwethula intuthuko yento yomkhiqizo ebizwa nge-inDrive.Freight.

am: ማስታወቂያው የተነገረው፣ በአፍሪካ ውስጥ የስራ ፈጠራ እና ፈጠራን በሚያከብረው፣ በሌጎስ የጅምር ድርጀቶች ሳምንት 2023 ነው።
en: The announcement was made at the Lagos Startup Week 2023, which celebrates entrepreneurship and innovation in Africa.
ha: An sanar da hakan ne a makon Sabbin kamfanoni na Legas 2023, wanda ke bikin kasuwanci da ƙirƙire-ƙirƙire a Afirka.
sw: Tangazo hilo lilitolewa katika wiki ya kuanza lagosi 2023, ambayo inaazimisha ujasiliamali na uvumbuzi barani Afrika.
yo: Wọ́n ṣe ìkéde náà níbi Lagos Startup Week 2033, tí ó ń ṣe àjọyọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn oníṣòwò àti àwọn ìmọ̀ ọ̀tun ní ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀.
zu: Isimemezelo senziwa Kusonto lesiqalo eLagos 2023,eyayibungaza ububhizinisi nokwenza okusha kweAfrika.

am: በ 'ኢን ድራቭ' (inDrive) ናይጄሪያ፣ የንግድ ልማት ተወካይ፣ 'ቲሞቲ ኦላዲሚጂ'፣ ተንቀሳቃሽነትን እያንዳንዱ ሰው ሊኖረው የሚገባ መሠረታዊ ፍላጎት እንደሆነ ገልጿል እናም በ 'ኢን ድራቭ' (inDrive) የታቀደው የ 15-ከተማ ማራዘሚያ፣ ይህንንም በፍትሃዊ እና ግልጽ በሆነ አቻ-ለ-አቻ የራይድ ታክሲ አገልግሎት ሞዴሉ አማካኝነት ለሁሉም ሰው ቀላል ያደርገዋል።
en: Timothy Oladimeji, Business Development Representative, inDrive Nigeria, described mobility as a basic need that every human must have and stressed how the 15-city extension by inDrive makes this very easy for everyone in local communities through its fair and transparent peer-to-peer ride-hailing model.
ha: Timothy Oladimeji, Wakilin Ci Gaban Kasuwanci, inDrive Nigeria, ya bayyana hada-hada a matsayin ainihin buƙatun da kowane ɗan adam dole ne ya kasance kuma ya jaddada haɓakar birni 15 ta hanyar inDrive ya sa wannan ya zama mai sauƙi ga kowa da kowa a cikin al'ummomin gida ta hanyar daidaitattun sauƙin samfurin abin hawa.
sw: Timothy Oladimeji, mwakilishi wa maendeleo ya biashara, InDrive Nigeria, alieleza uhamiaji kama hitajio la kimsingi ambalo kila mwandamu lazima awenalo na kusisitiza jinsi upanuzi wa miji 15 kwa InDrive unayofanya jambo hili kua rahisi kwa kila mtu katika jamii za wenyeji kupitia mtindo wake wa kusafiri wa usawa na uwazi wa rika kwa rika.
yo: Timothy Oladimeji, Aṣojú Ìdàgbàsókè Òwò, inDrive Nigeria, ṣàpèjúwe ìrìnkèrindò gẹ́gẹ́ bíi kòṣeémáàní tí gbogbo ènìyàn gbọ́dọ̀ ní ó sì tẹnumọ́ bí ìfẹ̀lójú sí ìlú-15 látọ̀dọ inDrive ṣe máa sọ èyí di ìrọ̀rùn fún gbogbo ènìyàn ní àwọn àwùjọ ní ẹsẹ̀kùkú nípasẹ àwòṣe pípe-awakọ̀ onírọ̀-sí-irọ̀ rẹ̀ tí ó dára tó sì kó àkóyawọ́.
zu: UTimothy OlAdimeji, uMmeli weZokuthuthukiswa kaMabhizinisi inDrive Nigeria, uchaza ukuhamba njengesidingo ngqangi okumele wonke umuntu abe naso, ugcizelele ukuthi ukwelulwa kwamadolobha angu-15 kwe InDrive kuzokwenza lokhu kubelula kanjani kuwona wonke umuntu emphakathini wasendaweni ngemodeli yokubiza imoto yokukuhambisa kube nokuthembeka nobulungiswa.

am: ለአነስተኛ፣ መካከለኛና ትላልቅ ኢንተርፕራይዞች የሎጂስቲክስ-ድጋፍ ምርት መጀመሩን በማስመልከት 'ኦላዲሚጂ' በመቀጠል ሲናገሩም “ከተተነተነው መረጃ ሰዎች ከ 20 ኪሎ ግራም የሚመዝኑ ፓኬጆችን ለማጓጓዝ የሚረዳ የአሽከርካሪዎች አገልግሎት እንደሚፈልጉ ተረድተናል።
en: Further speaking to the launch of the logistics-support product for small, medium, and large enterprises, Oladimeji said, “From data analyzed, we realized that people wanted a courier service that could help them transport packages that weigh more than 20kg.
ha: Da yake magana game da ƙaddamar da samfurin tallafi na kayan aiki ga ƙananan, da matsakaita, da kuma manyan masana'antu, Oladimeji ya ce, "Daga bayanan da aka bincika, mun gane cewa mutane suna son sabis na jigilar kaya wanda zai iya taimaka musu wajen jigilar mai nauyi fiye da 20kg.
sw: Akiongezea zaidi wakati wa uzinduzi wa bidhaa ya usaidizi wa vifaa kwa biashara ndogo, za kati na kubwa, Oladimeji alisema, "kutokana na takwimu iliochanganuliwa, tuligundua kua watu walitaka huduma ya usafirishaji amabayo ingeweza kuwasaidia kusafirisha vifurushi vyenye uzito wa zaidi ya kilo 20.
yo: Nígbà tí ó ń tẹ̀síwájú nínú ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ lórí àtìlẹ́yìn-ìbánikẹ́rù fún àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ kékeré, àwọn alábọ́dé, àti ilé iṣẹ́ ńlá, Oladimeji sọ wí pé, "Látara dátà tí a yànnàná, a rí i wí pé àwọn ènìyàn fẹ́ ìpèsè iṣẹ́ ìbánikẹ́rù tí ó lè bá wọn gbé àwọn ẹrù tí ó ní ìwọn ju 20kg lọ.
zu: Ngokuqhubeka ngikhulume ekwethulweni kokusekwa kwelojistikhi yomkhiqizo omncane, ophakathi nendawo kanye namabhizinisi amakhulu, u-Oladimeji uthe, "Kusuka ekuhlaziyweni kwemininingo, sibonile ukuthi abantu bafuna izinsiza zokuhambisa nokulanda ipahla lokho kungabasiza ukuthutha amaphekhi asinda ngaphezu kuka-20kg.

am: ስለዚህም የተሻሻለ የአሽከርካሪዎች አገልግሎታችን - 'ኢን ድራቭ ፍሬይት' (inDrive.Freight) - በፍላጎት የሚቀርብ፣ በተመሳሳይ ቀን የማድረስ አገልግሎት ደንበኞቻችን እና ሌሎች የቢዝነስ ባለቤቶቻችን ከ20 ኪሎ ግራም እስከ 20 ቶን የሚመዝኑ ዕቃዎችን ያለምንም ችግር እንዲያጓጉዙ አቅርበናል።"
en: Hence, we introduced an upgraded version of our courier service - inDrive.Freight - an on-demand, same-day delivery service which allows our customers and other business owners to transport goods weighing between 20kg to 20tn, seamlessly.”
ha: Don haka, mun gabatar da ingantaccen tsarin sabis ɗinmu - inDrive.Freight - sabis na isar da buƙatu na yau da kullun wanda ke bawa abokan cinikinmu da sauran masu kasuwanci damar jigilar kayayyaki masu nauyi 20kg zuwa 20tn, ba tare da matsala ba.”
sw: Kwa hiyo,tulianzisha toleo lililoboreshwa la huduma yetu ya usafirishaji, InDrive Fright huduma inayohitajika, siku hiyphiyo ambayo inaruhusu wateja wetu na wamiliki wnegine wa biashara kusafirisha bidhaa zenye uzani kati ya 20kg hadi 20tn, bila matatizo".
yo: Torí náà, a ṣe àfihàn ẹ̀dà àtúnṣe ìpèsè iṣẹ́ ìbánikẹ́rù wa - inDrive.Freight - ìpèsè iṣẹ́ lẹ́sẹ̀kẹsẹ̀, tí yóò já ẹrù lọ́jọ́-kan náà tí yóò fún àwọn oníbàárà wa àti àwọn oníṣòwò mìíràn láti gbé àwọn ẹrù tí ó ní ìwọ̀n láàrín 20kg sí 20tn, láìsí ìdíwọ́.
zu: Ngakho ke, sethule savuselela indlela yezinsiza zokuhambisa impahla- i-inDrive.Freight - efunekayo, izinsiza zokuhambisa ngosuku olulodwa okuvumela amakhasimende kanye nabanikazi bamabhizinisi ukuthi bathuthe izimpahla ezisinda phakathi kuka-20kg kuya ku-20tn, ngaphandle kwenkinga."

am: የንግድ ልማት ተወካዩም በመቀጠል፣ የ 'ኢን ድራቭ ፍሬይት' (inDrive.Freight) ሞጁል፣ ደንበኞች ተመራጭ ዋጋዎችን እንዲያወጡ፣ ተሽከርካሪዎችን እንዲመርጡ እና አሽከርካሪዎችን እንዲመርጡ የሚያስችል ፤ ከአቻ ለአቻ የራይድ ታክሲ አገልግሎት መተግበሪያ ባህሪያትን እንደሚያንጸባርቅም አብራርተዋል።
en: The Business Development Representative went on to explain that the inDrive.Freight module mirrors that of the peer-to-peer ride-hailing app features, that allow customers to set preferable prices, choose vehicles, and select drivers.
ha: Wakilin Ci gaban Kasuwancin ya ci gaba da bayyana cewa samfurin inDrive.Freight yana nuna manhajar abubuwa masu sauƙi, wanda zai bawa abokan ciniki damar saita farashin da aka fi so, zaɓar motoci, da zaɓar direbobi.
sw: Mwakilishi wa maendeleo ya biashara aliendelea kuelezea kuwa sehemu ya inDrive.Fright inaakisi ile ya vipengele vya programu ya kuendesha gari kutoka kwa wenzao, ambayo huruhusu wateja kuweka bei zinazopendekezwa, kuchagua magari na kuchagua madereva.
yo: Aṣojú Ìdàgbàsókè Òwò náà tẹ̀síwájú láti ṣàlàyé wí pé ìsọ̀rí inDrive.Freight jẹ́ àwòkọ́ṣe ìrísí ohun èlò pípe-awakọ̀ onírọ̀-sí-irọ̀, tí ó ń fún àwọn oníbàárà ní ànfààní láti kẹ́ iye owó tí wọ́n fẹ́, yan ọkọ̀, kí wọ́n sì yan awakọ̀.
zu: Ummeli wokuThuthukiswa kwamaBhizinisi waqhubeka wachaza ukuthi i-in Drive.Freight izibuko zemojuli yomuntu nomuntu ukugibela-izinto zesisetshenziswa,evumela amakhasimende ahlele amanani abawancamelayo,ukukhetha izimoto nokukhetha abashayeli.

am: በተጨማሪም ደንበኞች ሊልኩ ያሰቡትን እቃዎች ፎቶግራፍ እንዲያነሱ የሚያስችል ልዩ ባህሪም ያሳያል።
en: It also showcases a unique feature that allows customers to take a picture of goods that they intend to send.
ha: Har ila yau, yana nuna wani nau'i na musamman wanda ke bawa abokan ciniki damar sanin kayan da suke son aikawa.
sw: Pia inaonyesha kipengele cha kipekee ambacho kinaruhusu wateja kupiga picha ya bidhaa ambazo wanakusudia kuzituma.
yo: Ó tún ṣàfihàn ìrísí aláìlẹ́gbẹ́ tí ó ń fún àwọn oníbàárà ní ànfààní láti ya àwòrán ẹrù tí wọ́n ń gbèrò láti fi ránṣẹ́.
zu: Iphinde ikhombise izinto zayo ezahlukile ezivumela amakhasimende athathe izithombe zezimpahla abahlose ukuzithumela.

am: ለንግድ ሥራ ባለቤቶችም፣ ይህ በ 'ኢን ድራቭ ፍሬይት' (inDrive.Freight) አጠቃቀም በኩል ከሚቀርቡት ወጪ ቆጣቢ አማራጮች ጋር የንግድ ባለቤቶቹ የራሳቸውን የአሽከርካሪዎች አገልግሎት ወይም ተጓዳኝ ሎጅስቲክስ ንግዶችን ለማቋቋም ካፒታልን ማፍሰስ ባለመቻላቸው ይህ ለውጥ የሚያመጣ ተፅዕኖ አለው።
en: For business owners, this has a transformative impact as the business owners no longer have to invest capital in setting up their own courier services or adjunct logistics businesses, with cost-saving alternatives offered through the usage of the inDrive.Freight.
ha: Ga masu kasuwanci, wannan yana da tasiri mai canjawa kamar yadda masu kasuwancin ba za su ƙara saka jari ba don kafa sabis na jigilar kayayyaki ko haɗin gwiwar kasuwancin dabaru kai kaya, tare da hanyoyin rage kuɗi da aka bayar ta hanyar amfani da inDrive.Freight.
sw: Kwa wamiliki wa biashara, hii ina athari ya mageuzi kwani wamiliki wa biashara hawahitaji tena kuwekeza mtaji katika kuanzisha huduma zao za usafirishaji au kuunganisha biashara za usafirishaji, na njia mbadala za kuokoa gharama zinazotolewa kupitia matumizi ya inDrive.Freight.
yo: Fún àwọn oníṣòwò, èyí ní ipa àṣàyípadà torí àwọn oníṣòwò ò nílò láti fi owó dókówò láti ṣe àgbékalẹ̀ ìpèsè iṣẹ́ ìbánikẹ́rù tiwọn tàbí àwọn oníṣòwò ìbánikẹ́rù aláfibọ̀, pẹ̀lú bí àfidípò tí ò náni lówó púpọ̀ ṣe wà nípasẹ̀ lílo inDrive.Freight.
zu: Kubanikazi bamabhizinisi lokhu kunomthelela woguquko njengoba abanikazi bamabhizinisi singasekho isidingo sokuthi batshale imali yengqalabhizinisi ukuhlela izinsiza zabo zokuhambisa impahla noma amabhizinisi elojistikhi, ngezinye izindlela zokonga ukubiza ezinikezwa ngokusebenzisa i-inDrive.Freight.

am: ሰኞ፣ ሐምሌ 18፣ በናይጄሪያ በቀጥታ ስርጭት ላይ የ ኢን ድራይቭ (inDrive) ወደ አዲሱ 15 ናይጄሪያ ከተሞች ማስፋፋት በይፋ ይጀመራል።
en: Going live with the launch across Nigeria, on Monday, July 18, inDrive's expansion to the new 15 cities in Nigeria has officially commenced.
ha: A ci gaba da ƙaddamar da shirin a fadin Najeriya, a ranar Litinin, 18 ga watan Yuli, an fara faɗaɗa aikin inDrive zuwa sabbin garuruwa 15 a Najeriya a hukumance.
sw: Mubaashara na uzinduzi Nigeria kote, Juma tatu, Julai 18, upanuzi wa inDrive hadi miji mipya 15 nchini Nigeria umeanza rasmi.
yo: Wọn ó gbé e sáyé pẹ̀lú ìfilọ́lẹ̀ rẹ̀ káàkiri orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà, ní ọjọ́ Ajẹ́, 18, Agẹmọ, fífẹ inDrive lójú sí àwọn ìlú 15 tuntun ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjíríà ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ ní pẹrẹwu.
zu: Kuzobukwa ukwethulwa kuyona yonke iNigeria, ngoMsombuluko ngomhlaka-18 kuNtulikazi, ukwelulwa kwe-inDrive emadolobheni amasha awu-15 eNigeria sekuqalile ngokusemthethweni.
